40001001	Hih in Zeisu Khazih khang ciamtehna ahi hi. Amah in David tapa hi a, David in Abraham tapa ahi hi.
40001002	Abraham tapa Isaac, Isaac tapa Jacob, Jacob tapa Judah le a sanggam pasal teng ahi hi.
40001003	Judah in a zi Tamar tawh a neih a tapa Perez le Zerah, Perez tapa Hezron, Hezron tapa Ram,
40001004	Ram tapa Amminadab, Amminadab tapa Nahshon, Nahshon tapa Salmon,
40001005	Salmon in a zi Rahab tawh a neih a tapa Boaz, Boaz in a zi Ruth tawh a neih a tapa Obed, Obed tapa Jesse,
40001006	Jesse tapa kumpipa David ahi hi. David in Uriah zi tawh a neih a tapa Solomon,
40001007	Solomon tapa Rehoboam, Rehoboam tapa Abijah, Abijah tapa Asa,
40001008	Asa tapa Jehoshaphat, Jehoshaphat tapa Joram, Joram tapa Uzziah,
40001009	Uzziah tapa Jotham, Jotham tapa Ahaz, Ahaz tapa Hezekiah,
40001010	Hezekiah tapa Manasseh, Manasseh tapa Amon, Amon tapa Josiah ahi hi.
40001011	Jeconiah le a sanggam pasal tengin Babylon gamah sala a kipaipih madeuh in a suak Josiah tate ahi uh hi.
40001012	Babylon gama saltan khit ciangin Jeconiah in a neih a tapa Shealtiel, Shealtiel tapa Zerubbabel,
40001013	Zerubbabel tapa Abiud, Abiud tapa Eliakim, Eliakim tapa Azor,
40001014	Azor tapa Zadok, Zadok tapa Achim, Achim tapa Eliud,
40001015	Eliud tapa Eleazar, Eleazar tapa Matthan, Matthan tapa Jacob,
40001016	Jacob tapa Joseph hi a, Joseph in Khazih a kici Zeisu a hong suahna Mary pasal ahi hi.
40001017	Tua hi a, Abraham khang panin David khang ciang a vekin khang sawm le khang li, David khang panin Babylon gama saltang dinga a kimat hun ciang khang sawm le khang li, Babylon gama saltan hun pan Khazih khang ciang khang sawm le khang li mah ahi hi.
40001018	Zeisu Khazih a suahzia hih bang ahi hi. A nu Mary pen Joseph zi dingin zuthawl kipiasa hi a, a kiteenma un Kha Siangtho hangin gai hi ci in kithei hi.
40001019	A lawmpa Joseph in mi lungsim hoih hi a, a lawmnu Mary min daisak nuamlo ahih manin maksim dingin a ngaihsun hi.
40001020	Tua banga a ngaihsut laitak in Topa vantungmi khat a mang sungah kilang a, “David tapa Joseph aw, na lawmnu Mary na teenpih ding lauthawng kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh a sunga a paai nau pen Kha Siangtho hangin nau a paai ahi hi.
40001021	Amah in tapa khat nei dinga, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna panun honkhia ding ahih manin a min ZEISU na phuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40001022	Topa in kamsangpa tunga a gensa thu a tangtun nadingin hih thu khempeuh a piang ahi hi.
40001023	Kamsangpa in, “Ngai un, nungak siangtho khat gaai in Tapa khat nei dinga, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi,” a ci hi. Immanuel a khiatna in, “Eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi,” a cihna ahi hi.
40001024	Joseph a ihmutna panin khanglo a, Topa vantungmi thupiakna bangin a lawmnu a teenpih hi.
40001025	Ahi zongin tua a tacil a suah khit mateng in a lawmnu luppih lo a, a suah ciangin a min dingin ZEISU a phuak hi.
40002001	Kumpipa Herod a maan laitak in Judea gam Bethlehem khua ah Zeisu a suak hi. A suah khit ciangin en in, nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte Jerusalem khuapi a hong tung uh hi.
40002002	Amaute in, “Judah mite Kumpi dinga hong suakpa koi ah om ahi hiam? Nisuahna lam panin ama aksi ka muh uh ciangin amah bia dingin kong pai uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40002003	Kumpipa Herod in tua thu a zak ciangin Jerusalem khua mi khempeuh tawh a patau mahmah uh hi.
40002004	Herod in siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate khempeuh kaikhawm in Khazih suah nading mun a dong hi.
40002005	Amaute in, “Judea gam Bethlehem khua ah a suak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kamsangpa in,
40002006	‘Judah gam Bethlehem khua aw, Judah gam ukpite lakah khuaneu khua ginalo pen na hi kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keima mi Israelte a cing ding Ukpa khat nangma sung panin a piang ding hi,’ ci in a gelh khinzo hi,” a ci uh hi.
40002007	Tua khit ciangin Herod in mipilte samsim a, aksi kilat hun teltak in a dong hi.
40002008	Amah in Bethlehem khua ah amaute sawl a, “Pai unla, tua naupangno va mukhia hamtang un. Kei zong pai in ka va biak theih nadingin na muh khit uh ciangin ka kiangah hong zasakkik un,” a ci hi.
40002009	Amaute in kumpipa vaikhakna a zak khit uh ciangin, a paikhia uh hi. Tua ciangin nisuahna lama a muhsa uh aksi in naupangno omna tung a tun masiah amaute mai ah a pai hi.
40002010	Aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
40002011	Inn sungah a lut uh ciangin naupangno le a nu Mary mu uh a, bokin amah a bia uh hi. A van manphate uh suahkhia in kham, paknamtui le paknamtui kha‑teɠ letsong in a pia uh hi.
40002012	Herod kiangah a paikik nawnloh nadingun Pasian in amaute mang sungah hilh ahih manin lampi dang tawnin amaute gamah a ciahkik uh hi.
40002013	Mipilte a ciah khit uh ciangin Topa vantungmi khat Joseph mang sungah va kilang a, “Tho inla, naupangno le a nu Egypt gamah taipih in. Herod in naupangno that nuam in zong ding ahih manin thu kong zaksakkik mateng tualai ah va om phot un,” a ci hi.
40002014	Joseph zong tho in naupangno le a nu zankimpi mahin Egypt gamah a paikhiatpih hi.
40002015	Herod a sih mateng tualai ah a va om uh hi. Hih in, “Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka samkhia hi,” ci a, kamsangpa tungtawn in Topa gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40002016	Herod in mipilte khemna a theih ciangin heh mahmah 2:11 paknamtui: Greek ah “libanos” kici a, zatui leh biakpiakna a kizang khawm paknamtui nam khat ahi hi. hi. Tua ahih manin mipilte a dotna panin a hun ding seh a, Bethlehem khua le a kim gam sunga om pasalno kum nih le a nuaisiah khempeuh a thatsak hi.
40002017	Kamsangpa Jeremiah in a gensa thu hihlai ah a tangtung hi. Amah in,
40002018	“Ramah khua ah, Tamlawhna, kahna le nakpi in thumna aw kiza hi. Rachel in a tate kahkah a, Amaute om nawnlo ahih manin, A kihehnep ding a ut kei hi,” a ci hi.
40002019	Herod a sih khit ciangin, en in, Egypt gama om Joseph mang sungah Topa vantungmi khat a va kilang hi.
40002020	Amah in, “Naupangno a that nuamte si khinzo ahih manin tho inla naupangno le a nu Israel gamah ciahpih in,” a ci hi.
40002021	Amah zong tho a, naupangno le a nu tawh Israel gam hong zuan uh hi.
40002022	Archelaus in a pa Herod za luahin Judea gam uk hi cih thu a zak ciangin tua gamah pai ngamlo a, Pasian in a mang sunga a hilhkholh mah bangin Galilee gamah a pai hi.
40002023	“Amah Nazareth mi kici ding hi,” ci a, kamsangte gensa thu a tangtun nadingin Nazareth kici khua ah hong pai in tualai ah a teeng hi.
40003001	Tua hun in Judea gam gamlak ah Tuiphumpa John thuhilh in hong pai a,
40003002	“Vantung kumpigam hong nai zo ahih manin na mawhna uh kisikkik un!” ci in a tangko hi.
40003003	Kamsangpa Isaiah in, “Gamlak a kikopa awging in, ‘Topa pai nading lam na sial unla, Ama lampite na tangsak un,’ ci hi,” ci a, a genpa in hih John ahi hi.
40003004	John in kala‑oh mul tawh a kigan puan silhin savun kawnggak tawh a kawng gak a, kauphe le gamlak khuaizu an in a nei hi.
40003005	Tua hun sungin Jerusalem a kipan Judea gam sung khempeuh le Jordan gunkuam mun khempeuh panin John kiangah mite a va pai uh hi.
40003006	Amaute in a mawhnate uh pulak in John in Jordan gunah a tuiphum hi.
40003007	Pharisee pawlte le Sadducee pawlte tampi tui kiphum dinga hong pai John in a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, “A gupha gul suante aw, a hong tung ding Pasian hehna panin a kihemkhia dingin kua in hong hilhkhol ahi hiam?
40003008	Tua ahih manin kisikkikna tawh a kilawm gah na gah un.
40003009	Note lungsim sungah, ‘Ka pa uh Abraham hi,’ ci in kimuang kha kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham tate a suaksak thei hi.
40003010	Tu mahmah in zong singphung tengah hei kinga zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gahlo singkung khempeuh kiphuk in meikuang sungah kikhul ding hi.
40003011	“Kisikkikna tungtawn in note tui kong phum hi. Ahi zongin keima khit ciangin a hong pai ding pa in kei sangin vanglian zaw a, ama khedap tawi dingin zong ka kilawm kei hi. Amah in note Kha Siangtho le mei tawh hong phum ding hi.
40003012	Amah in a buhcilna tual hahsiang dingin a khutah ansi zapna a tawi hi. Antak teng a ansal sungah sung dinga, ansite ahih leh a mit ngeilo meikuang sungah a khul ding hi,” a ci hi.
40003013	Tua ciangin John tui kiphumsak dingin Galilee gam panin Jordan gunah Zeisu a hong pai hi.
40003014	Ahih hangin John in, “Nangmah in kei nong tuiphum ding hi zaw napi in banghang in kei kiangah hong pai zawsop na hi hiam?” ci in a mang nuam kei hi.
40003015	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Thuman khempeuh i tangtungsak ding kilawm ahih manin tu in hong mang in,” a cih ciangin John in zong a mang hi.
40003016	Zeisu tui a kiphum khit ciangin tui sung panin a dingto pah hi. Tua laitak in, en in, vantung kihong a, Pasian Kha in vakhu bangin hong kumsuk in Zeisu tungah a khawl, John in a mu hi.
40003017	Vantung pan thakhat in aw khat hong gingkhia a, “Hihpa in a hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40004001	Tua khit ciangin Dawimangpa ze‑etna thuak dingin Kha in gamlak ah Zeisu a paipih hi.
40004002	Zeisu in sun 40 le zan 40 an a tan khit ciangin a gil a kial hi.
40004003	Tua ciangin a ze‑et ding pa ama kiangah va pai a, “Pasian Tapa na hih leh hih suangte anlum a suah nadingin thu pia in,” a ci hi.
40004004	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “ ‘Mihing in an bek tawh a nungta hilo in Pasian kam panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nungta ding hi zaw hi,’ zci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40004005	Tua khit ciangin Dawimangpa in khuapi siangtho sungah Zeisu lutpih in biakinnpi khumdawn ah a koih hi.
40004006	Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Pasian Tapa na hih leh lengkhiasuk in. Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Amah in nang hong kem dingin, Ama vantungmite thupia dinga, Na khe le suang a kitah khakloh nadingin, A khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding uh hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
40004007	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “ ‘Topa na Pasian na ze‑et kei ding hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
40004008	Dawimangpa in mualsang mahmah khat dawn ah Zeisu paitohpih a, leitung gam khempeuh le tuate thupina teng a vekpi in a lak hi.
40004009	Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Bokin hong bia leteh hih na khempeuh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
40004010	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Satan aw, ka nungah kihemkhia in! ‘Topa na Pasian na bia dinga, ama na bek na sem ding hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
40004011	Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in amah nusia a, en in, vantungmite hong pai in amah a kem uh hi.
40004012	Thong sungah John a kikhiatna thu Zeisu in a zak ciangin Galilee gamah a pai hi.
40004013	Nazareth khua nusia in Zebulun le Naphtali gamnawl, tuilipi gei‑a om Capernaum khua ah a teeng hi.
40004014	Tua in kamsangpa Isaiah gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi. Amah in,
40004015	“Zebulun gam le Naphtali gamke‑te in, Jordan gungal tuili zuatna lampidung ah om a, Gentile‑te teenna, Galilee gamhuam ahi hi.
40004016	Khuamial sunga om tua mite in, A tang mahmah khuavak mu uh a, Sihna gam sung le sihna lim nuai‑a om, Tua mite tungah, Khuavak a tang ta hi,” a ci hi.
40004017	Tua hun a kipan Zeisu thuhilh kipan a, “Vantung kumpigam hong nai zo ahih manin na mawhna uh kisikkik un,” a ci hi.
40004018	Galilee tuilipi gei ah Zeisu a pai laitak in unau nih mu a, Peter a kici Simon le a sanggampa Andrew‑te ahi hi. Amaute ngabeng mi ahih manun tuili ah ngen khuh in a om uh hi.
40004019	Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nung hong zui un, mi mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40004020	Amaute in a ngen uh nusia in Zeisu nung a zui pah uh hi.
40004021	Tua mun pan a paikhiat ciangin a dang unau nihte a mu hi. Amaute in Zebedee tapa James le a sanggampa John hi a, a pa uh Zebedee tawh gunkuang sungah ngen khui in a om uh hi. Amah in amaute a sap ciangin,
40004022	thakhat in a gunkuang le a pa uh nusia in amah a zui uh hi.
40004023	Galilee gam sungteng ah Zeisu vak kawikawi a, kikhopna innte ah thuhilh in vantung kumpigam tawh kipawl lungdamna thu a tangko hi. Amaute laka cinate le natna tuamtuam a nei khempeuh zong a damsak hi.
40004024	Syria gam sung khempeuh ah a minthanna kizel in natna le zawngkhalna a tuamtuam a nei cina khempeuh le dawilutte, a sibuptheite, pumzawte hong paipih uh a, amah in a damsak hi.
40004025	Galilee gam, Decapolis gam, Jerusalem a kipan Judea gam le Jordan gungal panin hong pai mihonpi in amah a zui uh hi.
40005001	Zeisu in mihonpite a muh ciangin mualtung ah kahto in tu a, ama kiangah a nungzuite in hong naih uh hi.
40005002	Tua ciangin amah in thu a hilh inah,
40005003	“A lunggim mite in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam in amaute aa ahi hi.
40005004	A dah a kapte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in hehnepna a ngah ding uh hi.
40005005	A lungnemte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in leitung a luah ding uh hi.
40005006	Gilkial dangtak banga dikna thu a lunggulhte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute a gilvah ding uh hi.
40005007	Midang a hehpih theite in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in hehpihna a ngah ding uh hi.
40005008	Lungsim siangthote in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Pasian a mu ding uh hi.
40005009	Kilemna a bawlte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Pasian tate cihna a ngah ding uh hi.
40005010	Dikna thu hanga bawlsiatna a thuakte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam in amaute aa ahi hi.
40005011	“Keima hangin zahkona, bawlsiatna, a maanlopi a mawhsakna namkim na thuak uh ciangin mihampha na hi uh hi.
40005012	Vantung ah thaman lianpi sang ding na hih manun kipak unla lungdam mahmah un. Note ma‑a kamsangte zong tua bangin a bawlsia zo uh hi.
40005013	“Note in leitung mite aa dingin ci na hi uh hi. Ahih hangin ci pen al nawn kei leh bangci bangin ki‑alkiksak thei ding ahi hiam? Paikhia a mite tuatcil gawp ding longal a kimanna om lo hi.
40005014	“Note in leitung mite aa dingin khuavak na hi uh hi. Mual dawna om khua kiliah theilo hi.
40005015	Kuamah in mei a vak khit ciangin seeng a khuh ngei kei hi. Inn sunga om mi khempeuh in khuavak a ngah theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah meivak a koih zaw uh hi.
40005016	Tuamah bangin mite in note gamtatphate mu a, vana om na Pa uh a phat theih nadingun mite mai ah na khuavak uh na tangsak un.
40005017	“Thukham ahi a, Kamsangte laibu‑te ahi zongin a beisak dinga hong pai hong sa kei un. A beisak dinga hong pai hilo in a kicingsak dinga hong pai ka hi zaw hi.
40005018	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, van le lei a mangthang zongin thukham khempeuh a tangtun khit mateng laimal neu khat ahi a, laimal them khat nangawn ahi zongin a mangthang kei ding hi.
40005019	Tua ahih manin thupiakte lak panin a neupen khat nangawn palsat a, midangte zong a palsat dinga a hilh mi peuhmah vantung kumpigam sungah a neupen kici ding hi. Ahi zongin hih thupiaknate zui in midangte zong a zui dingin a hilh mi peuhmah vantung kumpigam sungah milian a kici ding hi.
40005020	Tua hi a, ken kong cih in ah na dikna uh in thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee‑te dikna a khup zawh kei leh vantung kumpigam sungah na lutthei kei ding uh hi.
40005021	“ ‘Mi na that kei ding hi. Mithatte in thukhenna thuak ding uh hi,’ ci a, tanglai mite tunga a kigensa thu na zazo uh hi.
40005022	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah a sanggampa tungah a thu omlopi a a heh mi in thukhenna a thuak ding lauhuai hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Nang, miginalo‡!’ a ci mi in zong thukhenteɠ thusitna a thuak ding lauhuai hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Nang, mihai!’ a cite hellɠ meikuang sungah a kikhul ding lauhuai hi.
40005023	“Biaknatau ah Pasian biak nading nate tawi‑a na om laitak in na sanggampa nang tungah lungkim lo hi ci a, na phawk leh,
40005024	Pasian na biak nading nate pen biaknatau mai ah koihphot in ciahkik inla, na sanggampa tawh va kilem masa in. Tua khit ciangin paikik inla Pasian na biakna nate piapan in.
40005025	“Na langpa tawh thukhen zum lam na zuat kawmkawm mahin kilem mengmeng in. Tua hi kei leh amah in thukhenpa tungah hong khia in thukhenpa in palikte tungah hong ap dinga, palikte in thong sungah a hong khum ding uh hi.
40005026	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, na liausum dangka na piak khit mateng in thong panin na suakta thei kei ding hi.
40005027	“ ‘Ang na kawm kei ding hi,’ ci a, tanglai mite tunga a kigen thu na zazo uh hi.
40005028	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah mawhnopna lungsim tawh numei khat a en mi peuhmah, tua numei tungah a lungsim mawh zo hi.
40005029	“Tua ahih manin na taklam mitin hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla pai in. Banghang hiam cihleh hellɠ sungah na pumpi bupin hong kikhiat sangin na pumpi nate khat kisia leh a hoih zaw hi.
40005030	Na taklam khutin hong khialhsak leh sattan inla pai in. Na pumpi bupin hellɠ sungah hong kikhiat sangin na pumpi nate khat kisia leh a hoih zaw hi.
40005031	“Tua banah, ‘A zi a ma nuam mi peuhmah in, a zi tungah kikhenna lai pia tahen,’ a cihna thu na thei zo uh hi.
40005032	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah mi khatpeuh in pasal dang tawh a mawhna longal thu dang khatpeuh hangin a zi a mak leh a zi midang tawh a mawh dingin a bawl ahi hi. A kimasa numei a teenpih mi peuhmah zong mi zi tawh a mawh ahi hi.
40005033	“Tua banah, ‘A manlopi in na kiciam kei dinga, ahi zongin Topa tunga na kamciamte tangtungsak in,’ ci in tanglai mite tunga a kigen thu na thei zo uh hi.
40005034	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah na kiciam peuhmah kei un. Vantung in Pasian tokhom ahih manin vantung tawh kiciam kei un.
40005035	Leitung in ama khengakna ahih manin leitung tawh kiciam kei un. A lian Kumpipa khuapi ahi Jerusalem min tawh kiciam kei un.
40005036	Na lutang uh tawh zong kiciam kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh na samzang khat na kangsak, na vomsak thei kei hi.
40005037	Ahi thute, ‘Hi mah hi,’ ci unla, a hilo thute, ‘Hilo hi,’ ci un. Hih zah val in a tam zawk leh gilopa kiang panin a hong piang ahi hi.
40005038	“ ‘Mittang khat tangin mittang khat, hatang khat tangin hatang khat,’ a cihna thu na zazo uh hi.
40005039	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah mi gilopa na dokik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na pang taklam a hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh in.
40005040	Mi khatpeuh in na puanak a hong suh nop manin zumah khiat a hong sawm leh na puan tungsilh zong na piak beh in.
40005041	Zawhthawh thu tawh taiɠ khat hong paipih nuamte, tai nih dong na zui in.
40005042	Hong ngente na pia in. Hong leitawi nuamte na nungngat kei in.
40005043	“ ‘Na vengte it inla, na galte mudah in,’ cih thu na zazo uh hi.
40005044	Ahi zongin ken kong cih in ah na galte na it un. Hong samsiate thupha na pia un. Hong mudahte tungah thupha na bawl un. A hong simmawh mite le hong bawlsia mite aa dingin thu na ngetsak un.
40005045	Tua hi leh vana om na Pa uh tate na hi taktak ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihlote le mihoihte tungah a kibang in ama ni suaksak a, midikte le midiklote tungah guah zong a zusak tuak hi.
40005046	Hong itte bek it le uh teh bang lemlawh tuam ding na hi uh hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in zong amau a itte it uh hilo ahi hiam?
40005047	Na lawmte bek maitai le uh teh midangte sangin na hoih zawkna uh bang om tuan ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in zong tua bangmah in hih uh hilo ahi hiam?
40005048	Tua ahih ciangin vana om na Pa uh a hoihkim bangin note zong na hoihkim un,” a ci hi.
40006001	“Na hoih na sep uh ciangin mite muh theihtheih dingin na hih khakloh nadingun kidawm un. Tua hi kei leh vantung a om na Pa un thaman a hong pia kei ding hi.
40006002	“Tua ahih manin a kitangsam mite huhna na piak uh ciangin a kineihkhem mite piak bangin pia kei un. Amaute in midangte pahtak ding lametna tawh kongzing lak le kikhopna innte ah pengkul tumkawmsa in a pia uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amaute in thaman a ngah zo uh hi.
40006003	Ahi zongin note in a kitangsam mite huhna na piak uh ciangin na taklam khut tawh na piakte uh na veilam khut theisak kei un.
40006004	Tua hi leh a kitangsam mite na huhnate uh kilangkhia lo dinga a kilanglote a mu na Pa un a kilangtang in thaman hong pia ding hi.
40006005	“Thu na nget uh ciangin zong a kineihkhem mite hih bangin hih kei un. Amaute in mite muh theihtheih dingin kikhopna innte le lamkabom khawng ah dinga, thunget ding a ut uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amaute in thaman a ngah zo uh hi.
40006006	Note in thu na nget uh ciangin inndei sungah lut unla kong na khak khit uh ciangin a kilanglo a om na Pa uh kiangah ngen un. Tua hi leh a kilanglote a mu na Pa un a kilangtang in thaman hong pia ding hi.
40006007	Thu na nget uh ciangin lawkite bangin na gen sasa uh gen phapha kei un. Amaute in gen pha kikkik le uh a ngahdeuh ding kisa uh hi.
40006008	Tua ahih manin amaute bang hi kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh na Pa un na kisapnate uh na ngetma un a thei khinzo hi.
40006009	“Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu na ngen un, Vantung a om kote Pa aw, Na min siangtho kizahtak hen.
40006010	Na kumpigam hong piang tahen. Vantung ah na deihna a kisep mah bangin, Leitung ah zong kisem tahen.
40006011	Tuni a ka nek ding uh an hong pia in.
40006012	Ko tunga hong khialte ka maisak uh bangin, Kote khialhna zong hong maisak ta in.
40006013	Ze‑etna sungah hong lutsak kei inla, Gilopa kiang panin hong honkhia in. Banghang hiam cihleh ukzawhna, Vangliatna le minthanna, Nang aa ahi tawntung hi. Amen.
40006014	“Mite khialhnate na maisak uh leh vana om na Pa un zong note khialhnate hong maisak ding hi.
40006015	Mite khialhnate na maisak kei uh leh na Pa un zong note khialhna hong maisak lo ding hi.
40006016	“Tua banah an na tan uh ciangin, a kineihkhem mite bangin na mai uh vulsak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in antang ahihna uh mite mai ah a kilat theih nadingin a maipuak uh a khel uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amaute in thaman a ngah zo uh hi.
40006017	Ahi zongin note in an na tan uh ciangin na lu uh sathau nilh unla na mai uh phiat un.
40006018	Tua hi leh na antan lam uh mite mai ah kilang lo dinga, a kilanglo a om na Pa uh mai bekah a kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin a kilanglote a mu na Pa un a kilangtang in thaman a hong pia ding hi.
40006019	“Na sum na paite uh nget in a nek theihna, a kekseu theihna le gutate in luh in a guk theihna hih leitung ah khol kei un.
40006020	Nget in a nek theih lohna, a kekseu theih lohna, gutate in luhin a guk theih lohna vantung ah khol zaw un.
40006021	Banghang hiam cihleh na sum a omna munah na lungsim zong a om ding hi.
40006022	“Mittang in pumpi aa dingin meivak ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na mit a ciim leh na pumpi bup a vak ding hi.
40006023	Ahih hangin na mit a mial leh na pumpi bup a mial ding hi. Tua ahih manin na sunga om khuavak pen khuamial hi leh a nak mial mahmah ding hi.
40006024	“Kuamah in to nih na semkhawm zolo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khat mudah in khat a it ding hi. Ahih keileh khat tungah kipia in khat a simmawh ding hi. Note in Pasian aa ding le sum le pai aa dingin na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.
40006025	“Tua ahih manin note kianga kong cih in ah, bang ne in bang dawn ding ka hi hiam ci in nuntak nading lunghimawh kei un. Bang silh bang teeng ding ka hi hiam ci in pumpi aa ding lunghimawh kei un. Nek le dawn sangin nuntakna thupi zaw a, silh le teen sangin pumpi thupi zaw hilo ahi hiam?
40006026	Vana leng vasate en dih un. Amaute in khaici tuh lo, an zong la loin bem le salah zong an a khol kei uh hi. Ahi zongin, vana om na Pa un amaute an a vak hi. Vasate sangin manpha zaw hilo na hi uh hiam?
40006027	Na lunghimawh manun na tun uh tong khat nangawn a behlap thei kua om na hi uh hiam?
40006028	“Tua ahih leh banghang in puansilh ding lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a unokpakte khankhiatzia ngaihsun dih un. Amaute in na sem loin khau zong khek lo uh hi.
40006029	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah Solomon in a minthanna puan tawh kizem a a om laitak nangawn in hih pakte khat zahin hoih zo nailo hi.
40006030	Upna neu mite aw, tuni in oma zingciang in meikhuk ah a kikhul ding gamlak a pakte nangawn Pasian in tua bangin puansilh guan ahih leh note hong limguat zawkan ding hilo ahi hiam?
40006031	Tua ahih manin, ‘Bang ka ne dinga, bang ka dawn ding hiam, bang silh dinga bang teeng ding ka hi hiam?’ ci in lunghimawh kei un.
40006032	Gentile‑te in hih thute khempeuh a zon pipen uh ahi hi. Vana om na Pa un hih na khempeuh na kisap lam uh a hong thei hi.
40006033	Tua ahih manin Pasian kumpigam le ama dikna zong masa un. Tua hi leh amah in hih nate khempeuh a hong piak beh ding hi.
40006034	Tua ahih manin zingciang aa dingin lunghimawh khol kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh zingciang vai ding zingciang mahin hong lunghimawh ding hi. Tuni a lungkhamna pen tuni aa dingin kicing khin hi.
40007001	“Thukhenna na thuak loh nadingun midangte tungah thu na khen kei un.
40007002	Banghang hiam cihleh midangte tunga thu na khen bangun no tungah zong thu hong kikhen ding hi. Note zat tehna tektek mah tawh note aa dingin a hong kitehsakkik ding hi.
40007003	“Nangma mita singluang phawk kha loin banghang in na sanggampa mita ninthem muhsak na hi hiam?
40007004	Ngaihsun dih in na mit ah singluang khat om napi banghang in na sanggampa kiangah, ‘Na mita ninthem hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei na hi hiam?
40007005	A kineihkhem mipa aw! Nangma mita singluang lakhia masa in. Tua hi leh na sanggampa mita ninthem telmuh in na lakkhiatsak thei pan ding hi.
40007006	“A siangtho nate uite pia kei un. Kepsuangmanphate zong vokpi mai ah lot kha kei un. Na lotkhak leh a khe tawh tuangawp in kihei in nang a hong petgawp ding hi.
40007007	“Ngen un, hong kipia ding hi. Zong un, na mu ding uh hi. Kiu un, hong kihon ding hi.
40007008	Banghang hiam cihleh a ngente in ngah a, a zongte in mu in, a kiute kong kihon hi.
40007009	“Note lakah a ta in anlum ngen leh suang a pia ding,
40007010	ngasa ngen leh gul a pia ding kua om na hi uh hiam?
40007011	No mihoihlote nangawn in na tate uh na hoih piak ding thei na hih uh leh vana om na Pa un ama kianga a ngente na hoih hong pia zawthamlo ding ahi hiam!
40007012	Tua ahih manin note tunga hong kibawl dinga na deih khempeuh uh midangte tungah zong na bawl un. Thukham le Kamsangte laibu‑te zong hih thu mah ahi hi.
40007013	“Kong kawcik ah lut un. Banghang hiam cihleh siatna mun tun nading kongpi zai a, lampi zong tanzau ahih manin mi tampi in tua lampi a tawn uh hi.
40007014	Nuntakna mun tun nading kong kawcik a, lampi zong neu ahih manin mi tawmcik bekin a zui uh hi.
40007015	“A lungsim tawng uh ngia bangin gilo napi tuuvun silh a, note kianga a hong pai kamsangzuaute na kidawm un.
40007016	Amaute bangci mi hiam cih a gah panun na thei ding uh hi. Lingkung panin lenggah kilo thei ahi hiam? Thangling kung panin theigah kilo thei ahi hiam?
40007017	Tua ahih manin singkung hoih leh a gah hoih in singkung hoih kei leh a gah zong a hoih kei hi.
40007018	Singkung hoih in gah hoihlo gah theilo a, singkung hoihlo in gah hoih a gah thei kei hi.
40007019	Gah hoih a gahlo singkung khempeuh kiphuk in meikuang sungah kikhul ding hi.
40007020	Tua ahih manin amaute bangci mi hiam cih a gah panun na thei ding uh hi.
40007021	“ ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci peuhmah vantung kumpigam sungah a lutkim kei ding uh hi. Vana ka Pa deih banga a gamtate bek a lut ding uh hi.
40007022	Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw, nangma min tawh kamsang in thugen hilo ka hi uh hiam? Nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia in nangma min tawh nalamdang bawl hilo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
40007023	Tua ciangin, ‘Note kong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a bawl mite aw, ka kiang panin paikhia un!’ ka ci ding hi.
40007024	“Tua ahih manin hih ka thugente za‑a a zui mi khatpeuh in suangpi tunga innlam mipilpa tawh kibang hi ci in ka gen ding hi.
40007025	Guahzu in tui hong khang a, huihpi nungin tua inn a nawk hangin suangpi tungah kilam ahih manin a puk kei hi.
40007026	Hih ka thugente za napi in a zuilo mi in, sehnel tunga innlam mihaipa tawh kibang hi ci in ka gen ding hi.
40007027	Guahzu in tui hong khang a, huihpi nungin tua inn a nawk ciangin a puk hi. Tua pukna in a lian mahmah pukna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40007028	Zeisu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin mihonpite in a thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
40007029	Banghang hiam cihleh thukhamhilh siate bangin hilh loin thuneipa bangin a hilh hi.
40008001	Zeisu mualtung pan hong kumsuk khit ciangin mihonpite in amah a zui uh hi.
40008002	Tua ciangin, en in, miphak khat hong pai in amah bia a, “Topa aw, hong damsak nuam lecin nong damsak thei hi,” a ci hi.
40008003	Zeisu in a khut zanin amah lawng a, “Kong damsak nuam hi, damta in,” ci a, thu a piak ciangin thakhat in a dam pah hi.
40008004	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Hih thu kuama kiangah gen kei in. Ahi zongin pai inla siampipa kiangah va kilak in. Amaute tungah teci ahi dingin Moses hong thupiakna bangin biakpiakna khat va pia in,” a ci hi.
40008005	Capernaum khua ah Zeisu a lut ciangin galkap 100 ukpa khat hong pai in,
40008006	“Topa aw, ka inn ah ka nasempa a pumzaw in lumcip a, genthei mahmah hi,” ci in a ko hi.
40008007	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Hong pai in amah ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008008	Tua ciangin galkap 100 ukpa in dawngkik a, “Topa aw, ka inn sunga nong lut ding ka kilawm kei hi. Thu pia ziau leteh ka nasempa a dam ding hi.
40008009	Banghang hiam cihleh kei zong mite khutnuai‑a om ka hi a, kei khut nuai ah zong galkapte a om hi. Khat kiangah, ‘Va pai in,’ ka cih ciangin a pai hi. A dang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cih ciangin a hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
40008010	Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, amah a zui mite kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Israel mite lak nangawn ah hi zahtak a lian upna a nei ka mu ngei kei hi!
40008011	Ken kong cih in ah nisuahna le nitumna lam panin mi tampi hong pai in Abraham, Isaac le Jacob‑te tawh vantung kumpigam sungah a tukhawm ding uh hi.
40008012	Ahi zongin tua kumpigam tate ahih leh a pualam khuamial lakah a lawnkhia ding hi. Tua munah kahna leh hagawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008013	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in galkap 100 ukpa kiangah, “Ciahkik in. Na upna bangin nang aa dingin piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua hun lian mahin a nasempa a dam hi.
40008014	Tua khit ciangin Peter inn ah Zeisu hong hawh in Peter sunghnu nattun in lupna tunga lum a mu hi.
40008015	Amah in tua nu khut a lawn ciangin a natna dam a, tho in amaute zin a do pah hi.
40008016	Nitak lam ciangin dawilut mi tampi Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uh a, tua dawite kam khat pauna bek tawh a hawlkhia ziau hi. Cina khempeuh zong a damsak hi.
40008017	Hih thu in, “Amah in i zawngkhalna teng lakhia in, I cinatna teng a pua hi,” ci a, kamsangpa Isaiah in a gensa thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
40008018	Zeisu in ama kima om mihonpite a muh ciangin gal khat lamah galkah dingin a nungzuite thu a pia hi.
40008019	Tua laitak in thukhamhilh siapa khat ama kiangah hong pai a, “Sia aw, na paina peuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008020	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ngiate in kua nei uh a, vana leng vasate in zong bu a nei uh hi. Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngakh nading mun a nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
40008021	Tua khit ciangin ama nungzuite khat in, “Topa aw, ka pa vui dingin hong paisak masa phot in,” a ci hi.
40008022	Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Hong zui in. Misi pen misite mahin na vui uh hen,” a ci hi.
40008023	Gunkuang sungah amah a kahtoh ciangin a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
40008024	Tua ciangin tuilipi tungah thakhat in huih khauh mahmah hong nung a, tuihual in gunkuang a tum dekdek hi. Zeisu ahih leh a ihmu hi.
40008025	A nungzuite ama kiangah pai in phong uh a, “Topa aw, a simang ding ka hita uh hi, hong hon in!” a ci uh hi.
40008026	Zeisu in, “Upna neu mite aw, banghang in hi zahtak in lau na hi uh hiam?” a cih khit ciangin tho a, huihpi le tuihual a taii leh a dai pah hi.
40008027	Amaute in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa bangci bang mi hi zawzen ahi hiam? Huihpi le tuihualte nangawn in ama thu a mang tazen uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40008028	Zeisu tuilipi galkhat a om Gergesa mite teenna kuam a tun ciangin dawilut mi nih han pan hong paikhia uh a, amah a na dawntuah uh hi. Amaute gilo in gamhtat mahmah uh ahih manin kuamah in tua lampi a tawn ngam kei uh hi.
40008029	Amaute thakhat in awng uh a, “Pasian Tapa Zeisu aw, nang tawh ka kisaina uh bang om ahi hiam? A hun tung nailopi in kote bawlsia dinga hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40008030	Amaute tawh a kigamla simsim ah vok honpi khat a om hi.
40008031	Dawite in ama kiangah, “Nong hawlkhiat leh hualai a vok honte sungah hong lutsak in,” ci in a thum uh hi.
40008032	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pai un,” ci in thupia a, tua dawite paikhia in vok honte sungah a lut uh hi. Thakhat thu mahin vok hon khempeuh ken lakah taiphialsuk uh a, tuilipi sung kidenna in a si khin uh hi.
40008033	Vokcingte tai pah vingveng uh a, dawilut mite tunga thupiang khempeuh khua sungah a va ko uh hi.
40008034	Tua ciangin tua khua mite a khuazang un Zeisu en dingin hong paikhia uh a, a muh uh ciangin amau gam panin a paikhiat nading a thum uh hi.
40009001	Tua ciangin Zeisu gunkuang tuangin galkah a, ama khua a tung hi.
40009002	Tua leh, en in, pumzaw mi khat a lupna tawh zawng in ama kiangah a hong paipih uh hi. Zeisu in amaute upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, lungnuam in na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
40009003	Tua thu a zak phetun thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat in a lungsim uh ah, “Hihpa Pasian tungah a pausia hi!” a ci pah uh hi.
40009004	Zeisu in amaute lungsim thei ahih manin, “Banghang in note lungsim sungah thusia ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
40009005	‘Na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding le, ‘Tho inla lampai in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam?
40009006	Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawhmaisak theihna thu a neih lam na theih nadingun,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho in, na lupna pua inla, na inn ah ciah in,” a ci hi.
40009007	Tua pa zong tho in a inn ah a ciah hi.
40009008	Mihonpite in hih thupiang a muh uh ciangin, lamdangsa mahmah uh a, mihingte tungah tua bang vangliatna a pia Pasian a phat uh hi.
40009009	Tua mun panin Zeisu paisuak a, siahdonna buuk sunga a tu Matthew kici mi khat a muh ciangin, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi. Matthew zong dingkhia in Zeisu a zui hi.
40009010	Inn sungah Zeisu an ne‑a a tut laitak in, en in, siahdongte le mawhneite tampitak hong pai in Zeisu le a nungzuite tawh ankuang a umkhawm uh hi.
40009011	Pharisee pawlte in a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Banghang in na siapa un siahdongte le mawhneite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40009012	Tua thu a zak ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mi cidamte aa dingin siavuan kisam lo a, mi cinate aa ding bekin kisam hi.
40009013	Ahih hangin va pai unla, ‘Gangawh biakna sangin hehpihna ka deih zaw hi,’ a cihna thu a khiatna va kantel phot un. Banghang hiam cihleh midikte sam dinga hong pai ka hi kei hi. Mawhneite a kisikkik theih nadingun a sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
40009014	Tua khit ciangin John nungzuite a kiangah hong pai uh a, “Kote le Pharisee pawlte in an ka tang zelzel uh hi. Banghang in na nungzuite in antang lo uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40009015	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhop sungun a lawm a gualte thum le tau in ombuang ding uh ahi hiam? Ahih hangin amaute kiang pan zineipa a kilakkhiat hun hong tung dinga, tua ciangin bel an a tang ding uh hi.
40009016	“Puan lui a kiphop ciangin kuamah in a ton nailo puanbek a thak tawh a phop kei hi. Tua bangin phop leh a phopna puanbek a thak in puan lui kaikek in, a kekna a zai semsem ding hi.
40009017	Kuamah in savun um lui sungah lenggahtui thak a thun kei hi. Tua bangin kithun leh savun um puakkham in lenggahtui teng luangkhia dinga, savun um zong a kisia ding hi. Lenggahtui thakte savun um thak sung mahah a kithun hi. Tua hi leh a nih tuakin bitkhawm in sawtveipi kikoih thei hi,” a ci hi.
40009018	Hih thute a gengen laitak in, en in, makaipa khat hong pai in amah bia a, “Ka tanu tu mahmah in a si hi. Ahi zongin nang hong pai in a tungah na khut nga leteh a hing ding hi,” a ci hi.
40009019	Zeisu dingkhia in amah zui a, a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
40009020	Tua laitak in kum sawm le kum nih sung tawntung siluang natna a vei numei khatin Zeisu nunglam panin a puanmongtep thakhat in a va lawng hi.
40009021	Amah in a lungsim sungah, “A puan va lawng beek leng zong ka dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
40009022	Zeisu a nunglam ah kihei a, amah a muh ciangin, “Ka tanu aw, lungnuam in, na upna in a hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lian mahin tua numei a dam hi.
40009023	Makaipa inn sungah Zeisu a lut ciangin tamngai tumte le kap a gamlum ngeingai mihonpi a mu hi.
40009024	Tua ciangin amah in tua mite kiangah, “Na awn un. Numeino a si hilo in a ihmu ahi hi,” a cih leh amaute in zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi.
40009025	Ahih hangin Zeisu in mihonpi a pusuahsak khit ciangin inn sungah lut a, numeino khut a let ciangin numeino a tho hi.
40009026	Hih thu tua gam mun khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
40009027	Tua mun pan Zeisu a paikhiat ciangin, mittaw nih in amah zui uh a, “David Tapa aw, kote hong hehpih in!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
40009028	Inn sungah amah a lut ciangin, mittaw nihte in zong a zui uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Na mit uh a vaksak thei dingin nong um uh hiam?” ci in dong a, amaute in, “Kong um uh hi Topa aw,” a ci uh hi.
40009029	Tua ciangin amah in a mit uh lawnsak a, “Na upna bangun, note tungah hong piang tahen,” a cih leh,
40009030	a mit uh kihong pah hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu kuamah theisak peuhmah kei un,” ci in khauhtak in thu a pia hi.
40009031	Ahih hangin amaute paikhia uh a, tua gam sung khempeuh ah ama thu a kizelsak uh hi.
40009032	Tua mi nihte a paikhiat laitak mah un, en in, a pautheilo dawilut mi khat ama kiangah hong paipih uh hi.
40009033	Amah in dawi a hawlkhiat ciangin, a pautheilo pa hong pauthei pah hi. Mihonpi in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Israel mite lakah hih bang i mu ngei kei hi!” a ci uh hi.
40009034	Ahih hangin, Pharisee‑te in, “Amah in dawi mangpipa min suangin dawigilote a hawlkhia ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
40009035	Tua bangin khuapi khuata kici tengah Zeisu vak kawikawi in amaute kikhopna innte ah thu a hilh hi. Pasian kumpigam lungdamna thu tangko in cina le natna tuamtuam a nei mi khempeuh a damsak hi.
40009036	Amah in mihonpite a et ciangin hehpihhuai a sa mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute a cing omlo, a thabei, a kithehthang zelzul tuute tawh kibang uh hi.
40009037	Tua hi a, a nungzuite kiangah, “An lak ding tam mahmah napi nasemte a tawm hi.
40009038	Tua ahih manin an la ding nasemte hong sawl nadingin an nei Topa kiangah ngen un,” a ci hi.
40010001	Zeisu in a nungzui sawm le nihte sam a, dawigilote hawlkhiat theih nading le cinatna nam khempeuh le natna namkim a damsak theih nadingun thuneihna a pia hi.
40010002	Tua sawltak sawm le nihte min in a khatna ah Peter kici Simon le a sanggampa Andrew, Zebedee tapa James le a sanggampa John,
40010003	Philip le Bartholomew, Thomas le siahdongpa Matthew, Alphaeus tapa James, Thaddaeus a kici Lebbaeus,
40010004	Canaan mi Simon le amah a lehhekpa Judas Iscariot‑te ahi uh hi.
40010005	Zeisu in tua sawm le nihte sawlkhia in amaute kiangah, “Gentile‑te kiangah pai kei unla, Samaria mite khua ah zong lut kei un.
40010006	Tuu banga a gammang Israel innkuante kiang bekah pai un.
40010007	Na pai ciangun, ‘Vantung kumpigam hong naita hi,’ ci in tangko un.
40010008	Cinate damsak unla, miphakte damsak un. Misite thosak in dawite hawlkhia un. Man piak loh a na ngah bangun manngen loin na pia un.
40010009	Kham, ngun le sumngote sumbawm sungah keng kei un.
40010010	Lampi a na zat ding uh thungip, puanak nih, khedap le ciangkhut cihte zong keng kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh nasempa in a nekkhop a ngah dingin a kilawm hi.
40010011	“Khuapi khuata mun khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin, zintun nadingin a kilawm mi kan unla, na ciah mateng un tua inn ah tamsuak un.
40010012	Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangun hopih un.
40010013	Tua innkuan in nopna ngah dinga a kilawm leh note piak nopna ngah henla, a kilawm kei leh note tungah tua nopna hong tungkik hen.
40010014	Note hong nolha na thu uh a ngai nuamlo mi khatpeuh a om leh tua inn hiam tua khua hiam pan na ciah uh ciangin note khe tunga leivuite singkhia un.
40010015	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, thukhen ni ciangin Sodom le Gomorrah khuate thuakna in tua khua thuakna sangin a thuaknop zaw lai ding hi!
40010016	“Ngai un, ngiahon laka a kikhah tuute bangin note kong sawlkhia hi. Tua ahih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un.
40010017	Mite in thukhente khut ah hong apin kikhopna innte ah hong sat ding uh ahih manin kidawm un.
40010018	Keima hangin kumpite le mangpite mai ah hong puak ding uh a, tua in amaute le Gentile‑te tungah teci na suah nading uh ahi hi.
40010019	Amaute in hong ap uh ciangin bang thu genin bangci gen ding cih lungkham khol kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh na thu gen ding uh a hun lianin hong kihilh ding hi.
40010020	A gen ding note hilo in note sung panin na Pa uh Kha in a gen ding hi.
40010021	“Unau khat le khat a sih nadingun a kilehhek ding uh hi. Pa in a tate lehhek dinga, tate in a nu le a pa langpan in a si dingin a lehhek ding uh hi.
40010022	Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a tawp donga a kipte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
40010023	Hih khua ah hong kibawlsiat leh khua dang khat ah tai un. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Israel gam khua khempeuh na khitma un Mihing Tapa a hong pai ding hi.
40010024	“Nungzuipa in a siapa sangin lian zawlo a, nasempa in a topa sangin lian zawlo hi.
40010025	Nungzuipa in a siapa tawh hong kibang a, nasempa in a topa tawh a kibat leh phazo hi. A inntekpipa Beelzebubɠ hi ci khin uh ahih teh a innkuanpih dangte bel nakcih zawkan lo ding uh ahi hiam!
40010026	“Tua ahih manin amaute kihta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a kilang lo dinga a kisincip thei le a kithei lo dinga a ki‑iimcip thei bangmah a om kei hi.
40010027	“Khuamial sunga kong gen thute khuavak ah gen un. Na zak thute uh innkhumzang panin tangkokhia un.
40010028	Pumpi bek that thei‑a kha a that theilote kihta kei un. Ahi zongin kha le pumpi a nih in hellɠ sungah a khia theipa kihta un.
40010029	Kawlgit nih ciangin dangkasanɠ tang khat tawh kizuak hilo ahi hiam? Tuate khat nangawn na Pa uh deihna om loin lei ah a mawkkiat kei hi.
40010030	Note lutung a samzang khempeuh zong a kisim khinzo ahi hi.
40010031	Tua ahih manin lau kei un. Kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha zaw uh hi.
40010032	“Tua hi a, mite mai ah kei a hong pawlpih mi peuhmah vana ka Pa mai ah zong ka sang ding hi.
40010033	Mite mai ah kei a hong nial mi peuhmah vana ka Pa mai ah zong ka nial ding hi.
40010034	“Leitung ah kilemna bawl dinga hong pai hi ci in hong ngaihsun kei un. Ahi zongin kilemna bawl ding hilo in namsau khah dinga hong pai ka hi zaw hi.
40010035	Tapa le a pa, tanu le a nu, monu le teknu a kilangpansak dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
40010036	Mi khat galin ama innkuanpihte mah ahi ding hi.
40010037	“Kei sangin a nu a pa, a tanu a tapa a it zawte kei tawh kipawl theilo hi.
40010038	Ama singlamteh pua loin ka nung a hong zuite zong kei tawh kituak lo hi.
40010039	A nuntakna a hu nuam mi in a nuntakna tan dinga, keima hanga a nuntakna a tan mi in nuntakna a ngah ding hi.
40010040	“Note hong sang mi in kei hong sang hi a, kei hong sang mi in kei a hong sawlpa zong a sang ahi hi.
40010041	Kamsang khat pen kamsang ahih mana a sang mi in tua kamsangpa ngah bangbang thaman a ngah ding hi. Midik khat pen midik ahih mana a sang mi in tua midikpa ngah bangbang thaman a ngah ding hi.
40010042	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih naupangnote khat peuhpeuh keima nungzui ahih mana tuivot haikhat nangawn a suah mi peuhmah in thaman ngah loin a om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
40011001	Zeisu in nungzui sawm le nihte thu a piak khit ciangin khuapite ah thugen ding le thuhilh dingin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
40011002	John in thongsung panin Khazih nasepnate a zak ciangin a nungzuite nih sawl a,
40011003	“Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam, ahih keileh a dang khat lamen lai ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dongsak hi.
40011004	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Pai unla, na muhsa na zaksa khempeuh uh John kiangah va gen un.
40011005	Mittawte in khuamu in khebaite lam a pai uh hi. Miphakte damsiang uh a, bengngongte in khua a za uh hi. Misite kithokiksak a, mizawngte tungah lungdamna thu a kihilh hi.
40011006	Keima hanga a puklo mi in mihampha ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40011007	Amaute a paikhiat khit uh ciangin John tawh kisai Zeisu in mihonpite kiangah a gen in ah, “Bang en dingin gamlak ah paikhia na hi uh hiam? Huihin a mut ciangin a kihuang diamdiam pumpeng kungte en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam?
40011008	Ahih keileh bang en ding na hi uh hiam? Puansilh nel niknek tawh a kizem khatpeuh en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? En un, puannel niknek a silhte in kumpi inn sunga a teengte ahi uh hi.
40011009	Tua ahih leh bang en ding taktak a paikhia na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa khat en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Hi takpi hi. Note kong gen in ah, amah in kamsang mawkmawk khat ciang bek hilo hi.
40011010	Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho ah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘En in, nangma lampi a sialkhol dingin, Na mai ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl ding hi,’ a cihpa in amah ahi hi.
40011011	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, numei sung panin a suak mite lakah Tuiphumpa John sanga a lianzaw kuamah a om kei hi. Ahi zongin vantung kumpigam sunga a neupenpa nangawn amah sangin a lianzaw hi.
40011012	Tuiphumpa John hun a kipan tuhun dong vantung kumpigam in zawhthawh bawlna thuak a, a zawhthawh bawlte in thagum suangin a la uh hi.
40011013	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham le kamsangte khempeuh in John hun donga a piang ding thute a genkhol hi.
40011014	Note in na sannop uh leh hong pai ding hi ci a, a kigenpa Elijah in amah ahi hi.
40011015	Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!
40011016	“Hih khang mite bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam? Sumbuuk ah tu in a lawmte kiangah,
40011017	‘Tamngai ka tumtum uh hangin, Na lam tuan kei uh a, Ka tamlawh uh hangin lah, Na kap tuan kei uh hi,’ a ci naupangte tawh kibang uh hi.
40011018	“Banghang hiam cihleh John hong pai in an ne lo, tuidawn lo‑a a om ciangin amaute in, ‘Dawilawm neipa hi,’ a ci uh hi.
40011019	Mihing Tapa hong pai a, anne tuidawn in a om ciangin lah, ‘En un, anhai, zuhaipa, siahdongte le mawhneite zawlpa,’ a ci zel uh hi. Ahih hangin ciimna in a gamtatnate panin hong kilangkhia hi,” a ci hi.
40011020	Zeisu in nalamdang a tam pen a bawlna khuapite a mawhna uh kisikkik lo uh ahih manin,
40011021	mawhsak a a taii in ah, “Chorazin khua aw, gimna na thuak ding hi! Bethsaida khua aw, gimna na thuak ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh no tunga hong kibawl nalamdangte Tyre khua le Sidon khuate ah a kibawl hi leh tanglai pekin amaute in ippi puan silhin vut kibuak in a mawhna uh kisikkik khinzo ding uh hi.
40011022	Tua ahih manin ken kong cih in ah thukhen ni ciangin Tyre khua le Sidon khuate thuakna in note thuakna sangin a thuaknop zaw ding hi.
40011023	Vantung donga hong kilamto Capernaum khua aw, Hadesɠ dongah hong kikhiasuk ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nangma sunga hong kibawl nalamdangte Sodom khua ah a kibawl hi leh tuni dongin tua khua kiplai ding hi.
40011024	Tua ahih manin ken kong cih in ah thukhen ni ciangin Sodom khuapi thuakna in nangma thuakna sangin a thuaknop zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
40011025	Tua laitak mahin Zeisu in, “Vantung le leitung a uk ka Pa aw, hih nate mipil misiamte kiang pan selin naungekte tungah lakkhia na hih manin nang tungah ka lungdam hi.
40011026	Hi hi, Pa aw, tua banga a pian ding hoih na sak ahi hi.
40011027	“Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei tungah a hong ap khinzo hi. Pa simloh kuamah in Tapa a thei kei hi. Tapa le Tapa in a kitheihsak nop mite simloh kuamah in Pa a thei kei hi.
40011028	“Vangik pua‑a a gim mi khempeuhte aw, ka kiangah hong paita un, tawldamna kong pia ding hi.
40011029	Keima hakkol kisuan unla, ka kiangah hong kisin un. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah in lungnem in a kiniamkhiat mi ka hi hi. Tua hi leh lungsim tawldamna na ngah ding uh hi.
40011030	Banghang hiam cihleh keima hakkol puaknop a, ka van zong a zang hi,” a ci hi.
40012001	Tua hun sung Sabbath ni khatin buhlei kantan in Zeisu a pai hi. A nungzuite gilkial uh a, buhvuite zutin a bak uh hi.
40012002	Pharisee‑te in a muh uh ciangin, “En in, na nungzuite in Sabbath ni‑a sep dinga thukham in a phalloh na a sem uh hi!” a ci uh hi.
40012003	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “David le a pawlte a gilkial laitak un,
40012004	Pasian inn sungah lut uh a, amah le a pawlte nek theih ding a hilo, siampite bek nek theih ding Ompihna Anlumte ne uh hi cih thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
40012005	Ahih keileh Sabbath ni in siampite in biakinnpi sungah Sabbath ngeina a palsat uh hangin mawhna in kiciamteh lo ahihlam thukham laibu sungah sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
40012006	Ken kong cih in ah biakinnpi sangin a lianzawpa hi lai ah a om hi.
40012007	Ahih hangin, ‘Gangawh biakpiakna sangin hehpihna ka deih zaw hi,’ a cihna thu theitel hi le uh teh khialhna a neilo mipa na mawhsak kei ding uh hi.
40012008	Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa in Sabbath ni zong a Ukpa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40012009	Tu in tua mun panin amah paikhia in amaute kikhopna inn sungah a lut hi.
40012010	En in, tua lai ah a khut langkhat a si mi khat a om hi. Amaute in Zeisu a mawhmat nop manun, “Sabbath ni in cina damsak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40012011	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni in tuu khat bek a neih guam sungah kia leh a lakhia lo ding note lakah kua om na hi uh hiam?
40012012	Tuu khat sangin mihing khat manpha zaw mahmah hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahih manin Sabbath ni in a pha bawl ding thukham tawh kituak hi,” a ci hi.
40012013	Tua khit ciangin mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” a ci hi. A zan ciangin a lang khat lam tawh a kibangkik hi.
40012014	Tua khit ciangin Pharisee‑te paikhia in amah thah theih nading thu a kikum uh hi.
40012015	Zeisu in tua thu a theih ciangin tua mun pan paikhia a, mihonpi in a zui uh hi. Amah in amaute khempeuh a damsak hi.
40012016	Ama thu kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun a kham hi.
40012017	Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40012018	Isaiah in, “En un! hihin ka teelsa ka nasempa, Ka itpa le ka lung hong damsak mahmah pa ahi hi! Ama tungah ka Kha ka koih dinga, Gentile‑te tungah thuman a hilh ding hi.
40012019	Amah in thu sel loin, A aw sangkhai lo dinga, Kongzing lakah zong kuamah in, Ama aw a za kei ding hi.
40012020	Thuman thutang a gualzawhsak mateng in, A kitamsa pumpeng kuaitan loin, A tanglai meivak a sumit kei ding hi.
40012021	Gentile‑te in ama min a muang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40012022	Tua khit ciangin a mittaw in a pautheilo dawilut mi khat Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uh hi. Zeisu in tua pa damsak ahih manin mittaw in a pautheilo pa pauthei in khua zong a mu thei hi.
40012023	Tua ciangin mipi khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in David Tapa hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40012024	Tu in Pharisee‑te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Hihpa in dawite mangpipa Beelzebubɠ min suangin dawite a hawlkhia ahi hi,” a cihsan uh hi.
40012025	Zeisu in amaute ngaihsutnate thei ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Kumpigam khat peuhpeuh amah le amah kilangkhen a, a kido leh a mangthang lel ding hi. Khua sung khat ahi a, innkuan khat ahi zongin amau le amau a kilem kei uh leh ding zolo ding uh hi.
40012026	Satan in Satan hawlkhia in amah le amah kilem kei leh ama kumpigam bangci in kip thei ding ahi hiam?
40012027	Beelzebubɠ suangin dawite hawlkhia ka hih leh na tate un kua min suangin dawite hawlkhia uh ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amaute in note tungah thu a hong khente a suak ding uh hi.
40012028	Ahih hangin Pasian Kha tawh dawite hawlkhia ka hih manin note tungah Pasian kumpigam hong tung zo hi.
40012029	Ahih keileh mi khatin mi thahat khat hencip masa lopi in a inn luhin a neih a lamte bangci laksak thei ding ahi hiam? A hencip khit ciang bekin a inn a luh zo pan ding hi.
40012030	Kei tawh a hong pangkhawmlo peuhmah ka langpang hi a, a hong kaihkhoppihlo peuhmah a thehthang mi ahi hi.
40012031	“Tua hi a, ken kong cih in ah mawhna namkim le Pasian tunga pausiatna peuhmah a kimaisak ding hi. Ahi zongin Kha tunga pausiatnate a kimaisak kei ding hi.
40012032	Mihing Tapa langpanna kam a paute kimaisak dinga, Kha Siangtho langpanna kam a paute ahih leh tu khang le hong tung ding khang dongin a kimaisak kei ding hi.
40012033	“Singkung a hoih leh a gah hoih a, singkung a hoih kei leh a gah hoih lo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh singkungte a gah panin a kithei hi.
40012034	A gupha gul suante aw! Mi hoihlote na hih manun kamhoih bangci zat theih ding na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim sunga a dimlet thute kam panin a hong phulkhia ahi hi.
40012035	Mihoih in ama lungsim hoih sunga a khol thuhoihte genkhia a, mihoihlo in thusia khol in thusia mah a genkhia hi.
40012036	Ken kong cih in ah mite in kimanna neilo, a mawkpauna kammalte uh hangin thukhen ni ciangin sittelna a thuak ding uh hi.
40012037	Banghang hiam cihleh na kampauna zui in dik hong kitangsak dinga, na kampauna mah zui in hong kimawhsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40012038	Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee‑te pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, limlamdang khat hong lak leteh ka mu nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40012039	Tua ciangin Zeisu in dawngkik a, “A gilo le a paktat tulai khang mite in limlamdang a nget uh hangin kamsangpa Jonah tunga piang limlamdang longal a dang kilak lo ding hi.
40012040	Jonah in ngapi gil sungah sun thum le zan thum a om bangin Mihing Tapa zong lei sungah sun thum le zan thum a om ding hi.
40012041	Thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khua mite hong dingto in tulai khang mite a mawhsak ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Jonah tangkona hangin amaute mawhna a kisikkik uh hi. En un, Jonah sanga a lianzawpa hi lai ah a om hi.
40012042	Thukhen ni ciangin Khanglam gam kumpinu in tulai khang mite tawh dingkhawm in amaute a mawhsak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Solomon pilna a ngai dingin leimong khat panin amah a hong pai hi. En un, Solomon sanga a lianzawpa hi lai ah a om hi.
40012043	“Dawigilo in mi khat sung pan a paikhiat khit ciangin tawlngak nading zongin munkeuna tengah a vak kawikawi hangin a mu zo kei hi.
40012044	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Ka paikhiatna inn mahah ciahkik ning,’ a ci hi. A tun ciangin tua inn na awngin kiphiat kipuah sinsen a om a mu hi.
40012045	Tua ciangin amah sanga a gilo zaw dawi sagih va zawn a, tua inn ah lutpih in a teeng uh hi. Tu‑a tua pa dinmun in a masa sangin a sia zaw hi. A gilo tulai khang mite tungah zong tua bangin a piang ding hi,” a ci hi.
40012046	Zeisu in mihonpite thu a hilhhilh laitak in a nu le a sanggamte in amah hopih nuamin innpua ah a ding uh hi.
40012047	Tua ciangin mi khat in, “En in, na nu le na sanggamte in nang hong hopih nuamin innpua ah a ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40012048	Ahih hangin Zeisu in tua mi kiangah, “Ka nu kua hi a, ka sanggamte kua ahi hiam?” ci in
40012049	a nungzuite lamah a khut zan a, “En un, hih mite in ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi uh hi!
40012050	Banghang hiam cihleh vantung a om ka Pa deihna bangin a gamta mi khat peuhpeuh ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu le ka nu ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
40013001	Tua ni mahin inn pan Zeisu paikhia a, tuilipi gei ah a tu hi.
40013002	Mihonpi hong kikhawm uh ahih manin gunkuang tungah kahto in tu a, mipi khempeuh ahih leh tuili gei ah a ding uh hi.
40013003	Amah in thugentehna tawh thu tampi a hilh in ah, “Ngai un, khaici vawhpa in khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
40013004	Amah in khaici a vawh laitak in pawlkhat lamdung ah kia a, vasate hong pai in tawmin a ne uh hi.
40013005	Pawlkhatte suang kitawphah lei tawmna munah kia in lei dai ahih manin thakhat in a po pah hi.
40013006	Ahih hangin ni hong sa in halvul a, zungkha zo loin, a keumang hi.
40013007	Pawlkhatte ling lakah kia a, lingkungte hong khangin tuate a depgawp hi.
40013008	Ahih hangin a dangte lei hoihna ah kia a, pawlkhatte a zah 100, pawlkhatte a zah 60, pawlkhatte a zah 30 a gah hi.
40013009	Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
40013010	A nungzuite in va naih uh a, “Banghang in gentehna tawh amaute thu hilh na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40013011	Amah in dawngkik a, “Vantung kumpigam tawh kisai a kisel thusimte theihtheihna note hong kipiak hangin amaute kipia lo hi.
40013012	A neite kipiak beh in tampitak a nei ding uh hi. A neilote ahih leh a neih sunsun nangawn uh a kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
40013013	Amaute in enen napi mu theilo, ngaingai napi za theilo in a theih theihloh nadingun thugentehna tawh ka hilh ahi hi.
40013014	Tua mite tungah Isaiah genkholhna a tangtung hi. Amah in, ‘Note in zaza napi in, Na telthei kei ding uh hi. Mumu napi in na phawk thei kei ding uh hi.
40013015	Banghang hiam cihleh hih mite a lungsim uh mawl in, A bil un khuaza hak mahmah a, A mit uh zong a sicip uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit un khuamu in, A bil un khua a za ding hi. A lungsim un theitel in, Hong kiheikik ding uh a, Amaute ka damsak ding hi,’ a ci hi.
40013016	“Ahih hangin note na hih uh leh na mit un khuamu in na bil un khuaza ahih manin mihampha na hi uh hi.
40013017	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kamsangte le midikte in note muhte a muhnop uh hangin a mu kha kei uh hi. Na zakte uh a zaknop uh hangin a za kha kei uh hi.
40013018	“Tua ahih ciangin khaici vawhpa tawh thugentehna na ngai un.
40013019	Mi khatin vantung kumpigam thu a zak ciangin theitel zolo ahih manin gilopa hong pai in ama lungsim sunga kivawhsa khaici a lakkhiatsak hi. Tua mi in lamdung a a kia khaici ahi hi.
40013020	A nuai ah suang om a, a tungtham lei tawm a omna munah a kia khaici in thu a zak ciangin lungdamna tawh a sang pah mi ahi hi.
40013021	Ahih hangin ama sungah zungkha lo ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek a kip hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian thu hanga haksatna ahih keileh bawlsiatna hong tun ciangin a lungkia pah hi.
40013022	Tu in ling laka a kia khaici in thu za napi leitung nuntakna aa ding lunghihmawhna le khemna tawh kidim hauhnopna in ama thu sansa depgawp ahih manin a gah zolo mi ahi hi.
40013023	Ahi zongin lei hoihna muna a kia khaici in thu a zak ciangin theitel a, gahsuah in a pungsak mi ahi hi. Pawlkhatte a zah 100, pawlkhate a zah 60, pawlkhatte a zah 30 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi.
40013024	Zeisu in thugentehna a dang khat a gen in ah, “Vantung kumpigam in lolai a khaici hoih a vawh mi tawh kibang hi.
40013025	Ahih hangin mi khempeuh a ihmut kalin ama galpa hong pai in tang lakah tahum tang a vawh khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
40013026	Tang tangte hong po in a vuih ciangin tahum kungte zong hong dawkkhia hi.
40013027	Lo neipa nasemte hong pai in ama kiangah, ‘Pu aw, na lo‑a na vawh khaici hoih hilo ahi hiam? Tahum kungte koi pana hong piang himawk ahi hiam?’ a ci uh hi.
40013028	“Amah in, ‘Galpa vawh ahi hi,’ a ci hi. “Nasemte in, ‘Tua ahih leh kote va pai in tahum kungte ka botkhiat ding uh na deih hiam?’ a ci uh hi.
40013029	“Amah in, ‘Botkhia nai kei un tahum kung le tang kung na botkhawm kha ding uh hi.
40013030	Anlak hun dong a nih in khangkhawmsak phot un. Anlak hun ciangin anlate kiangah, “Tahum teng bot masa unla, mei‑a khul dingin lomhen un. Tang ahih leh ka ansal ah hong sung un,” ci in ka vaikhak ding hi,’ ” a ci hi.
40013031	Amah in gentehna dang khat a gen in ah, “Vantung kumpigam in mi khatin lolai a a vawh ankamtang tawh kibang hi.
40013032	Ankamtang in khaici tang khempeuh lakah a neupen ahih hangin a khan khit ciangin anteh kung dangte sangin golzaw a, a kung lianpi khat hong suak hi. Vana leng vasate in zong a hiang lakah bu a tom thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
40013033	Amah in thugentehna dang khat a gen in ah, “Vantung kumpigam in numei khatin annel lawhbeuɠ thum a tawk dinga a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
40013034	Zeisu in hih thute khempeuh thugentehna tawh mihonpite hilh a, thugentehna loin thu a hilh kei hi.
40013035	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Thugentehna tawh thu ka hilh dinga, Leitung piancil a kipan a ki‑iimcip thute ka pulak ding hi,” ci a, kamsangpa gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40013036	Zeisu in mihonpi a ciahsak khit ciangin inn sungah a lut hi. A nungzuite in amah hong naih uh a, “Lolai a po tahum kung thugentehna a khiatna hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
40013037	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Khaici hoih vawhpa in Mihing Tapa ahi hi.
40013038	Lo in leitung ahi hi. Khaici hoihte pen kumpigam sung mite hi uh a, tahum kungte pen gilopa mite ahi uh hi.
40013039	Tahumtang a vawh galpa in Dawimangpa ahi hi. Anlak hun pen leitung hun beina hi a, tang late in vantungmite ahi uh hi.
40013040	“Tahum kungte botkhia in mei sungah a kikhul bangin hih leitung hun a bei ciangin a piang ding hi.
40013041	Mihing Tapa in ama vantungmite sawl dinga, amaute in mi a puksak khempeuh le siatna a bawl mi khempeuh ama kumpigam sung panin a paikhia ding uh hi.
40013042	Meikhukpi sungah amaute khul dinga, tua munah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
40013043	Tua ciangin midikte in a Pa uh kumpigam sungah ni bangin a tang ding uh hi. Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!
40013044	“Tua banah vantung kumpigam in lolai a kisel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khatin tua sum a muh ciangin selkik in lungdam mahmah in ciah a, a neihsa khempeuh zuak in tua lo a lei hi.
40013045	“Vantung kumpigam in a hoih mahmah kepsuangmanpha a zong sumbawlpa tawh kibang hi.
40013046	Amah in a mantam mahmah kepsuangmanpha khat a muh ciangin ciah a, a neihsa khempeuh zuak in tua kepsuang a lei hi.
40013047	“Vantung kumpigam in tuili sungah a kikhuh ciangin ngasa namkim a man ngenpi tawh kibang hi.
40013048	Tua ngenpi ah ngasa a dimtak a awk ciangin tuili gei ah kaikhia in tu uh a, a hoih teng bawm sungah guangin a hoihlo teng a paikhia uh hi.
40013049	Leitung hun a bei ciangin zong tuamah bangin a piang ding hi. Vantungmite hong pai ding uh a, midikte lak panin migilote a khenkhia ding uh hi.
40013050	Meikhukpi sungah amaute khul ding uh a, tua munah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
40013051	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thute a vekpi in na theitel ta uh hiam?” ci a, a dot ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, ka theitel ta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40013052	Tua ciangin amah in, “Vantung kumpigam thuhilhna a sang khin thukhamhilh sia peuhmah in ama sumkoihna sung panin a lui a thak a lakhia ziauziau thei innneipa tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
40013053	Zeisu in hih thugentehna khempeuh a gen khit ciangin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
40013054	Ama khankhiatna khua a tun ciangin amaute kikhopna inn sungah thu a hilh hi. Amaute in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in hih pilna le nalamdang pipi sep theihnate koipan ngah ahi hiam?
40013055	Amah khutsiampa tapa hilo ahi hiam? A nu zong Mary a kici nu hi a, a sanggamte zong James, Joses, Simon le Judah‑te hilo uh ahi hiam?
40013056	Ama sanggam numei khempeuh zong eite kiangah om hilo uh ahi hiam? Tua hi napi, hih mipa in hih thuteng koipan ngahkhia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40013057	Tua ahih manin ama hangin a lungkia uh hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Kamsang kici peuhmah ama khua le ama innkuan sung simloh mundang khempeuh ah pahtawina ngah loin a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
40013058	Amaute in um lo uh ahih manin tualai ah nalamdang tampi a bawl kei hi.
40014001	Tua huna gam uk mangpa Herod in Zeisu thu a za hi.
40014002	Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, “Hihpa in Tuiphumpa John hi a, misite lak pan hong thokik ahih manin hih nalamdangte a bawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40014003	Herod in a sanggampa Philip zi Herodias tawh kisai in John manin hen a, thong sungah a khum hi.
40014004	Banghang hiam cihleh John in ama kiangah, “Na sanggampa zi na teenpih pen thukham tawh kituak lo hi,” ci in a gen ngei hi.
40014005	Herod in John a thahnop hangin mipite a kihta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihonpite in kamsang khatin John ngaihsun uh hi.
40014006	Herod in ama suahpawi bawl a, amaute mai ah Herodias tanu a lam hi. Tua ciangin amah lungdam mahmah a,
40014007	“Nong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci in kamciam a pia hi.
40014008	Tua nu in a nu sawlna bangin, “Tuiphumpa John lutang kuangdai sung khatah hong pia in,” a ci hi.
40014009	Kumpipa dah mahmah a, ahi zongin a kiciamna sa le amah tawh omkhawm mite hangin tua nu ngetna piak dingin thu a pia hi.
40014010	Tua bangin mi sawl pah a, thong sunga om John ngawng a tansak hi.
40014011	Amaute in John lutang kuangdai tawh hong tawi in nungakno pia uh a, nungakno in a nu kiangah a puak hi.
40014012	Tua ciangin John nungzuite hong pai in a luang la in vui uh a, tua khit ciangin Zeisu kiangah a va ko uh hi.
40014013	Tu in, hih thu Zeisu in a zak ciangin tua mun panin gamdaihna mun khatah gunkuang tuangin a kihemkhia hi. Ahih hangin mihonpi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin amau khua ciat pan khe tawh hong pai in amah a zuan uh hi.
40014014	Zeisu gamdaihna mun a hong tun ciangin mihonpi mu a, amaute hehpihhuai sa ahih manin cinate a damsak hi.
40014015	Nitak lam ciangin a nungzuite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hih mun in gamlak ahih banah ni niamta ahih manin mihonte an lei dingin khua sungah paisak in,” a ci uh hi.
40014016	Zeisu in, “Amaute mundang a paikhiat ding uh kul lo hi. A nek ding uh bang khat peuhpeuh pia un,” a ci hi.
40014017	Amaute in, “Anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” ci in dawng uh hi.
40014018	Amah in, “Tuate ka kiangah hong la un,” a ci hi.
40014019	Tua khit ciangin mihonpite lopa tungah a tusak hi. Anlum nga le ngasa nihte la in, vantung lam ento a thupha a piak khit ciangin anlumte balkham in nungzuite pia a, nungzuite in mihonpite lakah a hawm uh hi.
40014020	A vekpi un gilvahtak in ne uh a, a kikhamval a themneng teng a khop uh ciangin lawh sawm le lawh nih dim a ngah uh hi.
40014021	Anne mi peuhmah numei le naupang simloh pasal bekbek 5,000 bang a pha uh hi.
40014022	Zeisu in mihonpite a ciahsak laitak in a nungzuite zong gunkuang tungah tuangsak mengmeng a, ama mai ah a galkahsak hi.
40014023	Mihonpite a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin thungen dingin mualtung ah amah bek a kahto hi. Khuamial ciangin tualai ah amah guak a om hi.
40014024	Ahih hangin gunkuang pen tuili laizang ah om a, huihin lehmut ahih manin tuihual in a lokgawp hi.
40014025	Zanvil lina ciangin amaute lam manawh in Zeisu tui tungah a khe tawh hong pai hi.
40014026	Nungzuite in amah tui tunga pai a muh uh ciangin patau uh a, ‘Sikha hi!’ ci in lau in a kiko uh hi.
40014027	Zeisu in zong, “Lungnuam un! Keimah ka hi hi. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
40014028	Peter in, “Topa aw, nangmah na hih leh tui tungtawn in nang kiangah kong pai theih nading thu hong pia in,” a ci hi.
40014029	Zeisu in, “Hong pai in,” a cih ciangin gunkuang pan Peter kumkhia in, Zeisu kiang zuanin tui tungah a pai hi.
40014030	Ahih hangin huihpi kizial a muh ciangin lau a, tui sungah tum dektak ahih manin, “Topa aw, hong hon in,” ci in a kiko hi.
40014031	Zeisu in thakhat in a khut zanin len a, “Upna neu mipa aw, banghang in muanglah na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
40014032	Amau gel gunkuang sung a tun uh ciangin huihpi a dai hi.
40014033	Tua ciangin gunkuang sunga mite hong pai in, “Pasian Tapa taktak na hi hi,” ci in amah a bia uh hi.
40014034	A gal khat ah a kah khit uh ciangin Gennesaret gamah a pai uh hi.
40014035	Tua muna om mite in amah ahihlam a theih uh ciangin khuakim khuapam ah thu zasak uha cina khempeuh ama kiangah a hong paipih uh hi.
40014036	Ama puanmongtep tawm a lawnziau theih nadingun ngen uh a, a lawng kha zahzah in damsiangthona a ngah uh hi.
40015001	Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi a om thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte Zeisu kiangah hong pai uh a,
40015002	“Na nungzuite in banghang in tanglai ngeina palsat in khutsil lopi in an ne uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40015003	Zeisu in, “Banghang in note in zong tanglai ngeina paulam in Pasian thupiak palsat na hi uh hiam?
40015004	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa zahtak in. A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a samsiate in thahna thuak tahen,’ ci in thu hong pia hi.
40015005	“Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatin a nu le a pa kiangah, “Kei tung pana na ngah ding khempeuh uh Pasian ka pia khinzo hi,”
40015006	ci peuh leh a nu le a pa piak kul nawnlo hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tua bangin tanglai ngeina paulam in Pasian thupiakna a mawkna na suaksak uh hi.
40015007	A kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note thu a genkholhna a maan mahmah hi. Amah in,
40015008	‘Hih mite in a kam uh tawh kei hong zuanin, A kam uh tawh a hong pahtawi uh hangin, A lungsim uh kei tawh kigamla hi.
40015009	Mihing phuahtawm thupiakte kihilh uh ahih manin, Kei hong biak uh hangin a mawkna a suak hi,’ ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
40015010	Amah in mihonpite ama kiangah a sap khit ciangin, “Hih thu ngai unla theitel un.
40015011	Kam sunga a lutsukte in mihing ninsak lo a, kamsung pan a pusuakte bekin mihing a ninsak hi,” a ci hi.
40015012	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite ama kiangah pai uh a, “Pharisee‑te in hih na thugen zadah mahmah uh hi cih na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40015013	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Vantung a ka Pa in a suanloh peuhmah kibotkhia ding hi.
40015014	Tua mite awlmawh kei un. Amaute in mittawte a makaih mittaw makaite ahi uh hi. Mittaw in mittaw makaih leh a nih un guam sungah kia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40015015	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Hih thugentehna a khiatna hong hilh in,” a ci hi.
40015016	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Note nangawn in hih thu tel zo nailo lailai na hi uh hiam?
40015017	Kam sunga a lutsuk peuhmah gilpi sung tung a, tua panin kithakhia hi cih thei lo na hi uh hiam?
40015018	Ahih hangin kam sung pana a pusuakte in lungsim pan hong paikhia ahih manin mihing a ninsak hi.
40015019	Banghang hiam cihleh ngaihsut hoihlote, mithahna, mi zi tawh mawhna, numei pasal mawhna, guktakna, a maanlopi a teci panna le kosiatnate lungsim sung panin a hong paikhia ahi hi.
40015020	Hite in mi ninsak a, ahih hangin khutsil lo a annekna in mi a ninsak kei hi,” a ci hi.
40015021	Tua ciangin tua mun panin Zeisu paikhia in, Tyre le Sidon gamah a pai hi.
40015022	En un, tua gam pana hong pai Canaan numei khat in, “David Tapa, Topa aw, kei hong hehpih in. Ka tanu dawilut a, nasiatak in bawlsiatna a thuak hi,” ci in a kiko hi.
40015023	Ahih hangin Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawng kei hi. A nungzuite zong hong pai in, “Eite nungah hih numei hong kiko niloh ahih manin hawlkhia in,” ci in a kun uh hi.
40015024	Ahih hangin amah in, “Tuu banga a mangthang Israel minamte kiang longal ah kei hong kisawl lo hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40015025	Tua ciangin tua nu hong pai in, “Topa aw, hong huh in,” ci in a bia hi.
40015026	Zeisu in, “Tate annek lai lakhia in uite piak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40015027	Tua nu in, “Hi mah hi, Topa aw, ahi zongin uite in a pu sabuai pana anneng kiate ne khasam uh hilo ahi hiam,” a ci hi.
40015028	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Numei aw, na upna a lian hi. Na lunggulhna bangin nang tungah piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua hun lian mahin a tanu a dam pah hi.
40015029	Zeisu in tua mun nusia in Galilee tuilipi lamah pai a, mualtung ah kahto in tualai ah a tu hi.
40015030	Tua ciangin mihonpite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, khebai, mittaw, pautheilo le a poite a kipan a dang cina tampi hong paipih uh a, Zeisu khebul ah nga in amah in tuate khempeuh a damsak hi.
40015031	A pautheilote pau thei uh a, a poite damkik in, khebaite lampai thei uh a, mittawte in khua a mukik uh hi. Mihonpite in tuate a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa uh a, Israel Pasian a phat uh hi.
40015032	Tu in Zeisu in a nungzuite ama kiangah sam in, “Hih mihonpite ni thum tawntung kei tawh omkhawm uh a, nek ding bangmah neilo uh ahih manin hehpihhuai ka sa hi. Lamkal ah phukhong vei kha ding uh ahih manin gilkialsa in ka ciahsak nuam kei hi,” a ci hi.
40015033	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Mihon hi zah kham ding an hih gamlak ah koi pan ngah mawk ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40015034	Zeisu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Anlum sagih le ngasaneu tawmkha ka nei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40015035	Tua ciangin Zeisu in mihonpite leilak ah a tusak hi.
40015036	Tua ciangin anlum sagih le ngasa la in lungdam a koh khit ciangin balnen a, a nungzuite a pia hi. Nungzuite in mihonpite lakah a hawmkhia uh hi.
40015037	Amaute khempeuh in khamtak in a nek khit uh ciangin nungzuite in a kikhamval a themneng teng kaikhawm uh a, lawhbeu gol sagih dim a ngah uh hi.
40015038	Anne mi numei le naupang simloh pasal bekbek 4,000 a pha uh hi.
40015039	Zeisu in mihonpite a ciahsak khit ciangin gunkuang tuangin Magdala gamah a pai hi.
40016001	Tua ciangin Sadducee‑te le Pharisee‑te hong pai uh a, amah a ze‑et nadingun, “Vantung pan theihsakna limkhat hong lak in,” ci in a ngen uh hi.
40016002	Zeisu in, “Note in, ‘Nitak lam in meiisan hong suah leh khua pha ding hi,’ na ci uh hi.
40016003	Zingsang lam ahih leh, ‘Tuni in meiisan in khua nim ahih manin khuahun a sia ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. A kineihkhem mite aw, tua bangin van maitang khentel thei napi uh cin banghang in a hun zui a piang theihsakna limte khentel theilo na hi uh hiam!
40016004	A gilo le angkawm hat tulai khang mite in limlamdang a nget uh hangin kamsangpa Jonah tunga piang limlamdang bek a kipia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute nusia in a paikhia hi.
40016005	Tu in a nungzuite a gal khat hong tun uh ciangin anlum a puak ding uh a mangngilh lam a phawk uh hi.
40016006	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Pharisee‑te le Sadducee‑te silngo kidawm un,” a ci hi.
40016007	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Anlum i puak loh manin hih bangin a hong gen hi ding hi,” ci in a kikum uh hi.
40016008	Ahih hangin Zeisu in tua thu a theih ciangin, “Upna neu mite aw, banghang in anlum na puak loh uh kikum na hi uh hiam?
40016009	Theitel nailo lailai na hi uh hiam? Mihing 5,000 in anlum nga a nek khit un ciangin a khamval lawh bangzah pha cih mangngilh ta na hi uh hiam?
40016010	Mihing 4,000 in anlum sagih a nek khit uh ciangin a khamval uh lawhbeu gol bangzah pha cih phawk nawnlo na hi uh hiam?
40016011	Annek tawh kisai thu gen ka hi kei a, Pharisee‑te le Sadducee‑te silngo na kidop ding uh a gen ka hih lam banghang in tel zolo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
40016012	Tua ciangin annel laka kisawh silngo hilo in Pharisee‑te le Sadducee‑te thuhilhna kidawm un Zeisu in a cihna ahihlam amaute in a tel pan uh hi.
40016013	Tu in Caesarea Philippi gamah Zeisu a hong tun ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite in keimah, Mihing Tapa, kua hi hong ci uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
40016014	Amaute in a gen in ah, “Mi pawlkhat in, Tuiphumpa John, pawlkhat in Elijah, Jeremiah, ahih keileh kamsangte khat peuhpeuh hi hong ci uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
40016015	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahih leh note in kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” a ci hi.
40016016	Tua ciangin Simon Peter in, “Nang in a nungta Pasian Tapa, Khazih na hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40016017	Zeisu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, mi hampha na hi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu ci le sa in a hong theihsak hilo in vana om ka Pa in a hong theihsak ahi hi.
40016018	Ken kong cih in ah nang in Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam dinga, Hadesɠ kongpite in a zo kei ding uh hi.
40016019	Vantung kumpigam kong honna tawhtang nang kong pia ding hi. Leitung a na hen khempeuh vantung ah kihen dinga, leitung a na phel khempeuh zong vantung ah kiphel ding hi,” a ci hi.
40016020	Tua ciangin amah Zeisu Khazih ahihlam a nungzuite in kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun khauhtak in a kham hi.
40016021	Tua huna kipan Zeisu in Jerusalem khuapi ah pai in makaite, siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate tung panin gimna tampi a thuak nadingte le tua mite in amah thatin a ni thum ni ciangin a kithawhkiksak nading thute a nungzuite kiangah a sianggen hi.
40016022	Tua ciangin Peter in amah samkhia a, “Topa aw, hih thu nang tawh kipelh henla hih thu nang tungah piang kei tapeuh hen,” ci in a taii hi.
40016023	Ahih hangin Peter lamah Zeisu kihei a, “Satan aw, ka nung lamah kihemkhia in. Pasian thu sangin mihing thu ngaihsut in nei zaw na hih manin keima suihkhak ding na na hi hi,” a ci hi.
40016024	Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in kei a hong zuihnop leh ama pumpi nialin a singlamteh kisuan henla hong zui hen.
40016025	Banghang hiam cihleh ama nuntakna a kemcing nuam mi in a nuntakna a tan ding hi. Keima hanga a nuntakna a tan mi in a nuntakna a kemcing ding hi.
40016026	Mi khatin leitung buppi a ngah hangin ama nuntakna a tan leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Ahih keileh mi khatpeuh in ama nuntakna bang tawh khekkik thei ding ahi hiam?
40016027	A Pa minthanna le ama vantungmite tawh Mihing Tapa a hong pai ciangin mi khempeuh amau sepna ciat zui in thaman a pia ding hi.
40016028	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hihlai ah a ding mi pawlkhat in Mihing Tapa, ama kumpigam sungah hong pai a muh mateng un sihna a ciam kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40017001	Ni guk khit ciangin Zeisu in Peter, James le a sanggampa John‑te samin mualsang khat tungah amau teng bek a paipih hi.
40017002	Amaute mai ah ama mel kikhel in a maitang ni bangin tanga a puante khuavak bangin a tee hi.
40017003	En in, amaute kiangah Moses le Elijah hong kilang in Zeisu tawh a kiho uh hi.
40017004	Tua ciangin Peter in Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, hihlai nuam ka sa uh hi. Hoih na sak leh nang aa ding buuk khat, Moses aa ding buuk khat, Elijah aa ding buuk khat, buuk thum kong lamsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40017005	Amah a pau laitak in meiingo khatin amaute tuam a, tua meii sung panin, “Hihpa in hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na mang un!” ci in aw khat a hong gingkhia hi.
40017006	A nungzuite in tua awging a zak uh ciangin lau mahmah uha lei ah a bok uh hi.
40017007	Ahih hangin Zeisu hong pai in amaute lawng a, “Tho un. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
40017008	Amaute a khuadaktoh uh ciangin Zeisu longal kuamah dang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
40017009	Mualtung pan a hong kumsuk uh ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa misite lak pan a kithawhkiksak mateng in hih na muhte uh kuama kiangah gen kei un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
40017010	A nungzuite in, “Tua ahih leh thukhamhilh siate in banghang in Elijah hong pai masa ding hi ci uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40017011	Zeisu in, “Elijah hong pai masa takpi dinga na khempeuh a bawlthak ding hi.
40017012	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah Elijah hong pai khin a, amaute in amah thei lo uh ahih manin a ut bangbang un a bawl uh hi. Tuamah bangin Mihing Tapa in zong tua mite khut sungah gimna a thuak ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40017013	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Tuiphumpa John a cihna ahihlam a thei uh hi.
40017014	Mihonpite kiang a tun uh ciangin mi khat hong pai in ama mai ah khukdin a,
40017015	“Topa aw, ka tapa hong hehpih in. Amah in sibup natna vei in nasia mahmah a, meikhuk sung khawng, tuisung khawng ah a tuk pahpah hi.
40017016	Na nungzuite kiangah ka paipih hangin a damsak zo kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
40017017	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Upna a neilo, a lehtat khang mite aw, bang tanvei hong ompih lai in bang tanvei hong thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua naupang ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
40017018	Zeisu in tua dawi a taii ciangin naupangno sung pan taikhia a, thakhat in naupangno a dam hi.
40017019	Tua ciangin nungzuite amau guak Zeisu kiangah hong tuam pai uh a, “Banghang in kote in tua dawi hawlkhia zolo ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40017020	Zeisu in, “Na up loh man uh ahi hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ankamtang cia upna nei le uh teh, ‘Hih mualpi kiangah hih mun panin hualai ah va kikhinkhia in,’ ci le uh teh zong kikhinkhia ding hi. Note aa dingin a piang theilo bangmah a om kei ding hi.
40017021	Ahi zongin hih bang dawi namte thungetna le antannalo tawh a paikhia kei hi,” a ci hi.
40017022	Galilee gamah a taam sungun Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa mite khut sungah hong kilehhek ding hita hi.
40017023	Amaute in amah that ding uha a ni thum ni in a kithokiksak ding hi,” a cih ciangin amaute a dah mahmah uh hi.
40017024	Capernaum khua a tun uh ciangin Peter kiangah biakinnpi siah a dongte va pai uh a, “Na siapa in biakinnpi siah pia lo ahi hiam?” ci a, a dot uh ciangin
40017025	Peter in, “Pia mah hi,” a ci hi. Inn sungah Peter a lut phetin Zeisu in na hopih masa a, “Simon aw, bang na ci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in mangmu ahi a, mimal siah ahi zongin a don uh ciangin a tate uh tung pan dong uh ahi hiam ahih keileh midangte tung pan dong zaw uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
40017026	Peter in, “Midangte tung panin dong zaw uh hi,” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh a tate a kimap ahi hi.
40017027	Ahi zongin amaute a puksak i suah khakloh nadingin tuili ah pai in ngakawi va siah in. A awk masa penpen a kam phen leteh shekel khat na mu ding hi. Tua shekel la inla, nang aa ding le kei aa dingin siah va pia in,” a ci hi.
40018001	Tua laitak in Zeisu kiangah a nungzuite hong pai uh a, 17:24 biakinnpi siah: Greek in “didrachma” hi a, mi khatin kum khat sung aa dingin ni nih thaman ahi denarius nih siah in a pia hi. “Vantung kumpigam sungah kua lianpen ding ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40018002	Zeisu in naupangno khat samin, amaute laizang ah dingsak a,
