40018003	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kikhel a naupang note na bat kei uh leh vantung kumpigam sungah na lutthei ngei kei ding uh hi.
40018004	Tua ahih manin hih naupangno bang a, a kiniamkhiatte in vantung kumpigam sungah a lianpen ahi ding uh hi.
40018005	“Keima min hanga hih bang naupangno khat a sang mi in kei zong a hong sang ahi hi.
40018006	Ahi zongin, kei hong um hih naupangnote khat a khialsak mi khatpeuh in a ngawngah angawina suang khih henla tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama aa dingin a hoih zaw ding hi.
40018007	“Khialh theih nading thute hangin leitung in gimna a thuak ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh khialh theih nading thute a om ding mah hi a, ahi zongin a khialsak mi in gimna a thuak ding hi!
40018008	Tua ahih manin na khut khat na khe khatin a hong khialhsak leh sattan inla pai in. Khutkim khekim tawh tawntung meikuangpi sungah hong kikhiat sangin khuttawng khetawng a poisa in nuntakna sungah lut leteh nang aa dingin a hoih zaw ding hi.
40018009	Tua ahih ciangin na mit in a hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla pai in. Mittang nih tawh hellɠ meikuang sungah hong kikhiat sangin mittang khat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut leteh nang aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
40018010	“Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawh khakloh nadingun kidawm un. Banghang hiam cihleh amau vantungmite in vana om ka Pa maitang a mu den uh hi.
40018011	Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa in a mangthang mite hon dinga hong pai ahi hi.
40018012	“Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khatin tuu 100 a neih lak panin khat gammang leh 99te nusia in tua a gammang zong dingin mualtung lamah kuankhia lo ding ahi hiam?
40018013	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tua tuu mang khat a muh ciangin a lungdamna pen a gammanglo 99te hanga a lungdamna sangin a lianzaw ding hi.
40018014	Tuamah bangin hih naupangnote khat nangawn a kisiat ding vantung a om na Pa un a deih kei hi.
40018015	“Tua thamlo in mi khat nang tungah a hong khialh leh a kiangah pai inla note gel kia theih in a khialhna va gen in. Na thu a hong man leh tua pa a zo na hi hi.
40018016	Nangma thu a hong mannop kei leh, ‘thu khempeuh teci nih bang thum bang thugenna tawh a kip theih nadingin’ mi khat le nih tawh va pai in.
40018017	Tua mite thu a nial lai leh pawlpi tungah ko in. Pawlpi thu nangawn a nial leh lawki le siahdongte bangin omsak in.
40018018	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, leitung a na hen khempeuh uh vantung ah kihen dinga, leitung a na phel khempeuh uh vantung ah kiphel ding hi.
40018019	“Khatvei kong genkik in ah leitung ah mi nih kilungtuak a thu a nget uh leh a nget peuhpeuh uh vantung a om ka Pa in a pia ding hi.
40018020	Banghang hiam cihleh keima min tawh nih le thum bang a kikhop uh ciangin amaute laizang ah ka om hi,” ci in Zeisu in a gen hi.
40018021	Tua khit ciangin ama kiangah Peter hong pai a, “Topa aw, ka sanggampa in ka tungah hong khialh leh bangzah vei ka maisak ding hiam? Sagihvei dongin ka maisak ding hiam?” a ci hi.
40018022	Zeisu in, “Sagihvei dongin maisak in kong ci kei hi. 70 mun sagihvei dongin maisak in kong ci hi.
40018023	Tua ahih manin vantung kumpigam in a nasemte sum sazian a sittel nuam kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
40018024	Amah in sum sazian a sit laitak in talentɠ 10,000 a bapa khat ama kiangah a hong paipih uh hi.
40018025	Amah in a leiba loh zolo ahih manin a pu in amah le a zi a tate a kipan a neihsa khempeuh zuak a, a leiba a loh nadingin thu a pia hi.
40018026	“Tua ciangin tua nasempa zong kumpipa mai ah bokin, ‘Pu aw, hong ngak keikai lai in a vekpi in kong loh ding hi,’ a ci hi.
40018027	A topa in tua nasempa khasiathuaisa ahih manin a leiba teng maisak in a khah hi.
40018028	“Tua nasempa paikhia a, ama sum denariusɠ 100 a ba, a lawm nasem dang khat tawh a kituak hi. Amah in tua pa manin gawlmek a, ‘Nong sum bat hong loh in,’ a ci hi.
40018029	“A lawm silapa zong a khe phungah bokin, ‘Hong ngak keikai lai in a vekpi in kong loh ding hi,’ ci in a thum hi.
40018030	“Ahih hangin tua pa in mang zolo a, a leiba khempeuh a loh khit mateng a lawmpa thong sungah a khum hi.
40018031	A lawm nasem dangte in tua thupiang teng a theih uh ciangin lungnuam hetlo uha a pu uh kiangah pai in thupiang teng a ko uh hi.
40018032	“Tua ciangin a pu in tua pa samsak a, ‘Nang a gilo nasempa aw, nong thum manin na leiba khempeuh kong maisak hi.
40018033	Nang kong hehpih bangin na lawm nasempa na hehpih ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
40018034	A pu hehlua ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a loh khit mateng in mi bawlsiate khut sungah tua nasempa a pia hi.
40018035	“Note in zong na sanggampa nang tunga a hong khialhnate na lungsim panin na maisak kei leh vantung a om ka Pa in tuamah bangin nang tungah a hong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
40019001	Zeisu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin Galilee gam panin Jordan gungal khat a om Judea gamah a pai hi.
40019002	Mi tampi in amah zui uha amah in amaute tua munah a damsak hi.
40019003	Pharisee pawlte zong hong pai uh a, “Mi khatin thu khatpeuh hangin a zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci in a ze‑et uh hi.
40019004	Zeisu in dawngkik a, “Amaute a bawlpa in a kipat cilin numei le pasal a bawl hi.
40019005	‘Tua ahih manin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi,’ cih thu sim kha ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
40019006	Tua hi a, amaute nih hi nawnlo in pumkhat ahi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in a gawmsate mihing in khen kei tahen,” a ci hi.
40019007	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahih leh banghang in Moses in kikhenna lai pia‑a zi mak theih nading thu hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40019008	Amah in, “Na lungtang uh khauhlua ahih manin zi na mak theih nadingun a hong phal ahi hi. Ahih hangin a kipat cilin tua bang ahi kei hi.
40019009	Ken kong cih in ah numei pasal mawhna hang longal thu dang hangin a zi ma‑a numei dang khat a teenpihpa in angkawm ahi hi. A kimasa numei a teenpihpa zong angkawm mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40019010	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Nupa vai tua bang ding ahih leh zi neilo a om ding hoih zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
40019011	Tua ciangin amah in, “Mi khempeuh in hih thu a sangkim zo kei uh hi. Pasian in a tuam vilvel a a piakte bekin a sangzo uh hi.
40019012	A nu gilsung panin gehsa banga a suak pawl a om hi. A kiget tawm pawl zong oma pawl khatte ahih leh vantung kumpigam thu hangin geh bangin a om uh hi. Hih thu a sang zote in sang un,” a ci hi.
40019013	Zeisu in naupangte tungah a khut nga‑a thu a ngetsak theih nadingin mite in naupangte hong paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin nungzuite in amaute na taiigawp uh hi.
40019014	Zeisu in, “Naupangte ka kiangah a hong pai ding kham kei unla hong paisak zaw un. Vantung kumpigam in naupang tawh a kibangte aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40019015	Tua khit ciangin naupangte tungah a khut nga‑a tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
40019016	Tu in, en in, ama kiangah mi khat hong pai a, “Sia hoih aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah theih nadingin a pha bang ka bawl ding hiam?” a ci hi.
40019017	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Banghang in mihoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian longal a hoih kuamah a om kei hi. Ahi zongin, nuntakna sungah na lutnop leh thupiakte na zui in,” a ci hi.
40019018	Amah in, “Bang thukham teng zui ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Mi that kei in. Angkawm kei in. Guta kei in. A maanlopi in teci pang kei in.
40019019	Na nu le na pa zahtak in. Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa it in,” a ci hi.
40019020	Tangvalpa in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neu tunga kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi. Bang kisam lai ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
40019021	Zeisu in, “A hoihkim a ut taktak na hih leh pai inla na neihsa teng zuak in mizawngte pia leteh vantung ah sum na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
40019022	Tangvalpa in tua thu a zak ciangin maikhingsa in a paikhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah mihau mahmah khat ahi hi.
40019023	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mihaute vantung kumpigam sung a lut nading uh haksa mahmah hi.
40019024	Khatvei kong cihkik in ah mihau khat Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding sangin kala‑oh khat phimbilvang sungah khum ding baih zaw hi,” a ci hi.
40019025	A nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Tua bang ahih mawk leh kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40019026	Zeisu in amaute en in a gen in ah, “Hih thu bel mihing tawh a piang theilo mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian tawh na khempeuh a piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
40019027	Tua ciangin Peter in ama kiangah, “En in, kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang hong zui ka hih manun bang ngah ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
40019028	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, bawlthak hun ah Mihing Tapa in ama minthanna kumpi tokhom tungah a hong tut hun ciangin kei hong zui note in kumpi tokhom sawm le nih tungah tu in Israel nam sawm le nam nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi.
40019029	Keima min hangin a inn, a sanggampa, a sanggamnu, a pa, a nu, a zi, a tate le a lote khat peuhpeuh a nusia mi in a zah 100 ngah dinga, nuntak tawntungna zong a luah ding hi.
40019030	Ahi zongin a masa mi tampite nunung ding uh a, a nunung mi tampite a masa ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40020001	“Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam in ama lenggah huan a nasem ding mi a cial dingin zingsang tunga a kuankhia loneipa tawh kibang hi.
40020002	Tu in, nitha denariusɠ khat piak dingin nasemte tawh kithukim uha lenggah huanah amaute a kuansak hi.
40020003	“Nai thum pawl ciangin loneipa a paikhiat leh vanzuakna phual ah sepmel nei loin a mawk om mi pawlkhat a mu hi.
40020004	Amaute kiangah zong, ‘Ka lenggah huanah va kuan un. Thaman a kilawm zah kong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin amaute zong a kuan uh hi.
40020005	Nai guk le nai kua pawlin khatvei, paikhiakik a tuamah bangin a va cial hi.
40020006	Nai sawm le nai khat pawlin zong paikhia a, a mawk om mi pawlkhat a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Banghang in hihlai ah sun thapai in mawk om na hi uh hiam?’ a ci hi.
40020007	“Amaute in, ‘Kuamah in hong cial lo hi,’ a cih uh ciangin amah in, ‘Note zong ka lenggah huanah va kuan un. Thaman a kilawm zah kong pia ding hi,’ a ci hi.
40020008	“Nitak ciangin lenggah loneipa in nasem ukpa kiangah, ‘Nasemte sam inla, a kuan nunung pen pan a kuan masa pen dongin a thaman uh pia in,’ a ci hi.
40020009	“Tua ciangin nai sawm leh nai khat pawla a cialte hong pai uh a, denariusɠ khat ciat a ngah uh hi.
40020010	A kuan masate hong pai uh ciangin a tam zaw ngah dingin kilamen uha ahi zongin amaute in zong denariusɠ khat ciat bek mah a ngah uh hi.
40020011	Tua banga a ngah uh ciangin loneipa phunsan uh a,
40020012	‘Hih a kuan nunungte in nai khat sung bek nasem man uh hi napi in sun thapai nisa thuakin a gim mahmah kote tawh thaman a kikim na ngahsak veve hi,’ a ci uh hi.
40020013	“Ahih hangin loneipa in amaute laka khatpa kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang tungah ka khial kei hi. Denariusɠ khat piak ding mah a thukim hilo na hi hiam?
40020014	Na thaman ding la inla ciah in. Hih a kuan nunung penpa zong nang aa zah mah ka pia nuam hi.
40020015	Keima neihsa ka ut bangbang a ka zek theih hi lello ahi hiam? Ka cit, ka siam manin nang heh laizang ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
40020016	“Tua ahih manin a nunungte masa ding uh a, a masate a nunung ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kisam mi a tam hangin a kiteel mi a tawm hi,” a ci hi.
40020017	Tu in Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paitoh kawmin lampi ah sawm le nihte tuam tonpih in thu a hilh hi.
40020018	Amah in, “En un, Jerusalem khuapi ah i paito ding hi. Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate tungah Mihing Tapa kilehhek dinga, amaute in thah dingin thu a khen ding uh hi.
40020019	Amaute in Gentile‑te zahko ding, sat ding le khailup dingin amah pia ding uha a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
40020020	Tua khit ciangin Zebedee tapate nu in ngetnop khat nei ahih manin a tapate tawh Zeisu kiangah pai in, a mai ah a khukdin uh hi.
40020021	Tua ciangin Zeisu in nupinu kiangah, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Tua nu in, “Na kumpigam sungah hih ka tapa nihte na taklam ah khat na veilam ah khat na tutsak ding ka deih hi,” a ci hi.
40020022	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Nong na nget uh bang hiam cih na thei kei uh hi. A sawtlo a ka dawn ding hai dawn zo ding na hi uh hiam? Ka kibaptize na ah kibaptize zo ding na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute in, “Hi zo mah nung,” a ci uh hi.
40020023	Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh a, ka kibaptize na ah zong na kibaptize takpi ding uh hi. Ahih hangin ka taklam le ka veilam a tut theih nading thu pen kei hong piak theih hilo in ka Pa in a sehkholhsa mite aa ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40020024	A dang sawmte in tua thu a zak uh ciangin tua unau nihte tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
40020025	Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute samkhawm a, “Gentile‑te sungah ukna neite in a mipite uh ukcip uh a, a miliante un a mipite tungah thuneihna zang uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
40020026	Ahi zongin note sungah tua bang ding hilo hi. Note lakah a lian a suak nuam mite in note nasem hi tahen.
40020027	Note lakah a masa pen a suak nuamte in note sila hi tahen.
40020028	Mihing Tapa nangawn ama na a kisepsak dinga hong pai hilo hi. Midangte na a sepsak ding le a nuntakna pia in mi tampi a tankhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40020029	Jericho khua pan a paikhiat uh ciangin mihonpi in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
40020030	Tua ciangin lamgei a tu mittaw nihin amaute lamah Zeisu hong pai hi cih a zak uh ciangin, “David Tapa, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
40020031	Amaute a daih nadingun mihonpi in a taiihuan uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “David Tapa, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in nakpi in a kiko semsem uh hi.
40020032	Tua ciangin Zeisu a dinsa in khawla amaute sam in, “Bang kong hihsak ding ut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
40020033	Amaute in, “Topa aw, khua nong muhsak ding ka ut uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40020034	Zeisu in amaute hehpihhuai sa in a mit uh a lawnsak leh thakhat in khua mu pah uh a, ama nung a zui uh hi.
40021001	Jerusalem khuapi tun kuan, Tanluan mual kianga om Bethphage khua a tun uh ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite nih sawl a,
40021002	“Note mai‑a khua ah va lut un. Laapi khat kikhih a om na mu pah ding uha a no zong a kiangah na om ding hi. Suut unla hong kai un.
40021003	Mi khatpeuh in hong paupih leh, ‘Topa in amaute zang nuam hi, hong puakkik pah ding hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
40021004	Hih thute khempeuh in kamsangpa gensa thute a tangtun nadinga piang ahi hi.
40021005	Amah in, “ ‘En in, laapi ta laano tungah tuangin, Na Kumpipa lungnemtak in, Nang kiangah hong pai hi,’ ci in, Zion tanu kiangah gen in,” a ci hi.
40021006	Tua ciangin nungzuite gel zong pai uh a, Zeisu thupiak bangin ahih uh hi.
40021007	Laapi le laano hong kai uha tuate tungah a puante uh phahin Zeisu a tuangsak uh hi.
40021008	Mihon tampitak in a puante uh lampi ah phah uh hi. Pawlkhatte in singhiangte satin phah uh hi.
40021009	A nung le a mai‑a a pai mihonpite kiko uh a, “David Tapa tungah Hosannaɠ! Topa min tawh a hong paipa in, Thupha ngah tahen! A sangbel munah Hosanna!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
40021010	Jerusalem khuapi sung a lut ciangin khuapi sunga om mi khempeuh ciak ngeingai uh a, “Hihpa kua ahi hiam?” ci in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
40021011	Mihonpi in, “Galilee gam Nazareth khua mi kamsangpa Zeisu ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
40021012	Tua khit ciangin Pasian biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lut a, biakinnpi huang sungah vanlei, vanzuak a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhekteɠ sabuaite le vakhu zuakte tutphahte zong a lumletsak hi.
40021013	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “ ‘Ka inn in thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ahih hangin note in ‘gutate phualpi’ na suaksak uh hi ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
40021014	Biakinnpi huang sunga a om laitak in ama kiangah mittawte le khebaite hong pai uh a, amah in amaute a damsak hi.
40021015	Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in ama bawl nalamdangte mu in, “David Tapa tungah Hosannaɠ!” ci in biakinnpi huang sunga a om naupangnote kikona aw a zak uh ciangin a heh mahmah uh hi.
40021016	Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Hih naupangte kikona aw na za hiam?” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka za hi, ‘Naupangnote le nawine naungekte kam panin phatna kicing na gingkhiasak hi,’ a cihna thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
40021017	Tua khit ciangin amaute nusia in khuapi sung pan Bethany khualam zuanin paikhia a, tua khua ah a giak hi.
40021018	Zingsang tungin khuapi lam zuanin Zeisu hong paikik a, lamkal ah a gilkial hi.
40021019	Lamgei ah theikung khat mu in a phungah a va pai leh a teh longal bangmah a mu kei hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Tu a kipan gah ngei nawn peuhmah kei in,” a cih ciangin tua theikung thakhat in a keugaw hi.
40021020	Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin, lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Banghang in hih theikung keugaw pah zawzen ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40021021	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, lunghiang loin um taktak le uh teh hih theikung tunga thupiang bang bek hilo in hih mualpi kiangah zong, ‘Kihemkhia inla tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le uh cin tua bangin a piang ding hi.
40021022	Upna tawh na nget uh leh na nget peuhpeuh uh a vekpi in na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40021023	Biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lutin thu a hilh laitak in siampi liante le Judah mite makaite ama kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih bang nate na sep theih nadingin kua kiang panin thu ngah na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua in nang hong pia ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
40021024	Zeisu in, “Ken zong note thukhat kong dong ding hi. Nong dawn theih uh leh hih nate kua thuneihna tawh hih ka hi hiam cih kong gen pan ding hi.
40021025	John tuiphumna thu vantung pana thuneihna tawh ahi hiam, mihing pana thuneihna tawh ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute kikum uh a, “ ‘Vantung pana thuneihna tawh hi,’ ci lehang, ‘Tua ahih leh banghang in amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
40021026	‘Mihing thuneihna tawh hi,’ ci lehang lah mi khempeuh in John pen kamsangpa a a san khitsa uh ahih manin mihonte kihtakhuai hi,” a kici uh hi.
40021027	Tua ahih manin, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Ken zong hih nate kua thuneihna tawh sem ka hi hiam cih kong gen kei ding hi.
40021028	“Ahi zongin hih kong gen ding thu bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam? Mi khatin tapa nih a nei hi. A ta uzawpa kiangah va pai a, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni in ka lenggah lo ah va kuan in,’ a ci hi.
40021029	“Tua a tapa in, ‘Ka kuan nuam kei hi,’ a cih hangin a nung ciangin kisikkik in a kuan hi.
40021030	“Tua khit ciangin a nauzawpa kiangah pai a, tuamah bangin a gen hi. A tapa in, ‘Pa aw, ka kuan ding hi,’ ci in dawng napi a kuan kei hi.
40021031	“Tua ta nihte kua zaw in a pa deihna mang ahi hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute in, “A upapen in a mang zaw hi,” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, siahdongte le numei kizuakte in Pasian kumpigam sungah note ma in a lut uh hi.
40021032	Banghang hiam cihleh John hong pai in thuman lampi hong lah hangin amah na um kei uh hi. Ahi zongin siahdongte le numei kizuakte in amah a um uh hi. Note in hih thu na muh khit nangawn un kisik in amah na um tuan kei uh hi.
40021033	“A dang thugentehna khat na ngai un. Leitang neipa khatin lenggah lo khat bawl in a kim ah phung ciangin um a, lenggah cilna phual khat bawl in buuktau khat zong a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin lenggah lo kho dingin mi cial a, khual gamlapi khatah a zinkhia hi.
40021034	Tu in lenggah lak hun hong naita a, lenggahte a kaikhawm dingin lokhawh thalawhte kiangah a nasemte a sawl hi.
40021035	“Lokhawh thalawhte in a nasemte man uh a, khat vuagawp in khat that uh a, a dang khat pen suang tawh a denglum uh hi.
40021036	Tua ciangin loneipa in a sawl masakte sangin a tam zaw a nasemte pawlkhat sawlkik leuleu a, tuate zong a masate a bawl mah bangun a bawl veve uh hi.
40021037	A tawpna ah loneipa in, ‘Ka tapa zahtak kha ding uh hi,’ ci in a tapa a paisak hi.
40021038	“Ahih hangin lokhawh thalawhte in a tapa a muh uh ciangin kikum uh a, ‘Hihpa innluah ding pa ahi hi. Pai dih un, amah thatin a luah ding teng sut ni,’ a kici uh hi.
40021039	Tua ciangin amah man uh a, lenggah lo pua lamah kaikhia in a that uh hi.
40021040	“Tua hi a, lenggah loneipa a hong pai ciangin tua lokhawh thalawhte bang a ci bawl ding hiam?” a ci hi.
40021041	Amaute in, “Amah in tua migilote nasiatak in a susia ding hi. Lenggah lak hun ciangin loneipa tungah lenggah a ngah zah ding a pia ding a dang lokhawh thalawhte a khosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
40021042	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang, Innkiusuang bulpi a suak hi. Hih in Topa sep hi a, Eite muhna ah lamdang hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
40021043	“Tua ahih manin note kianga kong gen in ah, note tung panin Pasian kumpigam kilakhia dinga, a gahsak ding minamdangte khat tungah kipia ding hi.
40021044	Hih suang tungah mi khatpeuh a kiat leh kitamkham dinga, hih suangin mi khatpeuh a den leh a zanciim ding hi,” a ci hi.
40021045	Tu in siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte in ama thugentehnate a zak uh ciangin amaute a cihna ahihlam a thei uh hi.
40021046	Zeisu mat a sawm uh hangin mihonpi in kamsangpa hi ci in um khin uh ahih manin mihonpi a kihta zel uh hi.
40022001	Zeisu in amaute dawngin thugentehna tawh thu a gen inah,
40022002	“Vantung kumpigam in a tapa aa ding mopawi a bawl kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
40022003	Amah in mopawi sim dinga a khohsate sam dingin a nasemte a sawl ciangin tua a khohsate a pai nuam kei uh hi.
40022004	“Amah in nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsate kiangah hih bangin va gen un. “En un, nitak an min khin ta hi. Bawngtalte le ganthaute kigo zo a, na khempeuh a baihsa in om khin hi. Mopawi ah hong paita un,” va ci un,’ a ci hi.
40022005	“Ahih hangin amaute in thusim loin, amau utna ciat ah a pai uh hi. Khat in lo kuansan a, a dang khatin sum bawl dingin a zinkhiatsan hi.
40022006	A dangte in a nasemte manin bawlsia in a that uh hi.
40022007	Kumpipa in tua thu a zak ciangin heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansak in tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua uh zong a haltumsak hi.
40022008	“Tua khit ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi ankuang kilui khinzo hi. Ahih hangin ka khohsate tua pawi an ne dingin a kilawm kei uh hi.
40022009	Tua ahih ciangin lam lianpite ah va pai kawikawi unla mi na muh peuhpeuh uh mopawi ah hong sam un,’ a ci hi.
40022010	Tua ciangin nasemte zong lam lianpite ah va pai in mi a muh khempeuh uh misia, mipha a kaihkhop uh ciangin mopawi inn sungah mi a dim hi.
40022011	“Tua pawisimte en dingin kumpipa a lut ciangin mopuan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi.
40022012	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Lawm aw, mopuan silh lopi in banghang in hih mun hong tung thei na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua pa in a dawng thei kei hi.
40022013	“Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Hihpa a khut le a khe hen unla kaikhia in pualam khuamial lakah lawnkhia un. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.’
40022014	“A kisam mi a tam hangin a kiteel mi a tawm hi,” a ci hi.
40022015	Tua khit ciangin Pharisee pawlte paikhia uh a, ama kampau mah tawh Zeisu a awksak theih nadingun a kikum uh hi.
40022016	Tua khit ciangin amau nungzuite le Herod pawlte Zeisu kiangah a sawl uh hi. Amaute in, “Sia aw, nang mi thuman khat na hi hi. Maitang zahtak tuam neilo na hih manin angvan tuam zong na nei kei‑a a maantak in Pasian thu na hilh hi cih kong thei uh hi.
40022017	Tua ahih ciangin Caesar kumpipa tungah mimal siah piakhuai hiam piakhuai lo hiam na ngaihsutna hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
40022018	Ahih hangin, Zeisu in amaute gitloh gelna thei ahih manin, “A kineihkhem mite aw, banghang in hong ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
40022019	Mimal siah dinga na piak uh dangkatang khat hong lak un,” a cih ciangin denariusɠ tang khat a pia uh hi.
40022020	Amah in, “Hih in kua lim le kua min ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
40022021	Amaute in, “Caesar kumpipa min le lim ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Caesar kumpipa neihsate Caesar kumpipa pia unla Pasian neihsate Pasian pia un,” a ci hi.
40022022	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uha amah nusia in a paikhia uh hi.
40022023	Tua ni mahin thawhkikna om lo hi a ci Sadducee pawlte hong pai in thu a dong uh hi.
40022024	Amaute in, “Sia aw, mi khatin ta nei loin a sih leh a naupa in a zi luah henla, a upa aa dingin suan leh khak tawisak hen ci in Moses in thu hong pia hi.
40022025	Tu in ko kiangah unau pasal sagih a om hi. A upapen in zi nei a, ta nei loin a si hi. Tua ciangin a naupa in a zi a luah hi.
40022026	A nihna le a thumna pa a kipan a sagihna dongin tua bangin a piang hi.
40022027	A tawpna ah tua numei zong a si hi.
40022028	Tua ahih teh thawhkik ni ciangin tua numei in unau pasal sagihte sung panin kua pen zi in a om ding hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh a vekpi un tua numei a teenpih khin uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40022029	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na sangkhial uh hi.
40022030	Thawhkik ni ciangin kipi kiteenna om nawnlo dinga, vana om Pasian vantungmite tawh a kibang ding uh hi.
40022031	Misite thawhkikna thu Pasian hong genna sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
40022032	Amah in, ‘Keimah in Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian ka hi hi,’ a ci hi. Pasian in misite Pasian hilo in, a nungta mite Pasian ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
40022033	Mihonpi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin ama thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
40022034	Zeisu in Sadducee pawlte cih nading thei loin a koih lam Pharisee pawlte in a zak uh ciangin a kikhawm uh hi.
40022035	Amaute lak panin thukhamhilh sia khatin, Zeisu a ze‑etna in thu dong a,
40022036	“Sia aw, thukham sung panin a lianpen thupiak bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
40022037	Zeisu in, “ ‘Na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, le na ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh Topa na Pasian it in.’
40022038	Hih in a masa le a lianpen thupiak ahi hi.
40022039	A nihna in a masa mah tawh a kibang hi a, ‘Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,’ cih thu ahi hi.
40022040	“Thukham le Kamsangte laibu‑te khempeuh in hih thupiak nihte pana a hong mengkhia ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40022041	Pharisee‑te a kikaihkhop laitak un Zeisu in,
40022042	“Khazih bang na cih ngaihsut uh hiam? Amah kua tapa ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “David Tapa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
40022043	Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh banghang in David in Kha theihsakna tawh amah Topa ci thei ahi hiam?
40022044	David in a genna ah, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah, “Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ a ci hi.
40022045	“David in amah Topa ci ahih leh banghang in ama tapa hi thei zel ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
40022046	Kuamah in kam khat beek dawng theilo uh ahih manin tua ni a kipan kuamah in thu a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
40023001	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonpite le a nungzuite thu a hilh hi.
40023002	Amah in, “Thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in Moses tutna a luah uh hi.
40023003	Tua ahih manin zuih dinga hong gen khempeuh uh zui unla sem un. Ahi zongin amaute in a gen bangun gamta lo uh ahih manin amaute gamtat bangin gamta kei un.
40023004	Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in midangte liangko tungah a puak hak theithei ding vangik suan napi uh amaute in tuate a khutme dawn nangawn uh tawh a lawng nuam kei uh hi.
40023005	“A sep a bawl khempeuh uh mite muh theihtheih dingin ahih uh hi. Thunget cianga a zat uh talsuante le banbulhteɠ a gol theithei zangin a puanmongtepte uh a sau theithei in a bawl uh hi.
40023006	Pawi annekna ah mun hoih penpen ngah nuam uha kikhopna innte ah tutna thupi tata a deih uh hi.
40023007	Sumbuuk ah mite in, ‘Rabbi aw, Rabbi aw,’ ci in a hopih ding uh a ut uh hi.
40023008	“Khazih khat bek note Siapa hi a, note khempeuh unau khat na hih manun kuamah ‘Rabbi,’ kicisak kei un.
40023009	Vantung a om Pa khat bek nei na hih manun leitung ah kuamah pa ci kei un.
40023010	Khazih khat bek na Siapa uh ahih manin kuamah sia kicisak kei un.
40023011	Note laka a lianpenpa in note nasem ahi ding hi.
40023012	Amah le amah a kilamsang mi peuhmah in niamkhiatna thuak dinga a kiniamkhiat mi peuhmah a kilamsang ding hi.
40023013	“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam kong na khak uh a, note lah lut loin a lut nuamte zong na lutsak kei uh hi.
40023014	A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Meigongte neihsa teng na nektumsak uh a, kineih tawmin thu sau pipi ngen na hih manun a nasia zaw thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi.
40023015	“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat na ngah nadingun leitung tuitung tengah na zin kawikawi uh a, na ngah khit uh ciangin note sanga a zah nihin a sia zaw hellɠ tapa na suaksak uh hi.
40023016	“Lamhilh mittawte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! ‘Mi khatpeuh biakinnpi tawh a kiciam leh phamawh loin a sunga kham tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in a khih hi,’ na ci uh hi.
40023017	Mihai le mittawte aw! Tua kham le tua kham a siangthosak biakinnpi, koi thupi zaw ahi hiam?
40023018	‘Mi khatpeuh biaknatau tawh a kiciam leh phamawh loin tua tau tunga Pasian a kipia nate tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in a khih hi,’ na ci uh hi.
40023019	Mihai le 23:15 mi khat na ngah: Upna hanga Judah mi a kisuaksakte genna ahi hi. mittawte aw! Pasian a kipia na le tua nate a siangthosak biaknatau koi thupi zaw ahi hiam?
40023020	Tua ahih ciangin biaknatau tawh a kiciam mi in, biaknatau le a tunga om na khempeuh tawh a kiciam ahi hi.
40023021	Biakinnpi tawh a kiciam mi in biakinnpi le a sunga a teengpa tawh a kiciam ahi hi.
40023022	Vantung tawh a kiciam mi in Pasian tokhom le tua tunga a tupa tawh a kiciam ahi hi.
40023023	“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh lengmasel, samong sapa teh le cummin‑te sawm a khat na piak uh hangin thukham sunga a thupi zaw ahi maantak a thukhenna, hehpihna le upnate na thudon kei uh hi. A dangte thudon lo tuanlo in hih nate na hih veve ding uh ahi hi.
40023024	Lamhilh mittawte aw, thosi thovaite na valh khakloh nadingun tui na khaih uh hangin kala‑oh na nawmvalh zel uh hi!
40023025	A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh hai le kuangte a pualam na silsiang uh a, ahi zongin a sunglam huaihamna le uangtat nopna lungsim tawh a kidim hi.
40023026	Mittaw Pharisee pawlte aw! Hai le kuangte a pualam a sian theih nadingin a sunglam silsiang masa un.
40023027	“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a pualam leikang a kizut han tawh na kibang uh hi. Tua hante a pualam a etlawm hangin a sungah misi guh le a kihhuai na khempeuh a dim hi.
40023028	Tuamah bangin note zong na puatham uh midik tawh na kibat uh hangin note sungah kineihna le siatna a dimtak in a om hi.
40023029	“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh kamsangte hante na bawl uh a, midikte hante na zem uh hi.
40023030	Tua ciangin, ‘I pu i pate khanlai in a om kha hi lehang, kamsangte a thatte lakah i kihel kei ding hi,’ na ci tazen uh hi.
40023031	Tua ahih ciangin kamsangte a that mite tu le tate na hihlam uh no le no in teci na pang uh hi.
40023032	Tua hi in, na pu na pate uh mawhna zah mah no zong mawhvet un.
40023033	“A gupha gul suante le gul hangsante aw! Hellɠ thukhenna tawh bangci kipelh theih ding na hi uh hiam?
40023034	Note kiangah kamsangte, mipilte le thukhamhilh siate kong sawl hi. Tuate pawlkhat thatin pawlkhat na khailum ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte na kikhopna innte uhah na sat ding uh a, khua khat pan khua khatah na bawlsia ding uh hi.
40023035	Tua banga na bawl manun midikpa Abel sisan a kipan biakinnpi le biaknatau kikal a na thah uh Berechiah tapa Zechariah sisan dongin leitung a na luansak uh midikte sisan khempeuh note tungah hong kisik ding hi.
40023036	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih thu khempeuh tulai khang mite tungah a hong tung ding hi.
40023037	“Kamsangte that a, no kianga hong kisawl mite a denglum den Jerusalem khuapi, Jerusalem khuapi aw, aakpi in a note a khanuai ah a huai bangin na tate ka huainop hangin na ut kei hi.
40023038	En un, na innte uh kilawi dinga, gamkhing a suak ding hi.
40023039	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ‘Topa min tawh hong paipa in thupha ngah tahen,’ na cih mateng in tu a kipan in kei nong mu nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
40024001	Tua ciangin biakinnpi huang sung pan Zeisu a paikhiat laitak biakinnpi innte a lak dingin a nungzuite a hong pai uh hi.
40024002	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih na khempeuh mu hilo na hi uh hiam? Aman takpi kong cih in ah, suang khat tungah suang khat nangawn kiciang nawnlo in kiphelkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
40024003	Tanluan mualtung ah Zeisu a tut laitak in, a nungzuite kia hong pai uh a, “Hih thute cik ciangin hong piang dinga, nong pai nading le hun bei nading theihsakna bang lim tawh hong kilang ding ahi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
40024004	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Kuamah in a hong khem loh nadingin na kidawm un.
40024005	Keima minin mi tampi hong pai dinga, ‘Keimah in Khazih ka hi hi,’ ci in mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
40024006	Gal kidona thu le gal hong tung ding hi cih thuthangte na za ding uh hi. Tua ciangin patau kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu khempeuh a pian loh a phamawh hi a, ahi zongin beina a tung nai kei ding hi.
40024007	Minam khat le minam khat, kumpigam khat le kumpigam khat hong kido ding uh hi. Kialpi le pulnatnate hong tung ding hi. Mun tuamtuam ah zin hong ling ding hi.
40024008	Hihte khempeuh in nausuah kuana natna tawh a kibang haksatna kipatna ahi hi.
40024009	“Tua ciangin bawlsiatna thuak dingin note hong ap ding uh a, hong that ding uh hi. Keima min hangin minam khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
40024010	Tua ciangin mi tampi lungkia ding uh a, khat le khat kilehhek in a kimudah ding uh hi.
40024011	Kamsangzuau tampi hong piang dinga, mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
40024012	Siatna hong khang dinga, mi tampi in ki‑itna a nei nawn kei ding uh hi.
40024013	Ahi zongin a tawp donga a kipte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
40024014	Minam khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian kumpigam lungdamna thu leitung khempeuh ah kitangko dinga, tua khit ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
40024015	“Kamsangpa Daniel in, ‘a lipkhaphuai siatna,’ thu tawh kisai gen khin hi. Tua mipa in biakinnpi a Mun Siangtho ah a din hun na muh uh ciangin (a sim mi in thei tahen),
40024016	Judea gam sunga om mite mualtung ah tai uh hen.
40024017	Innkhum zanga om mite zong na khatpeuh a la dingin inn sungah kumsuk kei uh hen.
40024018	Lokuante zong puan la dingin inn ah ciahkik kei uh hen.
40024019	Tua hun ciangin naupaaite le nawine lai naungek a nei nupite a genthei mahmah ding uh hi!
40024020	Na tai hun uh phalbi laitak le Sabbath ni ahih khakloh nadingin thungen un.
40024021	Banghang hiam cihleh leitung piancil a kipan tudong in a piang ngei nailo tunung ciangin zong a piang ngei nawnlo ding gimna lianpi tua hun ciangin a piang ding hi.
40024022	Pasian in tua nite a tomsak kei leh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a teelsa mite a khualna in tua nite a tomsak ding hi.
40024023	Tua hun ciangin mi khatpeuh in, ‘En in, hihlai ah Khazih a om hi. Hualai ah Khazih a om hi,’ a hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
40024024	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih maanlote le kamsangzuaute a hong piang ding hi. Amaute in hi thei hi leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khem zawh nadingun limlamdang le nalamdang lianpite a piangsak ding uh hi.
40024025	Theita un, a hun hong tunma in kong genkhol zo hi.
40024026	“Amaute in, ‘En un, amah gamlak ah om hi!’ a hong cih uh hangin zui kei un. ‘En un, amah inndeite sungah om hi!’ a hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
40024027	Banghang hiam cihleh nisuahna lam panin khua hong phia a, nitumna dong a tansuak bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin tua bangin a piang ding hi.
40024028	Misi luang omna peuh ah musanete a kikhawm ding uh hi.
40024029	“Tua gimna lianpi hun a bei khit phetin, Ni hong mial dinga, Kha a tang nawn kei ding hi. Van panin aksite hong kia dinga, Vantung nate kiling ding hi.
40024030	“Tua laitak in vantung ah Mihing Tapa tawh kisai limlamdang hong kilang dinga, leitung minam khempeuh a kap ding uh hi. Mihing Tapa vantung panin vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh meiitung tuanga hong pai a mu ding uh hi.
40024031	Amah in a ngaih mahmah pengkul aw tawh ama vantungmite sawl dinga, amaute in lei kiuli le van mong khat pan mong khat donga om a teelsa mite a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
40024032	“Theikung tawh kong gentehna panin hih thu na thei un. Theikung a hiangte dawn a, a tehte hong sel ciangin khuakhal hong naita hi ci in na thei uh hi.
40024033	Tuamah bangin hih thu khempeuh a hong piang na muh uh ciangin tua hun nai mahmah ta‑a kongbiang dong a hong tungta hi ci in na thei un.
40024034	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite a beima teitei in hih thu khempeuh a hong piang ding hi.
40024035	Van le lei mangthang dinga, ahi zongin ka thute a mangthang peuhmah kei ding hi.
40024036	“A ni le a nai ding kuamah in a thei kei hi. Vana om vantungmite in zong a thei kei uh hi. Ka Pa bekin a thei hi.
40024037	Noah hun lai bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin zong tua bang hi ding hi.
40024038	Tuiciin tunma a mite in Noah tembaw sungah a lut ni ciangdong, zukham ankham, kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi.
40024039	Tuiciin tunga amaute khempeuh a tupmang dongin khuaphawk loin a om uh hi. Mihing Tapa a hong pai ciangin zong tuamah bangin a piang ding hi.
40024040	Tua hun ciangin lokuan mi nih khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
40024041	An sukhawm numei nih khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
40024042	“Na Topa uh hong pai ding hun thei lo na hih manun kiging den un.
40024043	Inn neipa in gutapa hong pai ding hun thei leh na pangkhol dinga, a inn luhsak lo ding hi cih thei un.
40024044	Tua ahih ciangin na lamet loh laitak un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahih manin note zong kigingsa in om un.
40024045	“Innsung vai khempeuh hawm a, annek huna innsung mite an manman in a pia dinga a topa in a koih, a muanhuai le a pil nasem kua ahi hiam?
40024046	A topa hong pai ciangin nasem in a om a muh tua nasempa in thupha ngah ahi hi.
40024047	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amah in a neihsa khempeuh tua nasempa a uksak ding hi.
40024048	Ahih hangin a hoihlo nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong zekai lai ding hi,’ ci in ngaihsun henla,
40024049	a naseppih a lawmte satgawp in, zukhamte tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm in na om leh,
40024050	a lametloh ni le a theihloh kalin a topa hong tung vat ding hi.
40024051	A topa in amah tumnih suahin a kineihkhem mite tawh a thuakkhawmsak ding hi. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
40025001	“Tua banah, vantung kumpigam in zipipa dawn dinga a kuankhia meivak a tawi nungak siangtho sawmte tawh kibang hi.
40025002	Tuate lakah ngate pil uh a, a dang ngate a hai uh hi.
40025003	A hai ngate in meivak a ken uh hangin meitui a keng kei uh hi.
40025004	A pil ngate in ahih leh meivak a ken mah bangun meitui zong thawl sungah a keng uh hi.
40025005	Ahih hangin zipipa hong tung hak ahih manin amaute khempeuh lusu in a ihmu uh hi.
40025006	“Zankim laitak in kikona aw khat hong ging a, ‘Ngai un, zipipa hong paikhia ta hi. Amah dawn dingin hong pai un,’ a ci hi.
40025007	“Tua ciangin tua nungak siangthote a vekpi un tho in a meivak ciat uh vak dingin a kipan uh hi.
40025008	A haite in a pilte kiangah, ‘Ka meitui uh bei ahih manin na meitui uh hong hawm un,’ a ci uh hi.
40025009	“A pilte in, ‘Kong hawm zo kei ding uh hi. Ko aa ding le no aa ding kicing lo ding ahih manin meitui zuakte kiangah pai in va lei un,’ a ci uh hi.
40025010	“Amaute meitui lei dingin a pai kal un zipipa hong tung hi. Kigingsa a om mite zipipa tawh mopawi bawlna sungah lutkhawm uha tua ciangin kong a kikhak hi.
40025011	“Tua khit ciangin nungak siangtho dangteng hong tungkik uh a, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw, kong hong hon in,’ a ci uh hi.
40025012	Ahih hangin amah in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note kong thei kei hi,’ a ci hi.
40025013	“Tua ahih ciangin, Mihing Tapa hong pai ding a ni le a nai thei lo na hih manun kigingkhol tawntung un,” a ci hi.
40025014	Zeisu in, “Vantung kumpigam in a nasemte sama a neihsa teng a ap khit ciangin khual gamlapi ah a zinkhia mipa tawh kibang hi.
40025015	Amah in amaute siamna zui in khatpa talentɠ nga, khatpa talent nih, a dang khatpa talent khat a piak khit ciangin a zinkhia hi.
40025016	Talentɠ nga a sangpa in a metbawl ciangin a met talent nga a ngah hi.
40025017	Tuamah bangin talentɠ nih a sangpa in zong a met talent nih a ngah hi.
40025018	Ahih hangin talentɠ khat a sangpa in leito in a topa sum a phum hi.
40025019	“Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte topa hong ciah a, a sum sazian a sit hi.
40025020	Talentɠ nga a sangpa in a dang talent nga hong tawi a, ‘Topa aw, sum talent nga nong ap hi. En in, a met talent nga ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
40025021	“A topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi. A muanhuai nasem hoihpa aw, a tawmno khat tungah citak na hih manin na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Na topa tawh hong lungdamkhawm in,’ a ci hi.
40025022	“Talentɠ nih a sangpa zong hong pai a, ‘Topa aw, sum talent nih nong ap hi. En in, a met talent nih ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
40025023	“A topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi. A muanhuai nasem hoihpa aw, a tawmno khat tungah citak na hih manin na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Na topa tawh hong lungdamkhawm in,’ a ci hi.
40025024	“Tua khit ciangin talentɠ khat a sangpa hong pai a, ‘Topa aw, khaici na tuh lohna munah an na la a, khaici na theh lohna munah an a kaikhawm, migenhak na hih lam kong thei hi.
40025025	Tua ahih manin kong kihta a, lei sungah na sum ka phum hi. En in, na sum hihlai ah a om hi,’ a ci hi.
40025026	“A topa in, ‘A gilo le a thadah nasempa aw, khaici ka tuh lohna munah an la in, ka theh lohna munah an ka kaihkhop lam hong thei na hih leh,
40025027	summet bawlte kiangah ka sum na ap beek leteh kong tun ciangin ka sum le a met ka ngahkhawm thei ding hi.
40025028	‘Tua ahih ciangin ama tunga om talentɠ khat pen la unla talent sawm a neipa pia un.
40025029	Banghang hiam cihleh a neite kipiak beh dinga, kicingtak in a nei ding uh hi. A neilote ahih leh a neih sunsun nangawn uh a kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
40025030	Tua ahih manin kimanna a neilo tua nasempa a pualam khuamial sungah paikhia un. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina om ding hi,’ a ci hi.
40025031	“Mihing Tapa in a minthanna le ama vantungmi siangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin ama minthanna kumpi tokhom tungah a hong tu ding hi.
40025032	Tua ciangin ama mai ah minam khempeuh kikhawmsak dinga, tuucingpa in tuu le kel a khen bangin amaute a khen ding hi.
40025033	Tuute a taklam ah kelte a veilam ah a koih ding hi.
40025034	“Tua khit ciangin Kumpipa in a taklam a omte kiangah, ‘Ka Pa thupha piakte aw, hong pai unla leitung piancil a kipan note aa dingin a kibawlkholsa kumpigam hong luah un.
40025035	Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial lai in an nong pia uh hi. Ka dangtak lai in ka dawn ding tui nong pia uh a, khualzin mi ka hihlai in zin nong do uh hi.
40025036	Puan neilo a ka omlai in puansilh nong pia uh hi. Ka cinat lai in nong veh uha thong ka kiat lai in nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
40025037	“Tua ciangin midikte in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lam cik in hong mu a, an hong pia ka hi uh hiam? Na dangtak lam cik in hong mu a, na dawn ding tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
40025038	Khualzin mi na hih lam cik in hong mu a, zin hong do ka hi uh hiam? Puan na neih loh lam cik in hong mu a, puansilh hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
40025039	Na cinat, na thongkiat cik in hong mu a, hong veh ka hi uh hiam?’ ci in a dawng ding uh hi.
40025040	“Tua ciangin Kumpipa in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat tunga na bawl peuhmah uh kei tunga hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci in a dawng ding hi.
40025041	“Tua khit ciangin a veilam a omte kiangah, ‘Samsiatna a ngah mite aw, ka kiang panin paikhia un. Dawimangpa le a pawlte aa dingin a kibawlkholsa, a kuang tawntung meilipi sungah pai un.
40025042	Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial lai in an nong pia kei uha ka dangtak lai in dawn ding tui nong pia kei uh hi.
40025043	Khualzin mi ka hihlai in zin nong do kei uha, puan neilo a ka omlai in puansilh nong pia kei uh hi. Ka cinat lai le thong ka kiat lai in zong nong veh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
40025044	“Tua ciangin amaute in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lai, na dangtak lai, khualzin mi na hihlai, puan neilo a na omlai, na cinat lai le na thongkiat laitak cik in hong mu a, hong don kha lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
40025045	“Tua ciangin Kumpipa in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih mite a neupen khat tungah na bawlloh khempeuh uh, kei tungah zong a hong bawl lo na hi uh hi,’ ci in a dawng ding hi.
40025046	“Tua ciangin a tawntung daantatna a thuak dingin amaute paikhia ding uha midikte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna munah a pai ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40026001	Zeisu in hih thute khempeuh a gen khit ciangin, a nungzuite kiangah,
40026002	“Ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi hong tung ding hi cih na thei uh hi. Tua ni ciangin khailup dingin Mihing Tapa a kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026003	Tua ciangin siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le Judah mite makaite, Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas inntual ah a kikhawm uh hi.
40026004	Amaute in thukawi, thuzuau tawh Zeisu manin thah ding a sawm uh hi.
40026005	Ahi zongin, “Mihonpi hong lungso kha ding uh ahih manin pawi hun sungin hih kei ni,” a kici uh hi.
40026006	Tu in, Bethany khua‑a teeng Simon miphakpa a kici pa inn ah Zeisu an ne in a tut laitak,
40026007	numei khatin a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangkang thawl khat tawi in hong pai a, Zeisu lutung ah a buak hi.
40026008	Ahih hangin a nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin lungkim lo uh a, “Banghang in hih sathau namtui tuaci thangbawl ahi hiam?
40026009	Sum tampi tawh zuak in mizawngte kipia zaw leh,” a ci uh hi.
40026010	Ahih hangin Zeisu in tua thu a theih ciangin amaute kiangah, “Numeinu bang nopmawh laizang na hi uh hiam? Amah in kei tungah na hoih khat hong bawl khin hi.
40026011	Mizawngte note tawh omden uh a, kei ka hih leh note tawh ka omkhawm den kei ding hi.
40026012	Amah in ka pumpi hih sathau namtui hong buah pen a kivui ding ka pumpi hong puahkhol ahi hi.
40026013	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih lungdamna thu a kitangkona leitung mun khempeuh ah hih numeinu a kiphawk nadingin kei tungah a hong bawlna zong a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026014	Tua khit ciangin sawltak sawm le nihte lakah Judas Iscariot kici pa siampi liante kiangah va pai a,
40026015	“Note khutah amah hong pia hi leng kei bang hong pia ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in nguntang 30 piak dingin a kithukim uh hi.
40026016	Tua huna kipan in Judas in Zeisu a lehhek nading hun hoih a zong hi.
40026017	Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a kipat ni in nungzuite Zeisu kiangah hong pai uh a, “Paisan Pawi an na nek nading koilai ah hong bawlkholhsak le ung na ut hiam?” a ci uh hi.
40026018	Amah in, “Khua sungah va pai unla, kong gensa mipa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka hun hong naita ahih manin ka nungzuite tawh na inn ah Paisan Pawi ka bawl ding hi,” ci hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
40026019	Nungzuite in Zeisu cih bangin hih uha Paisan Pawi an a baihsa in a koih uh hi.
40026020	Nitak hong tun ciangin sawm le nihte tawh Zeisu a tukhawm hi.
40026021	Amaute in an a nek laitak un amah in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note lakah khatin kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40026022	Amaute dah mahmah uh a, ama kiangah, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong ciat uh hi.
40026023	Zeisu in, “Ankuang ka sawkkhoppih pa in kei a hong lehhek ding hi.
40026024	Lai Siangtho sungah ama thu a kigelhsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi! Tua pa mihing in a piangkhia lo hivet leh ama aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026025	Amah a lehhekpa Judas in, “Rabbi aw, kei ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin amah in, “Na cih bangin na hi hi,” a ci hi.
40026026	Amaute in an a nek laitak un, Zeisu in anlum la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkham in, “La unla, ne un. Hih in ka pumpi ahi hi,” ci in nungzuite a pia hi.
40026027	Hai zong la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin, “Na vekpi un dawn un.
40026028	Hih in mi tampi mawhna a mai nadinga a luangkhia, kiciamna thak ka sisan ahi hi.
40026029	Note kong gen in ah ka Pa kumpigam sungah note tawh lenggahtui a thak ka dawn ni mateng in tu a kipan ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” ci in a pia hi.
40026030	Amaute in la khat a sak khit uh ciangin Tanluan mual zuanin a paikhia uh hi.
40026031	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tu zan ciangin keima hangin na vekpi un na puk ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum dinga, Tuuhonte a kithehthang ding uh hi,’ ci in a kigelh hi.
40026032	“Ahih hangin ka thawhkik khit ciangin Galilee gamah note ma in ka na paikhol ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026033	Peter in, “Nangma hangin mi khempeuh a puk zongin kei ka puk ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026034	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuzan aak a khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026035	Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm nading ahi zongin kong nial peuhmah kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Nungzui khempeuh in zong tua bangin a ci ciat uh hi.
40026036	Gethsemane kici munkhat ah Zeisu a tun ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Hua pam lamah thu ka va nget sungin hihlai ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
40026037	Amah in Peter le Zebedee tapa nihte tonpih a, nakpitak a dahna le lunggim a hong kipan hi.
40026038	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “A si zo ding zahin ka lunggim lua mahmah hi. Hihlai ah om unla kei hong ngak un,” a ci hi.
40026039	Amah a gamla zawdeuh ah pai in boksuk a, “Ka Pa aw, hih hai tawh ka kipelh theih ding leh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin, kei deihna bang hilo in, nang deihna bang hizaw tahen,” ci in thu a ngen hi.
40026040	Nungzuite kiangah a va pai ciangin amaute ihmu a om a mu hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Nai khat sung nangawn hong ngak zolo na hi uh hiam?
40026041	Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun thungen unla kiging un. Lungsim a ut mahmah hangin pumpi a thanem hi,” a ci hi.
40026042	Tua ciangin a nihveina thungen dingin va paikhiakik a, “Pa aw, hih hai kei tawh kipelh theilo a, ka dawn loh a phamawh ahih leh nangma deihna bang hi tahen,” a ci hi.
40026043	Amah a hong paikik ciangin nungzuite hak zo mahmah lo uh ahih manin ihmu in a om uh a mukik hi.
40026044	Tua ciangin amaute nusia in va paikhiakik a, a nget ngeiteng mah a thumveina a va ngen leuleu hi.
40026045	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah hong pai a, “Note ihmumu lai, tawlnganga lai na hi uh hiam? En in, Mihing Tapa mawhneite khut sungah a kipiak ding hun hong tungta hi.
40026046	Tho unla pai ni. En un, kei hong lehhekpa a hong nai mahmah ta hi,” a ci hi.
40026047	Tua banga a gengen laitak in sawm le nihte lakah khat ahi Judas in siampi liante le Judah mite makaite in a sawl mihonkhat hong tonpih a, tua mite in namsau le molhtumte a tawi uh hi.
40026048	Amah a lehhekpa in mihonte kiangah, “Ka nap penpa amah ahi hi man pah un,” ci in a theihsak kholhsa ahi hi.
40026049	Amah in thakhat in Zeisu kiang hong naih a, “Rabbi aw, na dam hiam!” ci in a nam hi.
40026050	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Lawm aw, bang hih dinga hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin mihonpi hong pai uha Zeisu manin a paipih uh hi.
40026051	Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh a omkhawmte khatin thakhat in a namsau dokin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a bil a satkhia hi.
40026052	Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa kiangah, “Na namsau a paai ah siatkik in. Namsau tawi peuhmah namsau mah tawh a si ding uh hi.
40026053	Tu mahmah in ka Pa kiangah a ngen theilo hong sa na hi uh hiam? Ngen leng vantungmi legionɠ sawm le nih sanga a tam zaw hong pia pah ding hi.
40026054	Tua bangin a ngen hi leng hih banga a piang dingin Lai Siangtho sunga kigensa thute koici tangtun thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
40026055	Tua hun mahin Zeisu in mihonpite kiangah, “Guta buluh khat man ding bangin namsau le molhtum tawi in kei man dingin hong kuan na hi uh hiam? Biakinnpi huang sungah thuhilh in nisim in note tawh ka omkhawm a, ahih hangin nong man kei uh hi.
40026056	Ahi zongin kamsangte gelhsa Lai Siangtho a tangtun nadingin hihte khempeuh a sem na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin nungzuite khempeuh in amah nusia in a taikek uh hi.
40026057	Zeisu a mante in thukhamhilh siate le makaite kituahkhopna Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas kiangah amah a paipih uh hi.
40026058	Peter in Siampi Ukpa inntual dong a galzuih khit ciangin bang thu hong piang peuhmah hiam cih a en dingin huang sungah va lutin biakinn cingte tawh a tukhawm hi.
40026059	Siampi liante, makaite le thukhenteɠ khempeuh in Zeisu a thah theih nadingun zuauthu tawh thu a kawi zonzon uh hangin a mu zo kei uh hi.
40026060	A maanlo tecipang mitampi a hong pai uh hangin amah thah theih nading thu kician a mu zo kei uh hi. A tawpna ah a maanlo teci a pang mi nih hong pai uh a,
40026061	“Hihpa in, ‘Pasian biakinnpi susia in ni thum sungin ka lamkik zo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
40026062	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa dingto in Zeisu kiangah, “Bangmah dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Hih mite in nang hong mawhsak uh a, na langah hi zahta a teci a panna uh bang thu ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
40026063	Ahih hangin Zeisu a pau tuan kei hi. Siampi Ukpa in ama kiangah, “Pasian Tapa Khazih na hih leh na hih loh nong gen nadingin a nungta Pasian min tawh kong sawl hi!” a ci hi.
40026064	Zeisu in, “Na gen bangin ka hi hi. Ahi zongin, nang tungah kong genin Mihing Tapa in Vangliatna taklam ah tukawmsa in vana meii tungah a hong pai tunung ciangin na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
40026065	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa in a puan balkek a, “Hihpa Pasian tungah a pausia zo hi! Teci dang kisam lai ahi hiam? En un, Pasian tunga a pausiatna na za zo uh hi.
40026066	Bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A si dingin a kilawm hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
40026067	Tua khit ciangin a maitang cilphih in a tumgawp uh hi. A dangte in a khutpek uh tawh a pang beng uh a,
40026068	“Tu‑a hong beng kua ahi hiam? Kamsanna tawh hong gen dih in, Khazih aw!” a ci uh hi.
40026069	Tua laitak in a pualam inntual ah Peter tu in a om hi. Nasem numeino khat ama kiangah va pai a, “Nang zong Galilee mi Zeisu tawh a kithuahpa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
40026070	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Na thugen ka thei kei hi,” ci in amaute khempeuh mai ah a nial hi.
40026071	Amah paikhia in innlim ah a om laitak numeino dang khatin mu a, tualai a om mite kiangah, “Hihpa zong Nazareth khua mi Zeisu tawh a kithuah khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40026072	Amah in, “Tua pa ka thei kei hi!” ci in kiciam kawmin a nialkik hi.
40026073	Tawlkhat khit ciangin a gei‑a ding mite Peter kiangah hong pai in, “Nang zong amaute khat hingel teh, na awkaih in kithei hi,” a ci uh hi.
40026074	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Tua pa ka theih ngeitak leh!” ci in kihamsiat in a kiciam hi. Tua khit phetin aak a khuang hi.
40026075	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Aak a khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” ci a, Zeisu in ama kianga a gensa thu phawkkik a, a pua lamah paikhia in nakpitak in a kap hi.
40027001	A zingsang ciangin siampi liante le Judah mite makaite khempeuh in Zeisu a thah theih nadingun a vaihawm uh hi.
40027002	Tua ciangin amah henin paikhiatpih uha mangpipa Pontius Pilate khutah a piakhia uh hi.
40027003	Tua ciangin a lehhekpa Judas in sihna daan thuak dingin Zeisu tungah thu kikhen zo hi cih a theih ciangin khial kisa mahmah a, siampi liante le makaite kiangah nguntang 30 a va piakik hi.
40027004	Amah in, “Mawhneilopa lehhek kha ka hih manin ka khial zo hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Tua thu le ko bang kisai nawn ka hi uh hiam? Na suah nop peuh suah in,” a cihsan uh hi.
40027005	Tua ciangin Judas in a nguntang teng biakinnpi sungah pai a, paikhia in a gui‑awk hi.
40027006	Siampi liante in tua nguntang teng la uh a, “Hih sum sisan man ahih ciangin sumpi laka hel dingin kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
40027007	Tua banga a kikup khit uh ciangin khualmite a kivui nading belsekpa leitang leina in a nei uh hi.
40027008	Tua ahih manin tua leitang pen tuni dongin Sisan Leitang, kici hi.
40027009	Hih in kamsangpa Jeremiah in a gensa thu a tangtunna ahi hi. Amah in, “Israel mite in ama man ding seh uha nguntang 30 a mansak uh hi.
40027010	Amaute in tua sum la uha Topa in kei hong lamlahna bangin belsekpa leitang man dingin a pia uh hi,” a ci hi.
40027011	Tua ciangin Pilate mangpipa mai ah Zeisu dinga, mangpipa in, “Nang Judah mite Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Zeisu in, “Na cih bangin ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
40027012	Siampi liante le makaite in amah a mawhmatna thu a gengen uh hangin kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
40027013	Tua ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah, “Hih zahta in nang hong langpan a a hong mawhmatna uh za lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
40027014	Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawn loh ciangin mangpipa in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
40027015	Paisan Pawi a tun sialin mangpipa in mipi deih thongkia khat peuhpeuh a khahkhiat zel pen ngeina khat ahi hi.
40027016	Tua laitak in Barabbas kici a gilo a minthang thongkiapa khat a om hi.
40027017	Tua ahih manin amaute a kikhop laitak un Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Barabbas le Khazih a kici Zeisu, kua zaw kong khahkhiat ding na deih uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
40027018	Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a hazat manun amah a piakkhiat uh ahihlam Pilate in a thei gige hi.
40027019	Thukhenna tokhom tungah Pilate a tut laitak in a zi in ama kiangah mi khat sawl a, “Tua midikpa tawh bangmah kisawh kha kei in. Tuzan ka mang sungah tua pa hangin gimna nakpi in ka thuak hi,” ci in a zasak hi.
40027020	Tu in siampi liante le makaite in Barabbas khah a Zeisu a kithah nading a ngen dingin mihonpi a holhthawh uh hi.
40027021	Mangpipa in, “Hih mi nihte kuapen hong khahsak leng na ut uh hiam?” ci in a dotkik ciangin amaute in, “Barabbas!” a ci uh hi.
40027022	Tua ciangin Pilate in, “Tua ahih leh Khazih a kici Zeisu bang ka cih ding hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute khempeuh in, “Singlamteh ah khailum in!” a ci uh hi.
40027023	Tua ciangin mangpipa in, “Amah in bang siatna bawl ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “Singlamteh ah khailum in!” ci in nakpi in a kiko semsem uh hi.
40027024	Pilate in ama deihna lah tangtung lo, mipite zong hong so zaw semsem cih a muh ciangin tui la in mipi mai ah a khut sil a, “Hih midikpa sisan tungah kei ka siang hi. Na suahnop peuh uh suah un,” a ci hi.
40027025	Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Ama sisan phu ko le ka tu ka tate uh tungah hong tung tahen,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
40027026	Tua khit ciangin Pilate in Barabbas khahsak a, Zeisu ahih leh a satsak khit ciangin khailup dingin a piakhia hi.
40027027	Tua ciangin galkapte in mangpipa inn ah Zeisu paipih uha galkaphonɠ teng zong ama kiangah a kikhawm uh hi.
40027028	Amaute in Zeisu puan a suahsak khit uh ciangin puantual san khat a silhsak uh hi.
40027029	A kumpi lukhu dingin linglukhu bawl in khusak uh a, a taklam khutah pumpeng ciang khat a tawisak uh hi. Tua khit ciangin ama mai ah khukdin in, “Judah mite Kumpipa aw, na ci dam tahen!” ci in a zahko uh hi.
40027030	Tua ciangin cilphih uh a, a pumpeng tawi la in a lutang a sat uh hi.
40027031	A zahko khit uh ciangin a puantual suahkhiatsak in ama puante a silhsakkik uh hi. Tua khit ciangin khailup dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
40027032	Tua banga a paikhiat laitak un Simon kici Cyrene khua mi khat tawh kituak uha zawhthawh thu tawh Zeisu singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
40027033	Lutangguh Mun cih khiatna nei, Golgotha kici mun a tun uh ciangin,
40027034	a dawn dingin tuikha a kihel lenggahtui thuk a pia uh hi. Amah in tawm ciam a ahih hangin a dawn nuam kei hi.
40027035	Tua ciangin amaute in singlamteh tungah khai uh a, lai‑aisan in a puante a hawm uh hi. Tua in, “Amaute in ka puante hawm uha, Ka puansilh a ngah nadingun lai‑ai a san uh hi,” ci a, kamsangpa gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40027036	Amaute in tua munah tusuk in Zeisu a en uh hi.
40027037	A lu tungah, “HIHPA IN JUDAH MITE KUMPIPA ZEISU AHI HI,” ci in mawhmatna lai khat a suang uh hi.
40027038	Misuamte nih zong a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat amah tawh a kikhaikhawm hi.
40027039	Tua mun tawna a pai mite in amah zahko in a lu uh peisan in,
40027040	“Biakinnpi susia a, ni thum sunga a lamkik ding pa aw, nang le nang kihonkhia in! Pasian Tapa na hih leh singlamteh tung panin hong kumkhia in,” a ci uh hi.
40027041	Siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le makaite in zong tuamah bangin a zahko uh hi.
40027042	Amaute in, “Amah in midangte hon zo napi amah le amah a kihonkhia zo kei hi. Israelte Kumpipa ahih takpi leh singlamteh tung panin tu in hong kumkhia hen. Tua hi leh amah i um ding hi.
40027043	Amah in Pasian muang in, ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi,’ ci ahih manin Pasian in a hotkhiat nop leh tu in honkhia tahen,” a ci uh hi.
40027044	Amah tawh a kikhaikhawm misuamte in zong tuamah bangin a zahko uh hi.
40027045	Tu in, nai guk a kipan nai kua ciangdong leitung bup ah khimpi a zing hi.
40027046	Nai kua pawlin Zeisu nakpi in kiko a, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani,” a ci hi. Tua in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, banghang in hong nusia na hi hiam?” a cihna ahi hi.
40027047	Tua muna a ding mi pawlkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Hihpa in Elijah sam hi!” a ci uh hi.
40027048	Amaute lak panin thakhat in mi khat va tai a, tuihupna khat la in lenggahtui thuk sungah a diah khit ciangin pumpeng dawn ah suangin a dawn dingin a tahto hi.
40027049	A dangte in, “Hi ci omsak phot dih un. Amah hon dingin Elijah hong pai hiam en dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
40027050	Nakpitak in Zeisu a kikokik khit ciangin a huu tawpna a sangkhia hi.
40027051	Tua ciangin, en in, biakinnpi sunga kideina puan a lu pan a taw dong kikek in phelnih a kisuah hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumte kitam a,
40027052	hante zong kihong in a ihmu khinsa misiangtho tampite kithokiksak hi.
40027053	Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin amaute han sung pan hong pusuakkhia uha khuapi siangtho sungah lutin mi tampi kiangah a kilang uh hi.
40027054	Tua ciangin Zeisu a cing galkap 100 ukpa le a lawmte in zinling le thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in Pasian Tapa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
40027055	Zeisu panpih in a zui Galilee gam pana numei tampite in zong amah a galet uh hi.
40027056	Tuate lakah Magdala khua mi Mary, James le Joses‑te nu Mary a kipan Zebedee tate nu zong a om hi.
40027057	Nitak lam ciangin Joseph a kici Arimathea khua‑a mihaupa khat a hong pai hi. Amah zong Zeisu nungzui khat ahi hi.
40027058	Pilate kiangah amah va pai‑a Zeisu luang a ngen hi. Tua ciangin amah piak dingin Pilate in thu a pia hi.
40027059	Joseph in Zeisu luang lakhia in puanpak siangtho tawh a tun hi.
40027060	Tua khit ciangin suang a kikhuak ama bawlsa han thak sungah sial a, suangtumpi khat khuk in hankong a khak khit ciangin a ciah hi.
40027061	Magdala khua mi Mary le Mary a dang khat zong han lam nga in a tu uh hi.
40027062	A zingciang ahi Kigin Niɠ in siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte Pilate kiangah a va kikhawm uh hi.
40027063	Amaute in, “Sia aw, tua zuau genpa in a nuntak lai in, ‘Ni thum khit ciangin ka thokik ding hi,’ ci a, a gen thu ka phawkkik uh hi.
40027064	Tua ahih ciangin ni thum sung ama han a kicin nadingin thu pia in. Tua hi kei leh a nungzuite zanin hong pai in a luang gukhia ding uha mite kiangah, ‘Misite lak panin amah thokik zo hi,’ a ci ding uh hi. Tua hi leh a masa khemna sangin a nunung khemna suksia zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
40027065	Pilate in amaute kiangah, “A cing ding galkapte nei na hih uh ciangin pai unla na hih theih zahzah un a muanhuai theithei in bawl un,” a ci hi.
40027066	Tua ciangin amaute pai in a muanhuai theithei in a han suangtumpi tungah ciaptehna khen uha a cing ding mi zong a koih uh hi.
40028001	Tu in Sabbath ni a bei khit nipi kal sunga ni masa pen ni zingsang phalvak tungin Magdala khua mi Mary le Mary dang khat daihawh dingin a pai uh hi.
40028002	Tua ciangin, en in, zin nakpi in hong ling hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Topa vantungmi khat vantung pan hong kumsuk a hankong hukna suangtumpi likkhia in a tungah a tu hi.
40028003	Ama mel khuaphialep tawh kibang in a puan vuk bangin a ngo hi.
40028004	Han cingte in amah kihta lua uh ahih manin linggawp uha misi tawh kibang uh hi.
40028005	Ahih hangin vantungmi in numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un. Singlamteh tunga a thah uh Zeisu a zong na hi uh hi cih kong thei hi.
40028006	A hong gensa bangin amah thokik zo ahih manin, hihlai ah om nawnlo hi. Hong pai unla, Topa luang kisialna mun hong en un.
40028007	Pai mengmeng unla a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Amah misite lak panin thokik zo hi. Galilee gamah amah na pai masa dinga, tualai ah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci in gen un. En un, hih thu note kiangah kong genzo hi,” a ci hi.
40028008	Tua ciangin numeite lau le lungdam kawmsa in han pan ciah pah vingveng uha nungzuite kiangah tua thu a ko dingin a tai uh hi.
40028009	A nungzuite kiangah thuko dingin a pai laitak un, Zeisu in amaute na dawntuah a, “Lungdam un!” a ci hi. Amaute in Zeisu khe va kawi in amah a bia uh hi.
40028010	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Lau kei un. Pai unla ka sanggamte kiangah, Galilee gamah hong pai le uh hong mu ding uh hi ci in va gen un,” a ci hi.
40028011	Numeite a pai laitak un hancingte pawlkhat khuapi sungah pai in thupiang khempeuh siampi liante kiangah a va ko uh hi.
40028012	Siampi liante in zong makaite kaikhawm in thu a kikup khit uh ciangin galkapte sum tampi pia uh a,
40028013	“ ‘Zan ka ihmut kal un a nungzuite hong pai in a luang na gukhia uh hi,’ ci in hong gen un.
40028014	Hih thu mangpipa in a zak leh zong amah ka na lungkimsak ding uha note kong sukhasak kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40028015	Tua ciangin galkapte in zong a sumteng la in a kisawl bangin a gen uh hi. Amau thugen bangin hih thu Judah mite lakah tuni dongin a kigen lai hi.
40028016	Tua khit ciangin nungzui sawm le khatte Galilee gama Zeisu vaikhakna mualah pai uha
40028017	amah a muh uh ciangin a bia uh hi. Ahih hangin pawlkhatte a lunghiang lai uh hi.
40028018	Tua ciangin Zeisu hong pai in amaute kiangah, “Vantung le leitung a om thuneihna khempeuh kei a hong kipia zo hi.
40028019	Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla minam khempeuh ka nungzuite na suahsak khit uh ciangin Pa, Tapa le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui na phum un.
40028020	Note kong piaksa thu khempeuh a zuih nadingun hilh un. En un, hun a bei dongin note kong ompih tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. Amen.
41001001	Pasian Tapa Zeisu Khazih lungdamna thu a kipatna in hih bang ahi hi.
41001002	Kamsangte laibu sungah, “En in, nangma lampi a sialkhol dingin, Na mai ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl hi.
41001003	Gamlak a kikopa awging in, ‘Topa pai nading lam na sial unla, Ama lampite na tangsak un,’ a ci hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
41001004	John in gamlak ah mite tuiphum a, mawhmaisak nadingin kisikkikna thu tawh kisai tuiphumna thu a hilh hi.
41001005	Tua ciangin Jerusalem khua mite a kipan Judea gama om mi khempeuh ama kiangah hong pai in a mawhnate uh pulak uh a, John in Jordan gunah amaute tui a phum hi.
41001006	Tu in John in kala‑oh mul kigan puan silhin, savun kawnggak tawh a kawng gak a, kauphe le gamlak khuaizu tawh a kivak hi.
41001007	Amah in, “Kei sanga a vanglian zaw khat hong pai lai ding hi. Kunsuk a a khedapkhau sut ding nangawn in ka kilawm kei hi.
41001008	En in keimah in note tui ah kong phum a, ahih hangin amah in note Kha Siangtho tawh a hong phum ding hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
41001009	Tua hun laitak in Galilee gam Nazareth khua panin Zeisu hong pai a, John in Jordan gun sungah a tuiphum hi.
41001010	Tuisung pan a hong paikhiat phetin van kihong a, Kha in vakhu bangin ama tungah hong kumsuk John in a mu hi.
41001011	Tua ciangin van panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nangmah in hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
41001012	Tua khit phetin Kha in gamlak ah Zeisu a sawlkhia pah hi.
41001013	Gamlak ah ni 40 sung Zeisu omin Satan ze‑etna thuak a, gamsate tawh a omkhawm hi. Tua khit ciangin vantungmite in amah a kem uh hi.
41001014	Thong sungah John a kikhum khit ciangin Galilee gamah Zeisu pai in Pasian kumpigam tawh kisai lungdamna thu a tangko inah,
41001015	“A hun hong tungzo a, Pasian kumpigam hong tungta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla lungdamna thu um un,” ci in a gen hi.
41001016	Galilee tuili gei ah Zeisu a pai laitak in Simon le a sanggampa Andrew tuili sungah ngen khuh a om a mu hi. Amaute ngabeng mi ahi uh hi.
41001017	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka nung hong zui un. Mi a mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
41001018	Amaute in thakhat in a ngen uh nusia in Zeisu nung a zui pah uh hi.
41001019	Tua mun pan tawmvei sung a pai khit uh ciangin Zebedee tate ahi James le a sanggampa John zong a mu hi. Amaute gunkuang sungah ngen khui a om a mu hi.
41001020	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute a sam pah hi. Amaute in a cial uh nasemte le a pa uh Zebedee gunkuang sungah nusia in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
41001021	Tua khit ciangin amaute Capernaum khua ah pai uh a, Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn ah Zeisu lut pahin thu a hilh hi.
41001022	Amah in thukhamhilh siate hilh bangin hilh loin thuneipa bangin hilh ahih manin a thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
41001023	Tu in amaute kikhopna inn sungah dawigilo a vei mi khat a om hi.
41001024	Amah kiko in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu aw, komau thuthu in hong omsak in. Ko le nang bang kisai i hi hiam? Kote susia dinga hong pai na hi hiam? Nang kua na hi hiam cih kong thei uh a, Pasian mi Siangthopa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
41001025	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pau kei in, ama sung pan paikhia in!” ci in a tai hi.
41001026	Dawigilo in zong tua pa kongkawsak a, tua khit ciangin nakpitak in kiko a, tua pa sung pan a paikhia hi.
41001027	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Bang thu bang la hi zawzen hiam? Hih thuhilhna thak a bangci thu hi peuhmah hiam? Thuneihna tawh amah in dawigilote thu a piak ciangin ama thuthu a mang uh hi,” ci in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
41001028	Tua khit ciangin Galilee gam kim le pam tengah ama thu a kizel pah hi.
41001029	Tu in kikhopna inn pan a paikhiat khit phetun Simon le Andrew‑te inn sungah James le John tawh Zeisu a lut hi.
41001030	Simon sunghnu nattun in lum ahih manin Zeisu kiangah a ko pah uh hi.
41001031	Tua ciangin amah hong pai in tua nu a khut lenin a phot leh a cisa bei pahin tua nu in amaute zin a do hi.
41001032	Nitak lam ni a tum khit ciangin cina khempeuh le dawilut mite Zeisu kiangah a hong puak uh hi.
41001033	Tua khit ciangin a khuazang un kongpi gei ah hong kikhawm ngeingai uh a,
41001034	Zeisu in natna tuamtuam a vei mi tampi damsak in dawi tampi a hawlkhia hi. Dawite in Zeisu thei uh ahih manin amah in amaute kam khat beek a pausak kei hi.
41001035	Zingsang khua a vakma in Zeisu tho a, gamdaihna mun khatah pai in thu a ngen hi.
41001036	Tua kalin Simon le a lawmte in amah a zong uh hi.
41001037	Amaute in Zeisu a muh uh ciangin ama kiangah, “Mi khempeuh in nang hong zong uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41001038	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Thu ka hilh theih nadingin hih kima om khua dangdangte ah zong pai ni. Banghang hiam cihleh hih na sem ding maha hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
41001039	Tua bangin Galilee gam kikhopna inn khempeuh ah thu hilhin dawite a hawlkhia hi.
41001040	Tua laitak in miphak khat Zeisu kiangah hong pai a, Zeisu mai ah khukdin in, “Hong damsak nuam lecin nong damsak thei hi,” ci in a thum hi.
41001041	Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa hehpihhuai sa ahih manin a khut zanin lawng a, “Kong damsak nuam hi. Damta in,” a ci hi.
41001042	Tua bang a cih khit phetin thakhat in tua pa tung panin phaknatna paikhia in a dam pah hi.
41001043	Zeisu in tua pa khauhtak in thu a piak khit ciangin ciahsak pah a,
41001044	“Hih thu kuama kiangah gen peuhmah kei in. Ahi zongin, pai inla siampipa kiangah va kilak in. Damna ngah na hih manin Moses hong thupiak bangin biakna va pia in. Tua in amaute tunga teci panna a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
41001045	Ahih hangin tua pa paikhia in tua thu genthang in a kizelsak mang hi. Tua ahih manin Zeisu a kilang in khua sungah lut thei nawnlo a, khuanawl gamlak peuh ah om hi napi mun khempeuh panin mite in ama kiang hong zuan veve uh hi.
41002001	Tua khit a sawtlo in Capernaum khua ah Zeisu paikik a, amah inn sungah om hi cih thu mite in a za uh hi.
41002002	Kongkhak gei dong nangawn ah om nading omlo zahdong in mi tampi thakhat in hong kikhawm uh a, Zeisu in amaute thu a hilh hi.
41002003	Tua laitak in mi li in pumzaw mi khat hong pua uha ama kiangah hong paipih uh hi.
41002004	Mihonpi hangin amaute in Zeisu kiang naih theilo uh ahih manin ama omna tungsan innkhum phelkhia in tua panin pumzawpa a lupna tawh a khaisuk uh hi.
41002005	Zeisu in amaute upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
41002006	Tua laitak a tu thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat in amaute lungsim sungah,
41002007	“Banghang in hihpa in hih bangin Pasian tungah pausia ahi hiam? Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41002008	Ahih hangin tua banga a ngaihsut lam uh Zeisu in a lungsim sungah thei pah a, “Banghang in tua bangin note lungsim sungah ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
41002009	Pumzawpa kiangah, ‘Na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding leh, ‘Tho in, na lupna pua inla kalsuan in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam?
41002010	Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawhmaisak theihna thuneihna a neih lam na theih nading uh ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah,
41002011	“Tho in, na lupna pua inla na inn ah ciah in kong ci hi,” ci in a sawl hi.
41002012	Tua pa thakhat in tho a, a lupna pua in amaute khempeuh muhin a paikhia hi. Tua mite khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih bang mahmah khatvei beek i mu ngei kei hi!” ci in Pasian a phat uh hi.
41002013	Tua khit ciangin tuili gei ah Zeisu paikhiakik in ama kiangah mipi khempeuh hong kikhawm uh a, amah in amaute thu a hilh hi.
41002014	Amah lam a pai laitak in Alphaeus tapa Levi siahdonna buuk sungah tu‑a om a muh ciangin, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Levi zong dingto in a zui hi.
41002015	Tu in, Levi inn ah an ne dingin Zeisu a tut laitak in, siahdongte le mawhneite tampitak in zong Zeisu le a nungzuite tawh ankuang a umkhawm uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tualai ah tua bang mi tampi in amah a zui uh hi.
41002016	Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate in siahdongte le mawhneite tawh an nekhawm in a om Zeisu a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Banghang in amah in siahdongte le mawhneite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41002017	Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cinate bekin kisam uh hi. Midikte sam dinga hong pai ka hi kei a, mawhneite a kisikkik nadingun a sam dingin hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
41002018	John nungzuite le Pharisee‑te nungzuite in an a tang uh hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute Zeisu kiangah pai uh a, “John nungzuite le Pharisee‑te nungzuite in antang napi uh banghang in na nungzuite in antang lo uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
41002019	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Zipipa in a lawm a gualte a ompih laitak in amaute in antang thei ding uh ahi hiam? A ompih laiteng an a tang thei kei ding uh hi.
41002020	Ahih hangin zipipa a kilakkhiat hun hong tung dinga, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
41002021	“Kuamah in puan lui kek puan thak tawh a phop kei hi. Tua bangin phop leh puan thak in puan lui kaikek in, a kekna a zai semsem ding hi.
41002022	Kuamah in savun um lui sungah lenggahtui thak a thun kei uh hi. Tua bangin kithun leh lenggahtui thakin savun um lui phukham in lenggahtui teng buakhia dinga, savun um lui zong a kisia ding hi. Lenggahtui thak pen savun um thak sunga thun ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41002023	Tu in Sabbath ni in buhlei sung tawnin Zeisu a pai laitak in a nungzuite in buhvuite a zut uh hi.
41002024	Tua ciangin Pharisee‑te in ama kiangah, “En in, banghang in Sabbath ni in amaute in thukham tawh kituak loin gamta uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41002025	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Siampi Abiathar a khanlai in, David le a lawmte gilkial in a cimawh ngei uh hi.
41002026	Tua ciangin amah Pasian inn sungah lutin siampite longal midangte nek theih ding a hilo Ompihna Anlumte ne in, a lawmte zong a piak thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41002027	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni pen mite aa dinga kibawl hi a, mite pen Sabbath ni aa dinga kibawl hilo hi.
41002028	Tua ahih manin Mihing Tapa in Sabbath Ukpa zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41003001	Tua khit ciangin kikhopna inn sungah Zeisu lutkik a, tualai ah khut langkhat a si mi khat a om hi.
41003002	Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu a mawhmat theih nadingun Sabbath ni in tua mipa a damsak peuhmah hiam ci in a en gige uh hi.
41003003	Zeisu in khutsi mipa kiangah, “Ding inla, hong pai in,” a ci hi.
41003004	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni in a pha bawlhuai hiam a sia bawlhuai hiam? Nuntakna khat hotkhiathuai hiam thahhuai hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Ahih hangin amaute pau loin a dai khipkhep uh hi.
41003005	Amaute lungkhauhna hangin Zeisu in heh le dah thuah a, a kim a pam teng a ban et khit ciangin tua mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci in a sawl hi. Amah in a zankhiat leh a lang khat lam mah bangin a dam hi.
41003006	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte paikhia in Herod pawlte tawh amah a suksiat theih nading uh thakhat in a vaihawm uh hi.
41003007	Ahih hangin Zeisu a nungzuite tawh tuili lamah kihemkhia a, Galilee gam le Judea gam pana hong pai mi tampite in amah a zui uh hi.
41003008	Jerusalem khuapi, Idumia gam Jordan gungal khat pan le Tyre le Sidon khuakim panin mi tampite in Zeisu nasep tampite a zak uh ciangin ama kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
41003009	Tua ciangin mihonpite in amah a phut khakloh nadingin gunkuang neu khat ama aa dingin a koihkholh nadingun a nungzuite a sawl hi.
41003010	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mi tampi damsak ahih manin cina luna a om zahzah amah lawng kha nuamin a kiphu gawp uh hi.
41003011	Dawigilote in amah a muh uh ciangin, a mai ah pukin, “Nang in Pasian Tapa na hi hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
41003012	Ahi zongin, Zeisu in ama thu kuamah a theihsak loh nading uh khauhtak in a kham hi.
41003013	Zeisu in mualtung ah kahto in ama mi deihteng sam a, amaute zong ama kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
41003014	Tua khit ciangin amah in amah tawh a omkhawm ding le thuhilh a a sawlkhiat theih ding mi sawm le nih a seh hi.
41003015	Natna a damsak theih nading uh le dawite a hawlkhiat theih nadingun thuneihna a pia hi.
41003016	Tua mite in, Zeisu in Peter ci a, min thak a phuahsakpa Simon,
41003017	Zebedee tapa James, le ama min thak dingin “Vanging Tate” cih khiatna a nei Boanerges cih min a phuah Zebedee tapa James sanggampa John,
41003018	Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Thaddaeus, Cana khua mi Simon, le
41003019	amah a lehhekpa Judas Iscariot‑te ahi uh hi. (19) Tua khit ciangin amaute inn khatah a lut uh hi.
41003020	Tua ciangin mihonpite khatvei hong kikhawmkik uh ahih manin amaute in an nangawn ne manlo uh hi.
41003021	Ahih hangin ama innkuanpihte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin mihai tawh kibang sa uh ahih manin a pummat dingin a kuan uh hi.
41003022	Jerusalem khuapi pana hong paisuk thukhamhilh siate in, “Ama sungah Beelzebubɠ lut a, tua dawi mangpipa min suangin dawite a hawlkhia ahi hi,” a cihsan uh hi.
41003023	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute samin thugentehna tawh thu a hilh in ah, “Satan in bangci bangin Satan hawlkhia thei ding ahi hiam?
41003024	Gam khat peuhmah kiphelkhap leh tua gam ding zolo ding hi.
41003025	Innkuan khat a kiphelkhap leh zong tua innkuan ding zolo ding hi.
41003026	Satan amah le amah kido in kiphelkhap leh ding zolo dinga beimang ding hi.
41003027	Mi thahatpa hencip masa loin kuamah in ama inn sungah lutin a neihsate a laksak zo kei ding hi. Amah a kihencip khit ciang bekin a inn a kiluh zo pan ding hi.
41003028	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mihingte mawhna khempeuh le Pasian tunga pausiatnate a kimaisak ding hi.
41003029	Ahih hangin Kha Siangtho tunga a pausiate cikmah hunin kimaisak lo dinga, tawntung gimna a thuak ding uh hi,” ci in a gen hi.
41003030	“Ama sungah dawigilo lut hi,” ci in ngawh uh ahih manin amah in hih thugentehna tawh a hilh ahi hi.
41003031	Tua laitak in a nu le a naute ama kiangah hong pai uh a, amah a sam ding mi sawlin inn pualam ah a ngak uh hi.
41003032	Ama kim ah mihonpite a tu uh hi. Amah a samte in, “En in, na nu le na naute in innpua lamah omin nang hong zong uh hi,” ci in a gen uh hi.
41003033	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Ka nu le ka naute kua ahi uh hiam?” ci in a dawng hi.
41003034	Amah in a kianga tu mite gualet a, “En un, hih mite in ka nu le ka naute ahi uh hi.
41003035	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna banga a gamtate peuhmah ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu le ka nu ahi uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
