41004001	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in tuili gei ah thu a hilhkik hi. Mipi khempeuh ama kiangah hong kikhawm uh ahih manin tui tunga om gunkuang sungah a tu hi. Mihonpite in tuili lam nga in lei lakah a om uh hi.
41004002	Amah in thugentehna tawh thu tampi a hilh in ah,
41004003	“Ngai un! Khaici vawhpa khat khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
41004004	Khaici a vawh ciangin khaici pawlkhat lam gei ah tu a, vana vasate hong lengin a nemang uh hi.
41004005	Pawlkhatte leitang a tam lohna mun suang tungah tu a, lei a dai hangin a po pah hi.
41004006	Ahih hangin zungkha zolo ahih manin ni hong suakin nisa in a kat ciangin a keumang uh hi.
41004007	Khaici pawlkhatte ling lakah tu a, lingkungte hong khangin depgawp ahih manin a gah zo kei uh hi.
41004008	Ahi zongin khaici pawlkhatte leihoihna ah a tu hi. Tuate po in hong khanga a zah 30, a zah 60, a zah 100 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi.
41004009	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
41004010	Zeisu amah guak a om laitak, sawm le nihte le a kim a pam a om mite in tua thugentehna thu a dong uh hi.
41004011	Amah in amaute kiangah, “A kiselsim Pasian kumpigam thu note kong theisak hi. Ahih hangin a pualam mite tungah thu khempeuh thugentehna tawh ka hilh hi.
41004012	“Tua in, ‘Amaute in enen napi a muh theih loh nading, Ngaingai napi a tel theih loh nading uh ahi hi. Tua hi kei leh amaute hong kihei kha ding uh a, A mawhnate uh kimaisak ding hi,’ a cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41004013	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Note in hih thugentehna tel zolo na hih uh leh thugentehna khempeuh koici tel zawh ding na hi uh hiam?
41004014	Khaici vawhpa in Pasian thu a vawh hi.
41004015	Mi pawlkhatte lamgei a a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin thakhat in Satan hong pai in amaute lungsim sunga kivawhsa thu a lakkhiatsak hi.
41004016	Tua mah bangin pawlkhatte suang laka a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin lungdamtak in sang pah uh a,
41004017	zungkha lo uh ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek thuak zo uh a, Pasian thu hangin haksatna le bawlsiatna a tun ciangin a lungkia pah uh hi.
41004018	Tu in hihte in ling laka a tu khaicite ahi uh hi. Amaute in thu a za mite hi uh a,
41004019	leitung nuntak nading lunghimawh in khemna tawh kidim na dang tuamtuamte a lunggulh mite ahi uh hi. Tua nate in a zaksa uh thu depgawp ahih manin a gah zo kei uh hi.
41004020	Ahi zongin hihte in leihoihna ah a tu khaici ahi uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin sang uh a, pawlkhatte a zah 30, pawlkhatte a zah 60, pawlkhatte a zah 100 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi.
41004021	Amah in amaute kiangah a genbeh in ah, “Note in lawh a khuh ding le lupna nuai‑a koih ding peuhin meivak vak ngei na hi uh hiam? Meivak tunna tungah koih zaw hilo na hi uh hiam?
41004022	Banghang hiam cihleh a kilanglo dinga a kiselsim thei bangmah om lo a, khuavak ah a kilanglo dingin a kiselcip thei bangmah om lo hi.
41004023	Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
41004024	Tua ciangin amah in amaute tungah a gen in ah, “Na thu zak uh limtak in ngaihsun un. Note zat seeng mah tawh no aa dingin hong kitehsakkik ding hi. Hih thu a za note tungah a tam zaw in a hong kipia ding hi.
41004025	Banghang hiam cihleh a neite kipiak beh dinga, a neilote a neih sunsun nangawn a kilakkhiatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
41004026	Tua ciangin amah in, “Pasian kumpigam in lei lakah khaici a vawh mipa tawh kibang hi.
41004027	Tua pa, sun tawh zan tawh ihmu zel, tho zel a, ama theih loh kalin khaici poin a khang hi.
41004028	Leitang in ama thu in gah a gahsak hi. A masa in hong ngum a, tua khit ciangin hong vui in a vui sungah a tak hong dim hi.
41004029	A min ciangin at hunta ahih manin a phiaukawi tawh a at pah hi,” a ci hi.
41004030	Tua ciangin amah in, “Pasian kumpigam bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding i hi hiam?
41004031	Pasian kumpigam in ankamtang tawh kibang hi. Ankamtang in lei ah a kivawh laitak in leitung a khaici khempeuh lakah a tang neupen hi a,
41004032	ahih hangin a kivawh khit ciangin a kung hong po in, khai kung khempeuh sangin golzaw a, a mengkhia a hiangte golpipi hong pha hi. Tua ciangin vana leng vasate in a hiang kawm ah bu a tom thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
41004033	Amah in amaute theih zawh dingin tua bang thugentehna tampi tawh a hilh hi.
41004034	Amaute kiangah thugentehna loin thu a gen kei hi. Ahih hangin ama nungzuite bek tawh a om ciangin thu khempeuh teltak in a hilh hi.
41004035	Tua ni nitak lamin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Galkhat lamah pai ni,” a ci hi.
41004036	Tu in amaute in mihonpite a nusiat khit uh ciangin Zeisu a na tuanna sa gunkuang tawh amah a paipih uh hi. Gunkuangneu dangte zong amaute tawh a paikhawm uh hi.
41004037	Tua laitak in huihpi nakpi in hong nung a, tuihual in gunkuang vatgawp ahih manin gunkuang tui sungah a tum dekdek hi.
41004038	Ahih hangin Zeisu in gunkuang taw lamah lukham khat kham in a ihmu hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in amah phong uh a, “Sia aw, simang khin le ung phamawh salo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41004039	Tua ciangin amah tho in huihpi taii a, tuipi kiangah, “Dai inla om hithiat in,” ci in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin huihpi khawl in a dai dide pah hi.
41004040	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in hi zahtak in lau zawzen na hi uh hiam? Banghang in upna nei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41004041	Amaute lau mahmah uh a, “Hihpa bangci bang mi hi peuhmah ahi hiam? Huihpi le tuipite nangawn in a thu a mang tazen uh hi,” ci in khat le khat a kiho uh hi.
41005001	Amaute in tuili gal khat a om Gadara mite teenna kuam a tung uh hi.
41005002	Gunkuang tung pan Zeisu a tuahkhiat ciangin dawigilo a vei mi khat han panin hong paikhia in thakhat in Zeisu a na dawntuah hi.
41005003	Tua pa han lakah teeng a, sikkhau nangawn tawh kuamah in a hen zo kei hi.
41005004	Banghang hiam cihleh sikkhau tawh tam veipi khih in kol a kibulh hangin a sikkhau bottat in a kol zong peksat a, kuamah in a zozo kei hi.
41005005	Han lak le mualtung ah sun le zanin om tawntung a, kiko niloh in amah le amah suang tawh a kikuiliam gawp hi.
41005006	Tua pa in Zeisu a galmuh ciangin ama kiangah tai in a bia hi.
41005007	Amah nakpi in kiko a, “A Sangbel Pasian Tapa Zeisu aw, nang tawh ka kisaina bang om ahi hiam? Kei nong bawlsiat loh nadingin Pasian minin kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
41005008	Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu in, “Nang dawigilo aw, ama sung pan paikhia in,” ci in thu a pia zo hi.
41005009	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci a, a dot ciangin amah in, “Kote tampi ka hih manun ka min Legionɠ ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41005010	Zeisu in tua gam panin amah a hawlkhiat loh nadingin tua pa in nakpitak in a thum hi.
41005011	Tu in tua mun tawh a kinai mualte tungah vok honpi khat kicing in a om hi.
41005012	Tua ciangin dawigilote in Zeisu kiangah, “Vok honte sungah ka lut theih nadingun hong sawl in,” ci in a thum uh hi.
41005013	Tua ciangin Zeisu in a phal pah hi. Dawigilote paikhia in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua ciangin vok honte ken lakah taisuk gawp uha tui sung kidenna in a si khin uh hi. Tua vok honte 2,000 bang a pha hi.
41005014	Tua ciangin vokcingte tai pah vingveng uh a, khuasung le gam sungteng ah hih thu a va gen uh ciangin tua thupiang en dingin khua mite a hong paikhia uh hi.
41005015	Zeisu kiangah a tun uh ciangin dawigilo legionɠ khat a lutna mipa, puansilh in lungsim maan pua in tu hithiat a om a mu uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a lau uh hi.
41005016	Dawi a lutna mipa le vokte tunga thupiang a mu mite in tua khua mite kiangah a gensawn uh hi.
41005017	Tua khit ciangin tua gam panin Zeisu a paikhiat nadingin tua mite in a ngen uh hi.
41005018	Gunkuang sungah Zeisu a kah ciangin dawi a lutna mipa in Zeisu zui nuamin a kun hi.
41005019	Ahih hangin Zeisu in sang loin ama kiangah, “Na inn ah ciah inla Topa in na lianpi hong bawlnate le hong hehpihnate na lawmte kiangah va gen in,” ci in a sawl hi.
41005020	Tua pa pai in Zeisu in ama tunga a bawl na lianpite Decapolis gam sungteng ah kizelsak a, mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
41005021	Tu in gunkuang tungah Zeisu tuangin a gal khatah a galkahkik khit ciangin mihonpite a hong kikhawm uh hi.
41005022	Amah tuili gei ah a om laitak in en in, kikhopna inn ukte lakah Jairus kici mi khat hong pai a, Zeisu a muh ciangin a khe phungah bokin
41005023	nakpitak thum a, “Ka tanuno si dekdek hi. Amah cidam a hong nuntak theih nadingin hong pai inla a tungah na khut hong ngaksak in,” a ci hi.
41005024	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amah zui a, mihonpi in zong Zeisu paina zui uh ahih manin a phu kha gawp uh hi.
41005025	Tualai ah kum sawm le kum nih sung siluang natna a vei numei khat a om hi.
41005026	Gimna tampi thuakin siavuan tampi zong kibawlsak a, a neihsa teng nangawn a beita hi. Ahih hangin noptuam cih thadah a gim zaw semsem hi.
41005027	Tua nu in Zeisu thu a zak ciangin mihonpi lakah hong lut a, a nunglam panin Zeisu puan a lawng hi.
41005028	Banghang hiam cihleh tua nu in, “A puan va lawng beek leng zong ka dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
41005029	A lawn khit phetin tua nu a siluang kang pah a, a natna a dam lam ama sungah a kithei hi.
41005030	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama sung pan vangliatna paikhia hi cih thei in mihonpi lamah thakhat in kihei a, “Kua in ka puan hong lawng ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
41005031	Ahih hangin Zeisu nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Mihonpi in nang hong sukphut hong tophut cih thei napi cin, ‘Banghang in kua in hong lawng hiam?’ cimawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41005032	Zeisu in amah a lawng numeinu a muh nadingin a kim a pam teng a en kawikawi hi.
41005033	Tua nu in ama tunga thupiang khempeuh thei ahih manin laulua in a ling hi. Tua khit ciangin Zeisu kiangah hong pai in ama mai ah bok a, thupiang khempeuh ahi bangbang in a genkhia hi.
41005034	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in hong damsak zo hi. Lungnuamtak in ciah inla na natna dam tahen,” a ci hi.
41005035	Amah a paupau laitak in kikhopna inn ukpa inn pana hong paite hong tung uh a, “Na tanu sizo hi. Banghang in Siapa buaisak lai ding na hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41005036	Zeisu in tua thu a zak phetin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, “Patau kei inla um in,” a ci hi.
41005037	Zeisu in Peter, James, le a sanggampa John longal kuamah dang a kizuisak kei hi.
41005038	Tua ciangin kikhopna inn ukpa inn ah Zeisu a tun ciangin mite kap le mau‑a om ngeingai a mu hi.
41005039	Zeisu inn sungah luta amaute kiangah, “Banghang in mau in kap ngeingai na hi uh hiam? Numeino a si hilo in a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41005040	Tua ciangin tua mite in amah zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute a vekpi un pusuaksak a, numeino nu le pa le ama tonpih mite a sap khit ciangin numeino lupna inndei sungah a lut uh hi.
41005041	Tua ciangin amah in numeino khut len in, “Talitha, cumi,” a ci hi. A khiatna in, “Numeino aw, tho in kong ci hi,” a cihna ahi hi.
41005042	Tua ciangin numeino thakhat in tho in lam a pai hi. Amah in kum sawm le kum nih a pha numeino ahi hi. Amaute in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
41005043	Ahih hangin tua thu kuamah a theihsak loh nadingun Zeisu in khauhtak in a kham hi. Tua khit ciangin numeino nek theih khatpeuh a piak nadingun a sawl hi.
41006001	Tua ciangin tua mun pan Zeisu paikhia in ama khankhiatna gamah pai a, a nungzuite in a zui uh hi.
41006002	Sabbath ni hong tun ciangin kikhopna inn sungah thu a hilh hi. Ama thuhilhna a za mi tampi in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in hih thute koilai pana a ngah ahi hiam? A khut tawh hih bang nalamdang a bawl theih nadinga a kipia pilna in bangci bang pilna hi zawzen hiam?
41006003	Amah in Mary tapa, khutsiampa hilo ahi hiam? James, Joses, Judah, le Simon‑te sanggampa hi lello ahi hiam? A sanggam numeite zong i kiangah om uh hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute in amah a sang zo kei uh hi.
41006004	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Kamsang kici peuhmah midangte in a pahtawi uh hangin ama khuapihte, ama tanaute le ama innkuanpihte in a pahtawi ngeiloh mah uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41006005	Cina tawmkhatte tungah a khut nga‑a a damsak simloh, tua munah nalamdang bangmah a bawl kei hi.
41006006	Amah in amaute uplohna uh lamdang a sa hi. (6) Tua ciangin khuaneute ah zong a banban in zin kawikawi in thu a hilh hi.
41006007	Tua khit ciangin sawm le nihte ama kiangah sam a, nihta nihta in a sawlkhia hi. Dawigilote tungah thuneihna a pia hi.
41006008	Amah in amaute kiangah khualzinna ah a zat ding uh ciangkhut simloh thungip ahi a, an ahi a, sumbawm sungah sum ahi zongin bangmah a ken loh nading uh le
41006009	khedap bulhin puanak a silhthuah loh nading uh thu a pia hi.
41006010	Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Inn khatpeuh ah na tun uh ciangin tua khua pan na paikhiat mateng un tua inn ah tamsuak un.
41006011	Note hong sang nuamlo in na thugen uh zong a ngai nuamlo mite khua pan na paikhiat uh ciangin note khenuai‑a leivuite singkhia un. Tua leivuite in amaute langkhat ah teci a suak ding hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, thukhen ni ciangin Sodom le Gomorrah khua mite thuakna in tua khua mite thuakna sangin thuaknop zawlai ding hi,” a ci hi.
41006012	Tua ciangin a nungzuite paikhia uh a, mite a kisikkik nading thu a hilh uh hi.
41006013	Dawi tampi hawlkhia in cina tampite sathau zutin a damsak uh hi.
41006014	Tu in, Zeisu minthang mahmah ahih manin Kumpipa Herod in ama thu a za hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuiphumpa John misite lak pan hong thokik zo a, hih vangliatnate amah in a nei ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41006015	Mi pawlkhat in, “Hihpa Elijah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. A dangte in, “Kamsangpa khat ahih keileh kamsangte khatpeuh tawh a kibang mi khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
41006016	Ahih hangin Herod in a zak ciangin, “A ngawng ka tansa John mah misite lak pan hong thokik ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41006017	Herod in a sanggampa Philip zi Herodias a teenpihna thu tawh kisai in John in Herod a mawhsak ngei hi. Tua ahih manin Herod in John mansak a, sikkhau tawh khih in thongah a khum hi.
41006018	Banghang hiam cihleh John in Herod kiangah, “Na sanggampa zi na teenpih pen thukham tawh kituak lo hi,” ci a, a gen manin tua banga a khum ahi hi.
41006019	Tua ahih manin Herodias in John mudah in a that nuam hi. Ahih hangin tua numei in a that thei kei hi.
41006020	Banghang hiam cihleh Herod in John kihta a, John pen midik misiangtho ahihlam Herod in thei ahih manin amah a hu hi. John thugente in Herod lungsim buaisak mahmah a, ahih hangin a thugente hoih a sa mahmah hi.
41006021	Tua ciangin Herod in ama suah ni in a uliante, a galkap mangte le Galilee gam miliante an a vak ciangin hun hoih khat a hong om hi.
41006022	Tua ciangin Herodias tanu hong lutin hong lam a, Herod le amah tawh a tukhawm mite a lungkimsak mahmah hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in nungakno kiangah, “Na deih peuhpeuh hong ngen in kong pia ding hi.
41006023	Ka gam phelkhat dongin nong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci in kiciam in kamciam a pia hi.
41006024	Tua ciangin nungakno paikhia in a nu kiangah, “Bang ngen ding ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. A nu in, “Tuiphumpa John lutang va ngen in,” a ci hi.
41006025	Nungakno zong hong kilehkik pah vingveng in kumpipa kiangah, “Tuiphumpa John lutang kuangdai sung khatah hong pia pah leteh ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
41006026	Kumpipa a dah mahmah hangin, a kiciamna le ankuang a umpihte maitang zahtakna tawh nungakno ngetna a nial nuam kei hi.
41006027	Tua ciangin kumpipa in mithah nasep a sempa kiangah, “John lutang hong paipih in,” ci in thu a pia pah hi. Tua pa zong pai in thong sunga John ngawng va tan a,
41006028	kuangdai sungkhat ah koihin tua nungakno pia a, nungakno in a nu a piasawn hi.
41006029	John nungzuite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin pai in a luang la uha hanah a vui uh hi.
41006030	Tua ciangin sawltakte Zeisu kiangah hong kisutuahkik uh a, a nasepte uh le a thuhilhna teng uh a pulak uh hi.
41006031	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Gamdaihna mun khatah pai unla, tawmvei sung tawlnga un,” a ci hi. Mi a ciah le a kuan kiphamat in annek hun ding nangawn ngah lo uh ahih manin tua banga a gen ahi hi.
41006032	Tua ciangin amaute gunkuang khat tawh gamdaihna mun khatah tuam paikhiat uh hi.
41006033	Tu in amaute paikhiat mihonpi in mu uh a, mi tampi in Zeisu zong a kihel lam thei uh ahih manin khua khempeuh panin khe tawh hong tai ngeingai uh hi. Zeisu tunma in tua mun na tungkhol uh a, Zeisu hong tun ciangin a kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.
41006034	Gunkuang sung pan Zeisu hong tuahkhiat ciangin mihonpite mu a, a cing omlo tuute tawh kibang uh ahih manin hehpihhuai sa in tua munah amaute thu tampi a hilh hi.
41006035	Ni tum kuan ciangin nungzuite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hih mun in gamlakpi hi a, ni zong tum dekta hi.
41006036	Hih mite in annek ding bangmah neilo uh ahih manin, an lei dingin hih kima om khuaneute ah paisak in,” a ci uh hi.
41006037	Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute nek theih khat peuhpeuh pia un,” a ci hi. Nungzuite in, “Kote pai in denariusɠ 200 man an lei in a nek ding uh pia ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41006038	Amah in, “Anlum bangzah nei na uh hiam? Pai unla va en dih un,” a ci hi. Amaute in a omzah a theih khit uh ciangin, “Anlum nga le ngasa nih om hi,” a ci uh hi.
41006039	Tua ciangin Zeisu in mi khempeuh lopa tungah a honhon in tusak un ci in a sawl hi.
41006040	Tua ciangin amaute pawlkhat 100, pawlkhat 50 ta in a pawlpawl in a tu uh hi.
41006041	Zeisu in anlum nga le ngasa nihte a lak khit ciangin vantung lam ento in lungdam a ko hi. Tua khit ciangin anlumte balkham a, mite mai ah a lui dingin nungzuite a pia hi. Ngasa nihte zong mi khempeuh lakah a hawmsak hi.
41006042	Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in gilvahtak in a ne uh hi.
41006043	Anlum le ngasa kikhamval teng a kaihkhop uh ciangin lawh sawm le lawh nih dim a ngah uh hi.
41006044	Anlum a ne mi pasal 5,000 bang a pha uh hi.
41006045	Zeisu in mihonpi a ciahsak kalin nungzuite gunkuang ah tuangsak pah a, gal khat a om Bethsaida khua ah a mapaisak hi.
41006046	Amaute a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin thungen dingin mualtung ah a paito hi.
41006047	Tu in nitak hong tun ciangin tuili laizang ah gunkuang om a, tuili gei leitang tungah Zeisu bek a om hi.
41006048	Tua ciangin huih lehnun ahih manin nungzuite in haksapi in gunkuang a hawh uh Zeisu in a mu hi. Zanvil lina hun pawlin amaute kiang zuanin Zeisu tui tungah hong pai a, amaute a kheng dektak hi.
41006049	Amah tui tunga hong pai amaute in a muh uh ciangin, sikha sa in a kiko uh hi.
41006050	Banghang hiam cihleh a vekpi un amah mu uh a, a patau uh hi. Ahi zongin Zeisu in, “Lungnuamtak in om un, keimah ka hi hi. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
41006051	Tua ciangin amaute tuanna gunkuang ah Zeisu a kahtoh khit ciangin huih a dai hi. Amaute in gen zawhloh zahin lamdang a sa uh hi.
41006052	Banghang hiam cihleh a lungtang uh khauhlua ahih manin anlum tawh nalamdang a bawlna thu a ngaihsun kha kei uh hi.
41006053	A galkah khit uh ciangin Gennesaret gam tung uh a, tuili gei ah gunkuang a khih uh hi.
41006054	Gunkuang sung pan a paikhiat uh ciangin mi khempeuh in Zeisu ahihlam thei pah uh a,
41006055	amaute tua kima om gam tengah tai uh a, a cinate uh tal tawh hong pua in amah om hi ci a, a kizakna munmun ah a hong delh uh hi.
41006056	Khuapi khuata le gam sung ama tunna peuhpeuh ah mite in kongzing lakah cinate sialin a puanmongtep beek a lawnkhak theih nadingun a ngen tentan uh hi. Amah a lawng kha zahzah in damna a ngah uh hi.
41007001	Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi pana hong pai Pharisee‑te le thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat Zeisu kiangah hong paikhawm uh hi.
41007002	Tu in a nungzuite kimkhat in khutninsa a an a nek uh amaute in a muh uh ciangin a mawhsak uh hi. Khutnin a cih ciangin khutsil lo cihna ahi hi.
41007003	Banghang hiam cihleh Pharisee‑te le Judah mi khempeuh in tanglai mite ngeina zui uha khutsil loin an ne lo uh hi.
41007004	Sumbuuk pan a ciah uh ciangin zong kisil loin an ne lo uh hi. Haite, belte, sumngo kuangte, le sabuaite sawpsiangna ngeina a kipan zuih ding a dang ngeina tampi zong neilai uh hi.
41007005	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate in ama kiangah, “Na nungzuite in tanglai mite ngeina zui loin banghang in khutsil lopi in an ne uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
41007006	Amah in amaute kiangah, “A kineihkhem note thu, kamsangpa Isaiah in Lai Siangtho sunga a genkholhna thu a maan hi. Amah in, ‘Hih mite in a kam uh tawh a hong pahtawi uh hangin, A lungsim uh kei tawh kigamla hi.
41007007	Mihing bawltawm thukhamte thuhilhna in zang uh ahih manin, Kei a hong biakna uh a mawkna ahi hi,’ a ci hi.
41007008	“Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian thupiakte nawlkhin in tanglai ngeina ahi, bel le kuang sawpsiangna a kipan tua bang a dang ngeina tampi na zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
41007009	Amaute kiangah, “Tanglai ngeina na zuih theih nadingun Pasian thupiak na nawlkhin uh a, tua banga na hih uh ciangin hi na kisa mahmah uh hi.
41007010	Moses in, ‘Na nu le na pa zahtak in. A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a samsia mi in thahna thuak tahen,’ ci in note thu hong pia hi.
41007011	“Ahih hangin, ‘Note in mi khatin a nu le a pa kiangah, “Kei tung pana na ngah ding khempeuh Corban hita hi,” ci peuh leh bangmah a piak kul nawn kei hi,’ na ci uh hi. Corban a khiatna in Pasian kipia khin cihna ahi hi.
41007012	Tua bang thu tawh a nu le a pa aa dingin tua pa in bangmah sep kul nawnlo hi na ci uh hi.
41007013	Note in na kihilh sawnsawn uh tanglai ngeinate zui in Pasian thu kimanna neilo na suaksak uh a, tua bang dan ngeina tampi na nei uh hi,” a ci hi.
41007014	Amah in mihonpite a sap khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “Na vekpi un ka thugen ngai unla thei un.
41007015	A pualam panin mihing sunga tumsuk na khat beekin mi a ninsak kei hi. Mihing sung pana a pusuakkhiate bekin mihing a ninsak hi.
41007016	Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
41007017	Mihonpi lak pan amah paikhia a, inn sungah a lut khit ciangin a nungzuite in tua thugentehna thu a dong uh hi.
41007018	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in zong tel lo na hi uh hiam? A pualam pan mihing sunga a tumsuk peuhmah in mi a ninsak kei hi.
41007019	Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim sungah lut loin gilpi sungah lut a, a kine an khempeuh kithakhia in kisiangthosak hi,” a ci hi.
41007020	Amah in, “Mihing sung pana pusuakte in tuami a ninsak hi.
41007021	Banghang hiam cihleh a sunglam a om mihingte lungsim panin ngaihsutna hoihlo, angkawmna, numei pasal mawhna, mithahna,
41007022	guktakna, duhhopna, gitlohna, khemna, numei pasal paktatna, etsatna, kosiatna, kiphatsakna, haitatnate a hong pusuak hi.
41007023	Hih a hoihlo thute khempeuh sunglam pan hong pusuak in mihing a ninsak hi,” a ci hi.
41007024	Tua khit ciangin tua mun pan amah paikhia a, Tyre le Sidon gam sungah pai in inn khatah a lut hi. Tualai ah a om lam kuama theih ding a ut loh hangin a kisel zo kei hi.
41007025	Dawigilo a vei tanu a nei nupi khatin Zeisu thu a zak ciangin hong pai a, Zeisu khe phungah bokin
41007026	a tanu sung pan dawigilo a hawlkhiatsak nadingin a ngen den hi. Tua nu pen Syro‑Phoenicia gama piang Greek numei khat ahi hi.
41007027	Ahih hangin Zeisu in tua nu kiangah, “Tate annek ding la in uinote piak ding kilawm lo hi. Tua ahih manin tate ka gilvahsak masa phot ding hi,” a ci hi.
41007028	Tua nu in, “Topa aw, hi mah hi. Ahi zongin sabuai nuai‑a om tate anneng kiate nangawn, uinote in ne kha sam uh hilo ahi hiam?” ci in a dawng hi.
41007029	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Tua banga na cih manin na tanu sung pan dawigilo a taikhia zo hi. Ciahta in,” a ci hi.
41007030	Tua nu ama inn a tun ciangin lupna tungah a tanu lum a, ama sung pan dawigilo paikhia khinzo cih a mu hi.
41007031	Tyre le Sidon khua panin Zeisu paikhia leuleu a, Decapolis gam kantan in Galilee tuili a tung hi.
41007032	Tua ciangin amaute in a bengngong, a pautheilo mi khat ama kiangah hong paipih uh a, tua pa tungah a khut a ngakh nadingin a ngen uh hi.
41007033	Zeisu in mihonpi lak panin tua pa paikhiatpih a, a bil langnih sungah a khutme guangin a cil phiha, a lei a lawnsak hi.
41007034	Tua khit ciangin vantung lam ento in khuisa a, ama kiangah, “Ephphatha,” a ci hi. A khiatna in, “Kihong in,” a cihna ahi hi.
41007035	Tua pa thakhat in a bil kihong a, a leiigui zong kikhah in siangtak in a pau thei hi.
41007036	Tua ciangin tua thu kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun Zeisu in thu a pia hi. Ahih hangin nak kham semsem le tua mite in a nak gen semsem uh hi.
41007037	Amaute in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Amah in na khempeuh a hoih in bawl a, bengngongte khuazasak in pautheilote a pautheisak hi,” a ci uh hi.
41008001	Tua hun sungin mihonpite tamlua mahmah a, nek ding zong a nei kei uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite sam a,
41008002	“Hih mite ka kiangah ni thum hong om khin uh a, nek ding lah neilo uh ahih manin hehpihhuai ka sa hi.
41008003	Gilkialpi in ciahsak leng amaute pawlkhat gamlapi pana hong pai uh ahih manin lamkal ah a bah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41008004	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Kua in mihing hi zahta hih gamlak ah an bangci vak zawh ding ahi hiam?” ci in a dawng uh hi.
41008005	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Sagih a om hi,” a ci uh hi.
41008006	Tua ciangin amah in mihonpite lei lakah tu dingin thu a piak khit ciangin anlum sagihte la in lungdam a ko hi. Tuate balkham in mipi lakah hawm dingin a nungzuite pia a, amaute in zong mihonpite lakah a hawm uh hi.
41008007	Amaute in ngasaneu tawmkha zong a nei uh hi. Amah in tuate thupha a piak khit ciangin mihonpite lakah hawm dingin thu a pia hi.
41008008	Tua ciangin amaute in a kham dong uh a nek khit uh ciangin a khamval uh a them a nengin kaikhawm uh a, lawh sagih a ngah uh hi.
41008009	Tu in an a ne mi 4,000 bang a pha uh hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in amaute ciahsak in,
41008010	thakhat thu in nungzuite tawh gunkuang tung tuangin Dalmanutha gamah a pai uh hi.
41008011	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte hong pai in Zeisu thugen nial dingin a kipan uh hi. Amah a ze‑etna un, “Van panin limlamdang khat hong lak in,” ci in a ngen uh hi.
41008012	Ahih hangin a lungsim sungah Zeisu nakpi in khuisa a, “Banghang in tulai khang mite in nalamdang mu nuam uh ahi hiam? Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite tungah limlamdang a kilak kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41008013	Amah in amaute nusia in gunkuang tuangkik a, gal khat lamah a paikhia hi.
41008014	Tu in a nungzuite in anlum puak ding mangngilh uh a, gunkuang sungah anlum khat longal a dang bangmah a nei kei uh hi.
41008015	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Pharisee pawlte silngo le Herod silngo kidawm unla pelh un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
41008016	Amaute in, “Anlum i neih loh manin hih banga hong ci ahi hi,” ci in a kikum uh hi.
41008017	Tua banga thu a kikup uh Zeisu in a theih ciangin, “Anlum na neih loh manun banghang in tua bangin kikum na hi uh hiam? Phawk thei nai lo, tel thei nailo na hi uh hiam? Na lungtang uh khauhsak lailai na hi uh hiam?
41008018	Mittang nei napi khuamu lo na hi uh hiam? Bil nei napi khuaza lo na hi uh hiam? Phawk thei mahmah lo na hi uh hiam?
41008019	“Mi 5,000 aa dingin anlum nga ka balkhap ciangin a kikhamval an lawh bangzah ngah na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Lawh sawm le lawh nih,” a ci uh hi.
41008020	“Mi 4,000 aa dingin anlum sagih ka balkhap ciangin a kikhamval lawh bangzah ngah na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Lawh sagih,” a ci uh hi.
41008021	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahih leh bang dinga hih thu thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41008022	Tua ciangin amah Bethsaida khua ah hong tung a, mite in ama kiangah mittaw khat hong paipih in tua pa a lawn nadingin a thum uh hi.
41008023	Tua ciangin amah in mittawpa a khut in kai a, khuanawl ah a paipih hi. Tua khit ciangin a mit cil phihsak in a tungah a khut a ngakh khit ciangin, “Na khatpeuh na mu theita hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41008024	Tua pa khuadak in, “Mite ka et ciangin singkung lampai bangin ka mu hi,” a ci hi.
41008025	Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa mit tungah a khut khatvei ngakik a, tua khit ciangin a khuadaksak hi. A mit a ngei bangin hoihkik a, mi khempeuh teltak in a mu thei hi.
41008026	Tua ciangin amah in tua pa a inn ah ciahsak a, ama kiangah, “Khua sungah lut kei inla, hih thu kuama kiangah gen kei in,” ci in thu a pia hi.
41008027	Tu in Zeisu le a nungzuite Caesarea Philippi gam khuaneute ah a pai uh hi. Lam a paikawm un a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite in kei kua hi hong ci uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41008028	Amaute in, “Mi pawlkhat in Tuiphumpa John hi hong ci uh hi. Pawlkhat in Elijah hi hong ci uh hi. A dangte in kamsangte laka khat hi hong ci uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
41008029	Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua ahih leh note in kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” a ci hi. Peter in, “Nang in Khazih na hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41008030	Tua ciangin amah in kuama kiangah ama thu a gen loh nadingun khauhtak in a kham hi.
41008031	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Mihing Tapa in gimna tampi thuak dinga, makaite, siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in nialin a that ding uh hi. Ni thum khit ciangin a thokik ding hi,” ci in a nungzuite a hilhta hi.
41008032	Amah in hih thu siangtak in a gen ciangin Peter in amah samkhia in a taii hi.
41008033	Ahih hangin amah kihei in a nungzuite en kawmsa in Peter lehtaii a, “Satan aw, ka nunglam ah kihemkhia in. Pasian nate ngaihsun loin mihing nate na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
41008034	Tua ciangin amah in mihonpite le a nungzuite samkhawm a, amaute kiangah, “Kei hong zui nuam mi peuhmah in ama pumpi deihna nial henla, a singlamteh kisuan in hong zui tahen.
41008035	Banghang hiam cihleh ama nuntakna a hu nuam mi in a nuntakna a tanlawh ding hi. Keimah le lungdamna thu hanga a nuntakna a tanlawh mi in a nuntakna a honkhia ding hi.
41008036	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin leitung buppi a ngah hangin ama nuntakna a suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?
41008037	Ahih keileh ama nuntakna bang tawh khekkik thei ding ahi hiam?
41008038	Angkawm hat le mawhna a bawl tulai khang mite lakah kei le ka thu a maizumpih mi peuhmah Mihing Tapa in ama Pa minthanna silh a, a siangtho vantungmite tawh a hong pai ciangin a maizumpih ding hi,” a ci hi.
41009001	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih laitak a a ding mi pawlkhat in vangliatna tawh a hong tung Pasian kumpigam a muh mateng un sihna a ciam kha kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009002	Tu in ni guk khit ciangin Zeisu in Peter, James le John‑te a tuam in samkhia a, mualsang tung khatah a kahtohpih hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute mai ah a mel a kikhel hi.
41009003	A puante tee deldel a, vuk bangin a pak sitset hi. Leitung a puansawpmi kuama peuh in tua zahin a paksak zo kei ding hi.
41009004	Tua ciangin Elijah le Moses hong kilang uh a, Zeisu tawh a kiho uh hi.
41009005	Tua ciangin Peter in Zeisu kiangah, “Rabbi aw, hihlai nuam ka sa uh hi. Nang aa ding buuk khat, Moses aa ding buuk khat, Elijah aa ding buuk khat, buuk thum kong lamsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009006	Amaute lau mahmah uh a, gen ding mel a theih loh man ahi hi.
41009007	Tua laitak in meiilom khatin amaute tuam a, tua meiilom sung panin, “Hihpa in ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na mang un!” ci in aw khat hong gingkhia hi.
41009008	Amaute in a kim a pam envat uh a, Zeisu longal kuamah dang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
41009009	Tu in mualtung pan amaute hong kumsuk uh a, Mihing Tapa misite lak pan a thawhkik khit mateng in hih a muh uh nate kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun thu a pia hi.
41009010	Tua hi a, misite lak panin thokik a cih in bang a cihnopna ahi tam ci in kidong uh a, tua thu amauteng theih bekin a ciamteh uh hi.
41009011	Amaute in, “Banghang in thukhamhilh siate in Elijah hong pai masa ding hi ci uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
41009012	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Elijah hong pai masa in na khempeuh a ngeina bangsakkik ding hi. Tua ahih leh banghang in Mihing Tapa in zong gimna tampi thuak dinga, mite simmawh in om ding hi ci in kigelh ahi hiam?
41009013	Ahi zongin ken kong cih in ah Elijah hong pai khinzo a, ama thu a kigelhsa bangin amaute in a utut un a bawl khinzo uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009014	A nungzuite kiangah Zeisu hong pai ciangin amaute kimkot a om mihonpi a mu hi. Thukhamhilh siate zong amaute tawh thu kisel in na om uh hi.
41009015	Amaute khempeuh in Zeisu a muhvat uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, ama kiangah tai in a hopih uh hi.
41009016	Amah in thukhamhilh siate kiangah, “Amaute tawh bang thu kikum na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41009017	Tua ciangin mihonpi lak pan mi khat in, “Sia aw, ka tapa sungah dawi lutin pau theilo ahih manin nang kiangah kong paipih uh hi.
41009018	Tua dawi in amah a mat ciangin a matna mun peuhpeuh ah leitang a denna hi. Tua ciangin a cilphuan kai in a hagawi a, a kongkawgawp hi. Tua hi a, hih dawi hong hawlkhiatsak dingin na nungzuite kiangah ka nget hangin a hawlkhia zo kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009019	Zeisu in, “Upna a neilo khang mite aw, bang tanvei hong ompih a, bang tanvei hong thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua naupang ka kiangah hong paipih un,” ci in a dawng hi.
41009020	Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu kiangah tua pa hong paipih uh hi. Zeisu a muh ciangin dawi in tua pa thakhat in a kongkawsak hi. Tua khit ciangin lei ah tua pa pukin kipek a, a kam panin cilphuan a kai hi.
41009021	Zeisu in tua pasalno ii pa kiangah, “Ahi cih zawh bang tanvei sawt zo ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. A pa in, “A neutung a kipan ahi hi.
41009022	A sih nadingin tua dawi in tamveipi mei sungah puksak in tui sungah a kiasak hi. Ahi zongin nong hihsak theih a om leh hong hehpih inla hong huh in,” ci in a ngen hi.
41009023	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Na up nak leh a um mite aa dingin na khempeuh a piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
41009024	Tua ciangin pasalno ii a pa kikokhia pah a, “Topa aw, ka um hi. Ka uplohna hong huh in!” ci in khitui luangin a ngen hi.
41009025	Zeisu in mihonpite ama lamah hong tai a muh ciangin tua dawigilo kiangah, “Nang a pau theilo le a bengngong dawi aw, ama sung panin taikhia a, na lutkik nawnloh nadingin thu kong pia hi,” ci in a taii hi.
41009026	Tua ciangin tua dawi kikokhia in, pasalno nakpitak kongkawsak a, tua khit ciangin ama sung panin a paikhia hi. Tua pa misi tawh kibang ahih manin mi tampi in, “Amah sita hi,” a ci uh hi.
41009027	Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama khut lenin a phot ciangin a thoto hi.
41009028	Inn sungah Zeisu a lut khit ciangin nungzuite in, “Kote in banghang in tua dawi hawlkhia zolo ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dongsim uh hi.
41009029	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih bang dawi namte thungetna le antannalo tawh paikhia lo hi,” a ci hi.
41009030	Tua ciangin amaute tua mun pan paikhia in Galilee gam kantan uh a, Zeisu in tua thu kuama theih ding a deih kei hi.
41009031	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite khutah Mihing Tapa kilehhek dinga, kithat ding hi. A kithah zawh ni thum khit ciangin a thokik ding hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
41009032	Ahih hangin amaute in a thugen tel lo uh a, zong a dong ngam tuan kei uh hi.
41009033	Tua ciangin amaute Capernaum khua hong tung uh a, inn sung khatah a om laitak un amah in, “Lamkal ah bang thu kisel na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41009034	Amaute lakah kua lianpen ding hiam cih thu lamkal ah kisel uh ahih manin pau loin a omtek uh hi.
41009035	Tua ciangin amah tusuk in nungzui sawm le nihte sam a, amaute kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh a masa pen ding a ut leh a nunung pen hi dinga, mi khempeuh nasempa zong hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
41009036	Tua khit ciangin naupangno khat samin amaute laizang ah a koih khit ciangin a ang ah tawi a,
41009037	“Hih bang naupangno khat keima mina a sangmi in kei a hong sang ahi hi. Kei a hong sang mi in kei hong sang hilo in kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41009038	Tu in John in, “Sia aw, eite hong zuilo mi khatin nangma min tawh dawite a hawlkhiat ka mu uh hi. Amah in eite hong zui lo ahih manin ka kham uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009039	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Tua pa kham kei un. Keima min tawh nalamdang a bawl mi in kei hong gensia lo pah ding hi.
41009040	Banghang hiam cihleh ei hong langpanlo peuhpeuh ei lam a pang hi pah hi.
41009041	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Khazih mi na hih manun kei mina note tui haikhat a hong suah mi peuhmah in thaman ngah loin a om kei ding hi.
41009042	“Kei hong um hih naupangnote khat a puksak mi peuhmah a ngawngah angawina suang kikhih henla tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama aa dingin a hoih zaw ding hi.
41009043	Na khutin hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khut nih nei in hellɠ le a mit ngeilo meikuang sungah na lut sangin khut tawngsa in nuntakna munah lut leteh nang aa dingin a hoih zaw ding hi.
41009044	“Tua hell sungah, ‘Amaute a ne thante si theilo in, Meikuang zong a mit ngei kei hi.’
41009045	“Na khe in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khe nih nei‑a hellɠ le a mit ngeilo meikuang sungah hong kipaih sangin khetawng sa in nuntakna munah lut leteh nang aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi.
41009046	“Tua hell sungah, ‘A thante si thei loin, Meikuang zong a mit ngei kei hi.’
41009047	“Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in. Mittang nih nei in hellɠ meikuang sungah hong kipaih sangin mittang khat guak tawh Pasian kumpigam sungah lut leteh nang aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi.
41009048	“Tua hell sungah, ‘A thante si thei loin, Meikuang zong a mit ngei kei hi.’
41009049	“Banghang hiam cihleh biakpiakna a kigosa khempeuh ci a kisawh bangin mi khempeuh zong mei tawh kihahsiang ding hi.
41009050	Ci a lim hangin al nawn kei leh bangci alkiksak thei ding na hi uh hiam? Ci bangin al ciat unla, khat le khat kilem in om un,” a ci hi.
41010001	Tua ciangin tua mun panin Zeisu dingkhia a, Jordan gungal Judea gam a tung hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah mihonpite hong kikhawmkik uha a hih ngei bangin amaute thu a hilhkik hi.
41010002	Pharisee pawlte ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Mi khatin a zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci in ze‑et in a dong uh hi.
41010003	Amah in amaute dawngkik a, “Moses in bang thu hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
41010004	Amaute in, “Kimakna laigelh in a zi mak theih nading thu Moses in hong pia hi,” a ci uh hi.
41010005	Zeisu in, “Na lungtang uh khauhlua ahih manin Moses in hih thupiak a gelh ahi hi.
41010006	Ahih hangin lei a piansak cilin, ‘Pasian in pasal le numei a bawl hi.’
41010007	‘Tua ahih manin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga,
41010008	Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi.’ Tua hi a, amaute nih hi nawnlo in sakhat ahi uh hi.
41010009	Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawmsate mihing in khen kei tahen,” ci in a dawng hi.
41010010	A nungzuite in zong inn sungah hih thu mah a dongkik uh hi.
41010011	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “A zi ma a, numei dang tawh a kiteeng peuhmah in a zi a angkawmsan ahi hi.
41010012	Numei in zong a pasal ciahsan a, pasal dang tawh a kiteen leh angkawm mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010013	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu lawn dingin naupangnote ama kiangah hong paipih uh hi. Ahi zongin a nungzuite in tua mite na taii uh hi.
41010014	Zeisu in a muh ciangin lungkim lo a amaute a genah, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak unla kham kei un. Pasian kumpigam in naupangno tawh a kibangte aa ahi hi.
41010015	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, naupangnote san banga Pasian kumpigam a sanglo mi peuhmah tua kumpigam sungah a lutthei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41010016	Tua khit ciangin naupangnote a ang ah tawi in amaute tungah a khut nga in thupha a pia hi.
41010017	Amah lampi ah a pai laitak in mi khat hong tai in ama mai ah a khukdin khit ciangin, “Sia hoih aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah nadingin bang hih ding ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41010018	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Banghang in mihoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian Khat longal a hoih kuamah om lo hi.
41010019	‘Angkawm kei in. Mi that kei in. Guta kei in. Thumaanlo in teci pang kei in. Thumaanlo pi in mi van laksak kei in. Na nu le na pa zahtak in,’ cih thukhamte na thei hi,” a ci hi.
41010020	Tua ciangin tua pa in, “Sia aw, tuate khempeuh ka neutung a kipan ka zuih khitsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010021	Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa en a, it ahih manin, “Na kisap khat om hi. Pai in na neihsa teng zuak inla, mizawngte pia in. Tua hi leh vantung ah sum na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla, singlamteh pua in hong zui in,” a ci hi.
41010022	Tua pa hau mahmah ahih manin hih thu hangin dah a, maikhingsa in a paikhia hi.
41010023	Tua ciangin Zeisu in a kim a pam en a, a nungzuite kiangah, “Mihaute Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding uh haksa mah si in cia!” a ci hi.
41010024	A nungzuite in ama thugen lamdangsa mahmah uh a, ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Tate aw, hauhna suanga Pasian kumpigam sung lut a sawmte aa dingin nak haksat zen si in cia!
41010025	Mihau khat Pasian kumpigam sung a lut ding sangin kala‑oh khat phimbilvang a khum ding baih zaw hi!” a ci hi.
41010026	Amaute in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Tua bang ahih leh kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.
41010027	Zeisu in amaute en in a gen in ah, “Hih thu mihing tawh a pian theihloh hangin Pasian tawh tua bang ahi kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian tawh na khempeuh a piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
41010028	Tua ciangin Peter in, “En in, kote in ka neihsa khempeuh uh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
41010029	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mi khatpeuh in keima hang leh lungdamna thu hangin a inn a lo, a sanggampa a sanggamnu, a nu a pa, a zi a tate, khat peuhpeuh a nusiat leh,
41010030	tuami in tuhun mahin innte, sanggam pasal le sanggam numei, nute, tate le lote a zah 100 a ngah ding hi. Amah in bawlsiatna zong thuak dinga, hong tung ding hunah nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding hi.
41010031	Ahih hangin a masa mi tampite nunung ding uh a, a nunung mi tampite masa ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41010032	Tu in Jerusalem khuapi manawh in paito uh a, amaute mai ah Zeisu a pai hi. Nungzuite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, amah a zui midangte a lau uh hi. Amah in sawm le nihte samkhiakik in ama tunga thupiang dingte a gen inah,
41010033	“En un, Jerusalem khuapi ah i paito ding hi. Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate tungah Mihing Tapa kilehhek dinga, amaute in thah dingin thukhen in Gentile‑te khutah a piakhia ding uh hi.
41010034	Amaute in amah zahko in, sat in, cilphih in that ding uh a, ni thum khit ciangin a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
41010035	Tua ciangin Zebedee tapate James le John hong pai uh a, ama kiangah, “Sia aw, kong nget peuhpeuh uh hong hihsak lecin ka ut uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41010036	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Note aa dingin bang hong hihsak leng ut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41010037	Amaute in ama kiangah, “Na minthanna ah na tut ciangin na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat hong tusak in,” a ci uh hi.
41010038	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Nong nget uh bang thu hiam cih na thei kei uh hi. Ka dawn ding hai dawn zo ding na hi uh hiam, ka kibaptize nading ah kibaptize zo ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41010039	Amaute in, “Ka hih zo ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh a, ka kibaptize nading ah zong na kibaptize takpi ding uh hi.
41010040	Ahih hangin ka taklam le ka veilam a tut ding pen kei hong piak theih hilo hi. A ngah ding a kisehkholsa mite aa ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010041	Tua thu a dang sawmte in a zak uh ciangin James le John‑te tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
41010042	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute ama kiangah sam a, “Gentile‑te sungah a uk dinga a kiseh mite in amaute ukcip uh a, a miliante un zong mipite tungah thuneihna a zang uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
41010043	Ahih hangin note lakah tua bang ding hilo hi. Note lakah milian a suak nuam mi in note nasem ahi ding hi.
41010044	Note lakah a lianpen a suak nuam mi peuhmah mi khempeuh sila ahi ding hi.
41010045	Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa nangawn ama na a kisepsak dinga hong pai hilo hi. Midangte na a sepsak ding leh a nuntakna pia in mitampi a tankhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010046	Tu in amaute Jericho khua hong tung uh hi. Zeisu le a nungzuite mihonpite tawh tonin Jericho khua pan a paikhiat laitak un Timaeus tapa Bartimaeus kici mittaw khat khutdawh ngenin lamgei ah na tu hi.
41010047	Amah in Nazareth khua mi Zeisu hi cih a zak ciangin, “David Tapa, Zeisu aw, kei hong hehpih in!” ci in a kiko hi.
41010048	Tua ciangin mi tampite in a daih nadingin a kham uh hangin amah kinak ko semsem a, “David Tapa aw, kei hong hehpih in!” a ci hi.
41010049	Tua ciangin Zeisu dinkhawl a, “Amah sam un,” ci in thu a pia hi. Amaute in mittawpa kiangah, “Lungnuam inla dingto in. Amah in nang hong sam hi,” a ci uh hi.
41010050	Mittawpa in a puan lawnkhia in dingto a, Zeisu kiangah a pai hi.
41010051	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Nang aa dingin bang hong hihsak leng ut na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Mittawpa in, “Rabboni aw, khua muthei leng ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
41010052	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ciah in, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Amah in thakhat in khuamu pah a, lamdung ah Zeisu a zui hi.
41011001	Amaute Jerusalem khuapi tawh kinai Tanluan muala om Bethphage khua le Bethany khua hong tun uh ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite nih sawl a,
41011002	“Note mai‑a om khua ah va pai un. Khuasung na lut phetun kuama tuanngei nai lohna laano khat kikhih a om na mu ding uh hi. A khau sut unla hong kai un.
41011003	Mi khatpeuh in, ‘Banghang in sut na hi uh hiam?’ hong cih leh, ‘Topa in zang nuam hi,’ ci le uh cin, amah in hong phal pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
41011004	Amaute pai uh a, kongzing a inn pualam kongkhak gei ah a kikhih laano mu in a sut uh hi.
41011005	Tualai a a ding mi pawlkhat in, “Banghang in tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41011006	Amaute in Zeisu thupiakna bangin a gen uh ciangin tua mite in a paisak uh hi.
41011007	Tua ciangin amaute in tua laano Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uh a, a tungah a puante uh a phah khit uh ciangin Zeisu a tuang hi.
41011008	Mi tampite in lampi ah a puante uh phah a, a dangte in nisuh hiangte khiak in a phah uh hi.
41011009	Ama mai‑a paite le a nung a zui mite kiko in a gen inah, “Hosannaɠ! Topa min tawh hong paipa in, Thupha ngah tahen!
41011010	Topa minin a hong tung ding, I pa David kumpigam in thupha ngah tahen! A sangbel munah Hosannaɠ!” a ci uh hi.
41011011	Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lutin na khempeuh a en kawikawi hi. Ni hong tumkuanta ahih manin sawm le nihte tawh Bethany khua ah a ciahkik uh hi.
41011012	A zingciang in amaute Bethany khua pan paikhia uh a, Zeisu a gil a kial hi.
41011013	Gamlapi a om a teh a nim theikung khat a muh ciangin a gah hiam cih en dingin a va zuan hi. Theikung kianga tun ciangin thei min hun hilo ahih manin a teh longal bangmah mu lo hi.
41011014	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Tu‑a kipan kuamah in na gah ne nawn kei tahen,” a ci hi. Tua bang a cih a nungzuite in a za uh hi.
41011015	Amaute Jerusalem khuapi hong tun uh ciangin biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu a lut hi. Biakinnpi huang sungah vanlei vanzuak a om mite hawlkhia a, sumkhekteɠ sabuaite le vakhu zuakte tutphahte a lumletsak hi.
41011016	Biakinnpi huang sungah kuamah in vanzuak ding khat peuhpeuh a puak loh nadingin zong a kham hi.
41011017	Tua khit ciangin hih bangin amaute thu hilh a, “ ‘Ka inn in minamte khempeuh thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin note in ‘gutate phualpi,’ na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.
41011018	Thukhamhilh siate le siampi liante in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amah thah theih nading lampi a zong uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in ama thuhilhna lamdangsa mahmah uh ahih manin amaute in amah kihta uh hi.
41011019	Nitak lam ciangin khuapi sung pan Zeisu a paikhia hi.
41011020	A zingciang in amaute in theikung omna gei hong tung uh a, tua theikung a zung a kipan keugawcip in a om a mu uh hi.
41011021	Peter in Zeisu kammal phawkkik a, “Rabbi aw, en dih ve! Na samsiat theikung a keugaw hi,” a ci hi.
41011022	Zeisu in dawngkik in amaute kiangah, “Pasian um un.
41011023	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mi khatpeuh in hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Kikhinkhia inla tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci in thupia in, ka cih bangin piang ding hi ci in lunghiang loin a up takpi leh a cih bangin a piang ding hi.
41011024	Tua ahih manin ken kong cih in ah thu na nget uh ciangin ka nget khempeuh ka ngah hi ci a, na up uh leh na ngah ding uh hi.
41011025	Thu na nget uh ciangin midang khat peuhpeuh tungah lungkim lohna na neih uh leh maisak masa un. Tua hi leh vantung a om na Pa un note mawhna zong hong maisak ding hi.
41011026	Ahih hangin na maisak kei uh leh vantung a om na Pa un note mawhna zong hong maisak lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
41011027	Tua ciangin amaute Jerusalem khuapi ah hong paikik uh hi. Biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu a vak kawikawi laitak in siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le makaite ama kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
41011028	Amaute in ama kiangah, “Bang thuneihna tawh hih nate sem na hi hiam? Hih nate na sep nadingin thuneihna kua in hong pia ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
41011029	Zeisu in amaute dawng a, “Ken zong thu khat kong dong ding hi. Tua ciangin hong dawng un. Nong dawn theih uh leh bang thuneihna tawh hih nate sem ka hi hiam cih kong gen ding hi.
41011030	John tuiphumna thu, vantung pana hong pai ahi hiam ahih keileh mihing tung pana hong pai ahi hiam? Hong dawng dih un,” a ci hi.
41011031	Tua ciangin amaute kikum uh a, “ ‘Vantung pana hong pai hi,’ ci lehang, ‘Banghang in amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
41011032	‘Mihing tung pana hong pai hi,’ ci lehang lah mite khempeuh in John pen kamsang taktak a a san uh ahih manin mite i kihta hi,” a kici uh hi.
41011033	Tua ahih manin, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi. Zeisu in, “Ken zong bang thuneihna tawh hih nate sem ka hi hiam cih kong gen kei ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41012001	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna tawh thugen kipan a, “Mi khatin lenggah lo khat bawl a, suang tawh dai um in lenggah cil nading mun le tausang khat zong a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin lokhawh thalawhte khosak in khual gamlapi khatah a zinsan hi.
41012002	Lenggah lak hun ciangin lokhawh thalawhte kiangah a gah pawlkhat la dingin a nasemte khat a paisak hi.
41012003	Amaute in tua pa manin a vuak khit uh ciangin a guak ciahsak uh hi.
41012004	Tua ciangin loneipa in a dang nasem khat a sawlkik hi. Amaute in tua pa suang tawh dengin a lutang satliam uh a, a zumhuaipi in bawl in a ciahsak uh hi.
41012005	Loneipa in nasem dang khat sawlkik leuleu a, amaute in tua pa a that uh hi. Nasem dang tampi sawlbeh a, tuate zong pawlkhat vua in, pawlkhat a that uh hi.
41012006	“Tu in loneipa in a sawl theih ding a it mahmah a tapa khat bek omlai ahih manin amah in, ‘Ka tapa zahtak kha ding uh hi,’ ci in a tawpna ah a tapa a paisak hi.
41012007	“Ahih hangin tua lokhawh thalawhte in, ‘Hihpa a innluah ding pa ahi hi. Hong pai un, amah that ni. Tua hi leh ama luah ding teng eite aa hong suak ding hi,’ ci in a kikum uh hi.
41012008	“Tua hi a, tua pa manin a thah khit uh ciangin lenggah lo pua lamah a luang a pai uh hi.
41012009	“Tua ahih ciangin lenggah lo neipa in amaute bang a cih ding hiam? Amah hong pai in lokhawh thalawhte that dinga, lenggah lo zong midangte a pia ding hi.
41012010	Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhna ah, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat uh suang, Innkiusuang bulpi a suak hi.
41012011	Hih in Topa sep hi a, Eite muhna ah lamdang hi,’ a kici thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41012012	Amaute a kawkna in hih thugentehna a genlam thei uh ahih manin amah a matsawm uh hi. Ahih hangin mipite lau uh ahih manin amah nusia in a paikhiamang uh hi.
41012013	Tua khit ciangin ama kammal tawh amah mawhmat dingin Pharisee pawlte le Herod pawlte sung panin mi pawlkhat Zeisu kiangah a sawl uh hi.
41012014	Tua mite Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang na thuman a, maitang zahtak tuam zong na neih loh banah kuamah dawm loin Pasian thu maantak in na hilh hi cih kong thei uh hi. Caesar kumpipa tungah mimal siah piak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam kituak lo hiam?
41012015	Pia ding ka hi uh hiam pia lo ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in amaute a kineihkhem ahihlam uh thei ahih manin, “Banghang in hong ze‑et na hi uh hiam, denariusɠ tang khat hong la unla hong lak dih un,” a ci hi.
41012016	Tua ciangin amaute in denariusɠ tang khat hong paipih uh hi. Amah in, “Hih in kua lim le kua min ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Caesar lim le min ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
41012017	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Caesar neihsate Caesar pia unla Pasian neihsate Pasian pia un,” a cih ciangin amaute in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
41012018	Tua khit ciangin misite thokik lo hi a ci Sadducee‑te pawlkhat ama kiangah hong pai in thu dong uh a,
41012019	“Sia aw, mi khatin ta nei loin a zi a sihsan leh a naupa in a zi luah henla, a upa tangin suan le khak tawi hen ci in Moses in a na gelh hi.
41012020	Tu in unau pasal sagih a om uh hi. A upapen in zi nei a, suan le khak nei loin amah a si hi.
41012021	A nihnapa in tua nu teenpih a, suan le khak neilo mahin a si hi. A thumna pa zong tua bangmah ahi hi.
41012022	A sagih un tua nu teenpih uh a, suan le khak neilo vive in a si uh hi. A nunung pen in tua numei zong a si hi.
41012023	Tua ahih teh thawhkik ni ciangin hong thokik le uh tua numei kuapen zi in om ding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh a sagih un tua numei a teenpih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41012024	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na sangkhial uh hi.
41012025	Misite lak pan a thawhkik uh ciangin kuamah kipi kiteeng nawnlo ding uh a, vana om vantungmite a bang ding uh hi.
41012026	Ahi zongin misite thawhkikna tawh kisai in Pasian in Moses kiangah, ‘Keimah in Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci in sawlbawk kuang sung panin a genna thu Moses laibu sungah sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
41012027	“Pasian in misite Pasian hilo in a nungta mite Pasian ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na theikhial mahmah uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41012028	Tua khit ciangin thukhamhilh siate khat hong pai a, a thu kidotte uh hong za hi. Zeisu in thu kidongte kituak taka a dawnkik lianlian theih lam a zak ciangin Zeisu kiangah, “Thupiak teng lakah a lianpen bang ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41012029	Zeisu in, “Thupiak teng lakah a lianpen in, ‘Israelte aw, ngai un. Topa i Pasian in, Topa khat bek ahi hi.
41012030	Na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh le na hatna khempeuh tawh Topa na Pasian it in.’ Hih in a lianpen thupiak ahi hi.
41012031	A nihna in a masa bang hi a, ‘Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,’ cih thupiak ahi hi. Hih thupiakte sangin a lianzaw thupiak a om kei hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41012032	Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siapa in, “Maan mahmah hi, Sia aw, thuman thutak na gen hi. Pasian khat bek om a, amah longal Pasian dang om lo hi.
41012033	Mi khatin a lungsim khempeuh, a theihna khempeuh, a nuntakna khempeuh le a hatna khempeuh tawh Pasian it a, amah a ki‑it bangin a vengpa zong a it ding ahi hi. Hih in haltum biakpiakna le gangawh biakpiakna khempeuh sangin a thupi zaw hi,” ci in a gen hi.
41012034	Tua pa in pilna tawh a dawn lam Zeisu in a theih ciangin ama kiangah, “Pasian kumpigam tawh na kigamla kei hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun a kipan kuamah in thu a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
41012035	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah thu a hilh laitak in, “Banghang in thukhamhilh siate in, Khazih in David Tapa hi ci thei uh ahi hiam?
41012036	David in Kha Siangtho theihsakna tawh a genna ah, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah, “Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
41012037	“Tua hi a, David in amah Topa ci ahih leh bangci bangin ama tapa hi thei zel ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Mi honpite in lungdamtak in ama thugen a ngai uh hi.
41012038	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Thukhamhilh siate thuhilhna kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhsa in vak kawikawi ding le sumbuuk khawng a zahtakna tawh hopih ding a ut uh hi.
41012039	Kikhopna innte ah tutna thupi tata le pawi annekna munah munhoih tata a deih uh hi.
41012040	Amaute in meigongte neihsa teng netum uh a, kineihtawmna tawh sawt pipi thu a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite in a nasia zaw mawhsakna a thuak ding uh hi,” ci in thu a hilh hi.
41012041	Tu in sumpi khiatna kuang mai ah Zeisu tu in mite sumpi khiat a mu hi. Mihaute in sum tampipi a khia uh hi.
41012042	Tua ciangin a zawng meigongnu khat hong pai in dangka tang khat tawh kikim sumnenɠ tang nih a khia hi.
41012043	Zeisu in a nungzuite sam a, amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, sumpi khiatna kuang sunga sumkhia khempeuh lakah hih a zawng meigongnu in tam a khia pen hi.
41012044	Banghang hiam cihleh midangte in tampi a neih lak panin a khiat uh hi a, meigongnu ahih leh zawng napi in a kivak nading nangawn sit loin a neih khempeuh a khia hi,” a ci hi.
41013001	Tua ciangin biakinnpi huang sung pan Zeisu a paikhiat laitak in a nungzuite khat in, “Sia aw, en dih in hih suangte bangzahtak in gol a, hih innte bangzahtak in thupi ahi hiam!” a ci hi.
41013002	Zeisu in, “Hih a lian mahmah innte mu hilo na hi uh hiam? Hih suangte khat tungah khat nangawn kiciang nawnlo in a kiphelkhia mang ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41013003	Tua khit ciangin biakinnpi lam nga in Tanluan mualtung ah Zeisu a tu hi. Tua laitak in Peter, James, John le Andrew‑te in a tuam in thu a dong uh hi.
41013004	Amaute in, “Hih thute cik ciangin hong piang ding ahi hiam? Hih thu khempeuh a hong pian ding ciangin theihsakna lim bangbang a hong piang ding hiam? Hong hilh in,” a ci uh hi.
41013005	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute dawngin thu a gen in ah, “Kuamah in note hong khem zawhloh nadingin kikem un.
41013006	Mi tampi in, ‘Keimah in Khazih ka hi hi,’ ci in keima minin hong pai ding uh a, mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
41013007	Gal kidona thu le gal hong piang ding hi cih kamdawnte na zak uh hangin patau kei un. Tua bang thute a piang ding mah hi a, ahih hangin beina a tung nai kei ding hi.
41013008	Banghang hiam cihleh minam khat le minam khat, kumpigam khat le kumpigam khat hong kido ding uh hi. Mun tuamtuam ah zin hong ling dinga, kialpi le buainate a hong tung ding hi. Tuate in nausuah natna tawh a kibang gimna kipatna ahi hi.
41013009	“Tua ahih manin na kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in thukhente tungah note hong pia ding uh a, kikhopna innte ah a hong sat ding uh hi. Keima hangin mangpite le kumpite mai ah hong puak ding uh a, tua in amaute tungah teci na pan theih nading uh ahi hi.
41013010	Minam khempeuh tungah lungdamna thu a kitangko masa ding hi.
41013011	Amaute in note hong manin zumah hong puak uh ciangin bang ka gen ding hiam ci in lunghimawh masa kei unla bangmah zong ngaihsun khol kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a gen ding note hilo in Kha Siangtho ahih manin a hun liana hong piak bangbang in na gen un.
41013012	“Tua ciangin unau khat le khat thah dingin a kilehhek ding uh hi. Pa in a ta lehhek dinga, tate in a nu le a pa langpan in thah a sawm ding uh hi.
41013013	Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahih hangin a tawp donga a kip mi in hotkhiatna a ngah ding hi.
41013014	“Lai Siangtho a sim mi in thei tahen. Kamsangpa Daniel in a gensa ahi gam sung a hawmsuaksak, a lipkhaphuai na, ama om nading mun hilopi a, a hong ding na muh uh ciangin Judea gama om mite mualtung ah tai uh hen.
41013015	Innkhum zanga om mi in na khatpeuh la dingin inn sungah kumsuk in lut nawn kei hen.
41013016	Lokuante zong puan la dingin ciahkik nawn kei uh hen.
41013017	Tua hun laitak a naupaai numeite le nawine lai naungek a nei nupite a genthei mahmah ding uh hi!
41013018	Na tai hun uh phalbi laitak ahih khakloh nadingin thungen un.
41013019	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in na khempeuh a piansak cil a kipan tuni ciangdong a piang ngei nailo, tunung ciangin zong a piang ngei nawnlo ding gimna, tua hun ciangin a piang ding hi.
41013020	Topa in tua hun a tomsak kei leh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahi zongin a teelsa mite hangin tua hun a tomsak ding hi.
41013021	Tua hun ciangin mi khatpeuh in, ‘En un, hihlai ah Khazih om hi! En un, hualai ah Khazih om hi!’ a hong cih leh um kei un.
41013022	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih maanlote le kamsangzuaute hong piang dinga, a teelsate nangawn a khem zawh uh leh a khem dingin limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite a lak ding uh hi.
41013023	Tua ahih ciangin kidawm un. En un, hih thute khempeuh a pianma in kong gen khinzo hi.
41013024	“Tua gimna hun khit ciangin, ‘Ni hong mial dinga, Kha zong a tang nawn kei ding hi.
41013025	Vantung a aksite hong kia dinga, Vantung nate kiling ding hi.’
41013026	“Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa in vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh meii lakah a hong pai amaute in a mu ding uh hi.
41013027	Tua ciangin amah in a vantungmite sawl dinga, lei kiuli pan leimong khat pan vanmong khat donga om a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
41013028	“Tu in theikung thugentehna panin hih thu na sin un. Theikung a hiang meng a, a teh a no ciangin khuakhal hun hong naita hi ci in na thei uh hi.
41013029	Tuamah bangin note in zong hih thute hong piang na muh uh ciangin tua hun kongbiang dongah hong tungta hi ci in na thei un.
41013030	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite a beima teitei in hih thu khempeuh a hong piang ding hi.
41013031	Van le lei a mangthang ding hi. Ahih hangin ka thute a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.
41013032	“Ahih hangin tua ni le tua hun kuamah in a thei kei hi. Vana om vantungmite nangawn in thei loin Tapa in zong thei lo hi. Ahi hangin Pa khat bekin a thei hi.
41013033	A hun ding thei lo na hih manun kikem un. Pilvang unla thungen un.
41013034	Hih thu in khual gamlapi a a zinkhia ding mipa tawh kibang hi. Amah in a inn nusia in a nasemte tungah a innvaiteng ap a, a nasep ding ciat uh zong a pia hi. Kong cingpa zong hoihtak a a cing dingin thu a pia hi.
41013035	“Tua ahih ciangin inn neipa in nitak ahi a, zankim laitak ahi a, aak masa khuan le zingsang phalvak ahi zongin bang hunin hong tung ding cih thei lo na hih manun kiging den un.
41013036	Tua hi kei leh amah thakhat in hong tung dinga, na ihmut laitak uh hong tuak ding hi.
41013037	Note kiangah kiging den un kong cih mah bangin mi khempeuh tungah zong ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
41014001	Ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi le Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawikham hun a tung hi. Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in zuauthu tawh Zeisu mana a thah theih nadingun lampi a zong uh hi.
41014002	Ahih hangin amaute in, “Mihonpi hong so kha ding ahih manin pawikham sungin hih kei ni,” a kici uh hi.
41014003	Bethany khua‑a miphak ngeipa ahi Simon inn sungah Zeisu an ne‑a a tut laitak in ama kiangah numei khat a hong pai hi. Tua nu in a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangkang thawl khat hong paipih in a sukkhap khit ciangin Zeisu luzang ah a buak hi.
41014004	Tualai a om mi pawlkhatte lungkim lo uh a, “Banghang in hih numei in sathau namtui tuaci thangbawl ahi hiam?
41014005	Denariusɠ 300 val bangin zuak in mizawngte piakhuai hi,” ci in nakpi in a mawhsak uh hi.
41014006	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Tua ci omsak lel un. Banghang in amah nawngkaisak na hi uh hiam? Amah in keima tungah na hoih khat a hong bawl ahi hi.
41014007	Banghang hiam cihleh mizawngte note tawh om den a, na ut hunhun un amaute tungah thupha na bawlthei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh note tawh a omkhawm den ding ka hi kei hi.
41014008	Amah in ahih theih zahin a hih zo hi. A kivui ding ka pumpi sathau nuhin a hong pai ahi hi.
41014009	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, lungdamna thu a kitangkona hih leitung mun khempeuh ah hih numei thu a kiphawk nadingin kei tunga a hong bawlna a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014010	Tua ciangin sawm le nihte laka khat, Judas Iscariot in Zeisu lehhek dingin siampi liante kiangah a pai hi.
41014011	Siampi liante in tua thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam uha sum piak dingin a kamciam uh hi. Judah in Zeisu a lehhek theih nading hunhoih a ngak hi.
41014012	Tua ciangin Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi kipat ni, Paisan tuuno a kigawh ni in a nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, “Paisan Pawi an na nek nadingin koilai munah hong bawlkholhsak le ung na ut hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
41014013	Amah in a nungzuite nih sawl a, “Khua sungah pai le uh teh tuibel a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Amah zui un.
41014014	Ama lutna inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nek nading na zintunna inndei koilai ahi hiam?” ci un,’ a ci hi.
41014015	Tua ciangin amah in inndei tungnung ah a za mahmah a kipuah a kibawlkholsa inndei khat hong lak ding hi. Tua sungah na bawlkhol un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
41014016	Tua ciangin a nungzuite paikhia uh a, khua sungah lutin Zeisu gensa mah bangin mu uh a, Paisan Pawi an a bawlkhol uh hi.
41014017	Nitak ciangin sawm le nihte tawh amah a hong pai hi.
41014018	Tu in amaute tusuk in an a nek laitak un Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, keimah tawh an a nekhawm note lakah khatin nong lehhek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41014019	A nungzuite khatem mahmah uha ama kiangah, “Kei ka hi hiam?” ci in khat khit khat a banban in a dong uh hi. Tua ciangin a dang khat in, “Kei ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
41014020	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Sawm le nihte lak panin kei tawh kuang sungah an a sawkkhawm mipa ahi hi.
41014021	Mihing Tapa in ama thu Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhsa bangin a piang ding mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi! Tua pa mihing in a piang vetlo hi leh ama aa dingin a hoih zaw ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41014022	Amaute in an a nek laitak un Zeisu in anlum la a, lungdamna a koh khit ciangin balkham in amaute a pia hi. Amah in, “La unla ne un. Hih in ka pumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41014023	Tua khit ciangin hai la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin amaute a pia hi. Amaute khempeuh in tua hai panin a dawn uh hi.
41014024	Tua khit ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Hih in mi tampi aa dingin a luangkhia kiciamna thak ka sisan ahi hi.
41014025	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Pasian kumpigam sungah lenggahzu a thak ka dawn ni mateng in ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014026	Amaute in biakna la khat a sak khit uh ciangin Tanluan mual zuanin a pai uh hi.
41014027	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Tuucingpa ka satliam dinga, Tuute a kithehthang ding uh hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin, tu zan ciangin na vekpi un keima hangin na puk ding uh hi.
41014028	“Ahih hangin ka thawhkik khit ciangin Galilee gamah note ma in ka na paikhol ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014029	Peter in, “Mi khempeuh a puk zongin kei ka puk kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014030	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuzan aak nihvei a khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014031	Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm nading ahi zongin kong nial peuhmah kei ding hi,” ci in a khauhzaw in a gen hi. A dangteng in zong tuamah bangin a ci ciat uh hi.
41014032	Tua ciangin Gethsemane a kici mun khat a tung uh hi. Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Ka thunget kalin hihlai ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
41014033	Amah in Peter, James le John‑te tonpih a, tua lai ah a lungkham le a lungzin mahmah hun hong kipan hi.
41014034	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “A si zo ding zah dongin ka lung a gim mahmah hi. Hih lai ah om unla hong ngak un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
41014035	Amah a gamla zawdeuh ah pai a, lei ah bokin tua hun tawh a kipelh theih leh a kipelh nadingin thu a ngen hi.
41014036	Amah in, “Abbaɠ, Pa aw, nang aa dingin na khempeuh piangthei ahih manin hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hilo in nangma deihna bang hi zaw tahen,” a ci hi.
41014037	Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiang a tun ciangin amaute ihmu in a om a mu hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Simon aw, ihmu na hi hiam? Nai khat sung nangawn hong ngak zolo na hi hiam?
41014038	Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun thungen in kiging un. Lungsim a ut mahmah hangin pumpi a thanem hi,” a ci hi.
41014039	Amah va paikhiakik in a nget ngeiteng mah a va ngen hi.
41014040	Hong kilehkik ciangin hak zo mahmah lo uh ahih manin ihmukik in a om uh a mu hi. Amaute in amah a dawn nading mel a thei kei uh hi.
41014041	A thumveina hong pai ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “lhmumu lai in, tawlnga lailai ding na hi uh hiam? Pha zo hi. A hun hong tungta hi. En un, Mihing Tapa mawhneite khut sungah hong kilehhek ding hun hong tungzo hi.
41014042	Tho un. Pai ni. En un, kei hong lehhekpa hong tungta hi,” a ci hi.
41014043	Amah tua banga a paupau laitak in sawm le nihte lakah khat ahi Judas le namsau le molhtum a tawi mihonpi thakhat in hong suak uh hi. Tua mite pen siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le makaite sawl ahi uh hi.
41014044	Tu in a lehhekpa in, “Ka nap mipa amah ahi hi. Man unla lencip in paikhiatpih un,” ci in amaute theihsakna limkhat a piaksa ahi hi.
41014045	Amah a hong tun phetin Zeisu kiang naih a, “Rabbi, Rabbi,” ci in a nam hi.
41014046	Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu manin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
41014047	Ama kianga a ding mi khatin a namsau dokin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a bil a satkhia hi.
41014048	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Guta buluh khat man ding bangin namsau le molhtumte tawi in kei hong man dingin hong kuan na hi uh hiam?
41014049	Nisim in biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilhin note tawh ka om a, nong man kei uh hi. Ahih hangin Lai Siangtho a tangtun loh phamawh hi,” a ci hi.
41014050	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in amah nusia in a taikek uh hi.
41014051	Tu in dialkang khat bek a silh tangvalno khatin Zeisu nung a zui hi. Mihon laka tangval dangte in tua pa a mat uh ciangin,
41014052	tua pa in a dialkang nusia in a guaktang in a taikhia hi.
41014053	Amaute in Siampi Ukpa kiangah Zeisu a paipih uh hi. Tua Siampi Ukpa kiangah siampi liante, makaite le thukhamhilh siate khempeuh a na kikaikhawm uh hi.
41014054	Peter in Siampi Ukpa inntual dongin Zeisu galzuih a, tua munah biakinn cingte tawh tukhawm in mei a awi hi.
41014055	Tu in siampi liante le thukhenteɠ khempeuh in Zeisu thah theih nading teci a zon uh hangin khat beek a mu zo kei uh hi.
41014056	Banghang hiam cihleh mi tampi in Zeisu langah zuau teci a pan uh hangin a teci pannate uh khat le khat a kituak kei hi.
41014057	Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat dingto in ama langah zuau teci a pang uh hi.
41014058	Amaute in, “Hihpa in, ‘Khut tawh kibawl hih biakinnpi ka susia dinga, khut tawh kibawllo a dang biakinnpi khat ni thum sungin ka lamkik ding hi,’ a cih ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41014059	Ahih hangin tua thu nangawn ah amaute teci panna a kituak kei hi.
41014060	Tua ciangin amaute laizang ah Siampi Ukpa dingto in Zeisu kiangah, “Kam khat beek dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Na langa hih mite teci panna bang thu ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41014061	Ahih hangin Zeisu in bangmah dawng loin a sip dide hi. Siampi Ukpa in, “Phatna a Ngahpa Tapa, Khazih na hi hiam?” ci in a dongkik hi.
41014062	Zeisu in, “Ka hi hi. Mihing Tapa in Vangliatna taklam ah tu in vana meiipi tungah hong pai na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41014063	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa in a puan balkek a, “Teci dang bang kisam nawn i hi hiam?
41014064	Pasian tunga a pausiatna na za zo uh hi. Bangci ngaihsut na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute khempeuh in, “Amah a si dingin kilawm hi,” ci in a mawhsak uh hi.
41014065	Tua ciangin pawlkhat in amah cil a phih uh hi. A mai tunsak in tum uh a, “Kamsanna tawh hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Biakinn cingte in zong a beng uh hi.
41014066	Inntual ah Peter a om laitak in Siampi Ukpa nasem numei khat ama kiangah a hong pai hi.
41014067	Tua nu in mei‑awi a om Peter a muh ciangin en a, “Nang zong Nazareth khua mi Zeisu pawl na hi hi,” a ci hi.
41014068	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Na gen thu, ka thei kei a, zong ka tel kei hi,” ci in a nial hi. Tua ciangin amah inn pualam zuanin paikhia a, aak a khuang hi.
41014069	Tua ciangin tua nasem numei in amah va mukik a, a kianga a ding mite kiangah, “Hih mipa in amaute lakah khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41014070	Tua ciangin Peter in a nialkik hi. Tua zawh a sawtlo in ama kianga a ding mite in, “Nangin amaute lakah khat na hi takpi hi. Galilee mi na hih lam na awkaih tawh kithei hi,” a cikik uh hi.
41014071	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Na genpa uh ka thei kei hi,” ci in amah le amah kihamsiat in a kiciam hi.
41014072	Tua ciangin a nihveina aak a khuang hi. Zeisu in, “Aak nihvei a khuanma in thumvei na hong nial ding hi,” ci a, a gen thu Peter in phawkkik ahih manin a kapkhia hi.
41015001	Zingsang tungin siampi liante in makaite, thukhamhilh siate le thukhenteɠ khempeuh tawh thakhat in thu kikupna khat a nei uh hi. Amaute in Zeisu henin, paikhiatpih uha Pilate khutah a pia uh hi.
41015002	Tua ciangin Pilate mangpa in, “Nang Judah mite Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Zeisu in, “Na cih bangin ka hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
41015003	Siampi liante in thu tampi tawh a mawhmat uh hangin Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
41015004	Tua ciangin Pilate mangpa in, “Na langah hihzah taka hong kimawhmatna thu za khin na hih ciangin kam khat beek dawng lo ding na hi hiam?” ci in a dongkik hi.
41015005	Ahih hangin Zeisu in a dawn loh ciangin Pilate in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
41015006	Tu in pawi hun ciangin Pilate in thongkiate lak pan in amaute nget penpen mi khat a khahsak zel pen ngeina khat ahi hi.
41015007	Tua laitak in Barabbas a kici mi khat, kumpi a langpanpih a lawmte tawh thong sungah kol kibulh in a om hi. Amaute in kumpi langpang in mi a thatte ahi uh hi.
41015008	Tua ciangin mihonpite nakpitak kiko in Pilate in ahih ngei banga mi khat a khahsak nadingin a ngen uh hi.
41015009	Ahih hangin Pilate in, “Judah mite Kumpipa hong khah leng na ut uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
41015010	Banghang hiam cihleh siampi liante in Zeisu a hazat manun ama kiangah a piakkhiat uh ahihlam Pilate in a thei gige hi.
41015011	Ahih hangin siampi liante in mihonpite hansuah uh a, Pilate in Barabbas a khah zawk nading a ngensak uh hi.
41015012	Tua ciangin Pilate in, “Tua ahih leh, Judah mite Kumpipa hi na cihpa uh bang kong cihsak ding deih na hi uh hiam?” a cikik hi.
41015013	Amaute in, “Amah khailum in!” ci in a kikokik uh hi.
41015014	Tua ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in khailum ding ka hi hiam? Amah in bang thusia bawl ahi hiam?” ci in a gen hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, “Amah khailum in!” ci in a kiko semsem uh hi.
41015015	Tua hi a, Pilate in mihonpi a lungkimsak nadingin Barabbas khahsak a, Zeisu ahih leh a satsak khit ciangin khailup dingin a pia hi.
41015016	Tua ciangin galkapte in mangpipa inn ah Zeisu paipih uha galkaphonɠ khempeuh zong a kaikhawm uh hi.
41015017	Amaute in puan dupsan khat silhsak uha linglukhu a khusak uh hi.
41015018	Tua khit ciangin, “Dam maw, Judah mite Kumpipa!” ci in a hopih uh hi.
41015019	Pumpeng tawh a lutang satin cilphih uh a, khukdin in a bia uh hi.
41015020	A zahko khit uh ciangin puan dupsan pen suahkhiatsak in ama puan silhsakkik uh a, khailup dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
41015021	Tua laitak in Alexander le Rufus‑te pa Cyrene gam mi Simon khualzin hong ciah tawh a kituak uh hi. Amaute in zawhthawh thu tawh amah manin Zeisu singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
41015022	Lutangguh Mun cih khiatna nei, Golgotha kici mun ah amah a paipih uh hi.
41015023	Tua ciangin paknamtui khaɠ tawh kihel lenggahzu dawn dingin a piak uh hangin Zeisu in a dawn kei hi.
41015024	Amaute in Zeisu a khai khit uh ciangin a puante hawm uh a, amau tan ding ciat a theih nadingun lai‑ai a san uh hi.
41015025	Tu in nai thum sat a, amaute in amah a khailum uh hi.
41015026	A lu tung sanah, “JUDAH MITE KUMPIPA,” ci in mawhsakna lai khat a suang uh hi.
41015027	Guta nih zong a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat, amah tawh a khaikhawm uh hi.
41015028	Hih bangin, Lai Siangtho sunga kigelh ahi, “Thukham palsat mite tawh amah kisimkhawm hi,” a cihna thu a tangtung hi.
41015029	Tua mun a tawn kha mite in, “Hei! Biakinnpi susia a ni thum sungin a lamkik ding pa aw,
41015030	nangmah kihonkhia inla, singlamteh tung pan hong kumkhia in!” ci in a lu uh peisan in a zahko uh hi.
41015031	Tuamah bangin siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in zong, “Hihpa in midangte hon zo napi amah le amah a kihon zo kei hi.
41015032	I mit mahmah tawh mu a, i up theih nadingin Israel Kumpipa Khazih singlamteh tung panin tu in hong kumkhia hen,” ci in a zahko uh hi. Amah tawh a kikhaikhawm mite in zong a zahko uh hi.
41015033	Tu in nai guk a kipan nai kua ciangdong leitung bup ah khua a mial hi.
41015034	Nai kua a sat laitak in Zeisu in, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani?” ci in nakpi in a kiko hi. A khiatna in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, banghang in hong taisan na hi hiam?” a cihna ahi hi.
41015035	A gei‑a a ding mite pawlkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “En un, amah in Elijah a sam ahi hi!” a ci uh hi.
41015036	Tua ciangin mi khat va tai a, tuihupna khat la in lenggahtui thuk a dimtak in a diah khit ciangin, pumpeng dawn ah suangin a dawn dingin tah a, “Hi ci omsak tadih un. Amah lakhia dingin Elijah hong pai hiam, en dih ni,” a ci hi.
41015037	Tua ciangin Zeisu nakpitak kiko in a huu tawpna a sangkhia hi.
41015038	Tua laitak in biakinnpi sunga kideina puan kikek a, a lu panin a taw dong phelnih a suak hi.
41015039	Zeisu mai ngata ding galkap 100 ukpa in amah tua bangin kiko a a huu tawpna a sankhiat a muh ciangin, “Hihpa in Pasian Tapa taktak ahi hi!” a ci hi.
41015040	Numei pawlkhat in gamlapi pan galet uh a, tua numeite lakah Magdala khua mi Mary, James neuzaw le Joses‑te nu Mary le Salome‑te zong a kihel uh hi.
41015041	Amaute in Galilee gamah Zeisu a omlai in amah zui in a panpihte ahi uh hi. Jerusalem khuapi dong amah a zui numei dang tampi zong a om uh hi.
41015042	Tu in nitak hong hi a, tua ni in Sabbath a tunma Kigin Niɠ ahi hi.
41015043	Tua ciangin Arimathea khua mi Joseph in Pilate kiangah hangtak in va pai a, Zeisu luang a va ngen hi. Amah pen upa vaihawmte lakah mi thupi khat hi a, Pasian kumpigam a lamen mi khat zong ahi hi.
41015044	Zeisu si khin ahihlam Pilate in a zak ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, galkap 100 ukpa samin a sihzawh bangtan sawtzo hiam ci in a dong hi.
41015045	Zeisu si khin hi cih thu Pilate in galkap 100 ukpa kiang pan a theihtel ciangin Zeisu luang Joseph a pia hi.
41015046	Tua ciangin Joseph in Zeisu luang lakhia a, a hoih mahmah puanpak khat lei in a tun khit ciangin suang kikhuak han sung khatah sial a, suangtumpi khat khuk in hankong a khak hi.
41015047	Magdala khua mi Mary le Joses nu Mary‑te in a luang kisialna mun a en uh hi.
41016001	Tu in Sabbath ni hong bei a, Magdala khua mi Mary, James nu Mary le Salome‑te in a luang zut nadingin sathau namtui a lei uh hi.
41016002	Nipikal sunga ni masa pen ni zingsang nisuah tungin daihawh dingin hanah a hong pai uh hi.
41016003	“Hankong khakna suangtum kua in hong honsak ding ahi hiam?” ci in a kikum uh hi.
41016004	Ahih hangin amaute a khuadak uh leh tua suangtum a kikhukkhiasa a om a mu uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua suangtum a lian mahmah khat ahi hi.
41016005	Han sungah lut uha puanpak tualpi a silh tangval khat taklam panga a tu a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi.
41016006	Ahih hangin tua pa in, “Lamdangsa kei un. A kikhailum Nazareth khua mi Zeisu na zong uh hi. Amah thokik zo hi! Hihlai ah om nawnlo hi. A luang kisialna mun hong en un.
41016007	Tu in ciah unla Peter le a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Note paima in Galilee gamah na paikhol dinga, a hong gensa bangin tualai ah amah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci in va gen un,” a ci hi.
41016008	Amaute han sung panin manlangtak in hong paikhia uha a tai uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute lau uha lamdang a sa uh hi. Amaute lau uh ahih manin kuamah kiangah thu bangmah a gen kei uh hi.
41016009	Tu in nipikal khat sunga ni masa pen ni zingsang tungin Zeisu thokik a, dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna numei Magdala khua mi Mary kiangah a kilak masa pen hi.
41016010	Tua numei in Zeisu tawh a kithuah khawm ngei, dah le kap a om mite kiangah pai in tua thu a va gen hi.
41016011	Amah thokik ahihna le Mary in a muhna thu amaute in a zak uh ciangin a um kei uh hi.
41016012	Tua khit ciangin nungzuite nih gam sung khuaneu khatah a pai laitak un amaute kiangah a nam tuamkhat in Zeisu a va kilak hi.
41016013	Amaute in nungzui dangte a va koh uh hangin a um tuan kei uh hi.
41016014	Tua nungciang in nungzui sawm le khatte an ne a a om laitak un amaute kiangah Zeisu a kilak hi. Amah a thawhkik khit cianga a mu mite thugente um loin lungkhauh uh ahih manin Zeisu in amaute a taii hi.
41016015	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Leitung khempeuh ah pai unla a kipiangsak na khempeuh tungah lungdamna thu tangko un.
41016016	Thu um in tui a kiphum mi in hotkhiatna a ngah ding hi. Ahih hangin a umlo mi in mawhsakna a thuak ding hi.
41016017	Thu‑um mite tungah hih limlamdangte a piang ding hi. Keima min tawh dawite hawlkhia ding uha kampau thak tawh a pau ding uh hi.
41016018	Gulte man ding uh a, sih theihna gu a dawn uh hangin bangmah a ci kei ding uh hi. Cinate tungah khut a ngakh uh ciangin a dam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41016019	Tua bangin Topa in amaute kiangah thu a gen khit ciangin vantung ah amah kilato a, Pasian ziatlam ah a tu hi.
41016020	A nungzuite kuankhia in mun khempeuh ah lungdamna thu a tangko uh hi. Topa in amaute tawh na semkhawm a, nalamdangte tawh ama kammal a kipsak hi. Amen.
