42001001	A zahtakhuai mahmah Theophilus aw, eite lakah a piangsa thute mitampi in kiciantak in a gelh khinzo uh hi.
42001002	Amaute in tua thute a kipatcil a kipan mittang tawh mu in tua thu tawh kisai na a sem mite hong gensawnna banga a gelh uh ahi hi.
42001003	Kei zong tua thupiang khempeuh a kipat a kipan limtak kantel khinzo ka hih manin nang aa dingin hih thu a kizom in kong gelhkhiat ding hoih ka sa hi.
42001004	Hih in nang a hong kihilh khinsa thute maan takpi hi ci a, na theih nading ka deihna ahi hi.
42001005	Herod in Judea gamah kumpi a sep laitak in Abijah pawl sungah Zacharias kici siampipa khat a om hi. A zi pen Aaron suante khat hi a, a min Elizabeth ahi hi.
42001006	A nupa un Pasian muhna ah midik hi uha Topa thupiakte le thukhunte khempeuh kawkbang loin a zuite ahi uh hi.
42001007	Elizabeth tasel ahih manin ta neilo uha a kum uh zong tam khin mahmah hi.
42001008	Khatvei, Zacharias in Pasian mai ah siampi na a sep laitak,
42001009	siampite ngeina zui in nasep ding a hawmna uhah paknamtui hal ding nasep a ngah hi. Amah Topa biakinnpi sungah lut in,
42001010	paknamtui hal a a om laitak in mipite khempeuh in a pualam ah thu a ngen uh hi.
42001011	Tua laitak in Topa vantungmi khat ama kiangah hong kilang a, paknamtui halna biaknatau taklam ah a ding hi.
42001012	Zacharias in vantungmi a muh ciangin dipkua in a lau mahmah hi.
42001013	Tua ciangin vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Zacharias aw, lau kei in na thungetna Pasian in hong zazo hi. Na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat nei dinga, a min John na phuak ding hi.
42001014	Amah hong pian ciangin lungdam in na nuam dinga, mitampi zong a kipak ding uh hi.
42001015	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa muhna ah amah mi thupi a suak ding hi. Lenggahzu a kipan khamtheih guihtheihte ne lo dinga, a nu gil sung pan mahin Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim ding hi.
42001016	Israel Pasian ahi Topa lamah amaute a kiheisak ding hi.
42001017	Elijah lungsim le vangliatna nei in Topa mai ah a pai ding hi. ‘Pate lungtang a tate lamah kiheisak in,’ thumanglo mite in midikte lungpilna a neih nadingin a heisak ding hi. Tua bangin Topa aa dingin minam khat puahkhol in a kigingsa in a koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001018	Tua ciangin Zacharias in vantungmi kiangah, “Hih thu bangci theih ding ka hi hiam? Kei lah tekta ing a, ka zi zong kum tam mahmah khin ta hi,” a ci hi.
42001019	Vantungmi in dawngin ama kiangah, “Pasian mai‑a a ding Gabriel ka hi hi. Nang hong hopih in hih lungdamna thute hong puak dinga hong kisawl ahi hi.
42001020	En in, a hun a tun cianga a hong piang ding thu kong gente um lo na hih manin hih thute a hong pian mateng in na pauthei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001021	Biakinnpi sungah Zacharias sawtvei omlua ahih manin amah a ngak mipite in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42001022	A hong pusuah ciangin mipite hopih theilo ahih manin biakinnpi sungah mangmu hi ding hi ci in a thei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah pau theilo in om a, a khut bek tawh a lak hi.
42001023	Tua bangin a siampi nasep hun a bei phetin a inn ah a ciah hi.
42001024	Tua khit ciangin a zi Elizabeth in naupaai a, kha nga sung inn sungah a omcip hi.
42001025	Amah in, “Tu in Topa in kei hong angvan a, mi lak a ka maizumna teng hong lakkhiatsak hi,” a ci hi.
42001026	Tu in Elizabeth in nau a paai zawh kha guk a phak ciangin Galilee gam Nazareth a kici khua‑a om,
42001027	David suan, Joseph tawh kiteeng dinga zuthawl piaksa nungak siangtho Mary kiangah Pasian in vantungmi Gabriel a sawl hi.
42001028	Mary kiangah vantungmi va pai a, “Maipha a ngah mahmah numei aw, nopna ngahta in. Topa in nang hong ompih a, numeite lakah thupha ngahnu na hi hi,” a ci hi.
42001029	Ahi zongin Mary in amah mu in a thugen a zak ciangin patau a, “Banghang in hih bangin hong hopih hi ding ahi hiam?” ci in a ngaihsun hi.
42001030	Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Mary aw, lau kei in. Pasian maipha na ngah zo hi.
42001031	En in, naupaai in tapa khat na nei dinga, a min ZEISU na phuak ding hi.
42001032	Amah mi thupi suak dinga, Sangpenpa Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in a pa David tokhom tungah amah a tusak ding hi.
42001033	Amah in Jacob innkuante uk tawntung dinga, ama kumpigam a bei ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001034	Tua ciangin Mary in vantungmi kiangah, “Pasal tawh lumkhawm ngeilo ka hih manin hih thu bangci bangin piangthei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42001035	Vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Kha Siangtho nang tungah hong tung dinga, Sangpenpa vangliatna in nang a hong tuam ding hi. Tua ahih manin nang sung pan a suakkhia ding Siangthopa pen Pasian Tapa kici ding hi.
42001036	En in, na tanaunu Elizabeth in zong a tek nungin tapa khat a paaizo hi. Taselnu a kici amah in naupaai a, kha guk a phazo hi.
42001037	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian aa dingin a piang theilo na khat beek a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
42001038	Tua ciangin Mary in, “En in, Topa nasemnu ka hi hi! Na gen bangin kei tungah hong piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin ama kiang panin vantungmi a paikhia hi.
42001039	Tua khit ciangin Mary kithawi a, Judah gam mualtung khua khatah a pai pah hi.
42001040	Amah Zacharias inn sungah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi.
42001041	Elizabeth in Mary hopihna a zak ciangin a gil sunga naungek diang a, Elizabeth zong Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim hi.
42001042	Tua ciangin amah in aw ngaihtak in kiko a, “Numeite lakah thupha ngahnu na hi a, nang sunga naungek zong thupha ngah ahi hi!
42001043	Ka Topa nu kei kiangah a hong hawh theih nadingin hih bang hamphatna koipan ngah kha ka hi hiam?
42001044	En in, nong hopihna awging ka bil ah hong lut phetin ka gil sunga naungek kipak in a diang hi.
42001045	Topa in a gensa thute tangtungsak ding hi ci a, a um numei in thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42001046	Tua ciangin Mary in, “Ka lungsim in Topa pahtawi a,
42001047	Ka kha in zong hong Honpa Pasian sungah a lungdam hi.
42001048	Banghang hiam cihleh, Amah in a nasemnu dinmun niamna hong mu zo hi. En un, tu a kipan a khang a khang in, Thupha ngahnu hong ci ding uh hi.
42001049	Banghang hiam cihleh, Vanglianpa in kei aa dingin, Na lianpi hong sepsak zo a, Ama minin Siangtho ahi hi.
42001050	Amah in amah a zahtak mite, A khang a khang in a hehpih hi.
42001051	A khut tawh thahatna lak a, Kiliatsakna lungsim a neite a thehthang hi.
42001052	Gam ukte a kumpi tokhom panun khiasuk a, A kinengniamte a lamsang hi.
42001053	A gilkial mite na hoih tampi guan a, Mihaute ahih leh a hawmpi in a paikhiasak hi.
42001054	Amah in a hehpihna phawk tawntung ahih manin, A nasem Israel a huh hi.
42001055	Tua in i pu i pate, Abraham le a suan a khakte tungah, A tawntung in a gensa bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42001056	Mary in Elizabeth kiangah kha thum bang a taam khit ciangin a inn ah a ciah hi.
42001057	Tu in Elizabeth a suah hun hong tung a, tapa khat a nei hi.
42001058	Topa in Elizabeth tungah hehpihna lianpi lak hi cih a innvengte le a tanaute in a zak uh ciangin a lungdampih uh hi.
42001059	Naungek ni giat a phak ciangin a vunat dingin pai uh a, a min dingin a pa min zui in Zacharias phuah a sawm uh hi.
42001060	Ahih hangin a nu in, “Hilo hi, John phuah ding hi zaw hi,” a ci hi.
42001061	Amaute in, “No beh sungah tua bang min om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
42001062	Tua ciangin a pa in bang phuak nuam hiam cih a theih nadingun khut tawh lakin a dong uh hi.
42001063	Amah in laigelh nading khat ngen a, “Ama min John ahi hi,” ci in a gelh hi. Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42001064	Tua ciangin thakhat in Zecharias kam a kihong hi. A leii kilok in pauthei a, Pasian a phat hi.
42001065	Tua ciangin a veng a pam khempeuh lauthawng uh a, Judea mualtung gam khempeuh ah hih thute bek genin a kinei hi.
42001066	Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in amaute lungsim sungah, “Hih naungek bangci bang mi a hong suak ding hiam?” ci in a ngaihsun uh hi. Topa khutin amah tawh a omkhawm hi.
42001067	Tu in a pa Zacharias in Kha Siangtho tawh kidim in hih bangin kamsanna a gen hi,
42001068	Amah in, “Israelte Topa Pasian in thupha ngah tahen. Banghang hiam cihleh, amah in a mite hong vehin hong tankhia zo hi.
42001069	A nasempa David suan pan, Pasian in eite aa dingin, Hotkhiatna kii khat, Hong pokhiasak zo hi.
42001070	Tua thu in lei piancil a kipan, A siangtho ama kamsangte kam tawh, A gensa ahi hi.
42001071	Hih in i galte le, Hong mudah khempeuhte khut pan a, Hong hotkhiatna ahi hi.
42001072	I pu i pate tunga a kamciamsa, Hehpihna hong tungsak a, A siangtho ama thuciamna, A mangngilh kei hi.
42001073	I pupi Abraham tung a, A kiciamsa bangin,
42001074	I galte khut sung pan hong honkhia a,
42001075	I nuntak laiteng in, Ama mai ah sianthona le dikna tawh, Lau hetlo in ama na i sep theih nading ahi hi.
42001076	“Bawi aw, Sangpenpa kamsangpa hong kici ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Topa lampi a sial dingin, Ama mai ah na pai ding hi.
42001077	A mite in mawh kimaisakna tungtawn in, Hotkhiatna a ngah lam uh na theisak ding hi.
42001078	Eite Pasian hong hehpihna tungtawn in, Phalvak in eite hong veh zo a,
42001079	Khuamial sung le, Sihna lim sunga om mite tungah khuavak a tan nading, Nopna lampi ah eite a hong khak nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42001080	Tua bangin naupang hong khangin a lungsim zong hong picing semsem hi. Israel mite tunga a kilah khiat hun mateng in gamlak ah a teeng hi.
42002001	Tua hun lai in Caesar Augustus in a gam sunga mipha zah a kisim nadingin thu a pia hi.
42002002	Quirinius in Syria gam uk ahih laitak in hih mipha zah kisimna a masa pen ahi hi.
42002003	Mi khempeuh in a min uh khumsak dingin amau pianna khua ciatah a pai uh hi.
42002004	Joseph zong David phung sunga piang David suan ahih manin Galilee gam Nazareth khua panin Judea gam David khua Bethlehem ah min khumsak dingin a paito hi.
42002005	A zi dinga zuthawl a piaksa Mary tawh paikhawm uh a, Mary nausuak kuan ahih manin,
42002006	tua khua ah a om sungun a suah hun hong tung hi.
42002007	Amah in a tacil ahi tapa nei a, naupuan tawh a tun hi. Zintun inn sungah amaute aa dingin inndei om lo ahih manin bawng ankuang sungah nau a sial hi.
42002008	Tua gamah tuucingte in gamlak ah giak uh a, zanin tuute a vil uh hi.
42002009	En in, Topa vantungmi khat amaute mai ah hong dinga, Topa vangin amaute kim le pamteng tan ahih manin a lau mahmah uh hi.
42002010	Tua ciangin vantungmi in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un. Mi khempeuh aa ding a nuamhuai mahmah lungdamna thu kong puak hi.
42002011	Banghang hiam cihleh tuni in Topa Khazih ahi Honpa in note aa dingin David khua ah a suakzo hi.
42002012	Amah na theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi. Naungek khat naupuan tawh kitun in bawng ankuang sungah kisial a om na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42002013	Tua ciangin thakhat in vantungmi honpite tua vantungmi tawh hong om uh a,
42002014	amaute in, “A sangpen muna om Pasian minthang tahen. Leitung ah kilemna om henla, Leitung mite tungah nopna om tahen!” ci in Pasian a phat uh hi.
42002015	Vantungmite vanah a ciah khit uh ciangin tuucingte kiho uh a, “Bethlehem khua ah pai in, Topa hong gensa hih thupiang va en ni,” a kici uh hi.
42002016	Amaute pai pah vingveng uh a, Mary, Joseph le bawng ankuang sunga kisial naungek a mu uh hi.
42002017	Amah a muh khit uh ciangin amaute tunga kigensa hih naungek thute mun khempeuh ah a gen kawikawi uh hi.
42002018	Tuucingte thugen a za mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42002019	Mary ahih leh hih thu khempeuh a lungsim ah ciamteh in a ngaihsunsun hi.
42002020	Tua ciangin tuucingte in amaute tunga kigen bangin, a zaksa a muhsa uh thu khempeuh hangin Pasian pahtawi le phat kawmsa in a ciahkik uh hi.
42002021	Tua ciangin naungek vunat ding hun ni giat a cin ciangin a nu in a gil sungah nau a paaima a vantungmi in a gensa bangin a min ZEISU a phuak uh hi.
42002022	Moses thukham tawh kizui in Mary a kisiansuahna hun a cin khit ciangin, Topa tungah naungek a ap dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah a hong paipih uh hi.
42002023	Hih in, “Naubu a hong masa tapa khempeuh Topa aa dingin sehtuam ahi hi,” ci in Topa thukham sunga kigelh thu bangin a zui uh ahi hi.
42002024	Topa thukham sungah, “Vakhu kopkhat, ahih keileh kawl vakhuno nih pia ding,” cih tawh kizui in biakna pia dinga pai zong ahi uh hi.
42002025	En in, Simeon a kici a thuman, Pasian a zahtak mahmah mi khat Jerusalem khuapi ah a om hi. Israelte kihehnepna a lamen mi khat hi a, Kha Siangtho ama tungah a om hi.
42002026	Topa Sathau‑nilhpa a muh mateng si lo ding hi, ci in Kha Siangtho in a theihsaksa ahi hi.
42002027	Kha makaihna tawh biakinnpi huang sungah Simeon a lut hi. A nu le a pate in thukham ngeina bangin naungek Zeisu ap dingin a hong lutpih uh ciangin,
42002028	Simeon in ama ang ah naungek tawi in Pasian phat a,
42002029	amah in, “Topa aw, na silapa tunga nong gensa bangin, Lungnuamtak in hong paisakta in.
42002030	Banghang hiam cihleh, Na hotkhiatna ka mit tawh ka mu zo hi.
42002031	Nang in tua hotkhiatna, Minam khempeuh muh dingin na bawl khinzo a,
42002032	Gentile‑te tunga kilakna a puak ding khuavak le, Na mi Israelte minthan nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42002033	Simeon in naungek tawh kisai a gen thute Joseph le a nu in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42002034	Tua khit ciangin Simeon in amaute thupha pia a, a nu Mary kiangah, “En in, Israel mitampite kipuk nading le thawh nadingin hih naungek a kiseh zo hi.
42002035	Mitampite lungsim tawng a kilatkhiat nadingin amaute in a gensiat uh Pasian kiang pana limlamdang khat zong ahi hi. Hi hi, na lungsim zong namsau khatin hong dawtlet ding hi,” a ci hi.
42002036	Tua laitak in Anna kici kamsangnu khat om a, Asher phung sunga piang Phanuel tanu ahi hi. Amah khangham khin mahmah ta hi. A nungak lai‑a a kiteenpih a pasal tawh kum sagih sung bek damkhawm uh hi.
42002037	Tua khit ciangin meigong a, tu in 84 phazo hi. Amah in biakinnpi huang lawi ngeilo a, antang in thungen in sun le zanin Pasian a bia hi.
42002038	Tua laitak in amah hong lut a, Topa tungah lungdam a ko hi. Jerusalem khuapi a hotkhiat ding a lamen mi khempeuh tungah naungek thu a gen hi.
42002039	Amaute in Topa thukham banga na khempeuh ahih khit uh ciangin Galilee gama om a khua uh ahi Nazareth ah a ciahkik uh hi.
42002040	Naupang hong khangin a lungsim hong picing a, lungpilna tawh kidim in Pasian hehpihna thupha ama tungah a om hi.
42002041	A nu le a pate Paisan Pawi sim dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah kumsim in a pai den uh hi.
42002042	Zeisu kum sawm le kum nih a phak ciangin pawi ngeina bangin Jerusalem khuapi ah pawisim dingin a paito uh hi.
42002043	Pawi a ven ciangin a nu le a pate ciah uh a, Naupang Zeisu ahih leh Jerusalem khuapi ah a omlai hi. Tua thu Joseph le a nu in a thei kei uh hi.
42002044	Amaute in mihonpi lakah Zeisu a omom mah a sa uh hi. Ni khat lam a pai khit uh ciangin tanaute le meltheihte lak a zong uh hi.
42002045	A muh loh uh ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah kilehkik in a va zong uh hi.
42002046	Ni thum khit ciangin biakinnpi huang sungah siapite thugen ngai in thu dongin amaute laizang ah tu‑a om a mu uh hi.
42002047	Ama thugen a za mi khempeuh in a thutheihna le a dawnkiknate lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42002048	A nu le a pa in amah a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa uha a nu in, “Ka ta aw, banghang in hong hi ci bawl peuhmah na hi hiam? En in, na pa tawh lunghimawh mahmah in kong zong uh hi,” a ci hi.
42002049	Tua ciangin amah in amaute gel kiangah, “Banghang in hong zong na hi uh hiam? Ka Pa na a sem ding ka hih lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
42002050	Ahih hangin ama gennop thu a thei kei uh hi.
42002051	Zeisu in amaute tawh Nazareth khua ah ciahsuk khawm a, amaute thu a mang hi. A nu Mary in hih thu khempeuh a lungsim sungah a ciamteh hi.
42002052	Zeisu a lungpilna le a pumpi khang semsem a, Pasian maipha le mite maipha a ngah hi.
42003001	Tu in Tiberius Caesar a maan zawh kum sawm le kum nga a cin kumin Pontius Pilate in Judea gam mangpipa ahi hi. Herod in Galilee gam uk mangpa hi a, a naupa Philip in Iturea gam le Trachonitis gam uk mangpa hi in, Lysanias in Abilene gam uk mangpa ahi hi.
42003002	Annas le Caiaphas in Siampi Ukte ahih laitak un gamlak a om Zacharias tapa John tungah Pasian thu a tung hi.
42003003	Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh ah John vak kawikawi a, mawhmai nadingin kisikkikna tawh kisai tui kiphumna thu a hilh hi.
42003004	Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah laibu sunga kigelhsa thu ahi hi. Tualai ah, “Gamlak a kikopa awging in, ‘Topa pai nading lam na sial unla, A lampite na tangsak un.
42003005	Muallian mualneu khempeuh kitamsak in, Mualkuam khempeuh kivuk dim ding hi. A komna munte kivukdim in, Lamkawite kitangsak dinga,
42003006	Mi khempeuh in Pasian hotkhiatna a mu ding uh hi,’ ” ci in a kigelh hi.
42003007	Tua ciangin John in tui kiphumsak dingin ama kianga hong pai mihonpite kiangah, “A gupha gul suante aw! A hong tung ding hehna pan a taikhia dingin kua in hong hilhkhol ahi hiam?
42003008	Tua ahih manin kisikkikna tawh a kituak gah na gah un. Note lungsim sungah, ‘Abraham ka pa uh hi,’ ci in suang kei un. Ken kong cih in ah Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham tate a suaksak thei hi.
42003009	Tu mahmah in zong singphung tengah hei kinga zo hi. Tua ahih manin gahhoih a gahlo singkung khempeuh kiphuk in meikuang sungah kikhul ding hi,” a ci hi.
42003010	Tua ciangin mihonpite in ama kiangah, “Tua ahih leh bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
42003011	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Puanak nih a nei mi in a neilote hawm hen. Annek ding a nei mi in a neilo mi hawm hen,” a ci hi.
42003012	Tua ciangin siahdongte zong tui kiphumsak dingin hong pai uh a, “Sia aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
42003013	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na don ding zahval uh siah dong kei un,” a ci hi.
42003014	Tua mah bangin galkapte in zong ama kiangah, “Kote zong bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Zawhthawh thu tawh kuama neihsa laksak kei un. A maanlopi in kuamah mawhsak kei un. Khasum na ngah zah uh tawh lungkim un,” a ci hi.
42003015	Tu in mipite in John pen Khazih ahi kha ding hiam ci in a ngaihsut laitak un,
42003016	John in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Ken note tui tawh kong phum hi. Ahih hangin kei sanga a vanglian zaw Khat a hong pai ding hi. Ama khedapkhau sut ding nangawn in ka kilawm kei hi. Amah in Kha Siangtho le mei tawh note hong phum ding hi.
42003017	Amah in buhcilna phuala anhumte a hahsiang sitset dingin a khutah ansi zapna a tawizo hi. Antak teng ama ansal sungah sungin ansite ahih leh a mit ngeilo meikuang sungah a khul ding hi,” a ci hi.
42003018	Thu dang tampi tawh zong mite hanthawn in thu a hilh hi.
42003019	Gam uk mangpa Herod in a sanggampa Philip zi Herodias a suhna le a gamtat siatna teng hangin John in amah a taii hi.
42003020	Herod in hih mawhna teng a bawl banah John zong thong sungah a khum lai hi.
42003021	Tu in John in mi khempeuh tui a phum khit ciangin Zeisu zong tui a phum hi. Zeisu in thu a nget laitak in van kihong a,
42003022	Kha Siangtho in vakhu tawh a kibang pumpi tawh ama tungah hong kumsuk hi. Tua ciangin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nang in ka lung hong damsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
42003023	Tu in Zeisu kum 30 bang a phak ciangin nasep a kipan hi. Mite in amah Joseph tapa hi a ci uh hi. Joseph in Heli tapa,
42003024	Heli in Matthat tapa, Matthat in Levi tapa, Levi in Melchi tapa, Melchi in Janna tapa, Janna in Joseph tapa,
42003025	Joseph in Mattathiah tapa, Mattathiah in Amos tapa, Amos in Nahum tapa, Nahum in Esli tapa, Esli in Naggai tapa,
42003026	Naggai in Maath tapa, Maath in Mattathiah tapa, Mattathiah in Semei tapa, Semei in Joseph tapa, Joseph in Judah tapa,
42003027	Judah in Joannas tapa, Joannas in Rhesa tapa, Rhesa in Zerubbabel tapa, Zerubbabel in Shealtiel tapa, Shealtiel in Neri tapa,
42003028	Neri in Melchi tapa, Melchi in Addi tapa, Addi in Cosam tapa, Cosam in Elmodam tapa, Elmodam in Er tapa,
42003029	Er in Jose tapa, Jose in Eliezer tapa, Eliezer in Jorim tapa, Jorim in Matthat tapa, Matthat in Levi tapa,
42003030	Levi in Simeon tapa, Simeon in Judah tapa, Judah in Joseph tapa, Joseph in Jonan tapa, Jonan in Eliakim tapa,
42003031	Eliakim in Melea tapa, Melea in Menan tapa, Menan in Mattathah tapa, Mattathah in Nathan tapa, Nathan in David tapa,
42003032	David in Jesse tapa, Jesse in Obed tapa, Obed in Boaz tapa, Boaz in Salmon tapa, Salmon in Nahshon tapa,
42003033	Nahshon in Amminadab tapa, Amminadab in Ram tapa, Ram in Hezron tapa, Hezron in Perez tapa, Perez in Judah tapa,
42003034	Judah in Jacob tapa, Jacob in Isaac tapa, Isaac in Abraham tapa, Abraham in Terah tapa, Terah in Nahor tapa,
42003035	Nahor in Serug tapa, Serug in Reu tapa, Reu in Peleg tapa, Peleg in Eber tapa, Eber in Shelah tapa,
42003036	Shelah in Cainan tapa, Cainan in Arphaxad tapa, Arphaxad in Shem tapa, Shem in Noah tapa, Noah in Lamech tapa,
42003037	Lamech in Methuselah tapa, Methuselah in Enoch tapa, Enoch in Jared tapa, Jared in Mahalalel tapa, Mahalalel in Cainan tapa,
42003038	Cainan in Enosh tapa, Enosh in Seth tapa, Seth in Adam tapa, Adam in Pasian tapa ahi hi.
42004001	Tua ciangin Zeisu in Kha Siangtho tawh kidimsa in Jordan gun pan hong ciahkik a, Kha in amah gamlak ah a paipih hi.
42004002	Dawimangpa in ni 40 sung amah ze‑et a, tua sungin bangmah ne lo ahih manin ni 40 a cin ciangin a gil a kial hi.
42004003	Dawimangpa in ama kiangah, “Pasian Tapa na hih leh hih suangte anlum a suah nadingin thupia in,” a ci hi.
42004004	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “ ‘Mihing in an bek tawh a nungta hilo in Pasian kam panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nuntak ding ahi hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
42004005	Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in amah mualsang khat tungah paipih a, leitung gam khempeuh thakhat in a lak hi.
42004006	Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in ama kiangah, “Hih gamte tunga thuneihna le hih gamte thupina khempeuh nang kong pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hite khempeuh kei hong kipia khin ahih manin ka piak nop peuhpeuh ka pia thei hi.
42004007	Tua ahih manin bokin hong bia leteh hiteng khempeuh nangma aa a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42004008	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Satan aw, ka nungah kihemkhia in! ‘Topa na Pasian na bia dinga ama na bek na sem ding hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42004009	Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in Jerusalem khuapi ah amah paipih in biakinnpi khumdawn ah koih a, “Pasian Tapa na hih leh hih panin tuaksuk in.
42004010	Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Amah in nang hong kem dingin, Ama vantungmite thupia dinga,
42004011	Na khe le suang a kitah khakloh nadingin, A khut uh tawh nang a hong dom ding uh hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
42004012	Zeisu in, “ ‘Topa na Pasian na ze‑et kei ding hi,’ ci in kigen hi,”ci in a dawng hi.
42004013	Tu in Dawimangpa in a ze‑et nading khempeuh a zawh khit ciangin hun hoih dang ngakin a paikhiat san hi.
42004014	Tua ciangin Kha vangliatna tawh Galilee gamah Zeisu ciahkik a, tua gamkuam khempeuh ah ama thu a thang hi.
42004015	Amah in amaute kikhopna innte ah thuhilh a, mi khempeuh in amah a phat uh hi.
42004016	Tua khit ciangin ama khankhiatna Nazareth khua ah Zeisu a pai hi. Ama zatngei bangin Sabbath ni in kikhopna inn ah lut a, Lai Siangtho sim dingin a dingto hi.
42004017	Tua ciangin kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a pia uh hi. Amah in laibu a lem ciangin hih bangin a kigelhna mun a mu hi.
42004018	“Topa Kha in keima tungah a om hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Mizawngte tungah lungdamna thu a tangko dingin, Amah in sathau hong nilhzo hi. Lungsim kitamkhamte a damsak ding, A kiman mite a kikhahkhiatna thu a hilh ding, Mittawte khua a musak ding, Netcipna a thuakte a suaktasak ding le
42004019	Topa hong san hun hong tungta hi cih thu a tangko dingin Amah in kei a hong sawlzo hi,” a ci hi.
42004020	Tua khit ciangin amah in laibu khup in kikhopna inn ukpa a piak khit ciangin a tukik hi. Kikhopna inn sunga om mite mittang khempeuh in ama tungah a tu hi.
42004021	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hih Lai Siangtho in a gen thu, tuni in note zak mahmah in a tangtung zo hi,” a ci hi.
42004022	Mi khempeuh in amah phat uha ama kam sung pana a gingkhia thute zong khum mahmah ahih manin lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi zongin, “Hihpa in Joseph tapa hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42004023	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in, ‘Siavuanpa aw, nang le nang kidamsak in,’ cih paunak tawh hong kapin, ‘Capernaum khua‑a na sepsa thu ka zak bangbang un, nangma khua hi lai ah zong tua bangin hong sem in,’ nong ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42004024	Tua ciangin amah in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ama khua‑a kisang kamsang khat beek a om kei hi.
42004025	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Elijah hun lai in kum thum le a lang sung guahzu loin gam sung khempeuh ah kialpi a tun laitak in Israel mite lakah meigong tampi a om hangin,
42004026	Sidon gam Zarephath khua‑a om meigongnu simloh meigong dangte kiangah Elijah a kisawl kei hi.
42004027	Kamsangpa Elisha hun lai in zong Israel mite lakah miphak tampi a om hangin Syria gam mi Naaman simloh phak natna a kidamsak khat beek a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
42004028	Kikhopna inn sunga om mi khempeuh in hih thute a zak uh ciangin a heh mahmah uh hi.
42004029	Amaute dingkhia in khua pua lamah Zeisu kaikhia uha tua khuapi kilamna mualtung kensang dawn panin sawnkhiat ding a sawm uh hi.
42004030	Ahih hangin amaute lak panin amah a gelkhia hi.
42004031	Tua khit ciangin Galilee gam Capernaum khua ah paisuk a, Sabbath ni in thu a hilh hi.
42004032	Amah in thuneihna tawh thuhilh ahih manin amaute in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42004033	Tua kikhopna inn sungah dawigilo a lut mi khat a om hi.
42004034	Tua pa in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu aw, kote hong hi ci omsak lel in! Nang tawh bang kisai ka hi uh hiam? Kote a susia dinga hong pai na hi hiam? Kua na hi hiam cih kong thei uha Pasian mi Siangthopa na hi hi,” ci in nakpi in a kiko hi.
42004035	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Pau kei inla, ama sung pan paikhia in,” ci in a taii hi. Tua dawi in mite laizang ah tua pa sawnpai a, liamsak loin a paikhia hi.
42004036	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih kammal in bangci bang ahi hiam? Thuneihna le vangliatna tawh dawigilote thu a piak ciangin a paikhia hi,” a kici uh hi.
42004037	Ama thu tua kima om gam khempeuh ah a thang hi.
42004038	Tu in kikhopna inn panin Zeisu paikhia a, Simon inn ah a lut hi. Simon sunghnu nattun in a cisa a, gim mahmah ahih manin a damsak nadingin a ngen uh hi.
42004039	Tua nu gei ah Zeisu dingin cisa natna a taii ciangin a natna a dam hi. Tua ciangin amah thokhia pahin amaute zin a do hi.
42004040	Nitum khit ciangin natna tuamtuam a vei cina khempeuh ama kiangah hong puak uh a, amaute khatciat tungah a khut nga in a damsak hi.
42004041	Dawite in zong, “Pasian Tapa Khazih na hi hi!” ci in kiko in mi tampi sung pan a paikhia uh hi. Dawite in Khazih ahihlam thei uh ahih manin amah in amaute taii in kam khat beek a pausak kei hi.
42004042	Khua a vak ciangin amah tua mun panin gamdaihna mun khatah a pai hi. Mihonpite in amah zong uha a kiang a tun uh ciangin amaute a paisan loh nadingin a kho uh hi.
42004043	Ahih hangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Pasian kumpigam thu khuadangte ah zong ka tangko loh phamawh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua na a sem dingin a hong kisawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42004044	Tua bangin Galilee gam sunga kikhopna innteng ah thu a hilh kawikawi hi.
42005001	Gennesaret tuili gei ah Zeisu a din laitak in Pasian thu ngai dinga hong kikhawm mihonpi in amah a nehcip gawp uh hi.
42005002	Amah in ngabengte ngen sawp dinga a paikal un tuili gei‑a om gunkuang nih a mu hi.
42005003	Tua gunkuang nihte lak panin Simon gunkuang ah amah kah in lei tawh tawmkha gunkuang a kihalsak nadingin a ngen hi. Tua khit ciangin gunkuang tungah tu in mihonpite thu a hilh hi.
42005004	Thu a gen khit ciangin Simon kiangah, “Tui thukna lamah gunkuang khin inla na ngen khuh in,” a ci hi.
42005005	Ahih hangin Simon in, “Sia aw, zan thapai hanciamtak in ka khuh uh hangin khat beek ka man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin na cih bangin ka khuh ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42005006	Tua bangin ngen a khuh uh leh ngasa tampi khuh kha uh a, a ngen uh a kikek hi.
42005007	Tua ciangin gunkuang dang khat a om a lawmte hong pai in a huh nading uh khutvan in sam uh a, a lawmte zong hong pai uh hi. Gunkuang nih a dim tuakin ngasa guang uh ahih manin gunkuangte a tum dektak hi.
42005008	Simon Peter in hih thupiang a muh ciangin Zeisu khephung ah kunsuk a, “Topa aw, mawhnei mi ka hih manin ka kiang panin kihemkhia in!” a ci hi.
42005009	Banghang hiam cihleh amah le a lawmte khempeuh in a ngasa mat uh lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42005010	Simon lawmte ahi Zebedee tate James le John in zong lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in Simon kiangah, “Lau kei in. Tu a kipan in mite na man ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
42005011	A gunkuangte uh tuigei a tut khit uh ciangin na khempeuh nusia in ama nung a zui uh hi.
42005012	Khua khatah Zeisu a om laitak in a pumtang a phak mi khatin amah a muh ciangin boksuk a, “Topa aw, hong damsak nuam lecin nong damsak thei hi,” ci in nakpitak in a thum hi.
42005013	Tua ciangin, Zeisu in a khut zanin amah lawng a, “Kong damsak nuam hi, damta in,” ci in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin tua pa phaknatna a dam pah hi.
42005014	Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua thu kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingin thupia a, “Siampipa kiangah va kilak inla, na damna hangin Moses thupiak bangin biakpiakna va nei in. Tua in amau aa dingin teci ahi ding hi,” a ci hi.
42005015	Ahih hangin, ama thu kizel semsem a, a thugen ngai ding le a natnate uh ama damsak ding ut in mihonpi a hong kikhawm uh hi.
42005016	Amah ahih leh gamlak ah paikhia in thu a ngen zelzel hi.
42005017	Ni khat Zeisu thuhilh a a om laitak in Jerusalem khuapi a kipan Galilee gam le Judea gam khempeuh panin a hong kisutuah Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate ama kiangah a tu uh hi. Amaute a cidam nadingun tualai ah Topa vangliatna a om hi.
42005018	Tua ciangin en in, mi pawlkhat in pumzaw pasal khat a lupna tawh zawng in a hong paipih uh hi. Inn sungah lutpih in Zeisu mai ah a ngakh theih nadingun a hanciam uh hi.
42005019	Mihonpi in a pai nading uh lamkhak ahih manin lutpih theilo uh a, innkhum tungah a kahto uh hi. Innkhum dawn vangsak in tua pa a lupna tawh khaisuk uh a, mihonpi laizang Zeisu mai ah a nga uh hi.
42005020	Zeisu in amaute upna a muh ciangin cinapa kiangah, “Lawm aw, na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42005021	Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in, “Pasian tunga a pausia hihpa kua ahi hiam? Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam?” ci in a ngaihsun uh hi.
42005022	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute ngaihsutna thei ahih manin, “Banghang in tua bangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
42005023	‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding le, ‘Tho inla lampai in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam?
42005024	Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawhna maisak theihna thuneihna a neih lam na theih nadingun,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho in, na lupna pua inla na inn ah ciah in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
42005025	Amaute mai ah tua pa tho pah a, a lupna pua in Pasian phat kawmsa in a inn ah a ciah hi.
42005026	Amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, Pasian a phat uh hi. Amaute lau mahmah uh a, “Tuni‑a i muh nate lamdang thei mahmah hi,” a ci uh hi.
42005027	Hih thuteng khit ciangin Zeisu paikhia a, siahdonna buukah tu a om Levi kici siahdongpa khat a muh ciangin tuapa kiangah, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.
42005028	Amah dingkhia a, a na khempeuh nusia in Zeisu a zui hi.
42005029	Tua ciangin Levi in a inn ah Zeisu annekpihna thupitak in a bawl hi. Siahdongte honpi khat le midangte in zong amaute tawh ankuang a umkhawm uh hi.
42005030	Ahih hangin thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in, “Banghang in siahdongte le mimawhte tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm na hi uh hiam?” ci in nungzuite a phunsan uh hi.
42005031	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Cidamte aa dingin siavuan kisam lo a, cinate aa ding bekin a kisam hi.
42005032	Midikte sam dinga hong pai hilo in mimawhte a kisikkik nadingun a sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42005033	Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu kiangah, “John nungzuite in antang in thu a ngen zelzel uh hi. Pharisee pawlte nungzuite in zong tua bangmah in ahih uh hi. Banghang in na nungzuite in nene dawndawn uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42005034	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Zineipa in mopawi sim a lawmte a ompih laitak in, amaute antangsak thei ding ahi hiam?
42005035	Ahih hangin amaute kiang pan zineipa a kilakkhiat hun hong tung dinga, tua hun ciangin an a tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42005036	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in thugentehna khat a gen in ah, “Kuamah in puan thak tawh puan lui a phop kei hi. Tua bangin kiphop leh puan thak in puan lui a kaikek ding hi. Puan thak le puan lui a kituak thei kei hi.
42005037	Kuamah in savun um lui sungah lenggahtui thak a thun kei hi. Kithun leh lenggahtui thak in savun um phukham in lenggahtui teng luangkhia dinga, savun um zong a kitam ding hi.
42005038	Ahih hangin lenggahtui thak pen savun um thak sung mah ah thun ding ahi hi. Tua hi leh a nihin a bitkhawm ding hi.
42005039	Lenggahtui khauh a dawn khin mi peuhmah in lenggahtui thak a dawn pah nuam kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, ‘Lenggahtui a khauhpen lim a sa zaw hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
42006001	Sabbath masa pen khit a nihna Sabbath ni in buhlei khat kantan a Zeisu a pai laitak in a nungzuite in buhvuite zut uha a khut sungah nuai in a bak uh hi.
42006002	Pharisee pawlte pawlkhat in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni in sep dinga thukham in a phalloh nasep banghang in sem na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42006003	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “David in a pawlte tawh a gilkial laitak un,
42006004	Pasian inn sungah lutin siampite longal midang in a nek theih ding a hilo Ompihna Anlumte la in ne a, a pawlte zong pia hi cih thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
42006005	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa in Sabbath a Ukpa zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42006006	A dang Sabbath ni khat in kikhopna inn sungah Zeisu lutin thu a hilh hi. Tualai ah a taklam khut a keugaw pasal khat a om hi.
42006007	Thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in Sabbath ni peuhmah a Zeisu in cina a damsak leh a mawhmat dingin a encik gige uh hi.
42006008	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute ngaihsutna thei ahih manin a khut a sipa kiangah, “Tho inla, a laizang ah hong ding in,” a cih ciangin amah tho in a ding hi.
42006009	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Thu khat kong dong ding hi Sabbath ni in a pha bawl ding le a sia bawl ding, nuntakna gup ding le thah ding koi pen thukham tawh kituak zaw ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42006010	Amah in amaute khempeuh a gualet khit ciangin tua pa kiangah, “Na khut zankhia in,” a ci hi. Tua pa in a khut a zan leh a lang khat lam mah bangin dam a, a ngeina a bangkik hi.
42006011	Ahih hangin amaute hehlua uh ahih manin, “Zeisu bang cih ding i hi hiam?” ci in a kikum uh hi.
42006012	Tua hun lai ni khat, Zeisu thungen dingin mual tungah kahto a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
42006013	Khua a vak ciangin amah in a nungzuite a kiangah sam a, amaute lak panin sawm le nih teelkhia in sawltakte ci in min a pia hi.
42006014	Tua sawm le nihte in Peter ci a, min a phuahsakpa Simon le a sanggampa Andrew, James le John, Philip le Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthew le Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James le Zealot a kici Simon,
42006016	James tapa Judah le a lehhekpa a suak Judas Iscariot‑te ahi uh hi.
42006017	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh Zeisu kumsuk in munzang khatah a ding uh hi. Tualai ah a nungzui honkhat Judea gam khempeuh le Jerusalem khuapi a kipan tuipi gei Tyre le Sidon gamte panin ama thugen ngai ding le damna ngah nuam in a hong pai mihonpite a na om uh hi.
42006018	Dawigilote in a bawlsiat mite zong hong paipih uh a, amah in a damsak hi.
42006019	Ama tung panin a vangliatna paikhia in cina khempeuh damsak ahih manin mihonpi in amah a lawnkhak nading a hanciam uh hi.
42006020	Tua ciangin amah in a nungzuite en in a gen inah, “A genthei note in mihampha na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in note aa ahi hi.
42006021	Tu laitak a a gilkial note in mihampha na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na gil uh a vah ding hi. Tu laitak a a kap note in mihampha na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na nui ding uh hi.
42006022	Mihing Tapa hangin mite in, Note hong mudah in a hong hawlkhiat uh ciangin, Hong simmawh a migilote bangin a hong gensiat uh ciangin, mihampha na hi uh hi.
42006023	Tua bang hun ciangin lungdam unla, Kipak in diang un. Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ah thaman tampi na ngah ding uh hi. A pu a pate un zong tua mah bangin kamsangte a bawl uh hi.
42006024	No mihaute in gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh nopsakna na ngah khinzo uh hi.
42006025	No a gilvahte in gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh na gil uh a kial ding hi. Tu laitak a a nui note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh kapin na tau ding uh hi.
42006026	Mi khempeuh in a hong phat uh ciangin gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a pu a pate un zong kamsangzuaute tua mah bangin a phat uh hi.
42006027	“Ahih hangin ka thugen a za note kianga kong gen in ah na galte uh na it un. Hong mudahte tungah thupha na bawl un.
42006028	Hong samsiate thupha na pia un. Hong khelbawl mite aa dingin thu na ngetsak un.
42006029	Na pang langkhat a hong kibetsak leh a langlam zong na dawh lai un. Na puantungsilh a hong kilaksak leh na puansungsilh zong na it kei un.
42006030	A hong ngen mi peuhpeuh na pia un. Na vante uh hong kilaksak leh ngenkik kei un.
42006031	Note tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un.
42006032	“No a hong it mite bek it le uh teh bang phattuamna ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh mimawhte in zong amau a itte a it uh hi.
42006033	Thupha hong bawl mite tung bekah thupha bawl le uh teh bang phattuamna ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh mimawhte in zong tua bangin ahih uh hi.
42006034	Hong lohkik zo dinga na up mite bek uh leitawi pia le uh teh bang phattuamna ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh mimawhte in zong khat le khat a piak zahzah mah uh ngahkik ding lamen in a kileitawisak uh hi.
42006035	Note na hih uh leh na galte uh it unla, amaute tungah thupha bawl un. Ngahkik ding lamen loin leitawisak un. Tua hi leh thaman tampi na ngah ding uh a, Sangpenpa tate na hi ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna a theilo mite le migilote tungah amah a migi hi.
42006036	Tua ahih ciangin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna na nei un.
42006037	“Midangte tungah thu na khen kei un. Tua hi leh midangte in zong note tungah thu a hong khen kei ding uh hi. Midangte na mawhsak kei un. Tua hi leh note zong kuamah in a hong mawhsak kei ding hi. Midangte mawhna na maisak un. Tua hi leh note mawhna zong a hong kimaisak ding hi.
42006038	Pia un. Tua hi leh limtak a a kiteh, a kihenhen, a kitattat, a dimlet in note ang sungah hong kisung ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zat tehna tektek mah tawh note aa ding a hong kitehsakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42006039	Tua khit ciangin gentehna dang khat a gen in ah, “Mittaw in mittaw lam hilh thei ding ahi hiam? A nihun guam sungah kiakhawm ding uh hilo ahi hiam?
42006040	Nungzuipa in a siapa sangin lian zawlo hi. Ahi zongin hoihtak a a kipantah khin mi peuhmah a siapa tawh a kibang ding hi.
42006041	“Nangma mita singluang phawk lopi in na lawmpa mita ninthem banghang in muhsak na hi hiam?
42006042	Nangma mita singluangpi mu loin banghang in na lawmpa kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, na mita ninthem kong lakkhiatsak ding hi,’ ci na hi hiam? A kineihkhempa aw, nangma mita singluang lakhia masa leteh na lawmpa mita ninthem telmuh in na lakkhiatsak thei pan ding hi.
42006043	“Banghang hiam cihleh singkung hoih in a gah hoihlo a gah kei hi. Singkung hoihlo in zong gah hoih a gah kei hi.
42006044	Singkung peuhmah a gah panin a kithei hi. Lingkung ah theigah a kilo kei hi. Thangling kung panin lenggah a kilo kei hi.
42006045	Mihoih in a lungsim sungah thuhoih khol a, thuhoih mah a genkhia hi. Migilo in a lungsim sungah thusia khol a, thusia mah a genkhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim sunga a dimlet thute kam tawh a kigenkhia ahi hi.
42006046	“Kong gen thute zui lopi in banghang in, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci na hi uh hiam?
42006047	Ka kiangah hong pai in ka thugente za a, a zui mi in bang tawh kibang hiam cih kong lak ding hi.
42006048	Amah in lei thukpi to in suangpi tungah khuambul phut a, inn a lam mipa tawh a kibang hi. Tui hong khangin tuihual in khauhtak in tua inn a nawk hangin suangpi tungah kilam ahih manin a lok zo kei hi.
42006049	Ahih hangin ka thugente za napi in a zuilo mi ahih leh bulkip om lo leitham tunga inn lampa tawh a kibang hi. Tuihual in khauhtak in tua inn a nawk ciangin puk pah a, a kisia zan ngingei hi,” a ci hi.
42007001	Tu in Zeisu in tua mite zakin hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin Capernaum khua ah a lut hi.
42007002	Tu in galkap 100 ukpa in a it mahmah a nasempa khat cina in si dektak in a om hi.
42007003	Amah in Zeisu thu a zak ciangin Zeisu kiangah Judah mite makaite sawlin hong pai a, a nasempa a damsak nading a ngetsak hi.
42007004	Amaute in Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin nakpitak in thum in, “Hih mipa tungah na bawl ding a kilawm hi.
42007005	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in i minam hong it in kikhopna inn khat hong lamsak hi,” a ci uh hi.
42007006	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute tawh paikhawm a, galkap 100 ukpa inn a tunkuan uh ciangin amah in Zeisu kiangah a lawmte sawl a, hih bangin a gensak hi, “Topa aw, ka inn sunga nong lut ding kilawm lo ka hih manin hong kigimsak dah in.
42007007	Nangma kianga kong pai ding zong kilawm ka kisa tuan kei hi. Na kam tawh thu pia leteh ka nasempa a dam ding hi.
42007008	Banghang hiam cihleh kei zong mi khutnuai‑a om khat ka hi a, ka khutnuai ah zong galkapte a om uh hi. Amaute khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ka cih ciangin pai a, a dang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cih ciangin a hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a cisak hi.
42007009	Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin lamdangsa a, a kinunghei khit ciangin amah a zui mihonpite kiangah, “Ken kong cih in ah Israel mite sung nangawn ah hi zah a a lian upna ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.
42007010	A kisawl mite inn a tunkik uh ciangin a cina nasempa cidam in a om a mu uh hi.
42007011	A zingciang in Nain kici khua khatah Zeisu pai a, a nungzuite tampi le mihonpite in a zui uh hi.
42007012	Tua khua kulh kongpi a tunkuan uh ciangin misi khat a hong kizawngkhia hi. Tua misipa nu meigong hi a, amah bek tapa a neih ahi hi. Khuasung mi tampi in tua nu a zui uh hi.
42007013	Topa in tua nu a muh ciangin hehpihhuai sa a, ama kiangah, “Kap kei in,” a ci hi.
42007014	Amah in misi zawnna tal va naih a, a lawn ciangin misi zawngte a dinsa in a khawl uh hi. Amah in, “Tangvalpa aw, tho in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
42007015	Tua ciangin misipa hong tho in a pau hi. Zeisu in tua pa a nu khutah a ap hi.
42007016	Tua ciangin mi khempeuh lau mahmah uh a, “Eite lakah kamsang lian mahmah khat hong piang zo a, Pasian in a mite hong veh zo hi,” ci in Pasian a phat uh hi.
42007017	Ama thu Judea gam khempeuh le a kim a pam gamteng ah a kizel hi.
42007018	Tua ciangin John nungzuite in hih thu khempeuh ama kiangah a ko uh hi.
42007019	John in a nungzuite nih a kiangah samin Zeisu kiangah paisak a, “Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Ahih keileh a dang khat ka lamen lai ding uh hiam va ci un,” ci in a sawl hi.
42007020	Amaute Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin, “Tuiphumpa John in, ‘Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Ahih keileh a dang khat ka lamen lai ding uh hiam?’ ci in hong dongsak hi,” a ci uh hi.
42007021	Tua hun pen Zeisu in a zawngkhal mi tampi, natna nei mi tampi le dawilut mi tampi damsak in mittaw tampi zong khua a muhsak laitak ahi hi.
42007022	Zeisu in tua mi nihte kiangah, “Pai unla, na muhsa na zaksa teng uh John kiangah va gen un. Mittawte in khuamu in khebaite lam a pai uh hi. Miphakte dam uh a, bengngongte in khua a za uh hi. Misite thokik in mizawngte tungah lungdamna thu kitangko hi.
42007023	Keima hanga a puklo mi in mihampha ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42007024	John kamtaite a ciah khit uh ciangin, Zeisu in mihonpite kiangah John thu a gen in ah, “Gamlak ah bang en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? Huih in a mut cianga a kihuang diamdiam pumpeng kung peuh a en dinga pai na hi uh hiam?
42007025	Ahih keileh puannel niknek a silh mi khat a en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? En un, puanhoih a silh minuamsate kumpi inn sungah a teengte ahi uh hi.
42007026	Tua ahih leh bang en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa khat a en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? Hi mah hi. Ken kong cih in ah, kamsang khat sangin a lianzawpa ahi hi.
42007027	Lai Siangtho ah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘En in, nangma lampi a sialkhol dingin, Na mai ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl hi,’ ci a, a kigelhpa in amah ahi hi.
42007028	“Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah numei sung pana a suak mite lakah Tuiphumpa John sanga a lianzaw kamsang khat beek a om kei hi. Ahih hangin Pasian kumpigam sunga a om a neupenpa in John sangin a lianzaw hi,” a ci hi.
42007029	Zeisu thugen a za mi khempeuh le siahdongte nangawn in Pasian a thuman hi ci in a sang uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in John tuiphumna tawh tui a kiphumsate ahi uh hi.
42007030	Ahih hangin Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate in amaute aa dinga Pasian gelna nial in John khutah tui a kiphum nuam kei uh hi.
42007031	Tua ciangin Topa in, “Tulai khang mite bang tawh hong genteh ding ka hi hiam? Amaute bang tawh kibang uh ahi hiam?
42007032	Sumbuuk ah tu in, ‘Tamngai ka tumtum uh hangin, Na lam tuan kei uh a, Ka tam lawhlawh uh hangin, Na kap nuam kei uh hi,’ ci in khat le khat a kigal awtsan naupangte tawh na kibang uh hi.
42007033	“Tuiphumpa John in an nelo, lenggahzu dawn loin a hong pai ciangin, ‘Dawilawm nei hi,’ na ci uh hi.
42007034	Mihing Tapa hong pai a, anne tuidawn in a om ciangin, ‘En un, anhaipa, zuhaipa, siahdongte le mimawhte lawmpa hi,’ na ci zel uh hi.
42007035	Ahih hangin ciimna pen gamtatna khempeuh panin a hong kilangkhia hi,” a ci hi.
42007036	Tua khit ciangin Pharisee pawlte laka khatin an ne dingin Zeisu sam a, amah zong Pharisee pa inn ah pai in ankuang a um hi.
42007037	Tua laitak in tua khuasung a numei paktat khatin Pharisee pa inn ah Zeisu an ne in om hi cih a theih ciangin sathau namtui suangkang thawl khat tawi in a hong pai hi.
42007038	Zeisu nunglam a khe kiangah amah dingin kap a, a khitui tawh Zeisu khe a kawtsak hi. A sam tawh a khe nulsak in nam a, sathau namtui tawh a zut hi.
42007039	Zeisu a sam Pharisee pa in a muh ciangin, “Hihpa in kamsang taktak hi leh amah a lawng hih numei kua hi a, bangci bang mi hiam cih a thei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih numei in mawhnei mi ahi hi,” ci in a lungsim sungah a ngaihsun hi.
42007040	Tua ciangin Zeisu in Simon kiangah, “Simon aw, thu khat kong gen nuam hi,” a cih ciangin Simon in, “Sia aw, hong gen in,” a ci hi.
42007041	Zeisu in, “Mihaupa khat tungah mi nih in sum a ba uh hi. Khatin denariusɠ 500 ba a, a dang khatin 50 a ba hi.
42007042	Ahih hangin a loh nading neilo uh ahih manin a nihtuak un a maisak hi. Amaute gel kua penin sum neipa it zaw ding ahi hiam hong gen in,” a ci hi.
42007043	Simon in, “A tam zaw a kimaisakpa in it zaw dingin ka um hi,” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Na muhna a maan mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
42007044	Tua khit ciangin numeinu lamah kihei in Simon kiangah, “Hih numei na mu hiam? Na inn sungah kong lut a, ahi zongin ka khe sil nading tui nong lui kei hi. Hih numei in ahih leh a khitui tawh ka khe hong silsak a, a sam tawh hong nulsak hi.
42007045	Nang na hih leh nong nam kei hi. Hih numei in ahih leh kong lut khit a kipan ka khe a nam den hi.
42007046	Ka lu sathau nong nilhsak kei hi. Hih numei in ahih leh ka khe sathau namtui a hong nuhsak hi.
42007047	Tua ahih manin ken kong cih in ah, hih numei a mawhna tampi ka maisak manin hong it mahmah hi. A mawhna tawmkha a kimaisak mi in itna tawm bek a nei hi,” a ci hi.
42007048	Tua khit ciangin numeinu kiangah, “Na mawhnate kong maisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42007049	Tua ciangin ankuang a umpih mite in amaute lungsim sungah, “Mawhna nangawn a maisak hihpa kua hi peuhmah ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42007050	Tua khit ciangin amah in numeinu kiangah, “Na upna in nang hong honzo hi. Lungnuamtak in ciah in,” a ci hi.
42008001	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in Pasian kumpigam tawh kipawl lungdamna thu a tangko ding le a hilh dingin khuapi khuaneu khempeuh ah zin kawikawi a, sawm le nihte in zong a zui uh hi.
42008002	Dawigilote bawlsiatna pan le natna panin damna a ngah numeite in zong a zui uh hi. Tuate lakah dawi sagih a paikhiatna Magdala khua mi Mary zong a kihel hi.
42008003	Tua thamlo in Herod inn sunga nasemte a ukpa Chuza zi Joanna, Susanna le numei dang tampite in zong a zui uh hi. Hih numeite in amaute neihsa tawh Zeisu a panpihte ahi uh hi.
42008004	Khua khempeuh pana hong pai mihonpite a hong kisuktuah khop uh ciangin Zeisu in thugentehna khat a gen inah,
42008005	“Khaici vawhpa khat khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi. Khaici a vawh ciangin pawlkhat lampi ah tu ahih manin mite in tuangawp uh a, vana leng vasate in a nemang uh hi.
42008006	Pawlkhatte suang tungah tu a, leinom om lo ahih manin a po phetin a keutum pah hi.
42008007	Pawlkhatte ling lakah tu a, lingkungte tawh hong khangkhawm uh ahih manin lingkung in a depgawp hi.
42008008	Ahih hangin pawlkhatte leihoihna ah tu a, tuate a hong po ciangin a zah 100 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi. Hih thute a gen khit ciangin, “Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” ci in a kiko hi.
42008009	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Hih thugentehna a khiatna bang ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
42008010	Zeisu in, “Pasian kumpigam thusimte note kong theihsak hangin midangte tungah thugentehna tawh thu ka hilh hi. Hih thu in, ‘Amaute in a etet uh hangin mu loin, A zakzak uh hangin a theih loh nading uh ahi hi.’
42008011	“Tu in thugentehna a khiatna in hih bang ahi hi. Khaici in Pasian thu ahi hi.
42008012	Lampi a a kia khaicite in thu a zak khit uh ciangin um a, hotkhiatna a ngah loh nadingun Dawimangpa pai in amaute lungsim sunga om thute a lakkhiatsak mite ahi uh hi.
42008013	Suang laka a tu khaicite in thu a zak uh ciangin lungdamtak in a san uh hangin zungkha lo uh ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek um uh a, ze‑etna a tun ciangin a pukkik mite ahi uh hi.
42008014	Tu in ling laka a tu khaicite in thu a zak khit uh hunkhat khit ciangin nuntak nading lunghihmawhna, hauhnopna le noptat nopnate in depgawp a, picing zo loin a gahlo mite ahi uh hi.
42008015	Ahih hangin leihoihna muna a tu khaicite in lungsim gina le lungsim hoih a nei mite ahi uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin lenkip in thuakzawhhatna tawh gah a gahkhia mite ahi uh hi.
42008016	“Meivak a kivak ciangin kuamah in seeng a khuh ngei kei hi. Lupna nuai ah zong a koih ngei kei hi. Inn sunga a lut mi khempeuh in meitang a muh theih nadingun meivak tunna tungah a vak uh hi.
42008017	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipholak lo ding thusim bangmah om lo a, khuavak in tanin a kithei lo dinga a kiselsim thei bangmah a om kei hi.
42008018	Tua ahih manin na zaksa uh thu hoihtak in ngaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh a nei mi kipiak beh dinga, a neilo mi tung panin a neih sunsun nangawn a kilakkhiatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42008019	Tua laitak in a nu le a sanggamte amah tawh kimu nuamin hong pai uh a, mihonpi om ahih manin ama kiangah a pai thei kei uh hi.
42008020	Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in, “Na nu le na sanggamte nang tawh kimu nuamin a pualam ah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42008021	Ahi hangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Pasian thu za a, a zui mi peuhmah ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42008022	Ni khat, Zeisu in a nungzuite tawh gunkuang khatah tuangin, “Galkhat lamah galkah ni,” ci in a paikhia uh hi.
42008023	A pai laitak un Zeisu a ihmu hi. Tua laitak in tuilipi tungah huihpi hong nung a, gunkuang sungah tui dim dekdek ahih manin a lauhuai mahmah hi.
42008024	Tua ciangin a nungzuite pai in amah phong uh a, “Sia aw, Sia aw, a simang khin ding ka hita uh hi!” a ci uh hi. Amah tho in huihpi le tuihual a taii ciangin tuate khawl in a dai pah dide hi.
42008025	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Na upna uh koi ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in lamdangsa in lau mahmah uh a, “Bangci bang mi ahi hiam? Thu a piak ciangin huihpi le tuihual nangawn in a thu a mang uh hi!” a kici uh hi.
42008026	Tua ciangin Galilee tuilipi gal khat a om Gadara mite teenna kuam lamah gunkuang tuangin a galkah uh hi.
42008027	Gunkuang tung pan Zeisu a kum khit phetin dawi a lutzawh a sawt khinzo tua khua mi khatin a na dawntuah hi. Tua pa in puan silh loin inn ah zong om lo a, han lak peuh ah a teeng hi.
42008028	Amah in Zeisu a muh ciangin a mai ah bok a, a aw neih zah tawh kiko in, “A Sangbel Pasian Tapa Zeisu aw, nang tawh ka kisaina bang om ahi hiam? Nong bawlsiat loh nadingin kong thum hi!” a ci hi.
42008029	Banghang hiam cihleh tua pa sung panin tua dawigilo a taikhiat nading Zeisu in thu a pia zo hi. Tua dawigilo in tua pa man pahpah ahih manin sikkhau tawh khih uh a, a khekol bulh in a cin uh hangin tua a kikhihnate peksat in dawi in gamlak ah a hawlkhia pahpah hi.
42008030	Zeisu in, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci in a dot ciangin, amah in ama sungah dawi tampi om ahih manin, “Legionɠ,” a ci hi.
42008031	Tua dawite in mong neilo kuahawmpi sungah pai dingin thu a piak loh nadingin Zeisu kiangah a thum uh hi.
42008032	Tua laitak in mual tungah vokhonpi khat gamta in a om hi. Dawite in tua vokte sungah amaute a lutsak nadingin Zeisu kiangah ngen uh a, Zeisu in a phal hi.
42008033	Tua ciangin dawite zong tua pa sung panin paikhia in, vokte sungah a lut uh ciangin vokhonpite ken lakah taikeksuk uh a, tuili sung kidenna in a si khin uh hi.
42008034	Vokcingte in tua thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin tai uh a, khuasung le gam sungteng ah a va gen uh hi.
42008035	Tua ciangin thupiang teng en dingin khuasung mite hong pai uha Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin dawite a taikhiatna pa in puansilh in lungsim ngeina pua in Zeisu khe phungah tu‑a a om a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
42008036	Dawite a lutna pa a damsak dan a mu mite in tua khua mite kiangah a gensawn uh hi.
42008037	Tua ciangin Gadara kuam kima teeng mite khempeuh lau mahmah uh ahih manin amaute kiang pan Zeisu a paikhiat nadingin a ngen uh hi. Tua ciangin amah gunkuang tungah kah in a ciahkik hi.
42008038	Tu in dawite a taikhiatna pa in Zeisu zui nuamin a kun hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama kiangah,
42008039	“Na inn ah ciah inla, Pasian in nang aa dinga hong bawlsak nalianpite va gen in,” a ci hi. Tua pa ciahin Zeisu in ama aa dinga a bawl nalianpite khua sungteng ah a tangko hi.
42008040	Mi khempeuh in Zeisu a tunkik ding ngaklah mahmah uh a, a tun ciangin a dawn uh hi.
42008041	Tua laitak in Jairus kici kikhopna inn ukpa khat hong pai a, Zeisu khe phungah bokin a inn ah a hawh nadingin a thum hi.
42008042	Banghang hiam cihleh kum sawm le kum nih a pha a tanu neihsun si dektak in a om hi. Zeisu a pai laitak in mihonpite in amah a phugawp uh hi.
42008043	Tu in kum sawm le kum nih sung siluang natna a vei numei khat zong a om hi. Amah in a kivak nading teng nangawn siavuante guaihna in a zat khit hangin kuamah in a damsak zo kei hi.
42008044	Tua nu in Zeisu nunglam panin zuana a puanmongtep a va lawn ciangin a siluang lai thakhat in a kang hi.
42008045	Zeisu in, “Kua in hong lawng ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Mi khempeuh in a nial uh ciangin Peter le a lawmte in, “Sia aw, mihonpi hi zah ta in hong suknawk hong tonawk kimlai banghang in, ‘Kua in hong lawng hiam?’ cimawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42008046	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Mi khatin hong lawng mah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka sung pan vangliatna a paikhiat lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
42008047	Tua nu in kisel zolo ding ahihlam a theih ciangin lingkawmsa in Zeisu mai ah va bok a, amah a lawnna a hang le a lawn cianga a dam pahna thu mi khempeuh mai ah a gen hi.
42008048	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, lungnuam in. Na upna in hong damsak zo hi. Lungnuamtak in ciah in,” a ci hi.
42008049	Tua banga Zeisu a paupau laitak in kikhopna inn ukpa inn panin mi khat hong tung a, Jairus kiangah, “Na tanu sizo hi. Siapa buaisak nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
42008050	Tua thu Zeisu in a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Patau kei in. Um peuh leteh amah a hingkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42008051	Kikhopna inn ukpa inn ah Zeisu a tun ciangin Peter, James, John, le numeino nu le pate bek inn sungah a lutsak hi.
42008052	Tu in mi khempeuh in numeino nu sihna hangin kap le mau in a om ngeingai uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Kap kei un, amah a si hilo in a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42008053	Amaute in numeino a sih khitlam thei uh ahih manin Zeisu zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi.
42008054	Amah in amaute khempeuh pusuaksak a, tua khit ciangin numeino a khut ah len in, “Numeino aw, tho in,” ci in a sam hi.
42008055	Tua ciangin numeino a kha hong ciahkik a, thakhat in a tho hi. Tua ciangin nek theih khatpeuh a piak nadingun thu a pia hi.
42008056	A nu le a pa in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, ahi zongin Zeisu in kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun thu a pia hi.
42009001	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a nungzui sawm le nihte khawm a, dawi khempeuh hawlkhiat theih nading le natna damsak theih nading vangliatna le thuneihna a piak khitteh,
42009002	Pasian kumpigam thu a hilh ding le cinate a damsak dingin amaute a sawlkhia hi.
42009003	Amaute kiangah, “Lampi a na zat ding uh ciangkhut, thungip, nek theih le sum le pai a kipan bangmah keng kei un. Puanak silh nih kengthuah kei un.
42009004	Na zin tunna peuhpeuh uhah tua khuapan na paikhiat masiah uh tamsuak un.
42009005	Zin hong tungsaklo mi a om leh tua khuapan na paikhiat uh ciangin note khepek tunga leivuite singkhia un. Tua in amaute langkhat ah teci a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009006	Tua ciangin nungzuite kuankhia in khua khempeuh pha uh a, mun khempeuh ah lungdamna thu tangko in cinate a damsak uh hi.
42009007	Tu in gam uk mangpa Herod in, Zeisu nasep teng za a, a lungmang mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh pawlkhat in, “Misite lak pan John hong thokik hi,” a ci uh hi.
42009008	A dang pawlkhat in, “Elijah hong kilang hi,” ci uh a, a dang pawlkhat in, “Tanglai kamsangte khat hong thokik hi,” a ci uh hi.
42009009	Herod in, “John lah a ngawng ka tansa hi a, hih bang thute ka zak mipa kua hi peuhmah ding hiam?” ci in Zeisu a mu nuam mahmah hi.
42009010	Sawltakte a hong tunkik uh ciangin a sepna teng uh Zeisu kiangah a gen uh hi. Amah in amaute a tuamin samkhia a, Bethsaida khuahuam gamlak ah a paipih hi.
42009011	Mihonpite in a theih uh ciangin va zuan uh a, amah in amaute na sang a, Pasian kumpigam thu hilhin damna kisamte a damsak hi.
42009012	Ni tumkuan ciangin sawm le nihte ama kiangah hong pai in, “Giah nading le annek ding a zong dingin mihonpite hih kima om khuapi khuaneute ah sawlkhia in. Banghang hiam cihleh eite i omna in gamlak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
42009013	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “A nek ding uh khat peuhpeuh pia un,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Hih mite khempeuh nek ding va lei ding ka hih kei uh leh anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42009014	Banghang hiam cihleh a picingsa pasal bekbek zong 5,000 bang a pha uh hi. Amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “50 ta in tusak un,” a ci hi.
42009015	Amaute in zong tua bangin mi khempeuh a tusak uh hi.
42009016	Tua khit ciangin amah in anlum nga le ngasa nihte la a, vantung ento in thupha a pia hi. Tua khit ciangin balkham a, mihonpite mai ah lui dingin nungzuite a pia hi.
42009017	Tua ciangin a vekpi un a kham phitphet in a ne uh hi. A kikhamval a themneng teng a khop uh ciangin lawh sawm le lawh nih dim a ngah uh hi.
42009018	Khatvei Zeisu bek thungen a a om laitak in a nungzuite in va pawl uh hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Mite in kei kua hi hong ci uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
42009019	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Pawlkhat in Tuiphumpa John hi hong ci uh hi. A dang pawlkhat in Elijah hi hong ci uh hi. A dang pawlkhat in tanglai kamsangte khat hong thokik hi hong ci uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
42009020	Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua ahih leh note in kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” a ci hi. Peter in, “Pasian Sathau‑nilhpa na hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42009021	Amah in hih thu kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun khauhtak in kham a,
42009022	“Mihing Tapa in gimna tampi thuak dinga, makaite, siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in a nial ding uh hi. Amah kithat dinga a ni thum ni in a kithosakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009023	Tua khit ciangin amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuihnop leh ama pumpi nial henla nisim in a singlamteh pua in ka nung hong zui hen.
42009024	Banghang hiam cihleh ama nuntakna a hu nuam mi in a nuntakna a tan ding hi. Keima hanga a nuntakna a tan mi in ama nuntakna hu ahi ding hi.
42009025	Mi khatin leitung buppi a ngah hangin a nuntakna mangthang in kisia leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?
42009026	Keimah le ka thu a hong maizumpih mi peuhmah Mihing Tapa in ama vangliatna, a Pa vangliatna le a siangtho vantungmite vangliatna tawh hong pai ciangin a maizumpih ding hi.
42009027	Ahih hangin a maan takpi kong cih in ah hihlai a a ding mi pawlkhat in Pasian kumpigam a muh mateng un a si kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009028	Hih thute a genzawh ni giat khit bang ciangin Peter, John le James‑te tonpih in thungen dingin mualtung ah a kahto uh hi.
42009029	Thu a nget laitak in ama mel kikhel a, a puan zong pakin a tee deldel hi.
42009030	Tua ciangin en in, amah mi nih tawh kiho a, tua mi nihte in Moses le Elijah ahi uh hi.
42009031	Amaute gel zong a vang uh tangin hong kilang uh a, a sawtlo in Jerusalem ah Zeisu sih nading thu a kikum uh hi.
42009032	Ahi zongin Peter le a lawmte a ihmut uh suak mahmah ahih manin a lusu uh hi. A khanlawh uh ciangin Zeisu vangtang le amah tawh a dingkhawm mi nihte a mu uh hi.
42009033	Tua mi nihte Zeisu kiang pan a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Peter in Zeisu kiangah, “Sia aw, hih muna om nuam ka sa uh hi. Nang aa ding buuk khat, Moses aa ding buuk khat, Elijah aa ding buuk khat, buuk thum kong lamsak ding uh hi,” ci in a gen thu bangmah theilopi in a pau hi.
42009034	Tuateng a gen laitak mahin meii lompi khat hong kai in amaute tuama meii lakah a om uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
42009035	Tua ciangin meii lak pan aw khat hong ging a, “Hihpa in ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na mang un,” a ci hi.
42009036	Tua awging a khawl ciangin Zeisu bek a mu uh hi. Amaute in tua huna a muhte uh kuama kiangah gen loin a iimcip uh hi.
42009037	A zingciang in amaute mualtung pan kumsuk uh a, mihonpi in amah a na dawn uh hi.
42009038	Tua ciangin mihonpite lak panin thakhat thu in pasal khat hong kikokhia a, “Sia aw, ka tapa nong etsak nadingin kong thum hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in ka ta neihsun ahi hi.
42009039	En in, dawi in amah a mat ciangin thakhat in kikokhia a, a cilphuan kai in a kongkawgawp pahpah hi. A mat khit nak leh khahpak nawnlo ahih manin a tha a zaw dikdek hi.
42009040	Tua hi a, tua dawigilo hawlkhia dingin na nungzuite ka kut hangin a hawlkhia zo kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009041	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Upna a neilo, a lehtat khang mite aw, bang tanvei hong ompih dinga, bang tanvei hong thuak ding ka hi hiam? Na tapa hi lai ah hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
42009042	Tua pasalno Zeisu kiangah a hong pai laitak in dawi in sawnpai in a kongkawsak hi. Zeisu in tua dawigilo taii in pasalno damsak a, a pa kiangah a pia hi.
42009043	Mi khempeuh in Pasian vangliatna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Amaute in Zeisu bawl nate lamdangsa a a om laitak un amah in a nungzuite kiangah,
42009044	“Mihing Tapa mite khutah hong kipiakhia ta ding ahih manin hih ka thugente note bil ah lutsak in ciamteh un,” a ci hi.
42009045	Ahi zongin a thugente amaute in a tel zawhloh nadingun ki‑iim ahih manin tel zolo uh a, ahih hangin a dongkik ngam kei uh hi.
42009046	Tua ciangin amaute lakah kua lianpen ding cih thu a kisel uh hi.
42009047	Zeisu in amaute lungsim ngaihsutna thei ahih manin naupangno khat samin a kiangah a dingsak hi.
42009048	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “Keima min tawh hih naupangno a sang mi in kei hong sang ahi hi. Kei hong sang mi in kei hong sawlpa zong a sang ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note khempeuh laka a neupenpa in a lianpenpa a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009049	Tua ciangin John in, “Sia aw, nangma min tawh dawite a hawlkhia mi khat ka mu uh a, amah in eite hong zui lo ahih manin ka kham uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009050	Zeisu in, “Kham kei un. Eite a hong langpanlo mi in eite lamah a pang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42009051	Zeisu a kilaktoh ding hun a nai ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah paitoh ding tuppen in a nei hi.
42009052	Amah in kamtaite sawlkhol a, tua mite zong pai in ama aa ding mun bawl dingin Samaria khua khatah a lut uh hi.
42009053	Ama tuppen in Jerusalem khuapi ah paitoh ding ahih manin Samaria khua mite in a sang kei uh hi.
42009054	A nungzui James le John‑te in tua thu a theih uh ciangin, “Topa aw, Elijah in ahih bangin vantung pan meikuang samin amaute kangtumsak le ung nong awi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42009055	Zeisu kihei in amaute taii a, “Bang lungsim nei na hi uh hiam cih na thei kei uh hi.
42009056	Mihing Tapa in mite nuntakna susia dinga hong pai hilo in a hon dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin khua dang khatah a pai uh hi.
42009057	Lampi ah a pai laitak un mi khatin ama kiangah, “Topa aw, na paina peuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009058	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ngiate in kua nei uh a, vana leng vasate in zong bu a nei uh hi. Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngakh nading mun a nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
42009059	Tua ciangin amah in midang khat kiangah, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tua pa in, “Topa aw, ka pa vui dingin hong paisak masa phot in,” a ci hi.
42009060	Zeisu in, “Misi pen misite mahin na vui uh hen. Nang na hih leh pai inla, Pasian kumpigam thu va tangko in,” a ci hi.
42009061	Tua ciangin midang khatin zong, “Topa aw, kong zui ding hi. Ahi zongin ka innkuanpihte mangpha hong khak masa sak in,” a ci hi.
42009062	Zeisu in, “Lo kaihna letsan lenkawm sa a, a nunglam a en mi peuhmah Pasian kumpigam tawh kituak lo hi,” a ci hi.
42010001	Hih thuteng khit ciangin Topa in a dang mi 70 sehkhia in a sawtlo a ama zin nading khuapi khuaneu khempeuh ah nihta nihta in a paikholsak hi.
42010002	Amah in amaute kiangah, “An lak ding tam mahmah a, ahih hangin nasem ding mi a tawm hi. Tua ahih manin an nei Topa in ama an la dingin nasemte hong sawl nading thungen un.
42010003	Note va kuankhia un. En un, ngiate laka kikhah tuunote bangin note kong khah hi.
42010004	Sumbawm, thungip, khedapte keng kei un. Lampi ah na pai laitak un kuamah hopih kei un.
42010005	“Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin, ‘Hih inn ah nopna om tahen,’ ci masa un.
42010006	Tua inn ah nopna ngah dinga kilawm mi a om leh note piak nopna tua inn ah tung dinga, a om kei leh note kiangah hong kilehkik ding hi.
42010007	Inn khatah omsuak unla, zintunna khel kawikawi kei un. Na a sem mi in thaman a ngah ding kilawm ahih manin annek tuidawn hong kipia bangbang ne un.
42010008	“Khua khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin zin a hong tunsak uh leh note mai a hong kilui peuhpeuh ne un.
42010009	Tua khua sunga cinate damsak un. ‘Pasian kumpigam note kiang hong tung dekta hi,’ ci in gen un.
42010010	Ahih hangin khua khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin tua khua mite in a hong nolh uh leh khua sung kongzing lakah pai unla,
42010011	‘Kote tunga hong bang na khua leivuite uh note a hong langpan dingin ka nulkhia uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian kumpigam note kiang hong tung dekta hi cih theita un,’ ci in gen un.
42010012	Ken kong cih in ah tua Ni ciangin tua khua in Sodom khuapi sangin gimna a thuak zaw ding hi.
42010013	“Chorazin khua aw, gimna na thuak ding hi! Bethsaida khua aw, gimna na thuak ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh note sunga kibawl nalamdangte, Tyre le Sidon khua ah kibawl hileh, amaute sawtpi lai in a mawhna uh kisikkik in tukawm in ippi puan silhin vut a kibuak ding uh hi.
42010014	Ahih hangin Pasian in thu a khen ni ciangin note in Tyre le Sidon khuapite sangin gimna na thuak zaw ding uh hi.
42010015	Pasian in vantung donga hong lapsang Capernaum khua aw, Hadesɠ dongah hong kikhiasuk ding hi.
42010016	“Note thu a hong ngai mi in keima thu a hong ngai ahi hi. Note a hong nial mi in kei hong nial ahi hi. Kei a hong nial mi in kei hong sawlpa zong a nial ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42010017	Tua ciangin 70te lungdamtak in hong ciahkik uh a, “Topa aw, nangma min hangin dawite nangawn in kote thu hong mang uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42010018	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Satan in vantung panin khuaphialep banga hong tuaksuk ka mu hi.
42010019	En un, gulte le aikamte na tuatcil nading uh le galpa vangliatna khempeuh na zawh nadingun thuneihna kong pia hi. Note bangmah in hong siasak theilo ding hi.
42010020	Ahi zongin, dawite in na thu uh hong man manin lungdam kei unla, vantung ah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdam zaw un,” a ci hi.
42010021	Tua laitak in Kha sungah Zeisu a lungkim mahmah a, “Vantung le leitung Topa ahi ka Pa aw, mipil misiamte tungah hih thute iim in naungekte tungah na lah manin nang kong phat hi. Hi mah hi. Pa aw, hih in nangma lungkimna ahi hi.
42010022	“Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei a hong ap khinzo hi. Tapa kua hiam cih Pa longal in thei lo a, Pa kua hiam cih zong Tapa le, Tapa in a theihsak nop mite bekin a thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42010023	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite lamah kihei in a gensim in ah, “Note in hih nate mu na hih manun na mit uh a hampha hi.
42010024	Banghang hiam cihleh kamsangte le kumpi tampite in na muh uh hih nate a muhnop uh hangin a mu kha kei uh hi. Na zak uh hih thute a zaknop uh hangin, a za kha kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42010025	Tua ciangin, en in, thukhamhilh siapa khat Zeisu ze‑et nuamin hong dingto a, “Sia aw, bang hihleng nuntak tawntungna luah thei ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
42010026	Amah in, “Thukham sungah bang kigelh a, nang bangci bangin thei na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
42010027	Amah in, “ ‘Na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh le na ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh Topa na Pasian it in. Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,’ ci in kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
42010028	Zeisu in, “Nong dawnna a maan hi. Tua bangin hih lecin na nungta ding hi,” a ci hi.
42010029	Ahih hangin tua pa in amah le amah kidiksak nuam ahih manin, Zeisu kiangah, “Tua ahih leh ka vengpa kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42010030	Zeisu in, “Mi khat, Jerusalem khuapi panin Jericho khua ah a paisuk leh lampi ah misuamte a tuak kha hi. Amaute in a puan suahkhiatsak uh a, satliam in, a silo bekin nusia in a paisan uh hi.
42010031	Tua laitak in siampipa khat tualam tawnin hong pai a, tua pa a muh ciangin lamnawl ah pelin a paisan hi.
42010032	Tuamah bangin Levi mipa khat zong hong pai a, tua mun a tun ciangin tua pa en in lamnawl ah pelin a paisan leuleu hi.
42010033	Ahih hangin Samaria mi khualzin khat hong pai in, tua pa kianga tun ciangin mu a, hehpihhuai a sa hi.
42010034	Amah tua pa kiangah va pai a, a liammate sathau le lenggahzu nuhsak in puan tawh a tun hi. Tua khit ciangin ama laa tungah pua in zintun buuk khatah paipih a, tualai ah a khoi hi.
42010035	A zingciang in sumtang denariusɠ nih lakhia in zintun buuk neipa pia a, ‘Hihpa na khoisak in. Hihteng bana na zat khempeuh kong paikik ciangin kong loh ding hi,’ ci in a paikhia hi.
42010036	“Tua mi thumte sung panin kua pen a kisuam mipa vengpa hi dingin na ngaihsun hiam?” a ci hi.
42010037	Thukhamhilh siapa in, “Amah a hehpihpa ahi hi,” a ci hi. Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Pai inla, nang zong tua bangin hih in,” a ci hi.
42010038	Zeisu le a nungzuite a pai kawmkawm un khua khatah amah lut a, Martha kici numei khatin a inn ah Zeisu a tungsak hi.
42010039	Martha in Mary kici sanggam numei khat nei a, tua nu Zeisu khephung ah tu in a thugente a ngai hi.
42010040	Martha pen annek bawl in manlah ahih manin, Zeisu kiangah va pai a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamnu in annek bawl ding kei bek hong khiat awi na hi hiam? Hong huh nadingin sawl dih in,” a ci hi.
42010041	Zeisu in Martha kiangah, “Martha, Martha aw, lung hih mawhna na hau a, na lung a gim hi.
42010042	Ahi zongin a kisam na khat bek om a, Mary in a hoih zaw tua na teel khin ahih manin a kilakkhiatsak kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42011001	Khatvei munkhat ah Zeisu in thungen a, a thunget a man ciangin a nungzuite khat in, “Topa aw, John in a nungzuite a hilh bangin ko zong thungetzia hong hilh in,” a ci hi.
42011002	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin ngen un. Vantung a om kote Pa aw, Na min siangtho kizahtak hen. Na kumpigam hong tung tahen. Vantung ah na deihna a kisep mah bangin, Leitung ah zong kisem tahen.
42011003	Nisim a ka khamkhop ding uh, An hong pia in.
42011004	Ko tung a hong mawhte, Ka maisak mah bangun, Kote mawhna zong hong maisak ta in. Ze‑etna sungah hong lutsak kei in, Gilopa vangliatna pan hong honkhia in, ci in na ngen un,” a ci hi.
42011005	Tua khit ciangin amah in, “Note lakah mi khatin lawmkhat nei in tua a lawmpa kiangah zankimpi in va pai in, ‘Lawm aw, anlum thum hong leitawisak in.
42011006	Ka lawmpa khat khualzin hong tung a, amah ka lui ding bangmah ka nei kei hi,’ a va ci hi.
42011007	“Tua ciangin a lawmpa in a innsung panin, ‘Hong nawngkaisak kei in. Kong kikalh khinzo a, ka tate tawh zong lum khinzo ka hih manin hong tho in bangmah kong pia zo kei ding hi,’ a ci hi.
42011008	Ken kong cih in ah a lawmpa ahihna tawh tho‑a a piak loh hangin kisuang theilo in a nget teitei manin amah tho in a deih zahzah a pia ding hi.
42011009	“Tua hi a, note kianga kong gen in ah ngen un, hong kipia ding hi. Zong un, na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak kiu un, hong kihon ding hi.
42011010	Banghang hiam cihleh a ngen khempeuh in a ngah hi. A zong mi in a mu hi. Kong a kiu mi a kihon hi.
42011011	“Note lakah a tapa in a pa kiangah anlum ngen leh suangtum a pia ding, ngasa ngen leh ngasa tangin gul a pia ding kua om na hi uh hiam?
42011012	Aaktui ngen leh aikam peuh pia ding ahi hiam?
42011013	Mihoihlo ahi note nangawn in na tate uh na hoih piak ding thei na hih uh leh vana om na Pa un a ngen mite Kha Siangtho hong pia zawkan ding hilo ahi hiam!” a ci hi.
42011014	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a pau theilo dawi khat, mi khat sung panin hawlkhia a, dawi a paikhiat khit phetin tua a pautheilopa pauthei ahih manin mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42011015	Ahih hangin amaute pawlkhat in, “Amah in dawi mangpipa Beelzebubɠ min suanga dawite a hawlkhia ahi hi,” a cihsan uh hi.
42011016	Pawlkhatte in amah a ze‑etna un van pan limlamdang khat a piansak nadingin a ngen uh hi.
42011017	Ahi zongin Zeisu in a ngaihsutna uh thei ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Kumpigam khat peuhpeuh a kiphelkhap leh hawmsuak dinga, a kilemlo innkuan peuhmah a khuasuak kei ding hi.
42011018	Beelzebubɠ min suangin dawite hawlkhia hi nong cih uh Satan zong amah le amah kilangneih leh ama kumpigam bangci in kip thei ding ahi hiam?
42011019	Ken Beelzebubɠ min suanga dawite hawlkhia ka hih leh na tate un kua min suangin hawlkhia uh ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amaute in note tungah thu a hong khente a suak ding uh hi.
42011020	Ahi zongin Pasian vangliatna tawh dawite hawlkhia ka hih manin note kiangah Pasian kumpigam hong tungzo hi.
42011021	“Mi thahatpa in galvan kimtak tawh a inn a cin laiteng a neihsate a bit hi.
42011022	Ahih hangin amah sanga a thahat zaw khat hong pai in a zawhgawp ciangin a muan mahmah a galvan teng laksak in a van dangteng zong a hawmthang uh hi.
42011023	“Kei lam a panglo peuhmah kei hong langpan mi hi a, kei a hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang mi ahi hi.
42011024	“Dawigilo khatin mihing sung pan a paikhiat khit ciangin tui om lohna leikeu tengah vak kawikawi in tawlngak nading mun a zong hi. A muh loh ciangin, ‘Ka paikhiatna inn mahah ciahkik ning,’ a ci hi.
42011025	A tun ciangin tua inn kiphiat, kipuah sinsen a om a mu hi.
42011026	Tua ciangin amah va pai in amah sanga a gilo zaw a dang dawi sagih va sam a, tua inn ah lutpih in a teeng uh hi. Tua mi dinmun in a masa dinmun sangin a sia zaw hi,” a ci hi.
42011027	Amah in hih thute a gen laitak in mihonpite lak panin numei khat hong kiko a, “A gil sungah nang hong pai a, a nawi na tep numei in thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42011028	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Hi mah hi, tua sangin Pasian thu za a, a zuite in thupha a ngah zawlai uh hi,” a ci hi.
42011029	Mi tampi a hon a hon in a hong kikhop uh ciangin Zeisu in, “Tulai khangin khang gilo ahi hi. Nalamdang a kalh uh hangin kamsangpa Jonah tunga a piang limlamdang longal a dang kipia lo ding hi.
42011030	Banghang hiam cihleh Jonah in Nineveh khua mite aa dingin theihsakna lim a suah bangin Mihing Tapa in zong tulai khang mite aa dingin theihsakna lim a suak ding hi.
42011031	Thukhen ni ciangin Leitaw lam kumpinu hong dingin tulai khang mite a mawhsak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Solomon pilna ngai dingin leimong khat panin amah a hong pai hi. En un, Solomon sanga a lianzawpa hi lai ah a om hi.
42011032	Thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khua mite hong dingto ding uh a, tulai khang mite a mawhsak ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Jonah tangkona hangin amaute mawhna a kisikkik uh hi. En un, Jonah sanga a lianzawpa hi lai ah a om hi.
42011033	“Kuamah in mei a vak ciangin a kawmbu lak peuh, lawhnuai peuh ah a koih kei uh hi. Inn sunga a lut mite in meitang a muh theih nadingun meivak tunna tungah a koih uh hi.
42011034	Mittang in pumpi aa dingin meivak ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na mit a ciim leh na pumpi bup tang dinga, na mit a siat leh na pumpi bup a mial ding hi.
42011035	Tua ahih manin na sunga om khuavak a mial loh nadingin kingaihsun in.
42011036	Na pumpi bup tangin a mialna mun a om kei leh meivak tang in khuavak a piak bangin na pum tung khempeuh a vak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42011037	Tua banga thu a gen laitak in Pharisee pawlte lak panin khatin amah an ne dingin sam ahih manin inn sungah lutin ankuang a um hi.
42011038	Zeisu in an a nekma in a khutsil masa lo ahih manin, tua Pharisee pa in a muh ciangin lamdang a sa hi.
42011039	Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “No, Pharisee pawlte in hai le kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh hi. Ahih hangin note sungah duhhop huaihamna le gitlohna a dim hi.
42011040	No, mihaite aw, a pualam a bawlpa in a sunglam zong bawl hilo ahi hiam?
42011041	Tua ahih manin na neih bangbang uh mizawngte huh zaw le uh teh note aa dingin na khempeuh a siang ding hi.
42011042	“No, Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh lengmasel, masala le anteh nam khempeuh sawm a khat na pia uh hi. Ahih hangin thuman le Pasian it nading thute na thudon kei uh hi. Hihte khempeuh na hih ding uh hi a, paihkhiat na neih ding uh hilo hi.
42011043	“No, Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh kikhopna innte ah tutna thupi tata na deih uh a, sumbuuk ah hong kizahtak bawl ding na ut uh hi.
42011044	“A kineihkhem thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a kilanglo hankhuk tawh na kibang uh hi. Tua hante tungah mite a paipai uh hangin hankhuk ahihlam a thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42011045	Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siate khatin ama kiangah, “Sia aw, hih bang na cih ciangin kote zong a hong selpho na hi hi,” a ci hi.
42011046	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Thukhamhilh siate aw, note in zong gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh van gikpite midangte na suan uh a, note in lah na khutme dawn nangawn uh tawh na lawng nuam kei uh hi.
42011047	“Note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh kamsangte han ding na bawl uh a, na pu na pate un amaute a that uh hi.
42011048	Na pu na pate un a thah kamsangte hante na bawl uh ciangin na pu na pate uh gamtatna teng a thukimpih na hihna uh teci a pang na hi uh hi.
42011049	Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama pilna tawh a gen in ah, ‘Amaute kiangah kamsangte le sawltakte ka sawl dinga, amaute in pawlkhat thatin pawlkhat a bawlsia ding uh hi.’
42011050	Tua ahih manin leitung piancil a kipan a luansak uh kamsang khempeuhte sisan,
42011051	Abel sisan a kipan biaknatau le biakbuuk kikal a a thah uh Zechariah sisan dongin tulai khang mite tungah a kisikkik ding hi. Hi hi, ken kong cih in ah tua sisante tulai khang mite tungah a kisik ding hi.
42011052	“Thukhamhilh siate aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh thu theihna kong tawhtang nei napi in na kemcip uh hi. Note lah lut loin a lut nuam mite lah na khaktan uh hi,” a ci hi.
42011053	Amah in hih thute a gen khit ciangin thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in nakpitak in amah langpan uh a, thu tampi a leh lamlam in a dong huan uh hi.
42011054	Ama kampauna tawh man a, a mawhmat theih nadingun a pangsim gige uh hi.
42012001	Tua laitak in sim zawhloh dinga a tam mihonpite hong kikaikhawm uh a, khat le khat kisik kha zah dongin om ngeingai uh hi. Zeisu in a nungzuite thu hilh masa a, “Pharisee pawlte kineihkhemna silngo na kidawm un.
42012002	Banghang hiam cihleh a kilang lo dingin a kisincip, a kithei lo dinga kiselsim thei bangmah a om kei hi.
