42012003	Tua ahih manin khuamial sunga na genteng uh khuavak sungah a kiza ding hi. Innsung tawnga na kigensim thute uh innkhumzang ah a kitangko khia ding hi.
42012004	“Lawmte aw, ken kong gen in ah pumpi a thah theih hangin a dang bangmah a cih thei nawnlote kihta kei un.
42012005	Ahi zongin na kihtak ding uh kua ahi hiam cih kong gen ding hi. Pumpi a thah khit ciangin hellɠ sungah khiat theihna thu a neipa na kihta un. Hi hi, ken kong cih in ah na kihtak ding uh tua pa ahi hi!
42012006	Kawlgit nga ciangin dangkasanɠ nih tawh kizuak hilo ahi hiam? Pasian in tua kawlgitte khat nangawn a mangngilh kei hi.
42012007	Note luzang a samzang omteng a vekpi in a kisim khinzo hi. Tua ahih manin lau kei un. Kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha zaw uh hi.
42012008	“Ken kong cih in ah mite mai‑a kei hong pulak mi peuhmah Mihing Tapa in zong Pasian vantungmite mai ah a pulak ding hi.
42012009	Mite mai‑a kei a hong nial peuhmah Pasian vantungmite mai ah ka nial ding hi.
42012010	Tua hi a, Mihing Tapa langpan in a gensiate peuhmah a kimaisak ding hi. Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho tunga a pausia mi peuhmah a kimaisak kei ding hi.
42012011	“Tu in kikhopna innte ah ahi a, makaite le thuneite mai ah ahi zongin note a hong paipih uh ciangin bang thu genin bangci gen ding ka hi uh hiam cih lungkham kei un.
42012012	Banghang hiam cihleh tua hun ciangin Kha Siangtho in na gen ding uh thu a hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
42012013	Tua laitak in mihonpi lak pan khatin, “Sia aw, ka sanggampa in ama gamh hong hop nading hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
42012014	Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Mipa aw, note tunga thukhen ding le note gamh hawm dingin kua in kei hong seh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42012015	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Deihgawhna lungsim na neih khakloh nadingun hoihtak in kidawm un. Banghang hiam cihleh mihing nuntakna in neih le lam a bucin manin a kicing ahi kei hi,” a ci hi.
42012016	Tua khit ciangin amah in thugentehna khat gen a, “Mihaupa khat lo panin an tampi a piang hi.
42012017	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Ka an khol nading om nawnlo ahih manin bang cih leng hoih ding hiam?’ ci in a ngaihsun hi.
42012018	“Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hih bangin ka hih ding hi. Ka ansalte phelkhia in a lianzaw in ka lam dinga, ka an khempeuh le ka vanteng ka koih ding hi.
42012019	Tua ciangin ka kha kiangah, “Ka kha aw, kum tampi na khom dingin na tampi kong kholsak zo hi. Om hithiat inla, nene dawndawn in, a nuam theithei in om in,” ka ci ding hi, ’ a ci hi.
42012020	“Ahih hangin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mi haipa aw! Tuzan ciangin na kha kila ding hi. Na kholsa tua nate kua in ngah ding ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
42012021	“Tua ahih manin ama aa ding bekin neihsa khol a, Pasian mai ah a khollo mi in tua pa tawh a kibang ding hi,” a ci hi.
42012022	Tua khit ciangin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Tua hi a, note kianga kong gen in ah bang ka ne ding hiam, ci in nuntak nading lungkham kei un. Bang silh dinga bang teeng ding ka hi hiam, ci in pumpi aa dingin lungkham kei un.
42012023	Nek le dawn sangin nuntakna thupi zaw a, silh le teen sangin pumpi a thupi zaw hi.
42012024	Va‑aakte na lungngai un. Amaute in khaici tuh lo, an zong la loin, bem le sal zong a nei kei uh hi. Ahi zongin, Pasian in amaute an a vak hi. Vasate sangin note manpha zawtham hilo na hi uh hiam?
42012025	Na lungkham manun na tun sanna uh tong khat nangawn a khan thei kua om na hi uh hiam?
42012026	Hih bang thu neupen khat nangawn hih theilo na hih uh leh banghang in a dangte lungkham pih na hi uh hiam?
42012027	“Unok pakte khanzia ngaihsun dih un. Amaute in na sem loim khau zong a khek kei uh hi. Ahi zongin ken kong cih in ah Solomon in a minthanna puan tawh kizem a a om laitak nangawn in hih pakte khat zahin hoih zolo hi.
42012028	Upna neu mite aw, tuni in lo lai ah po in, zingciang in mei‑a a kikhultum ding lopate nangawn Pasian in tua bangin zem ahih leh note hong zem zawkan lo ding ahi hiam?
42012029	Tua ahih manin na nek na dawn ding uh zong masa kei unla, lunghimawh kei un.
42012030	Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite in tua nate zon masak in a nei uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh na Pa un a hong thei hi.
42012031	Pasian kumpigam zong masa le uh teh hih nate a hong piakthuah ding hi.
42012032	“Tuuhonte aw, lau kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh na Pa un note tungah kumpigam a hong piak ding pen ama lungkimna ahi hi.
42012033	Na neihsate uh zuak unla mizawngte huhna in zang un. Tua bangin a luitheilo sumbawm bawl unla a bei theilo dingin vantung ah sum na khol un. Tualai ah gutate in gu theilo in ngetin zong a ne thei kei hi.
42012034	Banghang hiam cihleh na sum omna munah na lungsim zong a om ding hi.
42012035	“Na kawng uh gak unla, na meivak uh vaksa in koih un.
42012036	A topa uh mopawi panin a hong ciahkik a hong tun ciangin, kong hong kiu dinga a hon thei pah dingin a ngak mite bangin na om un.
42012037	A topa uh hong ciah ciangin a na ngaka om a muh nasemte in mihampha ahi uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amah in a kawnggak in a nasemte an ne dingin a tusak hi. Tua ciangin amah hong pai in an a lui hi.
42012038	Amah zanvil nihna hunin hong tung ta leh, zanvil thumna hunin hong tung ta leh tua banga a om a muh nasemte in mihampha ahi uh hi.
42012039	Ahi zongin hih thu thei un. Inn neipa in gutapa pai ding hun theikhol hi leh pang gige in a inn a luhsak kei ding hi.
42012040	Tua ahih ciangin na upmawh loh laitak un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahih manin note zong kigingsa in om un,” a ci hi.
42012041	Tua ciangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, hih thugentehna kote aa ding beka nong gen ahi hiam? Ahih keileh mi khempeuh aa dinga na gen ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42012042	Tua ciangin Topa in, “A hun a tun ciangin a innkuanpihte annek tuidawn ding a vaihawmsak dinga a topa in a koih, a muanhuai le a lungpil neihsa kempa kua ahi hiam?
42012043	A topa hong tun ciangin tua banga om nasem a muh nasempa in mihampha ahi hi.
42012044	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amah in a neihsa khempeuh tua nasempa a uksak ding hi.
42012045	Ahih hangin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong tungbaih nailo ding hi,’ ci in, a topa nasemte, numei pasal ci loin satin vua henla, anne tuidawn, zukham ankham in om leh,
42012046	a lametloh ni le a theihloh kalin a topa hong tungvat dinga, a topa in tua nasempa tumnih suahin thu‑umlote tawh a thuakkhawmsak ding hi.
42012047	“A topa deihna thei napi in kiging lo a, a topa deihna banga a semlo nasempa in tamveipi satna a thuak ding hi.
42012048	Ahi zongin a topa deihna a theih loh manin a sathuai nasep a sem kha nasempa in a tawm zaw satna a thuak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tampi a kipia mi tung panin a tam zaw kisikkik dinga, tampi a ki‑apte tung panin a tam zaw a kingenkik ding hi.
42012049	“Leitung ah meikuang khah dinga hong pai ka hi a, tua mei a kuang khin hi leh ka ut hi.
42012050	Ahi zongin ka thuak ding baptize na khat om a, tua ka zawh mateng ka lung a gim mahmah hi.
42012051	Leitung ah kilemna piangsak dinga hong pai hong sa na hi uh hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi. Kikhenna a piangsak dinga hong pai ka hi zaw hi cih thu kong gen hi.
42012052	Banghang hiam cihleh tu a kipan inn khat sungah mi nga a om leh kilangkhenna om dinga, thumte in nih langah nihte in thum langah a pang ding uh hi.
42012053	“A pa in a tapa langpan dinga, a ta in a pa a langpan ding hi. A nu in a tanu langpan dinga, a tanu in a nu a langpan ding hi. A teknu in a monu langpan dinga, a monu in a teknu a langpan ding hi,” a ci hi.
42012054	Tua khit ciangin amah in mihonpite kiangah, “Nitumna lam pan meii hong kai ciangin, ‘Guahzu ding hi,’ na ci uh a, guah hong zu takpi hi.
42012055	Leitaw lam pan huih hong nun ciangin, ‘Khualum ding hi,’ na ci uh a, khua a hong lum takpi hi.
42012056	A kineihkhem mite aw, van le lei omzia khentel thei napi uh cin banghang in tuhun omzia khentel theilo na hi uh hiam?
42012057	“Hi hi, banghang in no le no in thu a maan bangin khen theilo na hi uh hiam?
42012058	Na langpa tawh thukhen zum zuana na pai laitak in amah tawh na kilemkik theihtheih nadingin lamkal ah na hih theihtawp in hanciam in. Tua banga na hih kei leh amah in thukhenpa mai ah hong tun dinga, thukhenpa in palik bupa tungah hong piakhia in palik bupa in thongah hong khum ding hi.
42012059	Ken kong cih in ah na liausum dangka na piak khit mateng in thong pan na suakta kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42013001	Tua laitak in Zeisu tawh a omkhawm mi pawlkhat in, Galilee mi pawlkhatte sisan le amaute biakna gan sisante Pilate in a helna thu ama kiangah a ko uh hi.
42013002	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih Galilee mite in tua banga a thuak manun a dang Galilee mi khempeuh sangin a mawh zaw uh hi, ci in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
42013003	A mawh zaw kei uh hi, ci in kong gen hi. Note zong na mawhna uh na kisikkik kei uh leh tua bangin na si ding uh hi.
42013004	Siloam tausang kipuk lai a a delhlup mi sawm le giatte zong Jerusalem khuapi sunga om mi khempeuh sangin mawh zaw uh hi, ci in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
42013005	A mawh zaw kei uh hi, ci in kong gen hi. Note zong mawhna na kisikkik kei uh leh tua bangin na si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42013006	Amah in hih thugentehna zong gen a, “Mi khatin a lenggah huanah theikung khat suan a, a gah lo dingin a pai ciangin a gah khat beek a mu kei hi.
42013007	Tua ciangin lenggah lokhopa kiangah, ‘En in, theigah lo dingin kum thum sung kong vil hangin a gah khat beek ka mu kei hi. Phuk in. Banghang in hih theikung in leitang pengsak lel ding ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
42013008	“Tua ciangin lenggah lokhopa in ama kiangah, ‘Topa aw, tukum sung hi ci omsak lai in. A phung kimkot to in eklei ka piaphot ding hi.
42013009	A hong gah leh pha hi. A hong gah tuan kei leh tua ciangin phuk in,’ ci in a dawng hi,” a ci hi.
42013010	Tu in Zeisu in Sabbath ni in kikhopna inn khat ah thu a hilh hi.
42013011	Tua ciangin en in, kum sawm le kum giat sung dawivei a a zawngkhal numei khat tualai ah a om hi. Amah a nungkul ahih manin ama thu in a dingtang thei kei hi.
42013012	Zeisu in tua nu a muh ciangin sam a, “Numei aw, na zawngkhalna panin kong suaktasak hi,” a ci hi.
42013013	Tua khit ciangin tua nu tungah a khut nga a, thakhat in tua nu dingtang in Pasian a phat hi.
42013014	Zeisu in Sabbath ni in cina damsak ahih manin kikhopna inn ukpa heh mahmah a, mihonpite kiangah, “Na sep theih nading hun ni guk tak om hi. Tua hun sungin hong pai unla, kidamsak un. Sabbath ni in hong pai kei un,” a ci hi.
42013015	Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang a kineihkhempa aw! Note in zong Sabbath ni in na bawng na laate uh ganbuuk panin kaikhia in tui pia dingin paipih hilo na hi uh hiam?
42013016	Tua ahih manin Satan in kum sawm le kum giat sung a hencip hih Abraham tanu zong, Sabbath ni in suahtaksak huai hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42013017	Hih thute a gen ciangin a langpang mite khempeuh a maizum uh hi. Mipite ahih leh ama bawlsa a thupi na tampite hangin kipak in a om uh hi.
42013018	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Pasian kumpigam bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam?
42013019	Mi khatin a huan sunga a vawh ankam tang tawh a kibang hi. Tua ankam tang hong khangin a kung lianpi khat hong suak a, vana leng vasate in a hiangte tungah buu a tom uh hi,” a ci hi.
42013020	Zeisu in a genkik in ah, “Pasian kumpigam bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam?
42013021	Numei khatin lawhbeuɠ thum bang a pha annel, a tawk dinga a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
42013022	Tua khit ciangin amah in Jerusalem zuanin a paikawm in khuapi khuaneute ah pai in thu a hilh hi.
42013023	Tua ciangin mi khatin ama kiangah, “Topa aw, mi tawmkhat bekin hotkhiatna ngah ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42013024	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Kong kawcik ah lut dingin hanciam un. Ken kong cih in ah mi tampi in kong kawcik ah lut nuamin a zon uh hangin a mu zo kei ding uh hi.
42013025	Ni khat ni ciangin inn tekpa tho in kong a khak ding hi. Tua khit ciangin inn pua lamah note dingin, ‘Topa, Topa aw, kong hong hon in,’ ci a, kong na kiuh uh hangin amah in, ‘Koi pana hong pai na hi uh hiam? Note kong thei kei hi,’ a hong ci ding hi.
42013026	“Tua ciangin note in, ‘Nang tawh an nekhawm tui dawnkhawm in i omngei a, kote kongzing ah zong thu nong hilhngei hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.
42013027	“Ahih hangin amah in, ‘Koi pana hong pai na hi uh hiam? Note kong thei kei hi hong ci hilo ka hi hiam? No, siatna a bawlte aw, na vekpi un ka kiang panin paikhia un,’ a hong ci ding hi.
42013028	“Note in Abraham, Isaac, Jacob le kamsangte khempeuh Pasian kumpigam sunga om na muh uh ciangin note hong kihawlkhia dinga, tualai ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
42013029	Amaute in nisuahna, nitumna, leilu le leitaw panin hong pai ding uh a, Pasian kumpigam sungah a hong tu ding uh hi.
42013030	En un, a nunun hangin a masa ding mi le a masak hangin a nunung ding mi a om hi,” a ci hi.
42013031	Tua ni mahin Pharisee‑te pawlkhat ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Herod in hong that nuam ahih manin hih mun panin paikhia in,” a ci uh hi.
42013032	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Pai unla, tua ngia kiangah, ‘En in, tuni le zingciang in dawite hawlkhia in cina ka damsak dinga, a ni thumna ni in ka nasep ka zo ding hi,’ ci hi ci in va gen un.
42013033	Ahi zongin kamsang khatin Jerusalem khuapi longal, khuadang ah a sih ding hi theilo ahih manin tuni, zingciang le thaiciang ka zinsuak lai ding hi.
42013034	“Kamsangte thatin na kianga hong kisawl mite suang tawh a denglum Jerusalem khuapi, Jerusalem khuapi aw! Aakpi in a note a khanuai ah a huai bangin na tate tamveipi ka huainop hangin na ut kei hi!
42013035	En in! Na teenna mun a hawmpi in kinusia ding hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ‘Topa min tawh a hong paipa in thupha ngah tahen!’ na cih hun hong tun mateng in kei nong mu kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42014001	Sabbath ni khatin Pharisee pawlte laka makai khatpa inn ah an ne dingin Zeisu pai a, amaute in Zeisu a encik uh hi.
42014002	En in, cibawk natna a nei pasal khat ama mai ah a om hi.
42014003	Zeisu in thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte kiangah, “Sabbath ni‑a cina damsak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
42014004	Ahih hangin amaute pau loin a om uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in cinapa samin damsak a, a ciahsak hi.
42014005	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “Na laa khat uh, ahih keileh na bawng khat uh Sabbath ni in guam sungah kia leh a lakhia pah lo ding kua om na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
42014006	Amaute in hih thute a dawngkik thei kei uh hi.
42014007	Zeisu in an ne dinga a kisam mi pawlkhatte in munhoih tata a teel uh a muh ciangin, amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a,
42014008	“Mi khatin mopawi ah a hong kisap ciangin mun hoihpen ah tu kei un. Nang sanga a zahtakhuai zaw mi khat na kisam henla,
42014009	a sampa le tua pa hong pai in, ‘Na tutna hihpa na awn in,’ hong ci leh maizum in a niampen munah na tu ding hi.
42014010	Mopawi ah a hong kisap ciangin a niampen munah tu leteh hong sampa hong pai ciangin, ‘Lawm aw, a sangah tuto in,’ hong ci dinga, na ankuang umpihte mai ah na mai tang ding hi.
42014011	Banghang hiam cihleh amah le amah a kilamsang mi peuhmah kiniamkhiat dinga, amah le amah a kiniamkhiat mi kilamsang ding hi,” a ci hi.
42014012	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a sampa kiangah zong, “Sun an ne ding ahi zongin nitak an ne ding ahi zongin mi na sap ciangin na lawmte, na sanggamte, na tanaute, na innveng mihaute khawng sam kei in. Tua mite sam leteh amaute in zong nang hong samkik in hong thukkik ding uh hi.
42014013	Ahi zongin pawi na bawl ciangin mizawng, mipoi, khebai le mittawte sam in.
42014014	Amaute in hong thukkik zolo ding uh ahih manin thupha na ngah dinga, midikte thawhkik ni ciangin Pasian in a hong thukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42014015	Tu in amah tawh ankuang a umkhawm mi khatin hih thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Pasian kumpigam sunga an a ne kha ding mi in mihampha ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42014016	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Mi khatin pawi lianpi khat bawla mitampi a sam hi.
42014017	Annek hun ciangin a khohsa mite kiangah a nasempa sawl a, ‘Na khempeuh a baihsa in om hi. Hong paita un,’ ci in a gensak hi.
42014018	“Ahih hangin amaute khempeuh in paulap zong ciat uh a, a masapenpa in, ‘Lo khat lei khin ka hih manin pai in ka va et kul ding hi, hong theisiam in,’ a ci hi.
42014019	“A dang khatpa in, ‘Bawngtal kap nga ka lei khin a, ka va sin kul ding hi hong theisiam in,’ a ci leuleu hi.
42014020	“A dang khatpa in zong, ‘Zi nei khin phet ka hih manin kong paithei kei ding hi,’ a ci hi.
42014021	“Tua ciangin tua nasempa hong ciahkik in a topa kiangah tua thuteng a gen hi. Tua ciangin inntekpa heh a, a nasempa kiangah, ‘Khua sung lampite le kongzingte ah va pai mengmeng inla, mizawngte, mipoite, khebaite le mittawte hong paipih in,’ a ci hi.
42014022	“Tua ciangin a nasempa in, ‘Topa aw, nong thupiak bangin ka hih khin a, ahi zongin mun a awnglai hi,’ a ci hi.
42014023	“Tua ciangin a topa in nasempa kiangah, ‘Lam lianpi a kipan khuanawl dongah va pai inla, ka inn a dim dongin amaute hong paisak hamtang in.
42014024	Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah ka khohsa tua mite khat beekin ka pawi an a ne kha kei ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.”
42014025	Tu in, amah tawh a tonkhawm mihonpite lamah Zeisu kihei in,
42014026	“Ka kianga hong pai mi in a nu, a pa, a zi, a tate, a sanggampate, a sanggamnute thamlo in ama nuntakna nangawn kei sanga a it zawk leh ka nungzui a suakthei kei ding hi.
42014027	Ama singlamteh pua loin ka nung a hong zui peuhmah ka nungzui a suakthei kei ding hi.
42014028	“Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah mi khatin inn sangpi khat lamsawm napi a zawhsiang nading sum a kicing in a neih leh a neih loh tuat masa loin om ding ahi hiam?
42014029	Tua bangin hih kei leh a bul a phuh khit ciangin zom zo nawnlo dinga, a mu mi khempeuh in amah zahko in,
42014030	‘Hih pa inn lam dingin kipan khin napi a zom zo nawn kei hi,’ a ci ding uh hi.
42014031	“Ahih keileh, galkap 10,000 a nei kumpi khat, galkap 20,000 a nei kumpi dang khatin amah tawh kido ding hileh, ka zo taktak ding hiam ci in, tuat masa loin om ding ahi hiam?
42014032	A zawhngap kei leh tua kumpipa gamlapi ah a omlai in tangmi sawlin kilemna a bawlsak ding hi.
42014033	Tuamah bangin note khatpeuh in zong a neihsa khempeuh a nusiat kei leh ka nungzui a suak thei kei ding hi.
42014034	“Ci pen lim mah hi. Ahih hangin al nawn kei leh bangci bangin ki‑alkiksak thei ding ahi hiam?
42014035	Leitang aa ding ahi a, leihoihza ding ahi zongin kizang theilo ahih manin a kipaikhia ding hi. Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
42015001	Tua khit ciangin siahdong khempeuh le mimawhte in Zeisu thugen ngai dingin ama kianga zuan uh hi.
42015002	Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate phun uh a, “Hihpa mimawhte tawh kikhawl in an a nekhawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
42015003	Tua ahih manin amah in amaute kiangah hih thugentehna a gen hi.
42015004	“Tuu 100 a neih lak panin khat mansuah leh 99teng gamlak ah nusia photin a mang pen a muh mateng a zong lo ding note lakah kua om na hi uh hiam?
42015005	A muh ciangin lungdam mahmah a, a liangko ah a pua hi.
42015006	Inn a tun ciangin a lawmte le a innvengte sam a, ‘A mangsa ka tuu mukik ka hih manin hong lungdampih un,’ a ci hi.
42015007	Ken kong cih in ah tuamah bangin mawhna kisikkik ding a kisamlo midik 99 sangin mawhna a kisikkik mimawh khat hangin vantung ah lungdamna a lianzaw hi.
42015008	“Ahih kei leh numei khatin nguntang tang sawm a neih lak panin tang khat mansuah leh meivak in inn phiatin, a muh mateng hoihtak in zong ding hilo ahi hiam?
42015009	A muh ciangin a lawmte le a innvengte sam a, ‘Ka mansuahsa nguntang mukik zo ka hih manin hong lungdampih un,’ a ci hi.
42015010	Ken kong cih in ah tuamah bangin mawhna a kisikkik mimawh khat hangin Pasian vantungmite omna munah lungdamna a om hi,” a ci hi.
42015011	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in hih thu a gen hi. “Mi khatin tapa nih a nei hi.
42015012	A nauzawpa in a pa kiangah, ‘Pa aw, kei tan ding neih le lam teng hong pia in,’ a ci hi. Tua ahih manin a pa in a neihsa teng a tate nih a hawmsak hi.
42015013	“Tua zawh a sawtlo in a nauzawpa in ama tan ding neih le lam teng kaikhawm in khual gamlapi khatah a zinkhia hi. Tua gamah a om sungin gualnopna lamah uangtat mahmah a, a neihsa teng a thangzat hi.
42015014	A neihsa teng a zatmang khit ciangin tua gamah kialpi nasiatak in hong tung a, cimawh in a om hi.
42015015	Tua ciangin tua gam mi khat va bel a, tua pa in vokcing dingin a lo ah a sawl hi.
42015016	Amah in vokte nek gamlak beegapte nangawn duhgawh mahmah ta a, ahih hangin kuamah in amah bangmah a pia kei hi.
42015017	“Ahih hangin amah le amah hong kiphawkkik in, ‘Ka pa cial nasemte in annek ding khamkhop cih thadah, khamval zong tampi a neih laitak un kei a puksi ding ka hita hi!
42015018	Kei tho in ka pa kiangah ka ciah dinga, “Pa aw, Pasian tung le nangma tungah ka khial zo hi.
42015019	Na tapa cih dingin zong ka kilawm nawn kei hi. Na cial nasemte khat bangin hong koih in,” ka ci ding hi,’ a ci hi.
42015020	Tua ciangin amah tho in a pa kiangah a ciah hi. “Amah gamlapi a a omlai mahin a pa in galmuh a, hehpihhuai sa ahih manin delhin ngawngkawi in a nam hi.
42015021	“Tua ciangin a tapa in, ‘Pa aw, Pasian tung le nangma tungah ka khial zo a, na tapa cih dingin zong ka kilawm nawn kei hi,’ a ci hi.
42015022	“Ahih hangin a pa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Puan hoih penpen hong la unla silhsak un. A khutah zungbuh bulhsak unla, khedap zong bulhsak un.
42015023	I bawngno thau kaikhia in go unla, an ne in nuamsa ni.
42015024	Banghang hiam cihleh hih ka tapa a sisa hi a, a hong nungtakik hi. A mangsa hi a, a kimukik hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in lungdamna pawi a bawl uh hi.
42015025	“Tu in a tapa uzawpen a lokuanna panin vai hong ciah a, inn gei a hong tun ciangin khuang le zam gingte za in, a lam a tawnte a mu hi.
42015026	Tua ahih manin nasemte khat sam a, bang thu om hiam ci in a dong hi.
42015027	Nasempa in, ‘Na naupa hong ciahkik hi. Na pa in amah cidam ludam in a tunkik lam a muhkik manin i bawngno thau a gawh hi,’ a ci hi.
42015028	“Ahih hangin amah heh a, inn sungah lut nuamlo ahih manin a pa hong paikhia in a zol hi.
42015029	Amah in a pa kiangah, ‘En in, kum hi zahtak nangma na ka sem a, khatvei beek na thupiak ka palsat ngei kei hi. Ka lawmte tawh ka gualnop nadingin kelno khat nangawn nong pia ngei kei hi.
42015030	Ahih hangin na neih na lam teng numei kizuakte tungah a beisak, hih na tapa hong tun phetin bawngno thaupen na gawh hi,’ a ci hi.
42015031	“A pa in, ‘Ka ta aw, nangmah in kei tawh a omkhawm tawntung na hi a, ka neihsa khempeuh nangma neihsa ahi hi.
42015032	Na naupa ahih leh a si khinsa hong nungtakik a, a mangthangsa i mukik hi. Tua ahih manin lungdam a pawi i bawl ding ahi hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
42016001	Tua banah, Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mihau khatin neihsa kempa khat a nei hi. Tua neihsa kempa in a topa neihsate thangzatgawp hi ci in a topa tungah a kikhia hi.
42016002	Tua ciangin amah in a neihsa kempa sam a, ‘Na thu ka zakte bangci bang ahi hiam? Ka neihsa kempa hi thei nawnlo ding na hih manin na sum zatna sazian hong pia in,’ a ci hi.
42016003	“Tua ciangin neihsa kempa in, ‘Ka topa in neihsa kem za panin hong tawpsak ding hita ahih manin bang cih ding ka hiam? Lei tawh ding lah ka ngap kei a, khutdawh nget ding lah ka maizum hi.
42016004	Neihsa kem za pan ka zakiat ciangin mite in amau inn a hong tunsak nop nadingun ka hih dingzia ka thei hi,’ ci in a lungsim sungah a ngaihsun hi.
42016005	“Tua ciangin a topa tunga leiba a nei khempeuhte sam a, a khatna pa kiangah, ‘Ka topa tungah bangzah ba na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
42016006	Tua pa in, ‘Sathau bung 100 ka ba hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua pa kiangah, ‘Na leiba ciaptehna lai la inla tu pakin 50 in gelh mengmeng in,’ a ci hi.
42016007	“Tua khit ciangin a dang khatpa kiangah, ‘Nang bangzah na ba hiam?’ a cih ciangin, ‘Mangbuh bem 100 ka ba hi,’ a ci hi. Amah in, ‘Na leiba ciaptehna lai la inla, 80 in gelh in,’ a ci hi.
42016008	“Tua hi a, a thumanlo neihsa kempa in, khelpilna tawh a sep manin a topa in a phat hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tulai khang mite in amaute khanpih khuavak tate sangin a khelpil zaw uh hi.
42016009	“Ken kong cih in ah hih leitung sum le pai tawh lawm le gual na zong un. Tua hi leh bangmah na neih nawnloh uh ciangin amaute in a tawntung in nang hong sang ding uh hi.
42016010	“Thuneupen tungah a muanhuai mi in thuliante tungah zong a muanhuai hi. Thuneupen tunga diktatlo mi in thuliante tungah zong a diktat kei hi.
42016011	Tua ahih manin leitung sum le pai tungah muanhuai kei le uhteh, kua in sum taktak hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
42016012	Midang khat neihsa tungah muanhuai kei le uh teh kua in a neihsa uh note hong pia ding ahi hiam?
42016013	“Nasem khatin to nih na semkhawm theilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khat mudah in khat a it ding hi. Ahih keileh khat thupi simin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian na le leitung na na semkhawm thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42016014	Tu in sumduh Pharisee pawlte in hih thu khempeuh a zak uh ciangin amah zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi.
42016015	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Mite mai ah no le no na kidiksak uh hangin Pasian in na lungsim uh a thei hi. Mihing in a thupi ngaihsut mahmahte Pasian in kihhuai a sa hi.
42016016	“Thukham le Kamsangte thuhilhnate John hun dongin a kihilh hi. John huna kipan Pasian kumpigam thu kitangko a, mi khempeuh in thagum hatna suangin a lut uh hi.
42016017	Thukham sunga laimal neupen khat a manthan ding sangin van le lei a manthan ding a baih zaw hi.
42016018	“A zi ma a, numei dang khat a teenpih mi in angkawm ahi hi. A kimasa numei a teenpih mi zong angkawm ahi hi.
42016019	“Khatvei lai in mihaupa khat om a, amah in puan dupsan le puanpak silhin nisim in leitung nopsakna tawh a om hi.
42016020	Ahi zongin a inn kongpi gei ah a pumtang in meima a vei Lazarus kici khutdawh ngenpa khat a kikoih hi.
42016021	Amah in mihaupa ankuang pana anneng kiate duhgawh mahmah in a om laitak in uite hong pai in a meimate a liak uh hi.
42016022	“Tua nung ciangin khutdawh ngenpa si a, vantungmite in amah Abraham ang sungah a tun uh hi. Mihaupa zong si in a kivui hi.
42016023	Amah in Hadesɠ ah bawlsiatna thuakin a om laitak in a khuadak leh gamlapi a om Abraham le a ang sunga om Lazarus a mu hi.
42016024	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Lazarus hong paisak inla, a khutme dawn tui ah diahin ka lei hong votsak hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih meikuang sungah bawlsiatna ka thuak hi,’ ci in a kiko hi.
42016025	“Ahih hangin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitung na nuntak sungin nopsakna namkim na ngah a, Lazarus ahih leh gentheihna namkim a ngah hi cih phawkkik in. Tu in amah in hehnepna ngah a, nangmah in bawlsiatna na thuak hi.
42016026	Tua thamlo in, no le ko kikal ah guam thukpi khat om a, hihlam panin no kiangah a galkah nuamte in galkah theilo in tualam panin zong ko kiangah kuamah hong galkah theilo hi,’ a ci hi.
42016027	“Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Tua ahih leh pa aw, ka pa inn ah amah nong sawlsak nadingin kong thum hi.
42016028	Banghang hiam cihleh keimah in sanggam pasal nga ka nei hi. Amaute zong hih gawtmun a hong tun khakloh nadingun amaute tungah teci va pangsak in,’ a ci hi.
42016029	Abraham in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte a nei uh hi. Tuate thu na ngai uh hen,’ a ci hi.
42016030	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hilo hi pa Abraham aw, a sisa mi khat amaute kiangah va pai leh a mawhna uh kisikkik ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.
42016031	“Ahih hangin Abraham in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte thuhilhnate a up kei uh leh misite lak panin a thokik mi khatin thu a gen hangin a um tuan kei ding uh hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
42017001	Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Pukna a hong tun loh a phamawh thu hi a, ahi zongin tua pukna a piangsakpa in gimna a thuak ding hi!
42017002	Mi khatin hih naupangnote khat a puksak sangin a ngawngah angawina suangtum khat khai in tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi.
42017003	Tua ahih ciangin kikepsiam un. Nang tungah na sanggampa a hong khialh leh thuhilh in taii in. A kisikkik leh maisak in.
42017004	Ni khat sungin sagihvei hong khial a, sagihvei mah na kiangah hong pai in, ‘Ka kisikkik hi,’ hong cihleh a khialhna maisak in,” a ci hi.
42017005	Tua ciangin sawltakte in Topa kiangah, “Ka upna uh hong khangsak in,” a ci uh hi.
42017006	Tua ciangin Topa in, “Upna ankamtang cia nei le uh teh hih bokthok kung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot inla, tuipi sungah va kisuan in,’ ci le uh teh na cih bangun hong mang ding hi.
42017007	“Na lo a kho, ahih keileh na gan a cing na nasempa vai hong tun phet in, ‘Hong pai inla na an ne pah in,’ a ci ding note lakah kua om na hi uh hiam?
42017008	Tua bang na cih sangsik un, ‘Kithawi inla, ka annek ding hong lui phot in. Ka nek ka dawn sung hong ngak inla, tua khit ciangin na an ne panin,’ ci zaw ding hilo na hi uh hiam?
42017009	Nasempa in a topa thupiak teng a sep manin a topa in nasempa tungah lungdam ko ding ahi hiam? Ko peuhmah lo ding hi.
42017010	Tuamah bangin note in zong a hong kisawl teng nasep khit uh ciangin, ‘I sep ding teng mah a sem i hi a, a cingtaklo nasemte i hi zawlai hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
42017011	Tu in, Samaria le Galilee gamgidung tawnin Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paitoh laitak in thu khat hong piang hi.
42017012	Amah khuaneu khat lut dinga a pai laitak in miphak sawm in amah a na dawntuah uh hi.
42017013	Amaute in a gamlapi panin, “Zeisu aw, Siapa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
42017014	Zeisu in amaute a muh ciangin, “Pai unla, siampite kiangah va kilak un,” a ci hi. Amaute a pai laitak mahun a dam uh hi.
42017015	Amaute laka khatin a dam lam a kimuh ciangin hong kilehkik a, aw lianpi tawh Pasian a phat hi.
42017016	Amah Zeisu khephung ah boksuk in lungdam a ko hi. Tua pa pen Samaria mi ahi hi.
42017017	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “A kidamsak mi sawm hilo ahi hiam? A dang kuate koi ah om uh ahi hiam?
42017018	Hih gamdang mipa simloh hong kilehkik a Pasian min a phat ding khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42017019	Tua khit ciangin tua pa kiangah, “Ding inla ciah in. Na upna in hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42017020	Khatvei, Pharisee pawlte in Pasian kumpigam cik ciangin hong piang ding hiam ci in dong uh a, Zeisu in, “Pasian kumpigam in muh theihin hong piang ding ahi kei hi.
42017021	‘Hihlai ah,’ om hi, ‘Hualai ah,’ om hi kici theilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in note sungah a om takpi hi,” a ci hi.
42017022	Tua khit ciangin nungzuite kiangah, “Mihing Tapa nite lakah khat na muhnop hun uh hong tung dinga, ahi zongin na mu kei ding uh hi.
42017023	Amaute in, ‘Hihlai ah om hi hualai ah om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin zui kei unla, nungdelh kei un.
42017024	Khuaphialep in vanmong khat pan phia a, vanmong khat dongah a tanzal bangin Mihing Tapa zong ama ni ciangin tua bang ahi ding hi.
42017025	Ahih hangin amah in gimna tampi thuak masa dinga, tulai khang mite in amah a nial ding uh hi.
42017026	“Noah hun lai bangin Mihing Tapa ni ciangin zong tua bang hi ding hi.
42017027	Tembaw sungah Noah a lut ni dongin mite anne tuidawn le kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi. Tua khit ciangin tuiciin hong tunga amaute khempeuh a susia mang hi.
42017028	“Tuamah bangin Lot hun lai in zong anne tuidawn, sumbawl paibawl, lokho singpua, innbawl lobawl in a om uh hi.
42017029	Ahih hangin Sodom khua pan Lot a paikhiat ni in, vantung panin kaat le meikuang guah bangin zu a, a vekpi un a susia hi.
42017030	“Mihing Tapa hong kilat ni ciangin zong tuamah bangin hi ding hi.
42017031	Tua ni ciangin innkhum zanga omte in inn sunga om nate la dingin kumsuk nawn kei uh hen. Tuamah bangin lokuante zong inn ah ciahkik nawn kei uh hen.
42017032	Lot zi na ngaihsun un.
42017033	A nuntakna a hu nuam mi in a nuntakna tan dinga, a nuntakna a tan mi in a nuntakna a hu ding hi.
42017034	Ken kong cih in ah tua zan ciangin lupna khat tunga a lumkhawm mi nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
42017035	An sukhawm numei nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
42017036	Lolai a om mi nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi,” a ci hi.
42017037	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, hih thute koi lai ah hong piang ding hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Misi luang omna peuh ah musanete hong kikhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42018001	Tua khit ciangin lungkialo a thu a nget tawntung nadingun Zeisu in thugentehna khat tawh amaute thu hilh a,
42018002	“Khua khatah Pasian a kihta lo, mi zong a thusimlo thukhenpa khat a om hi.
42018003	Tu in tua khua mahah meigongnu khat zong a om hi. Tua nu thukhenpa kiangah va pai pahpah a, ‘Thu ka neihpih ka langpa tungah maantak in thu hong khensak in,’ a ci hi.
42018004	“Amah in tawlkhat sung a khensak pah nuam kei hi. Ahi zongin a tawpna ah hi bangin ngaihsun a, ‘Pasian kihta loin mi zong ka thusim loh hangin,
42018005	hih meigongnu in hong nawngkaisak den ding ahih manin a thu maantak in ka khensak ding hi. Tua hi keileh amah hong pai thithe in hong nawngkaisak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
42018006	Tua ciangin Topa in, “A thumanlo tua thukhenpa kampauna ngaihsun un.
42018007	Pasian teelsa mite sun le zanin kiko le uh Pasian in a thu uh khensak loin sawtpi kingaksak ding ahi hiam?
42018008	Ken kong cih in ah manlangtak in a khensak pah ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitung ah upna a mu ding hiam?” a ci hi.
42018009	Tua ciangin amau le amau midik in a kingaihsun midang khempeuh a neumuh mi pawlkhat tungah thugentehna tawh thu a hilh inah,
42018010	“Mi nih thungen dingin biakinnpi huangah a paito uh hi. Khatpa Pharisee hi a, a dang khatin siahdongpa ahi hi.
42018011	Pharisee pa dingto in amah le amah kiphat in thungen a, ‘Pasian aw, midangte neihsa a sutte, a thumanlote, angkawmte le hi lai a siahdongpa bang ka hih loh manin, na tungah ka lungdam hi.
42018012	Nipi kal khatin nihvei an ka tang a, ka neihsa khempeuh panin sawm a khat ka pia hi,’ a ci hi.
42018013	“Siahdongpa ahih leh gamlapi ah dingin vantung lam nangawn en ngamlo in a awm beng a, ‘Pasian aw, mimawh keimah hong hehpih in,’ a ci hi.
42018014	“Ken kong cih in ah, hihpa in a khatpa sangin Pasian kiang pan diktansakna ngahsa in a inn ah a ciah hi. Amah le amah a kilamsang mi in niamkhiatna thuak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamkhiat mi, a kilamsang ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018015	Tu in Zeisu lawn ding deihin mite in a naungekte a hong paipih uh nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin a taiigawp uh hi.
42018016	Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute sam a, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong pai ding kham kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in naupang a bang mite aa ding ahi hi.
42018017	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, naupangnote san banga Pasian kumpigam a sanglo mi peuhmah tua kumpigam sungah a lutthei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018018	Tua ciangin milian khatin, “Sia hoih aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang hih ding ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
42018019	Zeisu in, “Banghang in mihoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian longal mihoih kuamah a om kei hi.
42018020	‘Angkawm kei in. Mi that kei in. Guta kei in. Thumanlo in teci pang kei in. Na nu na pa zahtak in,’ cih thupiakte na thei hi,” a ci hi.
42018021	Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neutung a kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42018022	Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Na kisap khat a omlai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla mizawngte hawmsak leteh vantung ah na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
42018023	Tua pa hau mahmah ahih manin hih thu a zak ciangin a dah mahmah hi.
42018024	Tua pa a dah mahmah lam Zeisu in a muh ciangin, “Mihaute Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding uh haksa mahmah hi.
42018025	Mihau khat Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding sangin kala‑oh khat phimbilvang sunga khum ding a baih zaw hi,” a ci hi.
42018026	Tua thu a za mite in, “Tua bang ahih leh kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42018027	Ahih hangin amah in, “Mihingte aa dingin a piang theilote Pasian aa dingin piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
42018028	Tua ciangin Peter in, “En in, kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
42018029	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Pasian kumpigam thu hangin a inn, a nu a pa, a sanggamte, a zi a tate a nusia mi peuhmah in,
42018030	hih leitung a nuntak sungin a zah tampi ngah dinga, hong tung ding hunah zong nuntak tawntungna ngah loin a om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018031	Tua ciangin amah in sawm le nihte tuam sapkhiat in amaute kiangah, “En un, Jerusalem khuapi ah i paito dinga, Mihing Tapa tawh kisai kamsangte gelhsa thu khempeuh a tangtung ding hi.
42018032	Gentile‑te khutah amah pia ding uh a, amaute in zahko in simmawh bawl in a cilphih ding uh hi.
42018033	Amah satin that ding uh a, a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018034	Ahih hangin a nungzuite in hih thute a tel zo kei uh hi. Hih thute amaute tungah ki‑iimcip ahih manin bang thu gen hiam cih a thei kei uh hi.
42018035	Tua ciangin Zeisu Jericho khua a tunkuan in mittaw khat lamgei ah khutdawh ngenin a tu hi.
42018036	Mihonpite in tua mun nawka hong paina husa a zak ciangin bang thu hiam ci in amah in a dong hi.
42018037	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu hong pai hi,” a ci uh hi.
42018038	Tua ciangin amah in, “David Tapa, Zeisu aw, kei hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko hi.
42018039	Tua pa a daih nadingin a mai‑a pai mite in a taiihuan uh hangin amah in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko semsem hi.
42018040	Tua ciangin Zeisu khawl a, tua pa ama kiangah a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi. Tua pa ama kianga tun ciangin Zeisu in,
42018041	“Nang aa dingin bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, khua ka mu nuam hi,” a ci hi.
42018042	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Khua muta in, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42018043	Tua ciangin tua pa in thakhat in khua mu a, Pasian min phatin Zeisu nung a zui hi. A mu mi khempeuh in zong Pasian a phat uh hi.
42019001	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu Jericho khuasung tawnin a pai hi.
42019002	Tua khua ah, en in, Zacchaeus kici a hau mahmah siahdong mangpa khat a om hi.
42019003	Tua pa in Zeisu kua hiam cih a muhnop hangin a tun tom ahih manin mihonpi lak panin a mu zo kei hi.
42019004	Tua ahih manin Zeisu pai nading lampi ah na matai in amah a muh theih nadingin theithek kung khatah a kah hi.
42019005	Zeisu tua mun a tun ciangin dakto a, amah a muh ciangin, “Zacchaeus aw, hong kum mengmeng in. Tuni in na inn ah kong taam ding hi,” a ci hi.
42019006	Zacchaeus zong kumsuk pah a, lungdamtak in a inn ah Zeisu a tungsak hi.
42019007	Hih thu a mu mi khempeuh in Zeisu phunsan uh a, “Mimawhpa inn ah zintung dingin a pai tazen hi,” a ci uh hi.
42019008	Tua ciangin Zacchaeus dingto in Topa kiangah, “Topa aw, en in, ka neihsa a lang mizawngte ka pia dinga, mi khatpeuh neihsa zawhthawh thu tawh ka laksak a om leh a zah li in ka loh ding hi,” a ci hi.
42019009	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Amah zong Abraham tapa khat ahih manin tuni in hih inn ah hotkhiatna a tung hi.
42019010	Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa in a mangthang mite zong ding le honkhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42019011	Amaute in Zeisu thugen khempeuh a ngai uh hi. Zeisu Jerusalem khuapi hong tung dekta ahihna leh mipite in Pasian kumpigam a phut pah ding sa uh ahih manin Zeisu in gentehna dang khat tawh thu a gen inah,
42019012	“Kumpi za sang ding le tua khit cianga hong ciahkik dingin ulian khatin gamlapi gamdang khatah a zin hi.
42019013	Amah in a nasem sawmte samin sumtang minaɠ khat ciat pia a, ‘Kong tunkik mateng na met bawl un,’ ci in a vaikhak hi.
42019014	“Ahih hangin a gam mite in amah mudah uh ahih manin a nungah tangmi sawl uh a, ‘Hih mipa ka kumpi dingun ka deih kei uh hi,’ ci in a gensak uh hi.
42019015	“Tua gamah kumpi za a ngah khit ciangin amah hong ciahkik a, sum a apsa nasemte in bangzah ciat metsak uh hiam cih thei nuam in a samsak hi.
42019016	Tua ciangin a khatna pa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum minaɠ khat panin a met mina sawm ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
42019017	Tua ciangin amah in tua pa kiangah, ‘Nasem hoihpa aw, na nasepna hoih mahmah hi. Thuneu khat tungah muanhuai na hih manin khuapi sawm na uk in,’ a ci hi.
42019018	“Tua ciangin a nihna pa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum minaɠ khat panin a met mina nga ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
42019019	Amah in hihpa zong tuamah bangin phat a, ‘Nang zong khuapi nga na uk in,’ a ci hi.
42019020	“Tua ciangin a dang khatpa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum dial tawh tun in hihlai ah ka kem khinkhian hi.
42019021	Mi genhakpa na hih manin kong kihta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sum khol lopi sum ngah nuamin khaici tuh lopi an na la nuam hi,’ a ci hi.
42019022	“Tua ciangin amah in tua nasempa kiangah, ‘A ginalo nasempa aw, na kampauna zui in thu kong khen ding hi. Sum khol lopi in sum ngah nuam, khaici tuh lopi in an a la nuam, mi genhakpa ka hihlam hong thei na hih leh,
42019023	kong ciahkik ciangin a met tawh ka ngahkhop theih nadingin banghang in ka sumte sumkholna ah na koih lo na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
42019024	“Tua khit ciangin a kianga a ding mite kiangah, ‘Ama tunga om sum minaɠ khat la unla, mina sawm a neipa pia un,’ a ci hi.
42019025	Tua mite in, ‘Topa aw, amah in minaɠ sawm nei khinzo hi,’ a ci uh hi.
42019026	“Amah in, ‘Ken kong cih in ah, a neite kipiak beh dinga, a neilote tung panin a neihsa nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
42019027	Keima uk ding a utlo tua ka galte hong paipih unla, ka muhtang mahmah in that un,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
42019028	Hih thute a gen khit ciangin, amah masa in Jerusalem khuapi ah a paito uh hi.
42019029	Tanluan muala om Bethphage le Bethany khuate a tunkuan uh ciangin a nungzuite nih sawl a,
42019030	“Mai‑a khua ah na paikhol un. Khuasung na lut uh ciangin kuama tuan ngei nailoh laano khat kikhih a om na mu ding uh hi. Suut unla hong kai un.
42019031	Tua ciangin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Banghang in suut na hi uh hiam?’ a hong cih leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
42019032	Tua a sawl mite pai uh a, a gensa bangbang in a mu uh hi.
42019033	Ahi zongin amaute in laano a suut laitak un a neite in, “Banghang in tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42019034	Amaute in, “Topa in deih hi,” a ci uh hi.
42019035	Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu kiangah laano hong paipih uh a, a tungah puan a phah khit uh ciangin Zeisu a tuangsak uh hi.
42019036	Amah a pai ciangin mipite in lampi ah a puante uh a phah uh hi.
42019037	A muhsa uh nalamdang khempeuhte hangin a nungzui mihonpite lungdam in a kipak uh hi. Tua ahih manin Tanluan mual panga lampi paisuk ah Zeisu a hong tun ciangin mihonpite nakpi in kiko in Pasian phat uh a,
42019038	amaute in, “Topa min tawh hong pai Kumpipa in thupha ngah tahen! Vantung ah nopna om henla, A sangbel munah minthanna om tahen!” a ci uh hi.
42019039	Mihonpite lak panin Pharisee‑te pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, na nungzuite taii in,” a ci uh hi.
42019040	Ahih hangin amah in, “Ken kong cih in ah hih mite dai le uh, suangte hong kiko pah ding uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42019041	Tu in, Jerusalem khuapi hong tung dekta a, khuapi a galmuh ciangin kah a
42019042	a gen in ah, “Nopna na ngah nading thute tuni beekin thei hi leteh maw! Ahi zongin tu in tua thute na muh khakloh nadingin nang kiang panin kiselta hi.
42019043	Na galte in na kimkot ah kulh hong ciangin hong umcih ding uh a, a munmun panin hong khaktan hun uh hong tung ding hi.
42019044	Nang le na sunga om na tate leitang hong den nading uh a, nang sunga om suang kiciangte zong a kithuap khat beek a omsak kei ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na kiangah a hong kihawh hun na thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
42019045	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu biakinnpi huang sungah lut a, vanlei vanzuak a om mite hawlkhia in,
42019046	amaute kiangah, “ ‘Ka inn in thungetna inn ahi hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho ah kigelh napi in note in ‘gutate phualpi’ na suaksak tazen uh hi” a ci hi.
42019047	Zeisu in ni simin biakinnpi huang sungah thu a hilh hi. Ahih hangin siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le mipi makaite in amah thah theih nading lampi a zong uh hi.
42019048	Ahi zongin mi khempeuh in ama thugen limngaih mahmah uh ahih manin bangmah a cih thei kei uh hi.
42020001	Ni khat, Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilhin lungdamna thu tangko in a om laitak in siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le maikaite ama kiangah hong pai uh a,
42020002	“Bang thuneihna tawh hih nate hih na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua in hong pia ahi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
42020003	Ahih hangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Ken zong thu khat kong dong ding hi hong dawng un.
42020004	John tuiphumna thu vantung pan ahi hiam ahih keileh mihing kiang pan ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42020005	Amaute kikum uh a, “ ‘Vantung pan hi,’ ci lehang, ‘Banghang in amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
42020006	‘Mihing kiang pan hi,’ ci lehang lah mite in John pen kamsang khatin um uh ahih manin mi khempeuh in suang tawh hong deng ding uh hi,” a kici uh hi.
42020007	Tua ahih manin, “Koi pan hiam cih ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
42020008	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ken zong hih nate bang thuneihna tawh hih ka hi hiam cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42020009	Tua khit ciangin amah in hih thugentehna mipite tungah gen a, “Mi khatin lenggah huan khat bawl in lokhote a khawhlawhsak hi. Tua khit ciangin gamlapi ah khualzin in sawtpi a taam hi.
42020010	Lenggah lawh hun a tun ciangin lo khawhlawhte in huan panin a piang lenggah pawlkhat a na piak theih nadingun a nasemte khat a sawl hi. Ahih hangin lo khawhlawhte in amah vuagawp in a khutguak in a ciahsak uh hi.
42020011	Amah in a dang nasem khat sawlkik a, tua pa zong vuagawp in a zumhuaipi in bawl uh a, a khutguak mahin a ciahsak uh hi.
42020012	Tua ciangin a thumveina ah, a nasemte khat sawlkik a, tua pa zong liamsak gawpin a nawhkhia uh hi.
42020013	“Tua ciangin huan neipa in, ‘Bang cih leng hoih ding ahi hiam? Ka it ka tapa sawl leng, na mu le uh zahtak khabuang ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.
42020014	Ahih hangin lo khawhlawhte in amah a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hihpa in a innluah ding pa ahi hi. Ama luah ding teng ei aa a suah theih nadingin hong pai un amah that ni,’ a kici uh hi.
42020015	“Tua khit ciangin lenggah huan pualam ah kaikhia in a that uh hi. Tua ahih leh lenggah huan neipa in amaute bang a cih ding hiam?
42020016	Amah hong pai in lo khawhlawhte that dinga, lenggah huan zong midangte a khosak ding hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, “Tua bangin piang kei tahen!” a ci uh hi.
42020017	Zeisu in amaute en a, “Tua ahih leh, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang, Innkiusuang bulpi a suakzo hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?
42020018	Hih suang tunga a kia mi peuhmah kitamkham dinga, hih suangin mi khatpeuh a den leh tua mi a zanciim ding hi,” a ci hi.
42020019	Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in hih thugentehnate in amaute a kawkna ahihlam a thei uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua hun mahin amah matsawm uh a, ahi zongin mihonpite a kihta zel uh hi.
42020020	Amaute in mangpipa ukna le thuneihna sungah Zeisu a piak theih nadingun ama kammal mah tawh a lehmat dingin mihoih banga a kineih thukante sawlin a enciksak uh hi.
42020021	Tua ciangin tua mite in, “Sia aw, thu a maan bangin genin thu na hilh a, zahtak tuam nei loin Pasian lampi maantak in na hilh hi cih kong thei uh hi.
42020022	Caesar kumpipa, siah piak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam kituak lo hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
42020023	Ahih hangin amah in amaute lungsim kawina thei ahih manin, “Banghang in hong ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
42020024	Denariusɠ sum tangkhat hong lak un. Kua lim le kua min tuang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Caesar kumpipa,” a ci uh hi.
42020025	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Caesar kumpipa neihsate Caesar kumpipa pia unla, Pasian neihsate Pasian pia un,” a ci hi.
42020026	Amaute in mipite mai ah ama kammal tawh a man zo kei uh hi. Amaute in ama dawnkikna lamdangsa in a dai khipkhep uh hi.
42020027	Tua khit ciangin misite thawhkikna thu a nial Sadducee pawlte pawlkhat hong pai in thu a dong uh hi.
42020028	Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in kote aa dingin a hong gelhsak thu in pasal khatin ta nei man loin a zi a sihsan leh a naupa in tua meigong teenpih henla, a upa aa dingin suan le khak tawisak hen a ci hi.
42020029	Khatvei lai in sanggam pasal sagih om uh a, a upapen in zi a neih khit ciangin ta nei loin a si hi.
42020030	Tua ciangin a nihnapa in tua nu teenpih a, ta neilo mahin a si hi.
42020031	Tua ciangin a thumna pa in tua nu a teenpih hi. Tua bangin a sagihna dongin teenpih suksuk uh a, ta neilo vive in a si uh hi.
42020032	A nunung penin tua numei zong a si hi.
42020033	Tua hi a, thawhkik ni ciangin tua numei in kuapen zi in om ding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh a sagih un tua numei a teenpih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42020034	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tulai khang mite kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi.
42020035	Ahi zongin tua huna kihel dingin a kilawm mite le misite lak panin a thokik mite in kipi kiteeng in a om nawn kei ding uh hi.
42020036	A thokik mite ahih manun sithei nawnlo ding uh a, vantungmite tawh kibang in Pasian tate a hita uh hi.
42020037	Moses in sawlbawk kuang gei ah Topa a hopih lai in, ‘Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian,’ a cihna thu in misite kithokiksak ding hi cih a lak ahi hi.
42020038	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian muhna ah mi khempeuh nungta ahih manin amah misite Pasian hilo in a nungtate Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42020039	Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, na thugen maan mahmah hi,” a ci uh hi.
42020040	Tua huna kipan in bangmah a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
42020041	Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute in banghang in Khazih pen David Tapa hi ci thei uh ahi hiam?
42020042	David mahmah in Late Bu sungah, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
42020043	“Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ a ci hi.
42020044	Tua ahih ciangin David in amah pen ‘Topa’ ci ahih leh bangci bangin ama tapa hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42020045	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mipite khempeuh zak dingin a nungzuite kiangah,
42020046	“Thukhamhilh siate tawh kisai in na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhin vak nuam uh a, sumbuuk phual ah zahtakna tawh a kihopih ding a ut uh hi. Kikhopna innte le pawikhamna innte ah mun hoih tata a deih uh hi.
42020047	Meigongte neihsa teng nek mangsak uh a, kineihna tawh thu sawtpipi a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite in a nasia zaw mawhna thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42021001	Zeisu a khuadak leh mihaute in a sumpi uh bung sungah a khiat uh mu a,
42021002	a zawng meigongnu khatin zong sumnenɠ tang nih a khiat a mu hi.
42021003	Tua ciangin amah in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang khempeuh sangin tam a khia zaw hi.
42021004	Banghang hiam cihleh midang khempeuh in a vum a leta a neihna sung panun Pasian sumpi ding a pia uh hi. Hihnu in ahih leh a zawnsa pipi in a kivak nading a neihsun teng a khia ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42021005	Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in biakinnpi zepna suangte a hoihzia le Pasian a kipia na manpha pipite thu a gen uh ciangin Zeisu in,
42021006	“Hih na muh uh suangte khat tungah khat zong kiciang loin, a kiphelkhiat hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
42021007	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Sia aw, hih thute cik ciangin hong piang ding ahi hiam? Hih thute hong tun ding ciangin theihsakna lim bang hong piang ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42021008	Amah in, “Kuamah in hong khem zawhloh nadingin kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Keimah in Khazih ka hi hi,’ ahih keileh, ‘A hun hong nai zo hi,’ ci in keima min tawh mi tampi hong pai in hong gen ding uh hi. Ahih hangin zui kei un.
42021009	Gal kidona thute za in gam sung buaina hong pian ciangin patau kei un. Hih thute a piang masa ding mah hi a, ahi zongin hun bei nading hi nailo hi,” a ci hi.
42021010	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Minam khat le minam khat, kumpigam khat le kumpigam khat hong kido ding uh hi.
42021011	Mun tuamtuam ah nakpi in zin hong ling dinga, kialpi le pul natnate hong tung ding hi. Vantung ah a dipkuathuai nate na mu ding uh a, limlamdang pipi zong hong piang ding hi.
42021012	“Ahih hangin hih thu khempeuh a pianma in note tungah a khut uh nga in hong bawlsia ding uh a, kikhopna innte le thong innte sungah hong ap ding uh hi. Keima min hangin kumpite le mangpite mai ah note hong kitun ding hi.
42021013	Ahi zongin tuate in note tecipan nadingin hun hoih a hong suak ding hi.
42021014	Tua hi a, na dawnkik nading uh na lunghimawh kholhloh nadingun khentatsa in nei un.
42021015	Banghang hiam cihleh na galte khempeuh in a hong langpan zawhloh nading le a hong nial zawhloh nadingun thugen siamna le lungpilna kong pia ding hi.
42021016	Na nu na pate, na sanggamte, na tanaute le na lawm na gualte in note hong lehhek ding uh a, thah ding dongin note pawlkhat hong tun ding uh hi.
42021017	Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
42021018	Ahi zongin note luzang a samzang khat nangawn a mangthang kei ding hi.
42021019	Thuak keikaina tawh na nuntakna uh na hu un.
42021020	“Galkap honpi in Jerusalem khuapi a umcih na muh uh ciangin tua khua a hawmsuak ding hita hi cih thei un.
42021021	Tua hun ciangin Judea gama om mite mualtung ah tai uh hen. Khuapi sunga om mite in khuapi nusia in gam sung a om mite khuapi sungah lut nawn kei uh hen.
42021022	Banghang hiam cihleh tua hun in Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa thu khempeuh a tangtun nadingin Pasian phulakna hun ahi hi.
42021023	Tua hun ciangin naupaaite le nawine lai naungek a nei nupite a genthei mahmah ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh hih gam sungah gentheihna lianpi tung dinga, hih mite tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung ding hi.
42021024	Namsau in si ding uh a, minamte khempeuh lakah amaute salin kikai ding hi. Gentile‑te in amau hun a kicin mateng Jerusalem khuapi a tuancil ding uh hi.
42021025	“Tua hun ciangin ni, kha le aksite ah limlamdangte a hong piang ding hi. Tuipi tuihualte nakpi in kilok dinga, leitung a om minamte lungzing in a amkham ding uh hi.
42021026	Vantung nate kiling dinga, mite in leitung a hong piang ding nate mukhol in lau in a sibup ding uh hi.
42021027	Tua ciangin vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh meiitung tuanga hong pai Mihing Tapa a mu ding uh hi.
42021028	Hih thute piang dingin a hong kipat ciangin na lu uh phong unla khuadak un. Banghang hiam cihleh note a hong kitatkhiat nading hun hong naita hi,” a ci hi.
42021029	Tua khit ciangin thugentehna khat gen a, “Theikung le singkung dang khempeuh na en un.
42021030	A teh a hong sel ciangin khuakhal dekta hi cih mu in na thei uh hi.
42021031	Tuamah bangin hih thute hong piang na muh uh ciangin Pasian kumpigam hong piang dekta hi cih na thei un.
42021032	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite a beima teitei in hih thu khempeuh a piang ding hi.
42021033	Van le lei a mangthang ding hi. Ahih hangin ka thute a mangthang peuhmah kei ding hi.
42021034	“Kigingsa in om un. Tua hi kei leh zukham pengnawngsa, leitung nuntak nading lungkham le lungkia in na om ding uh a, na upmawh loh laitak un tua Ni a hong tung ding hi.
42021035	Banghang hiam cihleh leitung bupa a teeng mi khempeuh tungah tua Ni in thang kisai bangin a hong tung ding hi.
42021036	Tua ahih manin hong tung ding hih thu khempeuh pan suakta in Mihing Tapa mai ah a ding dinga kilawm mite na suah theih nadingun pilvang unla thungen tawntung un,” a ci hi.
42021037	Amah in sunhun tengin biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilh a, zan ciangin paikhia in Tanluan mualah a om hi.
42021038	Tua ciangin zingsang tungin mi khempeuh ama thugen ngai dingin biakinnpi huangah hong pai uh hi.
42022001	Tu in Paisan Pawi kici, Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi hong tung dekta hi.
42022002	Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in Zeisu a thah theih nadingzia gel uh a, ahih hangin mipite a kihta uh hi.
42022003	Tua hun mahin sawm le nihte laka Iscariot a kici Judas sungah Satan a lut hi.
42022004	Tua khit ciangin amah pai in Zeisu lehhek a, a apzia ding siampi liante le biakinn cing bute tawh a kikum uh hi.
42022005	Amaute zong lungdam in sum piak dingin a kithukim uh hi.
42022006	Judas in zong kamciam pia a, mihonpi om loh laitak in amaute khutah a apkhiat theih nading hunhoih a zong hi.
42022007	Tu in, Paisan tuuno a kigawh ni ahi Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni hong tung hi.
42022008	Zeisu in Peter le John kiangah, “Va pai unla, Paisan Pawi an i nek nading mun va bawlkhol un,” ci in a sawl hi.
42022009	Amaute in, “Koi ah hong bawlsak le ung na ut hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42022010	Amah in, “En in, khuapi sung na lut uh ciangin tuibel a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Ama lutna inn ah lut unla,
42022011	inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nek nading zintunna inndei koilai hiam?” ci in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.
42022012	Tua ciangin amah in a kipuahsa, a za mahmah inndei tungnung khat hong lak ding hi. Tualai ah na bawl un,” a ci hi.
42022013	Amaute a pai uh ciangin ama gen bangin mu uh a, tualai ah Paisan Pawi an a bawl uh hi.
42022014	A hun a tun ciangin Zeisu in sawltak sawm le nihte tawh ankuang a umkhawm hi.
42022015	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka thuak ding hong tunma in note tawh hih Paisan Pawi an nekkhop ding ka lunggulh mahmah hi.
42022016	Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah Pasian kumpigam sungah hih na a tangtun mateng ka nekik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022017	Tua ciangin hai la a, lungdam ko in, “Hih hai la unla, a banban in dawn un.
42022018	Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah, Pasian kumpigam hong tun mateng lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022019	Tua khit ciangin anlum la in lungdam ko a, balkham in, “Hih in note aa dinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi. Kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” ci in amaute a pia hi.
42022020	Tuamah bangin nitak an a nek khit uh ciangin hai zong la a, “Hih hai in note aa dingin a luangkhia, ka sisan tawh a kibawl kiciamna thak ahi hi.
42022021	Ahih hangin en un, kei hong lehhekpa khutin kei tawh ankuang a sawkkhawm hi.
42022022	A kisehsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai loh phamawh ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah a lehhekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi!” a ci hi.
42022023	Tua ciangin amaute in tua banga a gamta ding kua pen i hi ding hiam, ci in a kidong uh hi.
42022024	Amaute lak panin kua lianpen ding ahi hiam cih zong a kisel uh hi.
42022025	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Gentile‑te kumpite in a mite uh ukcip in thu neihna zang uh a, amau le amau ‘deihsakna a neite’ a kici uh hi.
42022026	Ahih hangin note lakah tua bang ding ahi kei hi. Tua bang hilo in note laka a lianpenpa in a neupenpa bangin om hen. A makaipa in nasempa bangin om hen.
42022027	Sabuai tunga an a nepa le an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? An ne a tupa lianzaw hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin note lakah an a piapa bangin kong om hi.
42022028	Ahi zongin, note in gimna ka thuak sungteng nong ompih uh hi.
42022029	Ka Pa in kei tungah kumpigam hong piak mah bangin ken zong note tungah kong pia hi.
42022030	Keima kumpigam sungah ka ankuang umin na ne na dawn ding uh a, kumpi tokhom tungah tu in Israel minam sawm le nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42022031	Tua ciangin Topa in, “Simon, Simon aw! En in, Satan in an sep bangin nang hong sepkhia nuamin hong sawm hi.
42022032	Ahih hangin na upna na khahsuah loh nading thu kong ngetsak zo hi. Kei lamah nong kilehkik ciangin na sanggamte na hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
42022033	Ahih hangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, nang tawh thong a kiakhawm ding ahi zongin, a sikhawm ding ahi zongin a kigingsa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
42022034	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Peter aw, ken kong cih in ah amah ka thei kei hi, ci a, thumvei nong nial khit mateng tuni in aak a khuang kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022035	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Sumbawm, thungip le khedapte keng lo a kong paisak lai in na kisap uh a om hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kisap bangmah ka nei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42022036	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu in sumbawm neite in keng un. Thungip neite in zong keng un. Namsau a neilote in na puan uh zuak in lei un.
42022037	Ken kong cih in ah, ‘Thukham palsat mite tawh amah kisimkhawm hi,’ ci a, Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhsa thu a tangtung ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah tawh kisai thu khempeuh a tangtung ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022038	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, en in, hihlai ah namsau nih a om hi,” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Pha zo hi,” a ci hi.
42022039	Tua ciangin amah paikhia in ahih ngei bangin Tanluan mual ah pai a, a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
42022040	Tua mun a tun ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun thungen un,” a ci hi.
42022041	Tua khit ciangin amaute kiang pan suanglot khat tan bang paibeh in khukdin in thungen a,
42022042	“Pa aw, na deihna ahih leh hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin keima deihna bang hilo in nangma deihna bang hi hen,” a ci hi.
42022043	Tua ciangin vantung panin vantungmi khat ama kiangah hong kilang in tha a pia hi.
42022044	Amah lunggim mahmah ahih manin thu nak nget semsem a, a khua‑ulte sisan mal golpi bangin leilak ah a takkhia hi.
42022045	Thu a nget khit ciangin dingkhia a, a nungzuite kiangah a pai ciangin amaute a dahna hangun gimin ihmu in a om a mu hi.
42022046	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in ihmu na hi uh hiam? Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun tho unla thungen un,” a ci hi.
42022047	Tuateng a gen laitak mahin, en in, mihon khat a hong tung uh hi. Sawm le nihte lakah khat ahi Judas a kici pa in amaute hong makaih a, Zeisu nam dingin a kiangah a va naih hi.
42022048	Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
42022049	Ama kima om mite in a piang ding thuteng a theih uh ciangin ama kiangah, “Topa aw, namsau tawh ka vat ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42022050	Amaute khatin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi.
42022051	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Tua zah phazo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua pa bil lawngin a damsak hi.
42022052	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amah man dinga hong pai siampi liante, biakinn cing bute le makaite kiangah, “Guta buluh khat man ding bangin namsau le molhtum tawh hong kuan na hi uh hiam?
42022053	Biakinnpi huang sungah ni simin note tawh ka omlai in nong man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin tuhun in note hun hi a, khuamial in thu a neih hun ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42022054	Amah manin paikhiatpih uh a, Siampi Ukpa inn ah a lutpih uh hi. Peter in a gamla sim panin a galzuih hi.
42022055	Tu in amaute in inntual laizang ah meicih in awi uh a, Peter in zong amaute tawh mei‑awi in a tukhawm hi.
42022056	Peter mei‑awi a a om laitak in nasem numeino khatin amah mu a, a ettel khit ciangin, “Hih mipa zong ama pawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42022057	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Numei aw, amah ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
42022058	Tawlkhat khit ciangin midang khatin amah mu a, “Nang zong amaute pawl na hi hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Peter in, “Mipa aw, ka hi kei hi!” a ci hi.
42022059	Nai khat khit bang ciangin midang khatin, “Hihpa zong ama pawl taktak ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Galilee mi ahi hi,” ci in teltak in a gen hi.
42022060	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Mipa aw, na thugen ka thei kei hi!” a ci hi. Ama pau laitak mahin aak a hong khuang pah hi.
42022061	Topa kihei in Peter a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in, “Aak khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” ci a, Topa gensa thu phawkkik a,
42022062	pusuak in nakpitak in a kap hi.
42022063	Tu in, Zeisu a mante in amah zahko in a sat uh hi.
42022064	A mit a tuamsak khit uh ciangin a pang beng uh a, “Nang hong beng kua ahi hiam? Kamsanna tawh hong gen dih in!” a ci uh hi.
42022065	Zahpihna thudang tampi tawh zong amah a kosia uh hi.
42022066	Khua a vak phetin mipite makai vaihawmte, siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate hong kisutuah in thukhenteɠ kiangah amah paipih uh a,
42022067	“Amaute in, Khazih na hih leh hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Kong gen hangin na um kei ding uh hi.
42022068	Thu hong dong leng zong nong dawng kei ding uh a, nong khah tuan kei ding uh hi.
42022069	Tunung ciangin Mihing Tapa in a thahat Pasian taklam khutah a tu ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022070	Tua ciangin a vekpi un, “Tua ahih leh Pasian Tapa na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Na cih bangun ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
42022071	Amaute in, “Ama kam tektek panin za khinzo i hih manin teci dang bang kisam nawn ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42023001	Tua khit ciangin mihonpite a vekpi un dingkhia uh a, Pilate kiangah Zeisu a paipih uh hi.
42023002	Amaute in, “Hihpa in ka minam uh lam a khialsak hi. Amah le amah in Kumpi, Khazih ka hi hi ci in Caesar kumpipa tunga siah ka piak ding uh hong kham hi,” ci in a mawhmat uh hi.
42023003	Tua ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah, “Nang, Judahte Kumpipa na hi hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Na cih bangin ka hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
42023004	Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi liante le mipite kiangah, “Hihpa tungah khialhna ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.
42023005	Ahih hangin amaute uang semsem uh a, “Amah in Galilee gama kipan hih mun dong, Judea gam buppi ah thu hilhin mite a buaisak hi,” a ci uh hi.
42023006	Pilate in Galilee cih kammal a zak ciangin amah Galilee mi ahih leh ahih loh a dong hi.
42023007	Pilate in amah Herod uk sung mi ahihlam a theih ciangin tua laitak a Jerusalem khuapi a om Herod kiangah a puak hi.
42023008	Herod in Zeisu a muhnop sawt mahmah ahih manin amah a muh ciangin a nuam mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu thu tampi za khinzo a, Zeisu bawl nalamdang khatpeuh zong a mu kha dingin a kilamen hi.
42023009	Tua hi a, amah in thu tampi a dot hangin Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
42023010	Tua ciangin siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate dingto in nasiatak in amah a mawhmat uh hi.
42023011	Herod le a galkapte in simmawh bawl in zahko uh a, puantualpi hoih mahmah khat a silhsak khit uh ciangin Pilate kiangah a puakkik uh hi.
42023012	A beisa hunin Pilate le Herod khat le khat a kigalbawl den uh ahih hangin tua ni in lawmta a suak uh hi.
42023013	Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi liante, upa vaihawmte le mipite samkhawm in,
42023014	amaute kiangah, “Hihpa in mipi lamkhialsak hi ci in ka kiangah nong puak uh hi. En un, note mai mahmah ah thu ka sit khin a, na mawhmatnate uh tawh kisai in ama tungah khialhna ka mu kei hi.
42023015	Herod kiangah amah kong paipihsak a, amah in zong sih nading zah mawhna bangmah a mu tuan kei hi.
42023016	Tua ahih ciangin satin ka khah ding hi,” a ci hi.
42023017	Banghang hiam cihleh Pilate in tua pawi hun simin mi khat a khah khiatsak pen ngeina khat ahi hi.
42023018	Tua ciangin amaute thakhat in kiko uh a, “Hihpa that inla, Barabbas hong khahsak in,” a ci uh hi.
42023019	Barabbas in khuapi sunga thupiang kumpi langpanna le mithahna hanga thongkiapa ahi hi.
42023020	Tua ahih manin Pilate in Zeisu khah nuamin amaute tungah thu a genkik hi.
42023021	Ahih hangin amaute in, “Amah khailum in, amah khailum in!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
42023022	Tua ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in amah khailum ding ka hi hiam? Siatna bang bawl ahi hiam? Sih nading mawhna ama tungah ka mu kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin satin ka khah ding hi,” ci in a thumveina a genkik hi.
42023023	Ahih hangin amaute nakpitak in kiko uha amah khailup dingin a ngen teitei uh hi. Mipite le siampi liante awging in amah zothawh gawp
42023024	ahih manin Pilate in amaute ngetna bangin thu a khen hi.
42023025	Kumpi langpanna le mithahna hanga thong a kia amau ngetpa khahsak in Zeisu ahih leh amaute deih banga a bawl nadingun amaute tungah a piakhia hi.
42023026	Tu in, amah a paikhiatpih laitak un khuano pana hong pai Cyrene gam mi Simon a lammat uh hi. Singlamteh suanin puasak uh a, Zeisu nungah a paisak uh hi.
42023027	Mihonpi in amah zui uh a, tuate lakah Zeisu kah in a tamlo numeite pawlkhat zong a om uh hi.
42023028	Ahih hangin amaute lamah Zeisu kihei a, “Jerusalem tanute aw, kei hong kah kei un. No le na tate uh aa dingin kap zaw un.
42023029	Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Ta a neilo numei, a gil in nau a paai ngeilo, a nawi a kitep ngeilo numeite mihampha ahi uh hi,’ a cih hunte uh hong tung ding hi.
42023030	Tua hun ciangin amaute in, ‘Mual sangte aw, “Kote tungah hong cim un.” Mual niamte aw, “Kote hong vuk un,” ’ a ci ding uh hi.
42023031	“Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in singhing tungah hi ci bawl uh ahih leh singkeu tungah a bangci bawl ding uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
42023032	Migilo nih zong thah dingin amah tawh a paipih uh hi.
42023033	Calvary a kici mun a tun uh ciangin tualai ah amah a khai uh hi. Migilo nihte zong a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat a khai uh hi.
42023034	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih uh cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Amaute in lai‑aisan in a puante a hawm uh hi.
42023035	Mipite in dingin en uh a, upa vaihawmte zong amaute tawh a dingkhawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Amah in midangte honkhia hi. Pasian teelpa Khazih ahih leh amah le amah kihonkhia hen,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
42023036	Galkapte zong hong pai in lenggahtui thuk pia uh a,
42023037	“Judah mite Kumpipa na hih leh nang le nang kihonkhia in,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
42023038	“HIH IN JUDAHTE KUMPIPA,” ci in Greek lai, Latin lai le Hebrew lai tawh gelhin a lutung sanah a suang uh hi.
42023039	A kikhai migilote khat in, “Khazih na hih leh nang le nang kihonkhia inla kote zong hong honkhia in,” ci in a zahko hi.
42023040	A dang khatpa in tua pa taiigawp in, “Mawhsakna a thuak na hih lam kithei loin, Pasian kihta lo na hi hiam?
42023041	Eite gel bel i gamtatna tawh kizui in a hong kithukkik hilel a, i thuakna a thuman ahi hi. Ahi zongin hihpa in khialhna bangmah a bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
42023042	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, na kumpigam sung na tun ciangin kei hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
42023043	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuni in Paradise ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
42023044	Tua hun in nai guk pawl hi a, tua hun a kipan nai kua dong leitung bup ah khim a zing hi.
42023045	Ni mialin biakinnpi sung kideina puan phelnih a kisuah hi.

42023047	Galkap 100 ukpa in thupiang teng a muh ciangin, “Hihpa in midik taktak ahi hi,” ci in Pasian a phat hi.
42023048	A en dinga hong pai mi khempeuh in thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin a awm uh bengin a ciah uh hi.

42023051	Amah in amaute vaihawmna le a sepnate uh a thukimpih kei hi. Amah in Judahte khua lian khat ahi Arimathea khua mi hi a, Pasian kumpigam a lamen mi khat zong ahi hi.
42023052	Pilate kiangah amah pai in Zeisu luang a va ngen hi.

42023054	Tua ni in Kigin Niɠ hi a, Sabbath ni a kipan dekta hi.

42024001	Tu in nipi khat sunga ni masa pen ni, zingsang phalvak tungin tua numeite in a baihsa a a koih uh paknamtuite tawi in dai a hawh uh hi. Numei dangte pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi.

42024003	han sungah a lut uh leh Topa Zeisu luang a mu kei uh hi.

42024005	Numeite lau mahmah in leilak ah kunsuk a a om laitak un tua mite in, “Banghang in a nungta mi khat misite lakah zong na hi uh hiam?

42024007	‘Mihing Tapa in mimawhte khutah kipiakhia in singlamteh ah khai ding uh a, a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,’ ci in,” a gen hi.
42024008	Tua ciangin numeite in ama gensa thute a phawkkik uh hi.
42024009	Han panin amaute ciah uh a, sawm le khatte le a dangte khempeuh kiangah tua thuteng a gen uh hi.

42024021	Ahi zongin ko bel amah Israelte a tankhia ding pa hi ci in ka lamen uh hi. Tua thamlo in hih thuteng a pianzawh tu in ni thum phata hi.

42024027	Moses le Kamsangte laibu khempeuh a kipan Lai Siangtho buppi sunga ama thu a kigenna teng a khiatna a hilh hi.

42024030	Amaute tawh an ne a a tut uh ciangin amah in anlum la in lungdam ko a, balkham in amaute a pia hi.
42024031	Tua laitak in amaute mit kihong a, Zeisu ahihlam a thei uh hi. Ahi zongin amah na mang khin a, a mu nawn kei uh hi.
42024032	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Lampi ah hong hopih a Lai Siangtho khiatna khawng a hong genlai in i lungsim hong su kha mahmah hi,” a kici uh hi.
42024033	Tua hun mahin amaute dingkhia uh a, Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi. Tualai ah sawm le khatte le amau lawmte na kikhawm uh a,
42024034	“Topa thokik taktak in, Simon kiangah kilang hi,” a ci uh hi.
42024035	Amaute gel in zong lampi a thupiang teng le anlum a balkhap laitak a amaute a kitheihsakna teng a genkik uh hi.
42024036	Hih thute a gen laitak un amaute laizang ah Zeisu hong dinga, “Note tungah lungnopna om tahen,” a ci hi.
42024037	Ahi zongin amaute in sikha a mu kisa uh ahih manin lau in a linggawp uh hi.

42024039	Ka khut ka khete hong en un. Kei mahmah ka hi hi. Hong lawng unla thei un. Sikha in hih bangin satak le guh le tang neilo hi,” a ci hi.
42024040	Hih banga a gen khit ciangin a khut le a khete a lak hi.
42024041	Ahih hangin amaute nuamlua in lamdangsa mahmah in um zo nai tuanlo uh ahih manin amah in amaute kiangah, “Nek theih khatpeuh na nei uh hiam?” a ci hi.
42024042	Tua ciangin amaute in ngasa hankeu khat le khuailuzu phelkhat a pia uh hi.
42024043	Amah in sang a, amau muhin a ne hi.

42024045	Tua khit ciangin Lai Siangtho a theih nadingun amaute lungsim a honsak hi.
42024046	Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh bangin Khazih in hih bangin gimna thuak dinga, a ni thum ni in misite lak pan a thokik ding mah ahi hi.
42024047	Mawhna kisikkikna thu le mawhna maisakna thu Jerusalem khuapi pan kipan in minam khempeuh tungah ama min tawh a kitangko ding hi.
42024048	Hih thute teci a pang ding note na hi uh hi.
42024049	En un, ka Pa in note hong piak dinga a hong kamciamsa ahi Kha Siangtho kong sawl ding hi. Ahi zongin tunglam panin vangliatna in note a hong tuam khit mateng Jerusalem khuapi ah na ngak phot un,” a ci hi.
42024050	Tua ciangin Bethany khua dongah amaute a paipih hi. Tua ciangin a khutte lamto in amaute thupha a pia hi.
42024051	Amaute thupha a piak laitak in amaute kiang pan amah kilakhia a, vantung ah a kilato hi.
42024052	Amaute in amah bia uh a, tua khit ciangin lungdamna lianpi tawh Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi.
42024053	Amaute in Pasian min phat kawmsa le lungdam ko in biakinnpi huang sungah a om tawntung uh hi. Amen.
43001001	A kipatcil in Thu a om hi. Thu in Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi. Tua Thu in Pasian ahi hi.
43001002	A kipatcil in amah in Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi.
43001003	Na khempeuh ama tungtawn a kibawl hi a, a kibawl nate amah lo tawh a kibawl khat beek a om kei hi.
43001004	Ama sungah nuntakna om a, tua nuntakna in mihingte aa dingin khuavak ahi hi.
43001005	Tua khuavak in khuamial lakah tang a, khuamial in amah a zo kei hi.
43001006	Pasian hong sawl mi khat om a, tua pa minin John ahi hi.
43001007	Mi khempeuh in ama tungtawn in a up theih nadingun amah in Khuavak tawh kisai teci pang dingin a hong paipa ahi hi.
43001008	Amah, tua Khuavak hilo a, tua Khuavak thu teci a pang ding beka hong kisawl ahi hi.
43001009	Tua Khuavak in leitunga piang mi khempeuh a taankim Khuavak taktak ahi hi.
43001010	Amah leitung ah hong om a, ama tungtawn in leitung a kibawl hi napi leitung in amah a thei kei hi.
43001011	Amah a mite kianga hong pai hi napi a mite in amah a sang kei uh hi.
43001012	Ahih hangin amah sang a, ama min a um mi khempeuh Pasian tate suah theihna thu a pia hi.
43001013	Tua suahna pen sisan tawh hilo, ci le sa deihna zong hilo, mihing deihna hang zong hilo in Pasian deihna hanga suahna ahi hi.
43001014	Tua ciangin Thu in mihing hong suak a, eite lakah hong teengin eite in ama minthanna i mu hi. Tua in, Pa in khat bek a neih a Tapa a piak minthanna hi a, hehpihna le thuman thutak tawh a kidim hi.
43001015	Ama thu John in teci pang a, “ ‘Ka nunga hong paipa in kei pianma in om khinzo ahih manin kei sangin a lianzaw hi,’ kong cihpa in amah ahi hi,” ci in a kiko hi.
43001016	Eite khempeuh in ama kicinna sung panin hehpihna khat khit khat i ngah hi.
43001017	Banghang hiam cihleh Moses tungtawn in thukham hong kipia a, ahih hangin Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in hehpihna le thuman thutak hong pia hi.
43001018	Cikmah hunin kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahih hangin Pa ang sunga om Tapa khat bekin Pasian hong pulakkhia hi.
43001019	Hih in John teci panna ahi hi. Judah mite in John kiangah, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci a, a dong dingin Jerusalem khuapi panin siampi liante le Levi mite a sawl uh hi.
43001020	Tua ciangin John in, “Keimah in Khazih ka hi kei hi,” ci in ki‑iim loin siangtak in a kigen hi.
43001021	Amaute in, “Tua ahih leh nang kua na hi hiam? Elijah na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi. “Tua ahih leh Kamsangpa na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43001022	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kua na hi hiam? Ko hong sawlte kiangah ka genkik theih nadingun nang kua kici na hi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
43001023	Amah in, “Kamsangpa Isaiah gen bangin, ‘ “Topa lampi na tangsak un,” Ci a, gamlak a kiko awging,’ ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43001024	Tu in, amaute in Pharisee pawlte sawl mite ahi uh hi.
43001025	Amaute in, “Nang Khazih hilo, Elijah hilo, Kamsangpa lah hilo na hih leh banghang in mite tuiphum na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
43001026	John in, “Mite tui tawh ka phum mah hi. Ahih hangin na theihloh uh mi khat note lakah a om hi.
43001027	Ka nunga hong paipa in kei sangin vanglian zaw a, ama khedapkhau sut ding nangawn in ka kilawm kei hi kong cihpa in amah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43001028	Hih thute in John tuiphumna mun Jordan gungal khat a om Bethabara khua‑a a piang thute ahi hi.
43001029	A zingciang in John in ama kianglam manawh a hong pai Zeisu mu a, “En un! Leitung mite mawhna a puakhia Pasian Tuuno!
43001030	‘Kei omma in amah om khin ahih manin kei sangin lianzaw a, kei nungah hong pai ding hi,’ kong cihpa in hihpa ahi hi.
43001031	Keimah in amah ka theih loh hangin tuiphum dinga kong paina in Israel mite lakah amah a kilatkhiat theih nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43001032	Tua banah, John in teci panga a gen in ah, “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong kumsuk a ama tungah a khawl ka mu hi.
43001033	Keimah in amah ka theih loh hangin tuiphum dinga hong sawlpa in, ‘Kha hong kumsuk a, a tungah a khawl na muh leh tua pa in Kha Siangtho tawh a phum ding pa ahi hi,’ hong ci hi.
43001034	Tua bangin ama tungah hong piang mu khin ka hih manin hihpa in Pasian Tapa ahi hi ci in teci ka pang hi,” a ci hi.
43001035	A zingciang in John le a nungzui nihte, a dinkhop laitak un,
43001036	Zeisu hong pai mu uh a, John in, “En un, Pasian Tuuno!” a ci hi.
43001037	A nungzui nihte in John thugen a zak uh ciangin Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
43001038	Tua ciangin Zeisu kihei a, amaute gel in a zuih uh a muh ciangin, “Bang zong na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Rabbi aw, na omna koilai ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. (Rabbi a khiatna in “siapa” cihna ahi hi.)
43001039	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai unla hong en un,” a ci hi. Amaute pai uh a, a omna mun a mu uh hi. Tua hun in nai sawm pawl hita ahih manin amah tawh tua ni a tamkhawm uh hi.
43001040	John thugen za a, Zeisu nung a zui nihte lakah khatin Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew ahi hi.
43001041	Andrew in a sanggampa Simon va zong masa a, “Messiah ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi. (Messiah a khiatna in “Pasian Sathau‑nilhpa” cihna ahi hi.)
43001042	Andrew in Zeisu kiangah a sanggampa a paipih hi. Zeisu in amah en a, “Nang Jonah tapa Simon na hi hi. Cephas hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi. (Cephas a khiatna in “suang” cihna ahi hi.)
43001043	A zingciang in Galilee ah Zeisu paisawm a, Philip a muh ciangin, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.
43001044	Philip zong Bethsaida khua pan mah hi a, Andrew le Peter‑te khuapih ahi hi.
43001045	Philip in Nathanael a muh ciangin, “Moses in Thukham laibu sunga a gelh le Kamsangte in laibu sunga a gelh uh Joseph tapa, Nazareth khua mi Zeisu ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
43001046	Nathanael in, “Nazareth khua panin a hoih na khat peuhpeuh piang thei zawzen ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Philip in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” a ci hi.
43001047	Zeisu in Nathanael ama kianglam zuana hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, hihpa in a lungsim ah zuauthu a omlo Israel mi taktak ahi hi!” a ci hi.
43001048	Nathanael in, “Kei hong bangci theih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Philip in nang hong sapma, theikung nuai‑a na om laitak in kong mu zo hi,” a ci hi.
43001049	Nathanael in, “Rabbi aw, nang in Pasian Tapa na hi a, Israel mite Kumpipa zong na hi hi!” ci in a dawng hi.
43001050	Zeisu in, “ ‘Theikung nuai‑a na omlai pekin kong mu zo hi,’ ka cih manin hong um na hi hiam? Hihte sanga a lianzaw nate na mulai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43001051	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tunung ciangin van kihong in Mihing Tapa tungah Pasian vantungmite a kumsuk le a kahto a om na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
43002001	A ni thumna ni in Galilee gam Cana khua ah mopawi khat om a, Zeisu nu in zong a va sim hi.
43002002	Zeisu le a nungzuite zong tua mopawi sim dingin a kisam hi.
43002003	Lenggahzu a bei ciangin a nu in Zeisu kiangah, “Amaute in lenggahzu nei nawnlo uh hi,” ci in a ko hi.
43002004	Zeisu in, “Numei aw, banghang in na lung hihmawhna hong ko zenzen na hi hiam? Ka hun a tung nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
