43002005	A nu in nasemte kiangah, “Ama hong cih bangbang in na hih un,” a ci hi.
43002006	Tualai ah Judah mite kisiansuahna a kizang, khat sungah tui gallon 20 gallon 30 bang a ta thei, thambel guk a om hi.
43002007	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih bel teng tui dim un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in belgong dong dimin tui a sung uh hi.
43002008	Zeisu in, “Tu in, pawlkhat suak unla, pawi ukpa va pia un,” a ci hi. Amaute in zong suakin a pia uh hi.
43002009	Pawi ukpa in lenggahzu a kisuaksak tua tui a ciam hi. Tua lenggahzu koi pan kingah hiam cih tuitawi nasemte in a theih uh hangin amah in thei lo ahih manin mopipa sam a,
43002010	“Midangte in lenggahzu a ciilteng hawm masa in a kikham khit ciangin a pengteng hawm pan uh hi. Banghang in tu dongin a ciilteng sit lai na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43002011	Zeisu in Galilee gam Cana khua ah a masapen hih nalamdang bawl in ama vangliatna a kilangsak hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in amah a um uh hi.
43002012	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a nu, a sanggamte le a nungzuite tawh Capernaum khua ah paisuk uh a, tualai ah tawmvei sung a taam uh hi.
43002013	Tu in Judah mite Paisan Pawi hong naita ahih manin Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paito hi.
43002014	Biakinnpi huang sungah bawng zuak, tuu zuak, vakhu zuakte le sumkhek in summet bawla a omte a mu hi.
43002015	Amah in khautep khat bawl in tuute, bawngte le mi khempeuh biakinnpi huang sung panin a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhekteɠ sumteng buakkhiatsak in sabuaite zong a lumlet hi.
43002016	Vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Hihte lakhia un! Ka Pa inn sumlei sumzuakna inn suaksak kei un!” a ci hi.
43002017	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Na inn ka khualna in kei hong netum hi,” ci a, kigelhsa thu a phawk uh hi.
43002018	Judah mite in, “Hih bang na hih theih nadingin thuneihna na neih lam bang lim tawh hong lak ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43002019	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih biakinnpi susia le uh cin ni thum sungin ka lamkik ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43002020	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Hih biakinnpi kum 46 sung vilvel a kilam ahi hi. Nang ni thum sungin dingkiksak zo zawzen ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43002021	Ahih hangin Zeisu in biakinnpi a cih ciangin ama pumpi a genna ahi hi.
43002022	Tua hi a, misite lak pan amah a kithawhkiksak khit ciangin a nungzuite in amaute kiangah hih thu a gen khit lam phawkkik uh a, Lai Siangtho le Zeisu thugente a um uh hi.
43002023	Tu in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paisan Pawi hun sungin Zeisu a om hi. Tua pawi sunga a bawl nalamdangte a muh uh ciangin mitampi in ama min a um uh hi.
43002024	Ahih hangin amah in mi khempeuh thei ahih manin amaute tungah a mah ki‑ap lo hi.
43002025	Amah in mihing lungsim sungah bang om cih thei khin ahih manin mi khat thu midang khatin a gen ding a kisam kei hi.
43003001	Nicodemus kici Judah mite upa vaihawm Pharisee pawlte khat a om hi.
43003002	Hihpa in zan laitak in Zeisu kiangah va pai a, “Rabbi aw, Pasian in amah a ompih kei leh kuama peuhin na bawl nalamdangte bawl theilo ding ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai siapa khat na hih lam kong thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43003003	Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mi khat a suahkik kei leh Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43003004	Nicodemus in, “Mi khat a tek khit ciangin bangci suahkik theih ding ahi hiam? A nu gil sungah khatvei lutkik in suak thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43003005	Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tui le Kha tawh a suakkiklo mi peuhmah Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut thei kei ding hi.
43003006	Ci le sa pana suakte ci le sa mah hi a, Kha pana suakte zong kha mah ahi hi.
43003007	‘Na suahkik loh phamawh hi,’ kong cih pen lamdangsa kei in.
43003008	Huih in a utna peuh ah nung a, a huging na zak hangin koi lampan hong nung a, koilam manawh hiam cih na thei kei hi. Kha tawh a suak mi khempeuh zong tua bang ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43003009	Nicodemus in, “Hih thute koici pian theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43003010	Zeisu in, “Nang Israel mite siapa khat hi napi in hih thute thei lo zawzen na hi hiam?
43003011	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kote in ka theih uh thu genin ka muh uh thu teci ka pang uh hi. Ahih hangin note in kote teci panna na sang kei uh hi.
43003012	Leitung thu kong gente um lo na hih uh leh vantung thute hong genleng, bangci up theih ding na hi uh hiam?
43003013	Vantung ah omin vantung pana hong kumsuk Mihing Tapa longal vantung ah a kahto kuamah a om kei hi.
43003014	Moses in gamlak ah gul a khai bangin Mihing Tapa kikhai ding hi.
43003015	Amah a um mi khempeuh in kisialo a nuntak tawntungna a neih nading ahi hi.
43003016	“Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin khat bek a neihsun a Tapa a hong pia hi. Tua Tapa a um mi khempeuh in kisialo a nuntak tawntungna a ngah nading ahi hi.
43003017	“Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite mawhsak dingin Pasian in a Tapa leitung ah hong sawl hilo in leitung mite in ama tungtawn a hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingin hong sawl ahi hi.
43003018	Amah a um mi in thukhenna a thuak kei hi. Ahih hangin a umlo mi ahih leh Pasian in khat bek a neihsun a Tapa min um lo ahih manin tu mahmah in thukhenna a thuakzo hi.
43003019	Hih thukhenna in leitung ah khuavak hong tung khin napi mite a gamtatna uh hoih lo ahih manin khuavak sangin khuamial a deih zaw uh hi.
43003020	Siatna a bawl mi peuhmah in khuavak mudah a, khuavak a zuan kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a gamtatnate uh kipholak kha ding ahih man ahi hi.
43003021	Ahi zongin thuman in a gamta mi in ama gamtatnate Pasian deihna tawh kituak hi cih a kitelmuh nadingin khuavak a zuan hi,” a ci hi.
43003022	Hih thuteng khit ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite tawh Judea gamah pai in tualai ah amaute tawh omkhawm a, mite tui a phum hi.
43003023	Tu in John in zong Salim khua tawh kinai Aenon ah tuiphum in a om hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tualai ah tui tampi a om hi. Mite hong pai in tui a kiphumsak uh hi.
43003024	Banghang hiam cihleh John thong sungah a kikhum nai kei hi.
43003025	Tua ciangin kisiansuahna thu tawh kisai in John nungzuite le Judah mite a kisel uh hi.
43003026	Amaute John kiangah pai uh a, “Rabbi aw, Jordan gungal khatah nangmah tawh a omkhawm ngei ama thu teci na panpa in mite tui a phum hi. En in, mi khempeuh in ama nung a zui khin ta uh hi!” a ci uh hi.
43003027	Tua ciangin John in, “Vantung panin a kipiak kei leh kuamah in bangmah a bawlthei kei ding hi.
43003028	‘Kei Khazih hilo in ama mai‑a kisawlpa ka hi hi,’ ci a, kong genna ah no mahmah ka teci na hi uh hi.
43003029	A kipi monu in zineipa aa ahi hi. Zineipa kianga a ding bawmtapa in zineipa aw a zak ciangin a lungdam mahmah hi. Keima lungdamna zong tua banglian mah hi a, tu in ka lungdamna kicing zo hi.
43003030	Amah lian semsem dinga kei ka hih leh ka neu semsem ding hi.
43003031	“Tung lam pana hong paipa in na khempeuh tungah a lianpenpa ahi hi. Leitung pana a piang mi in leitung mi hi a, leitung thu a gen hi. Vantung pana hong paipa ahih leh na khempeuh tungah a lianpenpa ahi hi.
43003032	Amah in a muhsa le a zaksa thu teci hong pan hangin kuamah in ama teci panna a sang kei uh hi.
43003033	Ama teci panna a sang mi in Pasian a thuman hi cih a kipsak ahi hi.
43003034	Pasian sawlpa in Pasian thu a gen hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama tungah ciangtan om loin Kha a pia hi.
43003035	Pa in a Tapa it a, ama khut sungah na khempeuh a pia hi.
43003036	Tapa a um mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Ahih hangin Tapa a umlo mi in nuntakna neilo dinga, Pasian hehna ama tungah a om hi,” a ci hi.
43004001	John sangin Zeisu in mi tam tuiphum zaw in nungzui tam a ngah zawk lam Pharisee pawlte in a zak uh Topa in a thei hi.
43004002	(Zeisu tektek in tui a phum loh hangin a nungzuite in tui a phum ahi hi.)
43004003	Tua ciangin amah in Judea gam nusia in Galilee gamah a paikik hi.
43004004	Tua banga a pai ciangin Samaria gam a nawk kul hi.
43004005	Tua ciangin Jacob in a tapa Joseph a piak logam tawh kinai, Samaria gam Sychar kici khua a hong tung hi.
43004006	Tu in tua munah Jacob tuikhuk a om hi. Zeisu a lampaina gim ahih manin tua tuikhuk gei ah a tu hi. Tua hun in nai guk pawl ahi hi.
43004007	Tua laitak in Samaria numei khat tuitawi dingin hong pai a, Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ka dawn ding tui hong pia in,” a ci hi.
43004008	Banghang hiam cihleh a nungzuite khua sungah an lei dingin a paikhia uh hi.
43004009	Tua ciangin Samaria numei in ama kiangah, “Nang Judah mi hi napi in banghang in Samaria numei keima kiangah tui hong ngen na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite le Samaria mite a kipawl thei kei uh hi.
43004010	Zeisu in, “Pasian hong piak letsong thei in, ‘Ka dawn ding tui hong pia in,’ a cipa kua hiam cih thei lecin ama kiangah tui na ngen khinzo dinga, amah in nuntakna tui nang a hong pia khinzo ding hi,” a ci hi.
43004011	Numei in, “Sia aw, tui khai nading bangmah na nei kei a, tuikhuk lah thuk ahih manin tua nuntakna tui koi pan ngah ding na hi hiam?
43004012	Hih tuikhuk hong piapa, ka pupi uh Jacob sangin lianzaw na hi hiam? Amah a kipan a tate le a ganhingte in hih tuikhuk tui a nek uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43004013	Zeisu in tua nu kiangah, “Hih tui a dawn mi peuhmah a dangtakkik ding hi.
43004014	Ahih hangin ken ka piak tui a dawn mi peuhmah in a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ka piak ding tui in tua mi sungah tuikhuk suak dinga, tua tuikhuk panin nuntak tawntungna tui a phul ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43004015	Numei in, “Sia aw, ka dangtak nawnloh nading le hih munah tuitawi a ka paikik nawnloh nadingin tua tui hong pia in,” ci in a ngen hi.
43004016	Zeisu in, “Pai inla na pasal va sam in. Tua khit ciangin hong paikik un,” a ci hi.
43004017	Numei in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi,” a cih ciangin, Zeisu in, “ ‘Pasal ka nei kei hi,’ na cih pen a maan hi.
43004018	Banghang hiam cihleh pasal nga na nei khinzo a, tu‑a na neih pen zong na pasal hilo ahih manin thuman na gen hi,” a ci hi.
43004019	Numei in, “Sia aw, kamsang khat na hih lam kong thei hi.
43004020	Ka pute ka pate un hih mualtung ah Pasian a bia uh hi. No Judah mite in Jerusalem khuapi bekah Pasian kibia ding hi na ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004021	Zeisu in, “Numei aw, ka thu gen hong um in. Hih mualtung ah ahi a, Jerusalem khuapi ah ahi zongin Pa a kibiakloh hun hong tung ding hi.
43004022	Note in na theih lohpi uh na bia uh hi. Kote in ka theih uh ka bia uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite tung panin hotkhiatna hong piang hi.
43004023	Ahih hangin a bia taktakte in kha le thuman thutak tawh Pasian a biak ding hun uh tu in hong tung zota hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua banga amah a bia ding mite Pa in a zong hi.
43004024	Pasian in Kha ahi hi. Amah a biate in lungsim le thuman thutak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004025	Numei in ama kiangah, “Khazih kici Messiah hong pai ding hi cih ka thei hi. Amah a hong tun ciangin na khempeuh a hong hilhcian ding hi,” a ci hi.
43004026	Zeisu in, “Nangmah tawh a kiho keimah in tua Messiah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43004027	Tua laitak in a nungzuite hong tungkik uh a, tua numei tawh a kihona lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi zongin, “Bang na deihna ahi hiam?” cih ahi a, “Banghang in tua nu hopih na hi hiam?” cih ahi zongin kuamah in a dong ngam kei uh hi.
43004028	Tua khit ciangin numei in a tuibel nusia in khua sungah tai a, a khuapihte kiangah,
43004029	“Hong pai unla, ka gamtatna khempeuh hong genpa hong en un. Amah Khazih hilo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43004030	Tua ciangin amaute khua sung panin Zeisu kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
43004031	Amaute hong tunma in a nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, an ne in,” a ci uh hi.
43004032	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Note theihloh nek ding an khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
43004033	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Mi khatpeuh in nek theih ding khatpeuh puak khin ahi kha ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
43004034	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong sawlpa deihna bang sem a, ama hong piak nasep ka zawhna in ka annek ahi hi.
43004035	‘Tu zawh kha li khit ciangin an kila ding hi,’ ci hilo na hi uh hiam? Ken kong cih in ah khuadak unla lote en un. Ante min khin a, anlak hun hong tungzo hi!
43004036	A vawhpa le anlapa a lungdam khop theih nadingun anlapa in thaman sangin nuntak tawntungna gah zong a kaikhawm ding hi.
43004037	Tua ahih manin mi khatin vawh a, midang khatin a at hi a kici thu a maan hi.
43004038	Note khawhlohna lo ah an la dingin kong sawl hi. Midangte in na kho uh a, note in amaute sepsa a la ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004039	“Ka gamtatna khempeuh hong gen hi,” a ci tua numeinu teci panna hangin Samaria khua mi tampi in Zeisu a um uh hi.
43004040	Samaria khua mite Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin amau khua ah a taam dingin kho uh a, tua khua ah ni nih a taam hi.
43004041	Ama thugenna hangin thu‑um mi tampi a kibehlap hi.
43004042	Tua khit ciangin amaute in numeinu kiangah, “Nang nong gen hang beka um ka hi nawn kei uh hi. Kote mahmah in ama thugen za in, amah in leitung mite a Honpa Khazih taktak hi cih ka theih manun a um ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43004043	Ni nih khit ciangin tua khua panin Zeisu paikhia a, Galilee gam a tung hi.
43004044	Zeisu in, “Kamsang khat ama pianna gamah kipahtawi lo hi,” a ci hi.
43004045	Galilee gam a tun ciangin Galilee mite in amah a sang uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Jerusalem khuapi ah pawisim in a pai lai un Zeisu nasep khempeuh a mu khinzo uh hi.
43004046	Tuisik lenggahzu a suahsakna Galilee gam Cana khua ah Zeisu a paikik hi. Tua laitak in Capernaum khua‑a om kumpi nasem ulian khatpa tapa cina in a om hi.
43004047	Tua pa in Judea gam panin Galilee gamah Zeisu hong tung cih thu a zak ciangin a kiangah va pai a, “Ka tapa cina in a si ding hita hi. Hong pai inla, hong damsak in,” ci in a thum hi.
43004048	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Note in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite na muh kei ngal uh leh na um peuhmah kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004049	Ulianpa in, “Sia aw, ka tapa a sihma in hong paisuk tapeuh in!” a ci hi.
43004050	Zeisu in, “Ciah in na tapa a damzo hi,” a ci hi. Tua pa in Zeisu thugen um ahih manin a ciah pah hi.
43004051	Amah a paisuk laitak in a nasemte in na dawntuah uh a, “Na tapa a damzo hi!” ci in a ko uh hi.
43004052	Amah in a tapa dam hun a dot ciangin amaute in, “Zan ni nai sagih hunin a cisa natna hong dam hi,” a ci uh hi.
43004053	Zeisu in, “Na tapa a damzo hi,” a cih hun lian mahin a dam lam a pa in a theih ciangin amah le a innkuanpih khempeuh in Zeisu a um uh hi.
43004054	Hih in Judea gam pan Galilee gamah Zeisu a tun khit nalamdang a bawl a nihveina ahi hi.
43005001	Tua khit ciangin Judah mite pawikhat hong tung a, Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a hawhto hi.
43005002	Tu in, Jerusalem khuapi a Tuu Kongpi kiangah Hebrew pau in Bethesda a kici bual khat om a, tua bual kimkot ah buuk nga a om hi.
43005003	Tua buukte sungah mittaw, khebai, khutzaw, khezaw a kipan cina tampi tui kilok ding ngakin a lum uh hi.
43005004	Banghang hiam cihleh a hun khat ciangin tua bual ah vantungmi khat hong kumsuk in tui a lok hi. Tui a kilawh laitak tui sunga a kidiah masa penpen a natna khempeuh a damsiang pahpah hi.
43005005	Tua munah kum 38 sung a kumzawn mi khat a om hi.
43005006	Tua pa a lupsa a om Zeisu in mu a, a nat zawh sawt khinzo hi cih thei ahih manin, “Na dam nuam hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
43005007	Cinapa in, “Sia aw, tui a kilawh laitak bual ah hong paipih ding mi ka neih loh banah kei thu a ka pai ciangin ka mai ah midang khat ta na tung khin pahpah hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43005008	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Tho in na lupna pua inla pai in,” a ci hi.
43005009	Tua ciangin tua pa dam pah a, a lupna pua in lam a pai hi. Tua ni in Sabbath ni ahi hi.
43005010	Tua ciangin Judah mite in damna a ngahpa kiangah, “Sabbath ni, tuni in na lupna na puak thukham tawh kituak lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
43005011	Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei hong damsakpa in, ‘Na lupna pua inla, pai in,’ hong ci hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43005012	Tua ciangin amaute in, “ ‘Na lupna pua inla pai in,’ hong cipa kua ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
43005013	Tua muna om mihonpite lak panin Zeisu kihemkhia ahih manin damna a ngahpa in amah a damsakpa a thei kei hi.
43005014	Tua nung ciangin Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah tua cinapa mukik a, ama kiangah, “En in, tu in damta na hih manin nang tungah a siahuai zaw khatpeuh a hong tun loh nadingin mawhna na bawl nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
43005015	Tua pa paikhia a, amah a damsakpa Zeisu ahihlam Judah mite kiangah a gen hi.
43005016	Zeisu in hih nate Sabbath ni in bawl ahih manin Judah mite in amah bawlsia a a thah theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi.
43005017	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Ka Pa in tu dongin nasem ahih manin ken zong ka sem hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43005018	Tua hi a, Zeisu in Sabbath ni a tan loh banah Pasian nangawn ka Pa hi ci in Pasian tawh a kikim in kikoih ahih manin Judah mite in amah a that nuam semsem uh hi.
43005019	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Tapa in Pa nasep a muh banga a sep lohngal ama thu in bangmah a semthei kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pa sep bangbang Tapa in zong a sem ahi hi.
43005020	Pa in Tapa it ahih manin ama nasep khempeuh a lak hi. Tua ahih manin hihte sanga nasep thupi zawte, amah laklai dinga, note in lamdang na sa mahmah ding uh hi.
43005021	Pa in misite thosak a, nuntakna a piak bangin Tapa in zong a piak nop mite tungah nuntakna a pia hi.
43005022	Pa in kuama tungah thukhen lo a, thukhenna khempeuh Tapa khut sungah a ap khinzo hi.
43005023	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in Pa a pahtawi bangin Tapa zong a pahtawi theih nading uh ahi hi. Tapa a pahtawilo mi in Pa in a sawlpa zong a pahtawi lo ahi hi.
43005024	“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, keima thu za a, kei hong sawlpa a um mi in nuntak tawntungna neizo ahih manin thukhenna a thuak kei ding hi. Sihna pan paikhia in nuntakna a tungzo hi.
43005025	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, misite in Pasian Tapa aw a zak ding hun hong tung ding hi. Tu in hong tungzo a, tua aw a za mite a nungta ding uh hi.
43005026	Banghang hiam cihleh Pa in ama sungah nuntakna a neih bangin Tapa in zong ama sungah nuntakna a neih nadingin Pa in thu a piazo hi.
43005027	Amah Mihing Tapa ahih manin thukhen theih nading thuneihna zong a pia hi.
43005028	“Hih thu lamdangsa kei un, han sunga om mite khempeuh in ama aw za in,
43005029	a hong pusuah hun uh hong tung dinga, a pha in a gamtate in a nungta dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a sia in a gamtate in mawhsakna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi.
43005030	Keima ut thu in bangmah ka hih kei hi. Ka zak bang beka thu a khen ka hi hi. Keima deihna zui loin kei hong sawlpa ka Pa deihna bang zui ka hih manin ka thukhenna a maan hi.
43005031	“Kei le kei teci a kipang hi leng, ka teci panna a maan kei ding hi.
43005032	Kei aa dingin teci pang a dang khat om a, ama teci panna in thuman hi cih ka thei hi.
43005033	“Note in John kiangah thudong dingin mi na sawl uh a, amah in thuman thutak teci a pangzo hi.
43005034	Tua ka cih ciangin mihing teci panna a kisam ka hi kei a, note hong kihotkhiat theih nadingin hih thute a hong gen ka hi hi.
43005035	Amah in meivak bangin kuangin tang a, note in ama khuavak sungah tawlkhat sung nopsak ding na ut uh hi.
43005036	“Ahih hangin John teci panna sanga a lianzaw teci khat ka nei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pa in ka zawh dinga hong piak nasepte ka sem a, Pa in kei a hong sawl lam tua nasepte in teci a pang uh hi.
43005037	Kei hong sawlpa ka Pa mahmah in kei aa dingin teci a pangzo hi. Note in cikmah hunin ama aw na za ngei kei uh a, a mel zong na mu ngei kei uh hi.
43005038	Ahih hangin ama hong sawlpa um lo na hih manun note sungah ama thu a teeng kei hi.
43005039	Nuntak tawntungna ngah theih nading lametna tawh, Lai Siangtho na limsim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Lai Siangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi,
43005040	nuntakna na neih nadingun keima kiangah nong pai nuam kei uh hi.
43005041	“Keimah in mite pahtawi dingin thu ka gen kei hi.
43005042	Ahih hangin note in Pasian na it loh lam uh kong thei hi.
43005043	Ka Pa minin kong pai a, nong sang kei uh hi. Midang khatpeuh ama minin hong pai leh na sang ding uh hi.
43005044	Pasian khat bek kiang pana a hong pai pahtawina zong loin khat le khat kipahtawi thuk ding a ut zaw note in bangci in um thei ding na hi uh hiam?
43005045	“Ahi zongin Pa mai ah note hong mawhsak dingin hong ngaihsun kei un. Note hong mawhsak dingpen na muanpa uh Moses ahi hi.
43005046	Banghang hiam cihleh Moses in keima thu gelh ahih manin amah um taktak le uh teh kei zong nong um ding uh hi.
43005047	Ahih hangin ama laigelhte um lo na hih manun kong gen thute bangci up theih ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43006001	Hih thuteng khit ciangin Tiberias tuipi kici Galilee tuili gal khat ah Zeisu a galkah hi.
43006002	Tua ciangin cinate tunga a bawl nalamdangte mihonpite in mu khin uh ahih manin ama nung a zui uh hi.
43006003	Mualtung ah Zeisu kahto in tualai ah a nungzuite tawh a tukhawm hi.
43006004	Tu in Judah mite Paisan Pawi a naita hi.
43006005	Tua ciangin Zeisu khuadak a, ama kianga hong zuan mihonpite a muh ciangin Philip kiangah, “Hih mite nek ding anlum koi pan lei ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43006006	A sep ding teng a theih khitsa hi napi, Philip lungsim a ze‑et nop manin tua bangin a dong ahi hi.
43006007	Philip in amah dawng a, “Denariusɠ 200 man anlum i lei zongin bangmah thamin kihil zolo dinga, mikim in tawmkhat tekin kitang ding hi,” a ci hi.
43006008	Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew kici a nungzuite khatin ama kiangah,
43006009	“Hihlai ah mangbuh anlum nga le ngasaneu tawn nih a nei naupangno khat om hi. Ahih hangin mihon hi zahta nek dingin bangmah tham hilo hi,” a ci hi.
43006010	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Mite tusak un,” ci in a sawl hi. Tua munah lopa tampi po ahih manin mite tu uh a, pasal 5,000 bang a pha hi.
43006011	Zeisu in anlum la in lungdam a koh khit ciangin nungzuite pia a, nungzuite in tua a tu mipite lakah a hawmsawn uh hi. Tuamah bangin ngasa zong a deih zahzah un a hawmsawn uh hi.
43006012	An a kham khit uh ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “A kikhamval themneng teng thelthangsak loin kaikhawm un,” a ci hi.
43006013	Amaute in a kaihkhop uh ciangin anlum nga panin a kikhamval a themneng lawh sawm le lawh nih dim a ngah uh hi.
43006014	Tua mite in Zeisu bawl nalamdang a muh uh ciangin, “Hihpa in leitung a hong pai ding kamsangpa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
43006015	Tua ciangin tua mite in amah kumpi dingin thatang koihsawm uh hi cih thu Zeisu in a theih ciangin amah guak mual tungah a kihemkhiakik hi.
43006016	Tu in nitak lam hong hita a, a nungzuite tuili ah paisuk in,
43006017	gunkuang ah tuang uh a, Capernaum khua zuanin a pai uh hi. Khua hong mialta a, Zeisu lah amau kiang tung nailo hi.
43006018	Tua bangin a pai laitak un huihpi nung ahih manin tuihual hong kilok hi.
43006019	Tai thum tai li bang a pai khit uh ciangin gunkuang lam zuanin tui tunga hong pai Zeisu mu uh a, a lau uh hi.
43006020	Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Keimah ka hi hi. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
43006021	Amaute in lungdamtak in gunkuang tungah Zeisu tuangsak in a pai nading mun uh a tung pah uh hi.
43006022	A zingciang in tuili gal khat a om mihonpite in a nungzuite tuanna gunkuang neu khat longal gunkuang dang mu lo uh hi. Tua banah Zeisu le a nungzuite gunkuang tuangkhawm loin a nungzuite bek paikhia uh ahihlam zong a phawk uh hi.
43006023	Ahi zongin Tiberias panin gunkuang tawh midangte hong pai uh a, Topa in lungdam a koh khit cianga anlum a nekna mun a tung uh hi.
43006024	Tualai ah Zeisu le a nungzuite a om loh lam mihonpite in a theih uh ciangin Zeisu zong dingin gunkuang tuangin Capernaum khua ah a pai uh hi.
43006025	Tuipi gal khat ah Zeisu a muh uh ciangin, “Rabbi aw, bang hunin hihlai na tung na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
43006026	Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, nalamdangte na muh manun hong zong na hi kei uh hi. Gilvahtak in anlum na nek manun hong zong na hi zaw uh hi.
43006027	A siathei an ngah nadingin hanciam kei un. Mihing Tapa in hong piak ding nuntak tawntungna an na ngah nadingun hanciam zaw un. Banghang hiam cihleh nuntak tawntungna an a pia dingin Pasian in a Tapa tungah ciaptehna a khen zo hi,” a ci hi.
43006028	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Pasian nasepte ka sep theih nadingun bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43006029	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Pasian hong sawlpa upna in Pasian deihna sepna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006030	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahih leh kote in mu in nang kong up theih nadingun bang limlamdang hong lakin bang hong bawl ding na hi hiam?
43006031	‘Amah in amaute nek dingin vantung pan anlum a pia hi,’ ci a, a kigelh mah bangin ka pute ka pate un gamlak ah manna a ne uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43006032	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, vantung panin note anlum hong piapa in Moses hilo a, vantung panin note anlum taktak hong piapa in ka Pa hi zaw hi.
43006033	Pasian anlum taktak in vantung pan hong paisuk in leitung mite ama nuntakna a piapa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006034	Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, tua anlum kote hong pia den in,” a ci uh hi.
43006035	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Keimah in nuntakna anlum ka hi hi. Ka kiangah hong pai mi in gilkial ngei nawnlo dinga, kei hong um mi in dangtak ngei nawnlo ding hi.
43006036	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah note in kei hong mu khin napi uh cin nong um kei veve uh hi.
43006037	Pa in a hong piak mi khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai ding uh a, ka kianga hong pai mite lah ka hawlkhia peuhmah kei ding hi.
43006038	Banghang hiam cihleh keima deihna a sem dingin vantung panin hong paisuk ka hi kei hi. Kei hong sawlpa deihna a sem dingin hong pai ka hi hi.
43006039	Amah in kei a hong piak mi khempeuh lakah khat beek mansuah loin nitawp ni ciangin ka thokiksak ding hi. Tua in kei hong sawlpa deihna ahi hi.
43006040	Tapa mu a, a um mi peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna nei dinga, nitawp ni ciangin amah ka thokiksak ding hi. Tua in kei hong sawlpa deihna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006041	“Vantung pana hong kumsuk anlum ka hi hi,” a cih manin, Judah mite in amah phunsan uh hi.
43006042	Amaute in, “Hihpa a nu le a pa i theihluat Joseph tapa Zeisu hilo ahi hiam? Tua hi napi banghang in, ‘Vantung panin hong paisuk ka hi hi,’ ci tazen ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43006043	Tua ciangin Zeisu in dawngin amaute kiangah, “Phunphun nawn kei un.
43006044	Kei hong sawl ka Pa in a huai kei leh kuamah in kei kiang hong zuan theilo hi. Keima kiang hong zuan mi nitawp ni ciangin ka thokiksak ding hi.
43006045	Kamsangte laibu sunga a kigelh mah bangin, ‘Pasian in amaute khempeuh thu hilh ding hi.’ Tua hi a, Pa thu za a, a thei mi khempeuh in keima kiang hong zuan uh hi.
43006046	Pasian kiang pana hong paipa longal kuamah in Pa a mu ngei kei hi. Tua pa bekin Pa a mu khinzo hi.
43006047	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kei hong um mi in nuntak tawntungna a neizo hi.
43006048	Keimah in nuntakna anlum ka hi hi.
43006049	Na pute na pate un gamlak ah manna a nek uh hangin a si veve uh hi.
43006050	Vantung panin a hong pai hih anlum a ne mi a si kei ding hi.
43006051	Keimah in vantung panin hong pai nuntakna anlum ka hi hi. Hih anlum a ne mi a nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite nuntak nadingin ka piak ding anlum in hih ka pumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006052	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Hihpa in eite nek dingin ama pumpi hong bangci piak theih ding ahi hiam?” ci in a kinial uh hi.
43006053	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Mihing Tapa pumpi ne a, a si na dawn kei uh leh nuntakna na ngah kei ding uh hi.
43006054	Ka pumpi ne a, ka si a dawn mi kuama peuh in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Nitawp ni ciangin tua mi ka thokiksak ding hi.
43006055	Banghang hiam cihleh ka pumpi in an taktak hi a, ka si in dawn ding taktak ahi hi.
43006056	Ka pumpi ne a, ka si a dawn mi in keima sungah teeng a, ama sungah kei ka teeng hi.
43006057	A nungta ka Pa in kei hong sawl a, Pa hanga ka nuntak mah bangin keima sa a ne mi in keima hangin a nungta ding hi.
43006058	Hih anlum in vantung pana hong paisuk ahi hi. Na pu na pate un manna ne a, a sih veve uh bang hilo in hih anlum a ne mi a nungta tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
43006059	Hih thute Capernaum khua kikhopna inn sunga a hilh ahi hi.
43006060	Tua hi a, a nungzui tampite in tua thuhilhna a zak uh ciangin, “Hih thu in thuhaksa ahi hi. Kua in theitel zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43006061	Nungzuite in hih thu hangin a phunna Zeisu in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah, “Hih thu in note hong lungkiasak ahi hiam?
43006062	Tua ahih leh Mihing Tapa a masa a a omna munah a kahto mu le uh teh bangci ding na hi uh hiam?
43006063	Kha in nuntakna pia a, ci le sa in phattuamna bangmah a pia kei hi. Note kianga kong gen thu in kha thu hi a, tua in nuntakna ahi hi.
43006064	Ahih hangin note lakah a umlo pawlkhat na om uh hi,” a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kuateng in umlo a, kua in amah lehhek ding cih Zeisu in a kipat a kipan in a thei khin zo hi.
43006065	Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka Pa in a phal kei nak leh ka kiangah kuamah hong pai thei kei hi kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
43006066	Tua huna kipan in a nungzuite tampi ciahkik uh a, amah a zui nawn kei uh hi.
43006067	Tua ciangin Zeisu in sawm le nihte kiangah, “Note zong paikhia nuam na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43006068	Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, kua kiangah paituan ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna thu na nei hi.
43006069	A nungta Pasian Tapa Khazih na hih lam kote in thei in kong um uh hi,” a ci hi.
43006070	Zeisu in, “No sawm le nihte keima kong teel hi a, note sung panin khatin dawi hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43006071	Tua bang a cih ciangin sawm le nihte lakah amah a lehhek ding Simon tapa Judas Iscariot a cihna ahi hi.
43007001	Hih thuteng khit ciangin Galilee gam sungah Zeisu a zin kawikawi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite in amah thahsawm uh ahih manin Judea gam sungah a zin nuam kei hi.
43007002	Tu in Judah mite Buuk Pawi hong naita hi.
43007003	Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte in ama kiangah, “Na nungzuite in zong na bawl na nasepte a muh theih nadingun hih mun pan paikhia inla, Judea gamah va pai in.
43007004	Mite theih ding a ut mite in a simtham in na sem lo uh hi. Hih nate na sepsep ding leh leitung buppi muh dingin va kilakkhia in,” a ci uh hi.
43007005	Banghang hiam cihleh a sanggamte nangawn in amah a um kei uh hi.
43007006	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka hun a tung nai kei hi. Note aa dingin bel hunhoih hi tawntung hi.
43007007	Leitung mite in note hong mudah thei kei uh hi. Ahih hangin ken ka hih leh amaute gamtatna hoihlote pholak ka hih manin hong mudah uh hi.
43007008	Pawi sim dingin no na paito un. Kei ka hih leh ka hun tung nailo ahih manin kong pai nai kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43007009	Amaute kiangah hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin Galilee gamah a taamlai hi.
43007010	Ahih hangin a sanggamte pawi sim dingin a paitoh khit uh ciangin Zeisu zong a kilanglo in pawi ah a paisim hi.
43007011	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Amah koilai ah om ahi hiam?” ci in pawi sungah a zong uh hi.
43007012	Ama hangin mihonpite a kisel uh hi. Pawlkhat in, “Amah mihoih hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin pawlkhatte in, “Hilo hi. Mipite a khempa hi zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007013	Ahih hangin Judah mite kihta uh ahih manin a kilang in ama thu a genngam kei uh hi.
43007014	Pawi hun a lang bang a bei khit ciangin, biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lutin thu a hilh hi.
43007015	Judah mite in, “Hihpa in lai sin ngeilo napi banghang in hih zahta in laithei ahi hiam?” ci in lamdang a sa uh hi.
43007016	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka thuhilhte kei aa hilo in kei hong sawlpa aa ahi hi.
43007017	Mi khatpeuh in Pasian deihna a sepnop taktak leh ka thuhilhna Pasian kiang pan hiam ahih keileh keima utthu in a gen ka hi hiam cih a thei ding hi.
43007018	Ama utthu in thu a gen mi in ama minthan nading a zong ahi hi. Ahih hangin a sawlpa minthan nading a zong mi ahih leh thuman a, ama sungah zuauthu a om kei hi.
43007019	Moses in thukham hong pia khin napi banghang in khat beekin zui lo na hi uh hiam? Banghang in kei thah dingin hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43007020	Mihonpite in, “Nang dawilawm nei na hi hi. Kua in nang thah hong sawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43007021	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Nalamdang khat ka bawl a, na vekpi un lamdang na sa uh hi.
43007022	Moses in vunatna thu note hong pia a, Sabbath ni in vun na at uh hi. (Moses kiang pan hilo in i pu i pate kiang pan hi zaw hi.)
43007023	Moses thukham na palsat loh nadingun Sabbath ni in vun ki‑at thei ahih leh Sabbath ni in mi khat ka damsak manin banghang in kei tungah heh na hi uh hiam?
43007024	A puatham bek bulphuh in thu khen kei unla, a kilawm a kituak in thukhen un,” a ci hi.
43007025	Tua ciangin Jerusalem khua mi pawlkhatte in, “Thah a sawmsawm pa uh hihpa hilo ahi hiam?
43007026	Ahih hangin en un, hangtak in thu gen napi bangmah a cih kei uh hi. Gam ukte in amah Khazih sa takpi uh ahi hiam?
43007027	Tua dingin lah ama piankhiatna i thei hi. Ahih hangin Khazih hong pai ciangin kuamah in ama piankhiatna a thei kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007028	Tua ciangin Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah kiko in thu hilh a, “Note in kei nong thei uh a, ka piankhiatna zong na thei uh hi. Keima utthu a hong pai ka hi kei hi. Kei hong sawlpa thuman a, ahi zongin note in amah na thei kei uh hi.
43007029	Ahih hangin ama kiang pan ka hi a, ama hong sawl ka hih manin amah ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
43007030	Tua ahih manin amaute in amah matsawm uh a, ahi zongin a hun tung nailo ahih manin kuamah in a man kei hi.
43007031	Mihonpi lak pan mitampi in amah um uh a, “Khazih hong pai ciangin zong hihpa bawl sangin a tam zaw nalamdang hong bawl tuan ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43007032	Ama hanga mite a kihona uh Pharisee pawlte in a zak uh ciangin siampi liante tawh kikum in amah man dingin biakinn cingte a sawl uh hi.
43007033	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Note tawh tawmvei sung ka omlai dinga, tua khit ciangin kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka ciah ding hi.
43007034	Nong zon uh hangin nong mu kei ding uh a, ka omna munah zong nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43007035	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “I muh zawhloh dingin amah koi ah pai sawm ahi hiam? Greek mite laka a kithehthang i mipihte kiangah pai in, Greek mite thu va hilh sawm ahi hiam?
43007036	‘Nong zong ding uh a, nong mu kei ding uh hi. Ka omna munah zong nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ a cih pen bang a cihnopna hi ding hiam?” ci in a kidong uh hi.
43007037	Pawikham sunga ni thupipen ni ahi pawi ven ding ni in Zeisu dingto a, “Mi khatpeuh a dang a tak leh ka kiangah hong pai in tui hong dawn tahen.
43007038	Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin kei hong um mi sung panin nuntakna guntui a luangkhia ding hi,” ci in a kiko hi.
43007039	Tua bang a cih ciangin amah a um mite ngah ding Kha a genna ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu in minthanna ngah nailo ahih manin Kha Siangtho hong kipiakhia nailo hi.
43007040	Tua hi a, mihonpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Hihpa in Kamsangpa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007041	A dangte in, “Hihpa in Khazih ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin pawlkhat in, “Galilee gam panin Khazih hong piang ding ahi hiam?
43007042	‘Khazih in David suan sung pan hong piang dinga, David pianna Bethlehem khua ah hong suak ding hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho in gen khin hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43007043	Tua ahih manin ama hangin mihonpite a pawlpawl in kikhen uh hi.
43007044	Amaute pawlkhat in a mat nop uh hangin kuamah in a man kei uh hi.
43007045	Biakinn cingte a hong tunkik uh ciangin siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte in, “Banghang in amah hong paipih lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43007046	Biakinn cingte in, “Hihpa banga thugen kuamah om ngeilo hi!” a ci uh hi.
43007047	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte in, “Note zong hong khem zota ahi hiam?
43007048	Upa vaihawmte ahih keileh Pharisee pawlte sungah amah a um om ahi hiam?
43007049	Thukham theilo hih mihonpite in hamsiatna a thuak uh hita hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007050	Tua thukhente lakah zan laitak a Zeisu kianga a va paipa Nicodemus zong kihel a, amah in,
43007051	“Mi khat, ama kam za photin aman bang teng sem hiam cih theitel masa lopi in i thukham in thukhen ngei peuhmah ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43007052	Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Nang zong Galilee mi na hi hiam? Lai Siangtho encian lecin Galilee gam panin kamsang khat beek piang ngeilo hi cih na thei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007053	Tua khit ciangin amau inn ciat ah a ciah uh hi.
43008001	Zeisu ahih leh Tanluan mualtung ah a kahto hi.
43008002	Zingsang phalvak tungin biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu a paikik hi. Mi khempeuh ama kiangah hong pai uh a, amah in a tutsa in thu a hilh hi.
43008003	Tua khit ciangin thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in pasal khat tawh a mawh laitak in a kiman numei khat hong paipih uh a, amaute laizang ah a koih uh hi.
43008004	Amaute in Zeisu kiangah, “Sia aw, hih nu in pasal tawh a mawh laitak in a kiman ahi hi.
43008005	Moses in hih bang mite suang tawh denlup dingin thukham hong pia hi. Ahi zongin nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008006	Hih bangin a dot uh pen Zeisu mawhmat nuama a ze‑et uh ahi hi. Ahih hangin bangmah a zalo bangin Zeisu kunsuk a, a khutme tawh leilak ah lai a gelh hi.
43008007	Amaute in a dot phatphat uh ciangin amah dakto a, “Note lakah mawh neilopen in hih numeinu suang tawh deng masa hen,” a ci hi.
43008008	Tua khit ciangin kunsukkik in leilak ah lai a gelh hi.
43008009	Hih thu a zak uh ciangin mawhnei ahihlam uh amaute lungsim tawngah kiphawk ciat uh a, a upapen pan a neupen dong khatkhat in a gelkhia uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu le amaute laizang a om numeinu bek a omlai hi.
43008010	Zeisu dakto a numeinu longal midang kuamah a muh loh ciangin, “Numei aw, nang hong mawhmat mite koi ah om uh ahi hiam? Kuamah in thu hong khen lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43008011	Numeinu in, “Topa aw, kuamah in thu hong khen lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Ken zong thu kong khen kei hi. Ciah inla, mawhna bawl nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
43008012	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Keimah in leitung mite aa dingin khuavak ka hi hi. Ka nung hong zui mite khuamial lakah pai loin nuntakna khuavak a nei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008013	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte in ama kiangah, “Nang le nang teci kipang tawm na hih manin na teci panna a maan kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
43008014	Zeisu in amaute dawng a, “Kei koi pan hong pai a, koi ah pai ding ka hi hiam cih thei ka hih manin, kei le kei teci ka kipan leh zong ka teci panna a maan hi. Ahih hangin note in kei koipan hong pai a, koi lai ah pai ding ka hi hiam cih na thei kei uh hi.
43008015	Note in mihing thukhen bangin thu na khen uh hi. Ahih hangin keimah in kuama tungah thu ka khen kei hi.
43008016	Thu ka khen leh zong a maanin ka khen hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei guak om loin kei hong sawl ka Pa tawh ka omkhawm hi.
43008017	Mi nih in thukhat a maan hi ci in teci a pankhop leh tua teci panna a maan ahi hi, ci in note thukham sung mahmah ah zong kigelh hi.
43008018	Keima thu keimah in teci ka pang a, tua banah kei hong sawl ka Pa in zong a pang hi,” a ci hi.
43008019	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Na Pa koi ah om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in, “Kei ka hi a, ka Pa ahi zongin na thei kei uh hi. Kei hong thei hi le uhcin, ka Pa zong na thei ding uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43008020	Hih thute Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sunga a gen mah bangin sumkholna inndei sungah a gen ahi hi. A hun tung nailo ahih manin kuamah in amah a man kei uh hi.
43008021	Tua ciangin Zeisu in Pharisee pawlte kiangah, “Kei ka pai nading ah pai ding ka hih manin kei nong zong ding uh a, note in na mawhna uh na sihpih ding uh hi. Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a cikik hi.
43008022	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “ ‘Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ ci ahih manin amah le amah kithah sawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008023	Tua ciangin amah in, “Note in nuailam pan na hi uh a, kei ka hih leh tunglam pan ka hi hi. Note leitung aa na hi uh a, kei ka hih leh leitung aa ka hi kei hi.
43008024	Tua ahih manin na mawhnate uh hangin na si ding uh hi kong ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah in tua pa ka hih lam nong up kei uh leh na mawhnate uh hangin na si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008025	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in, “Tua thu a kipat cil a kipan kong gengensa ahi hi.
43008026	Note kong hilh ding thu le kong mawhsak nading thu tampi a om hi. Ahi zongin kei hong sawlpa thuman ahih manin ama kiang pana ka zaksa thute leitung mite tungah a gen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43008027	Amah in Pa thu a gengen ahihlam amaute in a tel zo kei uh hi.
43008028	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa na khaitoh uh ciangin kei pen tua pa ka hih lam nong thei pan ding uh hi. Keima utthu in bangmah sem loin ka Pa in hong hilh banga hih thute a gen ka hih lam na theitel ding uh hi.
43008029	Kei hong sawlpa in kei hong ompih hi. Pa lungdam nading na sem den ka hih manin amah in kei guak a hong nusia kei hi,” a ci hi.
43008030	Hih thute a gen ciangin mi tampi in amah a um uh hi.
43008031	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amah a um Judah mite kiangah, “Ka thu ah na kipsuak uh leh ka nungzuite taktak na hi ding uh hi.
43008032	Thuman thutak zong na thei ding uh a, tua thuman thutak in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a ci hi.
43008033	Amaute in ama kiangah, “Ko Abraham suante ka hi uh a, kuama sila in ka om ngei kei uh hi. Banghang in, ‘Na suakta ding uh hi,’ hong ci thei na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008034	Zeisu in amaute dawngkik a, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna sila ahi hi.
43008035	Silapa in inn sungah teeng tawntung lo a, tapa ahih leh inn sungah a teeng tawntung hi.
43008036	Tua ahih manin Tapa in hong suahtaksak leh a suaktate taktak na hi ding uh hi.
43008037	Abraham suante na hih lam uh kong thei hi. Ahih hangin note sungah ka thu om lo ahih manin thah nong sawm uh hi.
43008038	Ken ka Pa kianga ka muh bangin thu ka gen a, note zong na pa uh tung pana na muh bangun na gamta uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008039	Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Abraham ka pa uh ahi hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi. Zeisu in, “Abraham suante hi le uh cin Abraham gamtat bangin na gamta ding uh hi.
43008040	Pasian kiang pana ka zaksa thuman thutak kong gen manin tu in thah nong sawm uh hi. Tua bangin Abraham gamta lo hi.
43008041	Note in na pa uh gamtat bangin a gamta na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Zawlta ka hi kei uh hi. Pa khat bek ka nei uh a, tua in Pasian ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
43008042	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Na Pa uh Pasian hi taktak leh kei nong it ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kiang panin hong pai ka hi hi. Keima utthu a hong pai hilo in ama hong sawlpa ka hi hi.
43008043	Banghang in ka thugente tel theilo na hi uh hiam? Ka thugente na zak theihloh man uh ahi hi.
43008044	Note in na pa uh Dawimangpa suan na hi uh a, ama deihna bangin na gamta nuam uh hi. Amah in a kipat cil a kipan mithatpa hi a, ama sungah thuman thutak om lo ahih manin thuman thutak a zui kei hi. Amah zuauphuakpa hi a, zuauphuakte pa zong ahih manin zuauthu a gen niloh ding mah ahi hi.
43008045	Tua ahih manin thuman thutak ka gen hangin kei nong um kei uh hi.
43008046	Note lakah ka mawhna hong kawkkhia thei kua om na hi uh hiam? Thuman thutak gen napi banghang in hong um lo na hi uh hiam?
43008047	Pasian tawh a kipawlte in Pasian thugente a zathei hi. Pasian tawh kipawl lo na hih manun Pasian thugente na zathei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008048	Tua ciangin Judah mite in ama kiangah, “Nang Samaria mi, dawilawm nei kong cih uh a maan mah hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008049	Zeisu in, “Dawilawm nei ka hi kei a, ka Pa a pahtawi ka hi hi. Ahih hangin note in kei nong pahtawi kei uh hi.
43008050	Ka minthan nading ka zong kei hi. Ka minthan nading a zong khat om a, amah in thu zong a khen hi.
43008051	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mi khatpeuh in ka thugente a zuih leh a si ngei kei ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43008052	Tua ciangin Judah mite in ama kiangah, “Tu in, dawilawm nei na hih lam kong theitel taktak uh hi! Abraham le kamsangte zong si khinzo napi, ‘Mi khatpeuh in ka thu a zuih leh a si ngei kei ding hi,’ na ci hi.
43008053	A sisa ka pa uh Abraham sangin lianzaw na hi hiam? Kamsang khempeuh zong a si khinzo uh hi. Nang bang mi kisa na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008054	Zeisu in, “Kei le kei a kipahtawi hi leng tua kipahtawina in khiatna neilo hi. Kei hong pahtawipa in ka Pa hi a, kote Pasian hi na cihpa uh ahi hi.
43008055	Ahih hangin note in amah na thei kei uh hi. Ken ka hih leh ka thei hi. Amah ka thei kei hi cileng, note mah banga zuaugen ka hi ding hi. Ken amah ka thei a, ama thugente ka zui hi.
43008056	Na pa uh Abraham in ka ni a muh ding lawp mahmah a, a muh ciangin zong a lungdam mahmah hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43008057	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Nang kum 50 zong pha nailo napi in Abraham mu ngei na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008058	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Abraham a om ma in KEI KA OM HI,” a ci hi.
43008059	Tua ciangin amaute in amah a den nadingin suang a tawm uh hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute lak nawkin biakinnpi huang sung panin a gelkhia hi.
43009001	Tua bangin Zeisu a paikhiat laitak in mittawsa a suak mi khat a mu hi.
43009002	A nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, kua mawhna hanga hihpa mittawsa in suak ahi hiam? Ama mawhna hang ahi mawhna hang ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
43009003	Zeisu in, “Ama mawhna hang hilo hi! A nu a pate mawhna hang zong hilo hi. Pasian nasepnate ama tung pan a kilat theih nading ahi hi.
43009004	Sun khua a vak laiteng kei hong sawlpa na ka sem ding hi. Kuamah in na a sep theihloh zan hun hong tung ding hi.
43009005	Leitung a ka omlai teng leitung mite aa dingin khuavak ka hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43009006	Tua banga a gen khit ciangin, lei lakah cilsia in a cil tawh buan bawl a, mittawpa mit a nuhsak hi.
43009007	Tua khit ciangin ama kiangah, “Pai inla, Siloam bual ah va sil in,” a ci hi. (Siloam a khiatna in, Kisawl hi, cihna ahi hi.) Tua ahih manin amah pai in va sil a, khua mutheisa in a hong ciahkik hi.
43009008	Tua ciangin amah mittaw ahihlam a mu ngeite le a innvengte in, “Hihpa khutdawh ngena a tupa hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43009009	Mi pawlkhat in, “Hi mah hi,” a ci uh hi. A dang pawlkhat in, “A mel a kisun hilel hi,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Kei tua pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43009010	Tua ahih manin amaute in, “Bang na cih leh na mit hong vak hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43009011	Amah in, “Zeisu kici mi khatin buan bawl in ka mit hong nuhsak khit ciangin, ‘Siloam bual ah pai inla va sil in,’ hong ci hi. Tua ciangin kei zong pai in ka sil leh khua ka muthei hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43009012	Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Tua pa koi ah om ahi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
43009013	Amaute in tua mittaw ngeipa Pharisee pawlte kiangah a puak uh hi.
43009014	Tu in, Zeisu in buan bawla a mit a vaksak ni pen Sabbath ni ahi hi.
43009015	Pharisee pawlte in a mitvakzia a dotkik uh ciangin amah in, “Ka mit buan hong nuhsak a, ka sil leh khua ka muthei hi,” a ci hi.
43009016	Tua ahih manin Pharisee pawlte pawlkhat in, “Amah in Sabbath ni tang lo ahih manin Pasian kiang pana hong pai hilo hi,” a ci uh hi. A dang pawlkhat in, “Mawhnei mi khatin hih bang nalamdangte bawlthei ding ahi hiam?” ci uh a, khat le khat a kithutuak kei uh hi.
43009017	Amaute in mittawpa kiangah, “Na mit hong vaksak zo cileng amah bangci bang mi dingin na ngaihsun hiam?” ci in a dongkik uh hi. Amah in, “Kamsangpa khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43009018	Ahih hangin Judah mite in amah mittaw ngei khat, tu a khua a muthei pan ahihna thu a nu a pate a dot khit mateng un a um tuan kei uh hi.
43009019	Tua ahih manin amaute in a pa kiangah, “Hihpa mittawsa in a suak ka tapa uh hi na cih penpa mah uh ahi hiam? Tua ahih leh tu in bangci bangin khua mukik thei ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
43009020	A nu le a pa in, “Hihpa mittawsa in a suak ka tapa uh hi cih ka thei uh hi.
43009021	Ahih hangin kua in a mit vaksak a, bangci bangin khua mukik thei hiam cih ka thei kei uh hi. Amah zong a kum cingta ahih manin amah dong un. Ama tunga thupiang a maan hong gen thei ding hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
43009022	A nu le a pate in Judah mite a kihtak manun tua banga a ci uh ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu pen Khazih hi, ci in a sang mi peuhmah kikhopna inn pan hawlkhia ding ci in Judah mite a kithukim khinzo uh hi.
43009023	Tua ahih manin a nu le a pa in, “Amah a kum cingta ahih manin amah dong un,” a ci uh ahi hi.
43009024	Tua khit ciangin amaute in mittawpa samsakkik uh a, “Minthanna Pasian pia in! Tua mipa pen mawhnei mi khat hi cih ka thei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43009025	Amah in, “Amah mawhnei mi khat ahih leh ahih loh ken ka thei kei hi. Ahi zongin ka theih khat om hi. Ni dangin mittaw ka hi a, tu in khua ka muta hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43009026	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Amah in nang bang hong ci bawl hiam? Na mit bangci bangin hong vaksak ahi hiam?” ci in a dongkik uh hi.
43009027	Amah in, “Kong gen khinzo a, na um kei uh hi. Banghang in za kikkik nuam na hi uh hiam? Note zong ama nungzui suak nuam na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dawng hi.
43009028	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nang in ama nungzui na hi zaw hi. Ko ka hih uh leh Moses nungzui ka hi uh hi.
43009029	Pasian in Moses tungah thu gen hi cih ka thei uh hi. Hihpa zenzen koi pan hong piang hiam cih ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
43009030	Tua pa in amaute kiangah, “Amah in ka mit nangawn hong vaksak khin napi koi pan hong piang hiam cih na theih loh uh lamdang mahmah hi!
43009031	Tu in Pasian in mawhneite thu a ngaih loh hangin amah bia a, a deihna banga a gamtate thu a ngai hi cih i thei hi.
43009032	Mi khatin pianpih mittaw khat khua a muhkiksak lam lei piancil a kipan kiza ngeilo hi.
43009033	Hihpa in Pasian kiang pan hong pai hi kei leh bangmah ahih thei kei ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43009034	Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Mawhna tawh kidim a a suakkhia nangmah in, kote thu hong lehhilh ding na hi hiam?” ci in a hawlkhia uh hi.
43009035	Amaute in tua pa a hawlkhiatna thu Zeisu in a za hi. Amah in tua pa a muh ciangin, “Nangmah in Pasian Tapa na um hiam?” a ci hi.
43009036	Tua pa in dawngkik a, “Topa aw, amah ka up theih nadingin amah kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43009037	Zeisu in, “Amah na mu khinzo a, tu‑a na kihopihpa keimah in amah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43009038	Tua ciangin tua pa in, “Topa aw, kong um hi!” ci in a bia hi.
43009039	Zeisu in, “Khuamu lote in khua a muh theih nading ahi zongin khua mutheite in khua a muh loh nading ahi zongin thukhen dingin leitung ah a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43009040	Tua hi a, amah tawh a omkhawm Pharisee‑te pawlkhat in hihthu a zak uh ciangin, “Kote zong mittaw ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43009041	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Na mit uh a taw hi leh mawhna na nei kei ding uh hi. Tu in, ‘Khuamu ung,’ ci na hih manun na mawhna uh a omlai hi,” a ci hi.
43010001	Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuukhumna kongpi tawn loin mundang pan kahto a a lut mi in guta le misuam ahi hi.
43010002	Ahi zongin kongpi tawna a lut mi in tuucingpa ahi hi.
43010003	Kong cingpa in amah kong hon a, tuute in ama aw a thei uh hi. Amah in a tuute a minin samin a pusuahpih hi.
43010004	Amah in a tuute khahkhia in amaute mai ah amah pai a, tuute in ama aw thei uh ahih manin a nung a zui uh hi.
43010005	Midang mawkmawk khat a pai hangin tua pa aw thei lo uh ahih manin zui loin a taisan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43010006	Zeisu in hih thugentehna tawh thu a gen hangin amaute in bang thu gen hiam cih a thei zo kei uh hi.
43010007	Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, keimah in tuute aa dingin kongpi ka hi hi.
43010008	Ka mai‑a hong paite khempeuh, guta le misuam ahih manun tuute in amaute aw a thei kei uh hi.
43010009	Keimah in kongpi ka hi hi. Kei hong tawna a lut mi peuhmah khamuang dinga, sungtum pusuak in lonona mun a mu ding hi.
43010010	Gutapa in a gu ding, a that ding le a susia ding bekin a hong pai hi. Kei ka hih leh tuute in nuntakna a neih nading le nuntakna kicingtak a a neih nadingun kong pai hi.
43010011	“Keimah in tuucing hoih ka hi hi. Tuucing hoihpa in a tuute aa dingin a nuntakna a pia hi.
43010012	Ahi zongin a kicialtawm tuucingpa in tuunei tuucingpa ahi kei hi. Tua bang mi in ngia hong pai a muh ciangin tuute nusia in a taisan hi. Tua ciangin ngia in tuute manin tuute a kithehthang hi.
43010013	A kicialtawm tuucingpa in a kicialtawm ahih manin tuute khual loin a taisan hi.
43010014	“Keimah in tuucing hoih ka hi hi. Ka tuute ka thei a, ka tuute in zong kei hong thei uh hi.
43010015	Pa in kei hong theih mah bangin keimah in zong Pa ka thei hi. Keimah in tuute aa dingin ka nuntakna ka pia hi.
43010016	Hih tuukhumna sungah a om lo tuudang neilai ka hih manin tuate zong ka khum hamtang dinga, amaute in ka thu a ngai ding uh hi. Tua ciangin tuuhon khat le tuucing khat bek a om ding hi.
43010017	Ka nuntakna ka lakkik theih dingin pia ka hih manin ka Pa in kei hong it hi.
43010018	Kuamah in ka nuntakna a hong lakkhiatsak kei hi. Keima thu a ka piakkhiat ahi hi. Ka nuntakna piakkhiat theih nading le lakkik theih nading thuneihna ka nei hi. Hih thu ka Pa kiang pana ka ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43010019	Hih banga thu a gen manin Judah mite sungah kipawlkhenna a omkik hi.
43010020	Amaute lakah mi tampi in, “Amah dawilawm nei mihaipi ahi hi. Banghang in ama thugen ngai na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43010021	Pawlkhatte in, “Hih thute in dawilawm nei khat thugen hilo hi. Dawi in mittawte khuamusak thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43010022	Tu in Jerusalem khua ah Biakinnpi Siansuahna Pawi hun hong tung a, phalbi laitak ahi hi.
43010023	Biakinnpi huang sunga om Solomon buuk a kicihna munah Zeisu a pai kawikawi hi.
43010024	Tua ciangin Judah mite ama kimkot ah hong kikhawm uh a, “Kote bang tanvei hong lungkasak ding na hi hiam? Khazih na hih leh siangtak in hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
43010025	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu note kiangah kong gen khinzo a, nong um kei uh hi. Ka Pa min tawh ka bawl nate in kei aa dingin teci a pang khinzo hi. 10:22 Biakinnpi Siansuahna Pawi: A nunga Judah Mite Pawite nuai ah en in.
43010026	Note tungah kong gensa bangin ka tuute hilo na hih manun nong um kei uh hi.
43010027	Ka tuute in ka aw hong ngai uh hi. Ken amaute ka thei a, amaute in ka nung a hong zui uh hi.
43010028	Amaute nuntak tawntungna ka pia a, a kisia ngei kei ding uh hi. Ka khut sung panin zong kuamah in amaute hong sutkhia zo kei ding hi.
43010029	Amaute hong pia ka Pa in na khempeuh sangin lianzaw ahih manin ka Pa khut sung panin kuamah in a hong sutkhia zo kei ding hi.
43010030	Kei le ka Pa in pumkhat ka hi uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43010031	Tua ciangin Judah mite in amah den nadingin suang a tawmkik uh hi.
43010032	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka Pa kiang panin a hoih ka sep na tampi note kong lak khinzo hi. Tua ka septe lakah a koipen paulam in suang tawh den hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43010033	Judah mite in ama kiangah, “Nasep hoih na sep mana suang tawh hong densawm ka hi kei uh hi. Nang mihing kimlai Pasian bangin kibawl in Pasian tungah pausia na hih manin suang tawh hong densawm ka hi zaw uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
43010034	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Note in pasiante na hi uh hi kong ci hi,’ ci in note thukham sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
43010035	Pasian thu a sang mihingte nangawn pasiante kici ahih leh (Lai Siangtho khial ngeilo ahih manin),
43010036	Pa in hong siangthosak a, leitung ah a hong sawl keimah in, ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi,’ ka cih manin banghang in, ‘Pasian tungah pausia hi,’ hong ci na hi uh hiam?
43010037	Ka Pa nate ka sep kei leh hong um kei un.
43010038	Ahi zongin ka Pa nate ka sep leh kei nong um kei uh zongin ka nasepte um un. Tua hi leh Pa in keima sungah om a, ama sungah kei ka om lam thei in na um ding uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43010039	Hih thuteng hangin amaute in amah mat sawmkik uh a, ahi zongin amaute khut sung panin amah a suakta hi.
43010040	Tua khit ciangin John in tui a phum cilna mun Jordan gungal khatah Zeisu paikik a, tualai ah a taam hi.
43010041	Ama kiangah mi tampi hong pai uh a, “John in nalamdang a bawl loh hangin hih mipa tawh kisai thu a gen khempeuh a maan hi,” a ci uh hi.
43010042	Tua munah mi tampi in amah a um uh hi.
43011001	Tu in Lazarus kici mi khat cina in a om hi. Amah in Mary le a sanggamnu Martha teenna Bethany khua mi ahi hi.
43011002	Tua Mary in sathau namtui tawh Topa nilhin a sam tawh a khe a nulsaknu hi a, a cinapa Lazarus in tua nu sanggampa ahi hi.
43011003	Tua ahih manin a sanggam numeite in Zeisu kiangah mi sawl uh a, “En in, Topa aw, na itpa a ci a na hi,” ci in a kosak uh hi.
43011004	Zeisu in a zak ciangin, “Hih natna in sih nading natna hilo hi. Pasian vangliatna a kilat nading le Pasian Tapa in minthanna a ngah nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43011005	Tu in Zeisu in Martha le a sanggamnu le Lazarus‑te a it hi.
43011006	Ahi zongin, amah cina hi cih a zak ciangin a omna munah ni nih a tambeh lai hi.
43011007	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Judea gamah paikik ni,” a ci hi.
43011008	A nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, tu madeuh in Judah mite in suang tawh hong den sawm uh hilo ahi hiam tua lamah paikik veve ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43011009	Zeisu in, “Sun hun sung nai sawm le nai nih hilo ahi hiam? Mi khatpeuh in sun laitak in lam a pai leh hih leitung khuavak ngah ahih manin a kisui kha kei hi.
43011010	Ahih hangin mi khatpeuh in khuamialpi sungah lam a pai leh khuavak om lo ahih manin a kisui kha hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43011011	Amah in hih thute a gen khit ciangin, “I lawmpa Lazarus ihmu ahih manin a phong dingin ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011012	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Topa aw, ihmu ahih leh a damta hi ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
43011013	Zeisu in Lazarus sihna thu a gen hi napi amaute in Lazarus ihmu in tawlnga hi a cihna sa uh hi.
43011014	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Lazarus sizo hi,” ci in siangtak in a gen hi.
43011015	Tua banah amah in, “Tua muna ka om khakloh pen note up theih nading suak ahih manin note aa dingin ka lungdam hi. Ahi zongin ama kiangah va pai ni,” a ci hi.
43011016	Tua ciangin Thomas, Didymus a kici pa in, a lawm nungzuite kiangah, “Amah tawh a sikhawm dingin eite zong va pai ni,” a ci hi.
43011017	Zeisu tua mun a tun ciangin Lazarus a kivui zawh ni li phazo hi cih a thei hi.
43011018	Bethany khua pen Jerusalem khuapi tawh kinai a, tai nih bang bek a gamla hi.
43011019	A sanggampa uh hangin Martha le Mary hehnem in a tutpih numeite le Judah mite tampi na om uh hi.
43011020	Martha in Zeisu hong pai hi cih thu a zak phetin dingkhia a, amah a va dawn hi. Mary ahih leh inn sungah tu in a om hi.
43011021	Tua ciangin Martha in Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, hihlai ah om hi lecin ka sanggampa a si kei ding hi!
43011022	Ahi zongin tu nangawn in Pasian kiangah na nget peuhpeuh Pasian in hong pia ding hi cih ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
43011023	Zeisu in Martha kiangah, “Na sanggampa a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011024	Martha in, “Nitawp ni‑a thawhkik ni ciangin amah hong thokik ding hi cih ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
43011025	Zeisu in, “Keimah in thawhkikna le nuntakna ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi in a sih hangin a nungta ding hi.
43011026	Kei hong um a, a nungta mi peuhmah a si ngei kei ding hi. Hih thu na um hiam?” a ci hi.
43011027	Martha in, “Topa aw, ka um hi. Leitung a hong pai ding Pasian Tapa Khazih na hi hi ci in kong um hi,” a ci hi.
43011028	Martha in hih thute a gen khit ciangin paikhia a, a sanggamnu samsim in, “Siapa hong tungta a, nang hong kan hi,” ci in a ko hi.
43011029	Tua thu a zak ciangin Mary thakhat in dingkhia a, Zeisu a va dawn hi.
43011030	Tua laitak in Zeisu khua sungah lut nailo a, Martha in a na dawntuahna mun mahah a omlai hi.
43011031	Mary hehnem in inn sunga om Judah mite in thakhat a Mary a dinkhiat a muh uh ciangin hanah a kap dingin a pai sa in a zuikhia uh hi.
43011032	Zeisu omna munah Mary hong tung a, amah a muh ciangin a khe phungah bokin, “Topa aw, hihlai ah om hi lecin ka sanggampa a si kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011033	Zeisu in Mary a kipan amah tawh hong tonkhawm Judah mite khempeuh kapin a om uh a muh ciangin a lungsim sungah khuisa in na a sa hi.
43011034	Amah in, “Koilai ah vui na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Topa aw, hong pai inla hong en in,” a ci uh hi.
43011035	Zeisu a kap hi.
43011036	Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “En un, Zeisu in Lazarus nak it zen si e!” a ci uh hi.
43011037	Amaute pawlkhat in, “Mittawte khua a musak thei hihpa in, Lazarus a sih loh nadingin bawl theilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43011038	Tua ciangin Zeisu a lungsim ah khuisakik in hanah a pai hi. Tua han leihawm hi a, suangpekpi tawh kisin hi.
43011039	Zeisu in, “A suang lakhia un,” a ci hi. Misipa sanggamnu Martha in, “Topa aw, a sihzawh ni li phazo ahih manin uih khin ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011040	Zeisu in, “Na up leh Pasian vangliatna na mu ding hi hong ci zo hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43011041	Tua khit ciangin amaute in hankong khakna suang a likkhia uh hi. Zeisu in vantung lam ento a, “Pa aw, kong thumna hong za khinzo na hih manin ka lungdam hi.
43011042	Kong thumna nong zak tawntung lam ka thei hi. Ahih hangin kei nong sawl ka hih lam hih muna ding mihonpite in a up theih nadingun hih thu ka gen hi,” a ci hi.
43011043	Tua bang a cih khit ciangin, “Lazarus aw, hong paikhia in!” ci in nakpitak in a kiko hi.
43011044	Tua ciangin misipa zong a khut le a khete hanpuan tawh kitunsa le a maitang zong dial tawh kitunsa in hong paikhia hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “A kitunna phelkhia unla ciahsak un,” a ci hi.
43011045	Tua ciangin Mary kianga hong pai Judah mi tampite in Zeisu in a bawl nate a muh uh ciangin a um uh hi.
43011046	Ahih hangin amaute pawlkhat Pharisee‑te kiangah va pai uh a, Zeisu sepsa teng a gen uh hi.
43011047	Tua khit ciangin siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte in thukhenteɠ kikhawmsak uh a, “Hihpa in nalamdang tampi bawl ahih manin amah bang cih ding i hi hiam?
43011048	Amah hih bangin khahkhong lehang mi khempeuh in amah um ding uh a, Rome mite hong pai in i gam i lei le i minam bupin hong susia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43011049	Amaute sung panin tua kuma Siampi Ukpa ahi Caiaphas in, “Bangmah na thei peuhmah kei uh hi.
43011050	I minam buppi a i manthan sangin mipi tangin mi khat a sih ding eite aa dingin hoih zawtham hi cih zong na phawk kha peuhmah kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43011051	Amah in hih thute ama thu tawh a mawkgen hilo hi. Tua kuma Siampi Ukpa ahihna tawh Judah mite tanga Zeisu a sih nading thu a genkhol ahi hi.
43011052	Zeisu sihna in tua minamte aa ding bek zong hilo in mun khempeuh a a kithehthang Pasian tate kaikhawm in pumkhat a suahsak nading zong ahi hi.
43011053	Tua hi a, amaute in tua ni a kipan in Zeisu thah nading a vaihawm uh hi.
43011054	Tua ahih manin Judah mite lakah a kilang in Zeisu a vakkhia nawn kei hi. Tua mun pan paikhia a, gamlak tawh a kinai Ephraim kici khuaneu khatah a nungzuite tawh a om uh hi.
43011055	Tu in Judah mite Paisan Pawi hong naita a, tua Paisan Pawi a tunma in a kisiansuah dingin mi tampi Jerusalem khuapi ah a paito uh hi.
43011056	Tua ciangin Zeisu zong uh a, “Amah pawi ah hong pai lo ding ahi kha ding hiam?” ci in dinsa in biakinn huang sungah khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
43011057	Siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte in amah a mat theih nadingun ama omna mun a thei peuhpeuh in amau kiangah a zaksak nading mihonpite thu a piak khitsa uh ahi hi.
43012001	Tu in Paisan Pawi bawl nading ni guk in a sap laitak in misite lak pan a thawhkiksak pa Lazarus teenna Bethany khua ah Zeisu a pai hi.
43012002	Amaute in tualai ah Zeisu nitak an a vak uh hi. Martha in ankuang lui a, Lazarus ahih leh Zeisu tawh ankuang a umkhawm mite lakah a tu hi.
43012003	Tua laitak in Mary in a manpha mahmah bangmah tawh a kihel lo, sathau namtui thawl khat va la a, Zeisu khe nuhin a sam tawh a nulsak hi. Tua sathau gim namtui in inn sungteng a zel hi.
43012004	Tua ciangin a nungzuite sung panin amah a lehhek ding pa Simon tapa Judas Iscariot in,
43012005	“Hih sathau namtui denariusɠ 300 tawh zuak in mizawngte kipia leh hoih zawlo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43012006	Hih bang a cih ciangin mizawngte a khualna ahi kei hi. Amah gutapa hi a, sumkempa zong ahihna tawh sumbawm sunga sumte sawk thei zel ahih man hi zaw hi.
43012007	Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Ama ut bangin hihsak un. Hong kivui ni cianga a zat dingin a kepkep ahi hi.
43012008	Mizawngte note tawh om tawntung dinga, kei ka hih leh note tawh ka omkhawm tawntung kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43012009	Tu in tua khua ah Zeisu a om lam Judah mi tampite in a theih uh ciangin Zeisu lah mu nuamin misite lak panin a thawhkiksak pa Lazarus zong mu nuam uh ahih manin a hong pai uh hi.
43012010	Ahih hangin siampi liante in Lazarus zong thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
43012011	Lazarus hangin Judah mi tampi in a makaite uh nusia in Zeisu a um uh hi.
43012012	A zingciang in pawi sim dinga hong pai mi tampi in Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu hong pai ding hi cih thu a za uh hi.
43012013	Amah dawn dingin nisuh hiang tawi in kuankhia uh a, “Hosannaɠ! Topa min tawh a hong pai Israel Kumpipa in, Thupha ngah tahen!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
43012014	Tua ciangin Zeisu in laano khat mu a, a tungah a tuang hi. Lai Siangtho sunga om bangin,
43012015	“Zion tanu aw, lau kei in. Laano tungah tuanga hong pai, Na Kumpipa en in,” ci in kigelh hi.
43012016	A nungzuite in a cilin hih thute a thei kei uh hi. Zeisu in minthanna a ngah khit ciangin ama thu tua banga a kigelh ahihlam leh a kigelhna banga ama tungah a bawl uh ahihlam a phawkkik san uh hi.
43012017	Han sung pan Lazarus samkhia in misite lak pan a thawhkiksak laitak in ama kianga om mihonpite in zong tua thu teci a pang uh hi.
43012018	Amah in tua nalamdang a bawlna thu mihonpi in za uh ahih manin amah dawn dingin hong pai uh ahi hi.
43012019	Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte in, “Bangmah na cih theih lohlam uh na thei uh hi. En un, leitung mi khempeuh in ama nung zui khin ta uh hi!” a kici uh hi.
43012020	Tu in Pasian bia dingin pawi sim a hong pai mite lakah Greek mite pawlkhat a kihel uh hi.
43012021	Galilee gam Bethsaida khua mi Philip kiangah tua mite hong pai uh a, “Sia aw, Zeisu ka mu nuam uh hi,” ci in a ngen uh hi.
43012022	Philip zong Andrew kiangah pai in tua thu va gen a, Andrew le Philip in Zeisu kiangah a gensawn uh hi.
43012023	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa in minthanna a ngah hun hong tungta hi.
43012024	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, buhhum tang khat lei lakah kia‑a a muat phot kei leh amah kia om den ding hi. Ahi zongin, a muat leh buhtang tampi a gah hi.
43012025	Ama nuntakna a it mi in a nuntakna tan dinga, a leitung nuntakna a itlo mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei ding hi.
43012026	Mi khatpeuh in ka na a sep leh ka nung hong zui tahen. Tua hi leh kei omna ah ka nasempa zong a om ding hi. Mi khatpeuh in ka na a sep leh ka Pa in amah a pahtawi ding hi.
43012027	“Tu in ka lunggim hi. Bang cih ding ka hi hiam? ‘Pa aw, hih hun panin hong honkhia in,’ ci ding ka hi hiam? Ahi zongin hih mah a thuak dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
43012028	Pa aw, na min hong thangsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin van panin aw khat hong ging a, “Ka thangsak zo a, ka thangsak lai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43012029	A kianga ding mite in tua awging a zak uh ciangin, “Vanging ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Pawlkhat in, “Vantungmi khatin amah hopih hi,” a ci uh hi.
43012030	Zeisu in, “Hih aw in kei aa dinga hong ging hilo in note aa dinga hong ging ahi hi.
43012031	Tu in hih leitung in thukhenna a thuak hi. Tu in hih leitung a ukpa a kihawlkhia ding hi.
43012032	Leitung panin a hong kikhaitoh ciangin ka kiangah mi khempeuh ka lato ding hi,” a ci hi.
43012033	Hih bangin a gen ciangin a sawtlo in amah bangci bangin si ding cih a genna ahi hi.
43012034	Mihonpite in, “Khazih om tawntung ding hi ci in thukham panin kote in ka za uh hi. Banghang in, ‘Mihing Tapa kikhaito ding hi,’ ci na hi hiam? Mihing Tapa na cih kua ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43012035	Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Khuavak in note tawmvei sung bek hong ompih lai ding hi. Khuavak na neih sungun kalsuan un. Tua hi kei leh khuamial in hong lap ding hi. Khuamial lakah a pai mi in a pai nading a thei kei hi.
43012036	Khuavak tate na suah theih nadingun khuavak a omlai in khuavak um un,” a ci hi. Zeisu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin amaute kiang pan kihemkhia in a kisel hi.
43012037	Amah in amaute muhin nalamdang tampi a bawl hangin a um tuan kei uh hi.
43012038	Tua in kamsangpa Isaiah gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi. Isaiah in, “Topa aw, kote tangkona kua in um ahi hiam? Kua tungah Topa vangliatna kilang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43012039	Tua banah amaute in um theilo uh ahih manin Isaiah in a gen inah,
43012040	“Amah in amaute mittawsak in, A lungtang uh a khauhsak hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit uh tawh mu in, A lungsim uh tawh thei ding uh a, Amaute hong kiheikik in, Ka damsak ding hi,” ci in a genkik hi.
43012041	Isaiah in Topa vangliatna a muhlai in tua banga a gen ahi hi.
43012042	Upa vaihawm tampi in zong amah a up uh hangin Pharisee pawlte in kikhopna inn pana a hawlkhiat ding lau uh ahih manin a upna uh a pulakkhia ngam kei uh hi.
43012043	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian pahtak ding sangin mite pahtak ding a ut zaw uh hi.
43012044	Tua ciangin Zeisu kiko a, “Kei hong um mi in kei bek hong um hilo in kei hong sawlpa zong a um ahi hi.
43012045	Kei hong mu mi in kei hong sawlpa zong a mu ahi hi.
43012046	Kei hong um mi peuhmah khuamial sungah a om nawnloh nadingin leitung ah khuavak bangin kong pai hi.
43012047	“Mi khatpeuh in ka thugen za napi in a up kei leh ama tungah thu ka khen kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite thukhen dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, leitung mite a hon dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
43012048	Mi khatpeuh in kei hong nial a, ka thugente a san kei leh ama tungah thu a khen ding khat a om hi. Ka gen thu in nitawp ni ciangin tua mi tungah thu a khen ding hi.
43012049	Banghang hiam cihleh keima thuneihna tawh ka gen kei hi. Kei hong sawl ka Pa in ka cih ding le ka gen dinga hong piak thu bek a gen ka hi hi.
43012050	Ama hong piak thu in nuntak tawntungna ahi hi cih ka thei hi. Tua ahih manin ka gen khat peuhpeuh Pa in a hong gen bangin a gen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43013001	Tu in Paisan Pawi hong tung dekta a, Zeisu in leitung nusia in a Pa kiangah a ciah ding hun hong tungta hi cih a thei hi. Amah in leitung a om ama mite it mahmah a, it tawp loin a it hi.
43013002	Nitak an a nek khit uh ciangin Dawimangpa in Simon tapa Judas Iscariot sungah Zeisu lehhek nading lungsim a guan hi.
43013003	Zeisu in Pa in ama khut sungah na khempeuh a ap khitna thu le amah Pasian kiang pan hong pai in Pasian kiangah ciahkik ding ahihna thu a thei hi.
43013004	Tua ciangin ankuang pan amah dingto a, a puantualpi suahkhia in dial khat la in a teeng hi.
43013005	Tua khit ciangin kuang sungah tui sung a, a nungzuite khe a silsak khit ciangin, a teen dial tawh a nulsak hi.
43013006	Simon Peter kianga tun ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, nangmah in ka khe hong silsak ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43013007	Zeisu in, “Tu a ka bawl thu tu in na theih loh hangin tu nung ciangin na thei ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43013008	Peter in, “Nangmah in ka khe nong silsak ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Zeisu in, “Kong silsak kei leh kei tawh na kipawl thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43013009	Tua ciangin Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, ka khe bek hilo in ka khut le ka lu zong hong silsak lai in,” a ci hi.
43013010	Zeisu in, “A kisil khinsate, a khe longal sil kul nawnlo hi. A pumpi bupin siang khinzo hi. Note na siangtho uh hi. Ahi zongin, na vekpi un na siang kim kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43013011	Banghang hiam cihleh kua in amah lehhek ding cih thei ahih manin, “Na vekpi un na siangkim kei uh hi,” a ci ahi hi.
43013012	Hih bangin amaute khe a silsak khit ciangin, a puan silhin, tukik a, amaute kiangah, “Note tunga ka sep thu na thei uh hiam?
43013013	Siapa le Topa nong cih uh a maan hi a, na cih bangun ka hi hi.
43013014	Note Topa le Siapa ahi keimah in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note zong khat le khat na kisilsak ding uh hi.
43013015	Banghang hiam cihleh note tunga kong hih bangin note in zong na hih theih nadingun na etteh ding uh hong lak ka hi hi.
43013016	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, nasem khatin a topa sangin a lianzaw kei hi. A kisawlpa zong a sawlpa sangin a lianzaw kei hi.
43013017	Hih thute thei in na zuih uh leh thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
43013018	“Note khempeuh huamin thu kong gen kei hi. Ka teelsa mite ka thei hi. Ahih hangin Lai Siangtho in, ‘Kei tawh an a nekhawmpa in kei hong langpan in a khetul tawh hong pek hi,’ a cihna thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
43013019	“Hih thute a hong pian ciangin kei kua ka hih lam nong theih nadingun a hun hong tunma in kong genkhol hi.
43013020	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ka sawl mipa a sang mi peuhmah in kei zong hong sang ahi hi. Kei hong sang mi in kei hong sawlpa zong a sang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43013021	Tua bang a gen khit ciangin Zeisu lunggim mahmah a, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note lakah khatin kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” ci in a gentel hi.
43013022	Tua ciangin a nungzuite khat le khat ki‑en uh a, kua pen gen nuam ahi ding hiam ci in a lungsim uh a buai hi.
43013023	Tu in nungzuite khatin Zeisu ang ah kingam in a om hi. Tua pa in Zeisu itpa ahi hi.
43013024	Simon Peter in tua pa a mithek tawh lak a, Zeisu in kua gen nuam ahi hiam cih thu a dong dingin a sawl hi.
43013025	Tua ciangin Zeisu anga a kingampa in, “Topa aw, kua pen cinuam na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
43013026	Zeisu in, “Anlum themkhat diaha ka piakpa ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin anlum themkhat diahin Simon tapa Judas Iscariot a pia hi.
43013027	Judah in tua anlum them a san khit phetin ama sungah Satan a lut pah hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Na hih ding khatpeuh hih mengmeng in,” a ci hi.
43013028	Banghang in Zeisu in tua bangin ci ahi hiam cih ankuang a umte kuamah in a thei kei uh hi.
43013029	Banghang hiam cihleh Judas in sumkempa ahih manin, “Pawi‑a kisam ding na pawlkhat va lei in,” a ci ahi ding hiam ahih keileh mizawngte bang khat peuhpeuh pia dingin a sawl ahi ding hiam, ci in a ngaihsun uh hi.
43013030	Judah in tua anlum them a san khit ciangin a paikhia pah hi. Tua hun in zan laitak ahi hi.
43013031	Judas a paikhiat khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Tu in Mihing Tapa in minthanna ngahta a, Pasian in zong ama hangin minthanna ngah zo hi.
43013032	Ama hangin Pasian in minthanna ngah zo ahih leh Pasian in zong ama hangin tomkha sungin Mihing Tapa a minthangsak ding hi.
43013033	“Ka taneute aw, note tawh tawmvei sung kong omlai ding hi. Na hong zong ding uh a, ahih hangin, ‘Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ ci a, Judah mite kiangah ka gen bangin note kiangah zong tu in kong gen hi.
43013034	“Khat le khat na ki‑it un cih thupiak thak kong pia hi. Note kong it bangin note zong khat le khat na ki‑it un.
43013035	Note khat le khat na ki‑it uh leh ka nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in a hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43013036	Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, koi lai ah pai ding na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Tu in ka pai nading munah nong zui thei kei ding hi. Ahih hangin tunung ciangin nong zui ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43013037	Peter in, “Topa aw, banghang in tu in hong zui theilo ding ka hi hiam? Nang aa dingin ka nuntakna ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
43013038	Zeisu in dawngkik a, “Kei aa dingin na nuntakna pia ding na hi hiam? Aman takpi kong cih in ah, thumvei nong nial khit mateng in aak a khuang kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43014001	Zeisu in, “Note na lungkham kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un.
43014002	Ka Pa inn sungah om nading mun tampi a om hi. A om lo hi leh kong gen khinzo ding hi. Note om nading mun bawlkhol dingin ka va pai ding hi.
43014003	Va pai in note aa ding mun ka bawl khit ciangin kong paikik dinga ka omna munah note zong na om theih nadingun ka kiangah kong la ding hi.
43014004	Ka pai nading mun na thei uh a, a lampi zong na thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43014005	Thomas in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, na pai nading mun theilo ka hih manun a lampi bangci theih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43014006	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Keimah in lampi, thuman thutak le nuntakna ka hi hi. Kei tungtawn loin kuamah in Pa kiang a tung thei kei ding hi.
43014007	Kei nong theih khit uh leh ka Pa zong na theikhin ding uh hi. Tu a kipan amah na thei uh a, na mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
43014008	Philip in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, Pa hong lak lecin ka lungkim ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43014009	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Philip aw, note tawh hih tanvei hong omkhawm khinzo napi ing in kei hong thei lo lailai na hi hiam? Kei hong mu mi in ka Pa mu khinzo ahih manin, banghang in, ‘Pa hong lak in,’ ci lailai na hi hiam?
43014010	Pa sungah kei om in kei sungah Pa om hi cih thu um lo na hi hiam? Note kianga kong gen thute keima ut thu a kong gentawm hilo in ka sunga a teeng ka Pa in na a sem ahi hi.
43014011	Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om hi ka cih thu hong um in. Ahih keileh zong ka bawl nate hangin hong um in.
43014012	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kei hong um mi in keima nasep teng mah a sem ding hi. Ka Pa kiangah ciah ding ka hih manin, keima septe sanga a lianzaw zong a sem ding hi.
43014013	Keima min suanga na nget khempeuh uh Tapa tungtawn in Pa min a than theih nadingin kong pia ding hi.
43014014	Keima min suanga na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh leh kong pia ding hi.
43014015	“Kei nong it uh leh kong thupiakte na zui un.
43014016	Ka Pa kiangah ka ngen dinga, amah in note tawh hong omkhawm tawntung dingin a dang Huhpa khat hong pia ding hi.
43014017	Tua Huhpa in thuman thutak Kha ahi hi. Leitung mite in amah mu lo in thei lo uh ahih manin a sang thei kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin amah in note tawh hong teengkhawm in note sungah hong om ding ahih manin amah na thei ding uh hi.
43014018	Tagah bangin note kong nusia kei dinga, note kiangah kong paikik ding hi.
43014019	Tawmvei khit ciangin leitung mite in a hong mu nawn kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note in nong mu ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei ka nuntak manin note zong na nungta ding uh hi.
43014020	Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah note om in note sungah zong kei ka om lam tua ni ciangin na thei ding uh hi.
43014021	Keima thupiakte nei a, a zui mi peuhmah in kei hong it mi ahi hi. Kei hong it mi ka Pa in zong it dinga, ken zong amah it in ama tungah ka kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.
43014022	Iscariot a hilo Judas dang khatpen in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, leitung mite tungah kilang loin kote tung bekah hong kilang ning na cih koici bang thu ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
43014023	Zeisu in dawngkik in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei a hong it leh ka thu a zui ding hi. Ka Pa in amah it in ama kiangah ka pai ding uh a, amah tawh ka teengkhawm ding uh hi.
43014024	Kei hong itlo mi in ka thugente a zui kei hi. Na zak uh ka thugente keima thu hilo in kei hong sawlpa ka Pa thu ahi hi.
43014025	“Note tawh kong omkhop sungin hih thute kong genzo hi.
43014026	Ahi zongin Pa in kei minin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho in thu khempeuh hong hilh dinga note kianga kong gensa thu khempeuh a hong phawkkiksak ding hi.
43014027	Lungmuanna kong nusiat hi. Keima lungmuanna note kong pia a, leitung hong piak bangin ka hong pia kei hi. Lungkham kei unla, lau kei un.
43014028	“‘Ka va ciah dinga, note kiangah kong paikik ding hi,’ kong cihna thu na zazo uh hi. Kei na hong it uh leh, ‘Pa kiangah ka pai ding hi,’ ka cih manin na nuam ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei sangin ka Pa a lianzaw hi.
43014029	Hih thu a hong pian ciangin na up theih nadingun tu in a hong genkhol ka hi hi.
43014030	Note kiangah thu tampi kong gen nawn kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih leitung a ukpa hong tung dekta hi. Ahi zongin amah in kei tungah thu a nei kei hi.
43014031	Ahih hangin Pa ka it lam leitung mite in a hong theih nadingun Pa hong thupiak bangbang in na ka sem hi. Ding un. Hih mun panin paikhia ni,” a ci hi.
43015001	Zeisu in, “Keimah in lenggui maan taktak ka hi a, ka Pa in lenggui lo neipa ahi hi.
43015002	Kei tungah om napi a gahlo hiang khempeuh amah in sattan dinga, a gah hiang khempeuh a gah semsem nadingin a heuhsiang ding hi.
43015003	Note tunga kong gensa thu hangin tu in na siangta uh hi.
43015004	Kei sungah om tawntung un. Kei zong note sungah ka om tawntung ding hi. A hiangin a gui tawh kipeh kei leh a gah theihloh mah bangin note zong keima sungah na om tawntung kei uh leh na gah thei kei ding uh hi.
43015005	“Keimah in lenggui ka hi a, note in a hiangte na hi uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in keima sungah om tawntung a, ama sungah kei ka om tawntung leh tua mi in gah tampi a gah ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei loin bangmah na hih thei kei ding uh hi.
43015006	Keima sunga a omlo mi in lenggui hiang keu bangin a kipaikhia ding hi. Mite in tuate khawmin meikuang sungah khul ding uh a, a kangtum ding hi.
43015007	Keima sungah note om tawntung in, ka thu in note sungah a om tawntung leh na nget nop khempeuh uh na ngen ding uh a, a hong kipia ding hi.
43015008	Note in gah tampi na gah uh ciangin ka Pa min a thang hi. Tua in ka nungzuite taktak na hihna uh a hong kilangsak hi.
