43015009	“Pa in kei hong it bangin ken zong note kong it hi. Ka itna sungah om tawntung un.
43015010	Ka Pa hong thupiakte zui in ama itna sungah ka om tawntung mah bangin note in zong kong thupiakte na zuih uh leh ka itna sungah a om tawntung na hi ding uh hi.
43015011	Ka lungdamna note sungah a om nading le note lungdamna a kicin nadingin hih thute kong genzo hi.
43015012	Note kong it bangin note zong khat le khat na ki‑it un, ci in thu kong pia hi.
43015013	A lawmte aa dingin a nuntakna a pia itna sangin a lianzaw itna kuamah in a nei kei hi.
43015014	Kong thupiak bangbang na zuih uh leh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
43015015	Nasempa in a topa septe a theih khakloh hangin keimah in ka Pa kiang pana ka zaksa thu khempeuh note kong theisak zo hi. Tua ahih manin nasemte hong ci nawnlo in lawmte kong ci hi.
43015016	Note in kei nong teel kei uh a, ahih hangin keimah in note kong teel hi. Note pai in gah na gah uh ciangin na gah tawntung nadingun note kong koih hi. Tua hi a, keima min tawh na nget peuhpeuh uh Pa in hong piak theih nading ahi hi.
43015017	Note khat le khat na ki‑it nadingun hih thute kong pia hi.
43015018	“Leitung mite in note a hong muhdah uh leh kei hong mudah masa zaw uh ahi hi cih thu na thei un.
43015019	Leitung mite tawh kipawl hi le uh cin leitung in hong it ding hi. Ahih hangin leitung panin note kong telkhia a, leitung tawh kipawl lo na hih manun leitung in note hong mudah hi.
43015020	‘Nasempa in a topa sangin lian zawlo hi,’ ci a, kong gensa thu na phawk un. Amaute in kei hong bawlsia uh ahih leh note zong a hong bawlsia ding uh hi. Ka thugente zui le uh note thugente zong a zui ding uh hi.
43015021	Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong sawlpa thei lo uh ahih manin keima min hangin note tua bangin a hong bawl ding uh hi.
43015022	Kei hong pai loin amaute tungah thu a hilh lo hi leng amaute a mawh kei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin tu in mawhna tawh a kipelh thei nawn kei ding uh hi.
43015023	Kei hong mudah mi in ka Pa zong a mudah ahi hi.
43015024	Kuamah in a bawl ngeiloh nate amaute lakah a bawl lo hi leng amaute a mawh kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin tu in amaute in tua nalamdangte mu khin napi uh kei le ka Pa a hong mudah uh hi.
43015025	Hih in, ‘A thu omlopi in kei hong mudah uh hi,’ ci a, amaute thukham sunga a kigelhsa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
43015026	“Ahih hangin Pa kiang pana kong sawl ding Huhpa a hong tun ciangin keima thu teci a pang ding hi. Amah in Pa kiang pana hong pai thuman thutak Kha ahi hi.
43015027	Note in zong a kipat cil a kipan kei tawh omkhawm na hih manun teci na pang ding uh hi.
43016001	“Note na puk loh nadingun hih thute kong genzo hi.
43016002	Kikhopna inn panin note hong hawlkhia ding uh hi. Hi hi, note hong that mi khatpeuh in Pasian nasem in a kingaihsut uh hun hong tung ding hi.
43016003	Amaute in Pa thei lo uh a, kei zong hong thei lo uh ahih manin tua bangin hong gamta ding uh hi.
43016004	Tua mite thu hong gen khinzo ka hih manin a hun hong tun ciangin na phawkkik theih nadingun hih thute kong gen hi. Note tawh omkhawm ka hih manin a kipat cillai in hih thute kong gen nai kei hi.
43016005	“Ahih hangin tu in kei hong sawlpa kiangah a pai ding ka hita a, note khat beek in, ‘Koi ah pai ding na hi hiam?’ ci in nong dong kei uh hi.
43016006	Ahi zongin hih thute kong gen manin na lungsim uh dahna tawh a kidim hi.
43016007	Ahi zongin a maantak in kong gen in ah kei ka pai kei leh note kiangah Huhpa hong pai theilo ding hi. Pai leng note kiangah amah hong sawl ding ka hih manin ka pai ding pen note aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
43016008	Amah a hong tun ciangin mawhna thu, dikna thu le thukhenna thute leitung mite hong theitelsak ding hi.
43016009	Amaute in kei hong um lo uh ahih manin amah in mawhna thu hong theitelsak ding hi.
43016010	Ka Pa kiangah pai in kei hong mu kha nawnlo ding na hih manun amah in dikna thu hong theitelsak ding hi.
43016011	Pasian in hih leitung a ukpa tungah thukhen zo ahih manin amah in thukhenna thu hong theitelsak ding hi.
43016012	“Note kianga kong gen ding thu tampi a omlai hangin tu tadih in na thei zo nai kei ding uh hi.
43016013	Ahi zongin thuman thutak Kha a hong tun ciangin amah in thuman thutak khempeuh ah note lam hong lak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in ama ut bangin thu hong gen lo ding hi. A zaksa thute bek hong gen dinga, hong pianglai ding thute zong hong hilh ding hi.
43016014	Amah in kei tung pana a ngah thute note tungah hong pulak ding ahih manin ka min a thangsak ding hi.
43016015	Ka Pa neihsa khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Tua ahih manin kei tung pana a ngah thute note tungah hong pulak ding hi ci a, hong gen ka hi hi.
43016016	“Pa kiangah pai ding ka hih manin tawlkhat sung nong mu kei ding uh a, tawlkhat khit ciangin nong mukik ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43016017	Tua ciangin a nungzuite pawlkhat in, “ ‘Pa kiangah ka pai ding hi,’ a cih pen le, ‘Tawlkhat sung nong mu kei ding uh a, tawlkhat khit ciangin nong mukik ding uh hi,’ a cih pen in bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.
43016018	Tua ahih manin amaute in, “ ‘Tawlkhat sung’ a cih pen bang a cihnopna hi peuhmah ding ahi hiam? A thugen i thei zo peuhmah kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
43016019	Amaute in thu khat dongnuam uh hi cih Zeisu in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah, “ ‘Tawlkhat sung nong mu kei ding uh a, tawlkhat khit ciangin nong mukik ding uh hi,’ kong cih bang ka cihnopna hiam ci in khat le khat a kidong hingel uh teh maw?
43016020	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note kapin na tamlo ding uh a, leitung mite ahih leh a nuam ding uh hi. Na dah uh hangin na dahna teng uh nuamna hong suak ding hi.
43016021	Numei khat nau a suah ding ciangin lau‑a a dah hangin nau a suah khit phetin leitung ah mihing khat hong piang ahih manin lungdam in a Nausuah gimna khempeuh a phawk nawn kei hi.
43016022	Tuamah bangin tu in na dah mahmah uh hangin kong mukik dinga, tua hun ciangin na lungdam ding uh hi. Tua na lungdamna uh kuamah in hong sutkhia thei kei ding hi.
43016023	Tua ni ciangin bangmah nong ngen nawn kei ding uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih in ah, keima min tawh Pa kianga na nget peuhpeuh uh amah in hong pia ding hi.
43016024	Tu dongin keima minin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh hi. Ngen un. Na lungdamna uh a kicin nadingin na ngah ding uh hi.
43016025	“Hih thute note kiangah gentehna tawh kong gen hi. Ahih hangin gentehna tawh hong gen nawnlo in Pa thu a teltak a kong gen ding hun hong tung ding hi.
43016026	Tua ni ciangin keima min suangin thu na ngen ding uh hi. Note aa dingin Pa kiangah thu kong ngetsak ding hi a ci ka hi kei hi.
43016027	Banghang hiam cihleh note in kei hong it in, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi ci in hong um na hih manun, Pa mahmah in zong note hong it hi.
43016028	Pa kiang panin leitung ah kong pai a, leitung nusia in Pa kiangah ka ciahkik ding hi,” ci in Zeisu in a gen hi.
43016029	A nungzuite in ama kiangah, “En in, tu in gentehna zang loin kiteltak in thu nong genta hi.
43016030	Na khempeuh na thei a, kuamah in thu hong sittel ding kul lo hi cih ka theita uh hi. Hih thu hang mahin Pasian kiang pana hong pai na hi hi ci in kong um uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43016031	Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tu in hong um takpi na hi uh hiam?
43016032	En un, na inn ciat uh zuanin kithehthang a kei guak nong nusiat ding uh hun hong tung ding pen tu in hong tungzo hi. Ahih hangin kei guak ka om kei a, Pa in hong ompih hi.
43016033	“Keima sungah lungmuanna na neih theih nadingun hih thute kong genzo hi. Leitung ah gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Ahih hangin lunghimawh kei un. Leitung ka zozo hi,” a ci hi.
43017001	Zeisu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin vantung lam ento a, “Pa aw, a hun hong tungzo hi. Na Tapa in nang hong minthansak theih nadingin na Tapa zong minthangsak ta in.
43017002	Nangmah in nong piak zahzah mite khempeuh keimah in nuntak tawntungna ka piak theih nadingin mi khempeuh tungah thuneihna kei nong pia zo hi.
43017003	Tua nuntak tawntungna in nangmah bek a maan Pasian na hihna le na sawlpa Zeisu Khazih a theih nading uh ahi hi.
43017004	Leitung ah na min ka thangsak zo a, sep dinga nong piak nasep ka zozo hi.
43017005	Tu in Pa aw, leitung a pianma a nang tawh ka neih minthanna tawh kei hong minthangsak in.
43017006	“Leitung mite lak pan a nong piaktuam hih mite tungah na min ka pulak zo hi. Amaute nang aa hi a, nangin kei nong pia zo hi. Amaute in zong na thu a zui uh hi.
43017007	Kei nong piak khempeuh nangma aa ahihlam amaute in tu in a theizo uh hi.
43017008	Banghang hiam cihleh gen dinga nong piak thute amaute tungah ka gen zo a, amaute in zong a sangzo uh hi. Nangma kiang panin a pai ka hihna thu hong theitel zo uh a, nangma sawlpa ka hihna zong a um uh hi.
43017009	“Leitung mite aa dingin thu kong ngen kei hi. Nong piaksa mite nangma aa ahih manin amaute aa ding bekin thu kong ngen hi.
43017010	Kei neihsa khempeuh nangma aa hi a, nang neihsa khempeuh zong kei aa ahih manin amaute hangin minthanna ka ngah hi.
43017011	Tu in leitung ah om nawnlo in nang kiangah kong paita ding hi. Hih mite ahih leh leitung ah a omlai ding uh hi. A siangtho ka Pa aw, nang le kei pumkhat i hih mah bangin nong piaksa mite zong pumkhat a suah theih nadingun na min tawh amaute kem ta in.
43017012	Amaute tawh leitung ah ka omkhop sungin na min in ka kem zo hi. Lai Siangtho a tangtun nadingin siatna tapa longal nong piaksa mite khat beek mansuah loin ka humbit zo hi.
43017013	“Tu in nangma kiangah kong paita ding hi. Amaute sungah keima lungdamna a kidim nadingin leitung ah ka om sungin hih thute ka genzo hi.
43017014	Amaute tungah na thu ka pia khinzo hi. Leitung tawh kei ka kipawl loh mah bangin amaute zong kipawl lo uh ahih manin, leitung mite in amaute a mudah uh hi.
43017015	Leitung panin amaute lakhia in ci in kong ngen kei hi. Gilopa tawh a kipelh nadingun thu kong ngen hi.
43017016	Leitung tawh kei ka kipawl loh mah bangin amaute zong a kipawl kei uh hi.
43017017	Na thuman thutak tawh amaute siangthosak in. Na thu in thuman thutak ahi hi.
43017018	Leitung ah kei nong sawl mah bangin ken zong amaute leitung ah ka sawl hi.
43017019	Thuman thutak tawh amaute a kisianthosak theih nadingin amaute ka khualna in kei mahmah zong ka kisiangthosak hi.
43017020	“Hih mite aa ding bekin thu kong ngen kei hi. Amaute thuhilhna hanga kei hong um ding mite aa dingin zong thu kong ngetsak hi.
43017021	Pa aw, amaute pumkhat a suah nadingun thu kong ngen hi. Kei sungah nang omin nang sungah kei ka om bangin, amaute khempeuh zong eima sungah pumkhat suak a, tua hangin leitung mite in nangma sawlpa ka hih lam a theih nadingun thu kong ngen hi.
43017022	Nang le kei pumkhat i hih mah bangin amaute zong pumkhat a suah nadingun kei nong piak minthanna amaute ka pia zo hi.
43017023	Amaute sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah nang na om hi. Amaute pumkhat suaka a picinna uh hangin nangma sawlpa ka hihna thu le kei nong it bangin amaute zong na itna thu leitung mite in a theih nading uh ahi hi.
43017024	“Pa aw, nong piaksa mite keima omna mun mah ah om in kei nong it manin leitung pianma a nong piak minthannate amaute in zong mu le uh ka deih hi.
43017025	“A dik ka Pa aw! Leitung mite in nang hong theih loh uh hangin ken kong thei hi. Nong sawlpa ka hih lam hih mite in zong a theizo uh hi.
43017026	Kei nong itna bang itna amaute sungah om a, amaute sungah kei mahmah ka om theih nadingin amaute tungah na min ka pulak zo a, ka pulak lai ding hi,” ci in thu a ngen hi.
43018001	Zeisu in hih bangin thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh paikhia a, Kidron lui gal khat a om huan khat sungah a lut uh hi.
43018002	Zeisu le a nungzuite tua munah paikhawm zel uh ahih manin amah a lehhekpa Judas in zong tua mun a thei hi.
43018003	Tua ciangin Judas in galkap honkhatɠ, siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte kiang pana kisawl biakinn cingte pawlkhat hong makaih in huan sungah a hong pai uh hi. Amaute in meivak, meilah le hiamte a tawi uh hi.
43018004	Zeisu in ama tunga piang ding teng thei ahih manin amaute kiangah va pai a, “Kua zong na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43018005	Amaute in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu,” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in, “Keimah ka hi hi,” a ci hi. Amah a lehhekpa Judas zong amaute tawh a dingkhawm hi.
43018006	Zeisu in, “Keimah ka hi hi,” a cih khit phetin amaute nungkin in lei ah a puk uh hi.
43018007	Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Kua zong na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dongkik hi. Amaute in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu,” a ci uh hi.
43018008	Zeisu in, “ ‘Keimah ka hi hi,’ kong ci zo hi. Tua ahih manin kei hong zong na hih uh leh hih mite ciahsak un,” a ci hi.
43018009	Hih in, “Keimah nong piaksa mite khat beek ka mansuah kei hi,” ci a, ama gensa thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
43018010	Tua ciangin Simon Peter in ama kuah namsau dokin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi. Tua nasempa min in Malchus ahi hi.
43018011	Zeisu in Peter kiangah, “Na namsau a paai ah siatkik in. Ka Pa in hong piak hai dawn loin om ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018012	Tua khit ciangin galkaphonɠ a kipan galkap mangpaɠ le biakinn cing Judah mite in Zeisu manin a hen uh hi.
43018013	Tua khit ciangin tua kuma Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas sunghpa Annas kiangah a paipih masa uh hi.
43018014	Tu in Caiaphas in mipi tangin mi khat a sih ding hoih zaw hi ci in Judah mite thu a hilhpa ahi hi.
43018015	Tu in Simon Peter le a dang nungzuite khatin Zeisu a zui uh hi. Tua nungzuipa pen Siampi Ukpa tawh kimeltheih ahih manin, Siampi Ukpa inntual ah Zeisu tawh a lutkhawm uh hi.
43018016	Peter ahih leh kongpi pualam ah dingin a om hi. Siampi Ukpa tawh a kithei a dang nungzuipa hong paikhia a, kongcing numeino a hopih khit ciangin Peter a lutpih hi.
43018017	Tua ciangin kongcing numeino in Peter kiangah, “Nang zong hihpa nungzuite khat hilo na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Peter in, “Ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi.
43018018	Tu in khuadam ahih manin, tua muna ding nasemte le biakinn cingte in meihol cih in a awi uh hi. Peter zong tua mite tawh dingkhawm in mei a awi hi.
43018019	Tu in Siampi Ukpa in Zeisu kiangah a nungzuite thu le a thuhilhna tawh kisai thute a dong hi.
43018020	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Leitung mite tungah a kilang in thu ka genzo hi. Judah mite a kimuhkhop zelna kikhopna innte le biakinnpi huang sungah thu ka hilh tawntung a, a simtham in thu ka gen ngei kei hi.
43018021	Banghang in kei hong dong na hi hiam? Ka thugen a za mite dong in. Bang thu gen ka hi hiam cih amaute in a thei uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43018022	Zeisu in tua bang teng a gen khit ciangin a kianga ding biakinn cingte khatin amah beng a, “Siampi Ukpa hi bangin dawng vial ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018023	Zeisu in, “Kampau khial ka hih leh ka khialhna hong lak in. Thuman a gen kimlai, banghang in hong beng laizang na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018024	Tua khit ciangin Annas in Zeisu a kihensa in Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas kiangah a puak hi.
43018025	Tu in Simon Peter in a dinsa in mei a awi hi. Tua laitak in amaute in ama kiangah, “Nang zong Zeisu nungzuite khat hilo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Ka hi peuhmah kei hi,” ci in a nial hi.
43018026	Peter in a bil a sat khiatsakpa tanau khat ahi Siampi Ukpa nasempa in Peter kiangah, “Huan sungah Zeisu tawh hong mukhawm hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018027	Peter in nialkik leuleu a, tua ciangin aak a khuang pah hi.
43018028	Tua khit ciangin Caiaphas inn panin mangpipa inn ah Zeisu a paipih uh hi. Tua hun in zingsang tung ahi hi. Amaute in Paisan Pawi an a nek theih nadingun kisiansuah nuam uh ahih manin mangpipa inn sungah a lut kei uh hi.
43018029	Tua ahih manin amaute kiangah Pilate pai a, “Hih mipa na mawhmatna uh bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018030	Amaute in, “Amah khialhna neilo mi hi kei leh nangma tungah kong piakhia kei ding uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
43018031	Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Amah paikhiatpih unla note thukham tawh kizui in thukhen un,” a cih ciangin Judah mite in, “Mi thah theih nading thu ka nei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43018032	Hih thu in Zeisu in ama sih dingzia a gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
43018033	Tua ciangin Pilate in thu vaihawmna mun mangpipa inn ah lutkik in Zeisu sam a, “Nang Judah mite Kumpipa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018034	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Nangma utthu tawh hi bangin thu hong dong na hi hiam? Ahih keileh midangte in keima thu nangma kiangah hong gen khinzo uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018035	Pilate in, “Kei Judah mi hong sa na hi hiam? Na minamte le siampi liante in keima khut sungah nang hong piakhia uh hi. Bang sem kha na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
43018036	Zeisu in, “Ka kumpigam in hih leitung tawh kisai lo hi. Kisai hi leh Judah mite khut sungah hi bangin hong kipiakkhiat loh nadingin ka nasemte in a do ding uh hi. Ahih hangin ka kumpigam in hih leitung tawh kisai lo hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43018037	Tua ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah, “Tua ahih leh kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Zeisu in, “ ‘Kumpipa na hi hi,’ nong cih a maan hi. Thuman thutak teci a pang dingin hih leitung ah hong suakin kong paizo hi. Thuman thutak tawh a kipawl mite khempeuh in keima aw a ngai uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43018038	Pilate in, “Thuman thutak in bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Pilate in hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin Judah mite kiangah paikhiakik a, “Hih mipa tungah khialhna ka mu kei hi.
43018039	Ahih hangin Paisan Pawi hun simin mi khat kong khahsak theih ding na ngeina uh ahih manin Judah mite Kumpipa hong khahsak leng na ut uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43018040	Tua ciangin amaute in a vekpi un, “Hihpa khah kei in. Barabbas khah zaw in!” ci in a kikokik uh hi. Barabbas in mi suampa khat ahi hi.
43019001	Tua khit ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah Zeisu samin a satsak hi.
43019002	Galkapte in linglukhu bawl in khusak uh a, puan dupsan khat a silhsak uh hi.
43019003	Tua khit ciangin, “Dam maw, Judah mite Kumpipa!” ci in a beng uh hi.
43019004	Pilate zong khatvei paikhiakik in amaute kiangah, “En un, hihpa tungah khialhna ka muh loh lam na theih nadingun note kiangah kong puakkik hi,” a ci hi.
43019005	Tua ciangin Zeisu in ling lukhu khusa le puan dupsan silhsa in a hong paikhia hi. Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Hih mipa en un!” a ci hi.
43019006	Tua ciangin siampi liante le biakinn cingte in amah mu uh a, “Khailum in, khailum in!” ci in a kiko uh hi. Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Ama tungah khialhna mu lo ka hih manin amah la unla, nomau mahmah in khailum un,” a ci hi.
43019007	Judah mite in ama kiangah, “Kote in thukham khat ka nei uh a, tua thukham tawh kizui in amah a sih ding kilawm hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah le amah Pasian Tapa in kigen hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
43019008	Tua ciangin Pilate in tua thu a zak ciangin a lau semsem hi.

43019011	Zeisu in, “Tunglam panin thu a hong kipiak kei leh, kei tungah thu na nei thei kei ding hi. Tua ahih manin na khut sunga kei hong piakhiapa in a mawhna a lianzaw hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43019012	Tua huna kipan Pilate in Zeisu a khahkhiat theih nading lampi a zong hi. Ahih hangin Judah mite in, “Hihpa na khah leh Caesar kumpipa lawm na hi kei ding hi. Kumpipa ka hi hi ci a, a kibawltawm mi peuhmah in Caesar kumpipa a langpan ahi hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
43019013	Pilate in tua thu a zak ciangin Zeisu hong paikhiatpih a, Hebrew pau in Gabbatha a kici Suangphah Mun a om thukhenna tokhom tungah a tu hi.
43019014	Tua hunin Paisan Pawi Kigin Niɠ, nai guk pawl hi a, Pilate in Judah mite kiangah, “Na Kumpipa uh en un!” a ci hi.
43019015	Ahih hangin amaute in, “That in, that in! Khailum in!” ci in a kiko uh hi. Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Na Kumpipa uh hong khailupsak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Siampi liante in, “Caesar longal kumpi dang ka nei kei uh hi!” ci in a dawng uh hi.
43019016	Tua khit ciangin amah in khailup dingin amaute khut sungah Zeisu piakhia a, amaute in amah la in a paikhiatpih uh hi.

43019018	Amaute in tualai ah Zeisu a khai uh hi. Ama lang tuakah midang nih zong khai uh a, a laizang ah Zeisu a khai uh hi.
43019019	Tu in Pilate in, “JUDAH MITE KUMPIPA, NAZARETH KHUA MI ZEISU,” ci in lai gelh a, singlamteh tungah a suang hi.
43019020	Zeisu a kikhaina mun pen Jerusalem khuapi tawh kinai ahih manin Judah mi tampi in tua lai kigelh a sim uh hi. Tua lai in Hebrew, Greek le Latin paute tawh a kigelh hi.
43019021	Tua ciangin Judahte siampi liante in Pilate kiangah, “ ‘Judah mite Kumpipa,’ ci in gelh kei inla, ‘ “Judah mite Kumpipa ka hi hi,” a kici pa,’ ci in gelh zaw in,” a ci uh hi.
43019022	Tua ciangin Pilate in, “Ka gelh khitsa, ka gelhsa hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
43019023	Galkapte in Zeisu a khai khit uh ciangin a puante la in phel li suah uh a, mi khatin phel khat ciat a la uh hi. A puantualpi zong a la uh hi. Tua puantualpi kikhui loin a lu pan a taw dong a kigansuak ahi hi.
43019024	Tua ahih manin amaute in, “Hih puantualpi phelsuah kei ni. Kua in ngah ding cih i theih nadingin aisan ni,” a kici uh hi. Tua pen Lai Siangtho sung a, “Amaute in ka puan hawm uh a, Ka puanak a ngah nadingun, Lai‑ai a san uh hi,” ci a, a kigelhsa thu a tangtun nadingin galkapte in hi bangin ahih uh ahi hi.
43019025	Tu in Zeisu a kikhaina singlamteh kiangah a nu, a nu sanggamnu ahi Clopas zi Mary le Magdala khua mi Mary‑te a ding uh hi.
43019026	Tua bangin Zeisu in a nu le ama it nungzuipa a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, “Numei aw, na tapa en in!” a ci hi.

43019029	Tu in tua munah lenggahtui thuk a dima om bel khat a kitung hi. Amaute in lenggah tuithuk sungah puan diahin puknah ciangtawn dawn ah a suan khit uh ciangin a kam ah a tahto uh hi.
43019030	Lenggah tuithuk Zeisu a piak khit uh ciangin amah in, “Kizo zo hi!” ci in a lu puksuk in a huu tawpna a sangkhia hi.

43019032	Tua ciangin galkapte hong pai in, Zeisu tawh a kikhaikhawm a masapenpa khe a suktan khit uh ciangin a dang khatpa aa zong a sutan uh hi.

43021017	Zeisu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, kei nong it hiam?” ci in a thumveina a dongkik hi. “Kei nong it hiam?” ci in Zeisu in thumvei tak a dot manin Peter a khasia hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, na khempeuh na thei a, nang kong it lam zong na thei hi,” a ci hi. Zeisu in, “Ka tuute na vak in.
43021018	Aman takpi kong cih in ah, na khangno lai in na kawng gakin na utna peuhpeuh ah na pai hi. Ahih hangin na upat ciangin na khut na zan dinga, midangte in na kawng hong hensak in na pai nop lohna munah hong paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43021019	Hih thu in, Peter in ama sihzia tawh Pasian minthangsak ding cih a gennopna ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.
43021020	Tua ciangin Peter a kihei leh ama nungah Zeisu in a it nungzuipa in a zuih lam a mu hi. Tua pa pen nitak an a neklai un Zeisu ang ah a kingap kawmsa a, “Topa aw, nang hong lehhek ding kua pen ahi hiam?” ci in a dong pa ahi hi.
43021021	Peter in tua pa a muh ciangin Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, hihpa e leh, bangci ding a hia?” a ci hi.
43021022	Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Kong paikik dong hihpa ka nuntak suaksak nop leh bang phamawh sa na hi hiam? Nang na hih leh ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
43021023	Hih thu hangin tua nungzuipa si lo ding hi ci in nungzuite lakah a thang hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in amah si lo ding hi a ci hilo a, “Kong paikik dong amah ka nuntak suaksak nop leh bang phamawh sa na hi hiam?” a ci bek ahi hi.
43021024	Hih thu khempeuh teci panga a gelhpa in tua nungzuipa ahi hi. Ama teci panna a maan hi cih kote in ka thei uh hi.
43021025	Zeisu in a bawl nalamdang tampi zong a omlai hi. Tuate a bantak in kigelh leh a kigelhna laibute leitung ah ta zo in ka um kei hi. Amen.
44001001	Theophilus aw, Zeisu in a kilaktoh ni donga a sep le a hilh thu khempeuh kong laikhak masa sungah ka gelh khinzo hi.
44001002	Amah in a teelsa sawltakte kiangah Kha Siangtho tungtawn in thu tampi vaikhak a, tua khit ciangin vantung ah a kilato hi.
44001003	Sihna a thuak khit ciangin hih mite kiangah kilak a, nungta takpi ahihna thu a kician mahmah kipsakna thu tampi a pia hi. Amaute muhin ni 40 sung om a, Pasian kumpigam thute a gen hi.
44001004	Sawltakte tawh a omkhopna khatah Zeisu in amaute thupia a, “Jerusalem khuapi pan paikhia loin, keima tung pan na zaksa uh, Pa kamciam na ngak un.
44001005	Banghang hiam cihleh John in mite tui tawh a phum hi. Ahi zongin tu a kipan a sawtlo in note Kha Siangtho tawh hong kiphum ding hi,” a ci hi.
44001006	Tua ahih manin amaute hong paikhawm uha ama kiangah, “Topa aw, tu hunin Israel mite tungah kumpigam piakik ta ding na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
44001007	Amah in, “Pa in ama thuneihna tawh a seh khitsa hun le nite note theih ding ahi kei hi.
44001008	Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin vangliatna na ngah ding uha Jerusalem khuapi a kipan Judea gam khempeuh, Samaria gam khempeuh le leimong dongah ka teci na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44001009	Tu in hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin amaute muhtang mahin amah kilato a, meiilum khatin liah ahih manin a muthei nawn kei uh hi.
44001010	Vantung ah Zeisu a kahtoh a limet mahmah laitak un thakhat in amaute kiangah puanpak silh mi nih a ding uh hi.
44001011	Amaute in, “Galilee mite aw, banghang in dinsa in vantung lam en gega na hi uh hiam? Note kiang pana vantung ah a kilato hih Zeisu mah tu‑a a paitoh na muh bang tektek un a hong paikik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
44001012	Tua khit ciangin amaute Tanluan mual panin Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi. Tanluan mual pen Jerusalem khuapi panin Sabbath ni khat lam ahi hi.
44001013	Inn a tun uh ciangin amaute tunna inndei tungnung ah a kahto uh hi. Tua mite in Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Mate, Alphaeus tapa James le Zealot pawl Simon, James tapa Judas‑te ahi uh hi.
44001014	Amaute in numeite, Zeisu nu Mary, le Zeisu sanggamte tawh lungsim kikhat in thungetna le thumna a nei den uh hi.
44001015	Tualai a a kikhawm nungzuite 120 bang a pha uh hi. Amaute laizang ah Peter dingto in thu gen a,
44001016	“Sanggamte aw, Zeisu a mante a hong makaih ahi Judas tawh kisai thu Kha Siangtho in David tungtawn in a genkholhna Lai Siangtho a tangtun loh a phamawh ahi hi.
44001017	Tua Judas in eite tawh a kisimkhawm mi khat hi a, hih nasepna ah zong a kihel mi khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44001018	Tua hi napi hih mipa in a mawhna thaman tawh lo khat lei a, tualai ah bungbu kiat in a gilpi kitam a, a sungkua khempeuh a buakhia hi.
44001019	Tua thu Jerusalem khuapi a teeng mi khempeuh in a thei uh hi. Tua logam pen amau pau in “Akel Dama” ci uh a, “Sisan Lo” a cihna ahi hi.
44001020	Tua banah, “Late Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ama teenna mun gamkhing suak henla, Tua munah kuamah teeng nawn kei hen. Midang khatin ama za luah hen,’ ci in a kigelh hi.
44001021	“Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu eite lakah sungtum pusuak in a omsung,
44001022	John in tui a phum a kipan eite kiang panin a kilaktoh ni dong, eite tawh a kipawlkhawm mite lak panin mi khat i teel ding kisam hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua pa in eite tawh Zeisu Khazih thawhkikna thu teci a pangkhawm mi ahih ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
44001023	Tua ciangin amaute in mi nih Barsabas a kici Joseph (Justus zong kici) le Matthias a teelkhia uh hi.
44001024	Amaute in, “Nang, mi khempeuh lungsim a thei Topa aw, Judas ahih leh ama muna pai dingin mawhna bawl in a za pan a kia zo hi.
44001025	Tua ahih manin hih mi nihte lakah sawltak a suak ding le hih nasep a sem dinga na teelpa hong lak in,” ci in thu a ngen uh hi.
44001026	Tua khit ciangin lai‑ai san uh a, Matthias tungah tu ahih manin sawltak sawm le khatte tawh a kisimkhawm hi.
44002001	Pentecost ni a hong tun ciangin amaute khempeuh lungsim kikhat in munkhat ah a omkhawm uh hi.
44002002	Tua laitak in huihpi nung tawh a kibang awging khat vantung pan thakhat in hong ging a, amaute tutna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi.
44002003	Tua khit ciangin meikuang tawh a kibang leiite hong kilang in kithehzak a, amaute tung ciat ah a tu hi.
44002004	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, Kha in a lawhkhiatsak bangbang in pau nam tuamtuam tawh thu a gen uh hi.
44002005	Van nuai‑a om minam khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak Judah mite tua laitak in Jerusalem khuapi ah a om uh hi.
44002006	Tua aw a hong gin ciangin mihonpi hong pai uha tua mite thugen amau pau ciat tawh a zak manun a lungmang uh hi.
44002007	Lamdangsa lua uh ahih manin lungmang uh a, “En un, hih mite in Galilee pau in a paute vive hilo ahi uh hiam?
44002008	I pianpih pau ciat tawh i zak theihpen a bangci ahi hiam?
44002009	Parthia mi, Media mi, Elam mite le Mesopotamia gama teeng mite, Judea gam, Cappadocia gam, Pontus gam, Asia gam,
44002010	Phrygia gam, Pamphylia gam, Egypt gam, le Cyrene khua kiang Libya gama teeng mite, Rome khuapi pana hong zin Judah mite le Judah mi a kisuaksakte,
44002011	Crete mi le Arab mi ahi eite in amaute thugen eima pau ciat tawh i zak theih pen Pasian nasep hi a, lamdang mahmah hi,” a kici uh hi.
44002012	Tua hi a, amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa in lungmang uh a, “Bangci bang thu hi peuhmah ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.
44002013	Midangte in ahih leh, “Lenggahzu cil a kham uh hi ding hi,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
44002014	Ahih hangin sawm le khatte tawh Peter dingkhawm a, a aw sangkhan in a gen in ah, “Judah mite le Jerusalem khuapi a teeng mite khempeuh aw, hih thu kong theisak nuam hi ka thugen na ngai un.
44002015	Note upmawh bangin hih mite zukham hilo uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nai thum sat pan hi.
44002016	Hih thu kamsangpa Joel in a gensa ahi hi.
44002017	Amah in, ‘A nunung nite ciangin, Mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka bua dinga, Na tapa na tanute un kamsang in thu a gen ding uh hi. Na tangvalte un mang mu ding uh a, Na putekte un mang a man ding uh hi.
44002018	Tua hun ciangin, ka sila numei le pasalte tungah Ka Kha ka bua dinga, Amaute in kamsang in thu a gen ding uh hi.
44002019	Tunglam vanah nalamdang lianpi pite ka lak dinga, Nuai‑a leitung ah sisan, meikuang le meikhu tawh, Limlamdangte ka lak ding hi.
44002020	A lauhuai le a lian mahmah Topa ni, A hong tunma in ni hong mial dinga, Kha in sisan hong suak ding hi.
44002021	Tua ciangin, Topa min tawh Huhna a ngen mi khempeuh in, Hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi, Pasian in ci hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
44002022	“Israel mite aw, hih thute za un. Na theihsa mah bangun Pasian in Nazareth khua mi Zeisu tungtawn in note lakah nalamdangte, nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte a bawlna tawh amah a sanna thu teci a pangzo hi.
44002023	Pasian in a khentat khitsa ama ngimna le a theihkholhna tawh kizui in note tungah amah hong ap a, note in migilote khut tawh manin singkhuam tungah na khailum uh hi.
44002024	Ahih hangin, sihna in amah lencip zolo ahih manin sihna panin Pasian in khahkhia in a thosak zo hi.
44002025	David in ama thu tawh kisai in a genna ah, ‘Ka mai ah Topa ka mu tawntung hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka kilin loh nadingin, Ka taklam ah amah a om hi.
44002026	Tua ahih manin ka lungsim kipak a, Lungdamtak in thu ka gen hi. Tua thamlo in ka pumpi zong, Lametna tawh a tawlnga ding hi.
44002027	Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah in Hadesɠ ah ka kha na nusia kei dinga, Na Misiangthopa zong na muatsak kei ding hi.
44002028	Nuntakna lampi nong theisak zo a, Nangma omna munah, Lungdamna tawh nong kidimsak ding hi,’ a ci hi.
44002029	“Sanggamte aw, i pupi David thu teltak in hong gensak un. Amah si in kivui khin a, a han zong tuni dongin a omlai hi.
44002030	Pasian in ci le sa lama ama suan sung pan Khazih piangsak in ama tokhom tungah tusak dingin kiciam a, tua kamciamna David in kamsang khat ahihna tawh a thei hi.
44002031	Amah in hih thu mukhol ahih manin ama pumpi muat loin, a kha zong Hadesɠ ah a kinusia kei ding hi ci in Khazih a thawhkik nading thu a gen hi.
44002032	Pasian in hih Zeisu thokiksak khinzo hi cih thu kote khempeuh in teci ka hi uh hi.
44002033	Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama taklam ah amah lamsang khinzo a, Pa kiang panin Kha Siangtho kamciam zong a sang khinzo hi. Tu in ama hong buakkhiat tua Kha Siangtho mu in na zazo uh hi.
44002034	“David in vantung ah kahto lo napi in, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
44002035	“Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
44002036	“Tua ahih manin na khailup uh tua Zeisu, Pasian in Topa le Khazih a suaksak zo hi cih thu Israel mi khempeuh in teltak in theita un,” ci in a gen hi.
44002037	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungtang uh vut a, Peter le sawltak dangte kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
44002038	Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla Zeisu Khazih min tawh tui kiphum un. Tua hi leh Pasian in na mawhnate uh hong maisak in Kha Siangtho letsong na ngah ding uh hi.
44002039	Banghang hiam cihleh tua kamciamna in note aa ding hi a, na suan na khakte uh le Topa i Pasian in a saplai ding gamlapi a om mite khempeuh aa ding zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44002040	Peter in thudang tampi tawh teci pangin amaute hanthawn a, “Hih a gilo tulai khang mite lak panin kihemkhia un,” a ci hi.
44002041	Ama thugen lungdamtak in a sang mite tui kiphum uh a, tua ni in mi 3,000 bang a kibehlap hi.
44002042	Amaute in sawltakte hilh upna thu le kikholhkhopna, anlum balkhapna le thungetnate ah kuhkaltak in a omsuak uh hi.
44002043	Pasian in sawltakte tungtawn in nalamdang lianpite le limlamdang tampite bawl uha, mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44002044	Thu‑um mi khempeuh omkhawm in na khempeuh a neikhawm uh hi.
44002045	A neih a lamte uh le a vante uh zuak in amaute kisapna zui in a hawm uh hi.
44002046	Nisim in lungsim kikhat in biakinnpi huang sungah kikhawm uh a, inn khat khit inn khatah anlum balkham in, lungdamtak le lungsim siangthotak in an a nekhawm uh hi.
44002047	Pasian min phat uh a, mi khempeuh maipha zong a ngah uh hi. Topa in hotkhiatna a ngah mite nisim in pawlpi sungah a kibehlapsak hi.
44003001	Tu in thunget hun ahi nai kua ciangin Peter le John‑te biakinnpi huangah a paito uh hi.
44003002	Biakinnpi huang sunga a lut mite kiangah huhna a nget theih nadingin a nu gil sung panin a khebaisa a suak mi khat kipua in Hoih kici biakinnpi kongpi gei ah nisim in a kikoih zel hi.
44003003	Tua pa in biakinnpi huang sungah lut dingin a kithawi Peter le John a muh ciangin huhna a ngen hi.
44003004	John tawh a paikhawm Peter in tua pa tangtak in en a, “Hong en in,” a ci hi.
44003005	Tua pa in amaute kiang pan na khatpeuh a ngah ding kisa in a limet mahmah hi.
44003006	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kham le ngun ka nei kei hi. Ahi zongin ka neihpen kong pia ding hi. Nazareth khua mi Zeisu Khazih min tawh dingto inla lampai in,” a ci hi.
44003007	Peter in tua pa a khut taklam ah lenin a kaihtoh ciangin a khepek le a siakmit guhte thakhat in a thahat hi.
44003008	Tua pa diangto in dinga, lam a pai hi. Lampai in diangin Pasian min phat kawmsa in biakinnpi huang sungah amaute tawh a lutkhawm hi.
44003009	Mi khempeuh in amah lam paithei in Pasian min phata a om a mu uh hi.
44003010	Hoih kici biakinnpi kongpi gei ah tu‑a huhna a ngen denpa ahihlam a theih uh ciangin ama tunga thupiang hangin lungmang in lamdang a sa uh hi.
44003011	Tu in damna a ngah khebaipa in Peter le John‑te meilet pah cinten in a om laitak in mi khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, amaute omna Solomon buukah a tai ngeingai uh hi.
44003012	Peter in a muh ciangin, “Israel mite aw, banghang in hih thu lamdangsa na hi uh hiam? Kote vangliatna le biakna mi hihna tawh hihpa lam a paisak bangin banghang in hong en gega na hi uh hiam?
44003013	Abraham, Isaac le Jacob‑te Pasian ahi, i pu i pate Pasian in a nasempa Zeisu min a thangsak zo hi. Pilate in amah khah a sawm hangin Pilate mai‑ah amah na nial uh a, thah dingin na piakhia uh hi.
44003014	A Dikpa le a Siangthopa na nial uha mi thatpa khat a hong khahsak zawk nadingin na ngen uh hi.
44003015	Nuntakna a Piangsakpa na that uh a, ahih hangin Pasian in misite lak panin amah a thokiksak zo hi. Tua thu ah kote in teci ka hi uh hi.
44003016	Na muh na theih uh hihpa in Zeisu min um ahih manin tua min in amah a thakhauhsak zo hi. Hi hi, Zeisu tungtawn a hong pai upna in note muhtang mahmah in amah a damsiangsak zo hi.
44003017	“Tu in ahih leh sanggamte aw, na makaite uh mah bangin note in zong na theih loh manun tua banga ahih kha na hi uh hi cih kong thei hi.
44003018	Ahih hangin Khazih in gimna thuak ding hi ci a, Pasian in ama kamsang khempeuh kam tawh a genkholhsa tua thute hih bangin a tangtungsak zo hi.
44003019	Tua ahih manin na mawhnate uh a kiphiatsiang theih nadingin kisikkik unla kikhel un. Tua hi leh Topa kiang panin thamalhkikna hun a hong tung ding hi.
44003020	A beisa hunin note tunga hong kihilh, Zeisu Khazih zong amah in note kiangah hong sawl ding hi.
44003021	Pasian in na khempeuh a bawlthakkik mateng vantung ah Zeisu om phot ding hi. Pasian in tanglai peka kipan a siangtho ama kamsangte khempeuh kam tawh hih thu a gen khitsa ahi hi.
44003022	Moses in i pu i pate kiangah, ‘Topa na Pasian un na sanggamte uh lak panin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong piangsak ding hi. Note tunga ama hong gen thu khempeuh na mang ding uh hi.
44003023	Tua kamsangpa thu a manglo mi peuhmah a mipihte sung panin kisusia ding hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
44003024	Hi hi, Samuel a kipan ama khit a thu a gen kamsang khempeuh in tulai a a piang ding thute a genkhol uh hi.
44003025	Note in kamsangte suan le khakte na hi uh hi. Pasian in Abraham tungah, ‘Na suan na khak tungtawn in leitung mite khempeuh thupha ka pia ding hi,’ ci in i pu i pate tawh a bawl thuciamna tawh a kizom mite na hi uh hi.
44003026	Note khempeuh na gamtat khialhna panun hong kiheisak in thupha hong pia dingin Pasian in a nasempa Zeisu a thawhkiksak khit ciangin note kiangah hong sawl masa hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44004001	Tu in amaute in mite tungah thu a gen laitak un siampite, biakinn cingte a ukpa le Sadducee pawlte a hong tung uh hi.
44004002	Sawltakte in mite thu hilhin Zeisu hangin misite thawhkikna thu tangko uh ahih manin tua mite in nawngkaisa mahmah uh hi.
44004003	Tua ahih manin Peter le John man uha nitak hita ahih manin zingsang dongin thong sungah a khum uh hi.
44004004	Ahih hangin amaute thugen a za mi tampi in thu um uha pasal bekbek zong 5,000 bang a pha uh hi.
44004005	A zingciang in gam ukte, makaite, thukhamhilh siate,
44004006	Siampi Ukpa Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander le Siampi Ukpa innkuanpihte, Jerusalem khuapi ah a hong kikhawm uh hi.
44004007	Amaute laizang ah Peter le John a koih khit uh ciangin amaute gel kiangah, “Bang vangliatna ahih keileh bang min tawh hihpa damsak na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
44004008	Tua ciangin Peter in Kha Siangtho tawh kidim a, amaute kiangah, “Mipi ukte le Israel makaite aw,
44004009	hih mizawngkhal khat tungah thupha ka bawl manun tuni in thu hong sit na hih uh leh,
44004010	note in singkhuam tungah khailum in Pasian in misite lak pan a thawhkiksakpa, Nazareth khua mi Zeisu Khazih min tawh hihpa damin note khempeuh mai ah dinga om ahi hi cih thu note khempeuh le Israel mi khempeuh in theita un.
44004011	Tua Zeisu in, ‘Inn a lam note in na nilkhiat uh suang hi a, Innkiu suang bulpi a suakpa ahi hi.’
44004012	“Tua mi simloh midang tungah hotkhiatna a om kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hotkhiatna i ngah nadingin hong kipia, min dang khat beek vannuai mite lakah a om kei hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44004013	Tu in amaute in Peter le John‑te hansanna mu uh a, pilna neilo sinna nei ngeilo mite ahihlam uh a theih uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh kithuah ngei uh ahihlam a phawkkik uh hi.
44004014	Damna a ngah mipa in amaute tawh dingkhawm a om mu uh ahih manin bangmah a nial thei nawn kei uh hi.
44004015	Ahih hangin thukhenteɠ kiang pan amaute a paikhiat nadingun thu a piak khit uh ciangin thu a kikum uh hi.
44004016	Amaute in, “Hih mite bang cih ding i hi hiam? Amaute tungtawn in a kilang mahmah nalamdang khat piang khin a, Jerusalem khua mi khempeuh in mu khinzo uh ahih manin i nial thei kei hi.
44004017	Ahih hangin mite lakah a kizelh nawnloh nadingin, ‘Tu a kipan in kuama tungah hihpa min tawh thu gen nawn kei un,’ ci in khauhtak in tawnggawp ni,” a kici uh hi.
44004018	Tua khit ciangin amaute gel sam uh a, Zeisu min tawh thugen in, thu a hilh nawn peuhmah loh nadingun thu a pia uh hi.
44004019	Ahih hangin Peter le John in amaute kiangah, “Pasian thu sangin note thu kong man zawk ding uh Pasian mai ah maan hiam maanlo hiam note mah in khen zaw un.
44004020	Banghang hiam cihleh kote ka hih uh leh ka muhsa ka zaksa uh thute gen loin ka om thei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44004021	Hih nasepna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian min a phat uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua mite hangin Peter le John‑te bangci bangin daanpia ding cih thei zolo uha khauhtak in tawngin a khah uh hi.
44004022	Banghang hiam cihleh lamdangtak in a kidamsakpa in kum 40 val a phazo hi.
44004023	Amaute gel a kikhah khit ciangin a lawmte uh kiangah pai in siampi liante le makaite thugenteng a gen uh hi.
44004024	Amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin lungsim kituak in Pasian tungah kiko uh a, “Topa aw, nang in vantung le leitung, tuipi le a sunga om na khempeuh a piangsak Pasian na hi hi.
44004025	Na nasempa David kam tawh na gen inah, ‘Banghang in minam dangte heh uh a, Mite in kimanna neilo thute vaihawmsim uh ahi hiam?
44004026	Topa le a Sathau‑nilhpa a do dingin, Leitung kumpite kithawi uh a, Gam ukte a kikaikhawm uh hi,’ na ci hi.
44004027	“Herod le Pontius Pilate in Gentile mite le Israel mipite tawh kipawl in sathau na nilhpa, a siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu langpan in,
44004028	nangma vangliatna le na deihna tawh sep dinga na gelsa teng mah a sem uh ahi hi.
44004029	Tu in, Topa aw, amaute hong tawnna za in. Na nasemte in na thu a genngam nadingun hansanna pia in.
44004030	A siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu min tawh limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite a bawl theih nading le cinate in damna a ngah nadingin na khut hong zan in,” ci in thu a ngen uh hi.
44004031	Thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute kikhopna mun a kiling hi. Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, hangtak in Pasian thu a gen uh hi.
44004032	Tu in thu‑um mihonpite a lungsim, a ngaihsutna uh kituak a, a neihsa khempeuh uh kuama aituam ci loin a neikhawm uh hi.
44004033	Sawltakte in Topa Zeisu thawhkikna thu vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, amaute khempeuh tungah Pasian hehpihna thupha lianpi a tung hi.
44004034	Inn mun logam a nei khempeuh in zuak in a sumte uh hong tawiciat uh hi.
44004035	Tua ciangin sawltakte khephung ah hong koih uh a, sawltakte in mi khempeuh a kisapna zui in hawmsak uh ahih manin kisapna a nei kuamah a om kei hi.
44004036	Sawltakte in Barnabas (a khiatna in “Hehnepna Tapa”) a cih uh, Cyprus gam mi, Levi suan, Joses a kici mi khat a om hi.
44004037	Tua pa in a logam a zuak khit ciangin a sumteng paipih in sawltakte khephung ah a va koih hi.
44005001	Ananias a kici pa le a zi Sapphira‑te in zong a logam uh a zuak uh hi.
44005002	Tua ciangin a pasal in a sumte pawlkhat sit in a dangteng paipih a, sawltakte khephung ah a va koih hi. A sumte pawlkhat a sit lam a zi in zong a thei hi.
44005003	Peter in, “Ananias aw, Kha Siangtho a khem ding le na logam man sum pawlkhat a sit dingin banghang in na lungsim Satan uksak na hi hiam?
44005004	Tua logam na zuakma in nangma aa hi a, na zuak khit ciangin zong nangma thuthu hilo ahi hiam? Banghang in tua bang lungsim nei na hi hiam? Mihing a khem hilo in Pasian a khem na hi hi,” a ci hi.
44005005	Tua ciangin Ananias in hih thu a zak ciangin puksuk in a si hi. Tua thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uh hi.
44005006	Tangvalte dingkhia in puan tawh a luang a tun khit uh ciangin puakhia in a vui uh hi.
44005007	Tua khit nai thum bang ciangin a zi zong thu piangteng theilopi in a hong lut hi.
44005008	Peter in ama kiangah, “Na logam uh hih zah maha na zuak uh ahi hiam, hong gen in,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hih zah maha ka zuak uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44005009	Tua ciangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Topa Kha a ze‑et dingin banghang in kithukim na hi uh hiam? En in, na pasal a vuite kongbiang ah hong tungta hi, nang zong hong puakhia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005010	Tua ciangin tua nu Peter khephung ah thakhat in puksuk in a si hi. Tangvalte hong lut uh ciangin tua nu a sisa in mu uha puakhia in a pasal gei ah a vui uh hi.
44005011	Pawlpi buppi le hih thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uh hi.
44005012	Sawltakte tungtawn in mite lakah limlamdangte le nalamdang lian tampite a piang hi. Thu‑um mi khempeuh lungsim kikhat in Solomon buukah a omkhawm uh hi.
44005013	Midangte khat beekin amaute pawlpih ngamlo uh a, ahi zongin thupi a sa mahmah uh hi.
44005014	Topa a um numei pasal a honhon in kibehlap a, thu‑um mi a tam semsem hi.
44005015	Mite in cinate kongzing ah puakhia uh a, Peter hong pai ciangin a lim beekin a nawk khak theih nadingin lupna le tal tungah a sial uh hi.
44005016	Jerusalem khuapi kima om khuate panin zong mihonpi hong kikaikhawm uha dawigilote in a bawlsiatte le cinate hong paipih in amaute khempeuh in damna a ngah uh hi.
44005017	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa le amah tawh a omkhawm Sadducee pawlte heh mahmah uh a,
44005018	sawltakte manin thong sungah a khum uh hi.
44005019	Ahih hangin Topa vantungmi khatin zan laitak in thong kongkhak hong in amaute khahkhia a,
44005020	“Pai unla, biakinnpi huang sungah dingin hih nuntakna thu mite va hilh un,” a ci hi.
44005021	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin zingsang tungin biakinnpi huang sungah lutin thu a hilh uh hi. Tua hun sung mahin Siampi Ukpa le a lawmte hong pai uh a, thukhenteɠ le Israel upa khempeuh samkhawm in sawltakte a lakhia dingin thonginn ah mi a sawl uh hi.
44005022	Ahih hangin biakinn cingte a tun uh ciangin thong sungah sawltakte mu lo uh ahih manin kilehkik in thu zasak uh a,
44005023	“Thonginn bittak in kikalh a, thong cingte zong kongkhak mai ah a ding uh hi. Ahih hangin kong ka hon uh ciangin a sungah kuamah ka mu kei uh hi!” a ci uh hi.
44005024	Tu in Siampi Ukpa, biakinn cingte a ukpa le siampi liante in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, “Bang thuteng hong pianglai ding hiam?” ci in a lungmang uh hi.
44005025	Tua laitak in mi khat hong pai in amaute kiangah, “En in, thong sunga na mi khumte un biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilh in a om uh hi!” ci in a ko hi.
44005026	Tua ciangin biakinn cingte a ukpa le biakinn cingte va pai uha mite in suang tawh a denkhak ding lau uh ahih manin thu‑ol tawh sawltakte a la uh hi.
44005027	A hong tunpih khit uh ciangin thukhenteɠ mai ah koih uh a, Siampi Ukpa in thu a dong hi.
44005028	Amah in, “Hih min tawh thu na hilh nawnloh nadingun khauhtak in thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Ahih hangin en un, Jerusalem khua sungteng note thuhilhna zelsak in hih mipa sisan kote tungah hong tun nuam na hi uh hi!” a ci hi.
44005029	Tua ciangin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite thu sangin Pasian thu ka man ding uh kilawm zaw hi.
44005030	I pu i pate Pasian in singkhuam tungah khai a na thahpa uh Zeisu a thokiksak zo hi.
44005031	Israel mite a mawhna uh kisikkiksak in mawhmaina a piak theih nadingin Pasian in amah Kumpi le Honpa suaksak in a taklam ah a lamsang khinzo hi.
44005032	Hih thu ah kote in ama teci ka hi uh hi. Pasian in ama thu a mang mite a piak Kha Siangtho zong ama teci ahi hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
44005033	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uha sawltakte thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
44005034	Tua ciangin thukhente lak panin mi khempeuh in a zahtak thukhamhilh siapa ahi Gamaliel a kici Pharisee pa khat hong dingto in tawmvei sung sawltakte a pusuahsak nadingun thu a pia hi.
44005035	Tua khit ciangin amah in, “Israel mite aw, hih mite tunga na sepsawm uh thu hoihtak in ngaihsun pha un.
44005036	Banghang hiam cihleh tu ma lam in zong mi thupi khat ka hi a kici Theudas hong khang a, mi 400 bangin amah a pawl uh hi. Tua pa a kithah ciangin a nungzui khempeuh kithehthang in bangmah a suak kei uh hi.
44005037	Tua pa khit mi kisim hun sungin zong Galilee mi Judas hong khang leuleu a, nungzui tampi mah a ngah hi. Tua pa zong si a, ama thu a zui mi khempeuh a kithehthang uh hi.
44005038	Tu in zong note kianga kong cih in ah hih mite bangmah cih loin, hi ci omsak lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih gelna le nasepna mihing pana hong piang ahih leh hong beilel ding hi.
44005039	Ahi zongin Pasian pana hong piang ahih leh na beisak zo kei ding uh a, Pasian a lehdo na suak zawsop ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005040	Amaute in ama thu gen hoihsa uh ahih manin sawltakte samin sat uha Zeisu min tawh thu a gen nawnloh nadingun thu a piak khit uh ciangin a khah uh hi.
44005041	Tua ciangin sawltakte zong, Zeisu min hanga maizumna a thuak dingin Pasian in kilawm hong sa hi ci in lungdam mahmah uh a, thukhenteɠ kiang panin a paikhia uh hi.
44005042	Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi cih thu amaute in nisim in biakinnpi huang sung le innteng ah tatsat loin hilhin a tangko uh hi.
44006001	Tua hun sungin nungzuite hong tam semsem uh ciangin nisim annek hawmna ah Greek dan a zui Judah meigongte ki‑awlmawh lo ahih manin tuate in Hebrew kam a zang Judah mite tungah a phun uh hi.
44006002	Tua ahih manin sawm le nihte in nungzui honpite kaikhawm in amaute kiangah, “Kote in Pasian thu hilh manlo lianga nek le dawn kong buaipih ding uh kilawm lo hi.
44006003	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note lak panin na pahtak uh Kha Siangtho le lungpilna tawh a kidim pasal sagih hong teelkhia un. Hih nek le dawn a vaihawm dingin amaute ka seh ding uh hi.
44006004	Kote ka hih uh leh thungetna le thuhilhna nasep kong zomsuak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44006005	Hih thu mipi in hoihsa ahih manin thu upna le Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Antioch khua mi Judah mi a suak Nicolas‑te a teelkhia uh hi.
44006006	Sawltakte mai ah amaute koih uha sawltakte in tua mite tungah khut nga in thu a ngetsak uh hi.
44006007	Tua ciangin Pasian thu hong kizel semsem a, Jerusalem ah nungzuite nasiatak in a pung uh hi. Siampi tampite in zong thu a um uh hi.
44006008	Stephen in upna le vangliatna tawh kidim a, nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte mite muhin a bawl hi.
44006009	Tua ciangin Sal suaktate kikhopna sunga kihel Cyrene khua pana hong paite, Alexandria khua pana hong paite, Cilicia gam le Asia gam pana hong pai mite in Stephen tawh thu a kinial uh hi.
44006010	Stephen in lungpilna le Kha tawh a gen thute amaute in a nial thei kei uh hi.
44006011	Tua ciangin amaute in mi pawlkhat cialsim uh a, “Hihpa Moses le Pasian tungah a pausiatna ka zazo uh hi,” ci in a gensak uh hi.
44006012	Amaute in mipite, makaite le thukhamhilh siate hansuah in Stephen omna ah hong pai in man uh a, thukhenteɠ kiangah a paipih uh hi.
44006013	Zuau gen ding teci seh uh a, “Hih mun siangtho le thukham tungah hihpa pausia den a,
44006014	hih Nazareth khua mi Zeisu in hih mun susia in Moses in kote hong piak ngeinate khel ding hi ci a, a genna ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44006015	Thukhenteɠ kikhopna sunga a tu mi khempeuh in Stephen maitang a telet uh ciangin vantungmi maitang tawh kibang in a mu uh hi.
44007001	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa in, “Hih thute a maan mah ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
44007002	Stephen in, “Pate le sanggamte aw, ka thugen na ngai un. Haran khua ah i pu Abraham a teenma Mesopotamia gamah a om laitak in ama kiangah a vanglian Pasian kilang a,
44007003	‘Na gam le na beh na phungte kiang pan paikhia inla, kong lah ding gamah pai in,’ a ci hi.
44007004	Tua ciangin Chaldea mite gam pan amah paikhia in Haran khua ah a teeng hi. A pa a sih khit ciangin tua mun panin tu laitak a na teenna uh leitang ah a lal hi.
44007005	Tua gamah Pasian in ama luah dingin a khepek ngakh nading nangawn leitang a pia kei hi. Ahi zongin Abraham nunga a suan a khakte luah dingin hih gam a piak ding thu, ta a neihma in a kamciam zo hi.
44007006	Ahih hangin Pasian in ama kiangah, na suan na khakte gamdang khatah va pem ding uh a, tua gam mite in kum 400 sung sal in nei in a bawlsia ding uh hi.
44007007	‘Ahih hangin amaute salin a kai tua minam tungah thu ka khen dinga, tua khit ciangin amaute hong paikhia in hih munah keimah a hong bia ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.
44007008	Tua ciangin Pasian in Abraham tungah vunatna tawh kipawl thuciamna zong a pia hi. A tapa Isaac a neih ciangin a ni giat ni in vun a atsak hi. Isaac tapa Jacob hi a, Jacob in i pupi sawm le nihte pa ahi hi.
44007009	“Tua i pupite in Joseph haza in Egypt gamah a zuak uh hangin Pasian in amah ompih a,
44007010	a gentheihna khempeuh panin honkhia in Egypt kumpipa Pharaoh mai ah maipha le lungpilna a pia hi. Pharaoh in Egypt gam le ama inn sung khempeuh Joseph a uksak hi.
44007011	Tua hun in Egypt gam le Canaan gam bup ah kialpi tunga haksatna lianpi om ahih manin i pu i pate in nek le dawn ding a nei kei uh hi.
44007012	Ahih hangin Jacob in Egypt gamah an om hi cih thu a zak ciangin i pu i pate a paisak masa hi.
44007013	A nihveina a hawh uh ciangin a sanggamte kiangah Joseph kipulak a, tua ciangin Pharaoh in Joseph innkuanpihte a thei hi.
44007014	Tua nung ciangin Joseph in mi sawlin a pa Jacob le a innkuanpih khempeuh lasak a, mi 75 a pha uh hi.
44007015	Tua hi a, Jacob zong Egypt gamah paisuk in tua gamah si a, i pu i pate zong tua gam mahah a si uh hi.
44007016	Amaute luanghawmte Shechem khua ah pua uh a, Abraham in Shechem khua mi Hamor tate kiang panin sum tawh a leisa hanah a vui uh hi. Moses in Israelte Makaih
44007017	“Pasian in Abraham tunga a ciamsa kamciamna a tunkuan ciangin Egypt gamah amaute khangin pung mahmah uh a,
44007018	Joseph a theilo kumpi dang khat hong khan dong tua bangin a pung uh hi.
44007019	Tua pa in i minamte khembawl a, i pu i pate bawlsia in, a tangekte uh a nungta lo dingin a paihsak hi.
44007020	Tua hun mahin Moses hong suak a, tua in Pasian lungkimsak mahmah hi. Tua hi a, a pa inn sungah kha thum sung amah kikem hi.
44007021	Ahih hangin a kikoihkhiat ciangin Pharaoh tanu in na la a, ama tapa banglian in a pantah hi.
44007022	Tua ciangin Moses in Egypt gam pilna khempeuh sin a, kampau le sepna bawlna ah a siam mahmah hi.
44007023	“Tu in Moses kum 40 a phak ciangin a sanggam Israel tate kiangah hawh nopna lungsim a nei hi.
44007024	Egypt mipa khatin ama mite khat a thuman lopi a a bawl a muh ciangin a kibawlsia mipa va guma Egypt mipa a satlum hi.
44007025	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama khut zangin amaute a hotkhiat ding lam a sanggamte in a thei ding sa a, ahih hangin amaute in a thei kei uh hi.
44007026	A zingciang in Israel mi nih a kilai laitak uh va tuak kha a, ‘Lawmte aw, unau khat na hi uh hi, banghang in kilai na hi uh hiam?’ ci in a kilem nadingun a kho hi.
44007027	“Ahih hangin a lawmpa tunga a mawh zaw pa in Moses sawnkhia in a gen in ah, ‘Kote a hong uk ding le thu a hong khen dingin kua in nang hong seh ahi hiam?
44007028	Zanni a Egypt mipa na thah bangin kei zong hong that nuam na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
44007029	“Hih thu hangin Moses taimang in Midian gamah teenga tualai ah tapa nih a nei hi.
44007030	“Kum 40 a cin ciangin Sinai mual gamlak ah sawlbawk kuang sung panin Topa vantungmi khat Moses kiangah a kilang hi.
44007031	Moses in a muh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, a telet dinga a va naih ciangin Topa hopihna aw hong ginga,
44007032	amah in, ‘Keimah in na pu na pate Pasian, Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian ka hi hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses a ciling gawpin a telet ngam nawn kei hi.
44007033	“‘Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Na dinna mun leitang siangtho ahih manin na khedap suahkhia in.
44007034	Egypt gam sunga om ka mite a kibawlsiatna ka mu khinzo hi. Amaute thumna zong ka zazo a, a honkhia dingin kong paisuk hi. Tu in hong pai in, Egypt gamah kong sawl ding hi,” a ci hi.’
44007035	“Tua Moses in, ‘Kote hong uk ding le thu hong khen dingin kua in nang hong seh ahi hiam?’ ci a, a nialpa uh ahi hi. Pasian in tua Moses mah amaute a uk ding pa le a honkhia ding pa in sawlbawk a kilang vantungmi tungtawn in a sawl hi.
44007036	Tua bangin Moses in Egypt gam, San Tuipi le gamlak ah kum 40 sung nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte bawl in amaute a paikhiatpih hi.
44007037	“‘Topa na Pasian un, na sanggamte uh lak panin kei tawh a kibang Kamsang khat note aa dingin hong piangsak dinga, ama thu na ngaih ding uh ahi hi,’ ci a, Israel tate tunga a genpa in hih Moses ahi hi.
44007038	“Hihpa in Sinai muala amah a hopih Vantungmi tawh ahi a, i pu i pate tawh ahi a, gamlak a om mihonpite tawh ahi zongin a omkhawmpa hi a, eite hong piak dingin Pasian in a kam tawh hong gen a nungta thute a sangsawnpa ahi hi.
44007039	“Ahih hangin i pute i pate in ama thu mang nuamlo in nial uh a, Egypt gam lamah a lungsim uh a heikik uh hi.
44007040	Amaute in Aaron kiangah, ‘Egypt gam pana hong paikhiatpihpa Moses bang suakta hiam cih thei lo ka hih manun kote mai‑a a pai ding pasiante hong bawlsak in,’ a ci uh hi.
44007041	Tua ciangin tua hun sungin bawngno limkhat bawl uh a, tua lim tungah gangawh biakna pia in amau khut tawh a bawltawm uh tua nate mah tawh a kipak uh hi.
44007042	Tua ciangin Pasian in amaute nungngatsan in vantung a om nate a bia dingin a khahkhong ta hi. Tua thu Kamsangte laibu sunga kigelhsa mah bangin, ‘Israel innkuante aw, Gamlak ah kum 40 sung tawntung gan go in, Nong piak uh gangawh biaknate, Keimah nong piak takpi mah uh ahi hiam?
44007043	Hi hi, Moloch biakbuuk, Na pasian uh Remphan aksi le, Biak dinga na bawltawm uh milimte na pua uh hi. Tua ahih manin Babylon gam lam pekah, Note kong puak ding hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
44007044	“A muhsa bang tektek in a lam nadingin Pasian in Moses a sawlna tawh kizui in a kilam teci panna biakbuuk, i pu i pate in gamlak ah a nei uh hi.
44007045	Tua biakbuuk a sangsawn i pute i pate le Joshua in amaute mai pana Pasian in a hawlkhiatsak Gentile‑te leitang ah tua biakbuuk lutpih uh a, tua gamah David hun dongin a om hi.
44007046	David in Pasian maipha ngah a, Jacob Pasian teen nading biakbuuk khat a lam theih nadingin Pasian kiangah a ngen hi.
44007047	Ahih hangin Pasian biakinn pen Solomon in a lam zaw hi.
44007048	“Ahi zongin, kamsangpa gensa bangin Sangbel Pasian in khut tawh kibawl biakinn sunga teeng ahi kei a,
44007049	‘Topa in, vantung ka tokhom hi a, Leitung ka khengakna ahi hi. Keima aa dingin bang inn hong lamsak in, Koi munah tawlnga ding ka hi hiam?
44007050	Hih na khempeuh ka khut tawh ka bawlsa hilo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Israelte in Kha Siangtho Nial
44007051	“Lungsim le bilvun ki‑atlo, ngawng khauh mite aw! Na pute na pate mah bangin note in zong Kha Siangtho na langpan den uh hi.
44007052	Na pute na pate un a bawlsiatloh kamsang kua om ahi hiam? Amaute in a Dikpa a hong pai nading thu a genkhol mite a that uh hi. Tu in note in tua a Dikpa a lehhekte le a thatte na suakzo uh hi.
44007053	Note in vantungmite tungtawn a hong kipia thukham ngah napi in na zui kei uh hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44007054	Amaute in hih thute a zak uh ciangin a lung uh so a, a ha uh a gawisan uh hi.
44007055	Ahih hangin Stephen in Kha Siangtho tawh kidim in vantung a ettoh leh Pasian vangliatna le Pasian taklam a a ding Zeisu a mu hi.
44007056	Amah in, “En un! Vantung kihong a, Pasian taklam ah Mihing Tapa dinga om ka mu hi!” a ci hi.
44007057	Tua ciangin amaute nakpi in kiko uh a, a bil uh humkawm in ama lamah lungsim kituak in a hong tai uh hi.
44007058	Khua nawlah amah kaikhia in suang tawh a denglum uh hi. Tua a denglum mite in Saul a kici tangval khat khephung ah a puante uh a koih uh hi.
44007059	Suang tawh a den laitak un Stephen in, “Topa Zeisu aw, ka kha hong la in,” ci in Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
44007060	Tua khit ciangin amah khukdin a, “Topa aw, hih mawhna amaute tungah na suan kei in,” ci in nakpitak in a kiko khit ciangin a si hi.
44008001	Tu in Stephen a kithahna thu ah Saul zong a thukim hi. Tua hunin Jerusalem khuapi a om pawlpi nasiatak in kibawlsia ahih manin sawltakte simloh thu‑um dang khempeuh Judea gam le Samaria gamah a kithehthang uh hi.
44008002	Pasian a zahtakte in Stephen luang puakhia in vui uh a, nakpi in a kah uh hi.
44008003	Saul ahih leh pawlpi bawlsiat ding hanciam in inn simah lut a, numei pasal kaikhia in thongah a puak hi.
44008004	Tua ahih ciangin a kithehthang mite pai kawikawi in lungdamna thu a tangko uh hi.
44008005	Philip zong Samaria gam khua khatah paisuk in Khazih thu a tangko hi.
44008006	Mihonpi in Philip thugennate za in nalamdang a bawlte mu uh a, lungsim kikhat in ama thugen a ngai uh hi.
44008007	Dawigilote nakpitak kiko in mi tampi sung panin a taikhia uh hi. A pumzaw mitampi le khebai mitampi in zong damna a ngah uh hi.
44008008	Tua khua ah lungdamna lianpi a piang hi.
44008009	Tua khua ah amah le amah mi thupi khat a kingaihsun Simon kici mi khat a om hi. Amah in nidang in hih khua sungah mitphial lak a, Samaria khua mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44008010	“Hihpa in Pasian vangliatna nei hi,” ci in a neupen pan a lianpen dongin a thu a ngai uh hi.
44008011	Amaute in ama bawl mitphialte lamdang a sak uh sawt khinzo ahih manin ama gen bangbang a ngai uh hi.
44008012	Ahih hangin Philip in Pasian kumpigam tawh kipawl lungdamna thu le Zeisu Khazih min a tangko ciangin um uh a, numei pasal tui a kiphum uh hi.
44008013	Tua ciangin Simon in zong um ahih manin tui a kiphum khit ciangin Philip paina peuh ah a zui kawikawi hi. Philip in a bawl nalamdangte le limlamdangte a muh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
44008014	Tu in Samaria mite in Pasian thu a up lam uh Jerusalem khuapi a om sawltakte in a zak uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter le John a paisak uh hi.
44008015	Amaute a tun uh ciangin tua mite in Kha Siangtho a ngah nadingun thu a ngetsak uh hi.
44008016	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu mina tui a kiphum khit uh hangin amaute khat beek tungah Kha Siangtho a tung nai kei hi.
44008017	Tua hi a, sawltakte in tua mite tungah khut a ngak uh ciangin amaute in Kha Siangtho a ngah uh hi.
44008018	Tua mite in sawltakte khut ngakna tawh Kha Siangtho a ngah uh Simon in a muh ciangin Peter le John‑te mai ah sum lui a,
44008019	“Mi khatpeuh tungah ka khut ka ngakh ciangin, Kha Siangtho a ngah theih nading thuneihna hong pia un,” a ci hi.
44008020	Ahih hangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Pasian letsong sum tawh a kilei thei ding sa na hih manin na sum tawh kisiakhawm in!
44008021	Pasian mai ah na lungsim maanlo ahih manin hih thu tawh na kisai kha kei a, na ngah ding zong bangmah a om kei hi.
44008022	Tua ahih manin na hoih lohna kisikkik inla, Pasian tungah thum in. Tua hi leh amah in na lungsim ngaihsutna a hong maisak kha ding hi.
44008023	Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim siatna tawh na kidim a, hoih lohna in hong hencip hi cih kong thei hi,” a ci hi.
44008024	Tua ciangin Simon in, “Tu‑a na gensa thute khat beek ka tungah a hong tun loh nadingin Topa tungah thu hong ngetsak in,” a ci hi.
44008025	Amaute in Samaria mite teenna khua tampi ah lungdamna thu tangko in Topa thu hilhin teci a pan khit uh ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi.
44008026	Tu in Topa vantungmi khatin Philip kiangah, “Ding inla, Jerusalem khuapi pan Gaza khua paisukna lampi tawnin va pai in,” a ci hi. Hih munin leitaw lam sehnel gam ahi hi.
44008027	Tua ciangin Philip zong dingkhia in a pai pah hi. Tualai ah Ethiopia kumpinu Candace neihsa khempeuh a uk, thu a nei mahmah a kiget Ethiopia mipa khat a na om hi. Amah in Pasian bia in Jerusalem khuapi pan a hong ciahkik hi.
44008028	Amah in a sakolleng tungah a tuankawm in kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim hi.
44008029	Tua ciangin Kha in Philip kiangah, “Sakolleng kiangah va naih inla, va pawl in,” a ci hi.
44008030	Tua ciangin Philip zong tua pa kiangah va tai a, kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim a zak ciangin, “Na laisim a thu na theitel hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
44008031	Tua pa in, “Hong hilh khat a om kei leh bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah tawh leng tungah tuangkhawm dingin Philip a sam hi.
44008032	Tua pa Lai Siangtho simna in, “A kigo ding tuu bangin amah a kipaipih hi. Tuuno in a mulmetpa mai ah a ham loh bangin, Amah zong a pau kei hi.
44008033	Simmawh nuaisiahna thuakin, Ama tungah thuman thukhenna a kizang kei hi. Ama nuntakna leitung pan kilakhia ahih manin, A suan a khakte thu, Kua in gen nawn ding ahi hiam?” a cihna mun ahi hi.
44008034	Tua ciangin Ethiopia mangpa in Philip kiangah, “Hih kamsangpa in kua thu gen ahi hiam? Ama thu gen ahi hiam? Ahih keileh midang khat thu gen ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
44008035	Tua ciangin Philip in tua Lai Siangtho mun pansan in Zeisu thu a hilh hi.
44008036	Tu in, amaute paisuk uh a, tui omna munkhat a tun uh ciangin Ethiopia mangpa in, “En in, hihlai ah tui a om hi. Tui ka kiphum ding bangin hong khaktan ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
44008037	Tua ciangin Philip in, “Na lungsim khempeuh tawh na up leh na kiphum thei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Zeisu Khazih in Pasian Tapa ahi hi cih ka um hi,” a ci hi.
44008038	Tua ahih manin amah in a sakolleng khawlsak a, Philip le Ethiopia mangpa tui sungah paisuk in Philip in amah tui a phum hi.
44008039	Tui sung pan a hong paikhiat uh ciangin Topa Kha in Philip lakhia ahih manin Ethiopia mangpa in amah mu nawnlo a, ahi zongin lungdamtak in a paisuak hi.
44008040	Philip ahih leh Azotus khua ah a kimukik hi. Amah zin kawikawi a, Caesarea khua dongin khua khempeuh ah lungdamna thu a tangko hi.
44009001	Hih hun sungin Saul in Topa nungzuite thah dingin a sawm hi.
44009002	Tua ahih manin hih Lampi thu a um numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khuapi ah a puak theih nadingin Siampi Ukpa kiangah pai in, Damascus khuapi a kikhopna inn ukte a lah ding phalna lai a ngen hi.
44009003	Amah hong kuankhia a Damascus khuapi a tunkuan in thakhat in vantung pan khuavak khat ama kimkot ah a tang hi.
44009004	Tua ciangin amah lei ah puksuk a, “Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in hong bawlsia na hi hiam?” ci a, hopihna awging khat a za hi.
44009005	Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in, “Na hong bawlsiat Zeisu ka hi hi. Ciangzum sui lecin nang aa dingin na mahmah ding hi,” a ci hi.
44009006	Tua ciangin amah in lamdangsa mahmah in a ciling a, “Topa aw, bang hih dinga hong deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tho inla khua sungah lut in. Na hih ding teng hong kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
44009007	Saul tawh a zinkhawm mite in tua awging a zak uh hangin kuamah mu lo uh ahih manin gen ding mel thei loin a dingcip uh hi.
44009008	Saul zong leilak pan tho in a khuadak hangin kuamah a muthei kei hi. Amaute in a khutah lenin Damascus khuapi sungah a lutpih uh hi.
44009009	Amah in khuamu lo, an nelo, tui dawn loin ni thum sung a om hi.
44009010	Tu in Damascus khuapi sungah Ananias a kici nungzuipa khat om a, a mangmuhna sungah Topa in, “Ananias aw,” ci in a sam hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hihlai ah ka om hi, Topa aw,” ci in a dawng hi.
44009011	Topa in, “Dingkhia inla, ‘Tang,’ a kici kongzing ah va pai in. Judas inn ah Tarsus khua mi Saul a kici pa va kankhia in. En in, amah thungen in a om hi.
44009012	Thu a nget laitak in mang mu a, Ananias a kici mi khat ama kiangah hong pai in khua a muhkik theih nadingin ama tungah a khut hong nga ding hi cih thu a mu zo hi,” a ci hi.
44009013	Tua ciangin Ananias in, “Topa aw, hihpa in Jerusalem khuapi a om nangma misiangthote bawlsia mahmah hi cih mi tampi tung panin ka zazo hi.
44009014	Hih khua ah zong nangma min a suang khempeuh a mat theih nadingin siampi liante kiang panin phalna a ngah khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
44009015	Ahih hangin Topa in, “Va pai in. Gentile‑te, kumpite le Israel tate mai ah ka min a genkhia dinga ka teel, keima vanzat khat ahi hi.
44009016	Keima min hangin a thuak ding gimna tampi ka laklai ding hi,” a ci hi.
44009017	Ananias zong pai in tua inn sungah va lut a, Saul tungah a khut nga in, “Ka sanggampa Saul aw, khua na muhkik nading le Kha Siangtho tawh na kidim nadingin nong paina lampi a hong kilang Topa Zeisu in kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
44009018	Tua ciangin Saul mit panin ngalip tawh a kibang na khat thakhat in kia a, khua a muthei pah hi. Tua ciangin amah tho in tui a kiphum hi.
44009019	An a nek khit ciangin a tha a dimkik hi. Tua khit ciangin Damascus khuapi a om nungzuite tawh tawmvei sung Saul a omkhawm hi.
44009020	Kikhopna inn ah Saul pai a, “Zeisu in Pasian Tapa ahi hi,” ci in Khazih thu a hilh pah hi.
44009021	Ama thugen a za khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in Jerusalem khuapi sunga Zeisu min a suangte a bawlsiapa hilo ahi hiam? Hih khua ah zong tua mite manin, siampi liante kiangah a puak dinga hong pai hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
44009022	Ahih hangin Saul thakhauh semsem a, Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi ci in teltak in lak ahih manin Damascus khuapi a teeng Judah mite lungsim a patausak mahmah hi.
44009023	Ni tampi khit ciangin Judah mite in Saul thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
44009024	Ahih hangin Saul in amaute vaihawmna a thei hi. Amaute in amah a thah theih nadingun kongpi ah sun le zan in a pang uh hi.
44009025	Tua ahih manin nungzuite in zan laitak in Saul paipih uh a, bawmpi sungah koihin kulhpi pua lamah a khaisuk uh hi.
44009026	Jerusalem khuapi ah Saul a tun ciangin nungzuite tawh kipawl ding a hanciam hangin amah nungzui suak khin cih thu um zolo uh ahih manin a vekpi un a kihta uh hi.
44009027	Ahih hangin Barnabas in sawltakte kiangah amah paipih a, lampi ah Topa a muhna, Topa in amah a hopihna le Damascus khuapi sungah Zeisu min tawh hangtak a thu a hilhnate a gen hi.
44009028	Tua ciangin Saul in Jerusalem ah amaute tawh kikhawl a, sungtum pusuak in a om hi.
44009029	Amah in Topa Zeisu min tawh hangtak in thu a gen hi. Greek dan a zui Judah mite tawh thu kinial uh a, amaute in amah thah a sawm uh hi.
44009030	Sanggamte in hihthu a theih uh ciangin Caesarea khua ah amah kha uh a, tua panin Tarsus khua ah a paisak uh hi.
44009031	Tua hun in Judea gam a kipan Galilee gam le Samaria gam khempeuh a om pawlpite lungmuangtak in om uh a, tha a ngah uh hi. Topa kihtakna le Kha Siangtho thapiakna tawh kalsuan uh a, a pung semsem uh hi.
44009032	Tu in Peter khualzin kawikawi a, Lydda khua‑a a teeng misiangthote kiangah a hong tung hi.
44009033	Tua khua ah Aeneas a kici mipa khat a om hi. Amah a pumzaw ahih manin kum giat sung lupna tung ngakin a om khat ahi hi.
44009034	Peter in ama kiangah, “Aeneas aw, Zeisu Khazih in nang hong damsak zo hi. Tho inla, na lupna zial in,” a ci hi. Amah zong thakhat in a tho pah hi.
44009035	Tua hi a, Lydda khua le Sharon zanglei a teeng mi khempeuh in tua pa a muh uh ciangin Topa lamah a kikhel uh hi.
44009036	Tu in Joppa khua ah Tabitha, Greek pau in Dorcas a kici nungzui numei khat a om hi. Tua nu in mizawngte huhin thupha a bawl tawntung numei khat ahi hi.
44009037	Tua laitak in amah cina in a si hi. A luang a sil khit uh ciangin inndei tungnung ah a sial uh hi.
44009038	Joppa khua le Lydda khua kinai ahih manin tua khua ah Peter om hi cih thu nungzuite in a zak khitsa uh ahi hi. Peter sam dingin mi nih sawl uh a, thakhat in a hong pai pah nadingin a thumsak uh hi.
44009039	Peter zong dingin amaute tawh a paikhawm hi. A tun ciangin inndei tungnung ah a kahtohpih uh hi. Meigong khempeuh Peter kiangah dingin kap uh a, Dorcas in a nuntak lai‑a a khuisak nikteen puansilhte a lak uh hi.
44009040	Peter in amaute khempeuh a pusuahsak khit ciangin khukdin in thu a ngen hi. Tua khit ciangin misi luang lamah kihei in, “Tabitha aw, tho in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua nu a mit hong hak a, Peter a muh ciangin a tho hi.
44009041	Tua ciangin Peter in a khut khakin dingsak a, misiangthote le meigongte samin a nungtakik Dorcas a pia hi.
44009042	Joppa khua sungteng ah tua thu kizel a, mi tampi in Topa a um uh hi.
44009043	Joppa khua ah Peter ni tampi taam a, savun khuipa Simon inn ah a kinga hi.
44010001	Caesarea khua ah Cornelius kici mi khat om a, Italy galkaphonɠ sungah galkap 100 ukpa khat ahi hi.
44010002	A innkuanpih khempeuh tawh Pasian thu hahkat in Pasian a kihta mi khat ahi hi. Mizawngte tungah cinghtak in huhna pia a, Pasian kiangah thu a ngen tawntung mi khat zong ahi hi.
44010003	Ni khat, nai kua pawlin mang mu a, “Cornelius aw!” ci in a hopih Pasian vantungmi khat teltak in a mu hi.
44010004	Amah in vantungmi limtak in a et ciangin lau a, “Bang ahi hiam, topa aw?” a ci hi. Vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Na thungetna le mizawngte na huhna Pasian in hong thei khinzo hi.
44010005	Tu in Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in.
44010006	Amah in tuipi gei‑a a teeng savun khuipa Simon inn ah a om hi. Amah in na hih ding teng a hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
44010007	Amah a hopih vantungmi a paikhiat khit ciangin Cornelius in a innsung nasemte nih le a kisapna teng a sepsak den Pasian thu a hahkat galkap khat a sam hi.
44010008	A thuteng a hilhcian khit ciangin Joppa khua ah amaute a paisak hi.
44010009	A zingciang in amaute zinkhia uh a, Joppa khua a tunkuan uh nai guk hun pawlin Peter zong thungen dingin innkhumzang ah a kahto hi.
44010010	Amah a gilkial mahmah a, an a lunggulh hi. Ahi zongin ankuang a bawl laitak un Peter in mangmu a,
44010011	van kihong in puanzapi tawh a kibang kiuli a nei, a kiu ciat ah a kikhihsa in vantung pan a kikhai, ama lamah hong kiasuk a mu hi.
44010012	Tua sungah leitung a om khe li nei ganhing namkimte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte le vana leng vasate a om hi.
44010013	Tua laitak in aw khat hong ging a, “Peter aw, tho in, tuate go inla ne in,” a ci hi.
44010014	Ahih hangin Peter in, “Topa aw, ka ne peuhmah kei ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a nekhuailo le a sianglo na khat beek ka ne ngei kei hi,” a ci hi.
44010015	Tua ciangin awging khatin a nihveina hopihkik a, “Pasian in siang hi a cihte nekhuailo hi ci kei in,” a ci hi.
44010016	Hih bangin thumvei a cih khit ciangin tua hong kikhaisuk na vantung ah a kilatokik hi.
44010017	Peter in a mangmuhna a khiatna bang hi ding hiam ci a, lungmang in a om laitak in Simon inn a zongzong Cornelius sawltakte kongpi mai ah a ding uh hi.
44010018	Amaute in, “Hihlai ah Peter a kici Simon hong tung kha hiam?” ci in a galdot uh hi.
44010019	Peter in a mangmuhna ngaihsun in a om laitak in Kha in ama kiangah, “En in, mi thum in nang hong zong uh hi.
44010020	Tua mite keima hong sawl ahi hi. Tua ahih manin ding inla, kumsuk in. Lunghianglo tak in amaute zui in,” a ci hi.
44010021	Tua ciangin Cornelius in a hong sawl mite kiangah Peter paisuk a, “Hong en un, na mi zon uh keimah ka hi hi. Bang thu a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44010022	Amaute in, “Galkap 100 ukpa Cornelius in a inn ah nang hong sap nading le na thugen a ngaih nadingin Pasian in a siangtho vantungmi khat tungtawn in amah thu a pia zo hi. Amah in Pasian a kihta, a thuman mi khat hi a, Judah minam buppi in a zahtak uh mi khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44010023	Tua ciangin Peter in inn sungah amaute samin a giaksak hi. A zingciang in tua mite tawh Peter dingkhia a, Joppa khua‑a sanggamte pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi.
44010024	A zingciang in Caesarea khua a tung uh hi. Tu in Cornelius in a tanaute le a lawm itteng kaikhawm in amaute a ngak hi.
44010025	Inn sungah Peter a lut ciangin Cornelius in dawn a, a khe phungah bokin a bia hi.
44010026	Ahih hangin Peter in amah phongto a, “Ding in, kei zong mihing mah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
44010027	Peter in amah a hopih kawmin inn sungah a lut ciangin mi tampi kikhawm in a om a mu hi.
44010028	Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Judah mi khat minam dangte tawh a kikholh ding le a kianga a hawh ding thukham tawh kituak lo hi cih thu na thei uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in mi khatpeuh santaklo, sianglo hi ka cih khakloh nadingin a hong lakzo hi.
44010029	Tua ahih manin nong sap phetun nial loin kong pai pah hi. Bang thu a hong sam na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44010030	Tua ciangin Cornelius in, “Tuma ni li lai, tubang hun, nai kua pawlin ka inn sungah antang in thu ka ngen hi. Tua ciangin puanpak a silh mi khat ka mai ah hong dinga,
44010031	‘Cornelius aw, na thungetnate Pasian in hong zazo a, mizawngte na huhna zong a hong ciaptehsak zo hi.
44010032	Tua ahih manin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in. Amah in tuipi gei‑a a teeng savun bawlpa Simon inn ah zintung in a om hi. Amah hong tun ciangin thu hong gen ding hi,’ a hong ci hi.
44010033	Tua ahih manin nang hong sam ding mi kong sawl pah a, tu in hong paithei na hih manin hoih mahmah hi. Tua ahih manin na gen dinga Pasian in hong piak thu khempeuh a ngai dingin tu in Pasian mai ah koteng ka om uh hi,” a ci hi.
44010034	Tua ciangin Peter zong thugen kipan a, “Pasian in kuamah a deidan loh lam ka thei taktak hi.
44010035	Minam khempeuh lakah amah kihta in a dik a gamta mite amah in a sang hi.
44010036	Pasian in Israel mite tunga a puak lungdamna thu in mi khempeuh Topa, Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in a kihilh kilemna thu ahi hi.
44010037	Tua thu Judea gam khempeuh ah kitangko khinzo a, John in tuiphumna thu a tangko khit ciangin Galilee gam pana hong kipankhia thu ahi hi, cih thu zong na thei uh hi.
44010038	Pasian in Nazareth khua mi Zeisu, Kha Siangtho le vangliatna tawh nilh a, amah in thupha bawl in a vak kawikawi hi. Pasian in ompih ahih manin Dawimangpa bawlsiat mi khempeuh a damsak hi cih thu zong na thei uh hi.
44010039	“Singkhuam tunga a khailuppa uh tua Zeisu in Judah mite gam sung le Jerusalem khuapi sunga a bawl na khempeuh ah a teci ka hi uh hi.
44010040	A ni thum ni in Pasian in amah a thawhkiksakna thu kilangtak in a lak hi.
44010041	Ahih hangin mi khempeuh muhin lak lo a, Pasian in a teel kholhsa teci ahi kote muh ding bekin hong lak hi. Misite lak pan a thawhkik khit ciangin amah tawh anne tuidawn in ka omkhawm uh hi.
44010042	Zeisu in a nungta lai mite le a sisa mite tungah thukhen dinga Pasian in a sehpa ahi hi cih thu mite tungah a tangko ding le teci a pang dingin amah in kote thu hong pia zo hi.
44010043	Amah a um mi khempeuh in ama min hangin mawhmaisakna a ngah ding uh hi ci in kamsang khempeuh in zong ama thu teci a pangzo uh hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
44010044	Peter in hih thute a gen laitak mahin ama thugen a za mi khempeuh tungah Kha Siangtho a tung hi.
44010045	Pasian in Gentile‑te tung nangawn ah Kha Siangtho letsong a piakna thu, Peter tawh a paikhawm vun ki‑at thu‑um mite in a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44010046	Banghang hiam cihleh tua mite in paunam tuamtuam tawh pau in, Pasian min a phatna uh amaute in a za uh hi.
44010047	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Eite mah bangin Kha Siangtho a ngah hih mite tui sungah a kiphum ding uh kua in khamthei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
44010048	Tua ciangin Topa minin tui a kiphum nadingun Peter in amaute thu a pia hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute in ni tawmvei sung Peter a tambeh nadingin a kho uh hi.
44011001	Tu in Gentile‑te in zong Pasian thu sangta uh hi cih thu Judea gama om sawltakpite le sanggamte in a za uh hi.
44011002	Jerusalem ah Peter a paitoh ciangin vunat mite in ama kiangah,
44011003	“Vunatlo mite kiangah va pai in an na nekhawm hi!” ci in a mawhsak uh hi.
44011004	Ahih hangin Peter in a kipat a kipan a bantak in hih bangin a hilhcian hi.
44011005	Amah in, “Joppa khua ah thungen a ka om laitak in mang ka mu a, puanzapi tawh a kibang na khat, kiu li nei, a kiu ciat ah kikhihsa in vantung pan hong kikhaisuk, ka kiangah hong tung hi.
44011006	Tua sung limtak ka et ciangin leitung a khe li nei ganhingte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte, vana leng vasate ka mu hi.
44011007	Tua ciangin, ‘Peter aw, tho in tuate go inla ne in,’ a hong ci awging khat ka za hi.
44011008	“Kei zong, ‘Topa aw, ka ne peuhmah kei ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a nekhuailo le a siangtholo na khat beek ka kamsung ka tun ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi.
44011009	“Ahih hangin tua awging mahin vantung panin hong dawngkik a, ‘Pasian in siang hi a cihte nekhuailo hi ci kei in,’ a hong ci hi.
44011010	Hih bangin thumvei a hong cih khit ciangin, a vekpi in vantung ah a kikhaitokik hi.
44011011	“Tua hun mahin Caesarea khua panin ka kianga hong kisawl mi thumte, ka omna inn mai ah hong ding uh hi.
44011012	Tua ciangin lunghianglo taka amaute ka zuih nadingin Kha in a hong gen hi. Tua thamloh in hih sanggamte guk in zong kei hong zui uh a, a hong samsakpa inn ah ka lut uh hi.
44011013	Tua pa in, Vantungmi khat ka inn sungah hong ding ka mu a, ‘Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in.
44011014	Amah in nangmah le na inn sunga om mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna na ngah nadingun thu hong hilh ding hi hong ci hi,’ ci in a hong gen hi.
44011015	“Tua banga thugen ka kipat laitak in a kipat cillai‑a eite tunga a hong tun banglianin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho a hong tung hi.
44011016	Tua ciangin, ‘John in mite a tuiphum hi note na hih uh le Kha Siangtho tawh hong kiphum ding hi,’ ci a, Topa hong gensa thu ka phawkkik hi.
44011017	Tua ahih manin eite in Topa Zeisu Khazih i up cianga Pasian in hong piak Kha Siangtho letsong mah amaute zong pia ahih leh Pasian a langpan dingin kei leltak kua ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
44011018	Amaute in hih thute a zak uh ciangin bangmah gen nawnlo in Pasian phat uh a, “Tua ahih leh Pasian in Gentile‑te tungah zong nuntakna ngah nadingin mawhna kisik kikna thu a pia zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
44011019	Tu in Stephen a kibawlsiatna hangin a kithehthang mite Phoenicia gam, Cyprus tuikulh le Antioch khua dong tung uh a, kuamah dang tungah thuhilh loin Judah mite tung bekah a hilh uh hi.
