44011020	Ahi zongin Cyprus gam mite le Cyrene khua mite pawlkhat, Antioch khua ah va pai in Greek ngeina a zui Judah mite kiangah Topa Zeisu thu a va hilh uh hi.
44011021	Topa vangliatna in amaute ompih a, mi tampi in thu um in Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
44011022	Jerusalem khuapi a om pawlpi mite in hih thute a zak uh ciangin Antioch khuapi dong a pai dingin Barnabas a sawl uh hi.
44011023	Tua khua ah Barnabas tungin Pasian hehpihna a muh ciangin a lungdam a, a vekpi un lungsim takpi tawh Topa sungah a kipsuak nadingun a hanthawn hi.
44011024	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoih khat hi a, Kha Siangtho le thu upna tawh a kidim mi hi a, Topa kiangah mi tampi a tun hi.
44011025	Tua khit ciangin Saul a zong dingin Tarsus khua ah Barnabas a pai hi.
44011026	A muh ciangin Antioch khua ah a paipih hi. Tua khua ah kum khat sung pawlpite tawh omkhawm uh a, mi tampi kiangah Pasian thu a hilh uh hi. Thu‑um mite pen Christian ci in min a kiphuah masakna mun in Antioch khua ahi hi.
44011027	Tua hun sungin Jerusalem khuapi panin Antioch khua ah kamsangte a hong paisuk uh hi.
44011028	Tuate lakah Agabus a kici pa dingto a, “Claudius Caesar kumpipa hun lai‑a a tun bangin leitung bup ah kialpi hong tung ding hi,” ci in Kha theihsakna bangin a gen hi.
44011029	Tua ciangin nungzuite in zong amaute hihzawh zah ciat tawh, Judea gama om sanggamte huhna sum khak dingin a khentat uh hi.
44011030	A khentat bangun semtakpi uh a, Barnabas le Saul khut tungtawn in upate kiangah a khak uh hi.
44012001	Tua hun sungin Herod kumpipa in pawlpi mite pawlkhat bawlsiat dingin a man hi.
44012002	Amah in John sanggampa James namsau tawh a thatsak hi.
44012003	Tua thu in Judah mite lungdamsak hi cih a muh ciangin Peter zong mat dingin a sawm leuleu hi. Tua hunin Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi sung ahi hi.
44012004	Amah in Peter a mat khit ciangin thongah khum a, Paisan Pawi a ven ciangin mihonpi mai ah a lahkhiat dingin galkap li ta in a om pawl lite cin dingin a ap hi.
44012005	Tua ahih manin thong sungah Peter kikhum a, ahi zongin pawlpi in ama aa dingin tatsat loin Pasian kiangah thu a ngetsak uh hi.
44012006	Herod in Peter a lahkhiat sawm ni zanin sikkhau nih tawh amah kikhih a, galkap nihte kikal ah a ihmu hi. Thongcingte zong kongkhak mai ah amah cingin a om uh hi.
44012007	Tu in en in, Topa vantungmi khat Peter kiangah thakhat in hong dinga, thong inn sung khempeuh ah khuavak a tang hi. Vantungmi in Peter a pang khoih in, “Tho mengmeng in!” ci in a phong hi. Tua ciangin Peter khut a sikkhaute a kitolkhia hi.
44012008	Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na kawng gak inla, na khedap bulh in,” a cih ciangin Peter in zong tua bangin a hih hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na puan silh inla hong zui in,” a ci hi.
44012009	Tua ciangin Peter paikhia in vantungmi nung a zui hi. Ahi zongin vantungmi nasep teng a taktak ahihlam thei loin mangmu a kisa hi.
44012010	A cingte vilna mun a khatna le a nihna a khen uh ciangin khuapi sung lutna sikkongpi a tung uh hi. Tua kongpi ama thu in kihong a, amaute gel zong a pusuakkhia uh hi. Kongzing khat a zuih khit uh ciangin vantungmi in thakhat in amah a nusia hi.
44012011	Peter in khua a phawkkik ciangin, “Tu in Topa in a vantungmi hong sawlin, Herod khut sung pan le Judah mite hong thah nading panin hong honkhia khinzo hi cih thu teltak in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
44012012	Peter in hih thu a phawk khit ciangin Mark a kici John nu Mary inn ah va pai a, tualai ah mi tampi thungen in a kikhawm uh hi.
44012013	Peter in kong a kiuh ciangin Rhoda kici numeino khat kong a hon dingin a pai hi.
44012014	Tua nu in Peter aw ahihlam a theih ciangin lungdamlua a, kongpi hon nai loin inn sungah lehtaikik a, kongpi mai ah Peter a dinlam a va ko hi.
44012015	Ahih hangin amaute in, “A hai hi ni teh!” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Ahi taktak mah hi,” ci in a gen teitei ciangin amaute in, “Ama vantungmi hi in teh,” a ci lai uh hi.
44012016	Tu in, Peter in kong kiukiu lai ahih manin hon uh a, amah a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44012017	Ahih hangin amah in daitak in a om nadingun a khut tawh lak a, Topa in thong sung pan a lakkhiatna thuteng a gen hi. Amah in, “James le i sanggamte kiangah hih thu va gen un,” a cih khit ciangin mun dang khatah a pai hi.
44012018	Khuavak phetin Peter bangci ahi hiam ci in galkapte sungah buaina lianpi a om hi.
44012019	Herod in Peter limtak in a zonsak hangin a mu zo kei uh hi. Tua ciangin a cingte thu sit a, amaute thah dingin thu a pia hi.
44012020	Tu in Tyre khua le Sidon khua mite tungah Herod a heh mahmah hi. Tua ahih manin kumpi innsung vaihawmpipa Blastus a pawlmat khit uh ciangin Herod kiangah amaute hong paikhawm uh a, kilem nading a thum uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in hih kumpipa kiang panin a annek ding uh a ngah uh hi.
44012021	A kisehkholh ni a tun ciangin kumpi puan tawh Herod kizem in a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mipi tungah thu a gen hi.
44012022	Mipite in, “Ama awging in mihing aw hilo in pasian awging ahi hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44012023	Herod in minthanna Pasian pia lo ahih manin Topa vantungmi khatin thakhat in amah vattuk a, than in ne in a si hi.
44012024	Ahih hangin Pasian thu ahih leh khangin a pung semsem hi.
44012025	Barnabas le Saul in a sep ding teng uh a zawh khit uh ciangin Jerusalem khuapi pan ciahkik uh a, Mark a kici John a tonpih uh hi.
44013001	Tu in Antioch khua pawlpi sungah kamsangte le sia pawlkhat a om uh hi. Amaute in Barnabas, Niger kici Simeon, Cyrene khua mi Lucius, gam uk mangpa Herod tawh a khangkhawm Manaen le Saul‑te ahi uh hi.
44013002	Amaute in antang in Topa nasem in a om laitak un, Kha Siangtho in, “Ka piaksa nasep a sem dingin Barnabas le Saul hong khenkhia un,” a ci hi.
44013003	Antang a thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute tungah khut nga in a sawlkhia uh hi.
44013004	Kha Siangtho in a sawlkhiat amaute, Seleucia khua ah paisuk uh a, tua panin tembaw tawh Cyprus tuikulh ah a pai uh hi.
44013005	Salamis khua a tun uh ciangin Judah mite kikhopna inn sungah Pasian thu hilh uh a, John in zong amaute nasep a huh hi.
44013006	Tua tuikulh ah zin kawikawi uh a, Paphos khua a tun uh ciangin Bar‑Jesus kici Judah minam, dawi thu a siam, kamsangzuau khat a mu uh hi.
44013007	Amah in mipil mangpipa Sergius Paulus nasemte khat ahi hi. Mangpipa in Pasian thu za nuam ahih manin Barnabas le Saul a samsak hi.
44013008	Ahih hangin mangpipa in thu a up loh nadingin dawi thu a siam Elymas a kici pa in hamciam in amaute a langpan hi.
44013009	Ahih hangin Paul a kici Saul pen Kha Siangtho tawh kidim in, Elymas en gega a,
44013010	“Khemna le zuauthu bekbek tawh a kidim, Dawimangpa tapa, thuman khempeuh a galbawlpa aw, Topa lampi tangte na kawikaih den pen khawl lo ding na hi hiam?
44013011	Tu in en in, Topa khut nang tungah hong tung dinga, na mittaw in tawlkhat sung khua na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Thakhat in tua pa tungah khuamial hong tung ahih manin a khut lena a paipih ding mi zongin a zawt kawikawi hi.
44013012	Mangpipa in tua thu piang a muh ciangin amaute in Topa tawh kisai thu a hilhte uh lamdang sa mahmah in a um hi.
44013013	Tu in, Paul le a lawmte Paphos khua pan tembaw tuangin Pamphylia gam Perga khua tung uh a, tua panin John in amaute nusia in Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciah hi.
44013014	Perga khua panin paikhia uh a, Pisidia gam Antioch khua a tung uh hi. Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn sungah lutin a tu uh hi.
44013015	Thukham le Kamsangte laibu‑te a kisim khit ciangin kikhopna inn ukte in amaute samsak uh a, “Sanggamte aw, mipite hanthot nop na neih uh leh gen un,” a ci uh hi.
44013016	Tua ciangin Paul dingto in a khut vana thu a hilh in ah, “Israel mite le Pasian a kihta mite aw, na ngai un.
44013017	Hih Israelte Pasian in i pute i pate na teel a, Egypt gamah mikhual bangin a om laitak un amaute lamsang in, tua gam panin a thahat ama khut tawh a paikhiatpih hi.
44013018	Sehnel gam sunga tua mite gamtatna teng kum 40 sung a thuak keikai hi.
44013019	Amah in Canaan gam sunga minam sagihte a suksiat khit ciangin amaute aa dingin tua gam a hawmsak hi.
44013020	“Tua khit ciangin Pasian in kamsangpa Samuel hun dong kum 450 sung amaute aa dingin thukhen mangte a pia hi.
44013021	Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi khat ngen uh a, Pasian in Benjamin suante khat ahi Kish tapa Saul pia a, tua pa in kum 40 sung a uk hi.
44013022	Tua khit ciangin amah in Saul hemkhia in, amaute kumpi dingin David a lamto hi. Pasian in David thu a genna ah, ‘Keima deihna khempeuh a sem ding ka lungsim puak bang a nei Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi,’ a ci hi.
44013023	Pasian in ama kamciamna tawh kizui in hih mipa suan pan Israel mite aa dingin Honpa Zeisu a piangsak hi.
44013024	Zeisu hong paima in John in Israel mi khempeuh a mawhna uh kisikkik a tui a kiphum nadingun thu a hilh masa hi.
44013025	John in a nasep a zawh ciangin, ‘Kei kua hi, ci in nong ngaihsun uh hiam? Kei, amah ka hi kei hi. Ahih hangin en un, kei khit ciangin a dang khat hong pai dinga, ama khedapkhau sut dingin zong ka kilawm kei hi,’ a ci hi.
44013026	“Abraham suan ka sanggamte le note laka om Pasian a kihtate aw, Pasian in hih hotkhiatna thu note kiangah hong puakzo hi.
44013027	Jerusalem khuapi a teengte le gam ukte in Zeisu a thei kei uh hi. Sabbath ni sima a kisim den kamsangte thugente zong theilo uh ahih manin Zeisu tungah thu khen in tua thu kigente a tangtungsak uh hi.
44013028	Sihkhop nading zah thu khat beek mu lo napi in, Pilate in amah a thah nadingin a ngen uh hi.
44013029	Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa amah tawh kisai thu khempeuh tua bangin a tangtunsak khit uh ciangin singkhuam tung pan amah lakhia in han sungah a vui uh hi.
44013030	Ahih hangin Pasian in misite lak panin amah a thokiksak hi.
44013031	Galilee gam panin Jerusalem khuapi ah amah tawh paitokhawm mite in ni tampi sung amah mu uh a, tua mite in ama aa dingin mipi tungah teci a pang uh hi.
44013032	“Tua ahih manin Pasian in i pute i pate tunga a kamciamsa lungdamna thu note tungah a hong tangko ka hi uh hi.
44013033	Late nihna sungah, ‘Nangmah in ka Tapa na hi hi, Tuni in nang kong piangsak zo hi,’ ci a, a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in misite lak panin Zeisu thokiksak a, i pute i pate suan le khak ahi eite tungah tua kamciamna hong tungsak zo hi.
44013034	‘David tunga ka kamciam a siangtho le, A muanhuai hehpihna note tungah kong tungsak ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin a muatlo dingin misite lak panin Zeisu a thosak zo hi.
44013035	“Tua ahih manin amah in Late laibu mundang khatah zong, ‘Na Misiangthopa, Na muatsak kei ding hi,’ a ci hi.
44013036	“David ahih leh Pasian deihna bangin ama khang aa dingin na a sep khit ciangin si a, a pute a pate tawh kivuikhawm in a muat hi.
44013037	Ahih hangin Pasian in a thawhkiksak pa a muat kei hi.
44013038	“Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian in hih mipa tungtawn in mawhna hong maisakna thu a hong tangko ka hi uh hi cih thu theita un.
44013039	Moses thukham tawh dik na tan zawh lohna khempeuh panun, Pasian in Zeisu a um khempeuh dik hong tangsak hi.
44013040	Tua ahih manin Kamsangte gensa thu note tungah hong tun loh nadingin kidawm un.
44013041	“Kamsangte in, ‘No, mi a neumuhte aw, en un, Lamdangsa unla kisiamang un. Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah a hong kitangko hangin, Na up theih hetloh ding uh nasep khat, Note khang sungin ka sem ding hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a hilh uh hi.
44013042	Kikhopna inn pan Judah mite a paikhiat uh ciangin, Gentile‑te in amaute kiangah Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih thute mah a genkik nadingun a thum uh hi.
44013043	Kikhop a man uh ciangin Judah mi tampi le Judah mi a kisuaksak biakna mi tampi in Paul le Barnabas nung a zui uh hi. Amaute in zong Pasian hehpihna sungah a omsuak nadingun tua mite a hanthawn uh hi.
44013044	Sabbath ni kik ciangin Pasian thu ngai dingin khuazang phialin a hong kikhawm uh hi.
44013045	Judah mite in mihonpi a muh uh ciangin haza mahmah uh ahih manin Paul thugente lehgen in kosia in a langpan uh hi.
44013046	Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas hang semsem uh a, “Pasian thu note tunga kong hilh masak ding uh a kul ahi hi. Ahih hangin note in tua thu nolhin nuntak tawntungna a ngah dingin no le no kilawm kisalo na hih manun en un, Gentile‑te kiangah ka pai ding uh hi.
44013047	Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Hotkhiatna thu leimong dongah puakin, Gentile‑te khuavak a suak dingin, Note kong seh hi,’ ci in Topa in thu a hong pia zo hi,” ci in a gen uh hi.
44013048	Gentile‑te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah uh a, a kigen Topa thu a phat uh hi. Nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin a kisehsa mite in a um uh hi.
44013049	Tua gam buppi ah Topa thu a kizel hi.
44013050	Ahih hangin Judah mite in Pasian thu a hahkat, a kithupi muh numei makaite le khuapi uliante holhthawh uh a, Paul le Barnabas‑te bawlsia in amau gam panin a hawlkhia uh hi.
44013051	Ahih hangin Paul le Barnabas in amaute khe a leivuite singkhia in Iconium khua ah a pai uh hi.
44013052	Nungzuite ahih leh lungnopna le Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim uh hi.
44014001	Iconium khua a tun uh ciangin Paul le Barnabas in Judah mite kikhopna inn sungah lutin mihonpi thu hilh uh a, Judah mite le Greek mite tampi in a um uh hi.
44014002	Ahi zongin Gentile‑te in sanggamte tungah lungsim hoihlo a neih nadingun thu‑umlo Judah mite in a holhthawh uh hi.
44014003	Tua ahih ciangin tua khua ah Paul le Barnabas‑te sawtpi taam uh a, Topa thu hangtak in a gen uh hi. Pasian in amaute tungtawn in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite piangsak in ama hehpihna thu teci a pang hi.
44014004	Ahih hangin khuasung mite kipawlkhen uh a, pawlkhat in Judah mite pawlin a dangte in sawltakte a pawl uh hi.
44014005	Gentile‑te le Judah mite in a makaite uh tawh kikop in thagum tawh sawltakte bawlsia in suang tawh denlup ding a hanciam uh hi.
44014006	Sawltakte in tua thu a theih uh ciangin Lycaonia gama om Lystra le Derbe khua‑a kipan tua kim khuate ah tai in,
44014007	lungdamna thu a tangko uh hi.
44014008	A suah tunga kipan a khezaw in lam a pai ngeilo pasal khat Lystra khua ah a om hi.
44014009	Amah in Paul thugen a ngai hi. Paul in tua pa limtak in en a, dam theih nading upna a neih lam a muh ciangin,
44014010	“Na khe tawh dingtang in!” ci in nakpitak kiko in thu a piak leh tua pa diangin lam a pai hi.
44014011	Tu in mihonpite in Paul nasep a muh uh ciangin, “Pasiante mihing bangin hong paisuk ahi hi!” ci in Lycaonia pau tawh nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
44014012	Barnabas pen Zeus ci uh a, Paul pen thugenpipa ahih manin Hermes a ci uh hi.
44014013	Tua ciangin khuanawl a om Zeus biakna innpi a siampipa in bawngtalte le pakkualte kongpi ah hong paipih in mipite tawh biakna pia dingin hong kithawi uh hi.
44014014	Ahih hangin sawltak Barnabas le Paul in tua thu a zak uh ciangin a puan uh balkek in mihonpi lakah lut uh a,
44014015	“Lawmte aw, banghang in hih bangin hih na hi uh hiam? Kote zong note mah tawh a kibang mihing ka hi uh hi. Kimanna a omlo hih nate nusia in leitung le vantung, tuipi le tuate sunga om na khempeuh a bawlpa, a nungta Pasian lamah na kihei nadingun lungdamna thu a hong hilh ka hi bek uh hi.
44014016	Tua Pasian in a beisa khangte ah minamte khempeuh amau ut bangbang in nungta dingin a phal hi.
44014017	Ahi zongin ama teci ding om loin a koih kei hi. Eite aa dingin a hoih nate hong bawlsak in vana guahtui le khaici a gahsak khuahunte hong pia a, an ne tui dawnin lungdam kipahna tawh a hong kidimsak hi,” ci in kiko in a gen uh hi.
44014018	Hih thute a gen uh hangin mihonpi in gangawh biakna tawh amaute biakna piaksawm veve uh a, khamlah dektak in a om uh hi.
44014019	Tua ciangin Antioch khua le Iconium khua pana Judah mite tua munah hong pai uh a, mihonpi holhthawh in suang tawh Paul a deng uh hi. Amah a si khinzo sa uh ahih manin khuapua lamah a kaikhia uh hi.
44014020	Ahi zongin ama kimah nungzuite a din laitak un amah tho in khua sungah a lut hi. A zingciang in Barnabas tawh Derbe khua ah a pai uh hi.
44014021	Tua khua ah lungdamna thu tangko in mi tampi nungzui a suahsak khit uh ciangin Lystra, Iconium, le Antioch khua lamah a kilehkik uh hi.
44014022	Nungzuite lungsim hanthawn in thu upna a zopsuak nadingun thapia uh a, “Haksatna tampi thuakin Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding i hi hi,” ci in a hilh uh hi.
44014023	Pawlpi khempeuh ah makaite a koih khit uh ciangin antan thungetna tawh a uppa uh Topa khut sungah a ap uh hi.
44014024	Pisidia gam kantan in Pamphylia gam hong tung uh a,
44014025	Perga khua ah thu a hilh khit uh ciangin Attalia khua ah a paisuk uh hi.
44014026	A zawh khitsa uh nasepna teng a sem dingin Pasian hehpihna sungah amaute a ki‑apna mun Antioch khua zuan dingin tua mun panin tembaw tawh a pai uh hi.
44014027	Tua lai a hong tun uh ciangin pawlpite kaikhawm uh a, amaute tungtawn a Pasian nasepnate genin Pasian in Gentile‑te tungah thu upna kong a honsakna thu a zasak uh hi.
44014028	Tua khua ah nungzuite tawh amaute sawt veipi a omkhawm uh hi.
44015001	Judea gam panin a hong paisuk mi pawlkhat in, “Moses hong piak ngeina zui in vun na at kei uh leh hotkhiatna na ngahthei kei ding uh hi,” ci in sanggamte a hilh uh hi.
44015002	Tua ahih manin Paul le Barnabas in tua mite tawh nakpitak in kinial uh a, thu tampi a kisel uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih thu tawh kisai in Jerusalem khuapi a om sawltakte le makaite kiangah Paul, Barnabas le a dang mi pawlkhat paisak dingin a khentat uh hi.
44015003	Pawlpi mite in amaute kha uha Phoenicia gam le Samaria gam kantan in a pai uh hi. Gentile‑te a kikhelna thu zasak kawikawi uha, sanggamte khempeuh a kipak mahmah uh hi.
44015004	Jerusalem khuapi a tun uh ciangin pawlpi mite, sawltakte le makaite in amaute na dawn uha amaute tungtawn in Pasian nasepnate khempeuh a zasak uh hi.
44015005	Ahi zongin Pharisee pawlte lak panin thu‑um mi pawlkhat hong ding uh a, “Tua mite in vunat in Moses thukham a zuih nadingun thu i piak ding kisam hi,” a ci uh hi.
44015006	Tua ahih manin tu in hih thu a ngaihsun dingin sawltakpite le makaite a kikhawm uh hi.
44015007	Nakpitak in a kisel khit uh ciangin Peter dingto a, “Sanggamte aw, Gentile‑te in keima kam panin lungdamna thu za a, a up theih nadingun a sawtvei simlai in Pasian in eite lak panin kei hong teel hi cih na thei uh hi.
44015008	Tua hi a, lungsim a thei Pasian in eite mah bangin Kha Siangtho a piakna tawh amaute a san lam a kilangsak zo hi.
44015009	Upna tawh a lungsim uh hahsiangsak in amaute le eite kikal ah kilamdanna a omsak kei hi.
44015010	Tua ahih manin tu in, i pute i pate le eite mahmah in i puak zawh loh hakkol banghang in thu‑um mite tungah suanin Pasian ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
44015011	Amaute mah bangin eite in zong Topa Zeisu Khazih hehpihna tungtawn in hotkhiatna i ngah ding hi cih i um hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44015012	Tua khit ciangin Pasian in amaute tungtawn in Gentile‑te laka a bawl limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite Paul le Barnabas in a zaksak uh ciangin mihonpite in dai khipkhep in a ngai uh hi.
44015013	Amaute a daih khipkhep khit uh ciangin James in, “Ute naute aw, na ngai un.
44015014	Pasian in ama min dingin Gentile‑te lak panin mi honkhat lakhia dingin a hawhcilna thu Simon in hong gen khinzo hi.
44015015	Hih in kamsangte gensa thu tawh kituak hi. Kamsangte in,
44015016	‘Tua hun khit ciangin kong paikik ding hi. A puk khinsa David biakbuuk ka lamkik dinga, A kicimsa teng puahpha in ka dingkiksak ding hi.
44015017	Tua hi leh a kiplai mite le, Keima min a suang Gentile‑te khempeuh nangawn in Topa a zong ding uh hi. Hih na khempeuh a bawl Topa in a gen ahi hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44015018	“Pasian in ama sep ding khempeuh a kipatcil a kipan a theih khitsa vive ahi hi.
44015019	Tua ahih manin Pasian lama hong kihei Gentile‑te buaisak kei ni.
44015020	Ahi zongin amaute in milim biakna a kizang an, numei pasal mawhna, gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa le sisan a tan nadingun laikhak i gelh ding hoih ka sa hi.
44015021	Banghang hiam cihleh tanglai peka kipan khua khempeuh ah Moses laibu sunga om thute kihilh a, Sabbath ni sialin kikhopna innteng ah a kisim den hi,” a ci hi.
44015022	Sawltakpite, makaite le pawlpi buppi in tua thu hoih a sa uh hi. Antioch khua ah Paul le Barnabas tawh a paikhawm dingin sanggamte laka a makaite sung panin Barsabas a kici Judas le Silas‑te a teel uh hi.
44015023	Amaute in hih bangin laikhak gelhin a puasak uh hi. Sawltakpite, makaite le sanggamte in Antioch khua, Syria gam le Cilicia gama om Gentile mi ahi sanggamte kong hopih uh hi.
44015024	Kote kiang panin a hong pai mi pawlkhat in, “Vunat in, thukham na zuih ding uh ahi hi,” ci in a thugenna uh tawh note hong buaisak in na lungsim uh hong siatsak lam ka na za uh hi. Kote in tua bang dingin amaute tungah thu ka pia kei uh hi.
44015025	Tua ahih manin lungsim kituak in ka kikhawm uh a, mi pawlkhat teelkhia in i it Barnabas le Paul tawh note kiangah kong paisak ding uh hoih ka sa uh hi.
44015026	Amaute in i Topa Zeisu Khazih min hangin a nuntakna uh a pia ngamte ahi uh hi.
44015027	Tua ahih manin hih thute amau kam mahmah tawh zong hong genkawm dingin Judas le Silas kong paisak uh hi.
44015028	Banghang hiam cihleh hih a kisam thute lobuang note tungah vangik zaw hong suan lo dingin Kha Siangtho le kote in hoih ka sa uh hi.
44015029	Tuate in, milim biakna a kizang an, sisan, gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa le numei pasal thangtatnate na tan nading uh ahi hi. Tuate tang le uh cin note aa dingin a hoih ding hi. Na ci damta un. Mangpha, ci in lai a khak uh hi.
44015030	Tua bangin amaute sawlkhia uh a, Antioch khua a tung uh hi. Tualai ah mihonpi kikhawmsak in tua laikhak a pia uh hi.
44015031	Tua laikhak a sim khit uh ciangin tua thapiakna thu hangin a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
44015032	Tu in Judas le Silas‑te in zong kamsang ahihna uh tawh thu tampi gen uh a, sanggamte thapia in a thakhauhsak uh hi.
44015033	Sawtkhop a taam khit uh ciangin sawltakpite kiangah lungnuamtak in a ciahkiksak uh hi.
44015034	Ahih hangin Silas in amah tualai ah a taamlai ding hoih a sa hi.
44015035	Paul le Barnabas zong Antioch khua ah taamlai uh a, midang tampi tawh Topa thu hilhin lungdamna thu a tangko khawm uh hi.
44015036	Tawlkhat khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, “Topa thu i hilh khitna khuate ah paikik in i sanggamte bangci uh ahi hiam cih a en dingin va hawh ni,” a ci hi.
44015037	Tu in Barnabas in Mark kici John tonpih dingin a sawm hi.
44015038	Ahih hangin Mark in Pamphylia gam panin amaute ciahsan in amaute nasepna ah zuisuak lo ahih manin Paul in amah tonpih loh dingin a gen hi.
44015039	Kinak sellua uh ahih manin kikhen uh a, Barnabas in Mark tonpih in Cyprus tuikulh ah tembaw tawh a pai uh hi.
44015040	Ahi zongin Paul in Silas teel a, sanggamte in Pasian hehpihna sungah amaute a ap khit uh ciangin a kuankhia uh hi.
44015041	Syria gam le Cilicia gamah Paul zin kawikawi in pawlpite tha a pia hi.
44016001	Tua ciangin Derbe le Lystra khua ah Paul a tung hi. En in, tua khua ah Timothy kici nungzui khat a om hi. Amah Judah minam, thu‑um numei khat tapa hi a, a pa ahih leh Greek mi ahi hi.
44016002	Amah pen Lystra khua le Iconium khua‑a om sanggamte in a pahtak mahmah uh mi khat ahi hi.
44016003	Paul in amah tonpih nuam ahih manin sam a, tua kima om Judah mi khempeuh in a pa Greek mi ahihlam thei uh ahih manin vun a atsak hi.
44016004	Khuapi tengah zin kawikawi uh a, Jerusalem khuapi ah sawltakpite le makaite in zuih dingin a khun uh thute a theisak kawikawi uh hi.
44016005	Tua ahih manin pawlpite upna ah kip in nisim in mimal a khang hi.
44016006	Tu in Phrygia gam le Galatia gamah a zin khit uh ciangin Asia gam sungah Pasian thu a gen ding uh Kha Siangtho in a kham hi.
44016007	Mysia gam a tun khit uh ciangin Bithynia gam zinsawm uh a, ahi zongin Kha in a phal kei hi.
44016008	Tua ciangin Mysia gam kantan in, Troas khua ah a paisuk uh hi.
44016009	A zan ciangin Paul in mang mu a, Macedonia mi khat ama kiangah hong dingin, “Macedonia gam lamah hong galkah inla, kote hong huh in,” ci in a thum hi.
44016010	Paul in mang a muh khit ciangin Topa in tua mite kiangah lungdamna thu a tangko dingin hong samzo hi cih thei in Macedonia gam pai dingin ka sawm pah uh hi.
44016011	Tua ahih manin Troas khua panin tembaw tuangin Samothrace tuikulh ah tangtak in ka pai uh a, a zingciang in Neapolis khua ka tung uh hi.
44016012	Tualai panin Macedonia gam sunga khua lianpen khat ahi Rome mite teenna Philippi khua ka tung uh a, tua khua ah nitam simsim ka taam uh hi.
44016013	Sabbath ni in khuapua lamah paikhia in thu kingetna mun gungei ah ka pai uh hi. Tualai ah ka tu uh a, kikhawm a om numeite kiangah thu ka gen uh hi.
44016014	Tu in ka thugen uh a zate lakah Lydia a kici Pasian a bia numei khat a om hi. Amah Thyatira khua mi hi a, puan dupsan zuakte khat ahi hi. Tua nu in Paul thugen a up theih nadingin Topa in a lungsim a honsak hi.
44016015	Amah le a innkuanpihte tui kiphum uh a, amah in, “Topa tungah a citak mi khatin nong ngaihsut uh leh hong pai unla ka inn ah hong tung un,” ci in hong samin a hong kho tentan hi.
44016016	Khatvei, thungen dinga ka pai laitak un mailam thu genkholhna tawh a tote aa ding sum tampi a ngahsak, dawilut sila numei khatin kote hong dawntuah hi.
44016017	Tua numei in Paul le kote hong zui a, “Hih mite in hotkhiatna lampi a hong hilh, Sangbel Pasian nasemte ahi uh hi,” ci in a kiko hi.
44016018	Tua numei in ni tampi sung tua bangin a hih den hi. Tua ciangin Paul in nopmawhsa mahmah ahih manin tua dawi lamah kihei a, “Ama sung pan na paikhiat nadingin Zeisu Khazih min tawh thu kong pia hi,” a cih ciangin tua hun lian mah in tua dawi a paikhia hi.
44016019	A tote in a sum ngah nading uh lametna om nawnlo hi cih a theih uh ciangin Paul le Silas‑te man uh a, thuneite omna sumbuuk lamah a kai uh hi.
44016020	Thukhen vaihawmte kiangah puak in, “Hih Judah mite in ka khuasung uh nakpi in hong buaisak uh hi.
44016021	Ei Rome mite san theihloh ding le zuih theihloh ding ngeinate hong hilh uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44016022	Tua ciangin mihonpite in Paul le Silas langpan huan uh a, thukhen vaihawmte in amaute puan suahkhiatsak in ciangpum tawh sat dingin thu a pia uh hi.
44016023	Tam veipi a sat khit uh ciangin thonginn ukpa in hoihtak a cin nadingin thupia a, thongah a khum uh hi.
44016024	Thonginn ukpa in tua bang thupiakna ngah ahih manin thongsung tawngnung pen ah amaute khum in a khe uh kol a bulh hi.
44016025	Ahih hangin zankim laitak in Paul le Silas in thungen in Pasian phatna la sa uh a, thongkiate in a ngai uh hi.
44016026	Tua laitak in nakpitak in zinling a, thonginn bulpi nangawn a kilok hi. Thong kongkhak khempeuh thakhat in kihong a, thongkiate a kikhihna sikkhau khempeuh zong a kitolkhia hi.
44016027	Thonginn ukpa a khanlawh ciangin thonginn kongkhakte honsa a om mu a, thongkia teng a taimang khin sa ahih manin a namsau dokin amah le amah a kithahsawm hi.
44016028	Ahih hangin Paul nakpi in kiko a, “Ka vekpi un hihlai ah ka om uh hi. Nang le nang bangmah kicih kei in,” a ci hi.
44016029	Thonginn ukpa in meivak a nget khit ciangin taikawm in thong sungah lut a, a cilingsa in Paul le Silas mai ah a bok hi.
44016030	Tua khit ciangin amaute gel paikhiatpih a, “Siate aw, hotkhiatna ka ngah nadingin bang ka hih ding hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
44016031	Amaute in, “Topa Zeisu Khazih um in. Tua hi leh nang le na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44016032	Tua khit ciangin amah le inn sunga om mi khempeuh tungah Topa thu a hilh uh hi.
44016033	Amah in tua zan tua hun mahin Paul le Silas‑te lakhia in a liammate uh a sawpsak hi. Amah le a innkuanpih khempeuh tui a kiphum pah uh hi.
44016034	Thonginn ukpa in a inn sungah amaute lutpih in an a pia hi. A innkuan buppi un Pasian um uh ahih manin a lungdam mahmah hi.
44016035	A zingciang in thukhen vaihawmte in palikte sawlin, “Tua mite khahkhia un,” ci in a gensak uh hi.
44016036	Thonginn ukpa in Paul kiangah, “Note kong khah nadingin thukhen vaihawmte in thu hong zasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tu in nuamtak in ciahta un,” a ci hi.
44016037	Ahih hangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Rome gam mi ahi kote thusit lopi in mipi mai ah hong satin thong hong khia uh hi. Tu in a simtham in hong sawlkhia ziau thei ding uh ahi hiam? Hi thei peuhmah lo ding hi! Amaute mahmah hong pai in hong lakhia uh hen,” a ci hi.
44016038	Palikte in thukhen vaihawmte kiangah tua thu a zasak uh hi. Amaute Rome gam mi ahihlam a zak uh ciangin a patau uh hi.
44016039	Tua ciangin amaute pai in va thum uh a, a lakkhiat khit uh ciangin khuasung pan a paikhiat nadingun a sawl uh hi.
44016040	Amaute gel zong thonginn sung pan paikhia in Lydia inn ah a lut uh hi. Tualai ah sanggamte tawh kimu in amaute tha a piak khit uh ciangin a dingkhia uh hi.
44017001	Tu in amaute in Amphipolis le Apollonia khuate a nawk khit uh ciangin Thessalonica khua a tung uh hi. Tua khua ah Judah mite kikhopna inn khat a om hi.
44017002	Tua ciangin Paul in ahih ngei bangin kikhopna inn ah lut a, amaute tawh nipi thum sung Lai Siangtho kikum in a om hi.
44017003	Khazih in gimna a thuak khit ciangin misite lak panin a thokik ding mah ahihna thu teltak in lak a, “Note kianga kong hilh uh hih Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
44017004	Amaute pawlkhat in tua thu um uh a, Pasian thu a hahkat Greek mi honkhat le numei makai tampi in Paul le Silas‑te a pawl uh hi.
44017005	Ahih hangin a umlo Judah mite in haza uh ahih manin sumbuuk phual panin migilo pawlkhat a va zawnkhia uh hi. Mi honkhat ngah uh a, tuate tawh khuasung teng a so ngeingaisak uh hi. Paul le Silas‑te mihonpi mai ah kaikhia nuamin Jason inn a busim uh hi.
44017006	A muh loh uh ciangin Jason le sanggamte pawlkhat khuapi ukte kiangah kai uh a, “Leitung a lumlet mite hih mundong hong tungta uh a,
44017007	Jason in zin a tungsak hi. Hih mite in, ‘Zeisu a kici kumpi dang khat om hi,’ ci in Caesar kumpipa thukhunna tawh a kilehbulh vive in a gamta uh hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44017008	Mihonpite le khua‑ukte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungmang uh hi.
44017009	Amaute in Jason le a dangte kitansak in a khah uh hi.
44017010	Tua ciangin sanggamte in a zan a zanin Berea khua ah Paul le Silas paisak pah uh a, tua khua a tun uh ciangin Judah mite kikhopna inn ah a lut uh hi.
44017011	Thessalonica khua mite sangin hih khua mite a lungsim uh gina zaw ahih manin lawpna takpi tawh thu ngai uh a, a maan le a maanlo a theih nadingun nisim in Lai Siangtho tawh a sittel uh hi.
44017012	Tua ahih manin Judah mitampi in thu um uh a, Greek mite lak panin zong a zahtak uh numei pasal tampi in a um uh hi.
44017013	Ahih hangin Paul in Berea khua ah Pasian thu a hilh lam a theih uh ciangin Thessalonica khua‑a Judah mite va pai in mihonpi a va holhthawh uh hi.
44017014	Tua ciangin sanggamte in tuipi lam tawnin Paul paikhiasak pah uh a, Silas le Timothy ahih leh Berea khua ah a taamlai uh hi.
44017015	Paul a kha mite in Athens khuapi dong a zui uh hi. Silas le Timothy‑te a manlang theithei a hong pai nadingin Paul vaikhakna thu pua in a ciahkik uh hi.
44017016	Tu in Paul in Athens khuapi ah amaute ngakin a om sungin khuapi sungah milim tawh kidim in a om a muh ciangin a lungsim sungah na a sa mahmah hi.
44017017	Tua ahih manin kikhopna inn ah lutin Judah mite le Pasian thu a hahkat Gentile‑te tawh thu kikum in sumbuuk phuala a kimuh khakpih mite tawh zong nisim in a kikum hi.
44017018	Tua khit ciangin Epicurus nungzuite le Stoic mipilte pawlkhat in amah nialin, “Hih a mawk ciakciakpa gennop bang thu ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Paul in Zeisu thu le a thawhkikna thu hilh ahih manin a dang pawlkhatte in, “Gamdang pasiante thu a gen hi leh kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
44017019	Tua khit ciangin amah samin Ares mualvumɠ tungah paipih uh a, “Na gengen hih thuhilhna thak nong hilh thei ding hiam?
44017020	Ka zak ngeiloh uh thu pawlkhat hong gen na hih manin bangci dan hiam cih ka thei nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44017021	Banghang hiam cihleh Athens khua mi khempeuh le tua khua‑a om gamdang mite in a hun uh thudang mahmah in zang lo uh a, thuthak khat peuhpeuh gen nading le ngaih nading bekin a zang uh hi.
44017022	Tua ciangin Ares mualvumɠ tunga mite lakah Paul dingin thu a gen in ah, “Athens khua mite aw, na khempeuh ah na biakna mi mahmah lam uh kong thei hi.
44017023	Banghang hiam cihleh khuasung ka vak kawikawina ah biakna a na piak uh nate ka telet mahmah a, biaknatau khat tungah, ‘A KITHEILO PASIAN AA DING,’ ci a, a kigelh lai khat ka mu hi. Tua ahih manin theilopi a na biak pa uh thu note kiangah hong tangko ka hi hi.
44017024	“Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh a piangsakpa tua Pasian in leitung le vantung a uk Topa hi a, khut tawh kibawl biakinn sungah a teeng kei hi.
44017025	Amah in mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna le naksuk naktoh a kipan na khempeuh hong piapa ahih manin kitangsapna a nei bangin mihingte khut tawh ama aa ding sepsak bawlsak a kul kei hi.
44017026	Amah in leitung maitang khempeuh a a teeng dingin minam khempeuh sisan khat panin bawl a, tua minamte hun ding le amaute teen nading mun a sehkholhsak hi.
44017027	Hih pen mite in Topa zongin a khut uh tawh zam a a muh theih nading uh a deihna ahi hi. Tua bang i cih hangin amah in eite tawh a kigamla ahi kei hi.
44017028	Banghang hiam cihleh note laka laphuakte in zong, ‘Eite zong ama suan le khakte i hi hi,’ ci a, a gen bangin eite in ama sungah nungta in gamta in i om hi.
44017029	Tua hi a, Pasian suan le khakte i hih manin Pasian pen mihingte gelna le khutsiamna tawh a kibawl kham lim peuh, ngun lim peuh, suangtum lim peuh tawh a kibang a i ngaihsut ding ahi kei hi.
44017030	A taktak in cileng nidanglai in Pasian in tua bang theih lohnate a kimuhmawh bawl hangin tu in ahih leh mun khempeuh a om mi khempeuh mawhna a kisikkik nadingin thu a pia zo hi.
44017031	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a sehsa mipa tungtawn in leitung mite tungah maantak a thu a khen ding hun khat a sehkhol zo hi. Amah in tua a sehsa mipa, misite lak pan thokiksak a, tua thu maantakpi ahihna mi khempeuh tungah teci a lakzo hi,” a ci hi.
44017032	Misite thawhkikna thu a zak uh ciangin pawlkhat in, “Hih thu ka zakik nuam uh hi,” ci uh a, a dangte in a zahpih uh hi.
44017033	Tua ahih manin amaute lak panin Paul a paikhia hi.
44017034	Ahi zongin tuate lak panin Ares mualvumɠ a thu vaihawm pawlte laka Dionysius, Damaris a kici numei khat le amaute tawh a omkhawm midangte in um uh a, Paul lamah a pang uh hi.
44018001	Hihteng khit ciangin Athens khuapi pan Paul paikhia in Corinth khua a tung hi.
44018002	Caesar kumpipa Claudius in Judah mi khempeuh Rome khuapi panin a paikhia dingin thu pia ahih manin Pontus gam mi Aquila a kici Judah mipa khat le a zi Priscilla‑te Italy gam panin a tun zawh a sawt nai kei hi. Paul in a muh ciangin amaute kiangah a va hawh hi.
44018003	Amaute puanbuuk khuimi hi uh a, a nasep uh kibang ahih manin amaute tawh Paul omkhawm in na a sem hi.
44018004	Paul in Sabbath ni simin kikhopna inn ah thu kikuppih in Judah mite le Greek mite a zol hi.
44018005	Silas le Timothy‑te Macedonia gam panin a hong tun uh ciangin Kha in Paul thahatsak a, Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi ci in Judah mite tungah teci a pang hi.
44018006	Judah mite in langpan in a kosiat uh ciangin Paul in a puan sing in, “Note sisan nomau tungah hong tu tahen kei ka siang hi. Tu a kipan in Gentile‑te kiangah ka paita ding hi,” a ci hi.
44018007	Tua kikhopna inn panin amah paikhia a, Pasian bia khat ahi Justus kici pa inn ah a pai hi. Tua pa inn pen kikhopna inn tawh a kizom pah ahi hi.
44018008	Tua ciangin kikhopna inn ukpa Crispus in a innkuanpih khempeuh tawh Topa a um uh hi. Paul thugen a za Corinth khua mi tampi in zong um in tui a kiphum uh hi.
44018009	Zankhat a mangmuhna sungah Topa in Paul hopih a, “Lau kei in pau loin om kei inla gen in.
44018010	Banghang hiam cihleh hong ompih ka hih manin kuamah in nang hong do lo dinga, bangmah hong cih lo ding uh hi. Hih khua ah mi tampi ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
44018011	Tua khua ah kum khat le a lang sung tamsuak in Pasian thu a hilh hi.
44018012	Gallio in Achaia gamah mangpi a suah ciangin Judah mite in kithukhat in Paul langpan uh a, thukhen zumah puak in,
44018013	“Hih mipa in thukham tawh kilehbulh in Pasian a bia dingin mite a zol hi,” a ci uh hi.
44018014	Thugen dinga Paul a kithawi laitak in Gallio in Judah mite kiangah, “Judah mite aw, hih thu in khialhna le tatsiatna thu ahih leh kong ngaihsutsak bek ding hi.
44018015	Ahi zongin thu kinialnate, minte le na thukham uh tawh kisai thute peuh ahih leh nomau mahin thei un. Tua bang thute ka khen nuam kei hi,” a ci hi.
44018016	Tua khit ciangin thukhen zum panin amaute a hawlkhia hi.
44018017	Tua ciangin Greek mite in kikhopna inn ukpa Sosthenes manin thukhen zum mai ah a sat uh hi. Ahih hangin Gallio in tua thute a awlmawh kei hi.
44018018	Paul in tawlpi khat a taam khit ciangin sanggamte mangpha khak a, a kiciamna sa bangin Cenchrea khua ah a sam a met khit ciangin Priscilla le Aquila‑te tawh tembaw tuangin Syria gamah a pai uh hi.
44018019	Ephesus khua a tun uh ciangin tua khua ah amaute a nusia hi. Amah ahih leh kikhopna inn ah lutin Judah mite tawh thu a kikum hi.
44018020	Amaute kiangah sawtkhop khat taam dingin a khoh uh hangin mang zo loin,
44018021	mangpha khak a, “Mai‑a hong tung ding pawi, Jerusalem khuapi ah ka zat loh phamawh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in hong awi leh note kiangah kong paikik ding hi,” ci in Ephesus khua pan tembaw tuangin a dingkhia hi.
44018022	Caesarea khua a tun ciangin khua sungah paito in pawlpi mite hopih a, tua khit ciangin Antioch khua ah a paisuk hi.
44018023	Antioch khua ah tawlkhat a taam khit ciangin zinkhia a, Galatia gam le Phrygia gamteng ah zin kawikawi in nungzui khempeuh tha a pia hi.
44018024	Tu in Apollos a kici Judah mi khat Ephesus khua a hong tung hi. Amah Alexandria khuapi a a suak mi khat hi a, thugen a siam banah Lai Siangtho zong a thei mahmah khat ahi hi.
44018025	Amah in Topa lampi thu a sin khinsa mi khat hi a, lawptak le maantak in Topa thu gen in a hilh hi. Ahi zongin John tuiphumna thu bek a thei hi.
44018026	Amah in kikhopna inn sungah hangtak in thu a gen hi. Priscilla le Aquila in ama thugen a zak uh ciangin samkhia uh a, Pasian lampi a kicing zaw in a hilhcian uh hi.
44018027	Achaia gamah Apollos in zin a sawm ciangin sanggamte in amah hanthawn uh a, a paina ah hoihtak in a na kisan nadingin zong lai khat a puasak uh hi. Amah a tun ciangin hehpihna tungtawn a thu‑um mite nakpitak in a huh hi.
44018028	Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite upkhialhna teng mihonpi mai ah khauhtak in lakkhia a, Zeisu in Khazih hi cih Lai Siangtho panin a lak hi.
44019001	Corinth khua ah Apollos a om sungin Paul in saklam gam nawkin pai a, Ephesus khua a tung hi. Tua khua ah nungzuite pawlkhat a muh ciangin
44019002	amaute kiangah, “Note in na up hun mah un Kha Siangtho na ngah pah uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Kha Siangtho kici a om lam nangawn ka za ngei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44019003	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Bangci bang tuiphumna tawh kiphum na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin, amaute in, “John tuiphumna tawh ka kiphum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44019004	Tua ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “John in ama khit cianga hong pai ding pa Zeisu Khazih a up nadingun hilh a, kisikkikna tawh kipawl tuiphumna a pia hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44019005	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Zeisu minin tui a kiphum uh hi.
44019006	Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngak ciangin amau tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung a, pau nam tuamtuam tawh pau in kamsang in thu a gen uh hi.
44019007	Tua mite a vekpi un pasal sawm le nih ahi uh hi.
44019008	Kikhopna inn ah Paul pai zel in kha thum sung hangtak in thu gena Pasian kumpigam thute kikuppih in amaute a zol hi.
44019009	Ahih hangin mi pawlkhatte lungkhauh in um lo uh a, mihonpi mai ah tua Lampi thu a gensia uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in amaute paikhiatsan a, a nungzuite a sapkhiat khit ciangin Tyrannus sanginnpi sungah nisim in thu a kikuppih hi.
44019010	Hih bangin kum nihsung a sepsuak ciangin Asia gam sunga a teeng Judah mite le Greek mi khempeuh in Topa Zeisu thu a za uh hi.
44019011	Tua ciangin Pasian in Paul khut zangin a tuampian nalamdangte a bawl hi.
44019012	Paul pumpi tawh a kisu kha khinsa puan ahi zongin dial khatpeuh ahi zongin cinate tawh a kisukkhaksak ciangin, a natna uh damin amaute sunga om dawigilote zong a paikhia hi.
44019013	Tua ciangin phuisamna tawh kha gilote hawlkhia a a kawi vakvak Judah mite pawlkhat in dawigilo a lutna mite tungah Topa Zeisu min zangin, “Paul genpa Zeisu min tawh na paikhiat nading thu kong pia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44019014	Sceva a kici Judah mite siampi lianpa tapa sagihte in zong tua bangin a hih uh hi.
44019015	Tua ciangin dawigilo in, “Zeisu lah thei ing, Paul lah thei ing, note banglak mi na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44019016	Tua ciangin amaute tungah dawiveipa dianggawp in zogawp ngingei ahih manin si le nai tawh a guaktang un tua inn panin a taikhia uh hi.
44019017	Tua thu Ephesus khua‑a teeng Judah mite le Greek mi khempeuh in a theih uh ciangin lau mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa Zeisu min nakpitak in a phat uh hi.
44019018	Thu‑um mi tampi hong pai uh a, a gamtat siatna teng uh genkhia in a pulak uh hi.
44019019	Mitphial bawl mi tampi in zong a laibute uh hong paipih in mi khempeuh mai ah a haltum uh hi. Tua laibute a man a kiseh ciangin nguntang 50,000 man ahi hi.
44019020	Hih bangin Topa thu nasiatak in hong khangin hong kizel semsem hi.
44019021	Hihteng a sep khit ciangin Paul in Macedonia gam le Achaia gamah a zin hi. Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi a pai dingin Kha in theisak a, “Tua khuapi ka tun khit ciangin Rome khuapi zong ka phak kul ding hi,” a ci hi.
44019022	Tua ahih manin amah a huh mi nihte ahi Timothy le Erastus‑te Macedonia gamah paisak a, amah ahih leh Asia gamah tawlkhat sung a taamlai hi.
44019023	Tua hun lai mahin Lampi thu tawh kisai buaina lianpi khat a hong piang hi.
44019024	Demetrius a kici nguntui sungpa khatin Diana a kici nusian biakinn limte ngun tawh bawl a, a nasem khutsiamte in sum tampi a ngah uh hi.
44019025	Amah in tua bang nasepna a sem khempeuh samkhawm in, “Lawmte aw, hih nasepna panin sum tampi i ngah lamtak na thei uh hi.
44019026	Tu in hih Paul in, ‘Khut tawh a kibawl peuhmah pasian hilo hi,’ ci in Ephesus khua bekthamlo in Asia gam buppi phial ah mi tampi a zol khinzo hi cih thu za in na mu uh hi.
44019027	Tua ahih manin i nasepna a minsiat ding banah a lian nusian Diana‡ biakinnpi zong a kisimmawh khak ding lauhuai hi. Tua thamlo in Asia gam buppi le leitung buppi a kibia hih nusian thupina a bei ding zong lauhuai lai hi,” a ci hi.
44019028	Tu in amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uh a, “Ephesus khua mite Diana§ thupi mahmah hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44019029	Khua sung khempeuh ah tua buaina a hong kizelh ciangin Paul tawh khual a zinkhawm Macedonia gam mi Gaius le Aristarchus‑te manin pawilahna innpi sungah lungsim kikhat in a lut uh hi.
44019030	Mihonpi lakah Paul pai dingin a kithawi ciangin nungzuite in a phal kei uh hi.
44019031	Paul lawmte ahi Asia gam uliante pawlkhat in zong pawilahna innpi sungah a pai teitei loh nadingin mi sawlin a gensak uh hi.
44019032	A kikhawm mite buaigawp in amau tumciat in awng zelzul uh a, tua hangin mipite buai in mi a tam zaw in a kikhopna uh a hang nangawn a thei kei uh hi.
44019033	Mihonpi lak panin Judah mite pawlkhat in Alexander kaikhia uh a, mipi mai ah a koih uh hi. Alexander in a kihutna thu mipite tungah gen nuamin a khut tawh a lak hi.
44019034	Ahih hangin amah Judah mi ahihlam a theih uh ciangin, “Ephesus khua mite nusian Diana thupi mahmah hi!” ci in aw kituak in nai nihsung bang a awng uh hi.
44019035	Khuapi lai‑atpa in mihonpi a daihsak khit ciangin, “Ephesus khua mite aw, Ephesus khua mite pen a lian nusian Diana biakinnpi le Zeus pasian pana hong kiasuk tua nusian lim a cingte na hih lam uh a theilo kua om ahi hiam?
44019036	Hih thute kuama nial theih ding hilo ahih manin daitak in om unla pheng gamtat kei un.
44019037	Hih mite in nusian biakna innpi hong luhsak uh lah hilo, na nusian uh a hong kosiatsak uh zong hilo napi hih mun nong tun uh hi.
44019038	Tua ahih manin Demetrius le a seppih khutsiamte in mi khatpeuh tungah lungkim lohna a neih uh leh thukhen zum om a, thukhen mangte zong a om uh hi. Tualai ah kikhia uh hen.
44019039	Hihteng banah thudang kantelnop na neih uh leh thukhenna ngeina tawh a kituak kikhopna ah kikhen ding hi.
44019040	Banghang hiam cihleh tuni‑a thu piangteng in mipi so gawpsak hi ci in hong kingawh ding lauhuai hi. Hih bangin mipi so ziazua na a hang kician om lo ahih manin i gen ding zong bangmah a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
44019041	Hih bang teng a gen khit ciangin mihonpi a ciahsak hi.
44020001	Tua thubuai a ven khit ciangin Paul in nungzuite samsak a, mangpha a khak khit ciangin Macedonia gamah a pai hi.
44020002	Tua gamah Paul zin kawikawi a, thu tampi tawh amaute tha a piak khit ciangin Greek gam tung a,
44020003	tua gamah kha thum sung a taam hi. Syria gamah tembaw tawh a paikuan ciangin Judah mite in amah thahsim sawm uh ahih manin Macedonia gam lam tawnin a pai dingin a khentat hi.
44020004	Asia gama Paul a zinna ah Berea khua mi Sopater, Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus le Secundus, Derbe khua mi Gaius le Timothy, Asia gam mi Tychicus le Trophimus‑te in a zui uh hi.
44020005	Amauteng na pai masa uh a, Troas khua ah kote hong ngak uh hi.
44020006	Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a ven khit ciangin kote zong Philippi khua panin tembaw tuangin ka dingkhia uh hi. Ni nga khit ciangin amaute omna Troas khua ka tung uh a, tua khua ah ni sagih ka taam uh hi.
44020007	Nipi kal sunga ni masapen ni in anlum balnen dingin nungzuite a kikhawm uh hi. A zingciang in Paul paisawm ahih manin zankim dongin thu a gen hi.
44020008	A kikhopna uh inndei tungah meivak tampi a kivak hi.
44020009	Eutychus a kici tangvalno khat padenpauh ah tu a, Paul in thu sawtpi a gen sungin ihmu kha ahih manin inn dawl thumna panin kiasuk a, a va top uh ciangin a na si khinzo hi.
44020010	Ahih hangin Paul kumsuk in tangvalpa tungah bok a, kawi in, “Lunghimawh kei un. A nuntakna omlai hi,” a ci hi.
44020011	Tua khit ciangin kahtokik a, anlum balnen in a ne uh hi. Khuavak dongin sawtveipi holim uh a, tua khit ciangin Paul a dingkhia hi.
44020012	Amaute in tangvalpa a nungtasa in inn sungah paipih uh a, a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
44020013	Paul in Assos khua ciangdong khe in paisawm a, tua khua ah amah tawh kituah dingin ka gel uh hi. Tua ahih manin kote in tembaw tuangin Assos khua ah ka paikhol uh hi.
44020014	Amah tawh Assos khua ah ka kimuh uh ciangin Paul in tembaw tungah hong tuangin Mitylene khua ah ka paisuak uh hi.
44020015	A zingciang in tua khua pan ka paikhia uh a, Chios tuikulh gal ka tung uh hi. A thaiciang in Samos tuikulh ka tung uh a, Trogyllium khua ah taam in a zingciang in Miletus khua ka tung uh hi.
44020016	Paul in a hun neihteng Asia gamah a bei loh nadingin Ephesus khua ah taam loin paisuak dingin a khentat hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ahih theih leh Pentecost ni in Jerusalem khuapi ah a om theih nadingin a kinawh nuam ahi hi.
44020017	Miletus khua a tun ciangin Ephesus khua pawlpi makaite a sam dingin mi a sawl hi.
44020018	Amaute a hong tun uh ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Asia gam sung kong lutcil ni‑a kipan in note laka ka nuntakzia na thei uh hi.
44020019	Kiniamkhiat mahmahna le khitui tampi tawh Topa na ka sem a, Judah mite in thah a hong sawm manun gimna tampi ka thuak hi.
44020020	Note phattuam nading bangmah sit loin, mihonpi kikhopna ah ahi zongin inn khat khit inn khat ah ahi zongin lungdamna thu tangko in kong hilh khinzo hi.
44020021	Pasian tunga mawhna kisikkikna le i Topa Zeisu Khazih upna thu, Judah mite le Greek mite tungah teci ka pangzo hi.
44020022	Tu in en un, Jerusalem khuapi ah bang tuak ding cih ka theih loh hangin tua khua ah a pai teitei dingin ka lungsim in hong phu hi.
44020023	Matna henna le haksatna in hong ngak hi cih bekbek Kha Siangtho in khua khempeuh ah hong theisak hi.
44020024	Ahi zongin tuate khat beekin a hong linglawngsak zo kei hi. Pasian hehpihna tawh kisai lungdamna thu teci pang in Topa Zeisu tung pana ka ngah nasep lungdamtak a ka matut theih nadingin ka nuntakna zong pammaih ka sa kei hi.
44020025	Tu in ngai un. Pasian kumpigam thu gena ka vak kawikawi na mite in ka maitang nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi cih ka thei hi.
44020026	Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh sisan panin kei ka siang hi cih thu tuni in note tungah teci kong pang hi.
44020027	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian gelna khempeuh sit loin note kong hilh khinzo hi.
44020028	Pasian in ama sisan tawh a leisa ama pawlpi tuucin banga a cing dingin Kha Siangtho in note hong koih ahi hi. Tua ahih manin no le no kikem unla, tuuhon khempeuh zong na kem un.
44020029	Banghang hiam cihleh ka ciah khit ciangin note lakah keivom hangsante hong lut ding uh a, tuuhonte a hong koihkhong kei ding uh hi.
44020030	Note sung panin thuman thutak lehkaih a, amaute lamah nungzuite a kaimang nuam mi pawlkhat a hong piang ding hi.
44020031	Tua ahih manin na pilvang un. Kum thum tawntung sun le zan tatsat loin khitui tawh note khempeuh tunga kong hilh thute na phawk un.
44020032	“Tu in sanggamte aw, Pasian tung le ama hehpihna thu ah note kong ap hi. Ama hehpihna thu in note hong kipsak in a sianthosak mi khempeuh tawh luahna a hong ngahkhawmsak ding hi.
44020033	Kham le ngun, nikteen puansilh kuama a ka deihgawh ngei kei hi.
44020034	Hi hi, keimah le ka lawmte kisapna teng hih ka khut in hong guan hi cih no mahmah in zong na thei uh hi.
44020035	Na khempeuh ah hih bangin nasep hahkat in a zawngkhal mite na huh nadingun kong lak khinzo hi. ‘Ngahna sangin piakkhiatna ah thupha om zaw hi,’ ci a, Topa Zeisu thugente na phawk un,” a ci hi.
44020036	Hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin khukdin in amaute khempeuh tawh thu a ngenkhawm hi.
44020037	Tua ciangin a vekpi un nakpitak in kap uha Paul ngawngkawi in a nam uh hi.
44020038	Ka maitang nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi a cihna thu in amaute a dahsak phadiak hi. Tua khit ciangin tembaw tungah amah a kha uh hi.
44021001	Tu in amaute tawh ka kikhen khit uh ciangin tembaw tawh tangtak pai in Cos tuikulh ka tung uh hi. A zingciang in Rhodes tuikulh ka tung uh a, tua panin Patara khua ka tung uh hi.
44021002	Tua khua ah Phoenicia gama pai ding tembaw khat ka muh uh ciangin tuangin ka zui uh hi.
44021003	Cyprus tuikulh ka muh uh ciangin taklam zuanin ka paisuak uh a, Syria gamah pai in Tyre khua ka tung uh hi. Tualai ah tembaw vanteng kisuahkhia ding ahih manin ka kumkhia uh hi.
44021004	Tua khua ah thu‑um mite ka muh uh ciangin ni sagih ka taam uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a pai loh nadingin Kha theihsakna tawh a gen uh hi.
44021005	Ni sagih a cin ciangin tua khua pan dingkhia in ka khualzinna uh ka zom uh hi. Thu‑um mite in a zi a tate uh tawh khuanawl dong hong kha uh a, tuipi gei ah khukdin in thu ka ngen uh hi.
44021006	Mangpha ka kikhak khit uh ciangin tembaw tungah ka kah uh a, amaute zong a ciah uh hi.
44021007	Tyre khua pan tuitung khualzinna ka man khit uh ciangin Ptolemais khua ka tung uh a, sanggamte tawh kimu in ni khat ka taam uh hi.
44021008	A zingciang in Paul le ko a kithuahpih teng tua khuapan dingkhia in Caesarea khua ka tung uh hi. Upa sagihte lakah khatpa ahi lungdamna thu puakpa Philip inn ah tungin ka taam uh hi.
44021009	Tu in amah in kamsanna tawh thu a gen ta nungak siangtho li a nei hi.
44021010	Tualai ah ni tampi ka taam hun sungun Judea gam panin Agabus kici kamsangpa khat hong paisuk hi.
44021011	Kote kiangah amah a hong tun ciangin Paul kawnggak la in tua kawnggak tawh amah le amah a khut le a khe a kihen hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in, “ ‘Jerusalem khuapi a Judah mite in hih kawnggak neipa hih bangin hen ding uha Gentile‑te khutah a pia ding uh hi,’ ci in Kha Siangtho in a hong gen hi,” a ci hi.
44021012	Hih thu ka zak uh ciangin kote le tua muna om mite in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a pai loh nadingin ka kho uh hi.
44021013	Ahih hangin Paul in, “Banghang in kapin ka lungsim hong kitamsak na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu min hangin Jerusalem ah matna henna thuak bekthamlo in a si ding dongin ka kigingkhol zo hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
44021014	Ka khoh zawhloh uh ciangin bangmah gen nawnlo in, “Topa deihna bang hi tahen,” ka ci uh hi.
44021015	Ni tawmkha ka taam khit uh ciangin kithawi in Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paito uh hi.
44021016	Caesarea khua‑a nungzuite pawlkhat in zong hong zui uha ka zin tun nading uh Cyprus mi Mnason a kici pa inn ah hong kha uh hi. Amah pen nungzui a suak masate khat ahi hi.
44021017	Jerusalem khuapi ka tun uh ciangin sanggamte in lungdamtak in hong dawn uh hi.
44021018	A zingciang in Paul le koteng James kiangah ka va hawh uh a, pawlpi makaite khempeuh zong a na om uh hi.
44021019	Paul in amaute a hopih khit ciangin ama nasepna tungtawn in Pasian in Gentile‑te laka a nasepnate kicingtak in a gen hi.
44021020	Amaute in tua thute a zak uh ciangin Topa min phat uha Paul kiangah, “Sanggam aw, Judah mite lakah thu‑um mi tul tampi om a, thukham zuih ding a hahkat mahmah uh hi cih na thei hi.
44021021	Ahih hangin mi pawlkhat in nangma thu amaute tungah puak uh a, ‘Gentile‑te laka a teeng Judah mite in a tate uh vunat loin khanglui thuhilhnate zong a zuih loh nadingun Paul in gen a, Moses thu a nusiat nadingun thu a hilh hi,’ a ci uh hi.
44021022	Bangcih ding i hi hiam? Nang hong tungzo cih thu za khin ding uh ahih manin mihonpi hong kisutuah pelmawh ding uh hi.
44021023	Tua ahih manin kong gen bangun hih in. A kiciam khinsa mihing li ka nei uh hi.
44021024	Hih mite paipih inla amaute tawh kisiansuah khawmin a sammet man uh piaksak in. Tua hi leh nangma thu a kipuakte maanlo hi cih mi khempeuh in thei ding uh a, thukham zui in thumaan in a gamta na hihlam zong hong thei ding uh hi.
44021025	Ahi zongin thu‑um Gentile‑te in milim biakna sa, sisan le gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa ne loin numei pasal mawhna bawl lo ding uh hi cih thu lobuang a dang tua bang nate a tan loh nadingun khentatna lai ka khak khinzo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44021026	Tua hi a, a zingciang in Paul in tua mite tonpih in amaute tawh a kisiansuah khit uh ciangin, kisiansuahna hunte bei ni ding le mi khat ciat in biakpiakna a kipiak ding hun uh cingta hi cih a theisak dingin biakinnpi huang sungah a lut uh hi.
44021027	Tu in ni sagih beikuanta in Asia gam pana hong pai Judah mite in biakinnpi huang sungah Paul a muh uh ciangin mihonpite holhthawh in amah man uh a,
44021028	“Israel mite aw, hong huh un! Hihpa in i minam, i thukham le hih mun langpan in mun khempeuh a om mite khempeuh tungah thu a hilhpa ahi hi. Tua thamlo in biakinnpi huang sungah Greek mite hong lutpih in hih mun siangtho a ninsak hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44021029	Banghang hiam cihleh tu madeuh in Ephesus khua mi Trophimus kici pa Paul tawh khuapi sungah a omkhawm mu uh ahih manin biakinnpi huang sungah tua pa lutpih ngelngel ding hi ci in a ummawh uh hi.
44021030	Hih thu hangin khuapi sung khempeuh hong buai a, mun khempeuh panin mihonpite tai in hong kikhawm uha Paul a man uh hi. Biakinnpi huang pualam ah a kaihkhiat khit uh ciangin kongpite thakhat in a khak uh hi.
44021031	Amaute in Paul thah a sawm laitak un Jerusalem khua buppi buai hi ci in galkaphonɠ a uk galkap mangpaɠ kiangah thu a tung hi.
44021032	Tua ciangin amah in galkapte le galkap 100 ukte sam pah a, mihonpi omna munah a taisuk uh hi. Amaute in galkap mangpaɠ le galkapte a muh uh ciangin Paul a sat nawn kei uh hi.
44021033	Tua khit ciangin Paul kiangah galkap mangpaɠ hong pai in a man hi. Tua ciangin sikkhau nih tawh khihsak a, amah kua hi a, bang teng bawl ahi hiam ci in thu a dong hi.
44021034	Ahih hangin mihonpite lakah pawlkhat in thu khat genin a dangte in thu tuampi khat genin a ciak ngeingai uh hi. Gamlumlua uh ahih manin galkap mangpaɠ in a thu uh theitel zolo a, galkap lenah Paul a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
44021035	Kahlei bul ah Paul a tun ciangin mihonpi hong ngongtatlua uh ahih manin galkapte in Paul a puakhia uh hi.
44021036	Banghang hiam cihleh mihonpi in nungzuih uh a, “Amah that un!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44021037	Galkap len sung a lutpih ding uh ciangin Paul in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah, “Thu tawm kong gen thei ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Greek pauthei na hi hiam?
44021038	Nang, tuma lam a kumpi langpanna khat piangsak in misuam 4,000te gam sungah a taikhiatpih Egypt mipa hilo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
44021039	Ahih hangin Paul in, “Cilicia gam khua thupi khat ahi Tarsus khua‑a a suak Judah mi ka hi hi. Nong hehpihna in hih mite tungah thu hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
44021040	Galkap mangpa in phalna a piak ciangin kahlei tungah Paul dingin mipite lamah a khut a van hi. Mihonpite a daih khipkhep ciangin amah in Hebrew pau tawh thu a gen hi.
44022001	Paul in, “Pate le sanggamte aw, tu in ka kihutna thu hong gen ding ka hih manin hong ngaihsak un,” a ci hi.
44022002	Amaute in Hebrew pau† tawh a gen a zak uh ciangin a gamdai semsem uh hi.
44022003	Tua ciangin amah in, “Cilicia gam Tarsus khua‑a piang Judah mi taktak ka hi hi. Ahi zongin, Gamaliel pattahna tawh hih khuapi ah a khangkhia ka hi hi. Amah in i pute i pate thukham tawh kituak in limtak in hong sinsak a, tuni‑a note khempeuh mah bangin Pasian thu ka hahkat mahmah hi.
44022004	“Hih Lampi thu a um numei pasalte manin thong sungah ka khia a, tua Lampi thu suksiat ding ka hanciam hi.
44022005	Siampi Ukpa le makaite khempeuh in a theih ding mah bangin amaute kiang panin laikhak khat Damascus a om sanggamte muh dingin ka pua a, amaute Jerusalem ah a kibawlsiat theih nadingin kolbulh in a kai dingin ka kuan hi.
44022006	“Tu in Damascus khuapi ka tunkuan uh, sunkim pawlin a tang pha mahmah khuavak khat vantung panin ka kimah thakhat in a hong tang hi.
44022007	Tua ciangin lei ah ka puksuk a, ‘Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in hong bawlsia na hi hiam?’ hong ci awging khat ka za hi.
44022008	“Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Amah in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Nazareth khua mi Zeisu ka hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.
44022009	Ka tonpih ka lawmte in tua khuavak a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi. Ahi zongin kei hong kihopihna awging a tel thei kei uh hi.
44022010	“Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, bang hih ding ka hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Topa in, ‘Tho inla, Damascus khuapi sungah lut in. Nangma sep dinga ka gelsate tualai ah kong hilh ding hi,’ a hong ci hi.
44022011	Tua khuavak khauhlua a, khua mu theilo ka hih manin ka lawmte in hong bankaih uh a, Damascus khuapi ka tung hi.
44022012	“Tualai ah thukham tawh kituak in Pasian a bia, Ananias kici mi khat om a, tua khua‑a teeng Judah mi khempeuh in a zahtak mahmah khat uh ahi hi.
44022013	Amah ka kiangah hong pai in ka gei ah hong dinga, ‘Sanggampa Saul aw, khua muta in,’ a hong cih ciangin tua hun lian mahin amah ka mu thei pah hi.
44022014	Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Pasian deihna a thei ding, Midikpa a mu ding le ama thu genna aw a za dingin i pute i pate Pasian in nang hong teel zo hi.
44022015	Na muh khitsa le na zak khitsa thute mi khempeuh tungah na gen dinga, ama aa dingin teci na pang ding hi.
44022016	Tu in zong bang ngak na hi hiam? Tho inla tui kiphum in. Topa minin thungen inla, na mawhnate silsiang in,’ a hong ci hi.
44022017	“Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah ciahkik in biakinnpi huang sungah thungen a ka om laitak in mang ka mu hi.
44022018	Tua ka mangmuhna sungah Topa ka mu a, amah in, ‘Kinawh inla Jerusalem khuapi pan paikhia mengmeng in. Banghang hiam cihleh keima thu teci na panna amaute in hong sang lo ding uh hi,’ a hong ci hi.
44022019	“Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, kikhopna inn sungah lutin nang hong um mite satin thongah ka khiatna thu amaute in a hong thei uh hi.
44022020	Nangma thu hanga thahna a thuak Stephen sisan a luansak laitak un ama sih nading thukim in amaute kiangah ka dinga, amah a that mite puan zong ka kepsak hi,’ ka ci hi.
44022021	“Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hih mun pan paikhia in. Gamlapi a om Gentile‑te kiangah kong sawl ding hi,’ a hong ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
44022022	Amaute in Paul thugen hih ciangciang a ngai uh hi. Tua khit ciangin a aw uh sangsak in, “Hih bang mipa leitung panin hemkhia un a nungta dingin kilawm lo hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
44022023	A kiko kawmun a puante uh suahkhia in vantung lamah leivui a thehto uh hi.
44022024	Galkapte in galkap lenah Paul a paipih nadingun galkap mangpaɠ in thu a pia hi. Banghang in mihonpi in amah langpan in hi bangin kiko uh hi ding hiam cih a theih nadingin amah sata thu a sit nadingun a sawl hi.
44022025	Amaute in savun khau tawh amah a hen laitak un Paul in ama kianga a ding galkap 100 ukpa kiangah, “Rome gam mi khat mawh hi ci a, thukhenna om nailopi a sat ding pen thukhenna ngeina tawh a kituak mah ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
44022026	Galkap 100 ukpa in hih thu a zak ciangin galkap mangpaɠ kiangah pai in, “Hihpa Rome gam mi ahi hi na hihsawm thu kidawm in,” a ci hi.
44022027	Tua ciangin Paul kiangah galkap mangpaɠ pai in, “Nang, Rome gam mi na hi hiam hong gen in,” a ci hi. Paul in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
44022028	Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in, “Ken Rome gam mi ka suah nadingin sum tampi ka pia hi,” a ci hi. Paul in, “Kei ka suahpih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44022029	Tua ciangin thu a sitsawm mite ama kiang panin a kihemkhia pah uh hi. Galkap mangpaɠ in Paul na hen kha khinzo ahih manin Rome gam mi ahihlam a theih ciangin a lau hi.
44022030	Banghang in Judah mite in Paul mawhmat uh hiam cih thu galkap mangpa in theitel nuam ahih manin a zingciang in Paul a kihennate a phelsak hi. Siampi liante le thukhenteɠ khempeuh kikhawmsak a, Paul zong paipih in amaute mai ah a koih nadingun thu a pia hi.
44023001	Tua ciangin Paul in thukhenteɠ limtak in a etkawm in, “Ute naute aw, tuni dongin Pasian mai ah kisuang hetlo in ka nungta hi,” a ci hi.
44023002	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa Ananias in Paul kianga a ding mite kiangah Paul muk a satsak nadingun thu a pia hi.
44023003	Tua ciangin Paul in ama kiangah, “Leikang kizut suangcian tawh a kibang pa aw, Pasian in nang hong sat ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh thukham tawh kituak in thu hong khen dingin a tu kimlai banghang in thukham tawh kilehbulh in kei hong satsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
44023004	Tua kima a ding mite in, “Pasian Siampi Ukpa zahko vial ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
44023005	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Sanggamte aw, amah Siampi Ukpa ahihlam ka thei kei hi. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na mite a ukpa gensia kei in ci mah hi,’ ” a ci hi.
44023006	Amaute pawlkhat Sadducee pawlte hi uh a, a dangte Pharisee pawlte ahihlam uh Paul in a theih ciangin thukhenteɠ mai ah kiko a, “Ute naute aw, Pharisee mipa khat tapa Pharisee pawlte khat ka hi hi. Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai lametna hangin thusitna a thuak ka hi hi!” a ci hi.
44023007	Tua bang a cih ciangin Pharisee pawlte le Sadducee pawlte kisel uh a, mihonpi pawl nih a suak uh hi.
44023008	Banghang hiam cihleh Sadducee pawlte in misite thokik lo hi, vantungmi om lo hi, kha zong om lo hi a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Pharisee pawlte in a nih in om hi ci in a um uh hi.
44023009	Tua ciangin amaute nakpi in a kiko uh hi. Pharisee pawlte sunga thukhamhilh siate hong ding uh a, “Hihpa tungah thusia ka mu kei uh hi. Vantungmi khat ahih keileh kha khatpeuh in hopih ahih leh Pasian langpan in i do kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
44023010	Tu in kipawlkhenna le kitotna nasialua ahih manin Paul a tum a tel a suahkhak ding uh galkap mangpaɠ a patau hi. Tua ahih ciangin galkapte paisuksak in mihonpite lak panin thatanghat suangin Paul kaikhia a, galkap lenah a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
44023011	A zingciang zanin Paul kiangah Topa dinga, “Paul aw, lungkia kei in. Keima aa dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah teci na pan bangin Rome khuapi ah zong na panglai ding hi,” a ci hi.
44023012	Khua a vak ciangin Judah mite pawlkhat kituah uh a, Paul a thah khit mateng un an ne lo tui dawn lo dingin a kiciam uh hi.
44023013	Tu in Paul a thahsawm mite 40 val a pha uh hi.
44023014	Siampi liante le makai vaihawmte kiangah amaute va pai uh a, “Paul ka thah khit mateng un bangmah ne lo dingin ka kiciam khinzo uh hi.
44023015	Tua ahih manin note le thukhenteɠ in Paul thu a kicing zaw in a sit nuam bang khatin zingciang in a hong paipih nadingun galkap mangpaɠ kiangah va gen un. Note kianga hong tunpihma un a that dingin kigingsa in ka na om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44023016	Ahih hangin Paul sanggamnu tapa in tua mite suamsim nading thu a zak ciangin galkap lenah va lutin Paul kiangah a va ko hi.
44023017	Tua ciangin Paul in galkap 100 ukte khat sam a, “Hih tangvalpa in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah gennop khat nei ahih manin ama kiangah va puak in,” a ci hi.
44023018	Tua pa in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah amah a paipih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Thongkiapa Paul in kei hong sam a, hih tangvalpa nang kianga kong paipih ding hong ngen hi. Tangvalpa in nang kiangah gennop khat hong nei hi,” a ci hi.
44023019	Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in a khut tawh kai in paikhiatpih a, “Nong gennop thu bang ahi hiam?” ci in a dongsim hi.
44023020	Tangvalpa in, “Judah mite in a kicing zaw a Paul thu a sit nuam bang khatin zingciang in thukhenteɠ kiangah amah na paisak nading hong ngen dingin a kithukim khinzo uh hi.
44023021	Amaute thu mang kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh Paul a thah khit mateng un an ne lo tui dawn lo dingin a kiciam khinsa mihing 40 val in amah a pangsim uh hi. Tu in amaute in na kamciam piak ding bek ngakin kigingsa in a om uh hi,” a ci hi.
44023022	Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in tangvalpa ciahsak a, “Hih thute kei nong hilh lam kuama kiangah gen kei in,” ci in thu a pia hi.
44023023	Tua ciangin amah in galkap 100 ukte nih sam a, “Zan nai thum ciangin Caesarea khua donga a pai dingin galkap 200, sakol galkap 70 le teipi a tawi galkap 200 kithawisak un.
44023024	Paul a tuan nading khat zong keng unla, mangpipa Felix kiangah hoihtak in va puak un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
44023025	Amah in hih bangin laikhak khat a gelh hi.
44023026	Keimah Claudius Lysias in a lian mahmah mangpipa Felix kong hopih hi.
44023027	Judah mite in hihpa manin thah a sawm uh hi. Amah Rome gam mi khat ahihlam ka theih ciangin galkapte tawh pai in ka va honkhia hi.
44023028	Amah a mawhmatna uh thei nuam ka hih manin amaute thukhenteɠ kiangah ka puak hi.
44023029	Amaute thukham tawh kisai kinialna hangin a mawhmat uh hi a, sih nading le thongkiat nading zah dong ama mawhna ka mu kei hi.
44023030	Judah mite in amah pangsim uh hi cih thu a hong kigen ciangin nang kiangah kong puak pah hi. A mawhmat mite in a mawhmatna uh nangma mai ah hong sun nadingun thu ka pia zo hi. Mangpha, ci in lai a khak hi.
44023031	Tua ciangin galkapte in a thu ngahna uh tawh kizui in Paul lakhia uh a, Antipatris khua ah a zan a zan in a paipih uh hi.
44023032	A zingciang in Paul tawh a paikhawm dingin sakol galkap teng omlai uh a, galkap dangteng galkap lenah a ciahkik uh hi.
44023033	Caesarea khua a tun uh ciangin mangpipa khutah laikhak pia uh a, Paul zong ama khutah a ap uh hi.
44023034	Mangpipa in laikhak a sim khit ciangin Paul kiangah, “Bang gam mi na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Cilicia gam mi ahihlam a theih ciangin,
44023035	“Nang hong mawhmat mite a hong tun uh ciangin na thu kong sit ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin Herod inn ah Paul a kep nadingun thu a pia hi.
44024001	Ni nga khit ciangin Siampi Ukpa Ananias, makaite le Tertullus a kici thugen siampa tawh hong paisuk uh a, Paul a kimawhmatna thu a maan takpi mah hi ci in mangpipa mai ah thu a sung uh hi.
44024002	Paul a sap khit uh ciangin Tertullus in Paul a mawhmatna thu gen a, “A lian mahmah Felix aw, nangma hang bekin nuamtak in sawtpi a om thei ka hi uh hi.
44024003	Hih minam in na vaihawm siamna tawh a munmun ah khantohna tuamtuam ngah den ahih manin nakpitak in ka lungdam uh hi.
44024004	Bangbang ahi zongin hong cimtak loin nong hehpihna tawh ka thugen tawmkha nong ngaihsak nadingin kong thum hi.
44024005	Banghang hiam cihleh hihpa thusia bawl mi khat ahihlam ka mu uh hi. Amah in leitung mun khempeuh a om Judah mite lakah langpanna a piangsakpa le Nazareth pawlte makaipipa ahi hi.
44024006	Biakinnpi huang zong nitsak sawm ahih manin ka man uh a, kote thukham tawh kituak in ama tungah thu ka khen sawm uh hi.
44024007	Ahih hangin galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai in kote khut panin thagum tawh amah lakhia a,
44024008	Paul a mawhmat mite nang kiangah hong pai nadingun thu a pia hi. Nang mahmah in thusit lecin ka mawhmatna khempeuh uh a maan lamtak na tel ding hi,” a ci hi.
44024009	Judah mite zong panghuan uh a, “Hih thute a maan takpi mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44024010	Tua ciangin Paul in thu a gen nadingin mangpipa in a khut tawh a lah ciangin Paul in, “Hih minam kum tampi sung thu a khenpa na hihlam thei ka hih manin ka kihutna thu nuamtak in kong gen ding hi.
44024011	Pasian bia dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paitoh zawh ni sawm le ni nih val a phak nai loh lam na thei uh hi.
44024012	Biakinnpi huang sungah mi tawh ka kiniallam, kikhopna inn le khuapi sungah mipi ka buaisak lam amaute in a hong mu kei uh hi.
44024013	Tu a kei hong mawhmatna uh a maan takpi ahihna zong hong lakthei tuanlo ding uh hi.
44024014	Ahi zongin nang tunga kong pulaknop thu in, upna maanlo hi hong cihsan uh hih Lampi thu tawh kituak in ka pute ka pate Pasian ka bia a, Thukham laibu le Kamsangte laibu sunga kigelh thu khempeuh ka um hi.
44024015	Misi peuhmah mihoih ahi a, mi hoihlo ahi zongin a vekpi un thokik ding hi cih thu amaute in um uh a, kei zong tuamah bangin Pasian sungah lemetna ka nei hi.
44024016	Tua ahih manin Pasian tung le mihingte tungah lungsim kisuanna ka neih loh nadingin ka hanciam den hi.
44024017	“Tu in kum tampi khit ciangin ka minam mizawngte huhna a pia ding le biakna a pia dingin kong pai hi.
44024018	Asia gam pana hong pai Judah mite pawlkhat in biakinnpi huangah kisiansuah a ka om hong mu uh hi. Tualai ah mihonpi om loin buaina zong bangmah a om kei hi.
44024019	Kei hong mawhmat nading uh thu khatpeuh a neih uh leh hihlai ah na mai mahmah ah hong sung le uh hi ding hi.
44024020	Ahih keileh zong thukhenteɠ mai ah ka din laitak in,
44024021	‘Misite thawhkikna thu hangin tu in thusitna ka thuak hi,’ ci a, ka kiko lohngal khialhna dang khatpeuh ka bawl lam hihlai a om mite in a theih uh leh hong gen uh hen,” a ci hi.
44024022	Felix in hih thute za in tua Lampi thu a kician zaw in a theih ciangin, “Galkap mangpaɠ Lysias hong tunsuk ciangin, na thu kong khensak ding hi,” ci in a hun a sotto hi.
44024023	Paul kemin a ut bangbang in a omsak nadingun Felix in galkap 100 ukte khat thu pia a, a huh nuam le a veh nuam a meltheihte zong a kham loh nadingun a vaikhak hi.
44024024	Tua nung a sawtlo in Felix le Judah mi ahi, a zi Drusilla hong pai in Paul samkhiasak a, Khazih upna thu a ngai hi.
44024025	Paul in dikna thu, pumpi kidekna thu le a hong tung ding thukhenna thute a gen ciangin Felix lau a, “Na paikhia phot in. Hun hoih ka ngah ciangin kong samsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
44024026	Tua hun sungin Paul in amah a kikhah theih nadingin sum hong pia kha ding hi ci in Felix in a lamen hi. Tua ahih manin samkhiasak thithe in a hopih pahpah hi.
44024027	Ahih hangin kum nih a cin khit ciangin Porcius Festus in Felix za a laih hi. Felix in Judah mite lungdamsak nuam ahih manin thong sungah Paul a koihsuak hi.
44025001	Tu in Festus tua gam a tun zawh ni thum ciangin Caesarea khua panin Jerusalem khuapi ah a hawhto hi.
44025002	Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa le Judah mi makaite in Paul thu a sia lam in a ko uh hi.
44025003	Amaute in lamkal ah Paul pangin a thah theih nadingun Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a paisak nadingin Festus mai‑et in a kun uh hi.
44025004	Ahih hangin Festus in Caesarea khua mahah Paul kepsuak nading le amah zong a sawtlo in tua khua ah a pai nading thu gen hi.
44025005	“Tua ahih manin na makaite un hong zuisuk uh hen. Hih mipa in khialhna a neih le a neih loh ka theih nadingin amaute mawhmatna thu tualai ah hong sung uh hen,” a ci hi.
44025006	Amaute kiangah ni sawmval a taam khit ciangin Caesarea khua ah a paisuk hi. A zingciang in thukhenna tokhom ah amah tu in a kiangah Paul a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
44025007	Paul hong tun ciangin Jerusalem pana hong paisuk Judah mite ama kimah dingin Paul mawhsakna thulian pipite a gen uh hi. Ahi zongin, a teci dingin bangmah a lak thei kei uh hi.
44025008	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Judah mite thukham tungah ahi zongin biakinnpi tungah ahi zongin Caesar kumpipa tungah ahi zongin khialhna bangmah ka bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
44025009	Ahih hangin Festus in Judah mite lungkimsak nuam ahih manin Paul kiangah, “Jerusalem ah paito in tualai ah na thu hong kikhensak leh na ut hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
44025010	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tu a ka dinna mun in ka thu hong kikhensak nading Caesar kumpipa thukhenna tokhom mai ahi hi. Hoihtak a na theih mah bangin Judah mite tungah khialhna bangmah ka nei kei hi.
44025011	Mikhial ka hi a, sih nadingin a kilawm mawhna a bawl ka hih leh sih ding ka nial kei hi. Ahih hangin hih mite hong mawhmatna a maanlopi ahih leh amaute khutah kuamah in hong pia thei kei ding hi. Caesar kumpipa mai ah ka thu ka tunto ding hi,” a ci hi.
44025012	Tua ciangin Festus in upa vaihawmte tawh a kikup khit uh ciangin Paul kiangah, “Caesar kumpipa mai ah ka thu ka tunto ding hi ci na hih manin Caesar kumpipa kiangah na paikul ding hi!” a ci hi.
44025013	Tua nung a sawtlo in Festus kianga hawh dingin kumpipa Agrippa le Bernice‑te Caesarea khua ah hong paisuk uh hi.
44025014	Ni tampi sung a taam khit uh ciangin Festus in Paul thu kumpipa Agrippa tungah ko a, “Felix in thongah a nusiat mi khat a om hi.
44025015	Jerusalem khuapi a ka om sungin siampi liante le Judah mite makaite in ama thu hong zasak uh a, ama tunga thu ka khen ding a hong ngen uh hi.
44025016	Amaute kiangah, ‘A kimawhmatpa le a mawhmat mite kimaituah ding uh a, a kimawhmatpa in ama tunga kisuan mawhmatna tawh kisai in amah le amah kihu masa ding hi. Tua lopi in mi khat thah dinga piakkhiat theih nading Rome mite ngeina om lo hi,’ ci in ka dawng hi.
44025017	Tua ahih manin amaute hih munah hong kikaihkhop uh ciangin khinkhin nawnlo in a zingciang mahin thukhenna tokhom ah tu in tua pa ka samsak hi.
44025018	A mawhmat mite hong din uh ciangin ka upmawh thute khat beek tawh a mawhmat kha kei uh hi.
44025019	Amaute biakna tawh kisai kinialna thute le Paul in amah nungta hi a cihpa, a si khinsa Zeisu thu bek a gen uh hi.
44025020	Tua bang kinialna thute theitel lo ka hih manin Jerusalem ah pai in tualai ah na thu hong kikhensak leh na ut hiam, ci in ka dong hi.
44025021	Ahih hangin Paul in a thu Caesar kumpipa Augustus khen dingin a kikoihsak nading hong nget ciangin Caesar kumpipa kiang ka puak theih mateng amah a kikep nadingin thu ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
44025022	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Kei zong tua pa thu ka za nuam hi,” a cihleh Festus in, “Zingciang in ama thugen na za ding hi,” a ci hi.
44025023	A zingciang in Agrippa le Bernice‑te thupitak in hong pai uh a, galkap mangteɠ le khuapi uliante tawh thugenna innpi sungah a hong lut uh hi. Festus in thu a piak ciangin Paul zong hong lutpih uh hi.
44025024	Tua ciangin Festus in, “Kumpipa Agrippa le hihlai a om mite khempeuh aw, hihpa en un. Amah pen Jerusalem ah ahi a, hi lai ah ahi zongin Judah mi bupin a nungta dingin kilawm lo hi ci a, hong ngetpa uh ahi hi.
44025025	Ahih hangin hihpa in sih nading zahin a lian mawhna a bawl loh lam ka mu hi. Caesar kumpipa Augustus tungah a thu puakto nuam ahih manin paisak dingin ka khentat hi.
44025026	Ka topa ahi kumpipa tungah hih mipa thu lai tawh gelhin ka zaksak theih ding thu kician khat beek ka nei kei hi. Tua ahih manin note mai ah kong puak hi. A diakdiak in kumpipa Agrippa aw, thu na dot khit ciangin ka gelh ding thu kician pawlkhat ka ngah theih nadingin na mai ah kong puak hi.
44025027	Banghang hiam cihleh thongkia mi khat a kimawhmatna thu kician omlopi in ka puak ding hi theilo hi,” a ci hi.
44026001	Tua khit ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Na thu tawh kisai na gen theih nading hun kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Paul in a khut zanin a kihutna thu gen a,
44026002	“Kumpipa Agrippa aw, Judah mite hong mawhmatna thute tawh kisai in ka kihutna thu tuni in nangma mai ah hong gen thei ding ka hih manin hampha ka kisa hi.
44026003	Judah mite ngeina khempeuh le amaute kinialna thute thei mahmah na hih manin ka nuam phadiak hi. Tua ahih manin lungduaitak in nong ngaihsak nadingin kong thum hi.
44026004	“Ka khangno lai‑a kipan in Jerusalem a ka nuntakzia le ka khantohziate ka mipihte khempeuh in a hong theih uh ahi hi.
44026005	Kote biakna sunga a khauhpen Pharisee pawlte thu zui in ka nuntak lam a tung lai a kipan a hong theih khitsa uh ahih manin teci pang nuam uh hi leh pang thei ding uh hi.
44026006	Pasian in ka pu ka pate uh tunga a piak kamciamna ka lamet manin tu in thusitna thuakin ka ding hi.
44026007	Tua kamciamna a ngah dingin kilamen ka hih manun ko minam sawm le nihte in sun le zan tatsat loin Pasian ka bia uh hi. Kumpipa Agrippa aw, tua lametna thu hangin Judah mite in kei hong mawhmat uh ahi hi.
44026008	Pasian in misite thokiksak ding hi cih thu banghang in uptak salo na hi uh hiam?
44026009	“A taktak in ci lehang kei zong Nazareth khua mi Zeisu min langpan theih zah in langpan ding hi ci in ka ngaihsun ngei hi.
44026010	Tua bangin zong Jerusalem ah ka hih takpi a, siampi liante phalna tawh misiangtho tampite thong sungah ka khum hi. Amaute a kithah ciangin ka thukim hi.
44026011	Kikhopna innteng ah amaute ka bawlsia kawikawi a, Zeisu min a kosiat theihtheih nadingun ka bawl hi. Amaute tungah hehlua ka hih manin gamdang khualiante nangawn ah pai in ka va bawlsia hi.
44026012	“Tua banga ka hih sung mahin siampi liante thuneihna le sawlna tawh Damascus ah ka pai hi.
44026013	Kumpipa aw, ka pai laitak uh sunkim laitak in kei le ka khualzinpih mite kimah ni sangin a tang pha zaw khuavak khat vantung panin hong tang ka mu hi.
44026014	Ka vekpi un leilak ah ka puksuk uh a, tua laitak in, ‘Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam? Ciangzum sui leteh na mahmah ding hi,’ ci in Hebrew pau tawh hong hopih awging khat ka za hi.
44026015	“Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Amah in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Zeisu ka hi hi.
44026016	Ahi zongin tho inla, na khe tawh ding in. Na muh khitsa nate le kong hilh lai ding thute gen a, teci pang khat na suah theih nadingin nang tungah hong kilang ka hi hi.
44026017	Judah mite khut sung pan le Gentile‑te khut sung panin kong honkhia ding hi.
44026018	Gentile‑te mit honsak in khuamial pan khuavak ah a kiheisak ding le Satan thuneihna panin Pasian lama a kiheisak dingin nang kong sawl hi. Tua in amaute in mawhmaisakna ngahin keimah a hong up manun sianthona a ngah mite tawh go a luahkhop theih nading uh ahi hi,’ ci hi.
44026019	“Tua ahih manin kumpipa Agrippa aw, vantung panin ka ngah mangmuhna thu mang loin ka om thei kei hi.
44026020	A masa pen in Damascus, Jerusalem le Judea gam sung khempeuh a om mite kiangah hih thu ka tangko a, tua khit ciangin Gentile‑te kiangah ka tangko hi. Amaute mawhna kisikkik in Pasian lamah a kihei nading uh le mawhna kisikkikna tawh kituak in a gamtat nadingun ka hilh hi.
44026021	Hih thute hangin Judah mite in biakinnpi huang sungah hong manin hong thahsawm uh hi.
44026022	Tua hi a, Pasian in hong huh in milian mineu tungah teci pangin tuni dong ka ding lai hi. Moses le Kamsangte in hong piang dinga a gen khitsa uh thute longal thu dang ka gen kei hi.
44026023	Tua thu in, ‘Khazih in misite lak pan a thokik masa pen a suah theih nadingin gimna thuak dinga, Judah mite le Gentile‑te tungah khuavak a puak ding hi,’ cih thu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44026024	Paul in hih bangin ama kihutna thu a gengen laitak in Festus in aw lianpi tawh, “Paul aw, na haita hi! Thu tampi na sinna in hong haisak hi!” ci in a kiko hi.
44026025	Ahih hangin Paul in, “A zahtakhuai Festus aw, ka hai kei hi. Thuman thutak mah hoihtak ngaihsun kawmsa a ka gen ahi hi.
44026026	A mai‑a suakta taka thu ka genna pa kumpipa in zong hih thute a thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu a simtham a kisem hilo ahih manin a theih khakloh khat beek om lo hi cih ka thei hi.
44026027	Kumpipa Agrippa aw, Kamsangte thugente na um hiam? Na up lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
44026028	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Christian khat nong suaksak dektak hi,” a ci hi.
44026029	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Nang bek hilo in tuni a ka thugen a zate khempeuh hih banga mat le hen ka thuakna simloh kei tawh kibang in Pasian in bawl leh ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
44026030	Paul in hih thute a gen khit ciangin kumpipa dingkhia a mangpipa le Bernice tawh a tukhawm mite zong a dingkhia uh hi.
44026031	Amaute a paikhiat khit uh ciangin, “Hihpa in sih nading ahi a, mat le hen nading ahi zongin khialhna bangmah bawl lo hi,” ci in a kikum uh hi.
44026032	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hihpa in Caesar kumpipa tungah a thu tunto khin hi kei leh khahkhiat ding hi lel hi,” a ci hi.
