44027001	Italy gamah tembaw tawh kote hong puak dingin a kikhentat khit ciangin Paul le thongkia dang pawlkhatte Augustus galkaphon laka galkap 100 ukpa khat ahi Julius khutah a ap uh hi.
44027002	Tua ahih manin Adramyttium khua panin a hong pai tembaw khat ka zui uh a, Asia gam tuipi dungteng tawn dingin ka dingkhia uh hi. Macedonia gam Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus a kici pa zong kote tawh hong tuangkhawm hi.
44027003	A zingciang in Sidon khua ka tung uh hi. Paul tungah Julius thunuam mahmah a, a lawmte in huhna a piak theih nadingun amaute kiangah a va hawh ding a phal hi.
44027004	Tua khua panin tembaw tuangin ka dingkhia uh a, huih hong lehnun ahih manin Cyprus tuikulh bel in ka pai uh hi.
44027005	Tua ciangin Cilicia gam le Pamphylia gam lampang tuipidung zui in ka zin khit uh ciangin Lysia gam khua lian khat ahi Myra khua ka tung uh hi.
44027006	Tua khua ah galkap 100 ukpa in Italy gam a pai ding Alexandria tembaw khat mu a, tua tembaw ah kote a hong tuangsak hi.
44027007	Ni tampi sung damdam in ka pai khit uh ciangin, haksapitak in Cnidus khua ka tung uh hi. Huih nun hoihlo in mainawt theilo ka hih manun Crete tuikulh bel in ka pai uh a, Salmone kici leidawk ka tung uh hi.
44027008	Tuipi gei zui in haksapitak in ka pai uh a, Lasea khua tawh a kinai Khawlmun Nuam a kici mun ka tung uh hi.
44027009	Tu in ni tampi hong beita a, Antan Ni nangawn kheng khin ahih manin tembaw tawh khualzin ding a lauhuai hun hong hita hi.
44027010	Tua ahih manin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Lawmte aw, hih i khualzinna ah kituahsia mahmah dinga, tembaw le vante bek hilo in, i nuntakna nangawn a beikhak ding lauhuai hi cih ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
44027011	Ahih hangin galkap 100 ukpa in Paul thu sangin tembaw hawlpa le tembaw neipa thu a mang zaw hi.
44027012	Phalbi sung taam nadingin hih muna tembaw khawlna ginalo ahih manin hihlai pan Phoenix khua delh teitei in tualai ah phalbi sung taam zaw lehang ci in a tam zaw in ngaihsutna a pia uh hi. Tua khua in Crete tuikulh a tembaw khawlna mun khat hi a, nitumna khanglam le nitumna saklam a maingattuak hi.
44027013	Leitaw lam pan huih dam hong nun ciangin a tupna mun uh tung zo ding a kisa uh hi. Tua ahih manin tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ khaikhiato uha Crete tuikulh nehin a pai uh hi.
44027014	Ahih hangin a sawtlo in Euroclydon a kici pingpei tawh a kithuah huihpi khauh mahmah a hong nung hi.
44027015	Huihpi in tembaw a nawk khak ciangin phul zolo 27:9 Antan Ni: September ahih keileh October kha sunga tung Mawhkhuhna Ni (Yom Kippur) genna ahi hi. Tua hun in phalbi huih nun hun hi in tembaw tawh khualzin nadingin a lauhuai hun ahi hi. ahih manin huihpi mutna lamlam ah ka paisak uh hi.
44027016	Clauda a kici tuikulh bela ka pai laitak un tembaw tawh a kikhihkhawm gunkuang a siat loh nadingin haksapitak in ka kem zo uh hi.
44027017	Tua gunkuang tembaw sungah a koih khit uh ciangin khauhualpi tawh tembaw a gakcip uh hi. Syrtis muna sehnel lakah a awkkhak ding lau uh ahih manin tembaw puankhaite sutkhia in huihpi mutna lamlam ah a paisak uh hi.
44027018	Huihpi in hong nak nawklua ahih manin a zingciang in tembaw a zan nadingin vante a lawnkhia uh hi.
44027019	A ni thum ni ciangin tembaw vanzatte nangawn ka khut mahmah uh tawh ka lawnkhia uh hi.
44027020	Tu in ni tampi sung ni mulo, kha mu loin ka om uh a, huihpi in hong nak nawklua ahih manin a suakta zo dingin ka kilamen nawn kei uh hi.
44027021	Sawtpitak an a kingolh khit ciangin amaute laizang ah Paul dinga, “Lawmte aw, ka thugen hong mangin Crete tuikulh pan paikhia lo hi le uh cin hih tuahsiatna teng na thuak kha kei ding uh hi.
44027022	Ahi zongin tu in lungnuam taka na om nadingun kong hansuah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tembaw bek kisia dinga mi khat beek na si kei ding uh hi.
44027023	Banghang hiam cihleh keimah a hong neipa le ama na ka sepsak ka Pasian in a hong sawl vantungmi khat tu zanin ka kiangah hong dinga,
44027024	‘Paul aw, lau kei in. Caesar kumpipa mai ah hong kitun pelmawh ding hi. En in, tembaw a na tuanpih mi khempeuh Pasian in na khut sungah hong pia zo hi,’ a hong ci hi.
44027025	Tua ahih manin lawmte aw lungnuam un. Ka tunga hong kigen khinsa bangin hong piang taktak ding hi ci in Pasian ka um hi.
44027026	Ahih hangin tuikulh tung khatah i awk ding hi,” a ci hi.
44027027	Huihpi in Adriatic tuipi sungah hong sukmut hong tomut a, zan sawm le zan lina zankim pawl ciangin lei tawh kinai ta hi cih tembaw nasemte in a thei uh hi.
44027028	Tui a teh uh ciangin lam 20 bang a thuk lam a thei uh hi. Tawlkhat a pai khit uh ciangin tehkik uha lam sawm le lam nga na thuk lai hi.
44027029	Tua ciangin suang a phutkhak ding lau uh ahih manin tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ li tembaw nunglam ah khia uha thungen in khuavak ding a ngak uh hi.
44027030	Tembaw nasemte in tembaw pan taikhiat ding sawm uh a, tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ tembaw mai lamah a khia ding kineih in gunkuang a khiasim uh hi.
44027031	Tua ciangin Paul in galkap 100 ukpa le galkapte kiangah, “Hih tembaw nasemte om kei le uh na suakta zo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44027032	Tua ciangin galkapte in gunkuang khau sattat in tui sungah a khia uh hi.
44027033	Khua hong vakkuan ciangin Paul in amaute khempeuh an ne dingin hansuah a, “An ne lo a na om zawh uh ni sawm le ni li cingta in bangmah na ne kei uh hi.
44027034	Tua ahih manin na thahat zawh nadingun an na nek ding uh kong hanthawn hi. Na samzang uh khat nangawn zong pulhkhia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
44027035	Hih thute a gen khit ciangin anlum khat la in amaute khempeuh mai ah Pasian hehpihna phat a, balkham in a ne hi.
44027036	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in tha ngah uh a, an a ne ciat uh hi.
44027037	Tembaw tunga tuang mi peuhmah ka vekpi un mi 276 ka pha uh hi.
44027038	An a kham khit uh ciangin mangbuhte tui sungah khia in tembaw a zangsak uh hi.
44027039	Khua hong vak ciangin a tunna uh bang gam hiam cih a thei kei uh hi. Ahi zongin sehnel tawh kidim leidawk khat mu uh a, ahih theih leh tua munah tembaw a kingaksak sawm uh hi.
44027040	Tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiteɠ a khau sattat in tuipi sungah a pai uh hi. Tembaw heina pekte a kikhihna khaute zong a phel uh hi. Puankhaipi pen huih dawh in khaito uh a, tuigei lam a zuan uh hi.
44027041	Ahi zongin tembaw in gunpi nih kituahna muna om sehnel vum khat phu kha ahih manin a lulam tumsuk a, tang thei nawnlo in a awkcip hi. A tawlam ahih leh tuihual in khauhtak in sat ahih manin a kitam hi.
44027042	Thongkiate in tuipek in a taikhiat loh nadingun galkapte in thongkia teng a thahsawm uh hi.
44027043	Ahih hangin galkap 100 ukpa in Paul honkhia nuam ahih manin tua banga ahih loh nadingun kham a, tuipek theiteng tuakkhia masa in lei ah a kah nadingun thu a pia hi.
44027044	A dangteng in singpek le tembaw kitam themte khatpeuh a mat nadingun a sawl hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi un suakta in leilak a tung uh hi.
44028001	A suahtak khit uh ciangin Malta tuikulh ahihlam a thei uh hi.
44028002	Tua gam mite thunuam mahmah uha limtak in zin a hong do uh hi. Guahzu in khuadam ahih manin mei cih in a hong awisak uh hi.
44028003	Paul in singkang lomkhat khawmin mei tungah a koih ciangin mei sa ahih manin a gupha gul khat hong paikhia a, a khutah a kivial hi.
44028004	Tua gam mite in tua gul Paul khut tungah a luai lam a muh uh ciangin, “Hihpa mithat hi ngelngel ding hi. Tuipi tung pana hong suahtak hangin a nungta dingin Thumaan in phal lo hi,” a kici uh hi.
44028005	Ahih hangin Paul in tua gul mei tungah singkhia a, amah ahih leh bangmah a ci kei hi.
44028006	Ahi zongin amaute in, “A ci hong bawkgawp ding hi, ahih keileh thakhat in thaltuk in hong si ding hi,” ci in a ummawh lai uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpitak a etet uh hangin amah bangmah ci lo ahih manin, a lungsim uh khel uh a, “Amah pasian khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44028007	Tua mun tawh kigamlalo munkhat ah tuikulh hausapa Publius teenna huang a om hi. Amah in kote zin hong tungsak a, ni thum sung nuamtak in zin a hong do hi.
44028008	Publius ii pa in cisanat le gilsan natna thuahin a lum hi. Tua pa kiangah Paul va pai in a tungah a khut nga‑a thu a ngetsak ciangin a dam hi.
44028009	Hih thupiang hangin tuikulh tunga om cina khempeuh hong paipih uh a, damna a ngah uh hi.
44028010	Hong thupi bawl mahmah uh a, ka paikhiat uh ciangin kote kisapnate a hong guan uh hi.
44028011	Kha thum khit ciangin Alexandria tembaw khat zui in ka pai uh hi. Tua tembaw in Unau peng lim a tuang khat hi a, hih tuikulh ah phalbi sung a khawl hi.
44028012	Syracuse khua ka tun uh ciangin tualai ah ni thum sung ka taam uh hi.
44028013	Tua khua panin tembaw tuangin ka kualpai uh a, Rhegium khua ka tung uh hi. Ni khat khit ciangin leitaw lam huih hong nung a, a zingciang in Puteoli khua ka tung uh hi.
44028014	Tua khua ah sanggamte pawlkhat ka mu uh a, amaute kiangah ni sagih sung a taam dingin hong kho uh hi. Tua khit ciangin Rome zuanin ka pai uh hi.
44028015	Tua panin sanggamte in ko thu na za khin uh ahih manin hong dawn dingin Appii Sumbuuk phual le Giahbuuk Thum mun ciang dongah hong pai uh hi. Paul in amaute a muh ciangin Pasian hehpihna phatin tha a ngah hi.
44028016	Tu in Rome ka tun uh ciangin galkap 100 ukpa in kumpipa inncing galkap mangpa khutah thongkia teng a ap hi. Paul ahih leh amah a cing galkap khat tawh a ut bangbang in a omsak hi.
44028017	Tua hi a, ni thum khit ciangin Paul in Judah mi makaite samkhawm in amaute hong kikhop uh ciangin, “Sanggamte aw, i minam tungah ahi a, i pute i pate ngeina ah ahi zongin ka khial kei hi. Ahi zongin amaute in Jerusalem ah kei hong manin, Rome mite khutah hong piakhia uh hi.
44028018	Thu hong sit uh ciangin sihna ka thuak nading thu om lo ahih manin hong khahkhia nuam uh hi.
44028019	Ahih hangin Judah mite in tua thu a nial uh ciangin Caesar kumpipa tungah ka thu ka tuttoh ding a kul hi. Hih bang ka cih ciangin ka mipihte ka mawhsak nopna hilo hi.
44028020	Tua ahih manin hih thu hangin note tawh kimu ding le a holimkhawm dinga kong sapsak ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israelte lametna thu hangin hih banga sikkhau hong kikhih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44028021	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Judea gam panin nang tawh kisai laikhak ka ngah kei uh hi. Hihlai a hong pai sanggamte in zong nang tawh kisai thusia hong gen ngeilo uh hi.
44028022	Ahi zongin mun khempeuh ah hih biakna pawlte thu kigensia kawikawi hi cih thei ka hih manun tua thu nangma ngaihsutzia ka za nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44028023	Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paul tawh kimuh nadingin ni khat seh uh a, tua ni ciangin Paul tunna inn ah mi tampi a hong pai uh hi. Paul in hoihtak in thu hilhcian a, Pasian kumpigam thu nasiatak in teci a pang hi. Moses Thukham laibu le Kamsangte laibu‑te sunga om Zeisu tawh kisai thute tawh zing tunga kipan nitak dongin amaute a zol hi.
44028024	Paul thugente mi pawlkhat in um uh a, pawlkhat in a um kei uh hi.
44028025	Tua ciangin Paul in hih bangin a gen ciangin amaute kithutuak loin a paikhia uh hi. “Kha Siangtho in i pute i pate tungah kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawn in maantak in a gen inah,
44028026	‘Hih mite kiangah va pai inla hih bangin genin, “Note in zaza napi in na telthei kei ding uh hi. Mumu napi in na phawk thei kei ding uh hi.
44028027	Banghang hiam cihleh hih mite a lungsim uh mawlin, A bil un khuaza hak mahmah a, A mit uh zong a sicip uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit un khuamu in, A bil un khua a za ding hi. A lungsim un theitel in, Hong kihei ding uh a, Amaute ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.’
44028028	“Tua ahih manin Pasian hong hotkhiatna thu Gentile‑te tungah kipuak zo a, amaute in tua thu a sang ding uh hi cih theita un,” a ci hi.
44028029	Paul in hih thute a gen khit ciangin Judah mite paikhia uh a, nakpitak in a kinial uh hi.
44028030	Tua ciangin Paul in inn khat sapin kum nih sung om a, ama kianga pai mi khempeuh hoihtak in a sang hi.
44028031	Amah in Pasian kumpigam thu genin Topa Zeisu Khazih tawh kisai thute hangtak in hilha kuamah in a kham kei hi.
45001001	Pasian lungdamna thu tangko dinga kisehkhia, sawltakpi dinga kisam keimah Zeisu Khazih sila Paul in,
45001002	Pasian in a kamsangte tungtawn in Lai Siangtho sunga hong kamciamsa lungdamna thu,
45001003	ci le sa lam panin David suan ahi ama Tapa,
45001004	i Topa Zeisu Khazih in sianthona Kha hangin misite lak pan a thawhkikna in Pasian Tapa hi ci in thuneihna tawh a pulakkhia ahi hi.
45001005	Minamte khempeuh lakah ama min hangin upna thu a kizuih theih nadingin kote in ama tungtawn le ama min hangin hehpihna thupha le sawltakpi za ka ngah uh hi.
45001006	Note zong Zeisu Khazih aa dingin a kisamte lakah a kihel mite na hi uh hi.
45001007	Pasian it le misiangthote ci a, kisam Rome khua‑a om khempeuh tungah lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin a hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
45001008	Na thu upna uh leitung mun khempeuh ah thang ahih manin note khempeuh hanga ka lungdamna ka Pasian tungah Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in ka ko masa hi.
45001009	Thu ka ngetsim in note aa ding tatsat loin ka hel den a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama Tapa lungdamna thu ka hilhna a na ka sepsak Pasian in hong thei hi.
45001010	Pasian in hoih a sak hun khatpeuh ciangin note kiangah lam khatpeuh tawh kong pai theih nadingin zong thu ka ngen den hi.
45001011	Note thahat in na kip theih nadingun Kha Siangtho letsong pawlkhat hong hawmsawn nuam ka hih manin a hong mu nuam mahmah ka hi hi.
45001012	Tua bang ka cih ciangin upna tawh khat le khat tha i kipiaktuah theih nading ka cihna ahi hi.
45001013	Tu in sanggamte aw, Gentile dangte lakah gah ka neih bangin note lakah zong gah pawlkhat ka neih theih nadingin note kiangah pai kong sawm zel hangin tuciang dong mah hong khaktan om den hi cih thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
45001014	Greek mite le Greek mi a hilote tungah leiba ka neih bangin a pilte le a haite tungah zong ka nei hi.
45001015	Tua hi a, Rome khuapi sunga om note kiangah zong lungdamna thu kong tangko ding ka lawp mahmah hi.
45001016	Khazih lungdamna thu ka maizumpih kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua thu in a um mi khempeuh a masa pen in Judah mite le tua khit ciangin Greek mite in hotkhiatna a ngah nadingun Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.
45001017	Banghang hiam cihleh tua lungdamna thu sungah Pasian dikna hong kilang hi. “Midik in upna tawh a nungta ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin tua dikna pen upna tawh kingah a, upna mah tawh a kizomsuak ahi hi.
45001018	Pasian thusimlote le a thumanlo mite in thumanlohna tawh thuman a netcip manun amaute khempeuh tungah Pasian thangpaihna vantung panin a hong kilang hi.
45001019	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in amah tawh kisai thute theih ding amaute tungah lak khinzo ahih manin amaute aa dingin a kitel mahmah hi.
45001020	Bangci bang hiam cihleh a kimu theilo Pasian hihnate ama bawlsa nate panin kitheithei a, leitung a piansak cil a kipan teltak in ama neih tawntung vangliatna le Pasian pianzia kimu thei ahih manin paulap a zong thei kei ding uh hi.
45001021	Amaute in Pasian a theih uh hangin Pasian ahihna zahin pahtawi loin a tungah zong a lungdam kei uh hi. Tua sangsik in thu ginalo vive ngaihsun uha a lungsimte uh a mialcip hi.
45001022	Mipil ka hi hi a kicih uh hangin mihai suak uh a,
45001023	a sia theilo Pasian vangliatna pen a kisia thei mihing lim, vasa lim, khe li nei ganhingte lim le a bokvak ganhing lim peuh tawh a khek uh hi.
45001024	Tua ahih manin amaute lunggulhna zui in a pumpi uh a zumhuai pipi in zang uh a, Pasian in zong amaute siangtho lohna ah a khahkhong vet hi.
45001025	Amaute in Pasian thuman thutak pen zuauthu tawh khek uh a, a Piangsakpa sangin ama piansak nate bia in a na a sem zaw uh hi. Tua Pasian in thupha a ngah tawntungpa ahi hi. Amen.
45001026	Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu hangin a zumhuai theithei a lunggulh dingin Pasian in amaute khahkhong a, a numeite nangawn un pasal tawh omkhop ding ngeina tawh kilehbulh in a gamta uh hi.
45001027	Tuamah bangin pasalte in zong numei tawh omkhop ding ngeina nusia in pasal le pasal peuh kilunggulh in a zumhuai pipi in a mawh uh hi. Tua ahih manin a lehtatna uh tawh kituak in daan a thuak ciat uh hi.
45001028	Pasian a theihna nangawn uh zomsuak nuamlo uh ahih manin a kilawmlo le a kihhuai pipi a gamta dingin Pasian in siat theihtawp a sia lungsim guanin a khahkhong hi.
45001029	Amaute in siatna namkim bawl uh a, numei pasal thangtatna, gitlohna, huaihamna, midangte siatsak nopna, hazatna, mithahna, kiselna, khemna, thusia ngaihsutna tawh kidim uh hi. Amaute in mi sutuah nuamte,
45001030	mi a gensiate, Pasian a mudahte, a ngongtatte, a kiphasakte, a kisialte, thusia a piangsakte le nu le pate thu a manglote,
45001031	bangmah a thei theilote, mi muanhuailote, itna a neilote, midang khual lote le hehpihna a neilote ahi uh hi.
45001032	Tua bangin a gamta mite a si dingin Pasian in maantak in thu a khen lam thei napi, a gamtat ngei un gamta veve uh a, tua banga a gamta mite zong a pakta lai uh hi.
45002001	Tua ahih manin midangte a mawhsak mi aw, midangte na mawhsakna teng linlian mah nang zong sem na hih manin midangte na mawhsak ciangin nangma tunga thu a kikhen na hi hi. Tua ahih manin na suakta thei kei ding hi.
45002002	Tua banga a gamta mite tungah Pasian in thumanna tawh thukhen hi cih i thei hi.
45002003	Tua banga a gamta mite mawhsak napi tua mawhnate mah a bawl veve mi aw, Pasian thukhenna tawh kipelh ding kisa na hi hiam?
45002004	Ahih keileh na kisikkik theihtheih nadinga hong mapi Pasian migitna thei theilo in nangma tunga hong migit mahmahna hong lungduai mahmahna le hong thuak keikainate thusim lo na hi hiam?
45002005	Tua banga na lungkhauhna le na kisik nop lohna hangin Pasian thangpaihna le thumantak in a thukhenna a hong kilat ni ciangin na thuak ding Pasian thangpaihna a kholkhol na hi hi.
45002006	Amah in milip tungah ama gamtatna zui in thaman a pia ding hi.
45002007	Lungduaitak in a hoih sep tentanna tawh minthanna, pahtawina le sihtheih lohna a zong mite tungah nuntak tawntungna a pia ding hi.
45002008	Ahi zongin angsungthei a, thuman nialin siatna lampi a zui mite tungah Pasian thangpaihna le hehna a om ding hi.
45002009	A sia in a gamta mi peuhmah in buaina le lunggimna thuak dinga, Judah mite in thuak masa in, Greek mite in zong a thuak ding uh hi.
45002010	Ahih hangin a hoih in a gamta mi peuhmah in minthanna, pahtawina le nopna ngah dinga, Judah mite in ngah masa in Greek mite in zong a ngah ding uh hi.
45002011	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in deidan tuam a nei kei hi.
45002012	Thukham neilo‑a a mawh khempeuh thukham neilosa mahin kisia ding uh hi. Thukham nuai‑a a mawh khempeuh lah thukham tawh kizui in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.
45002013	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zakna hang hilo in thukham zuihna bekin Pasian mai ah dik a hong tangsak hi.
45002014	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham a neilo Gentile‑te in thukham kalhna amau theih tawmna tawh a sep uh ciangin amau aa dingin thukham a suak hi. Amaute in thukham a neih loh uh hangin
45002015	tua banga a sepnate panun thukham kalhnate amaute lungsim sungah kigelh hi cih hong lak hi. Tua thu amaute lungsim tawngin tecipang ahih manin a ngaihsutna un amaute mawhsak zel, diksak zel in a om hi.
45002016	Pasian in thu a khen ni ciangin mihingte thusimte keima hilh lungdamna thu tawh kizui in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in thu a khen ding hi.
45002017	“Kei Judah mi ka hi hi,” ci in thukham a suang le Pasian a kisialhpihpa aw,
45002018	thukham hong kihilh ahih manin Pasian deihna na thei a, a hoihpente mah zong hoih na sa hi.
45002019	Mittawte lamhilhpa ka hi a, khuamial sunga om mite aa dingin khuavak ka hi a,
45002020	mihaite a pantahpa le naungekte aa dingin siapa ka hi hi na kici a, thukham sunga om thutakte a thei takpi bangin na kimuang hi.
45002021	Tua ahih leh midangte thu a hilhpa aw, nang le nang zong thu kihilh lo na hi hiam? “Guta kei in,” ci a, midangte thu a hilhpa aw, nang zong guta hilo na hi hiam?
45002022	“Angkawm kei in,” a cipa aw nang zong angkawm hilo na hi hiam? Milimte lipkhaphuai a sapa aw, milim biakna innpite a luh hilo na hi hiam?
45002023	Thukham a kisialhpihpa aw, thukham na palsat manin Pasian min daisak hilo na hi hiam?
45002024	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Note hangin Gentile‑te lakah Pasian min a kigensia hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
45002025	Thukham na zuih leh na vunatna in man a nei ding hi. Ahih hangin thukham na palsat leh vun na at hangin a atlo mah tawh na kibang hi.
45002026	Tua ahih manin vunat lopa in thukham a zuih leh tua vunat lopa pen vunat bangin kisim ding hilo ahi hiam?
45002027	Lai tunga kigelh thukham nei in vun zong at napi in, thukham na palsat leh ci le sa ah vun a at loh hangin thukham a zui mi in nang hong mawhsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
45002028	Banghang hiam cihleh a puatham a Judah mi ahite Judah mi taktak ahi kei hi. A pualam pumpi a vunatna zong vunatna taktak ahi kei hi.
45002029	A sunglam a Judah mi ahite Judah mi taktak ahi hi. Vunatna zong lai tawh a kigelh thukham hang hilo in Kha hanga lungsim vunatna ahi hi. Mite in tua bang mite a pahtak loh uh hangin Pasian in a pakta hi.
45003001	Tua ahih leh Judah mite in bang hamphat tuamna nei a, vunat mi ahihna uh bang phattuamna nei ahi hiam?
45003002	A phattuamna tampi a om hi! A masa pen in Pasian in ama kam tawh a gen thute amaute tungah a pia hi.
45003003	Ahi zongin amaute pawlkhat in um kei le uh bang a ci ding hiam? Amaute uplohna in Pasian thumanna a mawkna a suaksak ding hiam?
45003004	A mawkna a suaksak peuhmah kei ding hi! “Na thugente in na thutanna hong lak a, Thu hong kikhen ciangin zong na gualzawh theih nading ahi hi,” ci a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin Pasian mah thuman hi a, mi khempeuh a zuauthei hilo ahi hiam.
45003005	Eite diklohna in Pasian dikna kilangsak ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Mihingte thugen banga kong gen inah, eite tungah Pasian hehna a hong thuaksak ciangin amah a thuman lo ahi hiam?
45003006	Ahi peuhmah kei hi. Tua ahih leh Pasian in bangci bangin leitung mite thu khen thei ding ahi hiam?
45003007	Keima zuauphuahna in Pasian thumanna khangsak in ama minthangsak ahih leh banghang in mimawh hong kici zel ahi hiam?
45003008	Pawlkhat in a thukimpih bangun, “A hoih a pian nadingin a sia bawl ni,” ci in mi pawlkhat in kote kam ding hong phuahsak uh hi. Hi bangin thu a gen mite Pasian in maantak in thu a khen ding hi.
45003009	Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Amaute sangin eite hoih zaw i hi hiam? I hoih zaw peuhmah kei hi. Tua ahih manin Judah mite le Greek mite a nih tuakun mawhna khut nuai ah om khin uh hi ci in a patna lamah kong gen khinzo uh hi.
45003010	Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin, “Midik khat beek a om kei hi. Khat nangawn a om kei hi.
45003011	A theisiam mi kuamah a om kei hi. Pasian a zong mi kuamah a om kei hi.
45003012	A vekpi un lampial khin uh a, Kimanna a nei kei uh hi. A hoih in a gamta kuamah om lo a, Khat nangawn a om kei hi.
45003013	A gawl uh a kihongsa hankhuk hi a, A leii uh mi khemna in a zang uh hi. Amaute mukah gulgu a om hi.
45003014	A kampau uh hamsiat le kamkha vive ahi hi.
45003015	Mi thah ding haksa a sa kei uh hi.
45003016	Amaute paina tengah siatna le gentheihna a om hi.
45003017	Lungmuanna lampi a thei kei uh hi.
45003018	Amaute mit ah Pasian kihtakna limlim om lo hi.”
45003019	Tu in thukham in a gen khempeuh thukham khutnuai mite tunga a gen ahi hi cih i thei hi. Thukham hangin kam khempeuh kikhakcip in leitung mi khempeuh in Pasian mai ah mawhsakna a thuak theih nading ahi hi.
45003020	Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mai ah kuamah in diktansakna a ngah kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihnate tungtawn in mawhna kilangkhia hi.
45003021	Ahih hangin Thukham le Kamsangte in teci a pan bangin Pasian in thukham loin a hong piak dikna tu in a hong kilang zo hi.
45003022	Pasian in Zeisu Khazih upna tungtawn in tua dikna mi khempeuh hong pia a, a um khempeuh in a ngah hi. Tua ahih manin kilamdanna a om kei hi.
45003023	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh mawh khin uh a, Pasian minthanna cinzo nawnlo uh hi.
45003024	Tua ahih manin Pasian in Khazih Zeisu hong tatkhiatna tungtawn in Pasian in ama hong hehpihna tawh manngen loin midik a hong tangsak hi.
45003025	Pasian lungkim nadingin Zeisu sisan luanna tawh upna tungtawn in mawhna a mai theih nadingin Pasian in amah thoihna in a hong pia hi. Hih in a beisa huna kibawl mawhnate Pasian in iip keikai in daan a piak lohna in amah dik ahihna a kilatsak nading leh,
45003026	tu hunin zong Zeisu a umte dik a tansakna ah amah thuman in thudik ahihlam a kilatsak nading ahi hi.
45003027	Tua ahih leh kisialh nading thu koi ah om ahi hiam? Kisialh theih nading thu a kilakhia zo hi. Bang tawh kilakhia ahi hiam? Thukham zuihna tawh ahi hiam? Hilo hi. Upna tawh a kilakhia hi.
45003028	Tua ahih manin mi khatin thukham zuihna tawh hilo in upna tawh diktansakna a ngah hi ci in thu i khum hi.
45003029	Amah Judah mite Pasian bek ahi hiam? Gentile‑te Pasian zong hilo ahi hiam? Hi mah hi. Gentile‑te Pasian zong ahi hi.
45003030	Vunat mite amau upna hangin diktangsak a, vunatlo mite zong upna hang mahin dik a tangsakpa in Pasian khat bek ahi hi.
45003031	Tua ahih leh upna thu hangin thukham in kimanna neilo a suaksak i hi hiam? I hi peuhmah kei hi. Thukham a kipsak i hi zaw hi.
45004001	Tua ahih leh ci le sa a ka pupi uh Abraham in hih thu tawh kisai bang mukhia ahi hiam?
45004002	Abraham in a gamtatna tawh diktansakna ngah hi leh kisial thei ding hi napi Pasian mai ah a kisialh theih nading a om kei hi.
45004003	Lai Siangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna pen ama dikna in kisimsak hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
45004004	Tu in nasempa in thaman a ngah ciangin hehpihna a ngah hi kici loin thaman a ngah hi kici hi.
45004005	Ahi zongin Pasian a zahtaklo mi khatin gamtatna suang loin, dik a tangsakpa a up leh ama upna pen dikna in a kisimsak hi.
45004006	Gamtatnate kihel loin Pasian in midik a a sim mipa in thupha a ngahna thu David in hih bangin a gen hi.
45004007	Amah in, “A tatkhialhnate uh kimaisak a, A mawhnate uh a kikhuhcipsak mite, Mihampha hi uh a,
45004008	Topa in mawhna a suatloh mi, Mihampha ahi hi,” a ci hi.
45004009	Hih thupha in vunat mite aa ding bek ahi hiam? Ahih keileh vunatlo mite aa ding zong ahi hiam? Abraham upna pen ama dikna in kisimsak hi i cih ciangin,
45004010	bang hunin kisimsak ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang ahi hiam? Ahih keileh a vunatma ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang hilo in a vunatma in a kisimsak ahi hi.
45004011	Abraham in a vun a at ma in upna hangin dikna ngah takpi ahihna a kilat nadingin a vun a nung at hi zaw hi. Amah in vun ki‑atlo thu‑um mite khempeuh pa a suah nading leh tua mite tungah dikna in a kisimsak theih nading ahi hi.
45004012	Ka pa uh Abraham in ngeina banga vunat bek hilo in amah in vun a ki‑atma a a neih upna khekhap a zui vunat taktakte pa ahi hi.
45004013	Banghang hiam cihleh leitung luah ding cih kamciam Abraham le a suan a khakte in thukham tungtawn a a ngah uh hilo in upna hanga dikna tawh a ngah uh ahi hi.
45004014	Thukham tawh a nungta mite in gamhluah ding uh ahih leh upna in man neilo dinga, kamciamna zong a mawkna suak ding hi.
45004015	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in Pasian hehna a piangsak hi. Thukham om kei leh thukham palsatna zong a om kei ding hi.
45004016	Tua ahih ciangin tua kamciamna pen hehpihna hanga kipia a suah nadingin upna tungtawn in kingah hi. Tua in Abraham suante khempeuh le thukham tawh kisai mite bek hilo in eite khempeuh pa ahi Abraham banga a um mite in zong tua kamciamna a ngah takpi theih nading uh ahi hi.
45004017	Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin, “Minam tampite pa a suak dingin kong bawl khin hi,” a cihna tawh kituak in Abraham in ama uppa Pasian muhna ah eite khempeuh pa a suak hi. Tua Pasian in misite a hingkiksakpa le a om nailopi nangawn a omsa banga a genpa ahi hi.
45004018	Abraham tungah, “Na suan na khakte in hih bangin a piang ding hi,” ci a, a kigenna bangin Abraham in minam tampite pa a suah nadingin a lamethuai lopi mah lamen in a um veve hi.
45004019	Ama khan kum 100 bang pha zo a, a pumpi a si tawh kibang ahihna le Sarah zong tasel ahihna ngaihsut in nei loin amah in upna ah a thanem tuan kei hi.
45004020	Uplahna tawh Pasian kamciam tungah lunghiang hetlo in a upna khauhsak a, Pasian min a thangsak hi.
45004021	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a kamciamna bangin a tangtungsakpa hi ci in upna kician a nei hi.
45004022	Tua ahih manin, “Tua upna pen ama dikna in a kisimsak hi.”
45004023	Tua banga a kisimsakna thu Lai Siangtho sungah ama aa ding bekin a kigelh ahi kei hi.
45004024	Eite aa dinga kigelh zong hi a, misite lak panin i Topa Zeisu a thokiksakpa i up leh tua upna mah eite dikna in a hong simsak ding hi.
45004025	Eite thu palsatnate hangin Zeisu hong kipiakhia a, diktansakna i ngah nadingin a thokik hi.
45005001	Tua hi a, upna hangin diktansakna ngah i hih manin i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in Pasian tawh i kilemkik hi.
45005002	Ama tungtawn in hehpihna sungah upna hangin tu‑a i omna ah luttheihna i ngah a, Pasian minthanna lametna nei in i lung a dam hi.
45005003	Tua bek zong hilo in haksatna in thuakzawhhatna piangsak hi cih thei i hih manin haksatnate i tuah ciangin i kipak hi.
45005004	Thuakzawhhatna in gamtat hoihna, gamtat hoihna in lametna a piangsak hi cih i thei hi.
45005005	Tu in lametna in hong lungkiasak lo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama hong piak Kha Siangtho tungtawn in eite lungsim sungah ama itna hong guanzo hi.
45005006	Banghang hiam cihleh eite thanem in i om laitak a hun a cin ciangin Pasian a thusimlo eite tangin Khazih hong si hi.
45005007	Midik khat tanga a singam ding mi haksa mahmah a, ahi zongin mihoih khat tanga a singam mi khatpeuh omthei khasam ding hi.
45005008	Ahi zongin mimawh i hih laitak mahin eite tanga Khazih hong sihna tawh Pasian in eite hong itna hong kilangsak hi.
45005009	Tu in ama sisan tawh diktansakna i ngah bekthamlo in ama tungtawn in Pasian hehna panin hong kihonkhia ding hi.
45005010	Banghang hiam cihleh eite in galte i hih laitak in ama Tapa sihna tawh Pasian in amah le eite hong kilemkiksak zo a, i kilemkik khit ciangin ama nuntakna tawh hotkhiatna i ngah lai ding hi.
45005011	Tua bek zong hilo in kilemkikna hong ngahsak i Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin Pasian tungah i kipak hi.
45005012	Tua ahih manin mi khat tungtawn in leitung ah mawhna hong lut a, mawhna hangin sihna a piang hi. Tua hi a, mi khempeuh mawh khinzo ahih manin mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi.
45005013	Thukham a omma in leitung ah mawhna a om khinzo hi. Ahih hangin thukham a om loh lai in mawhna pen mawhna in a kisim kei hi.
45005014	Tua hi napi Adam huna kipan Moses hun dongin sihna in mite uk veve a, Adam bangin thupiak palsat in a mawhlo mite nangawn zong sihna in a uk hi. Tua Adam in hong pailai ding pa lim a lakkhol ahi hi.
45005015	Ahi zongin letsong le thupalsatna a kibang kei hi. Mi khat thu palsatna hangin mi tampi a si hi. Ahi zongin Pasian hehpihna le mi khat ahi Zeisu Khazih hehpihna tawh i ngah letsong lian zawlai a, mi tampi aa dingin a kicing hi.
45005016	Mi khat mawhna hangin a piang thu le letsong a kibang kei hi. Mi khat mawhna hangin mawhsakna kingah a, ahi zongin manngenlo a hong kipia letsong in thu palsatna tampite a maisak hi.
45005017	Mi khat thupalsatna hangin tua mi khat tungtawn in sihna in mite uk ahih leh a dimlet hehpihna le dikna letsong a ngah mite in Zeisu Khazih ahi mi khat tungtawn in amaute nuntakna sungah a tam zawsem a uk ding uh hi.
45005018	Tua ahih manin mi khat thupalsatna hangin mi khempeuh tungah mawhsakna thukhenna a hong tung hi. Tuamah bangin mi khat diktatna hangin khawnkhong letsong mi khempeuh tungah tunga, tua in nuntakna tawh kipawl diktansakna a piangsak hi.
45005019	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat thumanlohna in mi tampi mimawh a suahsak bangin mi khat thumanna in mi tampi midik a suaksak hi.
45005020	Tua thamlo in thupalsatna a khan nadingin thukham hong lutbeh hi. Ahi zongin mawhna a khan ciangin hehpihna a khang zaw sem hi.
45005021	Tua hi a, mawhna in sihna a uk mah bangin, i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in tawntung nuntakna a tun dingin hehpihna in dikna tungtawn in a uk hi.
45006001	Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Hehpihna a khan nadingin mawhna i bawl behbeh ding hiam?
45006002	I bawl behbeh peuhmah kei ding hi! Mawhna a sihsan khinsa eite tua mawhna sungah koici bangin bual thei lai ding i hi hiam?
45006003	Khazih Zeisu sunga hong kiphum eite khempeuh in ama sihna sungah zong hong kiphum ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
45006004	Ama sihna sungah hong kiphum ahih manin amah tawh hong kivuikhawm khinzo hi. Tua in misite lak pan Pa vangliatna tawh Khazih a thawhkik bangin eite zong nuntakna thakah i kalsuan theih nading ahi hi.
45006005	Banghang hiam cihleh ama sihna lim la in amah tawh sikhawm a i kipumkhat leh amah bangin i thokik pelmawh ding hi.
45006006	Mawhna pumpi kisusia in mawhna sila i suah nawnloh nadingin eite mi lui pen Khazih tawh kikhailum khawm zo hi cih i thei hi.
45006007	Banghang hiam cihleh a si khin mi peuhmah mawhna pan a suakta zo ahi hi.
45006008	Tu in Khazih tawh sikhawm khin i hih leh amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi cih i um hi.
45006009	Misite lak pan Khazih a kithawhkiksak khit ciangin si nawnlo a, sihna in zong amah uk nawnlo hi cih i thei hi.
45006010	Khazih sihna in a kimangsuak dinga mawhna sihsanna hi a, nuntakna ahih leh Pasian aa dinga nuntakna ahi hi.
45006011	Tuamah bangin note zong mawhna a sihsan khinzo le i Topa Khazih Zeisu sungah Pasian aa dingin a nungta khinzo in kingaihsun un.
45006012	Tua ahih manin pumpi lunggulhnate a zui dingin a sithei na pumpi uh mawhna ki‑uksak kei un.
45006013	Tatsiatna hiamte bangin mawhna bawl nadingin na pumpi nate uh zang kei un. Misite lak panin a nungtakikte na hih manun na pumpi nate uh zong dikna hiamte bangin dikna bawl nadingin Pasian tungah pia un.
45006014	Thukham nuai ah om loin hehpihna nuai ah om na hih manun mawhna in note a hong uk kei ding hi.
45006015	Tua ahih leh bang i ci om ding hiam? Thukham nuai ah om loin hehpihna nuai ah om i hih leh mawhna i bawlbawl lel ding hiam? I bawlbawl peuhmah kei ding hi!
45006016	Mi khat thu mangin a sila dinga na kipiak uh ciangin a thu zong mang takpi in tua mipa sila na suak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin sihna a hong tun ding mawhna sila maw ahih keileh dikna a hong tangsak ding thumanna sila maw, hihte gel lakah khat zawzaw na hih lam uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?
45006017	A beisa hunin mawhna sila na hih ngei uh hangin note hong kipia thuhilhna lungsim takpi tawh mang na hih manun Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
45006018	Mawhna pan hong kisuaktasak khinzo ahih manin dikna sila na suak uh hi.
45006019	Na ci le na sa uh thanem ahih manin mihing kammal zangin thu a gen ka hi hi. A siangtholo nate sila ding leh hong tatsiasak semsem tatsiatna sila dingin na pumpi nate uh na piak ngei bangun tu in na pumpi nate uh dikna sila bangin a siangtho dingin kipia un.
45006020	Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna sila na hih lai un dikna tawh na kipelh uh hi.
45006021	Tu in zumhuai na sak uh tua mawhnate panin bang metlawh na hi uh hiam? Tua nate in a tawpna ah sihna a piangsak hi.
45006022	Ahi zongin tu in ahih leh mawhna pan suakta in Pasian silate na suak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tu in sianthona na ngah uh a, a tawpna ah nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding uh hi.
45006023	Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna thaman in sihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian hong piakkhong letsong in eite Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a kingah nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
45007001	Thukham a thei mite tunga kong gen inah sanggamte aw, mi khat a nuntak laiteng thukham in amah uk hi cih theilo na hi uh hiam?
45007002	Numei khat a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham in a pasal tawh a khihkhawm hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih leh a pasal tawh kisai thukham pan a suakta hi.
45007003	Tua ahih manin a pasal nungta lai napi pasal dang a teenpih leh angkawmnu a kici ding hi. Ahih hangin a pasal a sih leh tua thukham pan suakta ahih manin pasal dang a teenpih zongin angkawmnu ahi nawn kei hi.
45007004	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note zong Khazih pumpi hangin thukham a sihsan khin mite na hi uh hi. Hih in midang khat ahi misite lak pana a kithokiksakpa tawh kiteeng in Pasian aa dingin na gah theih nading uh ahi hi.
45007005	Eite i pianpih mawhna lungsim tawh i nuntak lai in thukham in mawhna lunggulhnate phonglo a, tua mawhna lunggulhnate in i pumpi sungah nasem in sihna hong tun hi.
45007006	Ahi zongin tu in laimal a kigelh ngeina lui bang hilo in Kha‑a nuntakna thak tawh na i sep theih nadingin eite hong khihcip ngei thukham sihsan khinta i hih manin tua thukham panin hong kisuaktasak khinzo hi.
45007007	Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Thukham in mawhna ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Tua cih thadah in, thukham om kei leh mawhna bang hiam cih ka thei kei ding hi. Thukham in, “Deihgawh kei in,” ci hi kei leh deihgawhna in bang hiam cih ka thei kei ding hi.
45007008	Ahi zongin thukham hangin mawhna in panmun ngahin keima sungah a hoihlo lunggulhna namkim a piangsak hi. Tua ahih manin thukham om kei leh mawhna zong a om kei hi.
45007009	Khatvei lai in thukham loin ka nungta hi. Ahih hangin thukham hong tun ciangin mawhna hong hingkik a, kei ka si hi.
45007010	Tua hi a, nuntakna a hong tun ding thukham in sihna a piangsak hi cih ka mu hi.
45007011	Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thukham siksan in kei hong khem a, tua tawh hong that hi.
45007012	Tua ahih manin thukham siangtho in, thupiakna zong siangtho a, thumaan in a hoih hi.
45007013	Tua ahih leh tua na hoih in kei aa dingin sihna suak ahi hiam? A suak peuhmah kei hi! Ahih hangin mawhna pen mawhna mahin a kilatkhiat theih nadingin tua na hoih tungtawn in kei sungah sihna a piangsak ahi hi. Tua in thupiakna tungtawn in mawhna pen mawhna ahih taktak lam a kilat nading ahi hi.
45007014	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in khalam thu tawh kisai hi cih i thei hi. Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ci le sa tawh a om mi ka hi a, tua in mawhna nuai ah kei hong zuak hi.
45007015	Ka sepnop teng sem loin ka muhdah teng peuh sem zawsop ka hih manin ka sepmel ka thei zo nawn kei hi.
45007016	Ka sep noploh teng mah sem ka hih leh thukham hoih hi ci in ka thukim hi.
45007017	Ahih hangin tua banga a semsem pen kei hi nawnlo in ka sunga a teeng mawhna ahi hi.
45007018	Tua ahih manin ci le sa ahi keima sungah a hoih bangmah a om kei hi cih ka thei hi. A hoih sepnopna lungsim ka neih hangin a hoih sepkhiat nadingzia ka thei zo kei hi.
45007019	Banghang hiam cihleh ka sepnop a hoih sem loin ka sep noploh a sia mah ka sem thapai hi.
45007020	Tu in ka sep noploh teng sem ka hih leh tuate a sem pen kei hi nawnlo in ka sunga a teeng mawhna in a sem ahi hi.
45007021	Tua ahih manin a pha a bawl nuam keima sungah siatna om hi cih thu khat ka theikhia hi.
45007022	Banghang hiam cihleh ka sunglam mi in Pasian thukham sungah nuam a sa hi.
45007023	Ahih hangin ka pumpi nate sungah a dang thukhat ka mu hi. Tua thu in ka lungsim a om thu tawh kido a, ka pumpi nate sunga om mawhna sila dingin hong mancip hi.
45007024	Mi gentheipa ka hi taktak hi! A si ding hih pumpi panin kua in kei hong honkhia ding ahi hiam?
45007025	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi! Hih bang teng ahih manin ka lungsim tawngah Pasian thukham nuai ah sila ka hi a, ka ci ka sa panin lah mawhna thukham nuai‑a sila ka hi zel hi.
45008001	Tua ahih manin tu in ci le sa deihna zui loin Kha deihna a zui, Khazih Zeisu sunga a om mite aa dingin mawhsakna a om nawn kei hi.
45008002	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih Zeisu sunga om nuntakna a piangsak Kha thu in mawhna le sihna thu panin kei a hong suaktasak zo hi.
45008003	Thukham in ci le sa hangin thanem ahih manin a sep zawhloh teng a sem dingin Pasian in ama Tapa mahmah mawhna a dim mihing bangin hong paisak a, tua ci le sa sungah mawhna thu a khen zo hi.
45008004	Hih in ci le sa deihna zui loin Kha deihna a zui eite sungah thukham in hong kalh dikna a tangtun nading ahi hi.
45008005	Ci le sa deihna banga a nungtate in ci le sa tawh kisai thute lunggulh uh a, Kha deihna banga a nungtate in Kha tawh kisai thute a lunggulh uh hi.
45008006	Ci le sa lungsim puakna in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin kha lungsim puakna in nuntakna le lungmuanna a piangsak hi.
45008007	Ci le sa lungsim puakna in Pasian galbawlna ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa lungsim in Pasian thukham a manglo bek hilo in a mang thei limlim kei hi.
45008008	Tua hi a, ci le sa deihna a zuite in Pasian a lungdamsak thei kei uh hi.
45008009	Ahi zongin note sungah Pasian Kha hong teen takpi leh ci le sa sungah omlo in Kha sungah a om na hi uh hi. Tu in Khazih Kha a neilo mi peuhmah Khazih mi ahi kei hi.
45008010	Note sungah Khazih Kha a hong om leh mawhna hangin na pumpi uh a si hi a, ahi zongin dikna hangin na kha uh a nungta hi.
45008011	Misite lak pan Zeisu a thokiksak Pasian Kha note sungah hong teen leh misite lak pan Khazih a thokiksakpa in a sithei note pumpi zong note sunga a teeng ama Kha tungtawn in nuntakna a pia ding hi.
45008012	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, ci le sa deihna zui in a nungta dingin ci le sa tungah leiba i nei kei hi.
45008013	Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa deihna zui in na nuntak uh leh na si ding uh hi. Ahi zongin Kha hangin pumpi deihna na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uh hi.
45008014	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian Kha in a makaih mi peuhmah Pasian tate ahi uh hi.
45008015	Sila hong suakkiksak in a hong lausak ding kha a ngah na hi kei uh a, ta hong suaksak Kha na ngah uh hi. Tua Kha in, “Abbaɠ, Pa aw,” hong cisak hi.
45008016	Pasian tate i hih lam tua Kha in eite kha tawh teci a pangkhawm hi.
45008017	Tate i hih leh innluahte i hi a, Pasian innluahte le Khazih tawh innluahkhawmte i hi hi. Khazih tawh i thuakkhop takpi leh amah tawh minthanna i ngahkhawm ding hi.
45008018	Tu laitak a i thuak gimnate ka ngaihsut ciangin eite tungah a hong kilakkhia ding minthanna tawh tehkaktham ka sa kei hi.
45008019	A kipiangsak na khempeuh in Pasian tate a kilat ding hun a ngaklah mahmah uh hi.
45008020	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipiangsak na khempeuh siattheihna nuai ah a om hi. Amaute utthu a om hilo in a koihpa in ama thu tawh a koih hi zaw a,
45008021	a kipiangsak nate in muattheihna kol panin kikhahkhia a, Pasian tate suahtakna thupi sungah kikoih ding hi cih lametna tawh a om uh hi.
45008022	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipiangsak na khempeuh in nupi nausuak ding a gim bangin tu dongin thum le tau in a om uh hi cih i thei hi.
45008023	Amaute bek hilo in Kha gah masa a nei eite nangawn i pumpi hong tankhia a, tate hong suahsak ding hun ngaklah in i lungsim sungah khuisa in i om hi.
45008024	Lametna sungah eite hotkhiat i hi hi. Ahi zongin i muh khitsa na khat lametna in lametna ahi kei hi. Kua in a muh khitsa na khat lamen theinawn ding ahi hiam?
45008025	Ahi zongin i muh nailoh na khat i lamet ciangin thuak keikai in i ngak hi.
45008026	Tuamah bangin Kha in zong eite thanemnate a hong huh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite in thungetzia ding nangawn i thei kei hi. Ahi zongin Kha mahmah in a kilokhia theilo tauna tawh thu hong ngetsak hi.
45008027	Tu in lungsim sung a zongpa in Kha lungsim zong thei a, tua Kha in Pasian deihna tawh kituak in misiangthote aa dingin thu a hong ngetsak hi.
45008028	Ama gelna bangin a sap Pasian a it mite aa dingin, amah in na khempeuh a hoih dingin a kituak in piangsak hi cih i thei hi.
45008029	Banghang hiam cihleh a Tapa in sanggam tampite lakah ta upapen a suah theih nadingin Pasian in a theihkholhsa mite mah ama Tapa lim le mel a sun dingin a sehkhol hi.
45008030	Tua banah a sehkholhsa mite a sam hi. A sapsa mite dik a tangsak hi. Dik a tansak mite minthanna a pia hi.
45008031	Hihteng banah bang i genlai ding hiam? Pasian ei lamah a pan nak leh eite langah kua pang zo ding ahi hiam?
45008032	A Tapa takpi itsik loin eite khempeuh aa dinga hong piakhiapa in na khempeuh zong manngen loin a Tapa tawh hong piakhawm loin om ding ahi hiam?
45008033	Pasian teelsa mite dik a tangsakpa in Pasian ahih manin amaute kua in mawhsak zo ding ahi hiam?
45008034	Mawhsakna thu a khen kua ahi hiam? Khazih in a sipa bek hilo in a thokikpa zong hi a, Pasian taklam ah omin eite aa dingin a hong thumsakpa zong ahi hi.
45008035	Khazih hong itna tawh kua in eite hong kikhensak zo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna ahi a, gentheihna ahi a, bawlsiatna ahi a, kialpi ahi a, puan neihlohna ahi a, manthanna ahi a, namsaute ahi zongin tuate in a hong kikhensak zo kei ding hi.
45008036	“Nangma hangin sun thapai in thahna ka thuak uh a, A kigo ding tuute bangin hong kingaihsun hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi.
45008037	Ahi zongin eite hong itpa hangin hihte khempeuh tungah a gualzopente i hi hi.
45008038	Sihna, nuntakna, vantungmite, zalianpente, a vangliante, tu laitak a om nate le hong pianglai ding nate,
45008039	a sang nate, a thuk nate le a kipiangsak nate khat beekin i Topa Khazih Zeisu sunga om Pasian hong itna tawh hong kikhensak zolo ding hi cih ka theitel hi.
45009001	Ka lungsimtawng in Kha Siangtho sungah teci a pan mah bangin zuaugen hetlo in Khazih sungah maantak a kong gen thu in,
45009002	ka lungsim sungah dahna lianpi le lungsim gimna ka thuak niloh hi.
45009003	Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa in ka sanggam ka mipih Israel mite tangin Khazih tawh kikhen in samsiatna a thuakthei ding hi leng ka ut hi.
45009004	Tate suahsakna, minthanna, thuciamnate le thukham piakna, Pasian nasepna le kamciamte amaute aa ahi hi.
45009005	Amaute in pu le pate suan le khakte hi uh a, ci le sa tawh kisai in Khazih zong amaute sung panin a piang ahi hi. Tua Khazih in na khempeuh tunga thunei a tawntung in a kiphat Pasian ahi hi. Amen.
45009006	Ahi zongin Pasian thu a kiplo ahi kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israel suante khempeuh Israel mi taktak ahi kim kei uh hi.
45009007	Abraham panin a piang ahih hangun Abraham tate taktak ahi kim kei uh hi. Pasian in, “Isaac panin a piangte bek nangma suan le khak kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009008	Ci le sa panin a piang tate Pasian tate taktak hilo in kamciamna panin a piang tate bek suan le khakin a kisim hi.
45009009	Kamciamna in, “A kiseh hun hong tun ciangin kong pai dinga, Sarah in tapa khat a nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009010	Tua bek hilo in, Rebecca tate zong a pa uh a kibang hi a, ka pupi uh Isaac ahi hi.
45009011	Ahi zongin, amaute a teelna tawh kisai in Pasian gelna le tupna pen mihing sepna hang hilo a sampa hangin a tangtung ahih theih nadingin amaute a suahma, a sia a pha bangmah a bawlma un,
45009012	Pasian in Rebecca kiangah, “A uzaw pa in a nauzaw pa sila a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009013	Hih in, “Jacob ka it a, Esau ka mudah hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhna tawh a kituak ahi hi.
45009014	Tua ahih leh bang gennawn ding i hi hiam? Pasian thumaanlo ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi!
45009015	Amah in Moses kiangah, “Ka hehpih nopte ka hehpih dinga, ka lainat nopte ka lainat ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009016	Hih bang ahih manin mihing lunggulhna le mihing hanciamna tungah kinga loin Pasian hehpihna tung bekah a kinga hi.
45009017	Lai Siangtho in Pharaoh kiangah, “Ka vangliatna nang tungah kilang in leitung khempeuh ah ka min a kitangko theih nadingin nang kong lamto hi,” a ci hi.
45009018	Tua ahih manin amah in a hehpih nopte hehpih in a lungkhauhsak nopte a lungkhauhsak hi.
45009019	Tua ahih leh, “Banghang in Pasian in mite hong mawhsak thei veve ahi hiam? Kua in ama deihna nial zo ngei ahi hiam?” nong ci kha thei ding uh hi.
45009020	Hi mah hi. Ahi zongin, Pasian kam a dawngngam mi aw, nang in kua na hi hiam? A kibawl na khatin a bawlpa tungah, “Banghang in hih banga kei hong bawl na hi hiam?” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
45009021	Belsekpa in tungman lomkhat panin bel hoih le bel hoihlo sek theih nading thu nei hilo ahi hiam?
45009022	Pasian in a hehna lakin a vangliatna a kitheih nading a deihna tawh suksiat dingin a koihkholhsa, ama hehna a ngah belte lungduaitak in thuak keikai ahih leh eite in bang awlmawh ding i hi hiam?
45009023	Pasian in minthanna a piak dingin a koihkholhsa, ama hehpihna a ngah belte tungah ama vangliatna tawh kizui hauhna a theihsak theih nading ahi hi.
45009024	Tua belte in Judah mite lak pan bek hilo in Gentile‑te lak panin zong hong sapkhiat eite mah hilo i hi hiam?
45009025	Amah in Hosea Lai Siangtho sungah zong hih bangin a gen hi, “Ka mi a hilote, ‘ka mite’ ka ci dinga, Ka itloh mi zong, ‘ka it mi’ hi ka ci ding hi.
45009026	Tua ciangin hih bang a hong hi ding hi. ‘Ka mite na hi kei uh hi,’ ka cihna munah, ‘A nungta Pasian tate na hi uh hi,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009027	Israel mite tawh kisai in Isaiah zong kiko a, “Israel tate a tamzia uh, Tuipi gei‑a sehnel zah a phak uh hangin, A omlai teng bekin, Hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
45009028	Topa in ama thukhenna leitung ah Manlangtak le kicingtak in semkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009029	Hih thu a beisa huna Isaiah genna tawh a kituak hi. Amah in, “Vantung galkap honpite Topa in eite aa dingin, Suan le khak khat hong sitsak lo hileh Sodom khua mite i bang khinzo dinga, Gomorrah khua mite bangin hong kibawl khinzo ding hi,” a ci hi.
45009030	Tua ahih leh bang gennawn ding i hi hiam? Dikna thu a delhlo Gentile‑te in upna hanga kingah dikna a ngah uh hi.
45009031	Ahi zongin dikna thukham a delh Israel mite in tua dikna a ngah kei uh hi.
45009032	Banghang in ngah lo uh ahi hiam? Upna tawh zong loin thukham zuihna tawh a zon man uh hi a,
45009033	“En un, palkhak suangpi ahi, Pukna suangpi khat Zion ah ka koih a, Amah a um mi khempeuh Maizumna a kithuaksak kei ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho ah a kigelh mah bangin tua palkhak suangpi a pal kha uh ahi hi.
45010001	Sanggamte aw, Israel mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh deihsak mahmah in Pasian tungah thu ka ngetsak hi.
45010002	Pasian aa dingin hanciam mahmah uh hi cih teci ka pang hi. Ahi zongin a hanciamna uh theihna tungah a kinga kei hi.
45010003	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian dikna thei lo uh ahih manin amaute dikna bulphuh sawm uh a, Pasian dikna a mang kei uh hi.
45010004	Banghang hiam cihleh a um mi khempeuh in dikna a ngah theih nadingin Khazih in thukham tawpna ahi hi.
45010005	Moses in thukham hangin a piang dikna thu a gelhna ah, “Thukham a zuimi in tua thukham zuihna hangin a nungta ding hi,” a ci hi.
45010006	Ahih hangin upna tawh a kingah dikna in a gen in ah, “Na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantung ah kua kahto ding ahi hiam?’ ci kei in.” (Hih thu in Khazih lasuk ding cihna ahi hi.)
45010007	Ahih keileh, “ ‘A thukpi sungah kua kumsuk ding ahi hiam?’ ci kei in.” (Hih in misite lak pan Khazih lato ding cihna ahi hi.)
45010008	Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho in bangci gen ahi hiam? “Ama thu in note tawh kinai mahmah a, note kamsung le note lungsim sungah a om hi,” a ci hi. Tua thu in kote hong tangko upna thu ahi hi.
45010009	Zeisu in Topa ahi hi ci in na kam tawh pulak a, Pasian in misite lak panin amah thokiksak hi ci in na lungsim sungah na up leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding hi.
45010010	Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim a upna in dikna hong ngahsak a, kam tawh pulakna in hotkhiatna a piangsak hi.
45010011	Lai Siangtho sungah, “Amah a um mi khempeuh in maizumna a kithuaksak kei ding hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
45010012	Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite le Greek mite a kilamdanna a om kei hi. Topa pen mi khempeuh Topa mah hi a, amah a sam mi khempeuh tungah kicingtak in hehpihna a pia hi.
45010013	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Topa min tawh huhna a ngen mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.”
45010014	Tua bang ahih leh a uploh mipa uh bangci bangin suang thei ding uh ahi hiam? A thu a zak ngeiloh mipa uh bangci bangin um thei ding uh ahi hiam? A hilh om kei leh bangci bangin za thei ding uh ahi hiam?
45010015	A sawl om kei leh bangci bangin hilh thei ding uh ahi hiam? “Nopna hong pia lungdamna thu hong tangko, Lungdamna thu hoih hong puak mite, A khe uh kilawm mahmah hi!” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
45010016	Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in lungdamna thu a um kim kei uh hi. Isaiah in, “Topa aw, kote tangkona kua in um ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
45010017	Tua bangin upna in thu zakna panin hong piang a, thu zakna in Pasian kammal panin a hong piang hi.
45010018	Ahi zongin ken kong cih in ah amaute in za lo uh ahi hiam? A za khinzo taktak uh hi. “Amaute awging, Leitung bup ah kiza khinzo a, Amau thugente leimong dongah kizel khin hi.”
45010019	Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah Israel mite in thei lo uh ahi hiam? A masa pen in Moses in, “Keima mipawl a hilo mite tungtawn in, Note sungah hazatna ka piangsak dinga, A theilo minamte tungtawn in, Note kong hehsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
45010020	Isaiah in hangtak in a gen inah, “Kei hong zong lote in hong mu uh a, Kei hong kan lote tungah ka kilak hi,” a ci hi.
45010021	Ahih hangin amah in Israel mite tungah, “A thumanglo le A genhak minamte aa dingin Sun thapai in ka khut ka zan den hi,” a ci hi.
45011001	Tua ahih leh Pasian in a mite nawlkhin ahi hiam ci in ka dong hi. A nawlkhin peuhmah kei hi! Keimah tektek zong Abraham suan, Benjamin phung sung panin a piang Israel mi ka hi hi.
45011002	Pasian in a theihkholh khitsa a mite a nawlkhin kei hi. Elijah in Pasian tungah Israel mite a khiatna thu Lai Siangtho in a gen theilo na hi uh hiam?
45011003	Amah in, “Topa aw, amaute in na kamsangte that khin uh a, na biaknataute zong a susia khin uh hi. Kei bek ka omlai a, kei zong thah ding a hong sawmlai uh hi,” a ci hi.
45011004	Tua ciangin Pasian in bangci dawnkik ahi hiam? “Baal milim mai ah kunin a bialo mihing 7,000 kei aa dingin ka sit lai hi,” a ci hi.
45011005	Tuamah bangin tu in zong Pasian in a hehpihna tawh kizui in a teel a omlai mi pawlkhat a om hi.
45011006	Hehpihna hang ahih leh gamtatna hang ahi nawn kei hi. Tua hi kei leh hehpihna pen hehpihna a suak nawn kei hi. Gamtatna hang hi leh hehpihna ahi nawn kei hi. Tua hi kei leh nasepna zong nasepna a suak nawn kei hi.
45011007	Tua ahih leh i gen bang ahi hiam? Israel mite in a zonzon uh a ngah kei uh hi. Pasian teel mite bekin ngah uh a, a dangteng ahih leh a mit uh a taw hi.
45011008	Hih thu Lai Siangtho ah, “Pasian in thu a theitheilo lungsim, Khua a mu theilo mittang, Khua a za theilo bilte, Tuni dongin a neisak hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
45011009	David in zong, “Amau ankuangte, amaute aa dingin, Thang le tehlop suak henla, A kipalkhakna uh suakin, Thuhkikna suak tahen.
45011010	Khua a muh theihloh nadingun, Pasian in a mit uh mialsak henla, A nung uh kulsak den tahen,” a ci hi.
45011011	Tua ahih leh amaute a puk dingin kipal kha uh ahi hiam ci in ka dong hi. Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Amaute thupalsatna hangin Gentile‑te tungah hotkhiatna tung a, amaute in a een nadingun a piangsak hi.
45011012	Tu in amaute pukna in leitung mite hauhna suak a, amaute supna in Gentile‑te aa dingin hauhna suak ahih leh amaute kicinna in bangzahtak in nasia zawlai ding ahi hiam!
45011013	Gentile‑te sawltakpa ka hihna tawh no Gentile‑te tunga kong gen inah,
45011014	ka mipihte lungsim sungah lamkhat peuhpeuh tawh eenna piangsak in amaute pawlkhat beek ka hotkhiat theih khak leh ka cih manin ka nasepna a hong thupi gen ka hi hi.
45011015	Amaute a kipampaihna hangin leitung mite tawh kilemkikna piangsak ahih leh amaute a kisankikna in sihna pan nuntakna longal thu dang bang hi ding ahi hiam?
45011016	Banghang hiam cihleh a gah masa pen a siantho leh a kungpi zong a siangtho hi. A zungpi a siantho leh a hiangte zong a siangtho hi.
45011017	A hiangte pawlkhat kisatkhia in tuate tungah gamlak tanluan sing ahi nang hong kipeh a, amaute tawh tanluan zung le tanluan kung panin an hoihte na ngahkhawm hi.
45011018	Tua ahih manin tua a hiangte tungah kisathei kha kei in. Ahi zongin na kisaktheih leh nang in a zung pua loin a zungin nang hong pua zaw hi cih phawk in.
45011019	“Kei hong kipeh theih nadingin a hiangte kisatkhia hi,” na cinuam kha ding hi.
45011020	Hi mah hi. Amaute in a up loh manun a kisatkhia hi a, nang na hih leh upna tawh a kip na hih manin kiphasak kei inla lauthawng zaw in.
45011021	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a hiang taktakte nangawn zah lo ahih leh nang zong a hong zah tuan kei ding hi.
45011022	Tua ahih manin Pasian migitna le a thukhauhna ngaihsun in. A puk mite tungah amah a thukhauh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian migitna sungah na omsuak leh nangma tungah a hong migi ding hi. Tua bang na hih kei leh amah in nang zong a hong satkhia ding hi.
45011023	Amaute zong um loin a omsuak kei nak uh leh Pasian in pehkik thei ahih manin a pehkik ding hi.
45011024	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in gamlak tanluan kung pan nang hong satkhia in nangma pianzia tawh kilehbulh in tanluan kungah nang hong peh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in tanluan hiang taktak ahi amaute a kung tungah pehkik zaw peuhmah ding hilo ahi hiam?
45011025	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, no ngaihsuttawmna ah pil na kisak khakloh nadingun hih thusim thei lo a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Tua in, Gentile‑te kicinna hong tun mateng in Israel mite tungah tawlkhat sung mittawtna a om hi.
45011026	Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Zion khuapi panin Honpa hong pai dinga, Jacob suan sung panin Pasian a uplohna uh A heikhiatsak ding hi.
45011027	A mawhnate uh ka lakkhiatsak ciangin, Amaute tunga ka bawl ding thuciamna in hih thu mah ahi hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
45011028	Amaute in lungdamna thu tawh kisai in note hangin Pasian galte a suak uh hi. Ahih hangin teelna tawh kisai in a pute a pate uh hangin Pasian it mite ahi uh hi.
45011029	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian letsong le a sapna pen a kilaih thei kei hi.
45011030	Banghang hiam cihleh nidang in Pasian thu a manglo note in amaute thumanlohna hangin tu in hehpihna na ngah uh hi.
45011031	Tuamah bangin note ngah hehpihna hangin amaute in hehpihna a ngah theih nadingun tu in amaute zong thumang loin a om uh ahi hi.
45011032	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in mi khempeuh a hehpih theih nadingin thumanlohna sungah amaute khempeuh a khum hi.
45011033	Aw! Pasian pilna le a thu theihna thuk in kicing zen mah si ee! Ama thukhenzia theih khit zawh ding hilo a, ama sulnung kankhiat zawh ding hilo hi!
45011034	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Kua in Topa lungsim thei a, Ahih keileh amah in kua tawh thu kikum ngei ahi hiam?”
45011035	“Tua ahih keileh Pasian in a thuhkik dingin, Kua in amah pia masa ahi hiam?”
45011036	Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh ama hang leh ama tungtawn in a piang hi a, ama aa ding vive ahi hi. Amah in pahtawina ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
45012001	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian hehpihna hanga kong kut in ah na pumpi uh a hing biakpiakna, a siangtho le Pasian san theih dingin pia un. Hih in note sep dingin a kilawm biakna nasep ahi hi.
45012002	Hih leitung mite gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh thaksuaksak in na kikhel un. Tua hi leh a hoih, a sanhuai a kicing Pasian deihna bang ahi hiam cih na theitel ding uh hi.
45012003	Banghang hiam cihleh kei hong kipia hehpihna tungtawn in note khempeuh tunga kong gen in ah no le no ahi ding zahval in na kingaihsun kha kei un. Pasian in mikim tungah a hong piak upna zah tawh kizui in a kilawm a kituak in kingaihsun un.
45012004	Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi tungah na tampi i nei hi. Tua nate a vekpi un a nasep uh a kibang khin kei hi.
45012005	Tuamah bangin eite in mi tampi i hih hangin Khazih sungah pum khat i hi a, eite khat ciatin pumpi nate i hi hi.
45012006	Pasian in eite hong piak hehpihna tawh kizui in letsong a tuamtek i ngahte zatsiam ciat ni. Pasian thu genkhiat theihna i ngah leh upna tawh kituak in thu gen ni.
45012007	Nasepna za i ngah leh i ngah nasep sem ni. Thuhilh theihna a ngah mi in thuhilh nasep sem hen.
45012008	Hanthot theihna a ngah mi in hanthot nasep sem hen. A piakhia mi in cinghtak in pia hen. A makai mi in kuhkaltak in makaih hen. A hehpih thei mi in lungdamtak in hehpihna lak hen.
45012009	Lungsim takpi tawh ki‑it un. Thusia mudah unla, thuhoih lenkip un.
45012010	Unau banga ki‑itna tawh khat le khat ki‑it kingai mahmah un. Nang sangin midangte pahtawi zaw in.
45012011	Nasep thadah loin lawpna lungsim tawh Topa na sem un.
45012012	Lametna tawh kipak un. Haksat hun ciangin thuak keikai un. Thungetna ah citak un.
45012013	Mi siangthote kisapnate huh unla, zindo thanuam un.
45012014	Hong bawlsiate thupha pia un. Amaute hamsiat loin thupha pia zaw un.
45012015	A lungdamte lungdampih unla, a kapte kahpih un.
45012016	Khat leh khat na ngaihsutna uh kibangsak un. Kiphasak loin a dinmun uh a niam mite tawh kikhawl zaw un. Kipilsak kei un.
45012017	Thusia pen thusia mah tawh thukkik kei un. Mi khempeuh muhna ah thuman in gamtat ding ngaihsun un.
45012018	Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem un.
45012019	Kong itte aw, phu na kila kei unla, thangpaihna pen Pasian aa hi sak zaw un. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Phulakna in keima aa hi a, keimah in ka thukkik ding hi,” Topa in ci hi ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
45012020	Tua ahih manin, “Na galpa a gilkial leh an pia in. A dangtak leh dawn ding tui pia in. Tua bangin hih leteh a luzang ah mei‑am a koih na hi ding hi.”
45012021	Thusia kizosak kei inla, thusiate thupha tawh zo zaw in.
45013001	Kuama peuh in kumpi thuneite thu mang uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian piak loh in thuneihna om theilo ahih manin ukna thu a nei mite in Pasian koih ahi uh hi.
45013002	Tua ahih manin ukna thu a nialte in Pasian thu sehna a nial ahi uh hi. Tua banga a nial mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.
45013003	A hoih in a gamtate aa dingin gam ukte kihtak nading thu om lo hi. A hoihlo a gamtate aa dingin a kihtakhuai ahi hi. Hong uk mite kihtakna panin na suakta nuam hiam? Na suahtak nop leh gamtat hoih lecin amaute in nang hong pahtawi ding uh hi.
45013004	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in nang hoih nadingin Pasian nasem ahi hi. Ahi zongin a hoihlo in na gamtat leh amah kihta in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in namsau a mawk tawi hilo a, gamtat hoihlo mite tungah daanpia dingin Pasian nasem ahi hi.
45013005	Tua ahih manin ukna a nei mite a heh ding launa bek tawh hilo in lungsim a theihtawmna tawh ukna thu na man ding uh ahi hi.
45013006	Amaute in tua nasep a sem Pasian nasemte ahih manun phiangsiah zong na piak ding uh ahi hi.
45013007	Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh amaute ngah dinga kilawm bangin pia un. Siah ngah dinga kilawmte siah na pia unla, mangmu ngah dinga kilawmte mangmu na pia un. Kihtak dingte kihta unla, pahtawi dingte pahtawi un.
45013008	Khat le khat ki‑itna longal kuamah leii na kibasak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh midang a itte in thukham a zui khin ahi hi.
45013009	“Angkawm kei in,” “Mi that kei in,” “Guta kei in,” “A maanlo teci pang kei in,” “Deihgawh kei in,” cih thupiakte a kipan a dang thupiak khempeuh, “Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,” cih thupiakna in a huam khin hi.
45013010	Ki‑itna in a vengpa siat nading bangmah a bawl kei hi. Tua ahih manin ki‑itna in thukham kicinna ahi hi.
45013011	Tuhun in bang hun hiam cih thei unla, ihmutna panin khanlawh hun mahmah ta ahihlam thei un. Banghang hiam cihleh i upcil lai sangin eite hotkhiatna tu in hong nai zawta hi.
45013012	Zan hun saupi bei khinzo a, khua hong vak dekta hi. Tua ahih manin khuamial gamtatnate paikhia in khuavak galvante silh ni.
45013013	Sun hun sunga om bangin a kilawm a kituak in gamta ni. Uangtatna, zunek zukhamna, hukna lanna, kitot kiselna le kihazatnate omsak kei ni.
45013014	Ahih hangin ci le sa lunggulhnate tangtungsak dingin bangmah lunggel kei unla, Topa Zeisu Khazih na silh un.
45014001	Upna thu ah a thanem mi na sang unla, upkhialh nading thute ah tua mi tawh na kikum kei un.
45014002	Mi pawlkhat in an khat peuhpeuh nek theih ding hi ci in um uh a, pawlkhatte in ahih leh upna thu ah thanem uh ahih manin gah le teh bek a ne uh hi.
45014003	A ne mi in a nelo mi neumuh kei henla, a nelo mi in a ne mi tungah thukhen kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a ne mi zong a sang veve hi.
45014004	Midang khat nasempa tungah thu a khen dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Amah a puk nading leh a kip nading ama topa tawh a kisai hi. A taktak in amah a kipsak theipa in Pasian ahih manin a kipsak ding hi.
45014005	Mi khatin ni khat sangin nidang khat thupi zaw hi ci in a ngaihsun hi. A dang khatin ni khempeuh a kibang hi ci in a ngaihsun hi. Mi khempeuh in ama lungsim ah limtak in theitel hen.
45014006	Ni a tang mi in Topa hangin a tang hi a, a tanglo mi in zong Topa hang mahin a tang lo ahi hi. A ne mi in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahih manin Topa hangin a ne hi. A nelo mi in zong Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahih manin Topa hang mahin a ne kei hi.
45014007	Banghang hiam cihleh eite khat beek ei aa dingin a nungta i om kei a, ei aa dingin a si zong kuamah i om kei hi.
45014008	I nuntak leh Topa aa dingin a nungta i hi a, i sih leh zong Topa aa dingin a si i hi hi. Tua ahih manin i nungta a, i si zongin Topa aa mah i hi hi.
45014009	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in a si mite le a nungta mite Topa, a suah nadingin si a, thokik in a nungta hi.
45014010	Banghang in na sanggampa tungah thukhen na hi hiam? Ahih keileh banghang in na sanggampa neumuh na hi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh eite khempeuh Khazih thukhenna tokhom mai ah i ding ciat ding hi.
45014011	Lai Siangtho ah, “Keimah nungta ka hih manin Ka mai ah mi khempeuh khukdin ding uh a, Leii khempeuh in Pasian tungah Kiciamna a nei ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
45014012	Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh in eima vaitek Pasian tungah i piaciat ding hi.
45014013	Tua ahih manin khat le khat thu kikhen nawn kei ni. Na sanggampa in a palkhak theih ding le amah a puksak thei ding lampi ah bangmah na koih loh nadingin na lungsim ah khentat zaw in.
45014014	Topa Zeisu sunga om mi khat ka hihna tawh kong gen in ah an khempeuh amau thu in a sianglo cih bang a om kei hi ci in ka tel mahmah hi. Ahi zongin mi khatin na khatpeuh a sianglo in a ngaihsut leh ama aa dingin a sianglo ahi hi.
45014015	Na annekna tawh na sanggam khat a lungsim na natsak leh itna tawh a gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Ama tangin Khazih in a sihlawh mi khat, na annekna tawh siasak kei in.
45014016	Tua ahih manin na hoihna a kigensiat ding phal kei in.
45014017	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in nek le dawn thute hilo a, Kha Siangtho sunga dikna, lungmuanna le lungdamnate ahi hi.
45014018	Hih thute zui a Khazih na a sem mite in Pasian santak le mite in zong a thukimpih uh ahi hi.
45014019	Tua ahih manin kilem nading thute le khat le khat i kilamkip theih nading thute delh ni.
45014020	Nek le dawn thu tawh Pasian nasepna siasak kei ni. An khempeuh a siangtho hi. Ahi zongin mi khat puk nadingin an a ne mi in a khial ahi hi.
45014021	Na sanggam khat a puksak, a hehsak, a thanemsak ding ahih leh sa nekna, lenggahzu dawnna, a dang na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin na nek loh ding hoih hi.
45014022	Hih thute tawh kisai in na upna nangmah le Pasian kikal thu hi sak in. Amah in maan a sak thu hangin amah le amah a kimawhsaklo mi in mihampha ahi hi.
45014023	Ahih hangin lunghei neipi in a nek leh amah le amah a kikhialsak hi a, upna tawh a ne hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh upna tawh a hilo na khat peuhpeuh hihna in mawhna ahi hi.
45015001	Tua ahih manin a thahat eite in eima nopsak bangin om loin a thanem mite zawngkhalnate i puakpih ding ahi hi.
45015002	A kua maciat in i vengte hoih nading le a kilamkip nading uh semin amaute lungkimsak ni.
45015003	Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nang hong zahko mite hong zahkonateng ka tungah hong tu hi,” ci in a kigelh mah bangin Khazih nangawn ama nopsak bangin a om kei hi.
45015004	A beisa huna kigelh thu khempeuh eite hong kithuhilh nadingin a kigelhkhol ahi hi. Hihin Lai Siangtho tungtawn a thuakzawhhatna le hehnepna tawh lametna i neih theih nading ahi hi.
45015005	Tu in thuakzawhhatna le hehnepna Pasian in Khazih Zeisu hangin khat le khat lungsim kituak dingin hong guan tahen.
45015006	Tua bangin lungsim khat, kampau khat tawh Topa Zeisu Khazih ii Pa, Pasian min hong phatsak thei tahen.
45015007	Tua ahih manin Pasian min a than theih nadingin Khazih in eite a hong san mah bangin note zong khat le khat na kisang un.
45015008	Tu in i pu i pate tunga a kamciamsate a kipsak dingin Pasian thumaanna hangin Zeisu Khazih in vunat mite nasempa a hong suahna thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
45015009	Hih in Gentile‑te in hehpihna hangin Pasian a phat theih nading uh ahi hi. Hih in Lai Siangtho sungah, “Hih thu hangin Gentile‑te lakah Na min ka pulak dinga, Na min phatin la ka sa ding hi,” ci a, a kigelhsa thu ahi hi.
45015010	Tua banah amah in, “No, Gentile‑te aw, Ama mite tawh lungdam khawm un!” a cikik hi.
45015011	Tua banah, “No, Gentile‑te khempeuh aw, Topa phat un! No, mi khempeuh aw, Ama min phat un!” a cikik hi.
45015012	Tua banah Isaiah in zong, “Jesse panin zung khat hong meng dinga, Gentile‑te a uk dingin Amah hong khangkhia ding hi. Gentile‑te in ama sungah lametna a nei ding uh hi,” a cikik hi.
45015013	Tu in, Kha Siangtho vangliatna hangin tua lametna tawh na kidim nadingun lametna Pasian in note upna tungtawn in kipahna le lungmuanna namkim tawh hong dim tahen.
45015014	Tu in ka sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh, hoihna tawh kidim in thu theihna ah kicing in khat le khat thu a kihilh thei dingin kong muang hi.
45015015	Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Pasian hong piak hehpihna hangin kong phawksak nop thu pawlkhat hangtak in kong gelh hi.
45015016	Gentile‑te aa dingin Zeisu Khazih nasempa khat ka suak a, Pasian lungdamna thu ka gen hi. Tua in Gentile‑te Kha Siangtho tawh kisiansuah a, Pasian mai ah a santak biakpiakna a suah theih nading uh ahi hi.
45015017	Tua ahih ciangin Pasian tawh kisai in Khazih Zeisu hangin ka kisialh theih nading thu khat ka nei hi.
45015018	Banghang hiam cihleh Gentile‑te in Pasian thu a man theih nadingun ka thugente le ka sepnate ah Khazih in kei tungtawn in a sepkhiat khit sate lobuang a dang bangmah ka genngam kei ding hi.
45015019	Amah in tua bangin Pasian Kha vangliatna tawh kei tungtawn in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite tawh na a sem hi. Tua ahih manin Jerusalem khuapi a kipan Illyricum gam tengah zinin Khazih lungdamna thu cingtak in ka hilh khinzo hi.
45015020	Midangte phuhsa khuambul tungah ka lam khakloh nadingin Khazih min a kizak ngeinai lohna munte bekah lungdamna thu tangko ding ka tup ahi hi.
45015021	Hih tawh kisai Lai Siangtho sungah, “Ama thu a kihilh ngeinai lohna mite in mu ding uh a, Ama thu a za ngei nailo mite in theitel ding uh hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
45015022	Hih thu hangin note kianga kong pai ding tam veipi kikhaktan hi.
45015023	Ahi zongin tu in hih lamah ka seplohna mun a om nawnloh banah note kong muhnop zong kum tampi sawtzo ahih manin,
45015024	Spain gam ka zin peuhpeuh ciangin note kiang hong tawnin note tawh a kimu dingin ka kilamen hi. Note tawh tawmvei sung i omkhop khit ciangin note huhna tawh a zinsuak thei dingin zong ka kilamen hi.
45015025	Ahi zongin tu tadih in Jerusalem khuapi a om misiangthote kiangah nasem dingin ka paiphot ding hi.
45015026	Banghang hiam cihleh Macedonia gam le Achaia gam mite in Jerusalem khuapi a om misiangthote laka mi cimawhte huhna piak ding a lungkim uh hi.
45015027	Macedonia gam le Achaia gam mite in amaute tungah leiba nei in kingaihsun uh a, a lungdam mahmah uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Gentile‑te in Judah mite in a ngah uh khalam thute sanpih uh ahih manin amaute in zong leitung thute tawh Judah mite a huhkik ding mah uh ahi hi.
45015028	Tua ahih manin hih huhnate amaute khut sungah bittak in ka ap khit ciangin note kiang hong tawnin Spain gamah ka pai ding hi.
45015029	Note kiang kong nawk ciangin Khazih lungdamna thupha a dimtak tawh kong tung ding hi cih ka thei hi.
45015030	Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Topa Zeisu Khazih le Kha tungtawn a ki‑itna tawh kong thumnop in ah Pasian kiangah kei aa dingin thu hong ngetsak in hong panpih un.
45015031	Judea gama thu‑umlo mite khut sung ka tun loh nading le Jerusalem a misiangthote in ka nasepna a hong san theih nading ahi zongin
45015032	Pasian deihna a om leh note kiangah lungdamtak in hong pai in note tawh tha thak ka ngahkhop theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
45015033	Tu in kilemna Pasian in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
45016001	Cenchrea khua‑a pawlpi nasem i sanggamnu Phoebe mi hoih ahihlam kong theisak nuam hi.
45016002	Mi siangthote hih dinga kilawm bangin Topa hangin amah na sang unla, huh ding a kisapna peuhpeuh ah na huh un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mi tampi huh a, kei zong a hong huh hi.
45016003	Khazih Zeisu sunga ka naseppih Priscilla le Aquila‑te na hopihsak un.
45016004	Amaute in ka nuntakna a hut nadingun a ngawng uh a dawh ngamte ahi uh hi. Kei bek hilo in Gentile pawlpite khempeuh zong amau tungah a lungdam uh hi.
45016005	Tuamah bangin amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi mite zong na hopihsak un. Ka it mahmah Epaenetus na hopihsak un. Amah in Achaia gam sungah Khazih aa dingin a gah masa pen ahi hi.
45016006	Kote aa dingin nakpitak in na a sem Mary na hopihsak un.
45016007	Ka mipihte le ka thongkiatpihte ahi Andronicus le Junia‑te zong na hopihsak un. Amaute in sawltakte lakah a min kidawkte hi uh a, kei sangin zong Khazih sungah a om masa zawte ahi uh hi.
45016008	Topa sunga ka it Amplias na hopihsak un.
45016009	Khazih sunga kote naseppih Urbanus le ka it Stachys na hopihsak un.
45016010	Pasian in Khazih sunga a sittel le a san khitsa Apelles na hopihsak un. Aristobulus le a innkuanpih teng zong na hopihsak un.
45016011	Ka mipihpa Herodion na hopihsak un. Topa sunga om Narcissus le a innkuanpih teng zong na hopihsak un.
45016012	Topa nasep a hahkat Tryphena le Tryphosa na hopihsak un. Topa nasep a hahkat mahmah ka it Persis zong na hopihsak un.
45016013	Topa sunga teel khitsa Rufus le nu banga ka neih ama nu zong na hopihsak un.
45016014	Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes le amaute tawh a omkhawm sanggamte zong na hopihsak un.
45016015	Philologus, Julia, Nereus le a sanggamnu a kipan Olympas le amaute tawh a omkhawm misiangthote khempeuh na hopihsak un.
45016016	A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat na kihopih un. Khazih pawlpite in note a hong hopih uh hi.
45016017	Tu in sanggamte aw, na sansa uh thuhilhna tawh a kilehbulh thute hong hilh a, kikhenna le pukna a piangsak mite thei unla na pelh un, ci in kong hanthawn hi.
45016018	Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang mite in i Topa Zeisu Khazih na sem hilo uh a, amaute gilpi aa dingin nasemte ahi uh hi. Kamsiam le kamzol tawh lungsim hoih mite a khem uh hi.
45016019	Pasian thu na zuihna uh mun khempeuh ah thang ahih manin note hangin ka lungdam hi. Ahi zongin thu hoihte ah mipilte hi unla, thusiate ah mawhna bang loin na om ding uh kong deih hi.
45016020	Nopna hong pia Pasian in a sawtlo in Satan tuancil in note khenuai ah a koih ding hi. Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.
45016021	Ka naseppih Timothy, ka mipih Lucius, Jason le Sosipater‑te in note hong hopih uh hi.
45016022	Hih laikhak a gelh keimah Tertius in, Topa sunga om note khempeuh kong hopih hi.
45016023	Ka zinpa le pawlpi buppi inntekpipa ahi Gaius in note a hong hopih hi. Khuapi sumkempa Erastus le i sanggampa khat mah ahi, Quartus‑te in zong note a hong hopih uh hi.
45016024	Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
45016025	Tu in, kong hilh lungdamna thu, Zeisu Khazih thu tangkona ahi lei piancil a kipan a ki‑iimcip thusim kilakkhiatna tawh kizui in, note a hong kipsak zopa in Pasian ahi hi.
45016026	Tu in tawntung Pasian thupiakna tawh kamsangte laigelhna tungtawn in minam khempeuh in upna tawh thu a man theih nadingun hih thu ki‑iimcip a hong kilang zo hi.
45016027	Amah khat bek a pil ahi tua Pasian in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in minthang tawntung tahen. Amen.
46001001	Pasian deihna banga Zeisu Khazih sawltak dinga hong kisam keimah Paul le i sanggampa Sosthenes in,
46001002	Khazih Zeisu sunga a kisiangthosak, misiangthote ci a, kisam Corinth khua‑a om Pasian pawlpi le mun khempeuh a om i Topa Zeisu Khazih min a belte kiangah lai kong khak uh hi. Tua Topa Zeisu Khazih in amaute le eite Topa ahi hi.
46001003	I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
46001004	Pasian hehpihna thupha note tungah Khazih Zeisu tungtawn in hong kipia zo ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah ka lungdam tawntung hi.
46001005	Banghang hiam cihleh thugen siamna le thutheihna a kipan na khempeuh ah note hong kicingsak zo hi.
46001006	Tua in, Khazih thu teci ka panna uh note sungah a kikipsakna ahi hi.
46001007	Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu Khazih hong kilat ding lawptak a na ngak sungun kha letsong khat zong na tasam kei uh hi.
46001008	I Topa Zeisu Khazih ni ciangin kawkbanna na neih loh nadingun amah in a tawp dongin hong kipsak ding hi.
46001009	Ama Tapa, i Topa Zeisu Khazih tawh a kipawlkhawm dinga note hong sampa in a citak Pasian ahi hi.
46001010	Sanggamte aw, tu in i Topa Zeisu Khazih min a kong thumnop in ah note sungah pawl kikhenna a om loh nadingin na vekpi un kithu khatin thugen un. Lungsim kibang, ngaihsutna kibang in hoihtak in kipumkhat un.
46001011	Sanggamte aw, note lakah kilemlohna om hi ci in Chloe innkuanpihte in hong gen uh hi.
46001012	Tu in kong gen in ah, note lakah mi khat in, “Kei Paul pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Kei Apollos pawl ka hi hi,” na ci uh hi. A dang khat in, “Kei Cephas pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Kei Khazih pawl ka hi hi,” na ci uh hi.
46001013	Khazih kiphelkhap thei ahi hiam? Note aa dingin Paul kikhailum ahi hiam? Ahih keileh Paul min tawh tui kiphum na hi uh hiam?
46001014	Crispus le Gaius longal note lakah khat beek tui kong phum loh manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
46001015	Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah khatpeuh in, Paul min tawh tuiphumna ka ngah hi ci a, na gen khakloh nading uh ahi hi.
46001016	Hi hi, Stephanas‑te innkuan zong ka tuiphum a, tualo midang ka tuiphum lam ka thei kei hi.
46001017	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in tuiphum dingin kei hong sawl lo a, lungdamna thu a tangko ding bekin hong sawl ahi hi. Khazih singlamteh vangliatna a mawkna a suah loh nadingin lungdamna thu ka tangko ciangin mihing pilna kammalte zangin ka gen kei hi.
46001018	Banghang hiam cihleh singlamteh thu in thu‑umlo mite aa dingin a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite aa dingin Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.
46001019	Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mipilte pilna ka susia dinga, Miteite thutheihna bangmah lo ka suah ding hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
46001020	Mipil koi ah om ahi hiam? Thukhamhilh sia koi ah om ahi hiam? Hih leitung ah thuthuk thei koi ah om ahi hiam? Pasian in hih leitung pilna teng haina suaksak khin hilo ahi hiam?
46001021	Leitung mite in amaute pilna tawh Pasian a thei zo kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama pilna tawh kizui in a haihuai thuhilhna tungtawn in a um mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding pen Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
46001022	Judah mite in nalamdang kal uh a, Greek mite in pilna a zong uh hi.
46001023	Ahih hangin kote in a kikhailum Khazih thu ka hilh uh hi. Amah in Judah mite aa dingin kipalkhakna suak a, Greek mite aa dingin haina a suak hi.
46001024	Ahih hangin Judah mi ahi a, Greek mi ahi zongin Pasian in a sapsa mite aa dingin Khazih in Pasian vangliatna le Pasian pilna ahi hi.
46001025	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian haina in mihingte pil penna sangin pil zaw lai a, ama thanemna zong mihing hat penna sangin a hat zaw hi.
46001026	Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong saplai a na omzia uh na lungngai un. Mite muhna ah a pil, mite tunga thunei le mi thupi tampi na om kei uh hi.
46001027	Ahih hangin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin leitung a a haihuai nate a teel hi. Pasian in a thahatte a maizumsak nadingin a thanem leitung nate a teel hi.
46001028	Leitung in thupi a sakte a suksiat nadingin a kineumuh le a kisimmawh hih leitung nate Pasian in a teel hi.
46001029	Tua in, Pasian mai ah kuamah a kisialh theihloh nading ahi hi.
46001030	Ama hangin Khazih Zeisu sungah om na hih manun amah in eite aa dingin Pasian hong piak pilna, dikna, sianthona le tatkhiatna a hong suakzo hi.
46001031	Tua hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah, “A kisial mi in Topa hang bekin kisial tahen,” ci in a kigelh hi.
46002001	Sanggamte aw, Pasian teci panna thu tangko a note kiangah kong pailai in thugen siamna ahi a, pilna ahi zongin ka suang kei hi.
46002002	Note laka kong om sungin a kikhailum Zeisu Khazih longal thudang bangmah a thei lo dingin ka lungsim ka khentat a,
46002003	thanemna, launa le patauhna tawh ka om hi.
46002004	Ka thuhilh, ka thugennate ah zong mihing pilna tawh kuamah ka zol kei hi. Ahih hangin Kha le vangliatna a kilatkhiat nadingin ka gen hi.
46002005	Tua hi a, note upna in mihingte pilna ah kinga loin Pasian vangliatna ah a kingak theih nading ahi hi.
46002006	Ahih hangin a picingsa mite tungah thu ka gen uh ciangin pilna tawh ka gen uh hi. Tua nangawn zong a maimang ding tulai mite pilna le tulai makaite pilnate ahi kei hi.
46002007	Kote ka hih uh leh eite minthan nadinga Pasian in leitung pianma in a sehkholhsa, a ki‑iimcip Pasian pilna thuthukpi a gen ka hi uh hi.
