46002008	Tulai makaite khat beekin tua pilna a thei kei uh hi. Thei uh hi leh minthang Topa a khailum kei ding uh hi.
46002009	Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian in amah a it mite aa dingin A bawlkholhsa nate in Mittang tawh kimu ngeilo, Bil tawh zong a kiza ngeilo, Mihingte lungsim sungah zong, A om ngeilote ahi hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
46002010	Ahih hangin Pasian in ama Kha tungtawn in tua nate eite hong lakzo hi. Kha in na khempeuh zongtel a, Pasian thu thukpite nangawn hong telsak hi.
46002011	Mi khat sunga om ama lungsim longal tua mi lungsim a thei kua om ahi hiam? Tuamah bangin Pasian Kha simloh Pasian lungsim a thei kua om ahi hiam?
46002012	Tu in Pasian in a khawnkhong a hong piakte i theih theih nadingin leitung kha a ngah i hi kei a, Pasian hong piak Kha a ngah i hi hi.
46002013	Hih thute ka gen uh ciangin mihing pilna tawh ka gen kei uh hi. Kha Siangtho in hong hilh bang bekin ka gen uh a, Khalam thute kha thu mah tawh ka hilhcian uh hi.
46002014	Ahi zongin leitung lungsim a nei mi in Pasian Kha thute haihuaisa ahih manin a sang kei hi. Tua thute kha bek tawh kikhentel thei ahih manin amah in a theitel zo kei hi.
46002015	Ahih hangin a khami pa in na khempeuh khentel thei a, amah ahih leh kuamah in a khentel thei kei hi.
46002016	Banghang hiam cihleh, “kua in Topa lungsim thei a, kua in amah thuhilh thei ding ahi hiam?” Eite in Khazih lungsim i nei hi.
46003001	Sanggamte aw, kha mite tunga thugen bangin note tungah thu kong gen thei kei hi. Ahi zongin Khazih sungah naungek tawh a kibang, sa mite tunga thugen bangin kong gen hi.
46003002	Banghang hiam cihleh note in sa mi na hih manun anham na ne zo nai kei uh a, nawizu tawh kong vak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tu ciangdong anham na hai zo nai kei uh a, tu nangawn in zong na ne zo kei uh hi.
46003003	Tua ahih manin note lakah kihazatna, kitot kiselna le kipawl khenna a om laiteng sa mite bangin a gamta hilo na hi uh hiam?
46003004	Note lakah mi khat in, “Paul pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Apollos pawl ka hi hi,” na cih uh ciangin a sa mi lai hilo na hi uh hiam?
46003005	Tua ahih ciangin Paul kua hi a, Apollos kua ahi hiam? Note in amaute tungtawn in na up theih nadingun Topa in mi khat ciat tunga a sehsak bangin nasemte hilo ahi uh hiam?
46003006	Keimah in ka suan a, Apollos in tui buakin Pasian in a khangsak hi.
46003007	Tua ahih manin a suanpa ahi a, tuibuakpa ahi zongin bangmah a thupi hilo in a khangsakpa ahi Pasian bek a thupi ahi hi.
46003008	Tu in a suanpa le tui a buakpa in pumkhat ahi uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in ama sepna tawh kizui in thaman a ngah ding hi.
46003009	Kote in Pasian tawh ma a pangkhawmte ka hi uh a, note in Pasian huan le Pasian inn na hi uh hi.
46003010	Pasian hong piak hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in innlam siampa bangin khuambul ka phut khinzo a, midangte in tua tungah a lam uh hi. Ahi zongin a lam mi peuhpeuh in bangci lam ahi hiam cih limtak in ngaihsun hen.
46003011	A kiphut khinsa khuambul ahi Zeisu Khazih longal khuambul dang kuamah in a phut thei kei hi.
46003012	Tu in mi khatpeuh in tua khuambul tungah kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, suangmanpha ahi a, sing ahi a, lopa ahi a, buhtu ahi zongin a lam leh,
46003013	amaute nasepna ciat hong kilangkhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua Ni ciangin amaute nasepna ciat meikuang tawh kilangsak dinga, mi khat ciat nasepna bangci nam hiam cih meikuang tawh a kisittel ding hi.
46003014	Mi khatin tua khuambul tunga a lamsa a sepna a kattum kei leh sepna thaman a ngah ding hi.
46003015	Mi khat nasepna a kattum leh thaman tan dinga, amah ahih leh meikuang tawh kipelh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding hi.
46003016	Note in Pasian biakinnpi na hi uh a, note sungah Pasian Kha a teen lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46003017	Mi khatpeuh in Pasian biakinnpi a nitsak leh Pasian in tua mi a susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian biakinnpi siangtho a, note in tua biakinnpi na hi uh hi.
46003018	Mi khatpeuh amah le amah kikhem kei hen. Hih leitung a om mi khatpeuh in note lakah pil a kisak leh, a piltakpi ahih theih nadingin mihai suakphot hen.
46003019	Leitung pilna in Pasian aa dingin haina ahi hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian in mipilte amau zuausiamna mah tawh a man hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
46003020	Tua thamlo in, “Topa in mipilte ngaihsutna thei a, tuate a mawknapi ahihlam a thei hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
46003021	Tua ahih ciangin kuamah in mihingte hangin kiphasak kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh note aa ahi hi.
46003022	Paul a kipan Apollos le Cephas‑te, leitung ahi a, nuntakna le sihna ahi a, tu laitak a om nate, a hong pianglai ding nate ahi zongin na khempeuh note aa ahi hi.
46003023	Note in Khazih aa na hi uh a, Khazih in Pasian aa ahi hi.
46004001	Tua ahih manin mite in kote Khazih nasemte le Pasian thusim a kemte bangin hong ngaihsun uh hen.
46004002	Tua hi a, neihsa kemte in mi muanhuai ahih ding uh kisam hi.
46004003	Note na hi uh a, leitung thukhente ahi zongin kei tungah thu na hong khen ding uh kei aa dingin thu neuno khat ahi hi. A taktak in cileng kei le kei nangawn thu ka kikhen kei hi.
46004004	Ka lungsim tawngah bangmah kisuanna ka thei kei hi. Ahi zongin tua in kei dik hong tangsak ahi kei hi. Kei tunga thu hong khenpa in Topa ahi hi.
46004005	Tua ahih ciangin a hun a tunma in bangmah thu khen kei unla, Topa hong pai dong ngak un. Amah in khuamial sunga a kisel nate le mihingte lungsim sunga a tup a gelte uh a lakkhia ding hi. Tua hun ciangin mi khat ciatin Pasian kiang panin phatna a ngah ding uh hi.
46004006	Sanggamte aw, tu in note phattuam nadingin hih thute Apollos le keima tungah kibulh in hong genteh ka hi hi. Tua in a kigelh zah valkan in na ngaihsut loh nadingun ko tung panin na sin theih nading uh ahi hi. Tua hi leh mi khat hangin kisathei in midang khatpeuh na simmawh kha kei ding uh hi.
46004007	Midangte tawh hong kilamdangsak kua ahi hiam? Hong kipia lopi a na ngah uh bang om ahi hiam? Tu in hong pia a om man bekin na ngah uh hi napi banghang in a ngah lo bangin kisathei na hi uh hiam?
46004008	Tu in na deih khempeuh uh na nei khin uh a, na hau khin uh hi! Kote tawh loin kumpite bangin na maang khin uh hi. Kote zong note tawh ka maankhop theih nadingun note kumpi bangin a maang taktak na hih ding uh kong deihsak hi!
46004009	Pasian in ko sawltakte pen thah dinga thu kikhen khinsa mite lak panin a kithat nunung pen dingin a kikoihte tawh hong kibangsak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh vantungmite le mihingte in leitung ah pawi‑et banga hong et dingun hong kibawl zo hi ci in ka ngaihsun hi.
46004010	Kote in Khazih aa dingin mihai ka suah uh hangin note Khazih sungah mipil na suak uh hi! Kote ka thanem uh hangin note na thakhauh uh hi! Note hong kipahtawi hangin kote hong kisimmawh hi!
46004011	Tudong mahin gilkial dangtak in ka om uh a, puansilh gina zong ka nei kei uh hi. Mite vuak ka thuak uh a, teen nading inn takpi zong ka nei kei uh hi.
46004012	Komau khut tawh nakpi in na ka sem uh hi. A hong kizahko ciangin thupha ka pia uh a, a hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka thuak keikai uh hi.
46004013	A hong kigensiat ciangin kamkhum tawh ka thuk uh hi. Leitung nin bangin kote hong kibawl a, tuni ciangdong mun khempeuh pana kikhawm nin lompi bangin a hong kibawl hi.
46004014	Hih thute note maizum nadingin a hong gelh ka hi kei hi. Ka it ka tate banga thu hong hilh ka hi zaw hi.
46004015	Khazih thu hong hilh ding sia 10,000 bang na nei uh zongin pa tampi na nei kei uh hi. Lungdamna thu hangin Khazih Zeisu sungah note pa ka suakzo hi.
46004016	Tua ahih manin keima gamtat bangin gamta un ci in kong hanthawn hi.
46004017	Hih thu hangin Topa sunga a muanhuai ka it ka tapa Timothy kong paisak hi. Pawlpi omna mun khempeuh ah ka gen bangin Khazih sunga keima nuntakzia teng amah in a hong phawksakkik ding hi.
46004018	Tu in note kiangah kei hong pai lo ding sa in mi pawlkhat na kiphasak uh hi.
46004019	Topa in hong awi leh a sawtlo in kong pai dinga, tua a kiphasak mite thugente bek hilo in bang hihtheihna nei uh hiam cih zong ka theikhia ding hi.
46004020	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in a thu bek hilo in vangliatna hi zaw hi.
46004021	Ciangduai tawh kong pai ding le itna le lungnemna tawh kong pai ding koi ut zaw na hi uh hiam?
46005001	Note lakah numei pasal thangtatna om bekthamlo in Gentile‑te lak nangawn ah a kiza ngeilo a pa zi a teenpih mi bang na om tazen uh hi, ci in hong kigen hi.
46005002	Tua bang mawhna a bawl mipa khasiat pipi mahin note lak pan na hawlkhiat ding uh hi napi na kisialhpih zawsop uh hi.
46005003	Ka pumpi tawh note lakah kong om loh hangin ka kha tawh kong om veve hi. Tua ahih manin ka pumpi a hong om mah bangin mawhna a bawl tua pa tungah hih bangin thu ka khen hi.
46005004	I Topa Zeisu Khazih minin na kikhop uh ciangin i Topa Zeisu Khazih vangliatna le keima kha in note hong ompih hi.
46005005	Tua mipa pumpi a kisiat nadingin Satan khutah na pia un. Tua hi leh Topa Zeisu Ni ciangin a kha in hotkhiatna a ngah kha ding hi.
46005006	Na kisialhna uh a hoih kei hi. Silngo tawmno khatin annel lompi tawk thei hi cih thu thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46005007	Silngo sawhloh annel thak na hih manun silngo lui teng paikhia un. Banghang hiam cihleh eite Paisan Tuuno ahi Khazih in eite tangin a kigo zo hi.
46005008	Tua ahih ciangin siatna le gitlohna ahi silngo lui tawh Paisan Pawi bawl loin, silngo sawhloh anlum lungsim takpi le thutak tawh pawi bawl ni.
46005009	Numei pasal vai ah a thangtat mite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ci in lai kong khakzo hi.
46005010	Tua bang ka cih ciangin hih leitung a numei pasal thangtatte, a huaihamte, mi neihsa a sutte, milim a biate tawh kikhawl kei un kong cihna hilo hi. Tua bang hi leh leitung panin na paikhiat uh a kul ding hi.
46005011	Tu‑a kong gelh pen thu‑um mi khat kici napi numei pasal mawhna a bawl mi ahi a, a huaiham mi ahi a, milim a bia mi ahi a, midang a gensia mi ahi a, zukham mi ahi a, mi neihsa a sut mi tawh ahi zongin kikhawl kei unla, an nangawn nekhawm kei un a ci ka hi zaw hi.
46005012	Pawlpi pualam mite tunga thukhen ding pen kei tawh bang kisai ahi hiam? Pawlpi sunga mite tungah thu a khen ding note hilo na hi uh hiam?
46005013	A pualam mite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin “tua a gamtatsia mipa note lak panin hawlkhia un.”
46006001	Note khat le khat thu na kineih uh ciangin misiangthote mai ah kitun loin thumanlote zumah kitun ngam tazen na hi uh hiam?
46006002	Misiangthote in leitung mite tungah thukhen ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Leitung mite tunga thukhen dingte na hih uh leh thuneupente khen theilo zawzen na hi uh hiam?
46006003	Eite in vantungmite tungah thu a khen ding i hihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna tawh kipawl thute i khen ding kilawm zawtham hilo ahi hiam?
46006004	Hih leitung nuntakna tawh kisai thute khen ding na neih uh ciangin pawlpi sunga a kineumuh tatate seh zawsop ding na hi uh hiam?
46006005	Na maizum nadingun hih banga kong cih ahi hi. Note lakah mipil om lo na hi uh hiam? A sanggamte kikal thu a khensak thei ding mipil khat beek om lo na hi uh hiam?
46006006	Tu in sanggam khat le khat thu kinei in thu‑umlo mite mai ah na kikhia tazen uh hi!
46006007	Tua banga khat le khat na kikhiatna uh zong guallelhna ahi khinzo hi. Banghang in a khial tang zaw loin supna thuak zaw mailo na hi uh hiam?
46006008	Na tua cih uh cih thadah sanggam khat le khat a hilopi in kibawl in na neihsa uh na kilaksak tazen uh hi!
46006009	Mi thumanlote in Pasian kumpigam luah theilo ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Mite khemsa in om kei un. Numei pasal mawhna a bawlte, milim a biate, angkawmte, pasal le pasal a mawhte, numei le numei a mawhte,
46006010	gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi a gensiate, mi neihsa a sutte in Pasian kumpigam a luah kei ding uh hi.
46006011	Nidang lai in note pawlkhat tua bang mi na hi uh a, ahi zongin tu in Pasian in hong sawpsiang in hong siansuah zo a, Topa Zeisu min le i Pasian Kha hangin dik hong tangsak zo hi.
46006012	Na khempeuh hih theih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in phattuamna hong pia lo hi. Na khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tuate khatpeuh sila ka kisuaksak kei ding hi.
46006013	An in gilpi aa ding hi a, gilpi zong an aa ding ahih hangin Pasian in tuate a nihin a susia ding hi. Tu in pumpi in numei pasal thangtat nading hilo in Topa aa ding hi a, Topa zong pumpi aa ding ahi hi.
46006014	Pasian in misite lak panin Topa thokiksak zo a, eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thokiksak ding hi.
46006015	Note in Khazih pumpi nate na hih lam uh kithei lo na hi uh hiam? Khazih pumpi nate la in numei kizuakte pumpi tawh pumkhat suaksak ding ka hi hiam? Ka suaksak peuhmah kei ding hi!
46006016	Numei kizuak tawh a mawh mi in tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suah lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, “Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
46006017	Ahih hangin Topa tawh a kizom mi in Topa tawh lungsim khat a suakkhawm hi.
46006018	Numei pasal thangtatna na taisan un. Mi khatin a bawl a dang mawhna khempeuh ama pumpi pualam hi a, ahi zongin numei pasal thangtatna a bawl mi in ama pumpi tungah a mawh ahi hi.
46006019	Note pumpi in note sunga om Pasian hong piak Kha Siangtho teenna biakinnpi hi a, note aa ahih loh lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46006020	Note in man tawh a kilei khinsa na hih manun Pasian aa ahi na pumpi uh le na kha uh tawh Pasian min thangsak un.
46007001	Tu in nong laikhak uh tawh kisai thute kong gen ding hi. Pasal in zi a neih loh ding a hoihpen ahi hi.
46007002	Ahi zongin numei pasal thangtatna a pian loh nadingin pasal khatin zi khat bek nei henla, numei khatin zong pasal khat bek mah nei zaw hen.
46007003	Pasal in nupa hihna tawh a zi tungah a bawl ding bangin bawl henla, zi in zong a pasal tungah tuamah bangin bawl tahen.
46007004	Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin a zat ding hilo in a pasal zat ding ahi hi. Tuamah bangin pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin a zat ding hilo in a zi zat ding ahi hi.
46007005	Antanna le thungetna nei dingin hun tomkal sung kithukim a na kitan lohngal uh nupa omkhop ding na kinial kei un. Pumpi na ki‑uk zawh loh manun Satan in mawhna ah hong zol kha ding ahih manin lumkhawmkik un.
46007006	Ahi zongin hih thute thupiak hilo in keima hoihsak thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
46007007	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh keima om bangin om le uh ka deih pen hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in hihzawhna letsong a tuamciat hong piak hi a, khat le khat kibang lo hi.
46007008	Ahih hangin kiteenpih a nei nailote le meigongte tunga kong gen in ah keimah bangin om le uh cin note aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
46007009	Ahi zongin a pumpi uh a ki‑uk zawh kei ding uh leh kiteenpih nei uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi ki‑uk zolo in a om uh sangin kiteenpih a neih ding uh a hoih zaw hi.
46007010	Tu in, kiteenpih a nei khinsate tawh kisai in keima hong thupiak hilo Topa hong thupiakna in, zi in a pasal ciahsan kei hen.
46007011	A ciahsan leh zong pasal dang nei nawn kei hen. Ahih keileh a pasal tawh kilemkik hen. Pasal in zong a zi ma kei hen.
46007012	Ahih hangin Topa ahi lo, ken a dangte tunga kong gen in ah sanggampa khatin thu‑umlo zi a neiha, a zi in amah tawh teenkhop ding a ut nak leh ma kei hen.
46007013	Tuamah bangin numei khatin thu‑umlo pasal a neiha, a pasal in amah tawh teenkhop ding a ut nak leh ma kei hen.
46007014	Banghang hiam cihleh a zi hangin thu‑umlo a pasal siangtho a, a pasal hangin thu‑umlo a zi zong a siangtho veve hi. Tua bang hi kei leh na tate uh siangtholo dinga, ahi zongin tu in ahih leh amaute a siangtho uh hi.
46007015	Ahi zongin thu‑umlo pen a paikhiat nop leh paikhia hen. Hih thu hangin thu‑um sanggampa ahi a, sanggamnu ahi zongin, bangmah in a khih kei hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in eite a kilem dinga hong sap ahi hi.
46007016	Zi aw, na pasal na hot theih ding le na hot theihloh ding bang thei na hi hiam? Pasal aw, na zi na hot theih ding le na hot theihloh ding bang thei na hi hiam?
46007017	Ahih hangin Pasian in mi khat ciat tungah a hong piakna le Topa in a hong sapna bang ciatin gamta uh hen. Hih bangin pawlpi khempeuh in a zuih dingin hih thu ka pia hi.
46007018	Pasian in vunat mi ahih laitak a a sap ahih leh vunatloh mi suak kei hen. Vunatlo mi ahih laitak a a sap ahih leh vunat mi suak kei hen.
46007019	Vunatna le atlohna a thupi hilo in Pasian thupiakte zuihna bek a thupi ahi hi.
46007020	Pasian in a hong sap laitak a na om bangbang un omciat un.
46007021	Sila na hih laitak in Pasian in hong sam ahi hiam? Hih thu patauhna in nei kei in. Ahih hangin suahtakna na ngah theih leh na suahtakna zatsiam in.
46007022	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat sila ahih laitak in Topa in a sap leh Topa aa dingin a suakta mi ahi hi. Tuamah bangin mi suakta ahih laitak a sapna a ngah mi in Khazih sila ahi hi.
46007023	Note in man tawh a kilei khinsa na hih manun mihingte silate suak kei un.
46007024	Sanggamte aw, Pasian in hong sap laitak a na om bangbang un omsuak un.
46007025	Tu in kitenpih a neilote tawh kisai in Topa thupiakna ka ngah kei hi. Ahi zongin Topa hong hehpihna tawh mi muanhuai khat ka hihna tawh kizui in thukhenna kong pia hi.
46007026	Tua ahih manin tuhun haksatna hangin pasal in ama om bangbang in a omsuak ding hoih ka sazaw hi.
46007027	Zi nei khin na hih leh zi neilo a om ding sawm kei in. Zi nei nailo na hih leh zi zong kei in.
46007028	Ahi zongin zi na neih leh mawhna hilo a, nungak in zong pasal a neih leh mawhna ahi kei hi. Ahi zongin zi nei pasal neite in pumpi haksatna tampi thuak ding uh ahih manin tuate tawh na kipelh ding uh kong deihsak zaw hi.
46007029	Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, a hun tom ahih manin tu a kipan in zi neite in zi neilo bangin,
46007030	a kapte a kaplo bangin, a lungdamte a lungdamlo bangin, van a leite zong bangmah a neilo bangin om uh henla,
46007031	hih leitung nate a zang mi in zangkhial kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih leitung nate a beibeita ahi hi.
46007032	Ahi zongin lung hihmawhna a tamluat ding kong deihsak kei hi. Zi a neilo mi in Topa a lungdamsak nadingin Topa tawh kisai nate bek a buaipih hi.
46007033	Ahih hangin zi a nei mi in a zi lungdamsak nuam ahih manin leitung nate a buaipih hi.
46007034	Pasal a nei numei le nungak in a kilamdang hi. Pasal a neilo numei in ama pumpi le a lungsim siangthosak in Topa tawh kisai nate bek a buaipih hi. Ahih hangin pasal a nei numei in a pasal lungdamsak nuam ahih manin leitung nate a buaipih hi.
46007035	Hih thute note phattuam nadingin kong gen hi a, kong thangsiahna hilo hi. A hong lehkaih bangmah om loin Topa na nasep theih nadingun a hoih ding thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
46007036	Mi khatin a tanu nungakpi in a omsak ding khial kisa a, a teenpih nuam mi a om leh ama hoihsak bangin hih hen. Bangmah khialhna a om kei hi. Kiteengsak hen.
46007037	Ahi zongin lungsimkip nei a, kul salo in a hihnop bang a hih theih nading thu nei a, ama tanu limtak in kemzo ning ci in a lungsim sungah khentatna a nei mi in a hoih a gamta ahi hi.
46007038	Tua ahih manin, a ta nungak siangtho mi zi dingin a piakhiapa in thuhoih a bawl hi a, a teengsak lopa in thuhoih zaw a bawl ahi hi.
46007039	Numei khat a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham in a pasal tawh a khihkhawm hi. Ahih hangin a pasal a sih leh ama hoihsak pasal dang khat tawh kiteenkik theih nading suahtakna a nei hi a, Topa sunga om mi bek tawh kiteeng hen.
46007040	Ahi zongin keima ngaihsutna ah a ngei bangin tua ci om leh lungdam zaw dingin ka um a, Pasian Kha ngaihsutna mah zong hi in ka um hi.
46008001	Tu in milim biakna a kipia nate tawh kisai thu kong gen ding hi. Eite khempeuh thu thei vive i hih lam ka thei hi. Thu theihna in kiphatsakna piangsak a, itna in hong kilamkipsak hi.
46008002	Na khatpeuh thei‑a a kingaihsun mi in a theih dinga kilawm zah a thei nailo ahi hi.
46008003	Ahih hangin Pasian in amah a it mite a thei hi.
46008004	Tua ahih ciangin milim biakna a kipia nate tawh kisai kong gen in ah leitung ah milim bangmah hilo a, Pasian khat bek longal Pasian dang a om kei hi cih i thei hi.
46008005	Leitung vantung ah pasian a kicite om hi mah ta leh (pasian tam om in topa tampi om hi),
46008006	eite aa dingin Pa ahi Pasian khat bek a om hi. Ama sung panin na khempeuh piang a, eite in ama aa i hi hi. Topa Zeisu Khazih khat bek om a, na khempeuh ama piansak hi in ama tungtawn in eite a nungta i hi hi.
46008007	Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in tua thu a theikim kei uh hi. Mi pawlkhat in tudong in milim biakna a kipia na a nek uh ciangin milim phawk kawmsa in ne uh a, amaute lungsim kisuangsak ahih manin tua in amaute a ninsak hi.
46008008	Ahih hangin annek in Pasian maipha a hong ngahsak kei hi. I nek manin mi hoih zaw i hi kei a, i nek loh manin misia zaw zong i hi tuan kei hi.
46008009	Ahi zongin nangma suahtakna in a thanem mite palkhak a suah loh nadingin kidawm in.
46008010	Banghang hiam cihleh thu a thei nangmah in an ne dingin milim biakna inn ah na tut laitak in a thanem mi khatin hong mu leh kisuangsa pi mahin milim biakna a kipia nate ne ngamsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
46008011	Tua a thanem na sanggampa tangin Khazih si khinzo napi na thutheihna tawh amah kisiasak ding na hi hiam?
46008012	Tua bangin na sanggamte uh tungah mawhin a thanem amaute lungsim na liamsak uh ciangin Khazih tungah a mawh na hi uh hi.
46008013	Tua ahih manin ka annek in ka sanggam khat puksak ahih leh amah ka puksak khakloh nadingin sa ka ne ngei nawn kei ding hi.
46009001	Sawltak khat hilo ka hi hiam? A suakta mi khat hilo ka hi hiam? I Topa Zeisu Khazih a mu khin hilo ka hi hiam? Note in Topa sunga ka nasepna gah hilo na hi uh hiam?
46009002	Midangte in sawltak in a hong sim kei uh zongin note aa dingin sawltak ka hi mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Topa sunga sawltak ka hihna ciaptehna in note na hi uh hi.
46009003	Kei hong dongtel mite kiang pan ka kihutna in hih bang ahi hi.
46009004	Annek tuidawn nading thuneihna neilo ka hi uh hiam?
46009005	Sawltak dangte, Topa sanggamte le Cephas‑te bangin thu‑um zi khat tonpih theih nading thu nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
46009006	Tua ahih keileh Barnabas le keimah in zong khut tawh na sem loin om theih nading thunei hilo ka hi uh hiam?
46009007	Kua in ama sum zangin galdo in kuan ahi hiam? Lenggah kung suan a, a gah a nelo kua om ahi hiam? Ahih keileh gankhawi in a nawi a nelo kua om ahi hiam?
46009008	Hih thute mihing muhna pan beka kong gen ahi hiam? Thukham in zong hih bangmah in gen hilo ahi hiam?
46009009	Moses thukham sungah, “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitak in a muuk hencipsak kei in,” ci in a kigelh hi. Pasian in hih thu ah bawngte a cih nopna ahi hiam?
46009010	Ahih keileh eite hong gennopna ahi hiam? A taktak in eite aa dingin a kigelh ahi hi. Lokhopa in lametna tawh lokho a, lametna tawh buh a cilpa in zong a lamet pen a ngah theih nadingin buh a cil ahi hi.
46009011	Note aa dingin khalam thu khaicite hong vawh khin ka hih manun note tung panin leitung nate ka ngah uh hangin lianlua ding ahi hiam?
46009012	Midangte in note tungah hih bang thuneihna nei uh ahih leh kote in nei zaw thamlo ding ka hi uh hiam? Ahih hangin Khazih lungdamna thu a khaktan ka suah loh nadingun ka thuneihna uh zang loin na khat peuhpeuh ka thuak tentan uh hi.
46009013	Biakinnpi sunga a siangtho nate tawh kisai in na a semte in tua nate mah ne uh a, biaknatau a nasemte in zong tua biaknatau tunga kipia nate mah a ne uh hi cih theilo na hi uh hiam?
46009014	Tuamah bangin lungdamna thu a tangkote in lungdamna thu mah kivakna in nei uh hen ci in Topa in thu hong pia zo hi.
46009015	Ahih hangin hih thuneihnate khat beek ka zang kei a, kei tungah hih bangin hong bawl un ci in zong lai kong khak ngei kei hi. Hih keima angtanna mi khatpeuh in a mawkna a suahsak sangin si leng kei aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
46009016	Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna thu ka tangko ciangin kisialh nading bangmah ka nei kei hi. A hangin tua thu ka hilh loh a phamawh ahi hi. Hi takpi hi. Lungdamna thu ka hilh loh ciangin gimna ka thuak hi!
46009017	Hih nasep keima utthu tawh a sem ka hih leh thaman ka ngah ding hi. Ahi zongin keima ut lohpi a a sem ka hih leh kei tunga a hong kipia nasep a sem ka hi hi.
46009018	Tua ahih leh ka thaman bang ahi hiam? Lungdamna thu ka hilh ciangin tua lungdamna thu hanga ka thuneihna zangkhial loin Khazih lungdamna thu manngenlo a mite ka piak pen mah ka thaman hi pah hi.
46009019	Mi khatpeuh nasem ka hih loh hangin mi a tam theithei ka ngah zawh nadingin mi khempeuh nasem ka kisuaksak hi.
46009020	Judah mite ka ngah zawh nadingin Judah mite lakah Judah mi bangin ka om hi. Thukham nuai‑a om mite ka ngah theih nadingin thukham nuai‑a om mite lakah thukham nuai‑a om mi bangin ka om hi.
46009021	Thukham a neilo mite ka ngah theih nadingin thukham a neilo mite lakah thukham a neilo mi bangin, Pasian thukham a nial hilo in Khazih thukham nuai ah ka om hi.
46009022	A thanem mite ka ngah theih nadingin a thanem mite lakah a thanem mi bangin ka om hi. Mi pawlkhat lam khat peuhpeuh tawh ka hotkhiat theih khak leh ci in mi khempeuh tungah na khempeuh ka suak hi.
46009023	Tu in hi bang ka sepna in lungdamna thu hang hi a, tua lungdamna thupha note tawh ka ngahkhop theih nading ahi hi.
46009024	Tai kidem mite a vekpi un a tai uh hangin mi khat bekin pahtawina a ngah lam theilo na hi uh hiam? Note in zong pahtawina na ngah theih nadingun tai un.
46009025	Tai kidemna a a kihel khempeuh in a siathei lukhu a ngah nadingun na khempeuh ah amaute pumpi a ki‑uk uh hi. Tu in amaute in a siathei lukhu ngah nadingin tai uh a, eite i hih leh a siatheilo lukhu i ngah nadingin i pumpi a ki‑uk i hi hi.
46009026	Tua ahih manin ngimna kician neilopi a, a mawktai hilo in huih lak a mawktup zong ka hi kei hi.
46009027	Ahi hangin midangte tungah lungdamna thu ka hilh khit ciangin a san thamlo mi ka suah loh nadingin ka pumpi sekin thu ka mangsak hi.
46010001	Tua thamlo in sanggamte aw, ka pu ka pate khempeuh in meiipi nuai ah a vekpi un tuipi a kantanna uh ah,
46010002	amaute in tua meiipi le tuipi ah a vekpi un Moses sungah a kibaptize na uh,
46010003	a vekpi un a kibang kha an a nekna uh le
46010004	a vekpi un a kibang khalam tui a dawnnate uh na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi. Tua tui pen amaute a zui kha Suangpi pana a dawn uh hi a, tua Suangpi in Khazih ahi hi.
46010005	Ahih hangin a tam zawte tungah Pasian lungkim lo ahih manin gamlak ah amaute luanghawm a thehthang hi.
46010006	Tu in amaute in thusia a lunggulh bangun eite in i lunggulh loh nadingin hih thute pen eite etteh ding ahi hi.
46010007	Amaute pawlkhat bangin milim bia kei un. Lai Siangtho sungah, “A ne a dawn dingin amaute tusuk uh a, tua khit ciangin a phengtat dingin a dingto uh hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
46010008	Amaute pawlkhat in numei pasal mawhna a bawl manun ni khat sungin 23,000 a si uh hi. Eite in tua mite bangin numei pasal mawhna bawl kei ni.
46010009	Amaute pawlkhat in Khazih a ze‑et bangun eite in ze‑et kei ni. Tua mawhna hangin gul in amaute tulum hi.
46010010	Amaute pawlkhat bangin phun kei ni. A phun manun a susia vantungmi in amaute a that hi.
46010011	Tu in hih thute in eite etteh dingin a piang hi a, hun nunung a om eite hong kihilhkholh nadingin a kigelh ahi hi.
46010012	Tua ahih manin kip a kisa mi in a puk loh nadingin kidawm hen.
46010013	Mihing thuakngei ze‑etna a val note tungah a hong tung kei hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in a muanhuai ciampellopa ahih manin note thuak zawh ding zah val a hong kize‑et ding a phal kei hi. Tua bang ze‑etna na thuak uh ciangin zong na thuak zawh nadingun suahtak nading lampi a hong bawlsak ding hi.
46010014	Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, milim biakna nusia un.
46010015	Mipilte tunga thugen bangin kong gen ding hi. Ka thugen bang hiam cih nomau mahin na khentel un.
46010016	Eite in hehpihna i phatna thupha hai in Khazih sisan tawh i kizopna hilo ahi hiam? I balkhap anlum in Khazih pumpi tawh i kizopna hilo ahi hiam?
46010017	Eite khempeuh in anlum khat nekhawm i hih manin mi tampi i hih hangin anlum khat le pumpi khat i hi hi.
46010018	Ci le sa lamsang ah Israel mite ngaihsun dih un. Gangawh biakna sa a nete in tua biaknatau tawh kizom uh hilo ahi hiam?
46010019	Tua ahih leh bang gen nuam ka hi hiam? Milim thupi hi a ci ka hi hiam? Ahih keileh milim a kipia biakpiakna thupi hi a ci ka hi hiam?
46010020	Ka hi kei hi. Gentile‑te biakpiakna pen Pasian a piak uh hilo in dawite a piak uh ahih manin dawite tawh na kikholh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
46010021	Topa hai le dawite hai na dawnkhawm thei kei ding uh hi. Topa ankuang le dawite ankuang na sawkkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
46010022	Topa a heh nadingin phin ding i hi hiam? Topa sangin thahat zaw i hi hiam?
46010023	Na khempeuh hihtheih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in phattuamna a hong pia kei hi. Na khempeuh hihtheih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in a hong kipsak kei hi.
46010024	Kuamah in ama phattuam nading zong loin midangte phatuam nading zong hen.
46010025	Sa zuakna muna kizuak sa khatpeuh dongtel loin lei unla ne un. Tua hi leh na lungsim uh kisuang lo ding hi.
46010026	Banghang hiam cihleh “leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”
46010027	Thu‑umlo mi khatin an ne dingin a hong sap ciangin na pai nop leh na paithei hi. Ahi zongin na mai‑a hong kilui khempeuh dongtel loin ne in. Tua hi leh na lungsim kisuang lo ding hi.
46010028	Ahih hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Hih in milim biakna a kipia khinsa ahi hi,” hong cih leh tua pa na khualna le lungsim kisuanna a om loh nadingin ne kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh “leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”
46010029	Lungsim kisuanna, ka cih ciangin nang lungsim a gen hilo in tua bang hong ci mipa lungsim a gen ka hi zaw hi. Midang khat lungsim kisuanna ka khualna in banghang in kei suahtakna tungah thu hong khen ding ahi hiam?
46010030	Lungdam ko a, ka nek ciangin lungdam ka kohna tua an hangin banghang in hong kimawhsak ding ahi hiam?
46010031	Tua ahih manin nekna dawnna a kipan na khat peuhpeuh na hih uh ciangin Pasian minthan nadingin na hih un.
46010032	Judah mite hi ta leh, Greek mite hi ta leh, Pasian pawlpi hi ta leh kuamah puksak kha kei un.
46010033	Mite in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun keima phattuam nading zong loin mi tampite phattuam nading ka zonga, na khempeuh ah mi khempeuh ka lungdamsak hi.
46011001	Khazih ka etteh bangin note in zong kei hong etteh un.
46011002	Tu in sanggamte aw, na khempeuh ah kei hong phawkin kong hilh thute zui na hih manun kong pakta hi.
46011003	Ahi zongin pasal khempeuh lutang in Khazih hi a, numei lutang in pasal hi in Khazih lutang in Pasian ahi hi cih thute kong theisak nuam hi.
46011004	Pasal peuhmah in thu a nget laitak ahi a, kamsang a thu a hilh laitak ahi zongin a lu a khuh leh a lutang a selpho ahi hi.
46011005	Numei peuhmah in thu a nget laitak ahi a, kamsang a thu a hilh laitak ahi zongin a lu a khuh kei leh a lutang a selpho hi a, a sam mettol mah bangin a zumhuai hi.
46011006	Banghang hiam cihleh numei in a lu a khuhnop kei leh a sam met hen. Sam met ding ahi a, mettol ding ahi zongin zumhuai a sak leh a lu khuh hen.
46011007	Pasal in Pasian lim le a minthanna ahih manin a lu a khuh hetloh ding ahi hi. Ahi zongin numei ahih leh pasal minthanna ahi hi.
46011008	Banghang hiam cihleh numei panin pasal piang hilo in pasal panin numei a piang ahi hi.
46011009	Numei aa dingin pasal kipiangsak hilo in pasal aa dingin numei a kipiangsak ahi hi.
46011010	Hih thu hang le vantungmite hangin numei in ukna nuai ah a om ahihna a lak lim khat peuhmah a lu tungah a khuk ding ahi hi.
46011011	Ahi zongin Topa sungah numei loin pasal kia tangdin theilo a, pasal loin numei kia zong tangdin thei tuanlo hi.
46011012	Pasal pana numei piang ahih mah bangin pasal zong numei sung pan a piang ahi hi. Ahih hangin na khempeuh Pasian pan a piang ahi hi.
46011013	Numei in a lu khuhlosa in Pasian kiangah thu a nget ding kilawm hiam, kilawmlo hiam nomau mah in khentel un.
46011014	Pasal in a sam a sausak leh zumhuai hi cih thu leitung ngeina nangawn in hong hilh hilo ahi hiam?
46011015	Ahih hangin numei in a sam a sausak leh ama minthanna hi a, ama kikhuh nadinga Pasian in a piak ahi hi.
46011016	Ahih hangin mi khatpeuh in hih thu a nialnop leh kote ka hi uh a Pasian pawlpite ahi zongin tua simloh ngeina dang kinei lo hi.
46011017	Na kikhop uh ciangin na hoih zawk nading uh hilo in na siatzawk nading uh suaksak na hih manun hih thu ah note kong pakta kei hi. Tua ahih manin tu in hih thute kong pia hi.
46011018	A thu masapen in pawlpi bangin na kikhop uh ciangin na kituambawlna thu uh ka za a, maan kha thei dingin zong ka um hi.
46011019	Note lak pan Pasian san mite kua hiam cih a kilat nadingin kithutuah lohna zong a omthei ding mah ahi hi.
46011020	Tua ahih manin munkhat ah na kikhop uh ciangin Topa Nitak An nekna na suaksak nawn kei uh hi.
46011021	Banghang hiam cihleh na nek uh ciangin kingak cih om loin nomau an ciat na ne masa uh a, a gilvah zolo tawh a khamlua tawh na om uh hi.
46011022	A bangci na hi uh hiam! Annek tuidawn nading inn neilo na hi uh hiam? Ahih keileh Pasian pawlpi simmawh in bangmah a neilote a maizumsak nuam na hi uh hiam? Bang hong gen ding ka hi hiam? Hih thu ah kong pakta ding hiam? Kong pakta kei hi.
46011023	Note tunga kong piak thu pen Topa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi. Amah a kilehhek ni nitak in Topa Zeisu in anlum la in,
46011024	lungdamna a koh khit ciangin balkham a, “La unla, ne un. Hih in note aa dingin a kibalkham ka pumpi ahi hi. Kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” a ci hi.
46011025	A nek khit uh ciangin tuamah bangin hai zong la a, “Hih hai in ka sisan a thuciamna thak ahi hi. Na dawn sim un kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” a ci hi.
46011026	Hih anlum ne in, hih hai na dawn sim un, Topa hong pai mateng Topa sihna thu a tangko na hi uh hi.
46011027	Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh in a kilawm lopi in hih anlum ne a, hih hai a dawn leh tua mi in Topa pumpi le ama sisan tungah a mawh ahi hi.
46011028	Ahi zongin mi khatin amah le amah a kisittel khit ciangin anlum ne in hai panin dawn tahen.
46011029	A kilawmlopi in a ne a dawn mi in Topa pumpi a theitel lo ahih manin ama tungah thukhenna a tun nadingin a ne a dawn ahi hi.
46011030	Hih thu hangin note lakah a thanem le a cina tampi na om uh a, a ihmu zong tampi na om khin uh hi.
46011031	Ahih hangin eimah le eimah i kisittel leh Pasian in thu hong khen lo ding hi.
46011032	Topa in thu hong khen leh zong leitung mite banga mawhsakna i thuak loh nading a hong thuhilhna ahi hi.
46011033	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, an ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin khat le khat na kingak un.
46011034	A gilkialte in ama inn ah an ne hen. Tua hi leh na kikhopna hangun thukhenna na thuak nawn kei ding uh hi. Kong pai ciangin thu dangdangte kong hilhcian ding hi.
46012001	Sanggamte aw, Khalam letsongte tawh kisai in awlmawhlo in na om ding uh ka deih kei hi.
46012002	Gentile‑te na hihlai un a pau theilo milimte kiang hong kitun in lam hong kipialsak ahihna na thei uh hi.
46012003	Tua ahih manin Pasian Kha tawh thugen mi peuhmah in Zeisu samsiat in om hen ci ngeilo a, Kha Siangtho tawh loin kuamah in Zeisu in Topa ahi hi, ci theilo hi cih thu kong theisak hi.
46012004	Letsong a tuamtuam a om hangin, Kha khat bek ahi hi.
46012005	Nasepna a tuamtuam a om hangin Topa khat bek ahi hi.
46012006	Sepna bawlna a tuamtuam a om hangin mi khempeuh sungah na khempeuh a sem Pasian khat bek ahi hi.
46012007	Ahih hangin mikim i kiphat tuampih theih nadingin Kha kilatkhiatna hong kipia ciat hi.
46012008	Pasian in Kha tungtawn in mi khat tungah ciimna pia a, tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah thutheihna a pia hi.
46012009	Tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah upna pia a, tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah cina damsak theihna letsong a pia hi.
46012010	A dang khat tungah nalamdang bawl theihna pia a, a dang khat tungah kamsang in thuhilh theihna a pia hi. A dang khat tungah khate khentel theihna a pia hi. A dang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuam pau theihna pia a, a dang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuamte a khiatna gentheihna a pia hi.
46012011	Hihte khempeuh Kha khat bekin sem a, ama deihna bangin mi khat ciat aa dingin a hawmsak hi.
46012012	Pumpi khat bek ahih hangin pumpi tung nate tampi a om hi. Tua pumpi tung nate tampi ahih uh hangin a vekpi un pumpi khat ahih bangin Khazih zong tuamah bang ahi hi.
46012013	Eite khempeuh in Judah mi i hi a, Greek mi i hi zongin, sila i hi a, a suakta mi i hi zongin i vekpi in pumpi khat sungah Kha khat bek tawh phumna i ngah hi. Kha khat sung panin hong kidawnkhawmsak hi.
46012014	Pumpi in pumpi tung nate khat bek nei loin tampi a nei hi.
46012015	Khe in, “Khut hilo ka hih manin, pumpi tawh ka kisai kei hi,” ci leh a kisai lo takpi ahi ding hiam?
46012016	Bil in, “Mittang hilo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kisai kei hi,” ci leh a kisai lo takpi ahi ding hiam?
46012017	Pumpi buppi mittang hi khin leh bangci bangin khuaza thei dinga, pumpi buppi bil hi khin leh bangci bangin a gimnam zathei ding ahi hiam?
46012018	Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin pumpi tung nate amau munciat ah a koih hi.
46012019	Tuate khempeuh pumpi tung na khat bek hi khin leh pumpi omthei ding ahi hiam?
46012020	Tu in ahih leh pumpi tung nate tampi a om hangin pumpi khat bek a om hi.
46012021	Mittang in khut kiangah, “Kei aa dingin nang na kisam kei hi,” ci theilo hi. Lutang in zong khe kiangah, “Kei aa dingin nang na kisam kei hi,” ci theilo hi.
46012022	Tua bangci theilo bekthamlo in a thanem zaw tawh a kibang pumpi nate a kisam zawteng ahi uh hi.
46012023	A thupi suahlo i pumpi nate pawlkhat i limkep pente hi zaw hi. Zumhuai i sakteng mah a kilawm zaw thamteng ahi uh hi.
46012024	Kilawm i sakzawk i pumpi nate, limbawl tuam a kisam loteng na hi zaw uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in hoihtak in pumpi lemkhawm a, a ginalo nate a pahtawihuai zaw in a koih hi.
46012025	Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi sungah kikhenna om loin pumpi tung nate khat le khat a kikeptuah ciat theih nading uh ahi hi.
46012026	Pumpi tung nate khatin gimna a thuak leh a dangteng in zong thuakpih uh a, khatin pahtawina a ngah leh a vekpi un a lungdamkhawm uh hi.
46012027	Tu in note in Khazih pumpi na hi uh a, mi khat ciatin pumpi tung nate na hi ciat uh hi.
46012028	Pasian in pawlpi sungah a masapen in sawltakte, a nihna ah kamsang a thu a hilhte, a thumna ah siate a koih hi. Tua khit ciangin nalamdang a bawltheite le cina damsak theihna letsong a ngahte, tua khit ciangin midang a huh theite, a uk theite le pau nam tuamtuam a pau theite a koih hi.
46012029	Tuate a vekpi un sawltakpite hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un kamsang a thuhilhte hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un siate hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un nalamdang a bawltheite hi khin uh ahi hiam?
46012030	A vekpi un cina damsak theihna letsong a ngahte hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un pau nam tuamtuam a paute, a vekpi un pau nam tuamtuamte a khiatna a gentheite hi khin uh ahi hiam?
46012031	Ahi zongin a hoih penpen letsongte mah na deih zaw un. A hoih zawlai thukhat kong gen ding hi.
46013001	Mihingte pau le vantungmite pau tawh ka pauthei phial zongin, itna ka neih kei leh dakging le daltuah ging tawh a kibanglel ka hi ding hi.
46013002	Kamsang in thuhilh theihna letsong nei a, thuthuk khempeuh le na khempeuh thei in mualte kinsak zawh nading upna ka nei zongin itna ka neih kei leh a mawkna ka hi veve ding hi.
46013003	Ka neihsa khempeuh mizawngte nek dingin pia in ka pumpi zong mei‑a khultum dingin ka pia zongin itna ka neih kei leh kei aa dingin phattuamna a om tuan kei hi.
46013004	Itna in lungduai in a migi hi. Itna in kuamah a haza kei hi. Itna in kisial loin a kiphasak kei hi.
46013005	A kilawmlo in a gamta kei hi. Ama angsung ding bek a khual kei hi. A hehbaih kei hi. Midangte siatna a ciamteh kei hi.
46013006	Thumanlote lungdampih loin thuman thutak ah a lungdam hi.
46013007	Na khempeuh a hu hi. Na khempeuh a um hi. Na khempeuh a lamen hi. Na khempeuh a thuakzo hi.
46013008	Itna a kip tawntung hi. Ahi zongin, kamsang a thuhilhnate kibeisak dinga, paunam tuamtuam pau theihnate a bei hun om ding hi. Thu theihna a om leh zong beimang ding hi.
46013009	Banghang hiam cihleh i thu theihna kimkhat bek hi a, kamsang in thu i hilhna zong kimkhat bek mah ahi hi.
46013010	Ahi zongin kicinna hong tun ciangin a kicinglo khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
46013011	Naupang ka hihlai in naupang bangin ka pau hi. Naupang bangin thu ka thei a, naupang bangin thu ka ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin ka picin ciangin naupang vai khempeuh ka paikhia hi.
46013012	Tu laitak in limlang tawh ki‑et bangin ahi milmial bekin i mu hi. Ahi zongin tunung ciangin kimaituah in i mu ding hi. Tu laitak in kimkhat bek ka thei a, tunung ciangin Pasian in kei hong theih bangin a kicing in amah ka thei ding hi.
46013013	Tu laitak in upna, lametna le itna, hihteng thum om a, tuateng lakah itna a thupipen ahi hi.
46014001	Itna neih ding na hanciam un. Kha letsongte na lunggulh unla, kamsang in thugen theihna na lunggulh deuh un.
46014002	Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau mi in mihingte tunga thugen hilo in Pasian tunga thugen ahi hi. Kuamah in a thugen theilo a, kha tawh thuthuk a gen ahi hi.
46014003	Ahih hangin kamsang in thu a hilh mi in kilamkip nading thute hansuah nading thute le thapiak nading thute mite tungah a gen hi.
46014004	Paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau mi in amah le amah a kikipsak hi a, ahi zongin kamsang a thuhilh mi in pawlpi a kipsak hi.
46014005	Na vekpi un paunam tuamtuam in na pau ding uh ka deih hangin kamsang a thu na hilh ding uh ka deih zawlai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh thu a gen mi in pawlpi a kilamkip theih nadingin a khiatna a gen kei leh amah sangin kamsang a thu a hilhpa a thupi zaw hi.
46014006	Tu in sanggamte aw, note kiangah hong pai in kilakna thu tawh ahi zongin thu theihna tawh ahi zongin kamsang a thuhilhna tawh ahi zongin hilhcianna tawh ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh tawh hong gen loin paunam tuamtuam khatpeuh tawh hong genleng, note aa dingin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?
46014007	Nuntakna a neilo nate ahi tamngai le gawsemte nangawn a aw maantak in ging kei leh bang aw kitum hiam cih kua in theithei ding ahi hiam?
46014008	Pengkul zong a aw mantak in ging kei leh galsim dingin kua kithawi thei ding ahi hiam?
46014009	Tuamah bangin a kitheitel kampau tawh thu gen kei le uh cin kua in na thugen uh theithei ding ahi hiam? Tua in huih lakah a pau tawh na kibang ding uh hi.
46014010	Leitung ah kampau nam tampi om a, khiatna a neiciat uh hi.
46014011	Mi khat thugen a khiatna ka mat theih kei leh tua pa aa dingin minam dang ka suak a, amah zong kei aa dingin minam dang mah a suak lel hi.
46014012	Note zong tuamah bang na hi uh hi. Kha letsongte deih mahmah na hih manun pawlpi kilamkip nading letsongte tampi na neih nadingun hanciam un.
46014013	Tua ahih manin paunam tuamtuam tawh a gen mi in a khiatna a gen theih nadingin ngen hen.
46014014	Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh thu ka nget leh ka kha in thu a nget hangin ka theihtelna a khang tuan kei hi.
46014015	Tua ahih leh bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Kha tawh thu ka ngen dinga, ka theihtelna tawh zong ka ngen ding hi. Kha tawh la ka sa dinga, ka theihtelna tawh zong ka sa ding hi.
46014016	Tua ahih keileh kha tawh Pasian na phat laitak in tua inn sunga hong om, bangmah a theilo mi khatin na thugente thei kei leh bangci bangin, “Amen,” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
46014017	Lungdamna na limkoh mahmah hangin midangte aa dingin kipna a piang kei hi.
46014018	Note khempeuh sangin paunam tuamtuam tawh ka pau theih zawk manin ka Pasian tungah ka lung a dam hi.
46014019	Ahi zongin pawlpi sungah paunam tuamtuam tawh kammal 10,000 ka gen sangin midangte zong thu ka hilhcian theih nadingin a kitheitel sinsen kammal nga tawh thu ka gen nuamzaw hi.
46014020	Sanggamte aw, thu theihna lamah naupangte bang loin a khang khinsa mite bang unla, gitlohna lamah naungekte bang un.
46014021	Thukham laibu sungah, “Gamdang mite kam le muk zangin Hih mite tungah thu ka gen ding hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Ka thugente a ngai tuan kei ding uh hi,” Topa in ci hi, ci in a kigelh hi.
46014022	Tua ahih manin paunam tuamtuam in theihsakna lim hi a, thu‑um mite aa ding hilo in thu‑umlo mite aa ding ahi hi. Kamsang a thuhilhna ahih leh thu‑um mite aa ding hi a, thu‑umlo mite aa ding ahi kei hi.
46014023	Tua ahih manin mun khatah pawlpi buppi in na kikhop uh ciangin paunam tuamtuam tawh pautek le uh cin bangmah a theilo mite ahi zongin, thu‑umlo mite ahi zongin hong pai leh, mihaihon hi hong ci ding uh hilo ahi hiam?
46014024	Ahih hangin na vekpi un kamsanna tawh thu na hilh laitak un, a umlo mi khat ahi zongin bangmah a theilo mi khat ahi zongin hong lut leh tua pa a mawhna teng kiphawksak in thu a khen na hi ding uh hi.
46014025	Tua ciangin a lungsim sunga a selsim khempeuh hong kipholak ding hi. Amah boksuk in Pasian bia dinga, note lakah Pasian om taktak hi ci in hong pulak ding hi.
46014026	Tua ahih leh sanggamte aw, a koici bang ding ahi hiam? Na kikhop uh ciangin mi khatin phatna lasakna, a dang khatin thu hilhna, a dang khatin paunam tuamtuam a pauna, a dang khatin Pasian kiang pana kilakna, a dang khatin a khiatna gen theihna na ngah ciat uh hi. Tuate khempeuh kilamkipna a pian nadingin na zang un.
46014027	Paunam tuamtuam tawh thu a kigen leh nih bang a tampen in thum ciangin gen hen. Khat khit khat a banban in gen uh henla, khatin a khiatna gen hen.
46014028	Ahih hangin a khiatna gen ding a om kei leh pawlpi kikhopna ah paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau ding pa pau loin om henla, ama thu in Pasian tawh kiho hen.
46014029	Kamsang a thuhilhte nih ahih keileh thum in thugen uh henla, a dangteng in saikak uh hen.
46014030	Ahi zongin a kianga a tu midang khat tungah na khat peuhpeuh a hong kilah leh a gen masapa khawlphot hen.
46014031	Mi khempeuh in thu kihilhcian a tha a ngahkim theih nadingun na vekpi un a banban in kamsang in thu na hilh ciat thei uh hi.
46014032	Kamsangte lungsim kamsangte ukna nuai ah a om hi.
46014033	Banghang hiam cihleh misiangthote pawlpi khempeuh ah a kimuh mah bangin Pasian in buaina a piangsak Pasian hilo in kilemna a piangsak Pasian ahi hi.
46014034	Pawlpi sungah na numeite uh pau loin om uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in thu a hilh ding uh kiphal lo hi. Ahi zongin thukham in a gen mah bangin amaute in thumang uh hen.
46014035	Tua hi a, a theihnop uh a om leh inn ah a pasal ciat uh dong uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh numeite in pawlpi sungah thu a hilh ding uh zumhuai hi.
46014036	Pasian thu note kiang pana hong kipankhia ahi hiam? Ahih keileh note tung bekah hong tung ahi hiam?
46014037	Kamsang a kingaihsun mi khat ahi a, khami a a kingaihsun mi khat ahi zongin hih kong gelh thute Topa hong thupiakte ahihna thei tahen.
46014038	Ahi zongin hih ka thugente a thudon lo a om leh amah zong kithudon kei tahen.
46014039	Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kamsang a thuhilh theih ding deih mahmah unla, paunam tuamtuam tawh thu gen ding zong na kham kei un.
46014040	Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituak in hih un.
46015001	Tua bekthamlo in sanggamte aw, note kianga kong hilhsa lungdamna thu kong phawkkiksak nuam hi. Tua lungdamna thu in na san khitsa uh le na dinkipna uh ahi hi.
46015002	Kong hilh tua lungdamna thu lenkip na hih manun hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Tua hi kei leh na upna uh a mawkna suak ding hi.
46015003	A masa pen in ka ngahsa lungdamna thu note tungah kong gensawn hi. Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin Khazih in eite mawhna hangin sihna thuak in,
46015004	amah kivui a, Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin a ni thum ni in a thokik hi.
46015005	Tua ciangin Cephas kiangah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawm le nihte kiangah a kilang hi.
46015006	Tua nung ciangin sanggam 500 valte kiangah khatvei va kilang a, amaute a tam zaw a nungta lai uh hi. Pawlkhatte ahih leh a ihmu khinzo uh hi.
46015007	Tua nung ciangin James kiangah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawltak khempeuh kiangah a kilang hi.
46015008	Tua khit ciangin a nunung pen in a hun cing lopi in a suak naungek tawh a kibang keima kiangah a hong kilang hi.
46015009	Sawltakpite lakah a neupen ka hi a, Pasian pawlpi a bawlsiapa ka hih manin sawltak cih dinga kilawm zong ka hi kei hi.
46015010	Ahi zongin Pasian hong hehpihna thupha hangin ka hihna bangbang in ka hi a, kei tunga ama hehpihna thupha a mawkna a suak kei hi. Tua thamlo in sawltak dang khempeuh sangin na ka nak sep zaw hi. Ahi zongin a sem taktak kei hilo in kei hong ompih Pasian hehpihna thupha in a sem ahi hi.
46015011	Tua ahih manin kei ka hi a, amaute ahi zongun note tungah hih thu mah kong hilh uh a, note in zong tua mah bangin na um uh hi.
46015012	Tu in, misite lak pan Khazih thokik zo hi ci a, kong hilh khitsa uh hi napi banghang in note pawlkhat in misite thokik lo ding hi ci na hi uh hiam?
46015013	Misite thokik lo ding hi leh Khazih zong a thokik lo hi ding hi.
46015014	Khazih thokik lo hi leh kote thugen a mawkna hi dinga, note upna zong a mawkna mah ahi ding hi.
46015015	Hi hi, Pasian in Khazih thokiksak zo hi cih thu kote in teci ka pang uh hi. Misite thokik loin Khazih zong Pasian in thokiksak lo hileh, Pasian teci zuaute ka hi ding uh hi.
46015016	Misite thokik lo hi leh Khazih zong a thokik lo ahi ding hi.
46015017	Khazih thokik lo hi leh na upna uh a mawkna hi dinga, na mawhnate uh sunga omlai na hi ding uh hi!
46015018	Khazih sunga a ihmu khinsa mite zong a mangthang uh hi ding hi.
46015019	Hih leitung nuntakna aa ding bekin Khazih sungah lametna a nei i hih leh mi khempeuh lakah a hehpihhuai pente i hi hi.
46015020	Tu in ahih leh, misite lak panin Khazih thokik khinzo a, a ihmu khinsa mite lakah gah masa a suakzo hi.
46015021	Mi khat hanga sihna hong tun mah bangin misite thawhkikna zong mi khat hang mahin a hong tung ahi hi.
46015022	Banghang hiam cihleh Adam sungah mi khempeuh a sih bangin Khazih sungah mi khempeuh a kinungtasak ding hi.
46015023	Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in amaute hun ciat a zui ding uh hi. Khazih in gah masa hi a, Khazih hong pai ciangin Khazih mite a thokik ding uh hi.
46015024	Amah in ukna, thuneihna le vangliatna khempeuh a suksiat khit ciangin Pa Pasian tungah kumpigam ap dinga, tua khit ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
46015025	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a galte khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih khit mateng a uk ding hi.
46015026	A nunung pen in a suksiat ding galin sihna ahi hi.
46015027	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Pasian in na khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih hi.” Ahih hangin, “Na khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih hi,” a cihna ah na khempeuh Khazih nuai‑a a koihpa Pasian kihel kha lo hi cih thu a kilang hi.
46015028	Tu in Pasian in na khempeuh ah a lianpen ahihna a kilat nadingin Tapa nuai ah na khempeuh a koih ciangin Tapa in zong na khempeuh ama nuai ah a koihpa ukna a mang ding hi.
46015029	Tua ahih manin misite thokik lo ding hi leh misite aa dinga kituiphumna in bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Banghang in misite aa dingin mite kituiphum ding uh ahi hiam?
46015030	Banghang in kote in zong tatsat loin lauhuaina thuakden nuam ding ka hi uh hiam?
46015031	I Topa Khazih Zeisu sungah note hong kisialhpih a ka gen in ah nisim in sihna ka thuak hi.
46015032	Misite a thokik lo ding hi in, mihing ngeina lel tawh Ephesus khua‑a gamsate tawh a kido hi leng, bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Misite thokik lo ding hileh, “Zingciang maha a si ding i hih teh ne in dawn ni!” i cih lel ding ahi hi.
46015033	Mite khemsa in om kei un. “Kholhpih hoihlo in gamtat hoih a susia hi.”
46015034	Thuman thutak ah khanglo unla, mawhna bawl nawn kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note pawlkhat in Pasian na thei kei uh hi. Hih thu in note maizum nadinga kong gen ahi hi.
46015035	Ahih hangin mi pawlkhat in, “Misite koici bangin hong thokik ding uh a, bangci bang pumpi tawh hong tho ding uh ahi hiam?” na ci kha ding uh hi.
46015036	Mihaipa aw, na tuh khaici muat masa loin a po thei kei ding hi.
46015037	Khaici na tuh uh ciangin a hong po dingin a kung na tuh kei uh a, mangbuh tang ahi a, khaici dang khatpeuh ahi zongin a tang bek na tuh uh hi.
46015038	Ahih hangin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin khaici khempeuh sungah a kung ding a guan hi.
46015039	Sa nam khempeuh a kibang kei hi. Mihingte sa nam khat, innsate sa a tuamkhat, ngasate sa a tuamkhat, vasate sa a tuamkhat ahi hi.
46015040	Vantung pumpi a om mah bangin leitung pumpi zong a om hi. Ahih hangin vantung nate thupina nam khat hi a, leitung nate thupina a tuamkhat ahi hi.
46015041	Ni in thupina nam khat, kha in thupina a tuamkhat le aksite in zong thupina a tuamkhat a neiciat uh hi. Aksi khat le khat zong a thupina uh a kilamdang lai hi.
46015042	Misite thawhkikna zong tuamah bang ahi hi. A kituh pumpi a muatthei hi a, a muat theilo in kithosak hi.
46015043	Vang nei loin kituh a, vangliatna tawh kithosak hi. Thanemna tawh kituh a, thahatna tawh kithosak hi.
46015044	Leitung pumpi in kituh a, kha pumpi in kithokiksak hi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a om hi.
46015045	Lai Siangtho ah, “A masa Adam in a nungta mi khat a hong suak hi,” ci in a kigelh hi. A nunung Adam in nuntakna a pia kha ahi hi.
46015046	Ahi zongin kha pumpi a om masa hilo a, leitung pumpi om masa in tua khit ciangin kha pumpi a om pan hi.
46015047	A masa mi in leitung pana piang leivui tawh kibawl hi a, a nihna mi in vantung pana hong pai Topa ahi hi.
46015048	Leivui pana kibawl mite in leivui pan a piang mipa tawh kibang uh a, vantung tawh kipawl mite in van pana hong pai mipa tawh a kibang uh hi.
46015049	Eite in leivui pana piang mipa mel i puak mah bangin van pana hong pai mipa mel zong i pua ding hi.
46015050	Tu in sanggamte aw, si le sa in Pasian kumpigam a luah thei kei hi. Tuamah bangin a muattheite in muattheihlohna a luah thei kei hi cih thu kong gen hi.
46015051	Ngai un, thusim khat kong gen ding hi. Eite khempeuh a ihmucip ding i hi kei a, i vekpi in i kikhel ding hi.
46015052	A nunung pengkul hong gin ciangin, mitphiat kal tomkha sungin i kikhel ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh pengkul hong ging dinga, misite a muatthei nawnlo in kithosak ding uh a, eite zong i kikhel ding hi.
46015053	Banghang hiam cihleh hih a muatthei pumpi in muattheihlohna silhin hih a sithei pumpi in sihtheihlohna a silh ding hi.
46015054	Tua bangin hih a muatthei pumpi in muattheihlohna silh a, hih a sithei pumpi in sihtheihlohna a silh ciangin, “Zawhna sungah sihna a kivalhtum zo hi.”
46015055	“Sihna aw, na gu koilai ah om ahi hiam? Hadesɠ aw, na gualzawhna koilai ah om ahi hiam?” ci a, Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa thu a tangtung ding hi.
46015056	Sihna gu in mawhna hi a, mawhna thahatna in thukham ahi hi.
46015057	Ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a gualzawhna hong pia Pasian tungah lungdam i ko hi.
46015058	Tua ahih manin kong it ka sanggamte aw, Topa sunga hanciamtak in na nasepna uh a mawkna suak lo hi cih thei na hih manun kiptak in ding un. A kilok zolo dingin om unla, Topa nasepna ah hanciam tawntung un.
46016001	Tu in misiangthote huh nading tawh kisai in Galatia gam pawlpite tunga ka thupiakte na zui un.
46016002	Mi khempeuh in na ngahna uh tawh kizui in pawlkhat na khenkhia unla, nipi kal khat sunga ni masa pen ni in na koihkhawm un. Tua hi leh kong tun ciangin kaihkhop tawmtawm kul nawnlo ding hi.
46016003	Kong tun ciangin tua na citpiakte uh Jerusalem khuapi ah a puak dingin na muan uh mite sawlin lai tawh ka paisak ding hi.
46016004	Kei pai ding a kul leh amaute in keimah tawh a paikhawm ding uh hi.
46016005	Tu in Macedonia gam nawk in paisawm ka hih manin tua gam ka kantan khit ciangin, note kiangah kong pai ding hi.
46016006	Ka paina khat peuhpeuh ah nong khaksawn theih nadingun note kiangah tawlkhat tamin, phalbi sungteng bang kong omthei kha ding hi.
46016007	Tutung in note kiangah hong lambang pak a i kimuh ding ciang bek ka ut kei hi. Topa in a hong awi leh note tawh tawmvei sung a omkhawm dingin ka kilamen hi.
46016008	Ahi zongin Pentecost ni dong Ephesus khua ah ka taam ding hi.
46016009	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in lawhcingtak in na sep theih nading kongpi khat hong honsak zo a, hong langpan mi zong tampi a om hi.
46016010	Tu in note kiangah Timothy hong pai leh lauthawng lo a hong om theih nading na ngaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in keimah bangin Topa nasem ahi hi.
46016011	Tua ahih manin kuamah in amah neuhmuh kei un. Kei kianga nuamtak a hong ciahkik theih nadingin hong kha un. Amah i sanggam dangte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin ka na lamen ding hi.
46016012	Tu in i sanggampa Apollos tawh kisai in amah note kiang hong pai ciangin a dang sanggamte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin nakpi in ka hanthawn hi. Amah in tu in hong pai noploh hangin hunlem a sak ciangin hong pai ding hi.
46016013	Pilvang unla, na upna uhah kiptak in ding un. Hang unla, thahat un.
46016014	Na sep na bawl khempeuh uh itna tawh a kisem hi tahen.
46016015	Sanggamte aw, Stephanas‑te innkuan pen Achaia gama thu‑um masapente hi uh a, misiangthote a huh dinga a kipiakna uh na thei uh hi.
46016016	Tua bang mite makaihna le kote hong huh a nasep a hahkat mite hong makaihnate na mang un ci in kong hanthawn hi.
46016017	Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus‑te hong tun uh ciangin note kisapna tengah hong huh thei uh ahih manin ka lungdam hi.
46016018	Amaute in keimah le note lungsim hong tawldamsak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua bang mite na pahtawi un.
46016019	Asia gama om pawlpi mite in note hong hopih uh hi. Aquila le Priscilla‑te in zong amau inn sunga om pawlpi tawh Topa minin lungsim takpi tawh hong hopih uh hi.
46016020	Sanggamte khempeuh in zong note hong hopih uh hi. A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat kihopih un.
46016021	Keimah Paul in kong hopihna lai ka khut mahmah tawh ka gelh ahi hi.
46016022	Topa Zeisu Khazih a itlo mi a om leh hamsiatna thuak tahen. Topa aw, hong paita in!
46016023	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen.
46016024	Kong itna in Khazih Zeisu sunga om note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
47001001	Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak a suak, keimah Paul le i sanggampa Timothy‑te in Corinth khua‑a om Pasian pawlpi le Achaia gama om misiangthote khempeuh kong hopih uh hi.
47001002	I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungmuanna note tungah om tahen.
47001003	Hehpihna hong pia i Pa le hehnepna khempeuh hong pia Pasian, i Topa Zeisu Khazih ii Pa le Pasian tungah phatna om tahen.
47001004	Tua Pasian in eite hong hehnepna mah bangin tua tawh eite in zong haksatna a thuak midangte i hehnep theih nadingin i thuak gimna khempeuh ah a hong hehnem hi.
47001005	Khazih hanga gimna tampi i thuak mah bangin Khazih tungtawn in hehnepna zong tampi i ngah hi.
47001006	Tu in, kote in gimna ka thuak uh leh note in hehnepna le hotkhiatna na ngah nading uh ahi hi. Tua in kote thuak gimnate mah zong note in a kibang in na thuak tentan zawh nading uh ahi hi. Kote in hehnepna ka ngah uh leh note aa dingin hehnepna le hotkhiatna ahi hi.
47001007	Tua ahih ciangin note aa dingin ka lametna uh a kip hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zong kote mah bangin gimna a thuakte na hihna uh ka thei uh a, tua mah bangin note in zong hehnepna a ngah na hi uh hi.
47001008	Sanggamte aw, Asia gam sunga ka thuak uh haksatnate thei loin na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Thuak zawh ding zahval in gen zawhloh haksatna ka thuak uh a, a nungta zolo ding zahin ka lungneu mahmah uh hi.
47001009	Hi hi, a si dinga thukhenna a thuak i hi ta hi ka kici uh hi. Ahi zongin tua in ko le ko kimuang loin misite a thokiksak Pasian ka muan nading uh ahi hi.
47001010	Tua Pasian in a lauhuai sih theihna panin hong honkhia zo a, kote hong honkhia in amah muang ka hih manun hong honkhia lai ding hi.
47001011	Mi tampi in thu hong ngetsak uh a, kote tangin mi tampi in lungdam a koh theih nadingun thungetna tawh kote nong panpih uh hi.
47001012	Kote kisialhna in hih thu ahi hi. Ci le sa pilna a hilo Pasian hehpihna thupha hangin lungsim siangtho le cihtakna tawh leitung ah ka gamta uh a, a diakdiak in note mai ah lungsim kisuanna om loin teci ka pang uh hi.
47001013	Note kiangah thudang gelh loin na sim theih na tel theih ding uh thu bek kong gelh uh hi. Tu in note in a tawp dongin a thei dingin kong um uh hi.
47001014	Note in kote thu a cingin na thei nai kei uh hi. Topa Zeisu Ni ciangin note kisaktheihpih ding mi ka hih mah bangun note zong kote kisaktheihpih ding mite na hi uh hi.
47001015	Hih bang lungmuanna nei ka hih manin khatvei phattuamna na ngahkik theih nadingun note kiangah hawh ding ka ngaihsun hi.
47001016	Kong hawh ciangin Macedonia gam ka pai masa dinga, tua gam pan kong kilehkik ciangin note kiangah kong bang ding hi. Tua panin note in Judea gamah nong kha ding uh hi.
47001017	Tua ahih manin hih banga ka gelna a mawkgel ka hi hiam? Ci le sa deihna zui a, hi mah e, hi kei e, ci themthum in a gel ka hi hiam?
47001018	Ahih hangin Pasian pen a citak ahihna tawh kizui in note kiangah thu kong gen uh ciangin hi mah hi, hilo hi ka ci themthum kei uh hi.
47001019	Banghang hiam cihleh Silvanus, Timothy‑te le keimah in kong hilh uh Pasian Tapa Zeisu Khazih in hi mah, hi kei cih themthum hilo in ama sungah, ahi mah hi tawntung hi.
47001020	Pasian hong kamciamte khempeuh in ama sungah, hi mah vive hi a, kote hangin Pasian min a kiphat theih nadingin Amen ahi hi.
47001021	Tu in Khazih sungah kote le note hong kipsak a, sathau hong nilhpa in Pasian ahi hi.
47001022	Amah in eite tungah ciaptehna hong khen zo a, kipsakna in i lungsim sungah Kha hong pia zo hi.
47001023	Tua thamlo in note hong dawm nuam ka hih manin Corinth khua ah hong pai nawnlo ka hihna Pasian in hong theihpih hi.
47001024	Hih bang ka cih ciangun note upna hong ukcip hilo in note lungdam nadinga note tawh a semkhawm ka hi zaw uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh upna tawh a dingkip na hi uh hi.
47002001	Tua ahih manin note lungsim nasak ding bekin kong zin nawnloh nading ka lungsim ka khentat hi.
47002002	Note hong dahsak leng kei hong lungdamsak ding kua hi nawn ding ahi hiam? Kong dahsak note mah kei hong lungdamsak dingte hilo na hi uh hiam?
47002003	Kong pai ciangin kei hong lungdamsak ding ahi note in kei nong dahsak khakloh nadingun hih laikhak hong gelh ka hi hi. Note khempeuh kei tawh lungdam khawm dingin kong muang hi.
47002004	Tua ahih manin haksatna lianpi le lunggim mahmah kawmsa in khitui naptui tawh lai kong khak hi. Note kong dahsak nopman hilo in kong it mahmah lam na theih nadingun lai hong khak ka hi zaw hi.
47002005	Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in dah nading thukhat a piansak ciangin ka uang genna hilo in kei hong dahsakna sangin note hong dahsakna nasia zaw lai ding hi.
47002006	Mipi a tam zaw in tua bang mipa tunga gimna a piakteng uh kicing zo hi.
47002007	A taktak in ci lehang tua pa mawhna maisak a, tha na piak ding uh hi zaw hi. Tua hi kei leh khasialua in siatlawh zaw kha ding hi.
47002008	Tua ahih manin amah na it takpi lamuh na lahkik nadingun kong hanthawn hi.
47002009	Na khempeuh ah thu na mang takpi uh hiam cih kong ettelnop manin lai‑a hong khak ka hi hi.
47002010	Tu in mi khatpeuh a mawhna na maisak uh leh keimah in zong ka maisak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh a mawhna maisak ding om a, ka maisak leh note kong khualna tawh Khazih hanga ka maisak ahi hi.
47002011	Mawhna kimaisak kei lehang Satan in noptak hong sa ding ahih manin a kimaisak i hi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ama tup le ngimziate a theilo i hi kei hi.
47002012	Tua banah, Khazih lungdamna thu hilh dinga Troas khua ka pailai in Topa in kei aa dingin kong hong honsak hi.
47002013	Tua khua ah ka sanggampa Titus ka muh loh ciangin, ka lungnuam theilo ahih manin amaute mangpha khakin Macedonia gamah ka pai hi.
47002014	Tu in Khazih hangin gualzawhna hong ngahsak den a, kote tungtawn in mun khempeuh ah Khazih theihna gim namtui a kizelsak Pasian tungah lungdamna thu tung tahen.
47002015	Banghang hiam cihleh kote in hotkhiatna a ngah mite le a mangthang mite lakah Pasian aa dingin Khazih gimnamtui tawh a kibang ka hi uh hi.
47002016	Mi pawlkhat aa dingin sihna a piangsak sihna gimnamtui tawh ka kibang uh a, a dang pawlkhatte aa dingin ahih leh nuntakna a piangsak nuntakna gimnamtui tawh ka kibang uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang nasep a sem zo ding kua kilawm ahi hiam?
47002017	Banghang hiam cihleh midang tampite bang hilo in kote in Pasian thu summet bawlna in ka zang kei uh hi. Khazih sungah Pasian kiang pana kisawl mite bangin Pasian mai ah cihtakna tawh thu ka gen uh hi.
47003001	Tua bang ka cih ciangin ko le ko hong kiphatkik zel ka hi uh hiam? Mi pawlkhatte bangin thukimpihna lai note tunga lah ding ahi zongin note kiang pana thukimpihna lai lak ding ahi zongin kisam ding ka hi uh hiam?
47003002	Note pen mi khempeuh in sima a theih uh kote lungtang tunga kigelh kote laikhak na hi uh hi.
47003003	Laitui tawh kigelh hilo in a nungta Pasian Kha tawh a kigelh kote nasepna gah Khazih laikhak na hi uh hi cih teltak in a kilang zo hi. Suangpek tunga kigelh hilo in lungtang satak tunga kigelh laikhak na hi uh hi.
47003004	Kote in Khazih hangin Pasian mai‑a ka khamuanna uh tua bang ahi hi.
47003005	Ko le ko hi ka kisak nadingun ko sungah kicinna ka neihman uh hilo in kote kicinna in Pasian kiang pan ahi hi.
47003006	Amah in thuciam thak tawh kisai nasem dingin kote hong bawl zo hi. Hih in thukham laimal hang hilo in Kha hang ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham laimal in sihna piangsak a, Kha in nuntakna a piangsak hi.
47003007	Suangpek tungah kikhuak in a kigelh sihna a piangsak nasepna vanglian mahmah a, Moses maitang tangsak ahih manin Israel mite in Moses maitang a en zo kei uh hi. Ahi zongin tua a vang tang damdam in a mual hi.
47003008	Tua ahih leh Kha nasepna vanglian zaw loin om ding ahi hiam?
47003009	Mawhsakna a piangsak nasepna tua zahin vanglian ahih leh dikna a piangsak nasepna vanglian zawtham lai ding hi.
47003010	Hih a lianzaw vangliatna tawh tehna in a masa tua vangliatna a cihtak peuhmah kei hi.
47003011	Damdam in a mual pen vanglian ahih leh a kip tawntung pen vanglian zawtham ding hi.
47003012	Tua hi a, tua bang lametna nei ka hih manun hangtak in thu ka gen uh hi.
47003013	Israel mite in damdam in a mual Moses maitang a vangtang en zolo uh ahih manin Moses in a maitang a khuh bangin, kote in ka khuh kei uh hi.
47003014	Ahih hangin amaute a lungsim uh kimialsak ahih manin tuni dongin Thuciam Lui a sim uh ciangin tua maikhuhna in a liahlai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua maikhuhna Khazih hangin kilakhia khinzo hi.
47003015	Ahih hangin tuni dongin Moses laibu a sim uh ciangin tua maikhuhna in a lungsim uh a liahlai hi.
47003016	Ahi zongin, Topa lamah mi khatpeuh a kihei ciangin tua maikhuhna a kilakhia hi.
47003017	Tu in Topa in Kha ahi hi. Topa Kha omna munah suahtakna a om hi.
47003018	Eite khempeuh in maitang kikhuh nawnlo in limlang a ki‑et bangin Topa vangliatna i mu hi. Topa Kha in vangliatna ah ama lim le mel sun dingin hong khel a, minthanna khat panin minthanna sang zaw ah hong omsak hi.
47004001	Tua ahih ciangin kote in hehpihna ka ngahna uh tawh kizui in hih nasep ngah ka hih manun ka lungkia kei uh hi.
47004002	Tua hi a, a zumhuai simtham tatnate ka nusia uh hi. Thukawi tawh khemna ka zang kei uh a, Pasian thu ka kawikaih kei uh hi. Thuman thutak teltak in ka hilh uh a, mikim lungsim in a san theih dingun Pasian mai ah maantak in ka om uh hi.
47004003	Kote hilh lungdamna thu a kiliah ahih leh zong siatna a thuak ding mite aa ding bekin a kiliah ahi hi.
47004004	Pasian lim le mel Khazih vangliatna lungdamna thu khuavak a muh theihloh nadingun hih leitung pasian in a umlo mite lungsim a mialsak hi.
47004005	Kote in komau thu a hilh hilo in Khazih Zeisu in Topa ahi hi cih thu le Zeisu hangin note sila ka hihna uh ka hilh uh hi.
47004006	Banghang hiam cihleh khuamial sung panin khuavak tangkhia hen ci a, thu a piapa in Pasian ahi hi. Tua Pasian in Zeisu Khazih maitang a om Pasian vangliatna hong theisak in kote lungsim sungah khuavak bangin hong tangsak zo hi.
47004007	Ahih hangin tua a lian mahmah vangliatna in kote aa hilo in Pasian aa ahihlam a kilat nadingin leibel tawh a kibang kote pumpi sungah a manpha mahmah tua vangliatna ka nei uh hi.
47004008	Mun tuamtuam panin netcipna ka thuak uh hangin ka kisia kei uh hi. Ka lungman uh hangin ka lungsim uh a bei kei hi.
47004009	Hong kibawlsiat hangin hong kinusia kei hi. Hong kisattuk hangin hong kisusia zo kei hi.
47004010	Kote pumpi ah Zeisu nuntakna a kilatkhiat theih nadingin Topa Zeisu sihna kote pumpi ah ka pua kawikawi uh hi.
47004011	Banghang hiam cihleh a sithei kote pumpi ah Zeisu nuntakna a kilatkhiat theih nadingin Zeisu hangin sihna ah a nungta kote a kipia ngitnget ka hi uh hi.
47004012	Tua ahih manin sihna in kote sungah na sem a, note sungah ahih leh nuntakna in na a sem hi.
47004013	Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh, “Um ka hih manin ka gen hi,” a cih bangin upna nei ka hih manun um in ka gen uh hi.
47004014	Topa Zeisu a thokiksakpa in kote zong tua Zeisu tawh hong thokik khawmsak in note tawh ama kiang hong tunkhawm ding hi cih ka thei uh hi.
47004015	Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh note phattuam nading ahi hi. Tua in mi tampi tungah a kicing hehpihna thupha a kizelh ciangin Pasian minthan nadingin lungdamkohna zong a dimlet nading ahi hi.
47004016	Tua ahih ciangin ka lungkia kei uh hi. Ka pualam mi uh a kiam semsem hangin ka sunglam mi uh ni khat khit ni khat a thaksuak den hi.
47004017	Tawlkhat sung bek ka thuak uh a genthamlo haksatna in kote aa dingin a thupi zawtham tawntung vangliatna a piangsak hi.
47004018	A kimuthei nate mitsuan loin a kimu theilo nate ka mitsuan uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate tomkal sung bek om dinga, a kimu theilo nate ahih leh a om tawntung ding hi.
47005001	Eite teenna lei inn ahi hih buuk a kisuksiat leh mihing khut tawh a kibawl lo, Pasian kiang pan tawntung inn khat vantung ah i nei hi cih i thei hi.
47005002	Tua ahih manin vantung pana hong pai ding tua inn puan bangin hong kisilhsak ding hun ngaklah in hih leibuuk sungah khuisa in i om hi.
47005003	Tua banga hong kisilhsak ciangin guaktang a om tawh i kibang kei ding hi.
47005004	Banghang hiam cihleh hih leibuuk sungah i teen sungin vangik pua bangin khuisa in i om hi. Eite in guaktang a om nuam hilo in nuntakna in sihna a valhtum theih nadingin tua buuk hong kisilhsak ding i utman hi zaw hi.
47005005	Hih bang ahi ding maha eite hong bawl pen Pasian hi a, amah in kipsak nading Kha a hong piapa zong ahi hi.
47005006	Tua ahih manin lungmuangtak in i om tawntung hi. Hih pumpi sunga i om laiteng Topa tawh a omkhawm nailo hi hang cih i thei hi.
47005007	Banghang hiam cihleh muhna tawh kalsuan loin upna tawh i kalsuan hi.
47005008	Lungmuangtak in i om hi ka ci hi. Hi takpi hi. Pumpi tawh kikhen in Topa tawh omkhop ding i ut zaw hi.
47005009	Tua ahih manin hih leibuuk ah i om a, i om kei zongin Pasian lungdamsak ding i tupna ahi hi.
47005010	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih thukhenna tokhom mai ah eite khempeuh i ding dinga, khat ciatin i pumpi a i bawl a sia a pha tawh kituak in thaman i sang ding hi.
47005011	Topa a kihtakhuaina bang hiam cih kote in thei ka hih manun mite a zol ka hi uh hi. Pasian in kote hihna hong tel bangin note lungsim ah kote hong tel dingin zong ka hong um hi.
47005012	Note mai‑a hong kiphatkik zel ka hi kei uh a, kote nong kisialhpih theih nading uh hunhoih hong bawlsak ka hi zaw uh hi. Lungsim sung hilo in a tungtham teng a kisialhpih mite na dawnkik theih nading uh ahi hi.
47005013	Kote ka hai uh leh Pasian aa ding hi in, ka pil uh leh note aa ding ahi hi.
47005014	Mi khempeuh tangin mi khat si khinzo ahih manin, mi khempeuh zong a si ahi hi cih ka um taktak uh hi. Khazih itna in kote hong tawsawn hi.
47005015	Mi khempeuh tangin amah si khinzo ahih manin, a nungta mite in amau aa dingin nungta loin amaute tangin si a, a thokikpa aa dingin a nuntak ding uh ahi hi.
47005016	Tua hi a, tu a kipan in ci le sa tawh kuamah ka en nawn kei uh hi. Khazih zong ci le sa tawh ka theih ngei uh hangin, tu in tua bangin ka thei nawn kei uh hi.
47005017	Tua ahih manin mi khatin Khazih sungah a om leh mi thak a suak hi. En in, a lui nate bei in na khempeuh a thak a suakzo hi.
47005018	Tu in hih thu khempeuh Pasian kiang pan hi a, amah in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in amah le eite hong kilemkiksak pa ahi hi. Amah in tua kilemkikna nasep kote hong pia hi.
47005019	Tua kilemkikna thu in hih bang ahi hi. Pasian in leitung mite thu palsatnate ciamteh loin Khazih hangin amah tawh hong kilemkiksak a, tua kilemkikna thu kote hong pia hi.
47005020	Tua ahih manin tu in kote in Khazih tangmite ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote tungtawn in note hong thum ahi hi. Tuamah bangin kote in zong Pasian tawh kilemkik un ci in Khazih tangin kong thum uh hi.
47005021	Eite in Khazih sungah Pasian dikna i tanhtheih nadingin Pasian in mawhna a theilo Khazih eite tangin mawhna a suaksak hi.
47006001	Tua hi a, na sansa uh Pasian hehpihna thupha a mawkna na suahsak khakloh nadingun Pasian tawh na a semkhawm ka hihna uh tawh kizui in kong thum uh hi.
47006002	Amah in, “San theihna hunin nang kong dawng a, Hotkhiatna ni in nang kong huh hi,” a ci hi. En un, tu hunin san theihna hun hi a, tu hunin hotkhiatna ni ahi hi.
47006003	Kote nasepna kuamah in hong gensiat loh nadingin puk theih nading bangmah ka hih kei uh hi.
47006004	Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh lam tuamtuam panin lakin thuak keikaina, haksatna, kitangsapna, gentheihna,
47006005	vuak le satna, thongkiatna, khutlum thuakna, haksapi a nasepna, ihmut kipelhna, anngolhna,
47006006	sianthona, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Kha Siangtho huhna, itna maan,
47006007	thuman thutak genna, Pasian vangliatna, vei le takah dikna galhiam tawina,
47006008	hong kipahtawi ciang le hong kiselpho ciangin, hong kiphat ciang le hong kigensiat ciangin zong Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh thuman gen kimlai mi khemte ci a, hong kingawhna ah,
47006009	mi tampi theih hi napi kuama theih loh banga hong kibawlnate ah, si dekphial napi ka hin teitei nate uh, hong kisat hong kivua napi thahna ka thuak lohnate uh,
47006010	dah napi ka lungdam tawntungna uh, zawng napi ka hauhnate uh, bangmah neilo napi na khempeuh ka neihnate uh ah, Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh hi.
47006011	Corinth mite aw! Note tungah siangtak in thu kong gen uh a, note aa dingin ka lungsim uh zaitak in ka hong uh hi.
47006012	Note tungah sit nei loin kong it uh a, note in na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh kote nong it kei uh hi.
47006013	Tu in, tate tunga thugen banga kong gen inah, kong itna uh nong thuhkik theih nadingun note in zong na lungsim uh kote aa dingin hong hon un.
47006014	Thu‑umlo mite tawh a kituaklo hakkol puakhawm kei un. Dikna le gitlohna kikhawl khawm thei ahi hiam? Khuavak le khuamial kipawl thei ahi hiam?
47006015	Khazih le Belial kithuhual thei ahi hiam? Thu‑um mi in thu‑umlo mi tawh bang neikhawm thei ahi hiam?
47006016	Pasian biakinnpi le milimte kithutuak thei ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh note in a nungta Pasian biakinnpi na hi uh hi. Pasian in a gensa mah bangin, “Amaute sungah teengin Amaute lakah ka vak kawikawi ding hi. Amaute Pasian ka hi dinga, Amaute in keima mite ahi ding uh hi.”
47006017	Tua ahih manin, Topa in, “Amaute lak pan paikhia in, A tuam in om unla, A siangtholo nate lawng kei un, Tua ciangin note kong sang ding hi,” ci hi.
47006018	Vanglianpen Topa in, “Note Pa ka hi dinga, Note zong ka tanu ka tapate, Na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
47007001	Tua ahih ciangin kong itte aw, hih kamciamnate ngah khin i hih manin pumpi le lungsim a ninsak nate pan kisiansuah in sianthona tawh a kipawl Pasian kihtakna ah picing in om ni.
47007002	Kote hong sang un. Kuama tungah ka gamta khial kei uh a, kuamah ka siasak kei uh hi. Khemna tawh kuama neihsa ka laksak kei uh hi.
47007003	Hih bang ka cih ciangin note hong mawhsak ka hi kei hi. A beisa a kong genngei mah bangin note tawh sikhawm hingkhawm nuam zahin kote lungsim ah na om uh hi.
47007004	Note tunga thugen ding ka hang mahmah a, note hanga ka kisialhna zong a lian mahmah hi. Hehnepna tawh ka kidim a, kote haksatnate sung mahah zong ka lungdamna kigen zolo hi.
47007005	Macedonia gam ka tun uh ciangin ka kiheina peuh uhah bawlsiatna tuak ka hih manun ka pumpi uh a tawldam man kei hi. A pualam ah kidona omin a sunglam ah launa a om hi.
47007006	Ahi zongin a lungkia mite tha a guan Pasian in Titus hong paisakna tawh tha hong guan hi.
47007007	Ama hong paina hang bek hilo in note hanga ama tha ngahna in zong tha hong guan hi. Kei nong itna uh kei hanga na dahnate uh kei nong khual mahmah nate uh zong hong gen a, ka lungdam semsem hi.
47007008	Kong laikhak in note hong dahsak kha ngei ahih manin ka kisik ngei a, ahi zongin tu in ka kisik nawn kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua laikhak in tawmvei sung bek hong dahsak hi cih ka thei hi.
47007009	Tu in, note kong dahsak mana lungdam hilo in tua dahna in hong kisiksak ahih manin a lungdam ka hi zaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Pasian deihna tawh kituak in a dah na hi uh a, kote hangin supna na nei kei uh hi.
47007010	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna tawh a kituak dahna in kisikkikna piangsak a, tua kisikkikna in hotkhiatna a hong tun hi. Hotkhiatna a ngah mite kisik ngeilo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin, leitung vai‑a dahna in sihna a piangsak hi.
47007011	Pasian deihna tawh kituak a dahna in note sungah bang teng piangsak hiam cih en dih un. Tua in, kihahsiang nopna, hehna, lau theihna, lunggulh luatna, thalawpna le, khialhnate daanpiakna tawh puahphat nopna lungsim hong neisak hi. Hih thu ah note in na khempeuh tungah paubanna na neihlohna uh na lak khinzo uh hi.
47007012	Tua ahih ciangin lai kong khak hangin khialhna a bawlpa aa ding le a thuakpa aa dingin hong gelh ka hi kei hi. Note kong khualna uh Pasian mai ah a kilat theih nadingin kong gelh uh hi zaw hi.
47007013	Tua ahih manin note in tha na ngah uh ciangin kote in zong tha ka ngah uh hi. Note khempeuh in Titus lungsim thakhauhsak na hih manun amah lungdam mahmah a, tua in kote hong lungdamsak sawnsawn hi.
47007014	Ama tunga note kong kisialhpihna zong nong maizumsak kei uh hi. Thu khempeuh ahi bangbang a kong gen mah bangun Titus tunga note kong kisialhpihna uh zong a maan mah ahi hi.
47007015	Note khempeuh in thu mangin launa le linna tawh amah na sanna uh a ngaihsutkik ciangin note a hong itna lian semsem hi.
47007016	Tua ahih ciangin na khat peuhpeuh ah note kong muan theih manin ka lungdam hi.
47008001	Tua banah sanggamte aw, Pasian in Macedonia gam pawlpite tunga a piak hehpihna thupha na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
47008002	Amaute in haksatna lianpi thuakkawmsa in lungdam mahmah uh a, a zawn mahmah uh hangin a piaknopna uh lian mahmah hi.
47008003	Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a piakzawh zah ciang uh a piak ban ah a piakzawh zah uh sangin a tam zaw pia nuam uh hi cih ka thei hi.
47008004	Misiangthote huhna piakna ah amaute zong a kihel khak nadingun hong thum ngetngut uh hi.
47008005	Kote upmawh bang hilo in, Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua khit ciangin Pasian deihna tawh kituak in kote tungah hong kipia uh hi.
47008006	Tua ahih manin hih piakkhiat nasepna Titus in a patkhiat ahih mah bangin note lakah zong a hong sepsuak nadingin amah ka hanthawn uh hi.
47008007	Note in upna, thugenna, thutheihna, hahkatna, le kote nong itna uh a kipan na khempeuh ah na kicin mah bangun hih piakkhiatna lamah zong cinghtak in na pia un.
47008008	Hih bang ka cih ciangin a hong thatang sawl hilo in itna na nei taktak uh hiam cih midangte lawpna tawh hong ze‑et nuam ka hi zaw hi.
47008009	Banghang hiam cihleh amah hau napi note hangin mizawng hong suak i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha na thei uh hi. Tua in ama zawnna hangin note na hauh theih nading uh ahi hi.
47008010	Tu in note aa ding ngaihsutna khat kong pia nuam hi. Tu ma kum khat lai in piaknopna lungsim a nei masa le a pia masa pen na hihna uh in note hamphatna ahi hi.
47008011	Tua ahih ciangin tu in na piaknopna lungsim uh le na piakkhiat taktakna uh a kikim dingin tangtungsak unla, na hihzawh zahzah un pia un.
47008012	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin a neih nailoh sung pan hilo in a neih khitsa sung pan piaknopna lungsim tawh a piak bangbang a kisang ahi hi.
47008013	Hihteng kong gen ciangin midangte van zangsak a, note vangik hong suatsawm ka hi kei uh hi.
47008014	Tu laitak a note neihna in amaute kisapna huhin, amaute in zong a neih uh ciangin note kisapna hong huhkik in, na kihuhtuah diamdiam theih nading uh ahi hi.
47008015	Hih in, “Tampi a kaikhawmpa aa vallo a, tawmkhat a kaikhawmpa aa zong kisam lo hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh bang ahi hi.
47008016	Ahih hangin kong khual bangun a hong khual dingin Pasian in Titus zong khualna lungsim a guat manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
47008017	Banghang hiam cihleh kote sawlna hang bek hilo in ama utna tawh lawptak in a hong pai ahi hi.
47008018	Lungdamna thugenna ah pawlpi khempeuh in a phat mahmah uh sanggampa khat amah tawh kong sawl uh hi.
