47008019	Tua sanggampa pen hih huhna letsong puakna ah kote tawh a zinkhawm dinga pawlpite in a teelkhiatpa ahi hi. Topa mahmah minthan nading le midangte na huhnopna uh a kilatkhiat nadingin hih huhna piak ding vai a hawmkhia ka hi uh hi.
47008020	Hih ka vaihawmna uh ahi citpiakna tawh kisai in paubanna ka neih khakloh nadingun ka kidawm uh hi.
47008021	Topa muhna bekah hilo in mihingte muhna mahmah ah zong a pahtakhuai in na ka sem uh hi.
47008022	Na khat peuhpeuh ah citak mahmah hi ci a, ka muh den uh sanggampa khat zong amaute tawh kong sawl uh hi. Amah in note hong muang mahmah ahih manin a citak semsem hi.
47008023	Titus tawh kisai mi khatpeuh in hong dot khak leh amah pen ka kikholhpihpa le note aa dinga ka naseppihpa ahi hi. A dang i sanggamte thu hong kidot le amaute in Khazih minthanna ahi pawlpite kamtaite ahi uh hi.
47008024	Tua ahih manin itna na neih takpi lam uh le note kong kisialhpihnate a maan takpi ahihlam amaute le pawlpite mai ah na lak un.
47009001	Tu in misiangthote huhna tawh kisai in lai kong khak hangin a valkhong hilel ding hi.
47009002	Banghang hiam cihleh huh nopna lungsim na neih lam uh ka thei hi. Tua hi a, Macedonia gam mite kiangah, Achaia gam mite zong tu ma kum khat laipek in a kiging khinzo uh hi, ci in note kong kisialhpih hi. Tua ciangin note lawpna in mi tampi a thalawpsak hi.
47009003	Ahi zongin hi banga kong kisialhpihna uh a mawkna a suah loh nadingin kong gensa mah bangin na kiginkholh theih nadingun sanggamte kong sawl hi.
47009004	Macedonia mite khatpeuh in kei hong zui henla, note a kigingsa in hong mu kei le uh (note cih thadah) ko mahmah zong muangtak a kong kisialhpihna teng uh hangin ka maizum ding uh hi.
47009005	Tua ahih manin tu ma‑a na kamciamsa uh huhnate a kaikhawmkhol dingin sanggamte hong paikholh ding uh genpihhuai ka sa hi. Piak dinga na kamciamsa bangun a baihsa in na om le uh cin it pipi a sawl zawh thu tawh na piak uh hilo in phaltak a na piak uh ahihlam hong kilang ding hi.
47009006	Tu in kong cih in ah khaici tawmkha a vawh mi in tawmkha bek at dinga, tampi a vawh mi in tampi a at ding hi.
47009007	Mi khatpeuh in a lungsim sunga piak dingin a sehsa bangin pia tahen. It pipi le piak loh phamawh hi cihna tawh pia kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in lungkimtak a a pia mite bek a pakta hi.
47009008	Note in na khempeuh kicingtak in nei tawntung in nasep hoih khempeuh nasep zawh nadingun hehpihna thupha khempeuh dimtak in a hong pia theipa in Pasian ahi hi.
47009009	Tua in, “Amah in hawmkhia in, Mizawngte pia a, Ama dikna a kip tawntung hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
47009010	Tu in, khaici vawhpa tungah a vawh ding khaici a piak banah a nek ding an a piapa in na vawhsa khaici hong piak khit banah hong pungsak dinga, note dikna gah zong a khangsak ding hi.
47009011	Lungkimtak in na piakzawh nadingun na khempeuh hong neisak a, tua in kote tungtawn in Pasian tungah lungdamkohna a piangsak hi.
47009012	Hih na citpiakna un misiangthote kisapna teng a huh banah Pasian tungah lungdamkohna zong tampi a piangsak hi.
47009013	Khazih lungdamna thu mangin na zuihna uh ahi zongin amaute le midang khempeuh tunga na cit na siamna uh ahi zongin hih huhna tawh na lahkhiat uh ciangin amaute in Pasian min a phat uh hi.
47009014	Tua ahih manin Pasian in note hong piak a kicing hehpihna thupha hangin amaute in note hong ngai uh a, thu hong ngetsak uh hi.
47009015	Kam tawh a kigen zolo Pasian letsong hangin ama tungah phatna om tahen!
47010001	Note kianga kong om ciangin kiniamkhiat in kong omkhop loh ciangin a hangpa keimah Paul in tu in Khazih lungnemna le nunnemna tawh kong thum hi.
47010002	Ci le sa tawh a kalsuan banga hong ngawh mi pawlkhatte tungah han ka sawm bangin note tawh kong om ciangin han a kul loh nadingin kong thum hi.
47010003	Banghang hiam cihleh kote in ci le sa tawh ka nuntak uh hangin ci le sa tawh gal ka do kei uh hi.
47010004	Banghang hiam cihleh kote galhiamte in ci le sa galhiamte hilo in kulhpite a cimgawpsak a vanglian Pasian galhiamte ahi hi.
47010005	Pasian theihna tawh a kilehbulh ngaihsutna le kipilsakna khempeuh tua galhiamte tawh ka phukpai uh a, lungsim gelna khempeuh zong Khazih thumang dingin salkaih bangin ka kai uh hi.
47010006	Note khempeuh in thu na man khit uh ciangin, thu a manglo mite khempeuh daan a pia dingin a kigingsa in ka om uh hi.
47010007	Na khat peuhpeuh a puatham bek en na hi uh hiam? Mi khatpeuh in Khazih mi ka hi hi a cih leh amah bangmah in kote zong Khazih mi ka hih lam uh phawk hen.
47010008	Banghang hiam cihleh note kisiat nading hilo in na kip nadingun Topa in thuneihna hong pia a, tua thuneihna tawm bang ka kisialhpih khak leh zong ka kisuang tuan kei ding hi.
47010009	Kong laikhakte tawh note hong lauthawngsak ka suah ding ka ut kei hi.
47010010	Mi pawlkhatte in, “A laikhakte thuthuk in bun mahmah napi amah taktak a hong om ciangin a zawngkhalpi hi a, a thugente zong bangmah pi hilo hi,” hong ci uh hi.
47010011	Ko mau pumpi kong om loh uh ciangin laikhak sunga kong gen bangbang un komau pumpi ka hong om uh ciangin hong gamta takpi ding ka hihna uh tua mite in theita uh hen.
47010012	Amau le amau a kiphat mite tawh kipawl khat ding le kitehkak ding ka ut kei uh hi. Amau le amau khat le khat kiteh in a ki‑etkakte in mi pillo ahi uh hi.
47010013	Ahi zongin, kote in a khengval in kisial loin Pasian hong ciangtansakna sung bekah ka kisial ding uh hi. Tua ciangtanna in note zong hong huam phadeuh hi.
47010014	Note omna ciangdong hong banlo bangin, kote in khengin a sem ka hi kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih lungdamna thu hilh dingin note omna dongin kong tung zo uh hi.
47010015	A khengval in kisial loin midangte sepsa peuh zong ka kisialhpih kei uh hi. Note upna a khanna tawh kizui in, kote nasepna huang zong nakpi in khangin tangzai ding hi cih ka lamen uh hi.
47010016	Tua hi leh note gam khengin lungdamna thu ka tangko thei ding uh hi. Midangte huang sunga a sepsa teng uh ka kisialhpih kei ding uh hi.
47010017	Ahih hangin “a kisial mi in Topa hang bekin kisial tahen.”
47010018	Banghang hiam cihleh amah le amah a kiphat mite kisang lo a, Topa in a phat mite bek a kisang hi.
47011001	Ka haina tawmno khat hong thuak zo le uh teh ka ut a, zong nong thuak zo khin uh hi.
47011002	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian tawh kipawl hazatna tawh kei zong note kong haza hi. Nungak siangtho khat bangin Khazih tungah kong piak theih nadingin pasal khat tawh a kiteeng dingin kong kham zo hi.
47011003	Gulpi in zuauthu tawh Eve a khem bangin lam khatpeuh tawh note zong hong khem a, Khazih sunga na neih uh a citak le a siangtho na lungsim uh hong suksiatsak khak ding ka lauthawng hi.
47011004	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh hong pai in kote in kong hilhsa uh a hilo a tuamdang Zeisu khat hong hilh henla, na ngahsa uh a hilo kha dang khat ngahin na san ngeisa uh a hilo, a dang lungdamna thu khatpeuh sang le uh teh phamawh na saktuak kei uh hi!
47011005	Ahih hangin sawltak lianpite sangin a neuzaw in ka kingaihsun peuhmah kei hi.
47011006	Thugen ka siam loh hangin theihna lamah tua bang ka hi kei hi. Hih thu note lakah ka sepsa khempeuh uh tawh siangtak in kong lak khinzo uh hi.
47011007	Note kong lapsang theih nadingin keimah kiniamkhiat in Pasian lungdamna thu a khawnkhong in kong hilh hi. Tua banga ka hihna a khial ka hi hiam?
47011008	Note lakah na kong sep theih nadingin pawlpi dangte kiang pan thaman la ka hih manin amaute sum a sut ka suak hi.
47011009	Note kianga ka omlai in kisapna pawlkhat ka neih hangin kuama tungah vangik kong suan kei hi. Macedonia gam pana hong pai sanggamte in ka kisapna teng hong sik uh hi. Na khatpeuh ah note aa ding vangik ka suah loh nadingin ka kidawm a, ka kidawm lai ding hi.
47011010	Ka sungah Khazih thuman thutak a om mah bangin Achaia gam sunga ka kisialhna uh kuamah in a hong kham zo kei ding hi.
47011011	Banghang ahi hiam? Note kong it loh man ahi hiam? Pasian in thei hi!
47011012	Thu nei nuam mite in thuneihna a ngah loh nading ahi zongin amaute in kote banga nasem hi ci a,, a kisaktheih loh nadingin tu a ka hih bangin ka hihlai ding hi.
47011013	Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang mite in a manlo sawltakte hi uh a, Khazih sawltak banga a kibawltawm mi a khem nasemte ahi uh hi.
47011014	Hih thu a lamdang hilo hi! Banghang hiam cihleh Satan nangawn khuavak vantungmi bangin kibawltawm thei hi.
47011015	Tua ahih manin ama nasemte zong dikna nasemte bangin a kibawltawm uh ciangin a lamdang hilo hi. Amaute in a gamtatna bangun a thuak ding uh hi.
47011016	Khatvei kong cihkik in ah, kuamah in mihai bangin hong ngaihsun kei hen. Tua banga hong ngaihsun teitei a om leh tawm ka kisialh beh theih nadingin mihai bangin hong sang hen.
47011017	Hih bang ka cih ciangin Topa thugen bangin a gen hilo in, mihai bangin kimuangtak in a hong kisial ka hi hi.
47011018	Mi tampi in ci le sa a ahihna kisialhpih uh ahih leh kei zong kong kisial ding hi.
47011019	Note mipil na hih manun mihaite lungdamtak in na thuakzo uh hi.
47011020	Sila bangin hong kibawl in hong kinetum a, na neihsa uh hong kilaksak ciangin, mi khatpeuh amah le amah hong kithupisak in na pang uh a hong kibet ciangin na thuakzo uh hi.
47011021	Kote ka hih uh leh tua bang hi zolo ka hih manun ka maizum uh hi! Ahih hangin mihai banga kong gen in ah mi khat a hanna ah kei zong ka hang hi.
47011022	Amaute Hebrew mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Israel minam ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Abraham suante ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi.
47011023	Amaute Khazih nasemte ahi uh hiam? Mihai banga kong gen in ah kei ka hi zawkan hi. Amaute sangin nakpi in na ka sem zaw hi. Sim zawhloh ding zahin hong kisat hi. Thong sungah hong kikhiamun mahmah hi. Sih theih nading tamveipi ka thuak hi.
47011024	Jew mite satna 40 pana khat a kiam ngavei ka thuak hi.
47011025	Ciangpum tawh thumvei hong kisat in suang tawh khatvei hong kideng hi. Tembaw siatna thumvei ka tuaka, tui tungah sun khat le zan khat ka omngei hi.
47011026	Khual ka zinmun mahmah hi. Tui tunga sih theihna, misuamte hanga sih theihna, keima mipihte hanga sih theihna, Gentile‑te hanga sih theihna, khuapi sung le gamlak a sih theihna, tuipi tunga sih theihna, sanggam banga kibawl mite hanga sih theihnate ka tuak hi.
47011027	Nakpitak na semin ka gim mahmah hi. Ka ihmut theihloh hun a tam mahmah hi. Gilkialna le dangtakna ka thuakngei hi. An ka ngawlmun mahmah hi. Silh ding nei loin khuadam ka thuak hi.
47011028	Hihteng banah pawlpi khempeuh aa dinga ka lung hihmawhna lianpi in nisim in hong vukcip hi.
47011029	Mi khat a thanem ciangin thanempih hilo ka hi hiam? Mi khat a kipuk ciangin dahin na sakpih hilo ka hi hiam?
47011030	Kisialh loh phamawh ahih leh ka ginatlohna teng mah ka kisialhpih ding hi.
47011031	Zuaugen ka hih lohna phatna a ngah tawntung i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa le Pasian in a hong thei hi.
47011032	Kumpipa Aretas khutnuai‑a Damascus gam ukpa in kei a hong mat nop manin galkap honkhat Damascus khuapi a cingsak hi.
47011033	Ahi zongin bawm khat tawh kulhpi vang panin a pua lamah hong khaisuk uh a, ama khut pan ka suakta hi.
47012001	Ka kisialh hangin phattuamna om lo hi ta leh kong kisial lai dinga, Topa hong lah mangmuhna le kilakna kong genbeh ding hi.
47012002	Khazih sunga om ka theih mi khat tuma kum sawm le kum li lai in vantung thuap thumna ah a kilato hi. A pumpi tawh ahi hiam hilo ahi hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian in a thei hi.
47012003	Ahi zongin tua pa ken ka thei hi. A pumpi tawh kilato hiam, kilato lo hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian bekin a thei hi.
47012004	Amah Paradise ah kilato a, mihingte genkhiat theihloh le genkhiat dinga zong a kiphallo thute a za hi.
47012005	Tua bang mipa ka kisialhpih dinga, kei ka hih leh ka ginat lohna teng lobuang ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
47012006	A kisial nuam hi leng thuman a gen ka hih manin mihai ka suak tuan kei ding hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in kei hong muhna le keima thu a zakna zah sangin a thupi zaw in a hong ngaihsut khakloh nadingin kisial loin ka om zaw hi.
47012007	A thupi mahmah Topa hong kilaknate hangin a khengval a ka kisaktheih loh nadingin ka pumpi tungah ling khat a hong kipia hi. Tua lingin kei hong sun niloh Satan sawltak ahi hi.
47012008	Tua ling hong lakkhiatsak nadingin Topa tungah thumvei ka thum hi.
47012009	Ahih hangin amah in, “Ka hehpihna thupha in nang aa dingin a kicing hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keima thahatna in thanem ciangin thahatna a piangsak hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ahih manin ka tungah Khazih vangliatna a om tawntung theih nadingin ka ginat lohna teng lungdamtak in ka kisialhpih zaw ding hi.
47012010	Tua ahih ciangin Khazih hangin zawngkhalna, simmawhna kitangsapna, bawlsiatna le haksatnate ka thuak ciangin ka lungdam zaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka thanem ciangin ka tha a hat hi.
47012011	Kisial lo theilo dingin hong bawl na hih manun kisialhna tawh mihai ka suak hi. Bang mahpi ka hih loh hangin sawltak lianpente ka phak lohna om tuanlo ahih manin nong phat ding uh ka kilawm hi.
47012012	Sawltak khat ka hih lam na theih nadingun thuakzawhna limlamdangte, nalamdangte le nalamdang lianpite tawh kiteltak in kong lak khinzo hi.
47012013	Banghang hiam cihleh note aa dingin vangik kong suahlohna simloh pawlpi dangte sanga na neu zawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Hih ka khialh khakna pen hong maisak un!
47012014	Tu in note kiangah a thumveina hong hawh dingin ka kithawi zo hi. Note neihsa a deih hilo in note mahmah hong deih ka hih manin note aa dingin vangik kong suak kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tate in nu le pa aa dingin neih le lam a kholsak ding hilo a, nu le pa in tate aa dingin a kholsak ding uh hi zaw hi.
47012015	Note kong itna a liat semsem ciangin kei nong itna uh neu semsem phial ta leh ka neih bangbang note aa dingin lungdamtak ka zang dinga, kei mahmah zong kong kizang lai ding hi.
47012016	Ahi zongin vangik kong suan kei hi. Bangbang ahi zongin in kei pen ngiankawi zangin note a hong manin nong ngaihsun uh hi!
47012017	Kong paisak mite khatpeuh tungtawn in note tungah a met a hong zong ka hi hiam?
47012018	Note kiangah hong pai ding Titus ka hanthawn a, i sanggampa khat zong kong zuisak hi. Titus in note tungah a met hong zong ngei ahi hiam? Lungsim kikhat a kalsuan hilo ka hi uh hiam? Kalsuan kibang in a paikhawm hilo ka hi uh hiam?
47012019	Ko le ko a kiphelhphelh hong sa na hi uh hiam? Kong itte aw, Khazih hangin Pasian mai ah thu ka gen uh a, ka sep khempeuh uh note kilamkip nading bek ahi hi.
47012020	Banghang hiam cihleh ka hong tun ciangin note in keima lungsim bang hilo in kei zong note lungsim bang kong hih loh khak ding ka lauthawng hi. Note sungah kiselna, kihazatna, kihehsuahna, angsungkhualna, kigensiatna, kisuktuahna, kiphatsakna le buainate a om khak ding ka lauthawng hi.
47012021	A kihhuai gamtatna, numei pasal mawhna bawl in a paktatnate uh pan a kisikkiklo mi a om khak ding ka patau hi. Kong paikik ciangin tua mite hangin ka Pasian in note mai ah kei hong maizumsak in amaute hanga ka khitui a luan khak ding ka lauthawng hi.
47013001	Tu‑a kong hawh ding pen a thumvei nading hita hi. “Mi nih bang thum bang teci panna kam tawh thu khempeuh kikipsak ding hi.”
47013002	Tuma in kong genkhol khinzo a, tu in zong note tawh ka omkhop loh hangin a nihveina a omkhawm lai mah bangin ka kingaihsun a, mawhna a bawl mite le a dang khempeuhte zong kong paikik ciangin kong koihkhong kei ding hi ci in laikhak tawh a hong gen ka hi hi.
47013003	Note tungah thanemlo in a thahat Khazih in kei tungtawn in thu gen hi cih kipsak nading nong kal lailai uh hi.
47013004	Banghang hiam cihleh tua Khazih in thanemtak in khailupna a thuak hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh a nungta hi. Tua hi a, kote zong ama sungah ka thanem uh hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh note aa dingin amah tawh ka nungta khawm ding uh hi.
47013005	Thu upna sungah a omtakpi mah na hi uh hiam no le no ki‑entel unla, kisittel un. Note sungah Zeisu Khazih a om lam no le no kithei lo na hi uh hiam? Santak a cing zolo na hih kei uh leh na kithei ding uh hi.
47013006	Kote ka hih uh leh santak cinglo ka hih loh lam uh hong thei dingin kong lamen hi.
47013007	Tu in siatna khatpeuh na bawl khakloh nadingun kote hong sanna thu mite mai ah a kilat nading hilo in kote santak ka cing kei uh zongin note in hoihtak in na gamtat theih nadingun Pasian kiangah thu a ngen ka hi uh hi.
47013008	Thuman thutak tawh a kilehbulh bangmah sem theilo ka hih manun thuman thutak bek ka sem uh hi.
47013009	Banghang hiam cihleh kote thanem in note na thahat uh ciangin ka kipak uh hi. Na picin nadingun zong thu kong ngetsak uh hi.
47013010	Tua ahih ciangin note siat nading hilo in na kilamkip theih nadingun Topa in thuneihna kei hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin ka pumpi tawh kong om ciangin thu kong khauh gen khakloh nadingin kong om loh sungin hih thute lai‑a hong khak ka hi hi.
47013011	Sanggamte aw, a tawpkhakna a kong gennop in ah na ci damta un. Picing unla, lungmuangtak in om un. Lungsim kituak in, kilem in om un. Tua hi leh itna le lungmuanna a hong pia Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
47013012	A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
47013013	Mi siangthote khempeuh in note hong hopih uh hi.
47013014	Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha, Pasian hong itna le Kha Siangtho tawh kilawmtakna in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
48001001	Mihingte kiang pan le mihing tungtawn in a kisawl hilo, Zeisu Khazih le misite lak pan amah a thokiksak Pa Pasian hanga sawltak a suak keimah sawltak Paul le,
48001002	ka ompih sanggamte khempeuh in Galatia gama om pawlpite lai kong khak uh hi.
48001003	Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha le lungmuanna in note tungah om tahen.
48001004	Tua Zeisu in Pa Pasian deihna tawh kizui in a gilo tuhun khang panin eite hong hotkhiat nadingin i mawhnate hangin amahmah a kipia hi.
48001005	I Pa Pasian tungah minthanna om tawntung tahen. Amen.
48001006	Khazih hehpihna thupha sunga hong sampa taisan in lungdamna thu tuamdang khatah hun tomkal sungin na kiheikhiat uh lamdang kong sa hi.
48001007	Tua lungdamna thu tuamdang khatin lungdamna thu taktak hilo in Khazih lungdamna thu a siasak nuam mi pawlkhat in note hong buaisakna uh ahi hi.
48001008	Ahih hangin kote mahmah ka hi uh a, vantung pana hong pai vantungmi khat ahi zongin kote hong hilhsa lungdamna thu a hilo, lungdamna thu tuamdang khat peuhpeuh hong hilh a om leh, tua mi in hamsiatna thuak tahen.
48001009	Na sansa uh lungdamna thu a hilo lungdamna thu tuamdang khat hong hilh a om leh tua mi in hamsiatna thuak tahen kong cih khitsa bangun tu in ka cikik hi.
48001010	Hih bangin mite maipha a zong ka hi hiam? Ahih keileh Pasian maipha a zong ka hi zaw hiam? Mite lungdam nading a zong ka hi hiam? Mite lungdam nading a zong ka hih leh Khazih sila ka hi kei ding hi.
48001011	Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, note kong hilh lungdamna thu pen mihing phuahtawm hilo hi cih kong theisak hi.
48001012	Banghang hiam cihleh hih kong hilh lungdamna thu mihing tung pana ka ngah hilo in, mihing hong hilh zong hilo a, Zeisu Khazih hong kilakna tungtawn a ka ngah ahi hi.
48001013	Judah biakna ka zuih lai a ka gamtatzia le gen zawhloh zah dongin Pasian pawlpi bawlsia in suksiat ding ka hanciamna thute na zazo uh hi.
48001014	Ka mipihte lak ka khangualte sung panin zong Judah biakna tawh kisai in a madawkpen khat ka hi a, tanglai ka pu ka pate ngeinate gumin ka naklet mahmah hi.
48001015	Ahih hangin Pasian in pha a sak hunin ka nu gil sunga ka omlai in hong teeltuam khinzo in, ama hehpihna thupha tawh a hong sam a,
48001016	ama Tapa thu Gentile‑te ka hilh theih nadingin keima sungah a Tapa hong kilangsak hi. Tua ciangin kei zong kuamah tawh kikum loin,
48001017	keima hun ma‑a sawltak a suak khinsa mite omna Jerusalem ah zong pai tuanlo in Arabia gamah ka pai hi. Tua panin Damascus khua ah ka ciahkik hi.
48001018	Tua zawh kum thum khit ciangin Peter tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paito a, amah tawh ni sawm le ni nga sung ka omkhawm hi.
48001019	Ahih hangin Topa sanggampa James longal sawltak dangte khat beek tualai ah ka mu kei hi.
48001020	Tu in, hih kong thugelhte zuauthu hi peuhmah lo hi cih Pasian in hong theihpih hi.
48001021	Tua khit ciangin Syria gam le Cilicia gamah ka pai hi.
48001022	Khazih sunga om Judea gam pawlpi mite in ka melin hong thei lo uh hi.
48001023	Ahi zongin, “Nidang lai‑a eite hong bawlsia ngeipa in khatvei lai‑a suksiat a sawm upna thu tu in hilhta hi,” cih bek a na za uh hi.
48001024	Tua ahih manin keima hangin Pasian min a phat uh hi.
48002001	Tua zawh kum sawm le kum li khit ciangin Barnabas tawh Jerusalem ah ka paitokik a, Titus zong ka tonpih hi.
48002002	Pasian hong kilakna tawh kizui in a paito ka hi hi. Ahi zongin ka sepsa teng le ka seplai dingte a mawkna a suah loh nadingin Gentile‑te tunga ka hilh lungdamna thu gentelna khat a makai zawdeuhte kiangah a tuamin ka neihpih hi.
48002003	Tua ahih manin ka tonpih Titus zong Greek mi hi napi vunat dingin a hahsawl nawn kei uh hi.
48002004	Ahih hangin eite laka hong lutsim sanggam kineih mi pawlkhat in vunat ding a hahbawl uh hi. Amaute in Khazih Zeisu sunga i neihsa suahtakna paikhia in, sila hong suaksakkik nuamin a hong lutsim uh ahi hi.
48002005	Thuman thutak lungdamna thu note sungah a kip tawntung theih nadingin amaute thu nai khat sung nangawn ka mang kei uh hi.
48002006	Ahih hangin mi thupi a kingaihsunte zong bangbang ahi uh zongin kei aa dingin a kilamdanna om lo hi. Pasian in maitang zahtak tuam a nei kei hi. Tua mi thupite in kei thugen valkan bangmah a gen tuan kei uh hi.
48002007	Tua sangsik in vunat mite tungah lungdamna thu gen nading thu Peter tungah a kipiak mah bangin vunatlo mite tungah lungdamna thu gen nading thu kei tungah a hong kipia hi.
48002008	Banghang hiam cihleh vunat mite sawltak ahi Peter tungah khauhtak a na a sempa mahin Gentile‑te sawltak keima tungah zong na a hong sem hi.
48002009	Khuampi bang ahi James, Cephas le John‑te in kei hong kipia hehpihna thupha a theih uh ciangin vunat mite kiangah amaute pai in Gentile‑te kiangah Barnabas le kei a pai dingin kilawmtakna taklam khut hong khakin ka kilen uh hi.
48002010	Mizawngte na phawk un cih thu khat bek hong vaikhak uh a, kei zong tua thu mah ka tuppen ahi hi.
48002011	Tu in Antioch khua ah Peter a hong pai ciangin mawhsak nading thu khat om ahih manin ama mai mahmah ah ka taii hi.
48002012	Banghang hiam cihleh James kiang panin a hong pai mi pawlkhat hong tunma un Peter in Gentile‑te tawh an a nekhawm hi. Ahi zongin tua mite hong tun uh ciangin vunat mite a kihtak manin Peter kihemkhia in a tuam om hi.
48002013	A dang Judah mite in zong Peter cingtaklohna zui uh a, Barnabas nangawn a kihel kha hi.
48002014	Ahi zongin amaute in lungdamna thu tawh kipawl thuman thutak tangtak in a zuihlohna uh ka muh ciangin amaute khempeuh mai ah Peter ka taii a, “Nang Judah mi hi napi Judah mite ngeina zui loin Gentile‑te ngeina zui na hih leh Gentile‑te in Judah mite ngeina a zuih nadingun banghang in hahbawl na hi hiam?
48002015	I pianna panin Judah mi ahi Gentile mikhialte a hilo eite in,
48002016	thukham zuihna tawh diktansakna kingah lo a, Zeisu Khazih upna bek tawh kingah hi cih thu i thei hi. Tua ahih manin thukham zuihna tawh hilo in Khazih upna tawh diktansakna i ngah nadingin Khazih Zeisu i umzo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihna hangin kuamah in diktansakna a ngah kei ding hi.
48002017	“Khazih sunga diktansakna i zon laitak in mawhnei i hih lam hong kilangkhia ahih leh Khazih pen mawhna tha a piapa a lehsuah ding hiam? Suak peuhmah lo ding hi!
48002018	Banghang hiam cihleh ka suksiatsa tua nate ka lamkik leh, kei le kei thupalsatpa a suak ka hi hi.
48002019	Tua ahih ciangin Pasian lamah ka nuntak theih nadingin thukham tungtawn in thukham ka sihsan khin hi.
48002020	Khazih tawh kikhailum khawm khin ka hih manin kei a nungta hi nawnlo in kei sungah Khazih a nungta ahi hi. Pumpi sunga om tulaitak a ka nuntakna in kei hong it in keima tanga amahmah a hong kipia Pasian Tapa ka upna tungtawn in a nungta ka hi hi.
48002021	Pasian hong hehpihna thupha ka pampaih kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihna tawh dikna kingah hi leh, Khazih sihna in a mawkna a suak ding hi,” ka ci hi.
48003001	Galatia mihaite aw! Zeisu Khazih note muh mahmah a hong kikhailum bangin na tel theih nadingun kong hilh khitsa hi napi tua thuman thutak na up loh nadingun kua in hong bumhai ahi hiam?
48003002	Thukham zuihna hanga Kha a ngah na hi uh hiam? Ahih keileh upna thu zakna hanga a ngah na hi zaw uh hiam cih thu khat bek note kiang pan ka thei nuam hi.
48003003	Hi zahtak in hai lawmlawm ding na hi uh hiam? Kha tawh kipan khin napi in tu in ci le sa tawh picin sawm na hi uh hiam?
48003004	Haksatna tampi na thuaksate uh a mawkna suaksak ding na hi uh hiam? A mawkna suak zawzen ding ahi hiam?
48003005	Tua ahih manin Kha hong pia in note lakah nalamdangte hong sempa in thukham na zuih manun hong sem ahi hiam? Ahih keileh upna thu na zak manun hong sem ahi hiam?
48003006	Abraham ngaihsun un. “Amah in Pasian um a, tua a upna pen ama dikna in a kisimsak hi.”
48003007	Tua ahih manin upna a nei mite bek Abraham tate ahi hi cih thu na thei un.
48003008	Upna tungtawn in Pasian in Gentile‑te diktangsak nuam hi cih thu Lai Siangtho in a mukhol hi. Tua ahih manin Abraham kiangah, “Nangma hangin minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah ding uh hi,” ci in lungdamna thu a hilhkhol hi.
48003009	Tua ahih manin upna a nei mite in thu‑um Abraham tawh thupha a ngahkhawm uh hi.
48003010	Thukham zuihna a suang mi khempeuh in hamsiatna nuai‑a om ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Thukham laibu sunga kigelh thute a vekpi in a zuisuaklo mi in hamsiatna a thuak ahi hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
48003011	“Midik in upna tawh a nungta ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh manin thukham zuihna tawh kuamah in Pasian mai ah diktansakna ngah lo hi cih teltak in a kimu hi.
48003012	“Thukham a zuimi in tua thukham zuihna hangin a nungta ding hi,” ci in kigelh ahih manin thukham le upna a kisai kha kei hi.
48003013	Khazih in eite tangin hamsiatna a suahna tawh thukham hamsiatna panin eite hong tankhia zo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Singkhuam tunga kikhai mi peuhmah in hamsiatna a thuak ahi hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi.
48003014	Eite khempeuh in upna tungtawn in hong kikamciamsa Kha i ngah theih nading le Gentile‑te in Abraham ngah thuphate Khazih Zeisu sungah a ngah nadingun amah in eite a hong tankhia hi.
48003015	Sanggamte aw, mihingte thugen banga kong gen in ah mihing khat thuciamna nangawn a kikipsak khit ciangin kuamah in phiat theilo in, zong behlap theilo hi.
48003016	Tu in Abraham le ama suanpa tungah kamciam kipia zo hi. “Na suan na khakte,” ci in mi tampi gen loin, “Na suanpa tungah,” ci in mi khat bekin a gen hi. Tua mi in Khazih ahi hi.
48003017	Ken kong cih in ah Pasian in Khazih sunga a kipsaksa kamciamna pen tua zawh kum 430 khit ciangin a kipia thukham in a susia thei nawn kei hi. Tua bang hi leh kamciamna a mawkna a suak ding hi.
48003018	Banghang hiam cihleh gamhluahna le thukham kisai hi leh, kamciamna tawh kisai nawnlo ding hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in Abraham tungah kamciamna tawh tua gamhluahna a pia zo hi.
48003019	Tua ahih leh bang dinga thukham hong kipia ahi hiam? Thupalsatna a om manin hong kipiakthuah ahi hi. Pasian in thukham pen Abraham Suanpa hong tun masiah a kimang dingin vantungmite tungtawn in palai khat tungtawn in hong piak ahi hi.
48003020	Tu in palai nasepna a langkhat bek tawh kisem theilo ahih mah bangin Pasian in a langkhat ahi hi.
48003021	Tua ahih leh thukham in Pasian hong kamciamte langpan ahi hiam? Langpan peuhmah lo hi! Banghang hiam cihleh nuntakna hong ngahsak thei dinga thukham hong kipia hi leh diktansakna zong thukham zuih zawhna tawh kingah thei ding hi.
48003022	Ahi zongin Zeisu Khazih upna tungtawn a kibawl kamciamna a um mite in a ngah theih nadingin Lai Siangtho in mawhna sungah mi khempeuh a khumcip hi.
48003023	Ahi zongin upna thu hong tun mateng thukham tawh thongkia bangin hong kicing a, a nungciang a hong kilang ding upna i neih theih nadingin a hong kikhumcip hi.
48003024	Tua ahih manin upna tawh diktansakna i ngah theih nadingin thukham in Khazih kiangah hong kha naucingpa bang ahi hi.
48003025	Ahih hangin upna thu hong tun ciangin tua naucingpa khut nuai ah i om nawn kei hi.
48003026	Banghang hiam cihleh note khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu na up manun Pasian tate na hi uh hi.
48003027	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih sunga phumna a ngah note khempeuh in Khazih na silh uh hi.
48003028	Note khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu sungah pumkhat na hih manun Judah mi, Greek mi, sila le silalo, numei le pasal cih zong na om kei uh hi.
48003029	Khazih aa na hih uh leh Abraham suan le khakte na hi uh a, hong kamciamna bangin innluahte na hi uh hi.
48004001	Tu in ken kong cih in ah innluahpa in na khempeuh a neipa ahih hangin naupang ahih laiteng sila tawh kilamdang lo hi.
48004002	A pa in a seh hun a tun mateng a cingte le neihsa kemte khut nuai ah a om hi.
48004003	Tuamah bangin eite zong naupang i hihlai in leitung thumawlte nuai ah saltang in i om hi.
48004004	Ahih hangin a hun a cin ciangin numei sung panin thukham nuai‑a hong suak dingin Pasian in ama Tapa hong paisak hi.
48004005	Eite in tapa za i luah theih nadingin thukham nuai‑a om eite hong tankhia dingin a Tapa hong paisak ahi hi.
48004006	Tapate na hih manun Pasian in a Tapa Kha note lungsim sungah hong sawl a, “Abbaɠ, Pa aw!” na ci uh hi.
48004007	Tua ahih manin sila hi nawnlo in tapa na hih leh Khazih tungtawn in Pasian innluahpa na hi hi.
48004008	Ahih hangin Pasian na theihma un a pianlim in pasian a hilo nate na bia uh hi.
48004009	Ahi zongin tu in Pasian na thei khin uh a, Pasian in zong note a hong thei khinzo hi. Tua khit nungin a thazawm kimanna a neilo thumawlte lamah kiheikik in tuate sila suakkik nuam na hi uh hiam?
48004010	Note in nite, khate, khuahunte le kumte peuh na tang uh hi.
48004011	Note aa dingin gimpi a ka sepna teng a mawkna a suahkhak ding ka lauthawng hi.
48004012	Sanggamte aw, note banga kong om bangin note zong kei bangin hong om un ci in kong thum hi. Kei tungah gamtat khialhna bangmah na nei peuhmah kei uh hi.
48004013	A masa lai in pumpi cidam lopi in note kiangah lungdamna thu kong hilhlam na thei uh hi.
48004014	Ka pumpi damlohnate simmawhna le nialna in nong nei tuan kei uh a, ahi zongin Pasian vantungmite khat zah le Khazih Zeisu mahmah bangin nong sang uh hi.
48004015	Tualai a na lungdamna teng uh tu in bang suak peuhmah ahi hiam? Hi thei hi leh na mittang nangawn uh khelkhia in nong piak nop lamtak uh ka thei hi.
48004016	Tua hi a, thuman thutak kong gen manin note gal hong suak zawsop ka hi hiam?
48004017	Amaute in note a hong itbawl uh hangin, a hoihlam ahi kei hi. Hi hi, note in amaute na it nadingun note a hong khenkhiat sawm uh ahi hi.
48004018	Keimah in note tawh ka oma ka om kei zongin na hoih khat peuhpeuh ah na thalawp ding uh a hoih hi.
48004019	Ka taneute aw, note sung pan Khazih lim hong piankhiat theih mateng in nausuak ding bangin gimna ka thuak hi.
48004020	Note hong lunghimawh mahmah ka hih manin tu laitak note kiangah hong omin ka kampauzia hong khel leng ka ut hi.
48004021	Thukham nuai‑a a omkik nuam mite aw, thukham in bang gen hiam cih thei lo na hi uh hiam hong gen dih un.
48004022	Abraham in tapa nih a nei hi. Khat pen a sila numei tawh a neih hi a, a dang khat pen sila a hilo numei tawh a neih ahi hi ci in kigelh hi.
48004023	Sila numei tawh a neih a tapa pen ci le sa hanga piang hi a, sila a hilo numei tawh a neih a tapa in kamciamna hanga piang ahi hi.
48004024	Tua nihte in genteh nadingin a piang hi a, thuciamna nihte a lak uh hi. Hagar in Sinai muala hong kipia sila suahna thu ahi hi.
48004025	Hih Hagar in Arabia gama om Sinai mual hi a, a tate tawh sila a suak tu laitak a om Jerusalem khuapi tawh a kibang hi.
48004026	Ahih hangin tunglam a om Jerusalem khuapi in eite khempeuh nu ahi sila a hilo numei ahi hi.
48004027	Banghang hiam cih leh, “Nang, a tasel numei aw, Lungdam in! Nausuak gimna a thuak ngeilo numei aw, Awng inla kiko in! Banghang hiam cihleh pasal a nei numei sangin Kuama deihloh numei in ta a hau zaw hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
48004028	Tu in sanggamte aw, eite in Isaac bangin kamciamna tate i hi hi.
48004029	Ahih hangin ci le sa hanga piang tapa in Kha hanga piang tapa tua hun lai a a bawlsiat mah bangin tu in zong a bawlsia hi.
48004030	Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Sila numei le a tapa hawlkhia in. Banghang hiam cihleh silanu tapa in sila a hilo numei tapa tawh gamh luahkhawm theilo ding hi,” a ci hi.
48004031	Tua bangin sanggamte aw, eite in silanu tate hilo in sila a hilo numei tate i hi hi.
48005001	Khazih in eite hong suaktasak khin ahih manin tua suahtakna ah kiptak in ding unla, sila suahna hakkol kisuankik nawn kei un.
48005002	En un, keimah Paul in kong gen in ah vun na ki‑at uh leh Khazih in note aa dingin a mawkna a suak ding hi.
48005003	Vunat mi khatpeuh tunga teci kong pankik in ah thukham khempeuh zuih khit ding na leiba ahi hi.
48005004	Thukham zuihna hanga diksakna a ngah nuam mite aw, note in Khazih tawh kikhenkhia in hehpihna panin na puk khin uh hi.
48005005	Banghang hiam cihleh upna hanga thuman thutak tawh kipawl lametna thu Kha tungtawn in lawptak in i ngak hi.
48005006	Banghang hiam cihleh vunatna ahi a, vunatlohna ahi zongin, Khazih sungah kimanna nei loin itna hanga upna tawh nasepna in kimanna a nei hi.
48005007	Limtak in a tai khinsa na hi uh a, thuman thutak zuihna panin kua in hong khaktan ahi hiam?
48005008	Hi banga note a hong kizolna in note hong samkhiapa Pasian kiang pan ahi kei hi.
48005009	Silngo tawmcik in annel lomkhat a tawkzo hi.
48005010	Lungsim dang a neilo dingin Topa sungah note kong muang hi. Ahih hangin note hong buaisak mi peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi.
48005011	Sanggamte aw, vunatna thu a hilh lai hi leng banghang in bawlsiatna thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua hi leh singlamteh thu hanga buaina zong a om nawn kei ding hi.
48005012	Note a hong buaisak mite in amau vunciat tankhia le uh ka ut hi.
48005013	Sanggamte aw, a suakta dingin a hong kisamkhia mite na hi uh hi. Ci le sa deihna zuih nadingin tua suahtakna zang kei unla, itna tawh khat le khat na kihuh un.
48005014	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,” a cihna thukhat sungah thukham khempeuh a kicing khin hi.
48005015	Ahih hangin khat le khat kitawng kisel in na om uh leh na maimang khakloh nadingun na kidawm un.
48005016	Ken kong cih in ah Kha sungah na gamta un. Tua hi leh ci le sa lunggulhna na zui kei ding uh hi.
48005017	Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa lunggulhna in Kha deihna tawh kituak lo a, Kha deihna in ci le sa lunggulhna tawh kituak lo hi. Na gamtat nop bangun na gamtat theihloh nadingun tua nihte khat le khat a kilehbulh den hi.
48005018	Ahi zongin Kha na kimakaihsak uh leh thukham nuai ah na om kei uh hi.
48005019	Tu in, ci le sa gamtatnate a kitel mahmah hi. Tuate in angkawmna, numei pasal mawhna, a kihhuai gamtatna, paktatna,
48005020	milim biakna, dawi‑ai tawina, kimuhdahna, kitotna, kihazatna, kihehsuahna, angsungkhualna, kikhenna, upna maanlo neihna,
48005021	ki‑eenna, mithahna, zukhamna, gualnop uangtatnate a kipan tua bang namte ahi hi. Tua banga a gamtate in Pasian kumpigam a luah kei ding uh hi ci a, kong genngei bangin tu in zong kong genkik hi.
48005022	Ahih hangin Kha gahin ki‑itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna,
48005023	lungnemna, pumpi ki‑ukzawhna cihte ahi hi. Tua thute tawh a kituaklo thukham a om kei hi.
48005024	Khazih mite in ci le sa deihna le lunggulhna teng a khailum khinzo uh hi.
48005025	Kha sunga nungta i hih leh Kha deihna bangin gamta ni.
48005026	Kiphasak loin khat le khat kiphin loin ki‑eeng loin om ni.
48006001	Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh mawhna sungah a pukkhak leh a khami note in lungnemna tawh na phong un. Ze‑etna sungah na puk khakloh nadingun kidawm un.
48006002	Khat le khat van kipuakpih unla, tua bangin Khazih thukham na kicingsak un.
48006003	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh bangmah hi hetlo napi a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah le amah a kikhem ahi hi.
48006004	Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuhin ama gamtatnate sittel hen. Tua hi leh midangte tawh kitehkak kul loin amah lungdam thei pah ding hi.
48006005	Banghang hiam cihleh kuamah peuhin ama van ciat mah a puak ding uh ahi hi.
48006006	Pasian thu a kihilh mipa in a hilh mipa tawh na hoih a neih khempeuh zangkhawm tahen.
48006007	Kuamah kikhemsak kei un. Pasian ciamnuih bawl theih ding hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh in ama vawh bangin a gah a at ding hi.
48006008	Ama ci le sa lunggulhna a vawh mi in ci le sa hanga muatna a at ding hi. Kha deihna a vawh mi in Kha hanga nuntak tawntungna a at ding hi.
48006009	Na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin sem lehang a hun a tun ciangin a gah i at ding hi.
48006010	Tua ahih manin hun hoih i ngah simin mi khempeuh tung le a diakdiak in upna sunga i innkuanpihte tungah na hoih sem ni.
48006011	Keima khut mahmah tawh note aa dinga kong gelh laimal golpipite en dih un!
48006012	Amaute pumpi tawh kipawl minthanna a deih mite in Khazih singlamteh hangin bawlsiatna a thuak khakloh nading bek un note vunat dingin hong nak sawl ding uh hi.
48006013	Banghang hiam cihleh vunat ahi amaute nangawn in zong thukham zui lo napi in note vunatna a kisialhpih nop manun vunat ding a hong deih uh ahi hi.
48006014	Kei ka hih leh i Topa Zeisu Khazih singlamteh longal bangmah thu ah ka kisial kei ding hi. Tua Topa tungtawn in leitung in kei aa dingin kikhailum khin a, kei zong leitung aa dingin ka kikhailum khin hi.
48006015	Banghang hiam cihleh vunatna le vunatlohna in Khazih Zeisu sungah kimanna a nei kei hi. Mi thak suahna bekin kimanna a nei hi.
48006016	Hih thu bangin a gamta mite khempeuh tung le Pasian mi ahi Israel mite tungah lungmuanna le hehpihna thupha om tahen.
48006017	Ka pumpi ah Topa Zeisu hong ciaptehnate pua ka hih manin tu‑a kipan in kuamah in hong nawngkaisak nawn kei hen.
48006018	Sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note lungsim ah hong om tahen. Amen.
49001001	Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak keimah Paul in Ephesus khua‑a om Khazih Zeisu sunga thu‑um mi, misiangthote kiangah lai kong khak hi.
49001002	I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin a hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
49001003	Khazih sunga om vantung khalam thupha khempeuh eite a hong pia i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa, Pasian kiphat tahen.
49001004	Ama mai ah a siangtho le mawhsakna om lo dingin leitung pianma in ama sungah eite a hong teel zo hi.
49001005	Tuamah bangin ama lungkimna le ama deihna tawh kizui in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in ama tate a suak dingin itna tawh eite hong sehkhol khinzo hi.
49001006	Tua in a vanglian ama hehpihna a kiphat theih nading hi a, tua hehpihna hangin ama Itpa sungah eite a hong sang zo hi.
49001007	A kicing mahmah ama hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in ama sisan hanga tatkhiatna ahi mawh maisakna ama sungah i ngah hi.
49001008	Amah in tua hehpihna thupha ahi ciimna le pilvanna namkim eite tungah kicingtak in hong pia zo hi.
49001009	Ama lungkimna bangin amahmah in a ngimsa ama deihna thusim eite a hong theisak zo hi.
49001010	Tua in a gelsa hunte a kicin ciangin vantung le leitung a om nate khempeuh Khazih nuai ah koih theih nading ahi hi.
49001011	Ama deihna le a ngimna zui in na khempeuh a sempa in ama ngimna tawh kizui in eite hong sehkhol khin ahih manin tua Khazih sungah gamhluahna i ngah zo hi.
49001012	Tua in Khazih a um masa kote hangin ama minthanna a kiphat theih nading ahi hi.
49001013	Note in zong note hotkhiatna lungdamna thu ahi thuman thutak na zak khit uh ciangin amah na up manun hong kamciamsa Kha Siangtho tawh ciaptehna a hong khen hi.
49001014	Pasian neihsa eite a hong kitatkhiat mateng tua Kha Siangtho in eite luahna kipsakna malep ahi hi. Tua in ama minthanna kiphat theih nading ahi hi.
49001015	Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu na upna uh le misiangthote khempeuh na itna uh ka zak ni a kipan,
49001016	ka thungetna ah na min uh loin note aa dingin lungdam ka ko den hi.
49001017	Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih Pasian, a vanglian Pa in amah na theihtel nadingun khalam lungpilna le kilakna a hong piak nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
49001018	Na lungsim mit uh hong kivaksak a, note a hong sapna hanga lametna in bang hi a, misiangthote sunga ama neihsa kicing zihziahte bang hiam cih na theih nading uh leh,
49001019	a thahat mahmah ama vangliatna tawh na a sep bangin a um eite aa dingin ama vangliatna bangzah in khauh hiam cih na theih nading uh zong thu kong ngetsak hi.
49001020	Amah in tua vangliatna tawh Khazih sungah nasem in misite lak pan a thawhkiksak khit ciangin vantung ama taklam ah a tusak hi.
49001021	A zalianpente, thuneite, vangliatna neite, ukna a neite khempeuh le tuhun bek hilo in a hong tung ding hunah a kiphuak lai ding min khempeuh sangin a lianzaw thamin a koih hi.
49001022	Na khempeuh ama khenuai ah koihin pawlpi aa dingin amah na khempeuhte lutang a suaksak hi.
49001023	Pawlpi in ama pumpi hi a, na khempeuhte na khempeuh mah tawh a kidimsakpa kicinna ahi hi.
49002001	Nidanglai in note in thupalsatnate le mawhnate sungah a si na hi uh hi.
49002002	Tu laitak a thu a manglo mite sungah na a sem kha huihlak a thuneipa deihna bangin hih leitung paizia zui in na nungta ngei uh hi.
49002003	Eite khempeuh zong a beisa hunin tua mite bangmah in ci le sa lunggulhna le ngaihsutnate zui in, ci le sa lunggulhnate i tangtungsak hi. Midangte mah bangin i pianlim in hehna tate i hi hi.
49002004	Ahih hangin hehpihna kicing a nei Pasian in itna lianpi tawh eite a hong it hi.
49002005	Tua ahih manin mawhna sungah si a, i om laitak nangawn in Khazih tawh hong hing khawmsak a (hehpihna thupha hangin hotkhiatna na ngah uh hi),
49002006	Pasian in amah tawh hong tho khawmsak in Khazih Zeisu sungah vantung ah amah tawh a hong tu khawmsak hi.
49002007	Tua in Khazih Zeisu sunga ama migitna tawh a hong lahkhiat gen zawhloh a kicing ama hehpihna thupha a hong tung ding hunte ah a hong lah theih nading ahi hi.
49002008	Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna thupha hangin upna tawh hotkhiatna na ngah uh hi. Note thu in hotkhiatna a ngah na hi kei uh hi. Hih in Pasian letsong ahi hi.
49002009	Kuamah a kisialh khakloh nadingin sepnate hang hilo hi.
49002010	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite sep dinga a koihsa na hoihte a sem dingin Khazih Zeisu sunga hong piansak ama bawlsate i hi hi.
49002011	Tua ahih manin nidanglai in ci le sa lamah Gentile‑te na hih lam uh le a pumpi vuntep uh a khut tawh a tan mite in vunatloh mi a hong cih mite na hih lam uh kiphawk un.
49002012	Tua hun lai in note in Khazih na nei kei uh a, Israel mipawl na hi kei uh hi. Kamciam tawh kipawl thuciamnate in hong huam kha loin, leitung ah lamet bei in Pasian nei loin na om uh hi.
49002013	Ahih hangin nidanglai in a gamlapi a om note tu in Khazih Zeisu sungah na om uh a, Khazih sisan in a naina munah hong tunzo hi.
49002014	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in eite kilemna ahi hi. Amah in minam nihte kikal a a hong khen kidalna kawm phelkhia in minam khat a hong suaksak hi.
49002015	Amah in ei minam nihte ama sungah mi thak khat a hong suahsak nadingin eite a hong kigalbawlsak thukham sunga om thupiakte le thukhunte ama pumpi tawh paikhia in kilemna a hong bawlsak hi.
49002016	Tua ciangin tua minam nihte pumpi khat sungah Pasian tawh a hong kilemkiksak theih nadingin Khazih singlamteh tungtawn in tua kigalbawlna a sisak hi.
49002017	Gamlapi a om note le a nai‑a om amaute kiangah amah hong pai in kilemna thu a hong hilh khinzo hi.
49002018	Tua ahih manin ei minam nihte in ama tungtawn in Kha khat bek tawh Pa kiang i naih theita hi.
49002019	Tua ahih manin tu in khualmi le gamdang mi na hi nawn kei uh hi. Misiangthote tawh gam mi khat hikhawm in Pasian innkuanpihte na hi uh hi.
49002020	Tua innkhuam bulpi ahi sawltakte le kamsangte tungah note hong kilam a, innkiusuang in Zeisu Khazih ahi hi.
49002021	Tua inn buppi Khazih sungah kilemkhawm in khangto a, Topa sunga a siangthopen biakinnpi ahi hi.
49002022	Kha tungtawn a Pasian teenna a suak dingin note zong tua Topa sungah a kilamkhawm na hi uh hi.
49003001	Hih thu hangin keimah Paul in Khazih Zeisu hangin no Gentile‑te aa dingin thongkia ka hi hi.
49003002	Pasian in ama hehpihna thupha tawh kipawl nasepna note aa dingin kei a hong piakna thu na zaksa uh,
49003003	Pasian in tua thusim ka tungah pulak in hong theihsakna tawh kizui in (nunglam a lai tomno khat kong gelh mah bangin,
49003004	tua lai na sim uh ciangin Khazih tawh kisai tua thusim ka theihtel lam na thei ding uh hi),
49003005	tua thusim in a siangtho ama sawltakte le kamsangte tungah Kha tawh tu‑a a pulak bangin hundang a mihing tate tungah a kipulak ngei kei hi.
49003006	Tua thusim in Gentile‑te in Israelte tawh gamh luahkhawm in pumpi khat suakkhawm uh a, Pasian in Khazih sunga a kamciam lungdamna thu tungtawn in a ngahkhawmte ahih nading uh ahi hi.
49003007	Ama vangliatna tungtawn in a tuam vilvel a Pasian in ama hehpihna thupha letsong kei hong piakna tawh kizui in tua lungdamna thu a gen nasempa khat ka suak hi.
49003008	Misiangtho khempeuh laka a neupen sanga a neuzaw lai keima tungah Pasian in hih hehpihna thupha hong pia zo hi. Tua in a kimukhia zolo Khazih hauhna thu Gentile‑te ka hilh theih nading ahi hi.
49003009	Tua banah ama gelna thusim bang hiam cih mi khempeuh ka theihsak nading zong ahi hi. Tua thusim pen a kipatcil a kipan na khempeuh Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in a piangsakpa Pasian sungah a kiselsuak ahi hi.
49003010	Vantung lama om a zalianpente le a vangliante tungah tu huna Pasian pilna tampite, pawlpi in a theihsak theih nading deihna ahi hi.
49003011	Hih in i Topa Khazih Zeisu sunga Pasian in a zawhsa, a tawntung a ama ngimna bangin a piang ahi hi.
49003012	Amah upna tungtawn in eite in hangtak le lungmuangtak in Pasian kiang i zuan thei hi.
49003013	Tua ahih manin note minthanna ahi note aa dingin ka thuak gimnate ah na lungkiat loh nadingun kong thum hi.
49003014	Hih thu hangin i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa kiangah khukdin in thu ka ngen hi.
49003015	Ama tungtawn in leitung le vantung a om innkuan buppi min kipia a,
49003016	ama vangliatna tawh kizui hauhna hong piak theih nading ama Kha tungtawn in note sunglam mi thahatna tawh hong thakhauhsak nading,
49003017	upna tungtawn in note lungsim sungah Khazih hong teengin, itna ah note zung hong khasak a, hong kiphuhkip nading,
49003018	ama hong itna a zaizia, a sauzia, a thukzia, le a sanziate, misiangtho khempeuh in a theih banga na theihtel nading uh le,
49003019	a kithei khin zolo Khazih hong itna thei in Pasian kicinna khempeuh tawh na kidim nadingun thu kong ngetsak hi.
49003020	Tu in eite sunga nasem ama vangliatna tawh kizui in i ngetna le i ngaihsutna sangin a zah tampi a semthei pa tungah
49003021	minthanna, pawlpi sungah Khazih Zeisu hangin a khang a khang in om tawntung tahen. Amen.
49004001	Pasian hong sap mite na hih manun tua sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak in na gamtat nadingun Topa hanga thongkiapa ahi keimah in kong thum hi.
49004002	Na khempeuh ah kiniamkhiat un. Thunem in lungduai unla, itna tawh khat leh khat kithuak keikai un.
49004003	Kilemna tawh Kha hanga kipumkhatna na letkip nadingun na hanciam un.
49004004	Lametna khat bek sunga hong kisam na hih manun pumpi khat, Kha khat,
49004005	Topa khat, upna khat, tuiphumna khat bek a om hi.
49004006	Na khempeuh tunga a om, na khempeuh a zel a tawk, note khempeuh sunga a om, mi khempeuh Pa, Pasian khat bek a om hi.
49004007	Khazih hong hawmsak letsong tawh kizui in eite khat ciat tungah hehpihna thupha hong kipia zo hi.
49004008	Tua ahih manin amah in, “A sang munah a kahtoh ciangin Sal honpi paipih a, Mite tungah letsongte a pia hi,” a ci hi.
49004009	(Amah kahto hi a cih ciangin leinuai tawngah kumsuk masa hi a cihna hilo ahi hiam?
49004010	A kumsukpa in na khempeuh a kicingsak dingin vantungte khenga a kahtopa mah ahi hi.)
49004011	Tua hi a, amah in mi pawlkhatte sawltak ding, mi pawlkhatte kamsang a thu a hilh ding, mi pawlkhatte lungdamna thu a tangko ding, mi pawlkhatte pawlpi sia le thuhilh sia dingin a suaksak hi.
49004012	Pasian na a sep theih nadingun misiangthote kigingkholsak in Khazih pumpi a lamkip theih nading uh ahi hi.
49004013	Eite khempeuh in upna le Pasian Tapa theihtelna ah pumkhat suakin picing a, Khazih kicinna zah i tun mateng,
49004014	mite in khemna tawh lam hong khialhsak theih nadingin khelpilna tawh a gel uh thuhilhnate in huih bangin a sukmut a tomut theih naupangte bang i hi nawn kei ding hi.
49004015	Tua ahih ciangin lutang ahi Khazih sungah na khempeuh ah i khantoh nadingin ki‑itna tawh thuman thutak gen ni.
49004016	Tua lutang panin pumpi na a tuamtuamte in kituaktak in kizom a, amaute limtak in a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau sep ding ciat a sep uh ciangin ki‑itna ah pumpi khangin a cingtak a suak thei hi.
49004017	Tua ahih manin Topa mina kong gen le kong thum thu in Gentile‑te in a haihuai amau lungsim ngaihsutna uh zui in a gamtat bangun note na gamta nawn kei un.
49004018	Amaute lungsim mialcipna le amaute awlmawhlohna hangin Pasian hong piak nuntakna tawh kikhen uh a, amaute theihtheihna a mialcip hi.
49004019	Amaute in zumtheihna nei nawnlo uh a, a kihhuai namkim tawh kidiah in numei pasal thangtatna lamah a uang semsem dingin a kipumpiak uh hi.
49004020	Ahih hangin note in Khazih na theihzia uh tua bang ahi kei hi.
49004021	Zeisu sunga a om thuman thutak hong kihilhsa le na zaksa uh mah bangin,
49004022	khemna tawh kidim lunggulhna hanga kisia, nidang a na mi lui gamtatnate uh suahkhia in,
49004023	na lungsim uh thaksak unla,
49004024	Pasian in dikna le sianthona taktak tawh amah banga a piansak mi thak na silh un.
49004025	Tua ahih manin zuauthu gen loin “i veng i pamte tungah thuman gen ciat ni.” Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi tunga om nate i hi ciat hi.
49004026	“Na heh uh zongin khial kha kei un.” Na hehna uh dam loin, ni tumsak kei unla,
49004027	Dawimangpa mun na pia kei un.
49004028	A guta mi in gu nawnlo in kisapna a nei mite a piakzawh nadingin nasep hoih khatpeuh a khut tawh semin hanciam hen.
49004029	Note kam sung panin kam hoihlo pusuaksak kei unla, a za mite a phatuamsak ding amaute kilamkipna a piangsak ding thuhoih bek gen un.
49004030	Tatkhiatna ni dong note a hong kiciaptehna ahi Pasian Kha Siangtho na dahsak kei un.
49004031	Kilungsim neihna, thangpaihna, hehna, kitot kiselna, kigensiatna le kisiatsak nopna lungsim khempeuh paikhia un.
49004032	Khat le khat na kihehpih un, lungnemna tawh na kiho unla, Pasian in Khazih hanga note mawhna a hong maisak bangin note zong khat le khat mawhna na kimaisak un.
49005001	Tua ahih manin it tate bangin Pasian tatzia etteh un.
49005002	Khazih in eite a hong it manin eite aa dingin amahmah a kipiak bangin itna tawh gamta un. Eite aa dingin namtui biakpiak nading amahmah biakpiakna le gangawh biakpiakna in Pasian tungah a kipia hi.
49005003	Numei pasal mawhna, a siangtholo na khat peuhpeuh ahi a, huaihamnate ahi zongin misiangthote tawh kituak lo ahih manin note sungah genin zong nei kei un.
49005004	A kilawmlo kampau, a haihuai kampau, ciamnuih thanghuaite ahi zongin zat ding kilawm lo ahih manin zang loin lungdamkohna kamte na zang zaw un.
49005005	Banghang hiam cihleh numei pasal mawhna a bawl mi, a siangtholo a a gamta mi, milim bia ahi, a huaiham mipa khat beekin Khazih le Pasian kumpigam sungah bangmah a luah kei ding uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
49005006	Thu ginalo tawh mi khemsa in om kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang thute hangin thu a manglo mite tungah Pasian hehna a tung hi.
49005007	Tua ahih manin tua bang mite tawh na kipawl kei un.
49005008	Nidanglai in khuamial sungah na om uh hangin tu in khuavak sungah na om uh hi. Tua ahih manin khuavak tate bangin gamta un.
49005009	(Banghang hiam cihleh Kha gahin hoihna, dikna le thuman khempeuh ahi hi.)
49005010	Topa lungkimna in bang ahi hiam ci in zong un.
49005011	Phattuamna a om lo khuamial gamtatnate tawh kipawl loin tua gamtatnate a hoihlohna na pholakkhia zaw un.
49005012	Banghang hiam cihleh a simtham in a gamtatnate uh kam a gen ding nangawn in zong a zumhuai hi.
49005013	A kilangkhia khempeuh khuavak in a kilatsak ahih mah bangin a kipholak khempeuh zong khuavak in a pholak ahi hi.
49005014	Tua ahih manin amah in, “A ihmu mi aw, khanglo inla, Misite lak pan thokhia in. Tua hi leh nang tungah Khazih hong tang ding hi,” a ci hi.
49005015	Mihai bangin gamta kei unla, mipil bangin pilvangtak in gamta un.
49005016	Hun le nite sialua ahih manin hun hoihte khahsuah kei un.
49005017	Tua ahih ciangin mihai bangin om kei unla, Topa deihna bang ahi hiam ci in theitel un.
49005018	Hong uangtatsak thei lenggahzu kham kei unla, Kha tawh kidim zaw un.
49005019	Pasian phatna late, biakna late le khalam late tawh khat le khat na kipaih unla, note lungsim sungah Topa phatin lasa un.
49005020	Na khempeuh ah i Topa Zeisu Khazih min tawh Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko tawntung un.
49005021	Pasian kihtakna lungsim tawh khat le khat thu na kimang un.
49005022	Zite aw, Topa thu na man mah bangun na pasalte uh thu na mang un.
49005023	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in pawlpi lutang hi a, pumpi a Honpa ahih mah bangin pasal zong a zi lutang ahi hi.
49005024	Tua ahih ciangin pawlpi in Khazih thu a man bangin zite in zong thu khempeuh ah a pasalte uh thu a man ding uh ahi hi.
49005025	Pasalte aw, Khazih in pawlpi it a, pawlpi aa dingin amahmah a kipumpiak bangin note in zong na zite uh na it un.
49005026	Thu tawh tui a sawp bangin Khazih in pawlpi sawpsiang a, a sianthosak theih nadingin,
49005027	kawkbanglo, hemna le hoihlohnate khat beek a omlo, a siangtho le mawhsakna omlo, a minthang pawlpi, amah le amah a kipiak theih nading ahi hi.
49005028	Tua ahih manin pasalte in amau pumpi banglianin a zite uh it uh hen. A zi a it mi in amahmah a ki‑it ahi hi.
49005029	Banghang hiam cihleh kuamah in ama pumpi a mudah ngei kei hi. Topa in pawlpi vakin a kep a huai bangin mihing in zong ama pumpi vakin a kem hi.
49005030	Eite in ama pumpi nate ama sa le a guh a tangte i hi hi.
49005031	“Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi.”
49005032	Hih in thusim lianpi hi a, Khazih le pawlpi tawh kisai a gen ka hi hi.
49005033	Ahi zongin note khatpeuh in amah le amah a ki‑it bangin a zi it henla, a zi in zong a pasal zahtak hen.
49006001	Tate aw, Topa sungah na nu na pate uh thu na mang un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in thuman ahi hi.
49006002	“Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cih thu in kamciam tawh a kithuahkhawm thupiak masa pen hi a,
49006003	“na nu na pa zahtak lecin leitung ah nuamsa in na khansau ding hi.”
49006004	Pate aw, na tate uh a heh nadingun phin kei un. Topa thu tawh hilhin pantah unla, khansuah un.
49006005	Silate aw, Khazih thu na man mah bangun ci le sa a na tote uh thu zong lau le ling kawmsa in lungsim takpi tawh na mang un.
49006006	Mihing mai‑et in amaute hong muh sung beka thumangte hilo in, lungsim takpi tawh Pasian deihna a zui Khazih silate bangin nasem un.
49006007	Mihingte nasem bang hilo in Topa nasem bangin deihsakna tawh na sem un.
49006008	Sila ahi a, silalo ahi zongin a hoih a sem mi khempeuh Topa in a hoih pia ding hi cih thu na thei uh hi.
49006009	Tote aw, note in zong na silate uh tungah tua bangin bawl un. Note Topa zong vantung ah om a, amah in kuamah deidan neilo hi cih thu thei unla, na silate uh lausak in tawnbawl kei un.
49006010	A nunungpen in sanggamte aw, Topa le a vanglian ama hatna sungah thakhauh un.
49006011	Dawimangpa hong sawmnate na nanzawh nadingun Pasian hong piak galvante a kimin na silh un.
49006012	Banghang hiam cihleh si le sa tawh kido i hi kei a, a zalianpente, a thuneite, tulai leitung khuamial a ukte le van lam a dawigilo honpite tawh a kido i hi hi.
49006013	Tua ahih manin hunsiate nang zo in na khempeuh zo a, na dinkip zawh nadingun Pasian hong piak galvante a kimin silh un.
49006014	Tua ahih manin thuman thutak kawnggak gak unla, dikna sik awmdal bulhin,
49006015	kilemna tawh kipawl lungdamna thu kiginkholhna khedap bulh unla, dingkip un.
49006016	Tua galvan khempeuh banah gilopa hong kapna meikuang thaltang khempeuh a mitsak zo ding upna lum na tawi un.
49006017	Hotkhiatna sik lukhu khu unla, Pasian kammal ahi Kha namsau tawi un.
49006018	Kha sungah a tawntung in thungetna nam khempeuh le deih ngetnate na ngen un. Hih bangin pilvangtak in omden unla, misiangthote khempeuh aa ding tatsat loin thungetsak un.
49006019	Kei aa dingin Pasian in ka gen ding thute hong pia a, a kiselcip ahi lungdamna thu hangtak a ka genngam nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
49006020	Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna thu hangin tangmi khat ka hihna hangin mat le hen ka thuak hi. Hih bangpi mah in ka gen dinga kilawm bangbang hangtak in ka gen theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
49006021	Ka vai teng le ka nasepzia teng na theih nadingun Tychicus in hong gen ding hi. Amah pen Topa nasem muanhuai ka it sanggampa khat ahi hi.
49006022	Ka vai teng uh na theih nading uh le amah in note tha hong piak theih nading ngimna tawh amah kong paisak ahi hi.
49006023	Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih in sanggamte tungah lungmuanna le upna tawh kipawl ki‑itna hong pia tahen.
49006024	Lungsim takpi tawh i Topa Zeisu Khazih a it mi khempeuh tungah hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen. Amen.
50001001	Zeisu Khazih sila keimah Paul le Timothy in Philippi khua‑a om Khazih Zeisu sunga misiangtho khempeuh le pawlpi siate le pawlpi upate lai kong khak uh hi.
50001002	I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pan hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
50001003	Note kong phawksim in ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
50001004	Thu ka ngetsim in note khempeuh aa dingin lungdamtak in kong ngetsak hi.
50001005	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipat a kipan tuni dongin lungdamna thu ka hilhna ah nong panpih uh hi.
50001006	Note sungah nasep hoih hong pankhiapa in Zeisu Khazih ni dongin kicingtak in hong zomsuak ding hi ci in ka lungmuang hi.
50001007	Ka lungsim sungah om den na hih manun na vekpi un tua banga kong ngaihsut ding mah na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mat le hen ka thuakna le lungdamna thu ka hutna le ka kipsaknate ah kei tawh kibang in hehpihna thupha a ngahkhawm na hi uh hi.
50001008	Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Khazih in hong it mah bangin kei zong note kong it mahmahna Pasian in ka teci ahi hi.
50001009	Note itna in thu theihna le thu khentel theihna khempeuh ah a khan semsem nading,
50001010	Khazih ni dongin a hoihpen nate muhtel theih nading, a siangtho le kawkbanglo a na om nading,
50001011	Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a dikna gahte tawh na kidim theih nading uh le Pasian vangliatna a kiphat theih nadingin thu kong ngetsak hi.
50001012	Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, ka tunga thupiangte in lungdamna thu kizelsak zaw hi cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
50001013	Khazih hanga mat le hen ka thuakna kumpi inncing galkapte khempeuh le midangte in zong a theitel uh hi.
50001014	Mat le hen ka thuak manin Topa sunga sanggamte a tam zaw in zong thangahna in nei uh a, Pasian thu gen ding lau loin a hang semsem uh hi.
50001015	Mi pawlkhat in midangte eenna le dem nopna tawh Khazih thu hilh uh a, pawlkhat in lungsim maan tawh a hilh uh hi.
50001016	Hih a masate pawlin lungsim takpi tawh hilo angsungkhualna bek tawh ka thuak gimnate a kibehlap nading ngimna tawh Khazih thu a hilh uh hi.
50001017	Ahih hangin a nunungte pawlin lungdamna thu a hu dingin kei hong kiseh ahihlam thei uh ahih manin itna tawh Khazih thu a hilh uh hi.
50001018	A phatmawhna bang om ahi hiam? Kineih tawmna tawh ahi a, lungsim taktak tawh ahi zongin lam khatpeuh tawh Khazih thu a kihilh nak leh ka lungdam veve a, ka lungdam lailai ding hi.
50001019	Banghang hiam cihleh nong thungetsakna uh le Zeisu Khazih Kha in a hong huhna hangin tua thute in keima suahtak nading hong suak ding hi cih ka thei hi.
50001020	Maizumna bangmah nei loin ka hansan ngei bangin ka hangsan lai dinga, ka si a ka hing zongin ka pumpi tawh Khazih minthansak ding lunggulh in ka lamen hi.
50001021	Banghang hiam cihleh nungta hi leng Khazih aa ding hi a, si hi leng a met zaw ka hi hi.
50001022	Ahih hangin ka pumpi nungta lai leh na tampi sem thei ding ka hih manin ka teel zawk ding ka thei kei hi.
50001023	Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu nihte kikal ah ka cih nading ka thei kei hi. Khazih tawh omkhop ding ka ut a, tua in kei aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
50001024	Ahi zongin hih pumpi tawh ka nuntak lai ding note aa dingin a kisam zaw hi.
50001025	Tua ahih manin upna sunga na khantoh nading uh le na kipah nadingun ka dam lai dinga, note khempeuh tawh ka omkhawm lai ding hi ci in ka lungmuang hi.
50001026	Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong paikik ciangin Zeisu Khazih sunga na lungdamna uh keima hangin a hong tam zaw ding hi.
50001027	Khazih lungdamna thu tawh kilawm kituak in na nungta un. Tua hi leh note kiangah hong pai in kong mu a, na thu uh ka galzak ahi zongin lungsim khat bekah dingkip in, lungdamna thu tawh kipawl upna thu ah ngaihsutna kikhat in na hanciamkhopna uh ka za thei ding hi.
50001028	Note hong langpan mite hangin na lau peuhmah kei un. Note laulohna in amaute kisiatna lahna hi a, ahih hangin note aa dingin Pasian kiang pana hong pai hotkhiatna lahna ahi hi.
50001029	Khazih a um dingte bek hilo in ama hanga a thuak dingin zong Khazih min tawh note tungah thu hong kipia hi.
50001030	Tua ahih manin na muh khitsa uh le tu laitak in na zak uh keima thuak bangbang a thuak na hi uh hi.
50002001	Tua ahih ciangin Khazih sungah tha kipiakna, itna tawh kihehnepna, Kha tawh kilawmtakna, lungnemna le lainatnate khat peuhpeuh na neih uh leh,
50002002	ka lungdamna a kicin nadingin na ngaihsutna uh kituaksak unla, a kibang itna nei in lungsim kihual le tupna kibang in om un.
50002003	Angsungkhualna le kisialh nopna tawh bangmah hih kei un. Na lungsim uh niamkhiat unla, no sangin midangte a thupi zaw in ngaihsun un.
50002004	No met nading bek ngaihsun loin midangte aa ding zong ngaihsutsak un.
50002005	Khazih Zeisu lungsim puak bang note sungah om tahen.
50002006	Amah in Pasian taktak hi napi Pasian tawh kikimna let tentan dingin ngaihsun loin,
50002007	bangmah lo bangin a hong kikoih hi. Sila bangin hong om a, mihing bangin a hong pai hi.
50002008	Mihing mel hong pua in hong kiniamkhiat a, sih dongin thumang in singlamteh tungah sihna a hong thuak hi.
50002009	Tua ahih manin Pasian in amah a sangpen munah lamto a, min khempeuh sangin a thupi zaw min a pia hi.
50002010	Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung le leinuai‑a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu min pahtawi in khukdin ding uh a,
50002011	Zeisu Khazih in Topa ahi hi ci in leii khempeuh in pulak in Pa Pasian min a thangsak ding uh hi.
50002012	Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, note kianga ka omlai a thu na man tawntung mah bangun tu a kong om loh ciangin zong thu na mang zaw kan unla, na ngahsa uh hotkhiatna lau le lingkawm in na lakkhia un.
50002013	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian a lungdamsak nate na sepnop nading uh le na sep theih nadingun note sunga na a hong sempa in Pasian ahi hi.
50002014	Na khempeuh phun lo kisel loin sem un.
50002015	Tua hi leh a kawkbanglo a siangtho khialhna a neilo Pasian tate na suak ding uh hi. Lungsim kawi in lam a khial tulai khang mite sungah note in leitung ah khuavak bangin na tang ding uh hi.
50002016	A mawknapi a a taii le a mawknapi a nasem hilo in Khazih ni ciangin ka lungdam theih nadingin nuntakna thu ka lenkip hi.
50002017	Hi hi, note in upna tawh na nasepna hangun tuibuah biakpiakna banga ka nuntakna a kibuak hangin note khempeuh tawh kipak in ka lung a dam veve hi.
50002018	Tuamah bangin note zong nuamin kei tawh lungdamkhawm un.
50002019	Ahih hangin note omdan teng thei a, tha ka ngah nadingin note kiangah Timothy hong paisak thei pah ning ci in Topa Zeisu sungah lametna ka nei hi.
50002020	Banghang hiam cihleh keima hong deihsak banga note hong deihsak taktak ding amah longal midang kuamah ka nei kei hi.
50002021	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu tawh kisai nate zong loin amau angsung ding bek a zong uh hi.
50002022	Ahi zongin Timothy mihoih ahihlam na theihsa uh hi a, lungdamna thu ah kei tawh pata banga nasemkhawm mi ahi hi.
50002023	Tua ahih manin ka vai ding khat peuhpeuh a kitel ciangin amah hong sawlthei pah dingin ka kilamen hi.
50002024	Ahi zongin kei mahmah zong a sawtlo in hong paithei dingin Topa sungah khamuanna ka nei hi.
50002025	Note kamtai le kei hong huh dinga nong sawl uh kei tawh na a semkhawm gal a hong dopih ka sanggampa Epaphroditus, note kiangah kong ciahsakkik ding kisam ka sazaw hi.
50002026	Banghang hiam cihleh a cinatna na zak uh ciangin amah in note hong lunggulh in a lunghimawh mahmah hi.
50002027	Amah si dektak in a cinat hangin Pasian in a hehpih hi. Amah bek hehpih hilo in ka dahna a kibehlap loh nadingin kei mahmah zong hong hehpih ahi hi.
50002028	Tua ahih manin amah na muhkik uh ciangin na lung uh dam dinga, keima dahna a noptuam theih nadingin amah kong paisak pah ding hi.
50002029	Tua ahih manin Topa min tawh lungdamtak in amah na sang unla, tua bang mite na thupibawl un.
50002030	Banghang hiam cihleh kei aa dingin nong sepsak theihloh tenguh aman hong sepsak in sih ding zong phamawh salo in Khazih na a sep manin a si dektak ahi hi.
50003001	A tawpna ah sanggamte aw, Topa sungah lungdam un. Hih thute kong gelh kikkik pen a cimtakhuai hilo in note kip nading hi zaw hi.
50003002	Uite na pel un, a hoihlo nasemte na pel unla, vunat ding a ci teitei mite na pel un!
50003003	Banghang hiam cihleh eite in Kha tawh Pasian a biate le ci le sa suang loin Khazih Zeisu sungah a lungdam vunatte i hi hi.
50003004	Ci le sa a suang nuam hi leng midangte sangin ka suan ding a tam zaw hi.
50003005	Ni giat ka phak ni in vun a ki‑atpa, Israel minam, Benjamin suan ka hi hi. Hebrew mite lak panin Hebrew mi khat ka hi a, thukham zuihna lamah Pharisee pawl ka hi hi.
50003006	Hanciamna lamah genleng pawlpi a bawlsiapa ka hi a, thukham tawh kisai dikna lamsang ah mawhsak nading a omlo mipa ka hi hi.
50003007	Ahi zongin keima metna khempeuh Khazih hangin supna in ka ngaihsun zaw hi.
50003008	Ka Topa ahi Khazih Zeisu ka theihna sanga thulian zaw om lo ahih manin thudang khempeuh supna hi ci in ka ngaihsun hi. Khazih a meta ka ngah theih nadingin na khempeuh ka tan zaw a, tua nate ninbulom bangin ka ngaihsun hi.
50003009	Tua Topa sunga ka om theih nadingin, thukham zuihna hangin dikna bangmah ka ngah kei a, Khazih upna tungtawn a kingah, Pasian in upna hanga hong piak dikna bek ka ngah hi.
50003010	Hih in Khazih mahmah le amah a thokiksak vangliatna ka theih theih nading, ama thuak banga gimna thuakin ama sih banga ka sih theih nading leh,
50003011	misite lak pan thawhkikna ka ngah hamtang theih nading ahi hi.
50003012	Tuate ngah khinzo ing, picing khinzo ing a ci ka hi kei hi. Khazih Zeisu in tuate a ngah dinga kei hong mat bangin kei zong tuate ka mat zawh nadingin a delhdelh ka hi hi.
50003013	Sanggamte aw, tuate a ngah khinzo in a kingaihsun ka hi kei hi. Ahi zongin ka hih khat om a, ka nunglam a om nate mangngilh in ka mailam a om nate ka zam hi.
50003014	Tunglam pana Pasian in Khazih Zeisu sunga hong sapna ahi pahtawina ka ngah nadingin kunglam ah ka tai hi.
50003015	Tua ahih ciangin a picing khinsa mi peuhmah in tua bang lungsim neiciat ni. Note ngaihsutna tawh a kituaklo thu a om leh Pasian in hong theitelsak ding hi.
50003016	Bangbang hi ta leh i ngah khitsa thute, zui in lungsim kituak in omciat ni.
50003017	Sanggamte aw, kei hong etteh un. Na etteh ding uh kote ka hih manun kote banga a nungta midangte zong na etteh un.
50003018	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih singlamteh galin a do mi tampite gamtatzia kong gen ngei zel bangin tu in zong khitui luangin kong genkik hi.
50003019	Amaute in a tawpna ah siatna a thuak dingte ahi uh a, amaute pasian in a gilpi uh ahi hi. A maizum nading teng uh kisialhna in nei zawsop uh a, leitung nate bek a ngaihsunte ahi uh hi.
50003020	Banghang hiam cihleh eite in vantunggam mi i hi a, tua gam panin Honpa ahi Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ding lawptak in i ngak hi.
50003021	Amah in na khempeuh ama thuneihna nuai‑a a koih a vangliatna tawh kizui in a ginalo i pumpite a minthang ama pumpi bangin hong khelsak ding hi.
50004001	Tua ahih manin kong it kong ngaih mahmah sanggamte aw, note in ka lungdamna le ka kumpi lukhu na hi uh hi. Kong itte aw, Topa sungah kiptak in na ding un.
50004002	Euodia le Syntyche‑te aw, Topa sungah khat le khat lungsim kituak in na om nadingun kong thum hi.
50004003	Ka naseppih, ka lawm taktak nangmah in zong lungdamna thu ah kei tawh nakpi in na a semkhawm hih numeite na huh nadingin kong thum hi. Amaute in Clement a kipan Nuntakna Laibupi sunga a min uh a kigelh a dang ka naseppihte tawh zong a semkhawmte ahi uh hi.
50004004	Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un. Khatvei kong genkik in ah lungdam un!
50004005	Na lungnemna uh mi khempeuh tungah kilangsak un. Note kiangah Topa a om hi.
50004006	Bangmah thu ah lung himawh loin na khempeuh ah lungdam ko kawmsa in thungen unla, na kisapnate uh Pasian tungah pulak in na ngen un.
50004007	Tua hi leh mite tel zawhloh Pasian hong piak lungmuanna in Khazih Zeisu tungtawn in note lungsim le ngaihsutnate hong cin hong kepsak ding hi.
50004008	Sanggamte aw, a tawpkhakna a kong gen in ah thudik le a pahtawihuai thute, a thuman, a siangtho, a ithuai thu le thu hoihte, gamtat hoih le a phathuai thute ngaihsutpen in na nei un.
50004009	Keima kiang pana na sinsa, na ngahsa, na zaksa uh le na muhsa uh thute na zui un. Tua hi leh lungnopna Pasian in, note hong ompih ding hi.
50004010	Tu in a nunung pen in kei nong khualna uh hong kilangsakkik na hih manun Topa sungah ka lungdam mahmah hi. Nidanglai in zong nong khual mahmah uh a, ahi zongin na lahkhiat nading uh hun hoih a ngah lo na hi uh hi.
50004011	Huhna ka kisap manin hih thu a hong gen ka hi kei hi. Bangci bangin om taleng a lungkim dingin ka kisin khinzo hi.
50004012	Cihmawhna ka thei a, cihtheihna zong ka thei hi. Gilkialna le gilvahna, kicinna le kisapnate zong, mun khempeuh ah na khempeuh panin ka sinzo hi.
50004013	Kei hong thahatsakpa Khazih hangin na khempeuh ka hih thei hi.
50004014	Bangbang hi ta leh ka haksatna hong thuakpih na hih manun na nasepna uh hoih mahmah hi.
50004015	Lungdamna thu kong gencil lai in Macedonia gam pan ka ciah ciangin piakna le ngahna lamah note longal kei tawh a kizom pawlpi dang om lo hi cih thu tu in no Philippi khua mite in na theihsa uh ahi hi.
50004016	Thessalonica khua‑a ka omlai nangawn in ka kisapnate nong huhna uh khatvei bek hilo in nihveitak nong khak uh hi.
50004017	Hih bang ka cih ciangin letsong ka deihna hilo in, gahpha na gah semsem nading uh kong deihsakna hi zaw hi.
50004018	Na khempeuh kicingtak in ka nei taktak hi. Nong na khakte uh Epaphroditus tung pan ka ngah a, ka kisapna teng kicing ta hi. Tuate pen Pasian in a san theih amah a lungdamsak mahmah, a namtui biakpiakna ahi hi.
50004019	Ka Pasian in Khazih Zeisu sunga ama thupina tawh kituak hauhna tawh na kisapna khempeuh uh hong pia ding hi.
50004020	Tu in i Pa Pasian in minthanna ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
50004021	Khazih Zeisu sunga misiangthote khempeuh na hopihsak un. Kei tawh a omkhawm sanggamte in zong note hong hopih uh hi.
50004022	Misiangtho khempeuh a diakdiak in Caesar kumpipa inn sunga omte in note hong hopih uh hi.
50004023	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
51001001	Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak keimah Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in,
51001002	Colosse khua‑a om, Khazih sunga misiangthote le a citak sanggamte lai kong khak uh hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
51001003	Kote in i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa, Pasian tungah note aa dingin thu kong ngetsak sim un lungdam ka ko den uh hi.
51001004	Khazih Zeisu na upna uh le misiangthote khempeuh na itna uh thu ka zak man uh ahi hi.
51001005	Pasian in note aa dingin vantung ah lametna hong koihsak zo a, thuman thutak ahi lungdamna thu panin tua thu na zazo uh hi.
51001006	Tua lungdamna thu leitung mun khempeuh ah hong gahkhia in a khan mah bangin Pasian hehpihna thupha maantak za in na theih ni uh a kipan note kiangah zong a hong tungzo hi.
51001007	Kote naseppih ka it mahmah uh Epaphras tung panin tua thu na zazo uh hi. Amah in note septang in Khazih nasem mi muanhuai ahi hi.
51001008	Amah in Kha sunga na ki‑itna uh kote tungah a hong gen hi.
51001009	Hih thu hangin ama deihna theitel in khalam pilna le khalam thutheihna khempeuh tawh na kidim nadingun hih thu ka zak ni uh a kipan tatsat loin thu ka hong ngetsak uh hi.
51001010	Topa tawh a kilawm gamtatna nei in na khempeuh ah amah lungdamsak in, nasep hoih khempeuh ah gahsuah in Pasian theihna ah na khan semsem nadingun thu kong ngetsak uh hi.
51001011	Lungduai in kipak a na thuak zawh nadingun, a vanglian ama thahatna tawh kizui in vangliatna khempeuh tawh note hong kithakhauhsak hen.
51001012	Khuavak sunga om mi siangthote luah ding, a ngah dinga kilawm mi a hong suaksak, i Pa tungah lungdam ka ko uh hi.
51001013	Amah in khuamial ukcipna panin eite hong honkhia in, a it a Tapa kumpigam sungah a hong tunzo hi.
51001014	Ama sisan hanga tatkhiatna ahi mawh maisakna, tua Tapa sungah i ngah hi.
51001015	Tua Tapa in a kimu theilo Pasian lim le mel hi a, a kipiangsak khempeuh lak pan a masa pen ahi hi.
51001016	Vantung le leitung a om, a kimu thei le a kimu theilo, kumpi tokhomte ahi a, uknate ahi a, zaliatnate le thuneihnate ahi zongin tua Tapa tungtawn in a kipiangsak ahi hi. Na khempeuh in ama tungtawn le ama aa dingin a kipiangsak ahi hi.
51001017	Na khempeuh a omma in amah om a, ama sungah na khempeuh a om hi.
51001018	Amah in pumpi, pawlpi Lutang ahi hi. Amah na khempeuh ah a lianpen ahih nadingin a kipatna le a bul hi a, misite lak panin a thokik masa pen ahi hi.
51001019	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama kicinna khempeuh Tapa sunga a om ding le,
51001020	Tapa tungtawn in leitung le vantung a om na khempeuh, amahmah tawh a kilemkik ding a deih hi. Tua ahih manin ama singlamteh tung pana hong luangkhia a sisan tungtawn in na khempeuh tawh kilemna a bawl zo hi.
51001021	Khatvei lai in Pasian tawh na kikhen uh a, note sep gitlohnate hangin na lungsim sung uhah Pasian galte na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin tu in amah in hong kilemkiksak zo hi.
51001022	Tua in Khazih in pumpi sihna a thuakna hang hi a, Pasian mai ah mawhsak nading omlo, a kawkbanglo, a siangtho in note a hong piak theih nading ahi hi.
51001023	Tua bang a hih theih nadingin upna ah kip in, zung kha in, kiptak in ding unla, na zaksa na lamet uh lungdamna thu panin kihei kei un. Tua lungdamna thu in van nuai‑a om khempeuh tungah a kihilh thu hi a, keimah Paul zong tua thu a gen nasem mi khat ka hi hi.
51001024	Tu in, note aa dingin gimna ka thuak manin ka lungdam hi. Tua banah Khazih in a thuak khitloh a kisam lai gimnate ka pumpi tawh thuaka ka kicinsak theih manin ka nuam hi. Tua ka thuakna in Khazih pumpi ahi pawlpi aa ding ahi hi.
51001025	Pasian in tua pawlpi aa dingin neihsa kem za hong piakna tawh kizui in, nasem khatin hong koihzo a, Pasian thu a bukim in kong hilh theih nading ahi hi.
51001026	Tua thusim khang tampi le hun sawtpi sung kiselcip a, ahi zongin tu in ama misiangthote tungah a hong lakkhia ta hi.
51001027	Hih thu kiselsim vangliatna kicinna in bang hiam cih Gentile‑te lakah a kitheih nadingin Pasian in a deih hi. Tua a kiselsim thu in Khazih note sunga om, vanglian lametna pen ahi hi.
51001028	Khazih Zeisu sungah mi khempeuh a picing a suah theih nadingun pilna namkim tawh mi khempeuh thu ka hilh uh a, kidophuai thute zong theisak in Khazih thu ka tangko uh hi.
51001029	Tua bang a pian theih nadingin amah in keima sungah thakhauhtak in na a hong sep mah bangin kei zong nakpitak in na ka sem hi.
51002001	Note le Laodicea khua mite a kipan ka mel a hong mu ngeilo mi khempeuh aa dingin ka hanciam tentanna na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
51002002	Na lungsim uh thahat in, itna tawh khat le khat kikhihkhawm in, thu theitel in, Pa le Khazih tawh kisai a kisel Pasian thusimte cingtak a, na theih sinsen nading uh ka tupna ahi hi.
51002003	Tua Khazih sungah a manpha pilna le theihna khempeuh kisel in a om hi.
51002004	Tu in kuamah in kamsiam tawh note a hong khem zawhloh nadingin hih thu kong gen hi.
51002005	Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah ka pumpi tawh kong om theihloh hangin ka lungsim tawh kong om a, hoihtak a na omzia uh le Khazih na upzia uh a kipna ka muh manin ka lungdam mahmah hi.
51002006	Tua ahih manin Topa Khazih Zeisu na san khit mah bangun ama deihna bangin gamta un.
51002007	Ama sungah zung kha in kilamkip un. Hong kihilhna sa a om bangin upna ah kip unla, lungdamkohna na hat semsem un.
51002008	Mite ngeina le leitung tawh kipawl thuguipite in Khazih hong hilh thute tawh kituak lo ahih manin mihing ngaihsut pilna le kimanna omlo thu tawh kuamah in a hong khem zawhloh nadingin na kikem un.
51002009	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian pianzia khempeuh Khazih pumpi sungah hong om hi.
51002010	Note in zaliatna le thuneihna khempeuhte lutang ahi tua Khazih sungah kicing in na om uh hi.
51002011	Khazih hong vunatna hangin ci le sa mawhna pumpi paikhia in khut tawh a ki‑atlo vunatna tawh ama sungah vun ki‑atte na hi uh hi.
51002012	Tuiphumna ah amah tawh kivuikhawm in misite lak pan amah a thokiksak Pasian vangliatna, na upna uh tungtawn in amah tawh na thokik zo uh hi.
51002013	Note in mawhna sungah si in ci le sa a vunatlote na hih laitak un Pasian in amah tawh hong hing khawmsak zo a, na mawhna khempeuh uh hong maisak zo hi.
51002014	Amah in eite a hong langpan a hong lehdo, khut tawh a kigelh thukhunte phiatmai in lakhia a, singlamteh ah a kilhcip khinzo hi.
51002015	Amah in zaliatnate le thuneihnate susia in tuate tungah a gualzawhna mipi muhin singlamteh tungah a lakkhia hi.
51002016	Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn a kipan, biakna pawi, khadet pawi le sabbath nite tawh kisai in note tungah kuamah thu kikhensak kei un.
51002017	Tuate in a hong pianglai ding nate lim hi a, a taktak pen Khazih ahi hi.
51002018	Kiniamkhiatna maanlo nuam a sate, vantungmi a biate, a muh ngeilohpi uh a mawk gengente, ci le sa lungsim tawh a kisathei mite, na thaman uh kisutkhiasak kei un.
51002019	Tua mite in Lutang ahi Khazih tawh a kizom kei uh hi. Tua Lutang panin pumpi buppi in guh le tangte le thaguite tawh kizomkhawm in thahatna ngah a, Pasian in a khansak bangbang in a khangto hi.
51002020	Tua ahih manin note in leitung thuguipite na zuihna panun Khazih tawh sikhawm khinzo na hih uh leh banghang in leitung ah a nungta laite bangin,
51002021	“Lawng kei in, ciam kei in, len kei in,”
51002022	cih thukhunte banghang in zui lailai na hi uh hiam? Tuate in mihingte thukham le thuhilhna bek hi a, tuate zuihna in sihna a piangsak hi.
51002023	Tuate in pilna maan tawh a kibat hangin phuahtawm biakna ahi hi. Kiniamkhiatna maanlo le pumpi gawtna hi a, ci le sa deihna kham nadingin kimanna a nei kei hi.
51003001	Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in Khazih tawh note hong thosak khinzo ahih leh Pasian taklam, Khazih tutna mun ahi tunglam a om nate na zong un.
51003002	Tunglam a om nate lunggulh unla, leitung a om nate lunggulh kei un.
51003003	Banghang hiam cihleh a si khin na hi uh a, note nuntakna in Pasian sungah Khazih tawh kiselkhawm in a om hi.
51003004	I nuntakna ahi Khazih hong kilat ciangin, note zong amah tawh minthang in na kilangkhawm ding uh hi.
51003005	Tua ahih manin leitung pumpi deihna ahi numei pasal thangtatna, a siangtholo gamtatna, iiplahna, a hoihlo lunggulhna le huaihamnate ahi milim biaknate sisak un.
51003006	Banghang hiam cihleh tua mawhnate hangin a thumanglo mite tungah Pasian hehna a tung hi.
51003007	Note zong nidanglai in tua mawhnate sungah bual in na nungta ngei uh hi.
51003008	Ahih hangin tu in hehna, thangpaihna, midangte siatsak nopna, gensiatna le a kihhuai kampaunate paikhia un.
51003009	Khat le khat na kikhem kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note in mi lui le mi lui gamtatna teng na paikhia khin uh a,
51003010	mi thak a piangsakpa in ama lim le mel tawh kituak in theihna lamah a kithaksuaksak mi thak na silh khin uh hi.
51003011	Tua bawlthakna sungah Greek mi, Judah mi, vunat mi, vunatloh mi, Greek mi a hilo, Scythia mi, sila mi, silalo mi cih a om kei hi. Khazih in na khempeuh hi a, na khempeuh sungah a om hi.
51003012	Tua ahih manin Pasian teel mite, a siangtho le itna a ngah mite na hih manun hehpihna, migitna, kiniamkhiatna, lungnemna le lungduainate na silh un.
