51003013	Khat le khat kithuak zo unla, mawhna kimaisak un. Kilungkim lohna na neih uh leh Khazih in note mawhna a hong maisak bangin na kimaisak un.
51003014	Tuate khempeuh banah note pumkhat a hong suaksak ki‑itna na silhthuah un.
51003015	Pasian kiang pana hong pai lungnopna in na lungsim uh hong uk tahen. Pasian in tua bang dingin pumpi khat sungah a hong sap mite na hih manun na lungdam un.
51003016	Khazih thu in note sungah pilna namkim tawh dimtak in hong teeng henla, phatna late a kipan, biakna late, kha tawh kipawl late tawh khat le khat thu kihilh tha kipia in na lungsim uhah lungdamtak in Topa na phat un.
51003017	Na kampauna uh ahi a, na gamtatna uh ahi zongin nasep na bawl khempeuh uh Topa Zeisu minin sem unla, ama tungtawn in Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko un.
51003018	Zite aw, na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Tua in Topa sungah a kilawm thu ahi hi.
51003019	Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah gamhtat kei un.
51003020	Tate aw, na khempeuh ah nu le pa thu na mang un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in Topa a lungkimsak hi.
51003021	Pate aw, na tate uh phin kei un. Amaute lungkia kha ding uh hi.
51003022	Silate aw, na khempeuh ah ci le sa a na tote uh thu na mang un. Maipha ngahpak nadingin amaute hong muh sung bek a thumangte hilo in Pasian kihta in lungsim takpi tawh thu na mang un.
51003023	Mihingte nasem bangin kingaihsun kei unla, Topa nasem bangin kingaihsun in na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh sem un.
51003024	Topa Khazih nasem na hih manun, ama tung pan pahtawina in gamhluahna na ngah ding uh hi cih thei un.
51003025	Ahih hangin amah in khialhna a bawl khempeuh kuamah deidan tuam nei loin a khialhna tawh kituak in a thukkik ding hi.
51004001	Tote aw, note in zong vantung ah Topa khat na neih lam uh phawk unla, na silate uh thuman le a kilawm bangin bawl un.
51004002	Lungdamna tawh kikem kawm in thunget hahkat tawntung un.
51004003	Sikkhau bulh ka thuaklawhna ahi, a kiselsim Khazih thuthukpi ka gen theih nadingin Pasian in kong hong honsak nading thu hong ngetsak un.
51004004	Gen dinga kilawm bangin teltak a thu ka lahkhiat theih nadingin zong thu hong ngetsak un.
51004005	A pualam mite tawh na kizop uh ciangin pilvangtak in gamta unla, hun hoihte khahsuah kei un.
51004006	Mi khatpeuh hong hopihnate maantak in na dawnkik theih nadingun note kampauna khempeuh ah ci bangin a al kamhoih na zang un.
51004007	Topa na ka sepkhoppih, a muanhuai nasempa ahi ka it sanggampa Tychicus in ka omzia khempeuh a hong gen ding hi.
51004008	Note omzia teng a thei ding le note lungsim tha a hong pia dingin amah kong paisak hi.
51004009	Note mipih khat ahi, a muanhuai le ka it sanggampa Onesimus zong amah tawh kong paikhawmsak hi. Hihlai a thupiang khempeuh amaute in hong gen ding uh hi.
51004010	Ka thongkiatpih Aristarchus le Barnabas tupa Mark in note hong hopih uh hi. Mark tawh kisai kong gensa thute thei khin na hih manun note kiangah a hong pai leh amah na sang un.
51004011	Justus a kici Zeisu in zong note hong hopih hi. Pasian kumpigam aa dingin vunat mite sung pan na ka seppih le tha hong pia amauteng bek ahi hi.
51004012	Note mipih ka lawmpa khat ahi Khazih sila Epaphras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian deihna khempeuh zui in picingtak a na dinkip theih nadingun amah in hanciam in nakpitak in thu hong ngetsak den hi.
51004013	Banghang hiam cihleh note aa ding, Laodicea khua mite aa ding le Hierapolis khua mite aa dingin hanciamtak in na a sem hi cih thu keimah in ka theihpih hi.
51004014	Ka it mahmah siavuanpa Luke le Demas in zong note hong hopih uh hi.
51004015	Laodicea khua‑a sanggamte, Nymphas le a inn sunga kikhawm thu‑umte na hopihsak un.
51004016	Tu in hih laikhak na sim khit uh ciangin Laodicea khua pawlpite zong na simsak unla, tua mah bangin Laodicea khua pawlpite ka laikhak zong na sim un.
51004017	Archippus kiangah, “Topa hong piak nasep na tangtun zawh nadingin limtak ngaihsun in,” ci in na gensak un.
51004018	Keimah Paul in hih hopihna lai keima khut mahmah tawh ka gelh ahi hi. Kolbulh khaukhih ka thuakna thu na phawk un. Pasian hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.
52001001	Paul, Silvanus, le Timothy‑te in Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih sunga om Thessalonica khua pawlpi mite lai kong khak uh hi. I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
52001002	Thu ka nget uh ciangin na min uh loin note khempeuh hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko den uh hi.
52001003	Upna tawh na nasepna uh, itna tawh na hanciamna uh le i Topa Zeisu Khazih sungah lametna hangin lungduaitak a na thuak keikainate uh i Pa Pasian mai ah kong phawk tawntung uh hi.
52001004	Kong it sanggamte aw, amah in note hong teel hi cih ka thei uh hi.
52001005	Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga ka omlai un note aa dinga ka nuntakzia uh na theihsa uh hi a, kong puak uh lungdamna thu zong a thu bek hilo in vangliatna, theihtel sinsenna le Kha Siangtho tawh na ngah uh ahi hi.
52001006	Haksatna tampi thuakin Topa thu na sang uh a, Kha Siangtho hong piak lungnopna nei in kote le Topa a hong ettehte na hi uh hi.
52001007	Tua ahih manin Macedonia gam le Achaia gam sunga om thu‑um mi khempeuhte etteh ding na suak uh hi.
52001008	Note tung panin Topa thu kizelkhia a, Macedonia gam le Achaia gamte bek hilo in mun khempeuh ah zong a kizel hi. Pasian na upna uh mun khempeuh ah thang khinzo ahih manin kong gen ding uh a kisam bangmah a om kei hi.
52001009	Banghang hiam cihleh note kiang kong tunzia uh ahi zongin, na milimte uh nusia in a nungta le a maan Pasian bia dingin ama lama na kiheizia uh ahi zongin,
52001010	misite lak pana Pasian in a thawhkiksak ama Tapa vantung pan hong pai ding ngaka na omziate uh amaute in a hong gengen uh hi. Tua Tapa in hong tung ding Pasian hehna panin eite hong honkhiapa Zeisu ahi hi.
52002001	Sanggamte aw, note kianga kong paina uh a mawkna suak lo hi cih na thei uh hi.
52002002	Ahih hangin na theihsa uh bangin kote in Philippi khua ah gentheihna ka thuak uh a, a zumhuaipi in hong kibawlsiat khit nangawn in hong kilehdona tampi kawmkal panin note kiangah Pasian lungdamna thu kote Pasian sungah hangtak in kong gen veve uh hi.
52002003	Banghang hiam cihleh thumanlo, lungsim maanlo, le khembawlna tawh ahi zongin note a hong hansuah ka hi kei uh hi.
52002004	Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsakna bangin, lungdamna thu hong apna tawh kizui in thu ka gen uh a, mihingte lungkim nading a gen hilo in ka lungsim uh hong sittel Pasian lungkim nadingin ka gen uh hi.
52002005	Banghang hiam cihleh nong theihsa bangun kimaitang phatna kamte ka zang kei uh a, a simtham huaihamna ka neih loh lam uh zong Pasian in kote teci ahi hi.
52002006	Khazih sawltakte ka hihna uh tawh note tungah huhna kong nget theih uh hangin note kiang pan ahi a, midang khatpeuh kiang pan ahi zongin phatna le pahtawina ka zong kei uh hi.
52002007	Ahi zongin nute in a tanote hoihtak a a kep a khoi bangin note lakah lungnemtak in kong om uh hi.
52002008	Tua hi a, hong it hong ngai ka hih manun Pasian lungdamna thu bek hilo in note in zong kote hong it na hih manun, ka nuntakna nangawn uh piak ding kote lungkimna ahi hi.
52002009	Banghang hiam cihleh sanggamte aw, nakpitak in nasem a ka hanciamna uh na thei uh hi. Pasian lungdamna thu kong hilh manun note khatpeuh aa dingin vangik ka suah loh nadingun sun le zanin nakpi in na ka sem uh hi.
52002010	Thu‑um note lakah ka nuntakna uh siangtho in, dik in, kawkban nading a om loh lam ka teci uh note le Pasian ahi hi.
52002011	Pate in a tate uh thu a hilh bangun note hong hanthawn in tha hong pia in thu kong hilh uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
52002012	Tua in ama kumpigam le a minthanna sunga note hong sam Pasian tawh kilawm kituak in na gamtat theih nading uh ahi hi.
52002013	Hih thu hangin Pasian tungah tatsat loin kote in zong lungdam ka ko den uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kote hong gen Pasian thu na zak uh ciangin mihing hong gen banglel in sang loin Pasian hong gen taktak bangin na sang uh hi. Tua thu in thu‑um note sungah muibuntak in na hong sem hi.
52002014	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih Zeisu a um Judea gama Pasian pawlpite in Judah mite bawlsiatna a thuak bangun sanggamte aw, note in zong nomau mipihte bawlsiatna thuak na hih manun amaute tawh kibang in a gamtate na hi uh hi.
52002015	Tua Judah mite in Topa Zeisu le amaute kamsangte that uh a, kote zong hong bawlsia uh hi. Amaute in Pasian lungdamsak lo uh a, mi khempeuh zong a langbawl uh hi.
52002016	Gentile‑te in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun thu ka hilh ding uh amaute in hong kham tawntung uh hi. Amaute in tua bangin a mawhnate uh behlap tawntung uh ahih manin tu in amaute tungah Pasian thangpaihna a buuk a bek in a tungzo hi.
52002017	Sanggamte aw, ka pumpi uh note tawh tawmvei sung a kikhen hangin ka lungsim uh note tawh a omkhawm hi. Note kong mu nuam mahmah uh a, kong muh theih nadingun nakpitak in ka hanciam uh hi.
52002018	Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong pai nuam mahmah uh a, keimah Paul tektek zong nihveitak pai kong sawm hangin Satan in kote hong khaktan den hi.
52002019	Tua ahih leh kote lamet ding, nuam nading, lungdamna lukhu in bang ahi hiam? I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ciangin ama mai‑a ka angtanpih ding uh note hilo na hi uh hiam?
52002020	Banghang hiam cihleh note in kote angtanna le lungdamna na hi uh hi.
52003001	Tua hi a, lung himawhna hong lian ahih manin ko guak bek Athens khuapi ah omsuak ding hoih ka sa uh hi.
52003002	Upna ah note tha hong pia a, a hong kipsak dingin Khazih lungdamna thu tangkona ah Pasian nasem kote naseppih, i sanggampa Timothy note kiangah kong sawl uh hi.
52003003	Kote pen hih haksatnate a thuak ding maha hong kisehsa ahihlam na theihsa uh ahih manin hih gimna thuaknate hangin kuamah na patauh loh nadingun amah in note tha hong pia ding hi.
52003004	Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga kong omlai un a sawtlo in gimna ka thuak ding uh hi ci a, kong gensa bangun a piantakpi lam tu in na thei uh hi.
52003005	Hih thu hangin hong ze‑etpa in lam khatpeuh tawh note hong ze‑et in ka sepsa khempeuh uh a mawkna a suah ding lunghimawh in om muangthei nawnlo ka hih manun na upna uh a thei dingin amah kong sawl hi.
52003006	Tu in note kiang panin Timothy hong tungkik zo hi. Upna le itna na neihna uh tawh kisai in a lungdamhuai thu hong puak hi. Kote nong phawk mahmahna uh ahi zongin note kong muhnop mahmah bangun note in zong nong muhnop mahmah nate uh hong gen hi.
52003007	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, gimthuakna le cihmawhna ka thuak laitak un note upna in kote hong thakhauhsak hi.
52003008	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa sungah kiptak in ding na hih manun tu in ka nungta uh hi.
52003009	Kote Pasian mai ah note hanga ka lungdamnate uh Pasian tungah lungdamkoh khit zawh ding hilo hi.
52003010	Na maitang uh kong muhkik nading uh le upna thu ah na kisapnate uh kong kicinsak theih nadingun sun le zanin nakpitak in thu ka ngen uh hi.
52003011	Tu in i Pa Pasian mahmah le i Topa Zeisu Khazih in note kiangah kong pai theih nading uh lampi hong honsak tahen.
52003012	Kote in note kong it mah bangun Topa in zong note khat le khat hong ki‑itsak semsem henla, mi khempeuh zong hong it theisak semsem tahen.
52003013	Topa Zeisu Khazih in ama misiangthote khempeuh tawh a hong pai ciangin i Pa Pasian mai ah sianthona ah kawkban nading om loin amah in na lungsim uh hong kipsak tahen.
52004001	Sanggamte aw a tawpkhakna a kong gennop in ah na nuntakzia ding uh le Pasian na lungdamsak zia ding uh kote kiang panin na thei khinzo uh hi. Tua bangin na khangto semsem un ci in Topa Zeisu sungah hong thumin kong hanthawn uh hi.
52004002	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu tungtawn a kong piak uh thupiakte note in na thei uh hi.
52004003	Banghang hiam cihleh na siantho nadingun numei pasal thangtatna na pelh un. Tua in Pasian deihna ahi hi.
52004004	Na pumpi uh a siangtho le a pahtawihuai dingin kemciat un.
52004005	Pasian a theilo Gentile‑te in numei le pasal kilunggulh luatna a neih bangun na om kei un.
52004006	Kong genkholh khitsa uh le kong theihsak khitsa bangun hih thute ah a khengval in kuamah gamta loin na sanggamte uh tungah gamta khial kei un. Topa in tua banga a gamta khempeuh a thukkikpa ahi hi.
52004007	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a thangtat dinga hong sap hilo in a siangtho dinga hong sap ahi hi.
52004008	Tua ahih manin hih thu a nialte in mihing thu a nial hilo in ama Kha Siangtho hong pia Pasian thu a nial uh ahi hi.
52004009	Ahih hangin sanggam ki‑itna tawh kisai lai kong gelh ding na kisam kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khat le khat na ki‑it nadingun Pasian mahmah in note hong hilh khinzo hi.
52004010	Macedonia gam a sanggamte khempeuh zong na it takpi uh hi. Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, itna na neih semsem nadingun kong hanthawn uh hi.
52004011	Thu kong piak khitsa uh bangin midangte tawh kilem in om hithiat unla, nomau vaiciat semtek un. Na khut uh tawh na semin hanciam un.
52004012	Tua hi leh kisapna bangmah nei loin a pualam mite muhna ah zong a kilawm a kituak in na nungta thei ding uh hi.
52004013	Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite a dah bangin na dah loh nadingun a ihmu khinsa mite thu thei lo a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi.
52004014	Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu si in thokik hi ci in i up mah bangin ama sunga a ihmu khinsa mite Pasian in Zeisu tawh hong tonkhawmsak ding hi ci in i um hi.
52004015	Topa hong pai dongin a nungta lai eite in a ihmu khinsa mite i makhelh peuhmah kei ding hi, ci in Topa kammal tawh kizui in kong gen uh hi.
52004016	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa mahmah in vantung panin kikona tawh, vantungmi mangpa kikona tawh, Pasian pengkul ging tawh hong kumsuk ding hi. Tua ciangin Khazih sunga a sisa mite hong tho masa ding uh hi.
52004017	Tua khit ciangin a nungta lai eite in amaute tawh huihlak ah Topa dawn dingin meiipi tungah hong kilato ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi.
52004018	Tua ahih manin hih thute tawh khat leh khat tha na kipia un.
52005001	Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, a ni le a hun tawh kisai in note kiangah lai kong gelh ding a kisam kei hi.
52005002	Banghang hiam cihleh gutate zankim a a hong pai bangin Topa Ni hong tung ding hi cih teltak in na thei uh hi.
52005003	Mite in, “Lungmuanna om hi Launa omlo hi!” a cih laitak un thakhat in suksiatna a thuak ding uh hi. Naupaai numeite tungah nausuah natna a tun vat bangin thakhat in siatna amaute tungah tung dinga, a suakta kei ding uh hi.
52005004	Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh khuamial sungah om lo na hih manun tua Ni in guta bangin hong bingphawn lo ding hi.
52005005	Note khempeuh in khuavak tate le sunlai tate na hi uh hi. Eite in zanlai tate le khuamial tate i hi kei hi.
52005006	Tua ahih manin midangte a ihmut bangin ihmu loin pilvangtak in omin pumpi kikhalna nei ni.
52005007	Banghang hiam cihleh a ihmu mite zan ciangin ihmu uh a, zukhamte zong zan ciangin a kham uh hi.
52005008	Ahi zongin sunlai tate ahi eite in pumpi kikhalna nei ni. Upna le itna sik awmdal bulh ni. Hotkhiatna lametna sik lukhu khu ni.
52005009	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama thangpaihna a thuak dinga hong koihte hilo in i Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin hotkhiatna a ngah dinga hong koihte ihi a,
52005010	amah in eite aa dingin a sipa ahi hi. Tua hi a, eite i si a, i hing zongin amah tawh i nuntakkhop theih nading ahi hi.
52005011	Tua ahih ciangin tu laitak a na hihna bangmah un khat le khat tha kipia in na kikipsak un.
52005012	Tu in, sanggamte aw, note lakah nasep a hahkatte le Topa sungah note hong makaih a, thu hong hilh mite na zahtak nadingun kong thum uh hi.
52005013	Amaute nasepna hangin itna tawh na thupi ngaihsut mahmah un. Note zong khat le khat na kilem un.
52005014	Tu in, sanggamte aw, a thumanglo mite thu na hilh un. A lungkiate tha na pia un. A thanemte na huh un. Mi khempeuh tungah thuakzawhna na nei un ci in kong hanthawn uh hi.
52005015	Thusiate thusia tawh thukkik kei un. Note aa ding le mi khempeuh aa dingin a hoih nate hanciam tawntung un.
52005016	Lungdam tawntung un.
52005017	Thungen tawntung un.
52005018	Na khempeuh ah lungdam na ko un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in Khazih Zeisu sungah note aa dinga Pasian hong deihsak ahi hi.
52005019	Kha meikuang na mitsak kei un.
52005020	Thuhilhnate na simmawh kei un.
52005021	Na khempeuh na sittel unla a hoihte na lenkip un.
52005022	A hoihlo a kici khempeuh na pel un.
52005023	Tu in lungmuanna hong pia Pasian mahmah in na sung na pua uh hong siangthosak tahen. Na kha uh, na lungsim uh le na pumpi uh, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ni ciangin kawkbanna a om lo dingin amah in hong kembit tahen.
52005024	Note hong sampa muanhuai ahih manin tua bangin hong sem ding hi.
52005025	Sanggamte aw, kote aa dingin thu hong ngetsak un.
52005026	A siangtho kinapna tawh sanggamte khempeuh na hopihsak un.
52005027	Hih laikhak a siangtho sanggamte khempeuh zak dingin na sim un ci in Topa min in thu kong pia hi.
52005028	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.
53001001	Paul, Silvanus le Timothy‑te in i Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih sunga om, Thessalonica khua pawlpi mite tungah lai kong khak uh hi.
53001002	I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
53001003	Sanggamte aw, na upna uh nakpitak in khang a, khat le khat na ki‑itna uh zong khang mahmah ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding uh a kiphamawh thu ahi hi.
53001004	Na thuak uh bawlsiatna le haksatna khempeuh sungah upna le thuakzawhna nei na hih manun Pasian pawlpite lakah note kong kisialhpih uh hi.
53001005	Hihte khempeuh in Pasian thukhenna a maan ahihna hong lak a, Pasian kumpigam aa dingin thuak na hih mah bangun tua kumpigam a luah dinga kilawmte na hihna uh zong hong lak hi.
53001006	No hong bawlsiate Pasian in gimna tawh a thuhkik ding pen a thuman ahi hi.
53001007	Topa Zeisu vantung pana a thahat ama vantungmite tawh hong kilat ciangin bawlsiatna a thuak note le kote tawldamna hong piakhawm ding hi.
53001008	Tua hun ciangin amah in Pasian a theilo mite le i Topa Zeisu Khazih lungdamna thu a umlo mite meikuang tawh a thukkik ding hi.
53001009	Tua mite pen Topa omna le a vangliatna huam sung panin kihawlkhia dinga, tawntung kisiatna daan a thuak ding uh hi.
53001010	Ama misiangthote hangin minthanna ngah ding le note laka ka teci panna uh a ki‑up manin thu‑um mite lakah pahtawina a ngah dingin tua Ni ciangin hong pai ding hi.
53001011	Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm banga Pasian in hong ngaihsut theih nadingin na tup uh a hoih khempeuh le na upna uh hanga piang nasep khempeuh ama vangliatna tawh hong tangtunsak nadingin thu kong ngetsak den uh hi.
53001012	I Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in note sungah i Topa Zeisu Khazih kipahtawi a, ama sungah zong note hong kipahtawi theih nadingin thu kong ngetsak uh hi.
53002001	Tu in, sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai nading thu le ama kianga i kikaihkhop nading thu tawh kisai a kong thum nopna uh hih bang ahi hi.
53002002	Khazih ni hong tung khinzo hi ci a, thusuak genna, thuhilhna le kote gelh bang khata a kibawltawm laikhakte hangin na lungsim uh patausak kei unla buaipih kei un.
53002003	Thu khat peuhpeuh tawh kuamah kikhem zosak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a masa pen in mite in upna maan pan hong puk ding uh a, tua Ni khit ciangin mawhna a piangsakpa hong kilang ding hi. Amah pen siatna tapa ahi hi.
53002004	Amah in Pasian le Pasian biakna kici khempeuh langpan in tuate tungah amah hong kitawisang ding hi. Amah in Pasian biakinnpi sungah Pasian bangin tu in amah le amah Pasian kici hi.
53002005	Note kianga kong omlai in hih thute kong gen khit lam phawk nawnlo na hi uh hiam?
53002006	Tua pa a hun a tun ciang beka hong kilatkhiat theih nadingin tu laitak in bangin khaktan hiam cih na thei uh hi.
53002007	Banghang hiam cihleh a kiselsim siatna in na a sem khinzo hi. Tua a khaktanpa a lakkhiat khit mateng amah in khaktan phot dinga,
53002008	tua khit ciangin siatna bawlpa hong kilangkhia pan ding hi. Topa hong pai ciangin ama kamsung pana pusuak a huu tawh tua siatna bawlpa sumang in ama hong kilatna vangtang tawh a susia ding hi.
53002009	Satan nasepna tawh kizui in tua siatna bawlpa hong kilangkhia dinga, ama vangliatna namkim tawh a maanlo limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite piangsak in,
53002010	siatna a thuak ding mite in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun thuman thutak deihna neilo uh ahih manin thumanlo khemna namkim a thuak ding uh hi.
53002011	Tua ahih manin amaute in zuauthu a up theih nadingun Pasian in amaute tungah khemna lianpi a tungsak ding hi.
53002012	Tua in thuman thutak um nuamlo a, thumanlohna ah nuam a sa, tua mite khempeuh tungah Pasian in thu a khen theih nading ahi hi.
53002013	Ahi zongin Topa hong it sanggamte aw, Kha in a hong siansuahna le thuman thutak na upna uh tungtawn in hotkhiatna a ngah dingin Pasian in a kipatcil a kipan note hong teel ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh tawntung ding uh a phamawh ahi hi.
53002014	Note in i Topa Zeisu Khazih minthanna na ngah theih nadingun kong hilh uh lungdamna thu tungtawn in amah in note a hong samzo hi.
53002015	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, kiptak in ding unla kam tawh ahi a, laikhak tawh ahi zongin kong piak uh thuhilhnate na lenkip un.
53002016	Tu in i Topa Zeisu Khazih mahmah le eite hong it a, a hehpihna thupha tawh a tawntung hehnepna le lametna pha hong pia i Pa Pasian in,
53002017	na lungsim uh hong hehnem henla kampau le gamtatpha namkim ah hong kipsak tahen.
53003001	Sanggamte aw, a tawpna a kong gennop in ah, note laka hong tun mah bangin Topa thu kizel mengmeng in a kipahtawi theih nading kote aa dingin thu hong ngetsak un.
53003002	Mihoihlote le migilote khut sung panin hong kihotkhiat theih nadingin zong thu na ngen un. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh thu‑um mi ahi khin kei uh hi.
53003003	Ahi zongin Topa in citak ahih manin gilopa vangliatna pan hong kemin hong kipsak ding hi.
53003004	Kong thupiakte uh tu‑a na zuih mah bangun a zuisuak dingin i Topa sungah kong muang uh hi.
53003005	Tu in, Pasian na it nading uh le Khazih banga na thuakzawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim sungah lam hong lak tahen.
53003006	Sanggamte aw, kote kiang pana na ngah uh thuhilhna a zui nuamlo a thadah sanggamte tawh na kithuah kei un, ci in i Topa Zeisu Khazih minin thu kong pia uh hi.
53003007	Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga ka omlai un thadah loin note etteh theih dingin ka om lamtak uh na thei uh hi.
53003008	Kuama an a mawkna in ka ne kei uh a, note khatpeuh aa dingin vangik ka suah khakloh nadingun sun le zanin hanciam in na ka sem uh hi.
53003009	Note tung pan huhna ngah theih nading thu ka neih loh man uh hilo in note zuih ding limpha kong lahna uh hi zaw hi.
53003010	Note kianga ka omlai nangawn un nasem nuamlo mi in an zong ne kei hen ci in thu kong pia zo uh hi.
53003011	Nasep thadah in sepmel neilo a, midangte vaiteng tawh a kitaklah mi pawlkhat note lakah om hi cih thu ka za uh hi.
53003012	Tu in tua bang mite in na sem tangtang in amau sepsa mah a nek nadingun i Topa Zeisu Khazih minin hanthawn in thu kong pia uh hi.
53003013	Sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh a pha bawl ding cimtak kei un.
53003014	Hih laikhak sunga kong thupiakte uh a manglo mi a om leh ciamteh unla a maizum theih nadingin na kithuahpih kei un.
53003015	Ahi zongin gal bangin na ngaihsun kei unla, sanggam bangin thu na hilh un.
53003016	Tu in nopna hong pia Topa in nopna namkim hong pia tawntung tahen. Topa in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen.
53003017	Keimah Paul in hih a nunung hopihna keima khut mahmah tawh kong gelh ahi hi. Ka laikhak khempeuh sungah hih bangin keima khut lam tawh gelhin ciaptehna ka nei hi.
53003018	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh tawh hong om tahen. Amen.
54001001	Eite hong Honpa Pasian le i lamet Topa Zeisu Khazih hong thupiakna hangin Zeisu Khazih sawltak ahi keimah Paul in,
54001002	upna lama ka tapa taktak Timothy tungah lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha, hehpihna, le lungnopnate nangma tungah om tahen.
54001003	Macedonia gam ka pailai a kong vaikhak mah bangin Ephesus khua ah na omlai inla, mi pawlkhatte in upna maanlo thute hilh loin,
54001004	phuahtawm tangthute le a bei theilo khangthu sutnate a buaipih nawnloh nading uh na hilh in. Tua thute in upna thu ah Pasian deihna banga kilamkipna piangsak loin kinialna piangsak zaw hi.
54001005	Tu in hih banga thu kong piakna in lungsim siangtho le lungsim tawnga kisuanna a omlo upna taktak panin a hong piang itna na neih theih nading ahi hi.
54001006	Mi pawlkhatte hih thu panin lampial uh a, thu ginalo teng genin a om uh hi.
54001007	A kampaute uh le hangtak a a gen uh thute bang hiam cih nangawn a theilopi mahin thukham hilh siate a suak nuam uh hi.
54001008	Ahi zongin thukham pen ahi ding bangin kizang leh a hoih hi ci in i thei hi.
54001009	Thukham in midikte aa dingin a kibawl ahi kei hi. Ahih hangin thukham a palsatte le a lehdote, Pasian a thusimlote le mawhneite, a siangtholote le a kihhuaite, a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a thatte le tual thatte,
54001010	numei pasal mawhna a bawlte le pasal le pasal a mawhte, mihing gu‑a a zuakte, zuaugente le a maanlopi a kiciamte a kipan thu upna maan tawh kilehbulh a a gamta mite aa dingin a kibawl ahi hi.
54001011	Tua upna maanin kei tunga hong ki‑ap a phattak Pasian neihsa a thupi mahmah lungdamna thu tawh kituak ahi hi.
54001012	Hih nasep a sem dingin muanhuai sa in hong seh a, sep zawh nading tha hong guan i Topa Khazih Zeisu tungah ka lungdam hi.
54001013	Nidang in Zeisu a kosiapa, pawlpi a bawlsiapa le a gamhtatpa ka hi ngei a, ahi zongin uplohna le theihlohna tawh ka hih ahih manin, Pasian hehpihna thupha ka ngah veve hi.
54001014	I Topa hehpihna thupha kei tungah a dimlet in hong kisung a, Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna le itna zong hong neisak hi.
54001015	Khazih Zeisu in mawhneite honkhia dingin leitung ah hong pai hi cih thu a muanhuai le a sanhuai thu ahi hi. Tua mawhnei mite lakah keimah in a mawh penpa ka hi hi.
54001016	Tua hi a, hih thu hangin Zeisu Khazih in amah uma nuntak tawntungna a nei ding mite etteh ka suah theih nadingin keimah hong hehpih a, a masa pen in kei tungah lungduaina namkim a hong lakzo hi.
54001017	Tu in tawntung Kumpipa, a si theilo, a kimu theilo, amah bek a pil Pasian in pahtawina le minthanna ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
54001018	Ka tapa Timothy aw, khatvei lai in nang tawh kisai genkholhna a kigente tawh kizui in a pha galdona na do theih nading le,
54001019	upna lenkip in lungsim tawng kisuanna om lo a na om theih nadingin hih thute hilhin kong pia hi. Mi pawlkhatte in tua thute nial uh ahih manin a upna uh tembaw kisia tawh a kibangsak uh hi.
54001020	Tua mite lakah Hymenaeus le Alexander‑te a kihel uh hi. Pasian kosiatna thu a hoihlohna a theih nadingun amaute Satan khut ah ka piakhia hi.
54002001	Tua ahih manin a masa pen a kong hanthot nop thu in deihngetna, thungetna, thumsakna le lungdamkohnate mi khempeuh aa dingin,
54002002	Pasian mi hihna le cihtakna tawh nungta in nuamtak le lungmuangtak a i om theih nadingin kumpite le thuneite khempeuh aa dingin zong thu na ngetsak in.
54002003	Tua bang hihna pen thu hoih hi a, eite hong Honpa Pasian santheih thu ahi hi.
54002004	Tua Pasian in mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin thuman thutak a theih ding uh a deih hi.
54002005	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite kikal ah Palai khat bek a om hi. Tua pa in mihing ahi Khazih Zeisu ahi hi.
54002006	Tua Khazih Zeisu in mi khempeuh tat nadingin amahmah a kipia zo hi. Hih in a hun a cin cianga hong kipia teci panna ahi hi.
54002007	Tua teci panna thu a tangko ding le sawltak khat dingin kei hong kiseh zo hi. Zuauthu gen loin Khazih sungah thuman kong gen in ah Gentile‑te tungah upna le thuman a hilh dingin a kisehpa ka hi hi.
54002008	Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuh a om pasalte in hehna le lunghianna om loin a khut siangthote uh lamto in thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
54002009	Tuamah bangin numeite zong nikteen puansilh a kilawm a kituak in kizem uh hen. A khelkhel sam bawldan tawh ahi a, kham le ngun, kep manphate le nikteen puansilh manpha pipite tawh ahi zongin kizem kei uh hen.
54002010	Pasian ka zahtak hi a ci numeite aa dingin a kilawm penpen kizepna in gamtat hoihna ahi hi.
54002011	Numeite in na khempeuh ah kiniamkhiatna tawh dai hithiat in thuman ding kisin uh hen.
54002012	Numeite in pasalte tungah thu hilh ding ahi a, thu a neih ding uh ahi zongin ka phal kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin pau loin om uh hen.
54002013	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in Adam bawl masa a, tua khit ciangin Eve a bawl hi.
54002014	Tua ciangin khemna a thuakpen Adam hilo in numei hi a, thukham a palsat hi.
54002015	Ahi zongin numei in upna, itna le a kilawm nuntakna tawh sianthona a neih leh nausuahna ah hutna a ngah ding hi.
54003001	Mi khatpeuh in pawlpi kem sia a lunggulh leh nasep hoih a deih ahi hi cih thu in thuman thutak ahi hi.
54003002	Pawlpi kem siapa in kawkban nading a omlo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, pumpi ki‑uk zo mi, lungsim ciimna a nei mi, a zahtakhuai mi, zindo a siam mi, thu a hilh thei mi hi ding hi.
54003003	Zu a dawnlo mi, lungtomlo mi, nunnem mi, kitot a hatlo mi, sum iplahlo mi, hazatna lungsim a neilo mi hi ding hi.
54003004	A tate in zahtakna le kiniamkhiatna tawh a thu a man, a innkuan sung hoihtak in a uk zo mi hi ding hi.
54003005	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin a innkuan sung a ukzia ding a theih kei leh bangci bangin Pasian pawlpi kem thei ding ahi hiam?
54003006	Thu‑um thak mi zong hilo ding hi. Tua hi kei leh kiliansak in Dawimangpa bangin thukhenna a thuak kha ding hi.
54003007	Tua thamlo in a kigensiat loh nading le Dawimangpa thangah a awk loh nadingin a pualam mite in a thupisim mi hi ding hi.
54003008	Tuamah bangin pawlpi upa dingte zong a zahtakhuai mi, thu a lehgen kawikawilo mi, lenggah zu a khamlo mi, sum a iplahlo mi,
54003009	upna thugilte lungsim siangthotak in a lenkip mi hi ding uh hi.
54003010	Ahih hangin pawlpi upa dingte kisinsak masa inla, mawhsak nading a om kei leh pawlpi upa sem pan uh hen.
54003011	Tuamah bangin a zite uh zong zahtakna a ngah mi, mi a gensialo mi, a lungsim a uk zo mi, na khempeuh ah a muanhuai mi hi ding uh hi.
54003012	Pawlpi upate in zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate le a innkuan sung hoihtak in a ukzo mi hi ding hi.
54003013	Banghang hiam cihleh pawlpi nasep hoihtak in a sem upate in minphatna le Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna ah hansanna a ngah uh hi.
54003014	Nang kiangah a sawtlo in kong pai ding ka lamen a, ahi zongin hih thute kong gelh veve hi.
54003015	Ahi zongin kong zekai khak zenzen leh Pasian inn sunga na gamtatzia ding teng na theih dingin lai kong khak hi. Tua Pasian inn in thuman thutak khuampi le bulpi ahi, a nungta Pasian pawlpi ahi hi.
54003016	Nial nading a omlo Pasian mi hihna thuthuk lianpi in, Pasian mahmah pumpi tawh hong kilang a, Kha in amah diktangsak in, Vantungmite in amah mu a, Gentile‑te lakah ama thu kihilh in, Leitung mite in ama thu uma, Thupitak in amah kilato hi, cih thu ahi hi.
54004001	Tu in Kha in teltak a hong gen in ah hun nunung lam ciangin mi pawlkhatte in thu‑upna pan pialkhia ding uha zuau thei khate khemna le dawite thuhilhna a zui ding uh a,
54004002	a lungsim uh siksa a bik tawh a kibang kineihkhemna tawh zuauthu gen in,
54004003	kipi kiteen ding kham uh a, an pawlkhatte zong nek loh dingin thu a pia uh hi. Tua ante pen thu‑umte le thuman a thei mite in lungdam ko in a nek dingun Pasian in a bawl ahi hi.
54004004	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian piansak na khempeuh a hoih vive hi a, lungdamkohna tawh kisang peuh leh nial ding khat beek a om kei hi.
54004005	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kammal le thungetna in tuate a siangsak hi.
54004006	Hih thute sanggamte tungah na hilh leh pilvangtak in na zuihsa upna le thuhilhna maan tawh a kipantah Zeisu Khazih nasem hoih khat na suak ding hi.
54004007	Ahih hangin Pasian thu tawh kituaklo, pitekte gen theih phuahtawm tangthute nial inla, biakna mi na hih theih nadingin kisin in.
54004008	Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi kisek a kisinna ah phattuamna tawmkha a om hi. Ahi zongin biakna mi hihna in na khempeuh aa dingin phattuamna piangsak a, tua in tu laitak nuntakna le hong tung ding nuntakna aa dingin a kipsak hi.
54004009	Hih in thuman thutak le a sanhuai thu ahi hi.
54004010	Banghang hiam cihleh a nungta Pasian sungah lametna nei i hih manin nakpi in na i sem a, zahkona zong tampi i thuak hi. Tua Pasian in mi khempeuh Honpa hi a, a diakdiak in a um mite aa ding ahi hi.
54004011	Hih thute a zuih nadingun sawl inla hilh in.
54004012	Khangno na hihna kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in. Kampauna, gamtatna, itna, lungsim ngaihsutna, upna le sianthonate ah thu‑um mite etteh dingin om in.
54004013	Kong pai mateng Lai Siangtho simna, hanthotna le thuhilhnate na hahkat in.
54004014	Pawlpi makaite khutngakna le kamsangte thugenna tawh nang hong kipia na sunga om letsong thudon loin om kei in.
54004015	Mi khempeuh in na khantohna a hong muh theih nadingin hih thute hoihtak in lungngai inla, limtak in zui in.
54004016	Na gamtatna le thu‑upna thupi ngaihsut in. Tua bangin hihsuak leteh nang bekthamlo in na thugen a za mite zong na honkhia ding hi.
54005001	A khangham papite taii giapgiap kei inla, pa bangin ngaihsun in hanthawn zaw in. A khangno lai pasalte, sanggamte bangin ngaihsun in.
54005002	A khangham numeite nute bangin ngaihsun in. A khangno lai numeite lungsim siangtho tawh sanggamte bangin ngaihsun in.
54005003	Meigong taktakte na zahtak in.
54005004	Ahih hangin tu le ta a nei meigongte ahih leh a tu a tate in Pasian a zahtakna uh a innkuan sungah a lah theih nading sin masa in nu le pa, pi le pute itna thukkik uh hen. Tua in Pasian mai ah a hoih le a sanhuai thu ahi hi.
54005005	Meigong taktakte in amau kia bek omin Pasian muang uh a, thumna le thungetna sun le zanin a nei dente ahi uh hi.
54005006	A paktat meigongte ahih leh a nuntak uh hangin a si ahi uh hi.
54005007	Tua bang meigongte in kawkbanna a neih loh nadingin thuhilh in.
54005008	Mi khatpeuh in ama tanaute a diakdiak in ama innkuanpihte a vak nop kei leh amah in upna thu a nial hi a, thu‑umlote sangin a sia zaw lai hi.
54005009	Kum 60 a pha nailo le, pasal khat sanga a tam zaw a nei ngei meigongte meigong sazian sungah na khum kei in.
54005010	Gamtat hoih hi ci a, pahtakna a ngah mi, a tate hoihtak in a kem mi, zindo a siam mi, misiangthote khe a silsak mi, micimawhte a huh mi, gamtat hoih khempeuh ahih zawh zahin a hanciam mi ahih leh meigong sazian ah na khum in.
54005011	A khanglai meigongte sazian sungah khum kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute ci le sa lunggulhna in Khazih tunga a kipiakna uh a zawh ciangin pasal a neikik nuam uh hi.
54005012	Amaute in a kiciamna masa uh palsat uh ahih manin mawhsakna a thuak uh hi.
54005013	Tua thamlo in amaute thadah uh a, inn khat khit inn khatah a kawi vakvak uh hi. Tua bek zong hilo in mi gensiat hatin midangte thuteng ah kitaklah uh a, gen dingin a kilawmlo thute a gen kawikawi uh hi.
54005014	Tua ahih manin a khanglai meigongte in pasal neikik in tanu tapa nei in innsung makaih in galpa in a gensiat theih nadingin hunhoih bangmah pia kei le uh ka deih hi.
54005015	Banghang hiam cihleh a khanglai meigong pawlkhatte lampial in Satan nung a zui khin uh hi.
54005016	Pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin thu‑um mi khatin a inn ah meigong a neih leh, amau mahin kem uh henla, pawlpi tungah vangik suan kei uh hen. Tua hi leh pawlpi in meigong taktakte a kem thei ding hi.
54005017	Hoihtak a pawlpi a makaih makaite, a diakdiak in thugen le thuhilh nasep hanciamtak in a semte in pahtawina a zah nih a ngah ding uh a kilawm hi.
54005018	Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho in, “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitak in a muuk hencipsak kei in. Na a sem mi in thaman a ngah ding kilawm hi,” a ci hi.
54005019	Pawlpi makai khat a kimawhmat ciangin teci nih bang thum bang a om kei leh sang kei in.
54005020	Midangte in zong a lau theih nadingun mawhna a bawl mite mipi mai ah na taii in.
54005021	Hih thute ah teeltuam, paihtuam, angvantuam nei loin na zuih nadingin Pasian mai, Topa Zeisu Khazih mai le a kiteel vantungmite mai ah thu kong pia hi.
54005022	Mi khatpeuh tungah na khut nga mengmeng kei in. Mi dangte mawhna tawh kisawh kha kei in. Siangthotak in na kikem in.
54005023	Na gilpi hang le na cinat theih zelzelna hangin tuisiang bek dawn loin lenggahtui zong tawmtawm na zang in.
54005024	Mi pawlkhatte a mawhna uh teltak in kilang pah a, thu a kikhenma nangawn in kithei hi. Ahih hangin mi pawlkhatte thu a kikhen khit ciang bekin a mawhna uh kilangpan hi.
54005025	Tuamah bangin mi pawlkhatte a gamtat hoihna uh teltak in kilang pah a, teltak in a kilangkhia pahlo gamtat hoihte zong a kiselcip zo kei hi.
54006001	Sila suahna hakkol nuai‑a omte khempeuh in Pasian min le thuhilhnate a kigensiat loh nadingin a tote uh a kilawm a kituak in zahtak uh hen.
54006002	A tote uh thu‑um mi ahih leh sanggam khat hilel hang ci in zahtak bawl lo tuan kei uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute nasepna hanga phattuamna a ngah a tote un thu‑um mi le a ki‑itpihte uh ahih manin hanciam zawkan in na a sep ding uh ahi hi. Hih thute hilh inla hanthawn in.
54006003	Biakna paizia tawh a kituaklo thuhilhna le i Topa Zeisu Khazih thuhilhna maan taktak tawh a kituaklo thuhilhna mi khatpeuh in a hong hilh leh,
54006004	a kiphasak, bangmah theilo, thu kheldot le kam kinial ding bek ut mi ahi hi. Tua bang thute in ki‑eenna, kitot kiselna, kigensiatna, kimuanmawhna le,
54006005	lungsimsia pana hong piang kimanna neilo kampau, thuman thutak thei theilo in Pasian biakna pen hauh theih nading lampi in a ngaihsunte ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite kiang panin na kihemkhia in.
54006006	Tu in, lungkimtak a Pasian mi hihna in hauhna lianpi ahi hi.
54006007	Banghang hiam cihleh leitung ah bangmah keng loin i suak a, bangmah keng loin i paikhia ding hi cih i theitel hi.
54006008	Tua ahih manin annek ding, puansilh ding i neih zahzah tawh lungkim ni.
54006009	Ahih hangin a hau nuam mite in ze‑etna thang sungah awk uh a, a haihuai le a lauhuai lunggulhna tampite sungah a awk uh hi. Tuate in siatna le manthanna sungah amaute a tumsuksak hi.
54006010	Banghang hiam cihleh sum deihluatna in siatna nam khempeuhte bulpi khat ahi hi. Sum deihluatna hangin mi pawlkhatte upna panin lampial uh a, lunggimna tampi a kisuan uh ahi hi.
54006011	Ahih hangin Pasian mipa aw, nang na hih leh tuate taisan in. Diktatna, Pasian deihna banga nuntakna, upna, itna, thuakzawhna le lungnemnate na delh in.
54006012	Upna thu tawh kipawl a pha galdona na do in. Nang zong teci tampite mai ah hoihtak a na pulak khitsa ahi Pasian hong sapna tawh na ngah nuntak tawntungna na lenkip in.
54006013	Pontius Pilate mai ah hoihtak in teci a pang Khazih Zeisu le, na khempeuh nuntakna a pia Pasian mai ah thu kong piak inah,
54006014	i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong kilat mateng ninbanglo, kawkbanglo dingin hih kong thupiak na zui in.
54006015	Ama hun a tun ciangin amah hong kilang ding hi. Tua Pasian in thupha a ngah amah bek a lianbel Ukpa, kumpite Kumpipa le tote Topa ahi hi.
54006016	Amah bek a si theilo hi a, a kineh theilo khuavak sungah a teengpa ahi hi. Kuamah in a muhngeiloh, kuamah in a muhtheihloh, tua Topa tungah pahtawina le a tawntung vangliatna om tahen. Amen.
54006017	Tu laitak a mihaute tungah hih thute hilh in. Amaute kiphasak kei uh hen. A kiplo hauhna muang loin nuamtak a i zat ding, na khempeuh kicingtak in a hong pia, a nungta Pasian muang zaw uh hen.
54006018	Na sep hoih tampi a neih theih nadingun na hoih sem uh hen. Cingh uh henla, piakkhiat nopna lungsim nei in,
54006019	a hong tung ding hunah bulkip muanhuai ahi dingin amaute aa ding khol uh hen. Tua hi leh nuntak tawntungna a lenkipte ahi ding uh hi.
54006020	Timothy aw! Na kep dinga hong kipia thute hoihtak in kem in. A kihhuai, mawk paupaunate le, pilna takpi a kisa kha thu kinialnate pel in.
54006021	Mi pawlkhatte in tua bangte zui kha uh ahih manin upna panin a pial uh hi. Hehpihna thupha nang tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
55001001	Khazih Zeisu sunga om a hong kikamciam nuntakna tawh kizui in Pasian deihna tawh Zeisu Khazih sawltak khat a suak keimah Paul in,
55001002	kong it ka tapa Timothy lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Khazih Zeisu kiang pana hehpihna, hehpihna thupha le lungnopnate nang tungah om tahen.
55001003	Sun le zanin ka thungetna ah nang kong phawk den hi. Tua banga kong phawkna ah lungsim tawngah kisuanna om hetlo ka pu ka pate mah bangin a na ka sepsak Pasian tungah lungdam thu ka ko hi.
55001004	Na khitui luannate ka phawk a, ka lung a nop theih nadingin nang kong mu nuam mahmah hi.
55001005	Nang sungah upna maan a om lam ka thei hi. Tua upna na pi Lois le na nu Eunice‑te in nei masa a, nang zong tua bang upna mah na neih lam ka thei hi.
55001006	Tua ahih manin nang tunga ka khutngakna tawh na ngah Pasian hong piak letsong na satsuah nadingin kong phawksak hi.
55001007	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in launa lungsim hong pia hilo in hanna, itna, ki‑ukzawhna hong guan hi.
55001008	Tua ahih manin i Topa thu teci na pan ding maizum kei inla, ama hanga ka thongkiatna zong hong maizumpih kei in. Lungdamna thu hanga ka thuaknate Pasian thahatna tawh hong thuakpih zaw in.
55001009	Tua Pasian in eite hong honkhia a, a siangtho sapna tawh hong sam hi. Amah in eite gamtatna hang hilo in ama ngimna le a hong hehpihna thupha hangin hong sam ahi hi. Amah in leitung a pianma pekin tua hehpihna Khazih Zeisu sunga a hong piak khitsa ahi hi.
55001010	Ahi zongin tu in i Honpa Zeisu Khazih hong kilatna tawh tua thu a hong kitheisak zo hi. Tua Zeisu Khazih in sihna beisak a, lungdamna thu tungtawn in nuntakna le sih theihlohna thu khuavak bangin hong tangsak zo hi.
55001011	Tua lungdamna thu Gentile‑te tungah a tangkopa, sawltakpa le thuhilh siapa a suak dingin Pasian in kei hong sehzo hi.
55001012	Hih thu hangin hih gimnate ka thuak a, ahih hangin ka maizum kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka uppa ka thei a, amah ka piak khitsate, tua Ni dongin kem zo ding hi cih ka theitel hi.
55001013	Kei tung pana na zaksa a maan thuhilhnate Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna le itna tawh lenkip in.
55001014	Nang tunga hong kipiaksa na hoih, eite sunga a teeng Kha Siangtho tha tawh na kem in.
55001015	Asia gama om mi khempeuh in kei hong nusia khin uh hi cih na thei hi. Tuate lakah Phygellus le Hermogenes‑te zong a kihel uh hi.
55001016	Topa in Onesiphorus‑te innkuan thupha pia tahen. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in tam veipi tha hong guan a, mat le hen ka thuakna zong, a hong maizumpih kei hi.
55001017	Amah in Rome khuapi a hong tun ciangin kuhkaltak in kei hong zonga, hong mukhia hi.
55001018	Topa in tua Ni ciangin amah hehpihna pia tahen. Amah in Ephesus khua ah lam tuamtuam tawh kei hong huh mahmah hi cih na thei hi.
55002001	Tua ahih ciangin ka tapa aw, Khazih Zeisu sunga om hehpihna thupha hangin thahat in om in.
55002002	Teci tampite mai‑a ka thugen na zaksa thute, midangte zong a hilhsawn thei dingin mi muanhuaite tungah na pia in.
55002003	Zeisu Khazih galkap hoih bangin haksatnate na thuak keikai in.
55002004	Galkap a sem mi peuhmah in amah galkap a suaksakpa a lungdamsak nadingin ama nuntak nading vaite tawh a kikai‑awksak kei hi.
55002005	Tai kidemna ah a tai mite in zuih ding ngeinate zui in a tai kei uh leh pahtawina lukhu a ngah kei ding uh hi.
55002006	Hahkattak in lo a khopa in lo panin a piang a gahte a ngah masak ding kilawm hi.
55002007	Hih kong gen thute ngaihsun inla, Topa in a vekpi in hong theitelsak tahen.
55002008	Ka hilh lungdamna thu in misite lak panin a kithokiksak, David suan Zeisu Khazih thu hi a,
55002009	tua lungdamna thu hangin gimna ka thuak a, migilo khat bangin sikkhau kikhih zah dongin ka om hi. Ahi zongin Pasian thu ahih leh sikkhau a kikhih thei kei hi.
55002010	Tua ahih manin Pasian teelsa mite in hotkhiatna ahi Khazih Zeisu sunga om, tawntung minthanna a ngah theih nadingun gimna namkim ka thuak hi.
55002011	Hih thu in thuman thutak ahi hi. Amah tawh i sihkhop leh, Amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi.
55002012	Gimna i thuak leh, Amah tawh i mangkhawm ding hi. Amah i nial leh, Amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi.
55002013	Eite in i cihtak loh hangin, Amah citak veve hi. Amah le amah kinial theilo hi.
55002014	Kam kinialna in phattuamna piangsak lo a, a za mite siasak zaw ahih manin kam a kinial loh nadingun Topa mai ah thupia inla phawksakkik in.
55002015	Maizum nading a omlo thuman thutak a khentel siam Pasian in a san theih nasempa na suah theih nadingin hanciam in.
55002016	A kihhuai le kimanna neilo thute pel in. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang thute in biaknamisak lo semsem hi.
55002017	Amau thugente in cancer bangin kizel ding hi. Hymenaeus le Philetus‑te zong tua bang mite lakah a kihel uh hi.
55002018	Amaute thuman thutak pan pialkhia uh a, thawhkikna pen a beisa thu hi ci uh ahih manin mi pawlkhatte upna a siasak uh hi.
55002019	Ahi zongin Pasian khuambulpi in kiptak in dinga, a tungah hih bangin a kiciamteh hi. “Topa in ama mite a thei hi,” cihleh “Khazih min a lo mi peuhmah siatna panin kiheikhia tahen,” cih thu ahi hi.
55002020	Ahih hangin inn lianpi khat sunga vanzat ahi um le bel‑te, kham le ngun bek tawh kibawl hi khin lo hi. Sing le lei tawh kibawl um le bel zong a om hi. Pawlkhatte thupi a, pawlkhatte thupilo hi.
55002021	Tua ahih manin mi khatin a thupilo nate panin a kisiansuah leh a kizatna a thupi, a kisianthosak le a Neipa in a zat theih ding na hoih khat peuhpeuh a sem dinga a kizang thei vanzat a suak ding hi.
55002022	Khangno lunggulhna hoihlote taisan in. Lungsim siangthotak a Topa min a lote tawh diktatna, upna, itna le kilemnate delh in.
55002023	A haihuai le theitel lopi a kiselnate in kitotna piangsak hi cih thei na hih manin na pel in.
55002024	Topa nasempa in kuamah tawh kitawng lo dinga, mi khempeuh tungah thudik in thu zong hilh thei dinga, thuakzawhhatna zong nei in,
55002025	amah a langpan mite lungnemtak in thu a hilh ding hi. Pasian in amaute lungsim kikhelsak leh amaute in thuman thutak thei ding uh a,
55002026	tua ciangin amaute in hong phawkin Dawimangpa thang panin a hong suakta ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in ama deih bangbang in a sawl theih dingin a mat mite ahi uh hi.
55003001	Ahih hangin hih thu ciamteh in. Ni nunung ni ciangin hun haksa hong tung ding hi.
55003002	Banghang hiam cihleh mite in amau le amau bek a ki‑it, sum a duh, a kisial, a kiphasak, mi kosiat hat, nu le pate thu a manglo, a lungdam theilo, a siangtholo,
55003003	itna a neilo, mi dangte mawhna a maisak nuamlo, mi a gensia, amau pumpi ki‑uklo, a gamhtat, thuhoih a deihlo,
55003004	thuciamna a palsat, lungtang a khauh, a kihisak, Pasian it ding sangin noptat ding ut zaw ding uh a,
55003005	Pasian mi bangin kibawl in, ahi zongin a vangliatna nial ding uh hi. Tua bang mite na pel in!
55003006	Tua mite in midangte inn ah va lut khiankhian uh a, lunggulhna tuamtuam zui in, mawhna tawh a kidim numei ginalote a thuzawh ding uh hi.
55003007	Tua bang mite pen thu a kihilhhilh hangin thuman a thei zo ngeilote ahi uh hi.
55003008	Tu in Jannes le Jambres‑te in Moses a langpan bangun tua mite in zong thuman thutak a langpan uh hi. Amaute lungsim in kisia khin a, upna thu ah a kipampaihte ahi uh hi.
55003009	Tua hi a, amaute a ma uh a pai kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Jannes le Jambres‑te mah bangin amaute haina zong kilangkhia ding hi.
55003010	Nangmah in ka thuhilhna, ka nuntakzia, ka tup ka ngimna, ka lungduaina, ka neih itna le ka thuakzawhnate na thei khinzo hi.
55003011	Antioch khua, Iconium khua le Lystra khuate a ka thuak bawlsiatna le gimnate na thei hi. Ahih hangin tuate khempeuh panin Topa in kei hong honkhia hi.
55003012	Hi mah hi. Khazih Zeisu sungah Pasian deihna banga a nungta nuam mi khempeuh in bawlsiatna a thuak ding uh hi.
55003013	Ahih hangin migilote le mi kineihtawmte siahuai semsem ding uh a, midangte a khem bangun amaute in zong khemna a thuak ding uh hi.
55003014	Nangmah in na sin khitsa, na theihtel khitsa thute zuisuak in. Tua thute kua tung pana na sin ahi hiam cih zong na thei hi.
55003015	Khazih Zeisu upna tungtawn a hotkhiatna ngah nadingin pilna a hong piathei Lai Siangtho na neutung a kipan na theihsa ahi hi.
55003016	Lai Siangtho buppi in Pasian humuapna tawh hong kipia hi a, thuhilh nading, mawhna kiphawksak nading, kibawlphat nading, le dikna thu ah kipattah nadingin a manpha hi.
55003017	Tua in Pasian mipa picing a na hoih khempeuh tawh a kigingkhol mi ahih theih nading ahi hi.
55004001	Tua ahih ciangin Topa Zeisu Khazih in a nungta laite le a sisate thukhen ding pa hi a, ama hong kilat ding le ama kumpigam thu ngaihsun kawmin Pasian mai le ama mai ah thu kong piak inah,
55004002	Pasian thu hilh in! Hun a hoih a, a hoih kei zongin a gen dingin kigingkhol den in. Lungduaitak le kiciantak in mawhna phawksak in taii bawl inla tha pia in.
55004003	Banghang hiam cihleh mite in thuhilhna maan a cimtak hun uh hong tung ding hi. A bil uh thakin amaute zaknop bangbang a gen dingin thuhilhsiate a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
55004004	Amaute in thuman thutak ngai nuam nawnlo ding uh a, phuahtawm tangthu peuh a ngai nuam zaw ding uh hi.
55004005	Nangmah in na khempeuh ah pilvang inla, haksatna hong tun ciangin thuak keikai in. Lungdamna thuhilh nasep sem inla, na nasep tangtun in.
55004006	Kei ka hih leh tuibuah biakpiakna a a kibua bangin hong kibuakhia ta a, ka paikhiat ding hun a hong nai zo hi.
55004007	Galdona pha ka do zo hi. Tai kidemna ah a mong dongin ka taizo hi. Upna ka lencip zo hi.
55004008	Tua hi a, tua Ni ciangin a dik Thukhenpa ahi Topa in kei hong piak ding dikna lukhu kei aa dingin hong koihkholhsak zo hi. Kei bek hilo in ama hong kilat ding a lunggulh mi khempeuh zong a pia ding hi.
55004009	A manlang theithei in nong pai theih nading hong hanciam in.
55004010	Banghang hiam cihleh Demas in hih leitung nate iplah ahih manin, kei hong nusia a, Thessalonica khua ah a paizo hi. Crescens zong Galatia gamah pai a, Titus zong Dalmatia gamah a paizo hi.
55004011	Luke bek kei kiangah a omlai hi. Nong pai ciangin Mark hong zawn inla hong tonpih in. Amah in ka nasepna ah phatuam mahmah hi.
55004012	Tychicus, Ephesus khua ah ka paisak hi.
55004013	Nong pai ciangin Troas khua ah Carpus kianga ka nusiat ka puantualpi le ka laibute, a diakdiak in savun laizialte hong pua in.
55004014	Sumsan sekpa Alexander in nakpi in kei hong bawlsia hi. Topa in ama gamtatna bangin thukkik tahen.
55004015	Amah in i thugente nasiatak in hong langpan ahih manin nang zong hoihtak in kikem in.
55004016	Thukhen zumah ka kihutna thu ka gen masak lai in kuamah in hong dinpih loin mi khempeuh in hong taisan khin uh hi. Amaute kimawhsak kei tahen.
55004017	Ahih hangin keima tung pan lungdamna thu a kicing in kihilh a, Gentile‑te in a zak theih nadingun Topa in kei hong dinpih in hong thakhauhsak hi. Amah in humpi nelkai kam sung panin kei hong honkhia hi.
55004018	Topa in thusia tawh hong kidona khempeuh panin hong honkhia lai dinga, ama vantung kumpigam sung a hong tunpih ding hi. Tua Topa tungah minthanna om tawntung tahen. Amen.
55004019	Prisca le Aquila, le Onesiphorus innkuanpihte na hopihsak in.
55004020	Erastus pen Corinth khua ah a taamlai hi. Ahih hangin Trophimus pen a cina ahih manin Miletus khua ah ka nusia hi.
55004021	Phalbi ma in nong tun theih nadingin hong hanciam in. Eubulus in nang hong hopih hi. Pudens, Linus, Claudia le sanggamte khempeuh in zong nang hong hopih uh hi.
55004022	Topa Zeisu Khazih in na kha hong ompih tahen. Pasian hehpihna thupha in nang hong ompih tahen. Amen.
56001001	Zeisu Khazih nungzui Pasian sila ahi keimah Paul in Pasian mi hihna tawh kituak in thuman thutak theihna le Pasian teelte upna tawh kizui in,
56001002	a zuau theilo Pasian in hun kipatma peka kipan a hong kamciamsa nuntak tawntungna lametna thu,
56001003	Pasian in a hun a tun ciangin keima thuhilhna tungtawn in ama kamciamsa tua thu hong kilangsak hi. Eite hong Honpa Pasian thupiakna tawh kizui in tua thuhilh nasepna keima tungah hong kipia zo hi.
56001004	I neihkhop a kibang upna sungah ka tapa taktak ahi Titus aw, Pa Pasian le eite hong Honpa Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pan hehpihna thupha, hehpihna le lungnopnate nangma tungah hong om tahen.
56001005	Thu kong piaksa mah bangin nasep ding a kisam laiteng a sem ding le khua khempeuh ah pawlpi makai dingte a seh dingin Crete tuikulh ah kong nusia hi.
56001006	Pawlpi upa dinga na seh mite in paubanna a omlo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate in thumanglo ahih keileh phengtat uh hi ci in mawhsakna a ngahlo thu‑um mi hi ding uh hi.
56001007	Banghang hiam cihleh pawlpi kem siapa in Pasian neihsa kempa ahih manin paubanna a neih loh ding kisam hi. Ama thu bek thu salo in, a heh baihlo, zu a dawnlo, a ngonghtatlo, sum iplahlo mi,
56001008	zindo a hahkat mi, thuhoih a deih mi, lungsim navak mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, ama pumpi a ki‑uk zo mi,
56001009	thuhilhna maantak tawh mite thapia in thu a nial mite zong a mawhna uh a kiphawksak theih nadingin a sinsa thuman a lenkip mi hi ding hi.
56001010	Banghang hiam cihleh a thumanglo, thu ginalo peuh a kawi gengen leh mi a khemthei tampitak om a, a diakdiak in vunat mite lakah a tampen hi.
56001011	Amaute in thumanlo tawh a ngah theih nadingun gen dinga kilawmlo thute gen uh a, midangte innkuan sung susia thei uh ahih manin tua bang mite thu gensak peuhmah kei in.
56001012	Amaute lak mahmah a kamsang khatin zong, “Crete mite zuautheite hi a, gamsa gilote tawh kibang in thadah le anhai a thuahte ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
56001013	Hih teci panna a maan ahi hi. Tua ahih manin, amaute in upna thu ah a kip theih nadingun khauhtak in taii inla,
56001014	Judah mite phuahtawm tangthute le thuman thutak a zuilo mite thupiakte a man loh nadingun zong hilh in.
56001015	A siangtho mite aa dingin na khempeuh a siangtho hi. Ahih hangin a siangtholo mite le a umlo mite aa dingin a siangtho na khat beek a om kei hi. A ngaihsutna le a lungsimte nangawn uh zong a nin hi.
56001016	Pasian ka thei hi a cih uh hangin a gamtatna uh tawh amah a nial uh hi. Mi kihhuai, thumanglo, na hoih khatpeuh sem dinga kizang theilo mite ahi uh hi.
56002001	Ahi zongin nang in upna thuman tawh a kituak hih thute hilh in.
56002002	Papi khanghamsate, a navak, a zahtakhuai, pumpi ki‑ukzo, upna maan a nei, itna le thuakzawhna a neite ahih nading,
56002003	tuamah bangin nupi khanghamte zong a gamtat hoih, a zahtakhuai, mi a gensialo, zu a hailo, thuhoih thupha a hilhte a suah nading,
56002004	amaute in a khanglai nupite tungah a pasal le a tate uh a itte,
56002005	a nuntakna a siangthote, a khuavallo mite, inn nupi hoihte, a migite, a pasalte uh thu a mangte a suah nading, Pasian thu a kigensiat loh nading uh ahi hi.
56002006	Tua mah bangin a khanglai pasalte zong a pilvang nadingin hanthawn inla,
56002007	nang na hih leh nasep hoih a kici khempeuh ah mite etteh theih dingin om in. Na thuhilhna ah ginatna zahtakbang in om inla, kam thanghuai zang loin kampau kilawm zang in.
56002008	Tua hi leh kuamah in a hong mawhsak nading a om kei ding hi. Nang hong langpang mite in zong hong gensiat nading uh mu loin a maizum ding uh hi.
56002009	Silate in a tote uh thu mangin na khempeuh ah a tote lungdamsak in a pau uh a dawnkik loh nadingun hilh in.
56002010	Guksim laksim nei loin a muanhuaina uh na khempeuh ah lak uh hen. Tua bangin om le uh amaute in a hong Honpa Pasian thu na khempeuh ah a kilangsak thei ding uh hi.
56002011	Banghang hiam cihleh hotkhiatna hong puak Pasian hehpihna thupha, mi khempeuh tungah hong kilang zo a,
56002012	Pasian deihna tawh kituaklo gamtatna le leitung lunggulhnate nialin a kilawm a kituak, a dik a maan le Pasian mi banga tu khang huna i nuntak nadingin hong hilh hi.
56002013	A lian eite Pasian le Honpa Zeisu Khazih minthanna tawh a hong kilat ding lametna thupha ngakin i om hi.
56002014	Amah in siatna khempeuh pan hong tankhia in ama neihtuam mite ding, ama aa dingin hong siangthosak a, na hoih sep ding i hanciam theih nadingin eite tangin amahmah hong kipia zo hi.
56002015	Hih thute genin hanthawn inla na thuneihna khempeuh tawh amaute taii in. Kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in.
56003001	Ukna neite le thuneite thu a zui ding, thu a mang ding, na hoih khat peuhpeuh a sem dingin kigingsa in om ding,
56003002	kuamah gensialo, midang tawh kihothei, thukhual le mi khempeuh tungah a kiniamkhiat dingin amaute phawksak in.
56003003	Banghang hiam cihleh eite mahmah zong nidanglai in bangmah theilo, thumanglo, khemna a thuak, a hoihlo lunggulhna le noptatna tuamtuamte a bawl, midangte a eeng le a siasak nuam, muhdah thuak le a mudahte i hi ngei hi.
56003004	Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa Pasian in a migitna le a hong itna mihingte tungah hong kilangsak hi.
56003005	Eite in a hoih a pha i bawlman hilo in suahthakna hanga silsiangna le Kha Siangtho hanga thaksuahsakna tungtawn in ama hehpihna tawh kizui in a hong honkhia ahi hi.
56003006	Amah in eite hong Honpa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in tua Kha Siangtho a dimtak in eite tungah hong sungzo hi.
56003007	Tua in ama hehpihna thupha tawh dik hong tansak khit ciangin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a luahte i suah nading ahi hi.
56003008	Hih in a muanhuai thugenna ahi hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian a um khinsa mite in na hoih a sep tawntung nading uh a phawk nadingun na gen tawntung ding ka deih hi. Hih thute in mikim aa dingin hoih a, phattuamna zong a piangsak hi.
56003009	Ahi zongin a haihuai thu kinialnate, khangthute, thukham tawh kisai kiselna le kitotnate na pel in. Tuate in phattuamna bangmah hong pia lo a, kimanna zong bangmah neilo hi.
56003010	Khatvei nihvei thu na hilh khit ciangin kikhenna a piangsak mi na hemkhia in.
56003011	Tua bang mite in lehtat in mawhna bawl teitei uh ahih manin amau le amau mawhna thukhenna a kithuaksak uh ahi hi cih na thei in.
56003012	Artemas ahi a, Tychicus ahi zongin kong paisak ciangin ka omna Nicopolis khua ah nong pai nadingin hong hanciam in. Banghang hiam cihleh tualai ah phalbi sungteng taam dingin ka khentat hi.
56003013	Sitnipa Zenas le Apollos‑te kisapna bangmah om loin a zinkhiat theih nadingun na huh in.
56003014	I mite zong gah nei loin om loin huhna a kisamte a huh zawh nadingun na hoih sep ding a tawntung in kisin uh hen.
56003015	Ka ompih mi khempeuh in nang hong hopih uh hi. Upna sunga hong it mite na hopihsak in. Pasian hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
57001001	Khazih Zeisu hanga thongkiapa keimah Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in kong it uh sanggam le naseppih Philemon a kipan,
57001002	kong it uh Apphia, Khazih galkap ka seppih uh Archippus le na inn a om pawlpi mite lai kong khak uh hi.
57001003	I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
57001004	Thu ka nget ciangin kong phawk tawntung a,
57001005	misiangthote khempeuh na itna le Topa Zeisu na upna ka zak ciangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
57001006	Khazih Zeisu sunga na neih hoihna khempeuh mite in thei in midangte tawh na nasepkhopna a khan semsem nadingin thu kong ngetsak hi.
57001007	Banghang hiam cileh sanggam aw, na itna in misiangthote lungsim thaksuahsak ahih manin lungdam mahmah in ka lung uh a kim hi.
57001008	Tua ahih manin Khazih sungah a kilawm nate na hih nadingin hangtak in thu kong piak theih hangin,
57001009	tu in Zeisu Khazih hanga thongkia putekpa keimah Paul in itna tawh kong thum zaw hi.
57001010	Ka thongkiat sunga ka tapa a hong suak Onesimus aa dingin kong thumsak hi.
57001011	Amah in a beisa hunin nang aa dingin kimanna a neih loh hangin tu in nang aa ding le kei aa dingin a kimang thei mi khat hong suakzo hi.
57001012	Amah ka hong ciahsakkik hi. Tua ahih manin keima pumpi bangin na ngaihsun inla amah na sang in.
57001013	Lungdamna thu hangin ka thongkiat sungteng nangma tanga kei hong kem dingin ka kiangah om leh ka ut hi.
57001014	Ahi zongin nang thukimna omlopi in bangmah ka hih nuam kei hi. A pha nong bawl dingte nang lungsim pana suak hilo in kong sawl zawh thu ahih khak ding ka ut kei hi.
57001015	Banghang hiam cihleh amah tawh tawlkhat sung na kikhenna uh in a tawntung in amah na neih theih nading hi zaw kha ding hi.
57001016	Amah sila bangin ngaihsun nawnlo in sila sangin a thupi zaw in na ngaihsun in. A diakdiak in amah in ka it mahmah sanggampa ahi hi. Ahih hangin ci le sa ah ahi a, Topa sungah ahi zongin nang tungah hong ithuai zaw lai ding hi.
57001017	Nasep khoppih khat a nong ngaihsut leh kei nong san ding bangin amah na sang in.
57001018	Ahi zongin, nang tungah hong khialh a leiba khatpeuh a hong neih leh kei kong loh dingin na ciamteh in.
57001019	Na nuntakna bup mahmah kei tungah nong kibatna thu nangawn gen vet loin, kong lohkik ding hi ci in keimah Paul in ka khut mahmah tawh lai kong gelh hi.
57001020	Hi mah hi sanggam aw, nang kiang pana lungdamna Topa sungah hong neisak inla Topa sungah ka lungsim hong thaksuak sakkik in.
57001021	Na thumanna kong muanna tawh kei hong gen sanga a hoih zaw nangawn in hih ni teh ci in lai hong khak ka hi hi.
57001022	Nong thungetsaknate uh hangin note kiangah hong paithei dingin kilamen ka hih manin ka giah nading inndei khat tu kikal sungin na vaihawmsak in.
57001023	Khazih Zeisu hanga ka thongkiatpih Epaphras in hong hopih hi.
57001024	Tuamah bangin kei tawh na a semkhawm Mark, Aristarchus, Demas le Luke‑te in zong a hong hopih uh hi.
57001025	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in nang hong ompih tahen. Amen.
58001001	Pasian in tanglai in kamsangte zangin hun tuamtuam ah lam tuamtuam tawh i pu i pate tungah thu a genzo hi.
58001002	Ahih hangin hih a nunung pen hunah a Tapa tungtawn in hong hopih hi. Tua a Tapa pen na khempeuh a luah dingin a sehsa hi a, van le lei zong a Tapa tungtawn mahin a bawl ahi hi.
58001003	Tapa in Pasian vangliatna a tankhiatna le Pasian lim le mel taktak kilah khiatna ahi hi. Amah in a vanglian ama kammal tawh na khempeuh a lenkip hi. I mawhnate amahmah in a sawpsiang khit ciangin a sangpen muna om Vanglianpenpa taklam ah a tu hi.
58001004	Vantungmite min sanga min thupi zaw a luah zah khat in amaute sangin a lianzaw thampa zong ahi pah hi.
58001005	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in vantungmite kua pen kiangah, “Nangmah in ka Tapa na hi hi, Tuni in nang kong piangsak zo hi,” ci ngei ahi hiam? Tua banah, “Keimah in ama Pa ka hi dinga, Amah in ka Tapa ahi ding hi,” ci ngei ahi hiam?
58001006	Tua banah, a ta masa pen leitung ah hong paisak ciangin, “Pasian vantungmi khempeuh in amah bia uh hen,” a ci hi.
58001007	Vantungmite tawh kisai in amah in, “Ama vantungmite kha bangin bawl a, Ama nasemte meikuang bangin a bawl hi,” a ci hi.
58001008	Ahih hangin a Tapa tungah, “Pasian aw, na kumpi tokhom kip tawntung a, Na ukna ciangkhut in dikna ciangkhut ahi hi.
58001009	Thumanna na deih a, siatna na mudah hi. Tua ahih manin, Pasian, nangma Pasian in, Na kithuahpihte sangin a tam zaw, Lungnopna sathau nang a hong nilhzo hi,” a ci hi.
58001010	Tua banah, amah in a Tapa tungah, “Topa aw, a kipatcil in leitung bulpi na phut a, Vantungte zong na khut tawh na bawlsa ahi hi.
58001011	Tuate kisiamang ding uh a, Nang na hih leh na om tawntung ding hi. Tuate khempeuh puan bangin a lui ding uh hi.
58001012	Nang in tuate khempeuh, Puan bangin zialin na laih ding hi. Nang na hih leh na kikhel ngei kei a, Na kumte zong bei hun a nei ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
58001013	Ahih hangin vantungmi kua pen kiangah, “Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci ngei ahi hiam?
58001014	Vantungmite in hotkhiatna a luah ding mite nasem dinga a kisawlkhia khate hilo ahi uh hiam?
58002001	Tua ahih manin i tolhmang khakloh nadingin i zaksa thute i thudon phat mahmah ding ahi hi.
58002002	Banghang hiam cihleh vantungmite tungtawn a a kigen thute kipsak a, tua thute mang loin a palsat mi peuhmah a kituak in daan thuaksak ahih leh,
58002003	a lian mahmah hotkhiatna thudon loin om lehang bangci bangin suakta thei ding i hi hiam? Tua hotkhiatna Topa in phuangkhia masa a, ama tung panin a za mite in eite tungah a hong kipsak uh ahi hi.
58002004	Pasian in zong limlamdangte, nalamdang lianpi pite, nalamdangte le ama deihna banga a hawmsak Kha Siangtho letsongte tawh teci a pang hi.
58002005	Pasian in kote gen, a hong pianglai ding leitung, vantungmite ukna nuai ah a koih kei hi.
58002006	Ahih hangin munkhat ah mi khatin hih bangin teci a pang khinzo hi. Amah in, “Na ngaihsuttham dingin mihing in bang hi peuhmah a, Na thudontham dingin mihing tapa in bang hi peuhmah ahi hiam?
58002007	Vantungmite sangin a niam zawdeuh in na bawl a, Minthanna le pahtawina na khusak hi. Na khut tawh na bawlsa nate a uk dingin na koiha,
58002008	Na khempeuh ama khenuai ah koihin na uksak hi,” a ci hi. Na khempeuh ama ukna nuai ah koih ahih manin ama ukna nuai‑a omlo na khat beek a om kei hi. Ahih hangin tu in na khempeuh ama khe nuai‑a a kikoih i mu nai kei hi.
58002009	Ahi zongin Pasian hehpihna thupha tawh mi khempeuh tangin sihna a thuak theih nadingin vantungmite sanga a niam zaw in hong kikoih Zeisu i mu hi. Amah in sihna a thuak manin tu in minthanna le pahtawina a kikhusak hi.
58002010	Na khempeuh ama tungtawn le ama aa dingin a piangsakpa Pasian muhna ah ta tampite in minthanna a ngah theih nadingun amaute aa dingin hotkhiatna a piangsakpa in gimthuakna tungtawn in a picin ding a kilawm hi.
58002011	Banghang hiam cihleh a Siangthosakpa le a sianthosak mite innkuan khat ahih manun Zeisu in amaute ka sanggamte a cih ding a maizumpih kei hi.
58002012	Tua ahih manin amah in, “Ka sanggamte tungah na min ka tangko dinga, A kikhawm mihonpi lakah nangmah phatna la ka sa ding hi,” a ci hi.
58002013	Amah in, “Amah ka muang ding hi,” a cih banah, “En un, Pasian hong piaksa tate tawh ka omkhawm hi,” a cikik hi.
58002014	Tate in si le sa a neih mah bangun amah in zong si le sa a nei hi. Tua in sihna a uk Dawimangpa tungah sihna mah tawh gualzo in,
58002015	a khantawn un sih ding kihtakna sila a suak mite a khahkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
58002016	Banghang hiam cihleh ama huh mite in vantungmite hilo in Abraham suante ahi hi.
58002017	Tua ahih manin na khempeuh ah a sanggamte tawh a kibat ding a kul hi. Tua in a hehpih thei Pasian nasepna ah a muanhuai Siampi Ukpa a suah theih nading le mite mawhna hanga thoihdamna a bawl theih nading ahi hi.
58002018	Banghang hiam cihleh amahmah in zong ze‑etna le gimna thuak ngei ahih manin ze‑etna a thuakte a huh thei hi.
58003001	Tua ahih manin van lam pana sapna a ngah a siangtho sanggamte aw, eite upna thu tawh kisai a Sawltak le Siampi Ukpa ahi Khazih Zeisu na lungngai un.
58003002	Pasian innkuan sung khempeuh ah Moses a muanhuai mah bangin Zeisu zong amah a sehpa tungah a muanhuai hi.
58003003	Banghang hiam cihleh inn sangin innlampa a kipahtawi zawk mah bangin amah in Moses sangin pahtawina a lianzaw a ngah dingin a kilawmpa ahi hi.
58003004	Inn khempeuh a lam mi omciat a, ahih hangin na khempeuh a bawlpa in Pasian ahi hi.
58003005	Moses in a nung cianga kigen ding thute ah teci a suah nadingin nasem khat ahihna tawh Pasian innkuan buppi tungah a muanhuai hi.
58003006	Ahih hangin Khazih in Tapa ahihna ah Pasian innkuan tungah a muanhuai hi. I lungmuanna le i kisialhpih lametna i letkipsuak le ama innkuanpihte i hi hi.
58003007	Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho in a gen inah, “Tuni in ama aw na zak uh leh,
58003008	Na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un. Pasian in gamlak ah amaute a ze‑et lai a, Amah a langpan bangun langpan kei un.
58003009	Tualai in na pu na pate un, Kei hong ze‑et in, hong sit uh a, Kum 40 sung tawntung ka nasepte a mu uh hi.
58003010	Tua ahih manin tua khang mite tungah ka heha, ‘Amaute a lungsim uh pial tawntung a, Ka lampite a theithei kei uh hi,’ ka ci hi.
58003011	‘Tua ahih manin ka tawlngakna sungah, Amaute a lut kei ding uh hi,’ ci in, Hehsa in ka kiciam hi,” a ci hi.
58003012	Sanggamte aw, a nungta Pasian nusia in a umlo lungsim gilo a nei mi khatpeuh na om khakloh nadingun kidawm un.
58003013	Mawhna in hong khemin a lungkhauh mi khatpeuh na om khakloh nadingun, “Tuni,” a kicih laiteng khat le khat tha kipia un.
58003014	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipatcil a i lungmuanna a tawp dongin i letkip leh Khazih tawh a kizomte i hi hi.
58003015	Hi bangin a kigen hi, “Tuni in ama aw na zak uh leh, Pasian na lehdo lai bangun, Na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un.”
58003016	Thu za khin napi in a lehdo lai veve kuate ahi uh hiam? Moses makaihna tawh Egypt gam panin a paikhia tua mite mah hilo ahi uh hiam?
58003017	Kuate tungah kum 40 sung tawntung Pasian heh ahi hiam? Mawhna a bawl manun gamlak ah pukin sihna a thuak tua mite mah hilo ahi uh hiam?
58003018	Ka tawlngakna sungah a lut kei ding uh hi ci a, Pasian a kiciamna zong thu a manglo tua mite tung mah hilo ahi hiam?
58003019	Tua ahih manin a up loh manun amaute a lut zo kei uh hi cih i thei hi.
58004001	Tua ahih manin Pasian tawlngakna sungah lut theih nading kamciamna omlai napi a lut zolo khatpeuh na om khakloh nadingun lauthawng in om ni.
58004002	Banghang hiam cihleh eite tungah lungdamna thu a hong kihilh mah bangin amaute tungah zong a kihilh hi. Ahih hangin a thu zak uh upna tawh thuah lo uh ahih manin amaute aa dingin phattuamna bangmah a piangsak kei hi.
58004003	Ahi zongin a um eite i hih leh tua tawlngakna sungah i lut hi. Pasian in leitung a piansak khit a kipan a nasep a zawh khitsa hi napi, “ ‘Ka tawlngakna sungah Amaute a lut kei ding uh hi,’ ci in Hehsa in ka kiciam hi,” a ci hi.
58004004	Amah in ni sagih ni tawh kisai in munkhat ah hih bangin a gen hi. “Pasian in a nasep khempeuh zo in ni sagih ni in a tawlnga hi,” a ci hi.
58004005	Tua hi napi tua mun mah ah, “Ka tawlngakna sungah Amaute a lut kei ding uh hi,” a cikik hi.
58004006	Tua ahih manin tua tawlngakna sungah a lut ding mi pawlkhat omlai hi, cih thu le lungdamna thu a kihilh masakna mite in a up loh manun lut kha lo uh hi, cih thu a kitel hi.
58004007	Tua ciangin, “Tuni in ama aw na zak uh leh, Na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un,” ci a, a gen zawh a sawtpi khit ciangin David tungtawn in, “Tuni,” ci in nidang khat a sehkik hi.
58004008	Banghang hiam cihleh, Joshua in amaute tawlngakna pia khin hi leh Pasian in tua nung ciangin nidang khat thu a genkik nawn kei ding hi.
58004009	Tua ahih manin Pasian mite aa dingin Sabbath tawlngakna khat a omlai hi cih a kilang hi.
58004010	Pasian in a nasep zo a, a tawlngak mah bangin ama tawlngakna sungah a lut mite zong a nasep uh zo in a tawlnga uh hi.
58004011	Tua ahih manin amaute bangin uplohna hanga a puk mi i om khak loh nadingin tua tawlngakna sungah i lut theih nading hanciam ni.
58004012	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian thu in nungta in vanglian a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin a hiamzaw hi. Lungsim le kha, guh le tang le guhngekte pailet in khentel a, lungsim ngaihsutna le tupna ngimnate zong a theitel hi.
58004013	A kipiangsak na khempeuh lakah Pasian muh loh dinga kisel thei na khat beek a om kei hi. Tua thamlo in eima thu ciat i puak nading pa muhna ah na khempeuh a liah om loin a kilang hi.
58004014	Vantung ah a kah khin a lian Siampi Ukpa ahi Pasian Tapa Zeisu nei i hih manin i pulaksa upna kiptak in len ni.
58004015	Banghang hiam cihleh i neih Siampi Ukpa in eite thanemnate hong thuakpih theilo ahi kei hi. Amah in eite mah bangin ze‑etna namkim thuak a, ahih hangin amah in mawhna a nei kei hi.
58004016	Tua ahih manin i kisap hunin a hong huh ding hehpihna thupha mu in hehpihna i ngah theih nadingin hehpihna tokhom hangtak in zuan ni.
58005001	Siampi Ukpa pen mite lak panin a kisehkhia ahi hi. Amah in Pasian tawh kisai thute ah mipite tangin a ding dingin a kisehpa hi a, Pasian tunga kipia nate le mawhmai nading gangawh biakpiaknate a pia ding pa ahi hi.
58005002	Amah zong a thanem thei mi ahih manin bangmah a theilo mite le lam a khial mite a lainat thei hi.
58005003	Tua ahih manin amah in mite aa hilo in ama aa dingin zong mawhmai nading gangawh biakpiakna a piak ding kul hi.
58005004	Kuamah in ama thu tawh hih dinmun thupi a ngahtawm theih hilo a, Pasian in Aaron a sap bangin a sap mite bekin a ngah theih ahi hi.
58005005	Tuamah bangin Khazih in zong Siampi Ukpa a suah theih nadingin amah le amah a kipia tawm ahi kei hi. Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in ka Tapa na hi hi, Tuni in nang kong piangsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
58005006	Mundang khatah zong amah in, “Nang in Melchizedek gui zui in, A tawntung in siampipa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
58005007	Zeisu in leitung mi banga hong omlai in sihna panin a honkhia theipa kiangah khitui luangin nakpitak kiko in thungen a, thumna a nei hi. Pasian kihtak zahtakna tawh ngen ahih manin a thungetna a ngah hi.
58005008	Tapa ahih hangin a thuak gimnate tawh thumanna a sin hi.
58005009	A kicin khit ciangin ama thu a mang mi khempeuh aa dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a piangsakpa hong suaka,
58005010	Pasian in Melchizedek gui zui in Siampi Ukpa cih min a pia hi.
58005011	Tua Khazih thu i gen ding tampi a om hangin thu tel zo mengmeng lo na hih manun kong telgen ding a haksa hi.
58005012	A taktak in sia a suak khinzo dingin na kilawmta uh hi. Tua hi napi Pasian thu tawh kisai in a kipatna thubulte mah hilh kikkik ding na kullai uh hi. Antak kisam loin nawizu mah na kisam lai uh hi.
58005013	Nawizu bek a nete naungek ahih manun dikna thu a theisiam nai kei uh hi.
58005014	Ahi zongin antak in a theih theihnate uh zangin a sia a pha a khentel thei khin a picingsa mite aa ding ahi hi.
58006001	Tua ahih manin Khazih tawh kisai a kipatna thuhilhnate nusia photin picinna lamah manawt ni. Kimanna neilo sepna bawlnate panin kisikkikna, Pasian upna,
58006002	tuiphumna, khutngakna, misite thawhkikna le tawntung thukhenna tawh kipawl thuhilhnate bulsut kikkik nawn kei ni.
58006003	Pasian in hong phal leh picinna lamah ma i nawt ding hi.
58006004	Banghang hiam cihleh amaute khuavak in khatvei tan khin a, vantung lam letsong zong a ciam ngei khin, Kha Siangtho tawh zong a kizom ngei,
58006005	Pasian thu a limna le a hong tung ding huna vangliatnate zong a ciam khin mite,
58006006	Pasian Tapa khailumkik in, a selphokik suak uh ahih manin a puk uh leh a kisikkik nadingun a kibawlpha thei nawn kei hi.
58006007	A hunhun a guahtui a dawl, lokhopa aa dingin kimanna a nei gah le teh a piangsak leitang in Pasian thupha ngah ahi hi.
58006008	Ahih hangin tua leitang ah lingkung le thangling kungte a po leh kimanna neilo a, hamsiatna thuakin a tawpna ah mei tawh a kihal ding hi.
58006009	Tua ahih ciangin kong itte aw, hih bangin thu kong gen uh hangin note in bel a hoih zaw hotkhiatna thu tawh kipawl nate na neihna uhah lungmuang in ka om uh hi.
58006010	Banghang hiam cihleh note in misiangthote huh ngei bekthamlo in tu in zong na huh lai uh a, tua banga na nasepna uh le ama min aa dingin itna tawh na hanciamnate uh a mangngilh dingin Pasian in a thumanlopa ahi kei hi.
58006011	Note khat ciatin na lametna uh na kiciatsak sinsen nadingun a tawp dongin thanuamtak in na om ding uh ka deih uh hi.
58006012	Thadah loin upna le thuakzawhna tungtawn a Pasian kamciamna a luahte na etteh ding uh ka deih zaw uh hi.
58006013	Pasian in Abraham tunga kamciam a piaklai in amah sanga a lianzaw a kiciampih ding omlo ahih manin amah le amah kiciam in,
58006014	“Thupha hong pia taktak in kong pungsak taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
58006015	Abraham in lungduaitak in a ngak khit ciangin tua kamciamna a ngah hi.
58006016	Mihingte in amaute sanga a lianzawte min loin kiciam uh a, tua kiciamna in thute kipsak in kinialna khempeuh a beisak hi.
58006017	Tuamah bangin Pasian in zong a tup a gelsa thute a kikhelkik theilo ahihna tua kamciamna a luah ding mite theitelsak nuam ahih manin kiciamna khat tawh kipsak a,
58006018	tua in Pasian zuau theih lohna a kikhel theilo thu nihte tungah kinga in, buk nading zuanin a tai khin eite in i mai‑a hong kikoihsa lametna letkipna tungtawn in hehnepna lianpi i ngah theih nading ahi hi.
58006019	Tua lametna in tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ bangin i lungsim kipsak a, puan tawh kideina nunglam a sungtawng ah a lut hi.
58006020	Tua munah Zeisu in eite aa dingin na lut masa khinzo a, amah in Melchizedek gui zui in a tawntung in Siampi Ukpa a suak hi.
58007001	Hih Melchizedek in Salem kumpipa hi a, a Sangbel Pasian siampipa zong ahi hi. Amah in kumpite zo a, a hong ciahkik Abraham na dawntuah in thupha a pia hi.
58007002	Abraham in gal sunga a ngah nate sung panin sawm a khat Melchizedek a pia hi. Ama min a khiatna masapen “dikna kumpipa,” cihna hi a, Salem kumpipa cihna zong hi‑in tua in “kilemna kumpipa,” a cihna ahi hi.
58007003	Amah in nu le pa ahi a, pugui pagui ahi a, nuntak kipat hun le bei hun ahi zongin a nei kei hi. Pasian Tapa bangin siampi ahi tawntung hi.
58007004	Tu in i pupi Abraham nangawn in gal sunga a ngah nate sung panin sawma khat a piak hih mipa a thupizia ngaihsun dih un.
58007005	Siampi za a ngah Levi suante in Abraham suante mah ahi, a sanggamte uh tung panin thukham tawh kizui in sawma khat a san theih nading uh thupiakna a ngah uh hi.
58007006	Ahih hangin Levi suan a hilo Melchizedek in Abraham tung panin sawma khat ngahin, kamciamna a ngahpa Abraham zong thupha a pia lai hi.
58007007	Tu in a lianzawpa in a neuzawpa thupha pia hi cih nial theih ding thu hilo hi.
58007008	Hihlai ah a sithei mite in sawma khat a ngah uh hi. Ahih hangin tualai in nungta hi ci a, teci panna a ngahpa in sawma khat a sang hi.
58007009	Sawma khat a ngah Levi in tualai in Abraham tungtawn in sawma khat pia khinzo hi, cih theih ahi hi.
58007010	Banghang hiam cihleh Melchizedek in Abraham a dawntuah lai in Levi in a pupi sungah a om khinzo hi.
58007011	Levi siampi nasepna tungtawn in mite in thukham a ngah uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua Levi siampi nasepna in picinna piangsak thei hileh, Aaron bang a hilo, Melchizedek gui zui in siampi khat hong pian ding kisam lai ding ahi hiam?
58007012	Tu in siampi hihna a kikhel mah bangin thukham zong a kikhel ding hong kul hi.
58007013	Banghang hiam cihleh hih thute gen mipa in biaknatau a na a sem ngeilo beh dang khat panin a hong piang ahi hi.
58007014	I Topa pen Judah beh panin a hong piang ahihna kitel mahmah a, tua beh thu ah siampite thu tawh kisai Moses in bangmah a gen kha kei hi.
58007015	Melchizedek tawh a kibang a dang siampi khat hong pian ciangin hih thu a hong kician mahmah hi.
58007016	Hihpa pen ci le sa a thupiakna tawh kizui in siampi a suak hilo a, a bei theilo nuntakna tawh kipawl vangliatna hanga siampi a suak ahi hi.
58007017	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, “Nang in Melchizedek gui zui in, A tawntung in siampipa na hi hi,” ci in teci a pang hi.
58007018	Thu dang khat in genleng, a masa thupiakna thanem in, kimanna neilo ahih manin a kibeisak hi.
58007019	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in kuamah picingsak zolo a, a hoih zaw lametna tawh kilaih in, tua tungtawn in Pasian kiang i zuan thei hi.
58007020	Hih siampipa in kiciamna omlopi a siampi suak ahi kei hi.
58007021	Banghang hiam cihleh siampi dangte in kiciamna omlopi in siampi a suak ahi uh hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu ahih leh, ama tunga Pasian kiciamna tawh siampi a suak ahi hi. Tua kiciamna in, “ ‘Nang in Melchizedek gui zui in, A tawntung in siampipa na hi hi,’ ci in, Topa kiciam khinzo ahih manin, A khelkik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
58007022	Hih kiciamna hangin Zeisu in a hoih zaw thuciam kipsakna a hong suak hi.
58007023	Siampi dangte si in nasep zomsuak theilo uh ahih manin, siampi tampi om uh a,
58007024	ahi zongin, amah om tawntung ahih manin a kikhel theilo siampi za a ngah hi.
58007025	Amah nungta tawntung ahih manin, ama tungtawn in Pasian a naih mite aa ding thumsak in a tawntung in a hon thei hi.
58007026	A siangtho, siatna a neilo, a buahbanglo, mawh neite tawh a kisawh kha lo, vantungte tunga a kitawisang, tua bang Siampi Ukpa in eite aa dingin a hoih mahmah hi.
58007027	Amah ahih leh Siampi Uk dangte bangin nisim in ama mawhna mai nadingin biakpiakna pia masa a, tua khit ciangin mipite mawhna a mai nadingin gangawh biakna a piak ding a kisam kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a kimang tawntung dingin ama pumpi mahmah khatvei a piaksa ahi hi.
58007028	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in a thanem mihingte mah Siampi Ukte dingin seh a, ahi zongin thukham nunga hong piang kamciamna in a kimang tawntung dingin Tapa a seh hi.
58008001	Tu in i gen khitsa thute sung panin i gennop bulpi in hih thu ahi hi. Eite in vantung a Vanglianpa tokhom taklam ah a tu, tua bang Siampi Ukpa i nei hi.
58008002	Amah in mihing lam a hilo Topa mahmah in a lam biakbuuk taktak sunga Siangthopen Mun ah siampi nasep a sempa ahi hi.
58008003	Pasian tunga kipia nate le gangawh biakpiaknate a pia dingin Siampi Uk peuhmah a kiseh ahi hi. Tua ahih manin hih Siampi Ukpa in zong a piak ding na khatpeuh a neih ding kisam hi.
