58008004	Thukham tawh kizui in a kipia nate a pia dingin siampite om khinzo ahih manin amah leitung ah a omlai hi leh siampi a suak kei ding hi.
58008005	Tua siampite nasepna in vantung a om nate lim le a lim bek ahi hi. Biakbuuk lam dinga Moses a kithawi lai in Pasian in ama kiangah, “Mualtung a kong lahsa lim banglian in na khempeuh bawl in,” ci in thu a pia hi.
58008006	Ahih hangin tu in Zeisu in a hoih zaw kamciamnate tawh a kikipsak a hoih zaw thuciamna Palai hi a, a thupi zaw siampi nasep a ngah hi.
58008007	Banghang hiam cihleh thuciamna masa a kawkbang lo hi leh thuciamna nihna zon ding a kul kei ding hi.
58008008	Ahi zongin Topa in tua mite a mawhsak nading mu ahih manin, “En un, Israel innkuan le Judah innkuan tawh thuciam thak khat ka bawl hun a hong tung ding hi.
58008009	Tua thuciamna in Egypt gam panin amaute bantang kaih in ka paikhiatpih lai in a pu a pate uh tawh ka bawl thuciamna tawh a kibang kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka thuciamna ah amaute kip lo uh ahih manin amaute ka thudon kei hi, Topa in ci hi.
58008010	“Tua hun khit ciangin Israel innkuan tawh ka bawl ding thuciamna in hih bang ahi hi, Topa in ci hi: ka thukhamte amaute lungtang sungah koihin amaute lungsim ah ka gelhsak ding hi. Amaute Pasian ka hi dinga, amaute in keima mite ahi ding uh hi.
58008011	Amaute in a innvengpa ahi a, a sanggampa ahi zongin thu hilh nawnlo ding uh a, ‘Topa thei in,’ a kici nawn kei ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a neupen a kipan a lianpen dongin a vekpi un kei a hong theita ding uh hi.
58008012	Banghang hiam cihleh amaute mawhna khialhnate ah ka hehpih dinga, amau mawhnate le thukham tawh a kituaklo a gamtatnate uh zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
58008013	Amah in, “Thuciam thak,” a cih ciangin thuciamna masa pen a luisak a hita hi. Tu in a lui khinsa le zat theih nawnloh pen a beimang ding mah ahi hi.
58009001	A taktak in ci lehang thuciamna masa pen in zong Pasian biakna tawh kisai thukhunte le leitung a om Mun Siangtho a nei hi.
58009002	Biakbuuk khat kilam a, a dei masa pen Siangtho Mun kici hi. Tua sungah meivak tunna, sabuai le Ompihna Anlumte a om hi.
58009003	Puan tawh a kidal dei nihna ah Siangthopen Mun kici dei khat a om hi.
58009004	Tua sungah kham tawh a kibawl paknamtui halna tau a om hi. Kham tawh a kizut thuciamna singkuang zong om a, tua sungah manna a kikoihna kham bel, a teh a sel Aaron ciangkhut le thuciamna suangpekte a om hi.
58009005	Tua singkuang tungah a vanglian cherub vantungmite lim om a, a kha uh tawh hehpihna tokhom a zakkhum uh hi. Tu in tuate thu a cingin i gen khinzo kei ding hi.
58009006	Tu in na khempeuh hih banga a kibawl khit dimdiam ciangin biakbuuk dei masa sungah siampite lut denin siampi na a sem uh hi.
58009007	Ahih hangin dei nihna sungah Siampi Ukpa bek a lutthei hi. Amah kum khat in khatvei lut a, ama mawhna le mipite in a theihlohna uh tawh a bawlkhak mawhnate a mai nadingin sisan tawh biakna a pia hi.
58009008	Biakbuuk dei masa a omlai teng Siangthopen Mun lutna lampi a kilang nai kei hi cih thu Kha Siangtho in hong theisak hi.
58009009	Banghang hiam cihleh a kipia nate le biakpiaknate in a pia mite lungsim a siangsak zo kei hi cih thu tu huna eite a hong lahna ahi hi.
58009010	Banghang hiam cihleh tuate in nek le dawn ngeinate, silsiangna ngeina tuamtuamte le pumpi tawh kisai thukhunte hi a, bawlthakna hun a tun mateng zat dingin a kikoih nate ahi hi.
58009011	A hong tung ding a hoih nate tawh kisai Siampi Ukpa hihna tawh Khazih a hong tungzo hi. Amah in leitung nate le khut tawh kibawl a hilo, a lianzaw le a cingtak zaw biakbuuk sungah a lut hi.
58009012	Amah in tua sungah kelte le bawngnote sisan lutpih lo a, a kimang tawntung dingin ama sisan mahmah tawh Siangthopen Mun ah khatvei lutin tawntung tatkhiatna a hong ngahsak hi.
58009013	A buahbang mite tunga a kitheh bawngtal sisan, keltal sisan le bawngla a kihalna vutte in amaute pumpi siangsak zo ahih leh,
58009014	a si nasepna panin a nungta Pasian na sem dingin Pasian tungah paubanna om loin tawntung Kha tawh amah le amah a kipiapa ahi Khazih sisan in na lungsim uh hong siangsak zawkan lo ding ahi hiam?
58009015	Hih thu hangin Khazih in thuciamna thak Palaipa hong suak hi. Pasian sapna a ngah mite in a kamciamsa tawntung gamhluahna a ngah theih nadingun Khazih in thuciamna masa hun sunga thupalsat mite ama sihna tawh a tankhia hi.
58009016	Luahna tawh kisai in sih thu vaikhakna lai‑a kizat theih nadingin thu vaikhakpa a sihphot kul ding hi.
58009017	Banghang hiam cihleh thu vaikhakna lai‑a bawlpa a nuntak laiteng luahna tawh kisai thu vaikhakna in thu nei theilo in a sih khit ciang bekin thu a nei thei pan hi.
58009018	Tua ahih manin thuciamna masa zong sisan tawh kibawl ahi hi.
58009019	Moses in thukham sunga thupiakte khempeuh mipi mai ah a gen khit ciangin bawngno sisan, keltal sisan le tuisiangte a lakhawm hi. Tua khit ciangin a sungah tuumul san le puknah hiangte diahin thukham laibu le mipite tungah a theh hi.
58009020	Amah in, “Hih in Pasian hong piak thuciamna sisan ahi hi,” a ci hi.
58009021	Tua khit ciangin biakbuuk le biakpiakna a kizang van khempeuh zong tuamah bangin sisan a theh hi.
58009022	Thukham kalhna tawh kizui in na khempeuh phial sisan tawh a kisiansuah ahi hi. Sisan kibua loin mawh maisakna a om kei hi.
58009023	Tua ahih manin vantung a om nate lim la in a kibawl vante pen hih bangin a kisiansuah ding mah ahi hi. Vantung na taktakte ahih leh tuate sanga a hoih zaw gangawh biakna tawh siansuah ding a kisam hi.
58009024	Banghang hiam cihleh siangtho mun taktak lim ahi khut tawh a kibawl Siangthopen Mun sungah Khazih lut loin eite tangin Pasian mai ah a va kilang dingin vantung mahmah ah a lut hi.
58009025	Tua bangin Siampi Ukpa in ganhingte sisan tawh Siangthopen Mun ah kum simin a lut thithe bangin amahmah a kipia kikkik dingin a lut kei hi.
58009026	Tua bang a kipiak thakthak ding a kisam hi leh leitung piancil a kipan tamveipi a si khinzo ding hi. Ahi zongin tu hun ciangin Khazih amahmah gangawh biakna banga a kipumpiakna tawh mawhna a lakhia dingin khatvei hong kilang zo hi.
58009027	Mihingte khatvei a sih ding sehsa hi a, tua khit ciangin thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.
58009028	Tua ahih manin Khazih in mi tampite mawhnate a puakhia dingin khatvei a kipia khinzo hi. Mawhna tawh kisai hi nawnlo in lawptak in amah a ngakte a honkhia dingin a nihveina a hong kilang lai ding hi.
58010001	Thukham in hong tung ding na hoihte lim taktak hilo in a lim bek ahi hi. Tua ahih manin a kibang veve tua gangawh biaknate kumsim a piak thuahthuahna tawh Pasian a bia mite a kicingsak zo kei hi.
58010002	Tuate in hong siangsak zo hi leh gangawh biakpiakna khempeuh kibeisak ding hilo ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh tua a pia mite in khatvei biakpiakna tawh siangtho tawntung in mawhna kisuantakna a beimang ding hi.
58010003	Ahih hangin tua gangawh biaknate in a mawhnate uh kumsim in a phawk kikkiksak hi.
58010004	Banghang hiam cihleh bawngtal sisan le keltal sisante in mawhnate a lakhia thei kei hi.
58010005	Tua ahih manin Khazih leitung ah hong pailai in amah in, “Gangawh biakpiakna le, Nate tawh biakna na deih kei hi. Ahi zongin keima aa dingin, Pumpi khat nong bawlkholhsak zo hi.
58010006	Haltum biakpiaknate le, Mawhmai nading biakpiaknate ah, Nang na lungdam kei hi.
58010007	Tua ciangin, keimah in, ‘En in, keima thu laizial laibu sunga A kigelhna bangin kei hiah om ing. Nangma deihna a sem dingin kong paita hi, Pasian aw,’ Ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
58010008	A tunga a gensa mah bangin amah in, “Gangawh biakpiakna, nate tawh biakpiakna, haltum biakpiakna le mawhmai nading biakpiaknate na deih kei a, tuate ah na lungkim kei hi,” a ci hi. (Hite pen thukham kalh biakpiaknate ahi hi.)
58010009	Tua khit ciangin, “En in, nangma deihna a sem dingin kong paita hi, Pasian aw,” a ci hi. Amah in a nihna a kipsak nadingin a masa pen a lakhia hi.
58010010	Tua bang deihna hangin Zeisu Khazih in a kimang tawntung dingin ama pumpi khatvei a kipiakna tawh eite a hong siangthosak hi.
58010011	Siampi peuhmah in siampi nasep sem dingin nisim in dinga mawhna a maisak thei ngeilo, a kibang gangawh biakpiaknate a pia kikkik hi.
58010012	Ahi zongin, hih siampipa in tawntung mawhmai nading biakpiakna in ama pumpi khatvei a kipiak khit ciangin Pasian taklam ah a tu hi.
58010013	Tua huna kipan in a galte ama khengakna a kisuahsak ding hun ngakin a om hi.
58010014	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in khatvei biakpiakna tawh a sianthosak mite a tawntung in a picingsak hi.
58010015	Kha Siangtho in zong hih thute eite tungah teci a hong panna in,
58010016	“Tua hun khit ciangin amaute tawh ka bawl ding thuciamna in hih bang ahi hi, Topa in ci hi: ka thukhamte amaute lungsim sungah koihin amaute lungtang ah ka gelhsak ding hi,” ci in a gen khit ciangin,
58010017	khatvei, “Amau mawhnate le thukham tawh a kituaklo a gamtatnate uh phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” ci in Kha Siangtho in a genbeh hi.
58010018	Tu in, mawhna a kimaisak khit ciangin mawhmai nading biakpiakna a kisam nawn kei hi.
58010019	Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Zeisu sisan suangin hangtak in Siangthopen Mun ah i lut thei hi.
58010020	Amah in a pumpi ahi deina puan kantan in nuntakna le lampi thak hong honsak zo hi.
58010021	Tua banah Pasian innkuan a uk tua Siampi Ukpa i nei hi.
58010022	Tua ahih manin i lungtang sunga om kisuanna lungsim siansuah in i pumpi zong tui siangtho tawh silin upna thu ah kitheician sinsensa in lungsim maantak tawh ama kiang naih ni.
58010023	Kamciamna a hong piapa muanhuai ahih manin i kam tawh i pulak khitsa lametna thu hoi loin lenkip ni.
58010024	Itna le gamtat hoih a nei ding le khat le khat a kilawpsuah dingte i hih lam phawk ni.
58010025	Mi pawlkhatte bangin biakpiak kikhopnate tawpsan kei ni. Topa Ni hong naita hi cih thei na hih manun khat le khat tha na kipia semsem un.
58010026	Banghang hiam cihleh thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin eima ut thu in mawhna i bawlbawl lai leh mawhmaisak nading gangawh biakna a om nawn kei hi.
58010027	Thuak loh a phamawh a lauhuai thukhenna le Pasian galte a haltum ding hehna meikuangpi bek a omlai hi.
58010028	Teci nih bang thum bang a om nak leh Moses thukham a nial mi in hehpihna ngah loin a si hi.
58010029	Tua ahih leh a khe tawh Pasian Tapa tuancil in, amah a siangthosak thuciamna sisan neu ngaihsut in, hehpihna thupha a pia Kha a zahko mi in bangzah in a lianzaw daantatna thuak ding cih na ngaihsun uh hiam?
58010030	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Phulakna in keima aa ahi hi. Keimah in ka thukkik ding hi,” ci in Topa in gen hi. Tua banah, “Topa in a mite tungah thu a khen ding hi,” a cipa i thei hi.
58010031	A nungta Pasian thukhenna khut i thuak khak ding mulkimhuai pha mahmah hi.
58010032	Ahi zongin khuavak na muh tung lai uh haksatnate nakpitak do in na thuakzawh lai uh hunte phawk gige un.
58010033	Khat veivei zahkona le bawlsiatna thuakin mipite et huan dingin hong kibawl hi. Khat veivei tua banga a kibawl mite na thuakpih uh hi.
58010034	Banghang hiam cihleh mat le hen ka thuakna zong nong khasiatpih uh hi. A hoih zaw a kip tawntung neihsa khat vantung ah na neih lam uh thei na hih manun na neihsate uh a hong kithatangsuh hangin zong na lungdam veve uh hi.
58010035	Tua ahih manin na lungmuanna uh khahsuah kei un. Tua lungmuanna hangin thaman tampi na ngah ding uh hi.
58010036	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna banga na nasep khit uh ciangin ama hong kamciamna na ngah nadingun thuakzawhna na kisam uh hi.
58010037	Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, “A hong pai dingpa, Tomkha kal sungin hong pai dinga, A hong zekai nawn kei ding hi.
58010038	Ahi zongin tu in, Midik in upna tawh a nungta ding hi. A nungtolh mi a om leh, Tua mi tungah ka lungkim kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
58010039	Ahi zongin eite in nungtolh in a kisia mite hilo in uma hotkhiatna a ngahte i hi zaw hi.
58011001	Tu in upna in i lamet nate tungah lungmuanna le a kimunailo nate telcianna ahi hi.
58011002	Hih bang upna hangin tanglai mite in phatna a ngah uh hi.
58011003	Pasian thupiakna tawh van le lei a kibawl hi a, tu a a kimu nate zong a kimuthei nate pana kibawl hilo hi ci in upna tawh i thei hi.
58011004	Abel in Cain piak biakna sanga a hoih zaw biakna Pasian tungah upna tawh a pia hi. Tua upna tungtawn in amah in midik hi ci in teci panna ngah a, a biakpiakna zong Pasian in a sansak hi. Amah a sih khit hangin upna tawh thu a gengen lai hi.
58011005	Upna hangin Enoch kilato a, sihna tawh a kipelh hi. Pasian in lato ahih manin amah a kimu nawn kei hi. Amah a kilaktoh ma in Pasian lungdamsak hi cih teci panna a ngah hi.
58011006	Tua ahih ciangin upna lo tawh Pasian kilungdamsak zolo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kianga naih mi peuhmah in Pasian om taktak hi cihleh kuhkaltak a amah a zong mite thaman a piapa hi cih a up loh phamawh hi.
58011007	Noah in a muh nailoh nate tawh kisai Pasian thupiak kholhna a ngah ciangin Pasian kihtak zahtakna nei a, a innkuanpihte a hotkhiat nadingin upna tawh tembaw a lam hi. Tua upna hangin leitung mite mawhtangsak a, upna hanga kingah dikna a luahpa zong a suak hi.
58011008	Abraham in a nung ciangin a luah ding munah pai dinga sapna a ngah lai in a pai nading mun theilopi mahin upna tawh thumang in a paikhia hi.
58011009	Amah in kamciamna gamah upna tawh gamdang ah pemta bangin a va teeng hi. Amah in tua kamciamna a luahpih Isaac le Jacob‑te tawh puanbuuk sungah a teeng hi.
58011010	Banghang hiam cihleh bulkip a nei khuapi khat a lamen hi a, tua khuapi a gelpa le a lampa in Pasian ahi hi.
58011011	Sarah in zong naupaai zawh nading upna tawh thahatna a ngah hi. Kamciamna a piapa muang ahih manin ta neih theih hun kheng khin hi napi ta khat a nei hi.
58011012	Tua ahih manin misi tawh a kibang khin lel mi khat sung panin vana aksi zah le tuipi gei‑a sehnel zah a a tam suan le khak a piang hi.
58011013	Hih mite khempeuh in a kikamciamte ngah nai loin upna sungah a si uh hi. Ahi zongin tua kamciamte gamlapi panin mu khin uh a, a na dawn khinzo uh hi. Leitung ah mikhual le pemtate i hi hi a kici uh hi.
58011014	Hih bang thute a gen tua mite in amaute gam ding khat a zong uh ahihlam teltak in a kilangsak uh hi.
58011015	A nusiatsa uh gam lunggulhkik uh hi leh a kilehkik theih nading uh hun hoih a ngah mahmah ding uh hi.
58011016	Ahih hangin tu in amaute in a hoih zaw vantunggam a lunggulh uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in amaute Pasian ka hi hi a kicih ding maizum lo hi. Tua hi a, amaute aa dingin khuapi khat a bawlkholhsak hi.
58011017	Pasian in Abraham a ze‑et lai in amah in upna tawh Isaac a pia hi. Kamciamna a ngahpa in a tapa neihsun biakpiakna in a pia hi.
58011018	Tua tapa tawh kisai in hi bangin, “Isaac panin a piangte bek nangma suan le khak kici ding hi,” ci in kigen hi napi,
58011019	Pasian in misite lak pan nangawn in amah thokiksak thei hi ci in Abraham in um a, a up mah bangin sihna pan Isaac ngahkik takpi hi cileng zong a kici thei hi.
58011020	Isaac in Jacob le Esau‑te, amaute mailam ding tawh kisai in upna tawh thupha a pia hi.
58011021	Jacob in a sihkuan ciangin Joseph tapa nihte upna tawh thupha pia a, a ciangkhut tungah kingam in Pasian a bia hi.
58011022	Joseph in Israel mite paikhiat nading thu a sihkuan in upna tawh gen a, ama guhte tawh kisai in thu a vaikhak hi.
58011023	Moses nu le pate in amah a suah ciangin a mel hoihna mu uh a, kumpipa thupiak nangawn lau loin kha thum sung upna tawh a selcip uh hi.
58011024	Moses in a khan khit ciangin Pharaoh tanu ii tapa a suah theih nading thu upna tawh a nial hi.
58011025	Hun tomkha sung mawhna tawh kipawl nopsakna sunga a bual ding sangin Pasian mite tawh gentheihna thuakkhawm dingin a teel zaw hi.
58011026	A ngah ding thaman mitsuan gige ahih manin Egypt gam hauhna phatna khempeuh sangin Khazih hanga zahkona thuak ding thupi a sa zaw hi.
58011027	Muhtheih lohpa mu ahih manin kumpipa a thangpaih ding nangawn lau loin upna tawh Egypt gam a nusia hi.
58011028	Tacil teng a thatpa in amaute a thah loh nadingin upna tawh Paisan Pawi bawl in sisan a theh hi.
58011029	Amaute in leikeu tunga lampai bangin upna tawh San Tuipi a kantan uh hi. Egypt mite in tua banga kantan a sawm uh ciangin tui in a tummang hi.
58011030	Israelte in Jericho khuapi ni sagih sung a kimkot khit uh ciangin amaute upna hangin tua khua kulhpi a cim hi.
58011031	Numei kizuaknu Rahab in thukante nuamtak in zin a tunsak ciangin a upna hangin a umlo mite tawh a kisiakhawm kei hi.
58011032	Kua thu genlai ding ka hi hiam? Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel le kamsangte thu i gen nading hun a kicing kei hi.
58011033	Hih mite in upna tawh kumpigamte la in diktak in thukhen uh a, kamciamnate a ngah uh hi. Amaute in humpi nelkai kam khakcip in,
58011034	mei thahatna mitsak uh a, namsau hiamte panin a suakta uh hi. A thanemnate uh thakhauhna suakin galsimna ah hang mahmah uh a, gamdang galkapte a taikeksak uh hi.
58011035	Numeite in a misite uh a nungta in a ngahkik uh hi. A dang pawlkhatte in a pha zaw thawhkikna a ngah theih nadingun khahkhiat ding teel loin bawlsiatna a thuak zaw uh hi.
58011036	Hi hi, pawlkhatte in zahkona, khautep tawh sata thusitna, sikkhau tawh khih a thong khiatnate a thuak uh hi.
58011037	Suangtum tawh denlupna, singat tawh attanna, namsau tawh thahnate a thuak uh hi. Tuuvun, kelvun peuh silhin vak kawikawi uh a, cimawh genthei in bawlsiatna le khelbawlna a thuak uh hi.
58011038	Hih leitung in amaute aa dingin a kilawm kei hi. Sehnel gam sung le mualkawm guamkawm tengah vak kawikawi uh a, leihawm sung, suanghawm sung peuh ah a teeng uh hi.
58011039	Hih mite khempeuh in upna hangin etteh hoih ngah uh a, ahi hangin a kikamciam thu a ngah nai kei uh hi.
58011040	Pasian in eite aa dingin a hoih zaw hong gelsak ahih manin eite kihel loin amaute kia kicinna a pia kei hi.
58012001	Hih zahin a tam tecite in i kim i pamah om ahih manin hong tuantualsak thei nate le olno taka hong awksak thei mawhna peuhmah paikhia in i mai‑a om kidemna ah kuhkaltak in tai ni.
58012002	Eite upna a piangsakpa le a kicingsakpa Zeisu mitsuan gige ni. Amah in a mai‑a Pasian koihsak lungdamna thu hangin zumna awlmawh loin singlamteh sihna thuak a, tua khit ciangin Pasian tokhom taklam ah a tu hi.
58012003	Note bahcip a na lungkiat loh nadingun mawhnei mite langpanna tua zahtak in a thuak keikai zopa lungngai un.
58012004	Sisan luangzah dongin mawhna tawh na kido nai kei uh hi.
58012005	Tate banga Pasian in hong hanthotna na mangngilh khin ta uh hi. Amah in, “Ka ta aw, Topa hong thuhilhna, Neu ngaihsut kha kei in. Hong taii ciangin na lung kiasak kei in.
58012006	Banghang hiam cihleh, Topa in a itte thuhilh a, A sansa a tate a sat hi,” a ci hi.
58012007	Note in tawsatna na thuak uh leh Pasian in tate bangin a hong ngaihsun ahi hi. A pa in thu a hilhloh ta kua om ahi hiam?
58012008	Tate thu kihilh ahih manin thuhilhna na thuak ngei kei uh leh ta taktak hilo in zawlta na hi uh hi.
58012009	Tua thamlo in eite thu hong hilh leitung pate i nei ciata, amaute i zahtak hi. Tua ahih leh khalam a i Pa hong thuhilhna mangin i nuntak ding hi zawkan lo ding ahi hiam?
58012010	Banghang hiam cihleh i leitung pate in amaute hoihsak bangin hong hilh uh hi a, tomkha sung bek a kimang ding ahi hi. Pasian in ahih leh amah banga i siantho theih nading le eite phattuam nadingin a hong hilh ahi hi.
58012011	Tu in thuhilhna peuhmah i thuak laitak in nuam loin na kisa hi. Ahi zongin thuhilhna tawh a kipantah mite in a nung ciangin a thuman lungmuanna gah a ngah uh hi.
58012012	Tua ahih manin a thanem na khutte uh le a zaw na khukte uh khauhsak un.
58012013	A bai na khete uh kilawi loin a dam nadingin na lampi uh tangsak un.
58012014	Mi khempeuh tawh kilem ding le sianthona na delh un. Tualo in kuamah in Topa a mu kei ding hi.
58012015	Pasian hehpihna thupha a khahsuah kha na om loh nadingun limtak in kisit un. Tua banah zungkha a nei singkung hong selin note sungah buaina piangsak a, mi tampi zong a buaisak loh nadingin zong kikem un.
58012016	Numei pasal mawhna a bawl mi a om loh nading le ankam khat tawh ama innluah za a zuak Esau banga Pasian a zahtaklo mi na om khakloh nadingun hoihtak in kisittel un.
58012017	Banghang hiam cihleh Esau in a nung ciangin thupha a ngahkik nop hangin kinolh khin a khitui luangin nakpi in a ngetkik hangin zong lungsim a kikhelsak zo nawn kei hi.
58012018	Banghang hiam cihleh khut tawh kilawng thei, meikuang, khuamial, lungzinna le huihpi,
58012019	Pengkul ging le thugenna awgingte kizakna, tua awging a za mite in tua banga thu a gen nawnloh nadingin a thumna mual, note a tung na hi kei uh hi.
58012020	(Banghang hiam cihleh tua mun pen, “Ganhing khat nangawn in tua mual a sukkhak leh suang tawh denglum un, ahih keileh thaltang tawh kaplum un,” cih thupiak a kizatna mun hi a, amaute in a thuak zo kei uh hi.
58012021	Amaute muh tua nate lauhuai mahmah ahih manin Moses in, “Lau lua in ka ci a ling hi,” a ci hi.)
58012022	Ahi zongin note tunna mun in Zion mual, a nungta Pasian khuapi ahi vantung Jerusalem khuapi ahi hi. A kisim zolo vantungmi honpi kikhopna mun,
58012023	vantung a min a kiciamteh ta masapente kikhopna le mi khempeuh tungah thu a Khenpa Pasian a omna mun ahi hi. Tua mun in picinna a ngah midikte khate a omna mun,
58012024	thuciamna thak Palaipa ahi Zeisu a omna mun le Abel sisan in a gen thute sangin a hoih zaw thute a gen sisan a kithehna mun ahi hi.
58012025	Note tunga thu hong genpa na nial khakloh nadingun kidawm un. Leitung ah thu a hong genpa a nialte suakta lo uh ahih leh vantung pana thu a hong genpa thugen ngai kei lehang i suakta kei sem ding hi.
58012026	Tualai in vantung pan thu a genpa awging in leitung a lingsak hi. Ahih hangin tu in amah in, “Leitung bek lingsak loin vantung zong khatvei ka lingsakkik ding hi,” ci in a hong kamciam khinzo hi.
58012027	Tu in, “Khatvei ka lingsakkik ding hi,” a cih ciangin a kipiangsakte sung pan a kiling theilo nate a kipsuak nadingin a kilingthei nate a hepkhiat nading cihna ahi hi.
58012028	Tua ahih ciangin eite in a kiling theilo kumpigam ngah i hih manin lungdam mahmah ni. Ama san theih dingin zahtakna le launa tawh Pasian bia ni.
58012029	Banghang hiam cihleh eite Pasian in a haltum meikuang ahi hi.
58013001	Unau khat banga na ki‑itna uh zomsuak un.
58013002	Zin le leng do ding mangngilh kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh mi pawlkhat in a theih lohkal un vantungmite nangawn zinin a do kha ngei uh hi.
58013003	Thongkiate na phawk unla amaute tawh sikkhau hong kikhihkhawm bangin kingaihsun un. Note zong pumpi mah tawh a nungta na hih manun bawlsiatna a thuak mite na phawk un.
58013004	Mi khempeuh in kiteenna pahtawi in thupi koih unla, nupa kal puannuai thu ah na siangtho un. Banghang hiam cihleh numei pasal mawhna a bawlte le angkawm mite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ding hi.
58013005	Sum duhlua kei unla na neih zahzah uh tawh lungkim un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, “Nang kong nusia ngei kei dinga, kong taisan peuhmah kei ding hi,” hong ci zo hi.
58013006	Tua ahih manin, “Topa in kei hong huhpa hi a, Ka lau kei ding hi. Mihing in bang hong cih thei ding ahi hiam?” ci in hangtak in i genngam hi.
58013007	Pasian thu hong hilh na makaite uh phawk tawntung un. Amaute nuntakzia ngaihsun in amau upna zui un.
58013008	Zeisu Khazih in zan ni, tuni le a tawntung in kibang den hi.
58013009	A tuamtuam le a lamdang thuhilhnate um kawikawi kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a zui mite phattuamna a pialo nek le dawnte hangin lungkipna sangin hehpihna hangin lungkipna in a hoih zaw hi.
58013010	Biakbuuk sunga nasemte in a nek theihloh uh biaknatau khat eite in i nei hi.
58013011	Banghang hiam cihleh Siampi Ukpa in mawhmai nadingin tua ganhing sisante Siangthopen Mun ah paipih a, ganhing pumpi ahih leh giahphual pualam ah a kihal hi.
58013012	Tua ahih ciangin Zeisu in zong ama sisan tawh mite a sianthosak theih nadingin kongpi pualam ah sihna a thuak hi.
58013013	Tua ahih ciangin eite in zong ama kizahkona thuakpih in giahphual pualam ama kiangah naih ni.
58013014	Banghang hiam cihleh hihlai ah a kipsuak ding khuapi i nei kei a, hong tung ding khuapi i zong hi.
58013015	Tua ahih manin Pasian phatna biakpiakna Zeisu tungtawn in pia tawntung ni. Hih phatna in kam tawh ama min i pulakna gah ahi hi.
58013016	Tua banah a pha bawl ding le khat le khat neihsa kihop kipiak ding zong mangngilh kei un. Tuate in Pasian a lungdamsak mahmah biakpiakna ahi hi.
58013017	Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, amaute tungah na ki‑ap un. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in note nuntakna hong cinsak in tua nasepna tawh Pasian tungah thu a pulak ding uh hi. Amaute in dahna tawh hih loin lungdamna tawh hih uh hen. Tua hi kei leh note aa dingin phattuamna a om kei ding hi.
58013018	Kote aa dingin thu hong ngetsak un. Ka lungsim uh siangtho hi ci in ka tel uh a, na khempeuh ah a pahtawihuai dingin ka nungta nuam uh hi.
58013019	Note kiangah a manlang theithei in a hong kipuak nadingin thu hong ngetsak un ci in a tuam vilvel in kong thum hi.
58013020	Tu in kilemna Pasian in tawntung thuciamna sisan tungtawn in Tuucing Lianpa i Topa Zeisu misite lak pan a thokiksak zo hi.
58013021	Tua Pasian in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in ama hoihsak nate note sungah hong sem henla ama deihna na sep theih nadingun na hoih khempeuh tawh hong kidimsak tahen. Tua Khazih in minthanna ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
58013022	Sanggamte aw, kong laigelh pen sau lo ahih manin kong hanthotnate limtak in na ngaih nadingun kong thum hi.
58013023	I sanggampa Timothy kikhah zo hi cih na theih ding uh ka ut hi. Amah hong tun baih leh note tawh kimu dingin amah tawh kong pai ding hi.
58013024	Na makai khempeuh uh le misiangthote khempeuh na hopihsak un. Italy gama omteng in note a hong hopih uh hi.
58013025	Pasian hehpihna thupha note khempeuh tawh hong omkhawm tahen. Amen.
59001001	Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih sila khat ahi keimah James in gam tuamtuam a kithehthang Israel nam sawm le nam nihte kong hopih hi.
59001002	Ka sanggamte aw, haksatna tuamtuam na tuah uh ciangin lungdam nadingin la zaw un.
59001003	Banghang hiam cihleh na upna uh hong kize‑et ciangin thuakzawhna a piangsak hi.
59001004	Bangmah kitangsam loin hoihna namkim tawh kidim a, na picin nadingun thuakzawhna in nasep hoih sem hen.
59001005	Note lakah pilna a kisam mi in Pasian kiangah ngen hen. Amah in kuamah taii loin cinghtak in a piapa ahih manin a pia ding hi.
59001006	Ahi zongin lunghiang loin upna tawh ngen hen. A lunghiang mi in huih mutna peuh ah a tai kawikawi tuihual tawh kibang hi.
59001007	Tua bang mi in Topa kiang panin bangmah a ngah dingin kilamen kei hen.
59001008	A lungka mi in a sepna khempeuh ah a kiplo mi ahi hi.
59001009	A nuntakna a niam sanggampa in tawisanna a ngah manin angtang hen.
59001010	A hau sanggampa in zong niamkhiatna a ngah manin angtang hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in gamlak a po pak bangin a mangthang ding hi.
59001011	Banghang hiam cihleh ni hong suak a, nisa in a kap ciangin a kung hong vul in a pak zong pulh a, a etlawmna teng a bei hi. Tuamah bangin mihaupa zong a hanciamna khempeuh pak bangin vulmang ding hi.
59001012	Ze‑etna a thuak keikai zo mi in mihampha ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bangin a thuak zo hi cih a kilat ciangin Topa in amah a it mite a piak dinga a kamciamsa nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding hi.
59001013	Mi khatpeuh in ze‑etna a thuak ciangin, “Pasian in kei hong ze‑et hi,” ci kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh siatna tawh Pasian kize‑et theilo a, tuamah bangin Pasian in zong siatna tawh kuamah a ze‑et kei hi.
59001014	Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a hoihlo lunggulhna in kai in a zol ciangin ze‑etna a thuak hi.
59001015	Tua ciangin a hoihlo lunggulhna hong gaai in mawhna a suakkhiasak hi. Mawhna a kicin ciangin sihna a piangsak hi.
59001016	Kong it sanggamte aw, mi khemsa in om kei un.
59001017	A hoih le a cingtak letsong peuhmah tunglam a om i Pa kiang panin a hong pai hi a, amah in khuavakte Pa ahi hi. Amah in nilim kihei bangin a kikhel themthum kei hi.
59001018	Ama piansakte lakah a gah masate i suah theih nadingin ama deihna bangin thuman thutak tawh eite a hong piangsak zo hi.
59001019	Tua ahih manin kong it sanggamte aw, hih thu na ciamteh un. Kuama peuh in thungaih ding kin henla, ahi zongin kam manlang loin hehbaih kei hen.
59001020	Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte hehna in Pasian dikna a piangsak kei hi.
59001021	Tua ahih manin a nin a kihhuai le a sia na khempeuh paikhia un. Na nuntakna uh hong hon thei note sunga hong kituhsa thu lungnemtak in sang un.
59001022	No le no a kikhem, thu a zate bek hilo in thu banga a gamtate na hi un.
59001023	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin thu za napi in tua thu banga a gamtat kei leh, limlang sunga a maitang a en mi tawh kibang hi.
59001024	Amah a ki‑et khit ciangin paikhia in a mel bangci bang ahi hiam cih a mangngilh pah hi.
59001025	Ahih hangin a kicing suahtakna hong pia thu entel a a zuisuak mi in thu a zak ciangin mangngilh pah loin zui ahih manin a sepna khempeuh ah thupha a ngah ding hi.
59001026	Note lakah mi khatpeuh in biakna hahkat mahmah a kisak hangin a leii a ukzawh kei leh, amah le amah a kikhem hi a, a biakna hahkatna zong a mawknapi ahi hi.
59001027	Pa Pasian mai‑a a siangtho le a buahbanglo biakna in meigong tagahte haksatna huhna le a hong ninsak thei leitung vaite tawh kisukkhak lohna ahi hi.
59002001	Ka sanggamte aw, minthang Topa ahi Topa Zeisu Khazih a umte na hih manun mi angvantuam nei kei un.
59002002	Note kikhopna ah kham khutbuh bulh a, puanhoih a silh mi khat le puansia a silh mizawng khat hong paikhop leh,
59002003	puanhoih a silhpa zahtak bawl in, “Hihlai a tutna nuam ah hong tu in,” ci in, mizawngpa kiangah, “Hualai ah na ding in,” ahih keileh, “Ka khengakna gei, hihlai ah hong tu in,” na ci thei kha ding uh hi.
59002004	Tua bang na cih uh ciangin note khat le khat kideidan in ngaihsutna hoihlo tawh thukhente suak hilo na hi uh hiam?
59002005	Kong it sanggamte aw, ngai dih un. Pasian in hih leitung mitmuh in upna lama a hau ding le amah a it mite tunga a kamciamsa kumpigam a luah dingin mizawngte teel khinzo hilo ahi hiam?
59002006	Ahi zongin note in mizawngte na simmawh uh hi. Note hong zothawh in zum ah a hong khiate, mihaute hilo ahi uh hiam?
59002007	Note hong kisapna min manpha a hong kosiatsakte, mihaute mah hilo ahi uh hiam?
59002008	“Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga hong kipia thupiak lianpi zui le uh teh, a dik in a gamta na hi ding hi.
59002009	Ahi zongin angvan tuam na neih leh mawhna bawl na hi a, thukham in thu palsat mi hong ci hi.
59002010	Banghang hiam cihleh thukham dang khempeuh na zuih khit hangin khat na palsat leh thukham khempeuh a palsat na hi hi.
59002011	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Angkawm kei in,” hong ci Pasian in, “Mi that kei in,” zong hong ci hi. Ang na kawm loh hangin mi na thah leh thukham a palsat na hi hi.
59002012	Suahtakna a hong pia thukham tawh thukhenna a thuak dingte bangin kampau unla, gamta un.
59002013	Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna a neilo mite, hehpihna om loin thu kikhen ding hi. Hehpihna na neih leh thu hong kikhen ciangin hehpihna na ngah ding hi.
59002014	Ka sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh in upna ka nei hi a cih hangin sepna in a zuih kei leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Tua upna in amah hon thei ding ahi hiam?
59002015	Na sanggampa ahi a, sanggamnu ahi zongin puansilh ding le nisim annek ding a neih kei leh,
59002016	note laka mi khatpeuh in, “Nuamtak in ciah in. Na khualum henla, na gilvah hen,” na cih uh hangin ama pumpi aa dingin a kitangsamte pia kei le uh teh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?
59002017	Tua mah bangin upna zong amah kia bek om henla, sepna in a zuih kei leh a si ahi hi.
59002018	Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in, “Nangmah in upna na nei a, keimah in sepkhiatna ka nei hi,” hong ci kha ding hi. Sepkhiatna tawh a kilanglo na upna hong lak in. Ken ka sepkhiatna tawh ka upna kong lak ding hi.
59002019	Pasian khat bek om hi cih na um hi. Pha hi, dawigilote in zong tua thu um in a ling uh hi!
59002020	Mihaipa aw, sepkhiatna in a zuihloh upna a si ahihlam na thei nuam hiam?
59002021	Eite pupi Abraham in biaknatau tungah a tapa Isaac a piak ciangin a sepkhiatna hangin diktansakna ngah hilo ahi hiam?
59002022	Sepkhiatna in ama upna zui a, tua sepkhiatna in a upna kicingsak hi cih theilo na hi hiam?
59002023	Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna pen ama dikna in kisimsak hi,” a cihna thu a tangtung hi. Amah pen Pasian lawmpa kici hi.
59002024	Tua ahih manin, mi khatin upna bek tawh hilo in sepkhiatna tawh diktansakna ngah hi cih thu na thei uh hi.
59002025	Tua mah bangin numei kizuaknu Rahab in zong thukante zintungsak in lampi dang khat ah a ciahsak ciangin ama sepkhiatna tawh diktansakna ngah hilo ahi hiam?
59002026	Kha a omlo pumpi a si ahih mah bangin sepkhiatna omlo upna zong a si ahi hi.
59003001	Ka sanggamte aw, siate in thukhenna a khauhzaw thuak ding ahihlam thei unla, mi tampi in sia na sem nuam dah un.
59003002	I vekpi mahin thu tampi ah i khialtek hi. A kampauna tawh a khiallo mi a picing hi a, a pumpi bup zong a uk zo mi ahi hi.
59003003	En un, sakol in i thu hong man nadingin kamkaih bulhin tua tawh a pumpi bup i hei kawikawi thei hi.
59003004	Tembawte zong ngaihsun un, lian mahmah uh a, huihkhauhte mutna tawh a kihawl hangin a hawlpa in a neu mahmah a heina pekno khat tawh a utna lamlam ah a kiheisak hi.
59003005	Tuamah bangin leii in zong i pumpi tung nate lakah a neu mahmah khat ahih hangin kisialh a hat mahmah hi. Meikuang neucik khatin gam zapi a kattum theih lam phawk un.
59003006	Leii in meikuang hi a, siatna namkim tawh kidim hi. I pumpi tung nate khat ahi leii in i pumpi bup ninsak a, i nuntakna buppi zong kuangsak thei hi. Leii a kuangsak mei in hellɠ ahi hi.
59003007	Mihingte in gamsate, vasate, a bokvak ganhingte le tuisung a om ganhing khempeuh pantah in a zualsak thei uh hi.
59003008	Ahi zongin leii ahih leh a gilo, a omkhong theilo na khat hi a, sihtheihna gu tawh kidim in kuamah in a zualsak zo kei hi.
59003009	Leii tawh i Pa Pasian i phat a, tua leii mah tawh Pasian in ama lim le melsun in a bawl mite i samsia zel hi.
59003010	Kam sung khat bek panin phatna le samsiatna i paikhia khawmsak hi. Ka sanggamte aw, tua bang ding ahi kei hi.
59003011	Tuinak khat panin tui lim le tui kha phulkhawm thei ahi hiam?
59003012	Ka sanggamte aw, theikung ah tanluan gah thei ahi hiam? Lenggui tungah thei gah thei ahi hiam? Tua mah bangin tuinak khat panin tui‑al le tui lim a phulkhawm thei kei hi.
59003013	Note lakah a pil le a thuthei kua ahi hiam? A sep a bawl peuhpeuh thunem pilna tawh sem henla, a pil le thuthei ahihna gamtatpha tawh lak hen.
59003014	Ahih hangin kihazatna le angsungkhualna lungsim na neih uh leh kisialhpih kha peuhmah kei un. Tua bang na hih uh leh thutak nialin zuaugen na hi uh hi.
59003015	Tua bang pilna in tunglam pana hong kipiasuk hilo in leitung pilna, ci le sa pilna le dawite pilna ahi hi.
59003016	Deihgawhna le angsungkhualna a om ciangin buaina le siatna namkim a piangsak hi.
59003017	Ahi zongin tunglam pana hong kipia pilna in a masa pen in a siangtho hi. Tua banah kilemna, migitna, thusan theihna, hehpihna le gahphate tawh kidim a, mi deidanna le kineih nate a om kei hi.
59003018	Tu in kilemna a bawl mite in dikna khaici, kilemna tawh a tuh uh ahi hi.
59004001	Note laka om kilangdona le kitotnate koi pan hong piang ahi hiam? Note pumpi nate sung panin a hong phuphu noptat nopna lungsim panin a hong piang hilo ahi hiam?
59004002	Na lunggulh mahmah uh a, ahih hangin na ngah kei uh hi. Tua ciangin mi na that uh hi. Na deihgawh leuleu uh a, na ngah loh uh ciangin kitawng in na kido uh hi. Na ngah kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kiangah na ngen kei uh hi.
59004003	Na nget uh ciangin ngimna maanlo tawh note noptatna a zat ding bekin ngen na hih manun na ngah kei uh hi.
59004004	A thangtat numei pasalte aw! Leitung tawh kipawlna in Pasian langpanna ahihlam theilo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin leitung tawh a kipawl mi peuhmah, amah le amah Pasian gal a kisuaksak ahi hi.
59004005	Ahih keileh, “Eite sunga a teeng Kha in eite hong lunggulh mahmah hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu a kimawk gelh in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
59004006	Amah in hehpihna thupha tampi hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin amah in, “Pasian in a kiphasakte langpan a, A kiniamkhiatte hehpihna thupha a pia hi,” a ci hi.
59004007	Tua ahih manin Pasian thu na mang unla, Dawimangpa na kham un. Tua hi leh note kiang panin a taikhia ding hi.
59004008	Pasian naii un. Tua hi leh amah in note hong naii ding hi. Mawhneite aw, na khut uh siangsak un. A lungka mite aw, na lungsim uh siangthosak un.
59004009	Dah in thum unla, kap un! Na nuihna uh kahna suaksak unla, na nuamna uh maigumna suaksak un.
59004010	Topa mai ah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hi leh amah in note hong lamsang ding hi.
59004011	Sanggamte aw, khat le khat kigensia kei un. A sanggam gensia in a sanggam tunga thu a khen mi in thukham a gensia le thukham tunga thu a khen ahi hi. Thukham tunga thu na khen leh thukham a zui hilo in thu a khen na hi hi.
59004012	Hong hon thei le hong that thei ding thukham hong piapa khat a om hi. Midangte tunga thu a khen dingin nang kua na hi hiam?
59004013	“Tuni hiam, zingciang hiam in hih khua ah ahih keileh tua khua ah va pai in, kum khat sung tamin vanlei vanzuak in summet va bawl ni,” a ci mite aw, ngai un, zingciang in bang thu piang ding cih na thei kei uh hi.
59004014	Na nuntakna uh bang tawh kibang ahi hiam? Tawlkhat sung hong kilat khit ciangin a thengmangkik pah meiilum tawh a kibang hi.
59004015	“Topa in hong awi leh, i dam lai dinga, tua bangin, hi bangin i hih ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi zaw hi.
59004016	Tu in na kiphatsakna tenguh na kisialhpih zawsop uh hi. Tua bang kisialhnate a hoih kei hi.
59004017	Tua ahih manin a pha bawl ding thei napi a bawllo mi aa dingin tua in mawhna ahi hi.
59005001	No, mihaute aw, ngai un. Note tunga hong tung ding gimna hangin kiko in kap un.
59005002	Na neih na lam tenguh muatgawp in na puansilhte uh ngetin a gai khinzo hi.
59005003	Na kham na ngun tenguh a kekseu khin hi. Tuate kekseuna in note langah teci hong pangin meikuang bangin na sa uh a hong ne ding hi. Hun nunung aa dingin note in sum le pai na khol uh hi.
59005004	Ngai un, lo sunga an la dinga na cial uh nasemte khemin na piak khitloh uh a thamante hangin kiko uh a, vantung galkap honpite Topa in amaute kikona aw a zazo hi.
59005005	Hih leitung ah a nuam theithei dingin na ut bangbang in na om uh a, a kigo ding ganhingte bangin na kivakthau uh hi.
59005006	Note hong langpanlo midikte mawhsak in na that uh hi.
59005007	Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong paikik dongin na thuak keikai un. Lokhopa in leitang panin a piang ding gah ngak a, guah masa a kipan guah nunung a zuk dongin lungduaitak in a ngakzia na ngaihsun unla,
59005008	note in zong thuak keikai un. Topa hong pai ding naita ahih manin na lungsim uh kipsak un.
59005009	Sanggamte aw, khat le khat kiphunsan kei un. Na kiphunsan uh leh thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi. En un, Thukhen mangpa kongbiang ah hong dingta hi!
59005010	Ka sanggamte aw, Topa min tawh thu a gen kamsangte in lungduaitak in gimna a thuakziate uh na etteh un.
59005011	En un, a thuakzote in thupha ngah uh hi cih i thei hi. Job in thuak keikai zo ahih manin a tawpna ah Topa in ama aa dingin bang hihsak ahi hiam cih na mu zo uh hi. Topa pen lainatna le hehpihna tawh kidim hi.
59005012	Ka sanggamte aw, tuate khempeuh banah vantung tawh ahi a, leitung tawh ahi a, nadang khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. “Hi,” na cihte uh “Hi,” ci unla, “Hilo,” na cihte uh “Hilo,” na ci un. Tua bangin na hih kei uh leh thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi.
59005013	Note lakah buaina le haksatna a thuak mi a om leh thungen hen. A lungdam mi a om leh phatna lasa hen.
59005014	A cina a om leh pawlpi makaite sam henla, amaute in Topa min tawh sathau nilhin thungetsak uh hen.
59005015	Upna tawh thungetna in cinapa damsak dinga, Topa in amah a thosak ding hi. Mawhna a bawlkhak leh zong a mawhna a kimaisak ding hi.
59005016	A hong kidamsak theih nadingin na khialhnate uh khat le khat kipulak unla, thu na kingetsak un. Midik thungetna in vanglian in muibun mahmah hi.
59005017	Elijah zong eite mah bangin mihing khat hi napi guahzuk loh nadingin nakpitak a thu a nget ciangin tua gamah kum thum le a lang sung guah a zu kei hi.
59005018	Thu a ngetkik ciangin vantung in guahtui pia a, leitang in gah le teh a piangsak hi.
59005019	Ka sanggamte aw, note lakah mi khatpeuh in thuman thutak pan lampial in a om laitak in a dang khatin a kiheikiksak leh hih thu phawk tahen.
59005020	Mawhna a bawl mi khat a khialhna panin a kiheikiksak mi in sihna panin tua pa nuntakna a honkhia hi a, mawhna tampi zong a khuhsak ahi hi.
60001001	Zeisu Khazih sawltak khat ahi keimah Peter in Pontus gam, Galatia gam, Cappadocia gam, Asia gam le Bithynia gam‑te ah a kithehthang pemtate lai kong khak hi.
60001002	Pa Pasian in ama theihkholhna tawh kizui in hong teel in Zeisu Khazih thu a mang ding le ama sisan tawh thehna a ngah dinga Kha tawh a hong sianthosak mite na hi uh hi. Note tungah hehpihna thupha le lungnopna khang semsem tahen.
60001003	Amah in misite lak pan Zeisu Khazih a thawhkiksakna tungtawn in a nungta lametna a nei dingin ama hong hehpihna lianpi tawh eite hong suakthaksak zo hi. Tua i Topa Zeisu Khazih ii Pa, Pasian tungah phatna om tahen.
60001004	Amah in a kisia theilo, a nin theilo, a mual theilo, na gamhluah ding khat uh vantung ah hong koihsak zo hi.
60001005	Pasian in hun nunung cianga hong lahkhiat dingin a baihsa in a koih tua hotkhiatna hong tun mateng Pasian vangliatna in na upna uh tungtawn in hong kembit hi.
60001006	Tu laitak in tawlkhat sung haksatna namkim ah dahna na thuak uh hangin hih hotkhiatna thu in note hong lungdamsak mahmah hi.
60001007	Kham in mei tawh sittelna a thuak zawh hangin a kisia thei hi. Kham sangin a manpha zaw note upna a taktak ahihna kilang a, Zeisu Khazih a hong kilat ciangin phatna, pahtawina leh minthanna na ngah theih nadingun sittelna a thuak na hi uh hi.
60001008	Tua Zeisu Khazih na muh loh uh hangin na it uh hi. Tu in na muh lohpi mah uh um na hih manun minthanna tawh kipawl a kigen zolo lungdamna lianpi tawh na kidim uh hi.
60001009	Banghang hiam cihleh note upna in a ngim bulpi ahi, kha hotkhiatna na ngah man uh ahi hi.
60001010	Note tunga hong tung ding hehpihna thupha a genkhol kamsangte in tua hotkhiatna thu phatak in a kantel uh hi.
60001011	Khazih thuak gimnate le tua khit cianga a ngah ding minthanna thu, tua kamsangte sunga om Khazih Kha in a genkholh lai in bang hun ciangin bangci bangin hong tung ding hiam cih thei nuam in a zongtel uh hi.
60001012	Note tunga lungdamna thu hong gen mite in tua thu vantung pana hong kisawl Kha Siangtho tawh a hong gen uh ahi hi. Tua thu kamsangte in a genkholh lai un amaute aa ding hilo in note aa ding ahihlam zong amaute tungah a kihilh hi. Vantungmite nangawn in hih thute muhkhiat ding a lunggulh mahmah uh hi.
60001013	Tua ahih manin lungsim kigingsa in omden unla, pumpi kikhalna nei un. Zeisu Khazih a hong kilat ciangin note a hong piak ding hehpihna thupha tungah na lametna khempeuh uh koih un.
60001014	Awlmawhlohna tawh nidang lai a na lunggulhnate uh zui in gamta loin tu in a thumang tate bangin na gamta un.
60001015	Note a hong sampa a siantho mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
60001016	Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kei ka siantho bangin note zong na siangtho un,” a ci hi.
60001017	Kuamah deidan nei loin mi khempeuh amau gamtatna tawh kizui in thu a khen i Pa min a lote na hih manun leitung ah na om sungun khualzin mi bangin na gamta un.
60001018	Na pu na pate uh tung panin na luahsuk uh kimanna a neilo gamtatna panin a kisiathei kham le ngun tawh note a hong kitankhia ahi kei hi.
60001019	Ahi zongin a kawkbanglo, a ninbanglo, tuuno sisan tawh a kibang Khazih sisan manpha tawh hong kitankhia hi cih na thei uh hi.
60001020	Khazih in leitung pian mapek in a kisehkholsa hi a, ahi zongin hih hun nunung ah note aa dingin hong kilang in,
60001021	Pasian sungah upna le lametna na neih theih nadingun misite lak panin amah thokiksak in a minthangsak Pasian na um uh hi.
60001022	Kha tungtawn in thuman thutak zui in na lungsim uh na siangsak khin uh a, na sanggamte uh zong na it takpi uh hi. Tua ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khat le khat na ki‑it mahmah un.
60001023	Banghang hiam cihleh note in a kisiathei khaici tawh hilo a kisiatheilo khaici ahi, a nungta, a kip tawntung Pasian thu tawh a suakthakte na hi uh hi.
60001024	Banghang hiam cihleh, “Mi khempeuh pen lopa kung tawh kibang a, A thupitna khempeuh zong, Lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopa vul in a pakte pulh mang a,
60001025	Ahih hangin Topa thu ahih leh a kip tawntung hi.” Tu in note tunga hong kihilh lungdamna thu in hih thu ahi hi.
60002001	Tua ahih manin kisiatsak nopna, zuautatna, kineihkhemna, ki‑eenna le kigensiatna khempeuh paikhia un.
60002002	Na khantoh theih nadingun naungek suaktungte bangin Pasian thu nawizu siangtho na lunggulh un.
60002003	Banghang hiam cihleh Topa hoih hi ci in na ciam khinzo uh hi.
60002004	Mite in a nawlkhin uh hangin Pasian in a teel a manpha mahmah a nungta suangpi ahi Topa kiang na tung zo uh hi.
60002005	Tua ahih manin note zong a nungta suangte bangin, kha inn in a kilamte na hi uh a, Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in Pasian in a santheih khalam biakpiakna a pia ding, a siangtho siampi na hi khin ta uh hi.
60002006	Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “En un, a kiteelsa a manpha mahmah innkiusuang khat, Zion ah ka phut a, Amah a um mite maizumna kithuaksak ngeilo ding hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
60002007	Tua ahih manin thu‑um note aa dingin amah a manpha mahmah hi. A umlo mite aa dingin ahih leh, “Innlamte in a nilkhiat uh suang, Innkiu suang bulpi a suak hi.”
60002008	Tua suang in, “Palkhak suang ahi, Pukna suangpi ahi hi,” a kici thu a tangtung hi. Amaute in Pasian thu mang lo uh ahih manun kipalkha uh a, tua bang ding maha a kisehsate ahi uh hi.
60002009	Note na hi uh leh khuamial sung panin a lamdang ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa, amah phatnate a tangkokhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel minam, kumpi za a ngah siampi nam, a siangtho minam le Pasian tuamneih mite na hi uh hi.
60002010	Nidang lai in hehpihna na ngah loh uh hangin tu in hehpihna na ngah uh hi. Nidang lai in ama mite na hih loh uh hangin tu in Pasian mite na hi uh hi.
60002011	Kong itte aw, kha tawh a kido ci le sa lunggulhnate na tang un ci in khualzin mi le pemtate tawh a kibang note kong hanthawn hi.
60002012	Gentile‑te in siatna a bawl mite bangin a hong kosiat uh hangin amaute lakah a pahtakhuai in na gamta un. Tua hi leh note gamtatna phate mu in thukhen ni ciangin Pasian a phat thei ding uh hi.
60002013	Tua ahih ciangin i Topa min na khualna un hong uk mite thu na mang un.
60002014	Thuneihna sangpen a nei kumpipa ahi a, a tatsia mite daanpia in a hoih in a gamtate a pahtawi dingin ama koih gam uk mangpite thu zong na mang un.
60002015	Banghang hiam cihleh thu thei loin a mawk paupaute, na gamtatpha uh tawh na daihsak ding uh Pasian deihna ahi hi.
60002016	A suakta mi bangin nungta unla, ahi zongin na suahtakna uh gitloh selna in zang kei un. Pasian silate bangin gamta un.
60002017	Mi khempeuh zahtak unla, thu‑um sanggamte it un. Pasian kihta unla, kumpipa pahtawi un.
60002018	Silate aw, na tote uh thu zahtakna tawh na mang un. A hoih, a thukhual tote bek hilo in, a gilo, a gamhtat tote ukna zong na mang un.
60002019	Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin Pasian a theih manin a thumanlopi bawlsiatna khat a thuak zawh leh a pahtakhuai ahi hi.
60002020	Ahi zongin na khialhna hangin satna na thuak leh na pahtakhuaina bang om ding ahi hiam a pha na bawl manin gimna thuak a, na thuak zawh leh Pasian mai ah a pahtakhuai na hi hi.
60002021	Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang ding mahin Pasian in hong sap mite na hi uh hi. Khazih in zong eite tangin na thuak khinzo a, ama khekhap na zuih theih nadingun limpha hong nusiat zo hi.
60002022	“Amah in mawhna bawl lo a, A kam panin zong zuauthu kiza lo hi.”
60002023	Kosiatna a thuak lai in amah in a thukkik kei hi. Bawlsiatna a thuak lai in zong a bawlsiate tawnbawl loin maantak in thu a khenpa tungah a kipum ap hi.
60002024	Mawhna sihsan in dikna ah i nuntak theih nadingin amah in i mawhnate a pumpi in singkhuam tungah a puazo hi. Ama liammate hangin damna na ngah zo uh hi.
60002025	Banghang hiam cihleh tuu bangin lam na pial khin uh a, ahi zongin na kha uh hong Cingpa le hong Kempa kiangah tu in na tungkik zo uh hi.
60003001	Tuamah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Tua hi leh thu‑umlo pasal khatpeuh a om leh note gamtatna le amaute na zahtakna uh a hong muh uh ciangin,
60003002	kam khat beek pau kul loin a zite gamtatna hangin hong kikhel thei ding uh hi.
60003003	Na kizepnate uh sam bawlziate, kham le ngun le nikteen puansilh hoihte tawh a pualam kizepna hi sak kei un.
60003004	Pasian muhna ah a manpha mahmah ahi, a kisia theilo lungnemna le lungduaina lungsim, a kimu theilo lungsim sung kizepna hi tahen.
60003005	Banghang hiam cihleh tanglai a Pasian a muang numei siangthote in zong a pasalte uh thu mangin, tua bangin a etlawm in a kizem uh hi.
60003006	Sarah in zong Abraham thu mang a, topa a cih bangin note in zong launa tawh hilo in a hoih in na gamtat uh leh Sarah tanute na hi uh hi.
60003007	Tuamah bangin pasalte aw, na zite uh tawh kitheihsiam in om un. Amaute a thanem zaw ahihna uh le hehpihna thupha tawh hong kipia nuntakna a luahkhawm dingte na hih manun na zite uh pahtawi un. Tua hi leh na thungetna uh hong kikhaktan lo ding hi.
60003008	A tawpna a kong gennop thu in khat le khat kithutuaktak in na om un. Kilainatna, sanggam bang a ki‑itna, kihehpihna le kiniamkhiatna lungsimte na nei un.
60003009	Thusiate thusia tawh thukkik kei unla, hong kosiate kosiakik kei un. Pasian in thupha a luah dinga hong sap mite na hihlam uh thei unla, thupha tawh thukkik zaw un.
60003010	Banghang hiam cihleh, “A nuntakna it a, Hunhoih hunnuam tampi a munuam mi in, A leii tawh thusia gen kei henla, A muk tawh zuauthu gen kei hen.
60003011	Thusia pan kiheikhia in a pha bawl henla, Kilemna deihin a ngah mateng hanciam hen.
60003012	Banghang hiam cihleh, Topa mit in midikte en a, A bil in amaute thungetnate a ngai hi. Thusia a bawlte ahih leh Topa in a nungngat hi.”
60003013	A hoih in gamta le uh teh kua in no tungah siatna hong bawl ding ahi hiam?
60003014	Ahi zongin thuman hangin na thuak uh leh thupha na ngah ding uh hi. “Amaute hong tawnbawlnate hangin lau kei unla patau kei un.”
60003015	Ahi zongin note lungsim sungah a tuamin Topa Pasian koih unla, note lametna thu hong dong mi khatpeuh lungnemna le zahtakna tawh na dawnkik theih nadingun a kigingsa in omden un.
60003016	Amaute in nasep hoihlo sem banga hong mindaisak uh ciangin lungsim hoih nei le uh cin, Khazih sunga na gamtatna hoih uh hong gensia mite in maizum lawh ding uh hi.
60003017	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna hi peuh leh, a pha bawl mana gimthuakna in a sia bawl mana gimthuakna sangin a hoih zaw hi.
60003018	Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in zong Pasian kiangah eite hong tunpih theih nadingin midik amah in a diklo eite mawhna tangin khatvei sihna a thuak hi. A pumpi a sih hangin Kha in a nungtasak hi.
60003019	Tua kha tawh thong sunga om khate kiangah pai in thu a tangko zo hi.
60003020	Tua khate pen Noah in tembaw a bawl lai a Pasian in lungduaitak in a ngak, thu a manglo mite khate ahi hi. Tua tembaw sunga om mihing tawmno khat ahi mi giatte in tua tui sung panin hotkhiatna a ngah uh hi.
60003021	Hih tui in Zeisu Khazih thawhkikna hanga hotkhiatna i ngahna, baptizena thu a kawk ahi hi. (Hih baptizena in pumpi tunga cininte hong kisilna hilo in lungsim siangtho tawh Pasian lam i ngatna ahi hi.)
60003022	Tua Zeisu Khazih vantung ah kahto khinzo in Pasian taklam ah om a, vantungmite a kipan ukna a neite le vangliatna khempeuh ama khut nuai ah a koih hi.
60004001	Tua ahih manin Khazih in eite tangin pumpi gimna a thuak mah bangin note in zong tua lungsimpuak mah galhiam bangin na nei un. Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi a gimna a thuak mi in mawhna tawh a kipaikan nawn kei hi.
60004002	Tua bang mi in a nuntaklai teng ci le sa deihna tawh mihing lunggulhna hoihlote zui in a nungta nawn kei a, Pasian deihna zui in a nungta hi.
60004003	A beisa hunin Gentile‑te gamtatna mah bangin numei pasal paktatna, a hoihlo lunggulhna, zukhamna, gualnop pawibawlna, zunek pawikhamnate le a kihhuai milim biakna sunga i kidiahnate in a simphat khin mahmah hi.
60004004	Tu in tua noptatnate sungah amaute banga na bual loh uh ciangin lamdangsa in hong gensia uh hi.
60004005	Ahih hangin amaute in a nungta le a si mite tungah thukhen dingin a om gigepa tungah amaute thu ciat a puak ding uh hi.
60004006	Tua thu hang mahin misisate tungah lungdamna thu a kitangko khin hi. Tua in amaute a leitung pumpi uh thu kikhen in, Pasian deihna bangin a kha uh a nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
60004007	Na khempeuh a bei ding hun hong nai zo hi. Tua ahih manin thu na nget theih nadingun na pumpi uh hoihtak uk unla, na pilvang un.
60004008	A dang khempeuh sangin khat le khat na ki‑it mahmah un. Banghang hiam cihleh itna in mawhna tampi a sel hi.
60004009	Phun loin khat le khat zin na kido un.
60004010	Pasian hehpihna thupha tampi a kem neihsa kemsiamte bangin kha letsong na ngah bang uh zangtek unla khat le khat tha kipia un.
60004011	Minthanna le ukzawhna a nei tawntung Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in na khempeuh ah Pasian min a than theih nadingin thugen mi peuhmah in Pasian kammal tektek mah bangin gen henla, nasem mi peuhmah in Pasian in a piak a hih theihna zah tawh sem hen. Amen.
60004012	Kong itte aw, meikuang bangin a sa ze‑etna haksa na thuak uh ciangin thu lamdangpi khat hong tung bangin ngaihsun in lamdangsa kei un.
60004013	Ahi zongin ama minthanna hong kilat ciangin nuamna lianpi tawh na kipah theih nadingun Khazih thuakna a thuakpih na hih manun lungdam un.
60004014	Khazih min hangin zahkona na thuak uh leh mihampha na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh minthanna Kha le Pasian Kha note tungah hong om ahi hi. Amaute in Khazih a kosiat uh hangin note in na pahtawi uh hi.
60004015	Note, kuamah in mithahna, guktakna, tatsiatna, midangte thu ah kitaklahna thute hangin bangmah thuaklawh kei un.
60004016	Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in Christian ahih manin gimna a thuak leh maizum kei henla, tua min a puak manin Pasian phat zaw hen.
60004017	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian innkuan sung panin thukhenna a kipat ding hun hong tungzo hi. Eite in thukhenna thuak masa ding i hih leh Pasian lungdamna thu a sanglo mite a tawpna ah bang suak ding uh ahi hiam?
60004018	Tu in, “Midikte nangawn in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh haksa ahih leh, Pasian a thusim lote le mimawhte bangci ding uh ahi hiam?”
60004019	Tua ahih manin Pasian deihna tawh kizui in gimna a thuakte in gamtat hoih zomsuak uh henla, a muanhuai a Piangsakpa tungah a nuntakna uh ap hen.
60005001	Note bangmah a makai khat ka hih banah Khazih thuak gimnate teci a pangpa khat ka hihna le a hong kilang ding vangliatna a ngahpa khat ka hihna tawh kizui in,
60005002	note laka om makaite kong hanthot nop thu in note laka om Pasian tuuhonte vak unla cing un. Sep loh phamawh hi cihna tawh hilo zaw in sepnopna lungsim tawh sem un. A maanlo a sum ngahnopna tawh hilo in lawpnatak tawh sem un.
60005003	Pasian in note hong ap tuuhonte tungah ukcip gawp kei unla, amaute hong etteh theih dingin om zaw un.
60005004	Tua hi leh Tuucing Mangpa hong kilat ciangin a tul theilo minthanna lukhu na ngah ding uh hi.
60005005	Tuamah bangin khangnote aw, makaite thu mang un. Note khat le khat thu kimang unla, kiniamkhiatna silh un. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Pasian in a kiphasakte langpan a, A kiniamkhiatte hehpihna thupha a pia hi.”
60005006	Tua ahih manin Pasian in a hun a tun ciangin a hong lapsang theih nadingin a thahat Pasian khut nuai ah kiniamkhiat un.
60005007	Amah in note hong lung himawh ahih manin na lung hihmawhna khempeuh uh amah suan un.
60005008	Na galpa uh Dawimangpa in a valhtum ding mi zong in humpi nelkai hawk bangin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua ahih manin pumpi ki‑uk unla, kigingsa in omden un.
60005009	Leitung mun tuamtuam a om na sanggamte un zong tua bangin thuak uh hi cih thei unla, Dawimangpa dal in upna tawh dingkip un.
60005010	Khazih Zeisu sunga tawntung minthanna sungah eite hong sampa in hehpihna thupha khempeuh a neipa Pasian ahi hi. Note in tawmvei sung gimna na thuak khit uh ciangin amah in hong picingsak in hong kipsak henla, hong thakhauhsak in hong phutkip tahen.
60005011	Tua Pasian in minthanna le ukzawhna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.
60005012	A tomno a kong gelh hih laikhak, a muanhuai i sanggampa Silvanus kong puasak hi. Hih thute Pasian hong hehpihna thupha taktak hi cih teci pangin kong hanthawn hi. Hih thute ah na kip un.
60005013	Note mah tawh teelna a ngahkhawm Babylon khuapi a om numei in note hong hopih hi. Ka tapa Mark in zong hong hopih hi.
60005014	Itna kinapna tawh khat le khat kihopih un. Khazih Zeisu sunga om note khempeuh tungah nopna om tahen. Amen.
61001001	Zeisu Khazih sila le sawltak khat ahi keimah Simon Peter in i Pasian le Honpa Zeisu Khazih dikna hanga kote tawh a manpha mahmah upna a ngahkhawm mite lai kong khak hi.
61001002	Pasian le i Topa Zeisu na theihna uh tungtawn in note tungah hehpihna thupha le lungnopna hong khang semsem tahen.
61001003	Ama vangliatna le ama hoihna tawh eite hong sampa i theihna tungtawn in nuntakna le Pasian sutna tawh kisai na khempeuh Pasian ahihna vangliatna tawh eite hong pia zo hi.
61001004	Amah in a thupi mahmah le a manpha mahmah kamciamnate tua vangliatna mah tawh hong pia zo hi. Tua kamciamte tungtawn in a hoihlo lunggulhnate hanga a piang hih leitung siatna tawh kipelh in Pasian pianzia na ngah theih nading uh ahi hi.
61001005	Hih thu hang mahin upna tungah hoihna, hoihna tungah thutheihna,
61001006	thutheihna tungah pumpi deihna khamna, pumpi deihna khamna tungah thuakzawhna, thuakzawhna tungah Pasian sutna,
61001007	Pasian sutna tungah sanggam banga kikhualna, sanggam banga kikhualna tungah itna a neihthuah dingin na hanciam un.
61001008	Banghang hiam cihleh hihte nei in khangsak le uh teh Topa Zeisu Khazih theihtelna ah kimanna neilo le gahsuah loin na om kei ding uh hi.
61001009	Ahi zongin hihte a neilo mi ahih leh a mit mangin naicik bek muthei a, a mawhna luiteng kisilsiangsak khinzo ahihlam zong a mangngilh mi ahi hi.
61001010	Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note a hong kisapna le a hong kiteelna a kiciat sinsen nadingin hanciam semsem un. Tua hi leh na puk ngei kei ding uh a,
61001011	i Topa le Honpa Zeisu Khazih tawntung kumpigam sung luttheihna thu note a kicing in hong kipia ding hi.
61001012	Hih thuman thutak thei in a kip khinsa na hi uh zongin hih thute mah kong phawksakkik nuam lai hi.
61001013	Hi hi, hih buuk sungah ka teen laiteng hih thute kong phawksak ding hoih ka sa hi.
61001014	Banghang hiam cihleh i Topa Zeisu Khazih in a hong lahsa mah bangin hih ka buuk ka suahkhia baihta ding hi ci in ka thei hi.
61001015	Tua thamlo in ka sih khit ciangin zong hih thute na phawk tawntung theih nadingun ka hanciam nuam hi.
61001016	I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong paina thu le ama vangliatna thu kong gen uh ciangin pilna tawh a kiphuak tawm tangthu a hong gen ka hi kei uh a, mittang mahmah tawh ka muhsa uh ama thupina hong gen ka hi zaw uh hi.
61001017	Banghang hiam cihleh a thupi mahmah vanglian kiang panin, “Hihpa in hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” a ci aw khat ama tungah a hong ginkhiat in amah in Pa Pasian pahtawina le vangliatna a ngah hi.
61001018	Amah tawh mual siangtho tunga ka omkhop laitak un vantung panin a hong ging hih aw kote in ka za uh hi.
61001019	Tua banah a kip a kho zaw kamsangte thugente i nei hi. Note lungsim sungah, zingsang khua hong vak in zingsol hong suah mateng khuamial laka meitang bangin hih thute lim ngaihsut le uh teh note aa dingin a hoih mahmah hi.
61001020	Nadang khempeuh sangin hih thu na thei masa un. Lai Siangtho sunga om genkholhna thute khat beek kamsangpa theih tawmna tawh a hong piang ahi kei hi.
61001021	Banghang hiam cihleh genkholhna thute in mihing deihna banga hong piang hilo in Pasian misiangthote in Kha Siangtho sawl bangbang in a gen uh ahi hi.
61002001	Ahi zongin Israel mite lakah kamsangzuaute a om ngei mah bangin note lakah zong thuzuau hilhte a hong om ding hi. Amaute in a hong siasak thei upna maanlote hong lutpih sim ding uh a, amaute a lei Topa nangawn nial uh ahih manin amaute tung mahah siatna tung pah ding hi.
61002002	Mi tampi in tua mite siatna lampite zui ding uh a, amaute hangin thuman thutak lampi a zahko ding uh hi.
61002003	Amaute duhhop huaiham mahmah uh ahih manin zuauthu tawh note nek zonna in hong nei ding uh hi. Tanglai a kipan in Pasian in amaute thukhen zo a, a sawtlo in kisiatna a thuak ding uh hi.
61002004	Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna a bawl vantungmite nangawn Pasian in koihkhong loin hell sungah khia a, thukhenna thuak dingin khuamial sungah sikkhau tawh a khihcip hi.
61002005	Tanglai leitung mite zong koihkhong loin Pasian a thusimlo tua mite tungah tuiciin tungsak a, dikna thu a hilh Noah tawh a kisim mihing giatte a honkhia hi.
61002006	A nung ciangin Pasian a thusimlo mite tungah a piang ding thu a lahna in Sodom le Gomorrah khuate thukhen in susia a, vut le vai a suaksak hi.
61002007	Ahih hangin migilote kihhuai gamtatnate hangin lunggimna a thuak midikpa Lot a honkhia hi.
61002008	(Banghang hiam cihleh amaute laka a teeng tua midikpa in amaute tatsiatna teng nisim in mu in a kampau tenguh zaza ahih manin a dik ama lungsim a gimsak mahmah hi.)
61002009	Tua hi a, Pasian a kihta mite ze‑etna pan a hotkhiat zia ding le thukhen ni cianga daanpiak dingin migilote a koihzia,
61002010	a diakdiak in a kihhuai lunggulhna tawh ci le sa deihna a zui mite le ukna a thusimlo mite daan a piak dingzia Topa in a thei hi. Tua mite haihan in amau thu bek thusa uh a, tunglam a thuneite nangawn a gensia ngam uh hi.
61002011	Ahih hangin amaute sanga a vanglian zaw le a thahat zaw vantungmite nangawn in Topa mai ah tuate zahko loin zong a mawhsak kei uh hi.
61002012	Hih mite in amaute theihloh peuhpeuh gensia uh a, ngaihsutna a neilo thah ding le suksiat ding bek a ngak ganhing gilo tawh a kibang uh hi. Ganhing gilote mah bangin amaute zong a mangthang ding uh hi.
61002013	Amaute in diktatlohna thaman a sang ding uh hi. Amaute nopsakna in sun tangpi in noptat a omna ahi hi. Note tawh ankuang hong um uh ciangin a tatsialo bangin a kigualnop bawl uh hangin a nin le a kawkbang a suak uh hi.
61002014	Angkawm nopna lungsim tawh a mit hah uh kidim a, mawhna bawl loin om theilo uh ahih manin lungsim palau mite a zol uh hi. Huaihamna lamah siam mahmah uh a, hamsiatna a ngah mite ahi uh hi.
61002015	Amaute in lampi maan nusia in lampial khin uh a, Beor tapa Balaam lampi a zui uh hi. Tua Balaam in thumanlohna thaman a deihpa ahi hi.
61002016	A pau theilo laa khat mihing bangin pau in tua kamsangpa gamtatna maanlo taii a, kamsangpa haitatna a kham hi.
61002017	Tua mite in tui omlo tuikhuk le huihpi mut mang meiilum tawh a kibang uh hi. Amaute aa dingin a mial bikbek tawntung khuamial a kikoihkhol zo hi.
61002018	Amaute in kimanna neilo kiphatsakna kam pau uh a, khialhna sunga a om mite lak panin a suakta mite, ci le sa lunggulhna zui in a paktat dingin a zol uh hi.
61002019	Ka hong suaktasak ding uh hi ci in midangte kamciam a piak uh hangin amaute mahmah siatna sila ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na khatpeuh in mi khat a thuzawh leh, tua mipa in tua sila ahi hi.
61002020	Topa le Honpa ahi Zeisu Khazih thei in, a thanghuai leitung nuntakna pan a suahtak khit uh ciangin tua thanghuai leitung nuntakna sungah awkkik a, a guallelh uh leh, tua mite pianzia in a patna sangin a tawpna a sia zaw hi.
61002021	Amaute in a kipia a siangtho thupiakna thei khin uh a, a nungngatsan uh sangin tua thuman lampi a thei kha lo uh hi leh amaute aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
61002022	Ahih hangin, “Ui in a luak a nekik hi. Vok in a kisil khit ciangin buan lakah a bualkik hi,” a kici paunak bang tektek in amaute tungah a piang hi.
61003001	Kong itte aw, tu‑a kong laikhak a nihveina ahi hi. (Hih laikhak nihte in ngaihsutna gina na neihna uh kong phawkkiksakna ahi hi.)
61003002	A siangtho kamsangte in nidang a a gen uh thute Topa le Honpa in sawltakte tungtawn a hong piak thute na phawkkik ding uh ka deih hi.
61003003	A masa pen in hih thu na thei un. Hun nunung ciangin amaute lunggulhna hoihlo zui in a gamta, mi a zahko thei mite hong piang ding uh hi.
61003004	Amaute in, “Ama hong paikik nading kamciamna koi ah omta hiam? I pu i pate si zota uh a, na khempeuh a kipiansak cil a bangbang in omlai hi,” ci in a gen ding uh hi.
61003005	Ahih hangin tanglai in Pasian in a kammal tawh vantung nate piangsak in leitung zong tui in a tup pawl le tui tunga a dawkkhia pawl a omsak thu thei gige napi a kitheihmawh bawl uh hi.
61003006	Tua hun lai a om leitung zong tui in tummang in kisia hi cih thute amaute in a kimangngilh bawl uh hi.
61003007	Tua thamlo in Pasian in a kammal mah tawh tu laitak a a om vantung nate le leitung zong thukhen ni le Pasian a thusimlo mite a kisuksiat ni cianga meikuang tawh haltum dingin a kikoih khol ahi hi.
61003008	Ahi zongin kong itte aw, Topa aa dingin ni khat in kum 1,000 bang hi a, kum 1,000 zong ni khat mah bang ahi hi cih thu mangngilh kei un.
61003009	Mi pawlkhat in zekai hi a cih bangun Topa in ama kamciamna a tangtunsak nadingin a zekai kei hi. Eite khat zong kisialo in i vekpi in mawhna i kisikkik ding hong deih manin lungduaitak in hong ngak ahi hi.
61003010	Ahi zongin Topa Ni in zan laitak a hong pai guta bangin hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin vantung nate ginngaih mahmahsa in a mangthang ding uh a, a sunga om nate zong salua in a tuimang ding hi. Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh zong a kangtum ding hi.
61003011	Tua bangin na khempeuh tuimang ding ahih manin note bangci bang mi hi dingin kilawm cih ngaihsun un. Pasian sutna le siangtho nuntakna ah gamta unla,
61003012	Pasian Ni hong tun ding kal ngaklah in lametna tawh na om ding uh kilawm hilo ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh tua ni ciangin vantung kuangin tuisuak dinga, a sunga om na khempeuh zong salua in a tuimang ding hi.
61003013	Ahih hangin eite in ama hong kamciamna bangin midikte a teenna van thak le lei thak i lamen hi.
61003014	Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, tuate lamen na hih manun ama mai ah lungmuangtak in na om theih nadingun a ninbanglo, mawhsakna a omlo dingin om un.
61003015	I it mahmah i sanggampa Paul in zong amah a kipia pilna tawh kizui in lai sunga hong gelh mah bangin lungduaitak a Topa hong ngakna in hotkhiatna ngah theih nading ahi hi ci in na ciamteh un.
61003016	Amah in a laikhak dang khempeuh ah zong tua thute mah a gen hi. Tua laikhakte sungah a telhak thu pawlkhat om a, bangmah theilo mite le lungsim kiplo mite in tua thute a lehkaih uh hi. Lai Siangtho sunga om a dang thute zong tuamah bangin lehkaih uh ahih manin siatna a thuaklawh uh hi.
61003017	Tua hi a, kong itte aw, hih thute theikhol khin na hih manun migilote in lammaanlo ah hong pialkhiatpih in na dinna uh munkip pan na puk khakloh nadingun kikem un.
61003018	I Topa le Honpa Zeisu Khazih hehpihna thupha le amah theihtelna ah na khangto un. Tua Topa tungah tu le a tawntung in minthanna om tahen. Amen.
62001001	A kipat cil a kipan in a om khinsa kote in ka zak uh, mit tawh en in ka muh uh le, khut tawh ka lawn uh tua nuntakna Thu tawh kisai note kiangah kong tangko uh hi.
62001002	Tua nuntakna hong kilang in kote in ka mu uh a, teci pangin note kiangah kong gen uh hi. Tua nuntak tawntungna in Pa tawh a omkhawm hi a, tu in ahih leh kote kiangah a hong kilang zo hi.
62001003	Kote in Pa le a Tapa Zeisu tawh ka kipawlkhop takpi mah bangun note zong kote tawh nong kipawlkhop theih nadingun ka muhsa ka zaksa uh tua thu note kiangah kong pulakkhia uh hi.
62001004	Na lungdamna uh a kicin nadingin hih thute kong gelh uh hi.
62001005	Ama tung pan ka zak khit uh ciangin note tungah kong pulakkhiat uh thu in Pasian in khuavak hi a, ama sungah khuamial a om kei hi cih thu ahi hi.
62001006	Amah tawh ka kipawlkhawm hi ci napi in khuamial sungah i gamtat leh zuau thugen i hi a, thuman thutak a zui lo i hi hi.
62001007	Ahi zongin amah khuavak sungah a om mah bangin eite zong khuavak sungah i kalsuan leh, khat le khat a kipawlkhawm i hi a, a Tapa Zeisu Khazih sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin a hong sawpsiang hi.
62001008	Mawhna ka nei kei hi i cihleh ei le ei a kikhem i hi a, eite sungah thuman thutak a om kei hi.
62001009	I mawhnate pulak lehang i mawhnate hong maisak in i diktatlohna khempeuh pan hong sawpsiang dingin amah muanhuai in a dik hi.
62001010	Mawhna ka bawl kei hi i cihleh amah zuaugen i suaksak a, eite sungah ama thu a om kei hi.
62002001	Ka taneute aw, mawhna na bawl khakloh nadingun hih thute kong gelh hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in mawhna a bawl leh Pa tawh a omkhawm Sitni khat i nei a, amah in midikpa Zeisu Khazih ahi hi.
62002002	Amah in eite aa ding bek hilo in, leitung mi khempeuh mawhna aa dingin zong amahmah thoihdamna a hong hi hi.
62002003	Tu in ama hong thupiakte i zuih leh amah a theitel i hi hi.
62002004	“Amah ka thei hi,” ci napi in a thupiakte a zuilo mi in zuaugen hi a, ama sungah thuman thutak a om kei hi.
62002005	Ahih hangin ama thu a zui mi sungah Pasian itna a kicing in a om hi. Hih thu tawh ama sungah i om lam i thei hi.
62002006	Ama sungah ka om hi a ci mi peuhmah in ama gamtat bangin a gamta ding hi.
62002007	Sanggamte aw, note kiangah thupiak thak kong gelh kei a, a cil a kipan na ngahsa uh thupiak lui mah kong gelh hi. Tua thupiak lui pen a cil a kipan na zak khitsa uh ahi hi.
62002008	Thupiak thak khat note tungah kong gelhkik hi. Tua thu in ama sung le note sungah a om takpi thu ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khuamial hong bei in khuavak taktak a hong tangzo hi.
62002009	Khuavak sungah ka om hi ci napi in a sanggam a mudah mi in khuamial sungah a omlai ahi hi.
62002010	A sanggam a it mi in khuavak sungah om ahih manin a puk nading thu a om kei hi.
62002011	Ahi zongin a sanggam a mudah mi ahih leh khuamial sungah omin khuamial sunga lampai ahi hi. Khuamial in a mittawsak ahih manin a paina mel a thei kei hi.
62002012	Ka taneute aw, Pasian in ama min hangin na mawhnate uh hong maisak ahih manin lai kong khak hi.
62002013	Pate aw, a kipat cil a kipan a ompa thei na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, gilopa zo khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Ka taneute aw, Pa thei khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi.
62002014	Pate aw, a kipat cil a kipan a ompa thei khinzo na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, na thahat uha Pasian thu note sungah om in gilopa zo khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi.
62002015	Leitung ahi a, leitunga om na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin iplah kei un. Mi khatpeuh in leitung a iplah leh Pa itna ama sungah a om lo ahi hi.
62002016	Banghang hiam cihleh leitunga om nate in, ci le sa lunggulhna, mittang iplahna le nuntak kiphatsak pihnate hi a, tuate in Pa kiang pana hong pai hilo in leitung pan hong pai ahi hi.
62002017	Leitung le leitunga om lunggulhnate a beibei hita a, ahi zongin Pasian deihna a zui mite a om tawntung ding hi.
62002018	Ka taneute aw, tuhun in hun nunung ahi hi. Anti‑khazih hong piang ding hi ci a, na zaksa bangun tu in zong anti‑khazih tampi hong piangzo hi. Tua ahih manin tuhun in hun nunung ahi hi cih i thei hi.
62002019	Amaute in eite tawh kipawl hilo uh ahih manin eite kiang panin a paikhia uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite tawh kipawl hi le uh eite tawh a omkhawm suak ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute khat beek eite tawh hong kipawllohna uh a kilat nadingin eite kiang panin a paikhia uh ahi hi.
62002020	Ahi zongin Siangthopa in note sathau hong nilh khinzo ahih manin na khempeuh na thei uh hi.
62002021	Note in thuman thutak na theih loh manun lai hong khak ka hi kei hi. Thuman thutak na theih man uh leh thuman thutak panin zuauthu piang lo ahih manin lai hong khak ka hi zaw hi.
62002022	Zuaugen mi kua ahi hiam? Zeisu pen Khazih hi cih thu a nial mi hilo ahi hiam? Pa le Tapa a nial mi in anti‑khazih ahi hi.
62002023	Tapa a nial mi peuhmah in Pa zong a nei kei hi. Tapa a sang mi in Pa zong a nei hi.
62002024	Tua ahih manin a cil a kipan na zaksa uh thu note sungah omsak un. A cil a kipan na zaksa uh thu note sungah a om leh Pa le Tapa sungah note zong na om ding uh hi.
62002025	Ama hong kamciamsa thu in nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
62002026	Note hong khem nuam mite tawh kisai in hih thute kong gelh hi.
62002027	Pasian sathau nilhna note sungah om khin ahih manin kuama thuhilh ding na kisam kei uh hi. Tua sathau nilhna in thu khempeuh hong hilh hi. Tua sathau nilhna pen zuauthu hilo in thuman thutak ahih manin hong hilh bangbang in ama sungah omsuak un.
62002028	Tu in, ka taneute aw, ama sungah omsuak un. Tua hi leh amah a hong kilat ciangin i lungmuang dinga, a hong pai ciangin zong ama mai ah i maizum kei ding hi.
62002029	Amah dik hi ci in na theih uh leh a dika gamta mi peuhmah zong ama sung panin a piang ahi hi cih na thei uh hi.
62003001	Pasian tate cihna i ngah theih nadingin Pa in eite tunga hong piak itna bangzahtak in lian ahi hiam! Leitung mite in amah thei lo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong thei kei uh hi.
62003002	Kong itte aw, tu in Pasian tate i hi hi. Tua hi a, tunung cianga i omzia ding ahih leh a kilang nai kei hi. Ahi zongin amah a hong kilat ciangin amah tawh i kibang ding hi cih i thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ahihna bangbang in amah i mu ding hi.
62003003	Hih bang lametna a nei mi khempeuh in Pasian a siantho bangin amah le amah a kisiangthosak ahi hi.
62003004	Mawhna a bawl mi in thukham neilo banga gamta mi ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham neilo banga gamtatna in mawhna ahi hi.
62003005	I mawhnate a lakhia dingin Zeisu hong kilang hi cih thu na thei uh hi. Ama sungah mawhna kici a om kei hi.
62003006	Ama sunga a om mi in mawhna a bawl kei hi. Mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah in amah a mu nailo a thei nailo ahi hi.
62003007	Ka taneute aw, kuamah kikhemsak kei un. A dika gamta mi in Khazih a dik mah bangin midik a suak hi.
62003008	Mawhna a bawl mi in Dawimangpa kiang pan ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Dawimangpa in a kipat cil mahin mawhna a bawlpa ahi hi. Tua ahih manin Dawimangpa nasepte a susia dingin Pasian Tapa hong kilang zo hi.
62003009	Pasian panin a piang mi peuhmah ama sungah Pasian khaici om ahih manin mawhna a bawl kei hi. Amah Pasian panin a piang mi ahih manin mawhna a bawlthei kei hi.
62003010	A dika a gamtalo mi le, a sanggam a itlo mi peuhmah Pasian mi ahi kei hi. Hih bangin Pasian tate le Dawimangpa tate a kikhentel thei hi.
62003011	Banghang hiam cihleh khat le khat ki‑it ni cihna thu in a kipat cil a kipan na zak khitsa uh thu ahi hi.
62003012	Cain bangin om kei ni. Amah mi gilopa mi hi a, a sanggampa a thatpa zong ahi hi. Banghang in a sanggampa that ahi hiam? Ama gamtatna sia in a sanggampa gamtatna a dik hang ahi hi.
62003013	Sanggamte aw, leitung mite in note hong muhdah uh leh lamdangsa kei un.
62003014	Sihna pan nuntakna ah galkah khinzo i hihna thu i sanggamte i itna panin i theithei hi. A sanggam a itlo mi in sihna sungah a omlai ahi hi.
62003015	A sanggam a mudah mi in mithat hi a, mi thatpa sungah nuntak tawntungna a om kei hi cih na thei uh hi.
62003016	Zeisu Khazih in eite aa dingin ama nuntakna hong piakna hangin itna in bang ahi hiam cih i thei hi. Eite in zong i sanggamte aa dingin nuntakna i piak ding a kilawm hi.
62003017	Ahi zongin leitung neih le lam a hau mi khatin a sanggampa khat kitangsapna mu napi in a hehpih nop kei leh bangci bangin ama sungah Pasian itna om thei ding ahi hiam?
62003018	Ka taneute aw, a thu bekin ki‑it kei ni. Kam le muk bek tawh zong ki‑it kei ni. Sepkhiat bawlkhiatna le thuman thutak tawh ki‑it ni.
62003019	Hih thu hangin thuman thutak tawh a kipawl i hihna thei in, ama mai ah lungmuang in i om ding hi.
62003020	Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsim in hong mawhsak leh i lungsim sangin Pasian lianzaw a, amah in na khempeuh a thei hi.
62003021	Kong itte aw, i lungsim in hong mawhsak kei leh Pasian mai ah lungmuanna i nei hi.
62003022	Ama hong thupiakte zui in ama mai ah ama lungdam nading i sep leh ama tung pan i nget peuhpeuh i ngah ding hi.
62003023	Ama hong thupiak in hih ahi hi. Ama hong thupiak mah bangin ama Tapa Zeisu Khazih min i up ding le khat le khat i ki‑it ding thu ahi hi.
62003024	Tu in ama hong thupiakte a zui mi in ama sungah oma amah zong tua mi sungah a om hi. Amah in eite sungah hong om hi cih thu ama hong piak Kha hangin i thei hi.
62004001	Kong itte aw, kha khempeuh um kei un. Khate in Pasian kiang pan ahi hiam ahi kei hiam sittel un. Banghang hiam cihleh zuaugen kamsang tampi leitung ah hong paikhia khinzo hi.
62004002	Pasian Kha na theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi. Zeisu Khazih mihing in hong piang hi ci in a pulak kha khempeuh Pasian kha hi a,
62004003	a pulaklo kha khempeuh Pasian kha ahi kei hi. Tua kha in hong piang ding hi ci a, na zak khitsa bangun tu in leitung ah a om khinzo anti‑khazih kha ahi hi.
62004004	Ka taneute aw, note in Pasian mite na hi uh a, tua khate na zozo uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note sunga a ompa in leitung a a ompa sangin a lianzaw hi.
62004005	Amaute in leitung mi ahih manun leitung thu gen uh a, leitung mite in zong amaute thu a ngai uh hi.
62004006	Eite in Pasian mi i hi hi. Pasian a thei mite in eite thugen ngai uh a, Pasian mi a hilote in eite thugen a ngai kei uh hi. Hih bangin a maan kha le a maanlo kha i khentel thei hi.
62004007	Kong itte aw, khat le khat ki‑it ni. Banghang hiam cihleh ki‑itna in Pasian kiang pan ahi hi. Itna a nei mi in Pasian kiang pana piang hi a, amah in Pasian a thei hi.
62004008	Itna a neilo mi in Pasian a thei kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ki‑itna ahi hi.
62004009	Ama hangin i nuntak theih nadingin Pasian in khat bek a neih a Tapa leitung ah a hong sawlna tawh Pasian in eite hong itna a hong lakzo hi.
62004010	Eite in Pasian i it man hilo in Pasian in eite hong it manin i mawhnate thoihdam nadingin a Tapa hong sawlna in a hong itna ahi hi.
62004011	Kong itte aw, Pasian in hihzahtak in eite hong it ahih leh eite zong khat le khat i ki‑it ding a kilawm hi.
62004012	Kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahi zongin eite khat le khat i ki‑it leh eite sungah Pasian hong omin, eite sungah ama itna a hong picingsak hi.
62004013	Ama Kha eite hong pia khinzo ahih manin ama sungah eite i om a, eite sungah amah a hong om hi cih thu i thei hi.
62004014	Pa in leitung mite Honpa dinga a hong sawl a Tapa ka mu zo uh a, ama thu teci ka pang uh hi.
62004015	Zeisu in Pasian Tapa hi ci in a pulak mi peuhmah sungah Pasian om a, tua mi zong Pasian sungah a om hi.
62004016	Pasian in eite hong itna eite in thei in i umzo hi. Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sunga a om mi in Pasian sungah a om hi a, Pasian zong tua mi sungah a om hi.
62004017	Leitung ah amah bangin nungta in thukhen ni ciangin hangtak a i om theih nadingin amah in itna sungah eite hong picingsak hi.
62004018	Itna sungah launa a om kei hi. A cingtak itna in launa a beisak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh launa in gawt ding kihtakna hi a, a lau mi in itna cingtak a neilo ahi hi.
62004019	Amah in eite hong it masa ahih manin eite in amah i it hi.
62004020	Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” a cih hangin a sanggampa a muhdah leh zuaugen ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a muh theih a sanggampa a itlo mi in a muh theihloh Pasian bangci it theih ding ahi hiam?
62004021	Pasian a it mi in a sanggampa zong a it hi cih thupiakna ama tung panin i ngah hi.
62005001	Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi, ci in a um mi peuhmah in Pasian kiang pana piang ahi hi. A Piangsakpa a it mi in a piansak mi zong a it hi.
62005002	Pasian it in ama hong thupiakte i zuih ciangin Pasian tate a it i hihlam i kithei hi.
62005003	Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a hong it manin a thupiakte a zui i hi hi. Ama hong thupiakte zong a zuihhak ahi kei hi.
62005004	Pasian kiang pana piang mi peuhmah in leitung a zo khin ahi hi. Eite upna in leitung a zo gualzawhna ahi hi.
62005005	Zeisu in Pasian Tapa ahi hi, ci in a um mi simloh leitung a zo mi kua om ahi hiam?
62005006	Tui le sisan tawh a hong paipa in Zeisu Khazih ahi hi. Tui bek tawh hilo in tui le sisan tawh amah a hong pai hi. Hih thu teci a pangpa in Kha ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Kha in thuman thutak ahi hi.
62005007	Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ah teci a pang thum om a, tuate in Pa, Thu, le Kha Siangtho ahi hi. Hih thumte in pumkhat ahi hi.
62005008	Leitung ah zong teci a pang thum mah a om hi. Tuate in Kha, tui, le sisan hi a, hih thumteng in thukhat in a luang uh hi.
